rows.Title: Proximity sensor not working
rows.Problem: Proximity sensor is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The proximity sensor is not functioning properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The sensor is not working, which prevents the device from detecting when the phone is near the user's face, potentially causing issues during calls.

rows.Title: Studio App Keeps Stopping after save edit video
rows.Problem: The Studio App crashes when saving changes to a video after editing in the gallery app
rows.Summarized Problem: The Studio App crashes when saving edited videos.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes during a critical operation (saving edits), making it unusable for video editing.
rows.R&D Comment: We added defense code to prevent crash in this case. Please check it with app version 7.1.8.0 or later.

rows.Title: System's UI not responding
rows.Problem: System's UI not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The system's user interface is not responding.
rows.Severity Reason: The UI is unresponsive, making the device unusable for basic interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: ANR occur in SystemUI due to accessing telephonyManager API in MobileConnectionRepositoryImpl. A try-catch has been applied in UTAH branch (CL#30708369) and will reflect in B OS (OneUI 8.0); it will not be applied in PROD_UTAH.

rows.Title: AI generative icon not available in gallery
rows.Problem: unable to see AI generative logo between favorite and edit icon
rows.Summarized Problem: The AI generative icon is missing in the gallery interface between the favorite and edit icons.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, preventing visibility of a feature but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue may occur if "Show menu in viewer bottom" is turned on through Gallery labs. Gallery Labs is not an official setting; users should avoid it and reset the setting by closing gallery and restarting the app.

rows.Title: Eye Comfort Shield Doesn't Work
rows.Problem: Eye Comfort Shield doesn't work while using Samsung Wallet
rows.Summarized Problem: The Eye Comfort Shield feature does not function while using Samsung Wallet.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails during a core user interaction, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: An optical fingerprint sensor requires sufficient light; color modes like Eye Comfort Shield are temporarily disabled during authentication to ensure proper fingerprint scanning. A temporary disablement of eye comfort shield during fingerprint authentication improves sensor performance.

rows.Title: Face issue with recyclebin
rows.Problem: Deleting an image does not work; instead, it shows 'can move the file please try again' and an error acquired at the bottom of the screen
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot delete images as the recycle bin shows an error message instead of proper deletion.
rows.Severity Reason: The deletion function fails, but the user can still attempt the action, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: User is using an outdated version of the My Files app. Countermeasure: Instruct user to uninstall updates and reinstall the app.

rows.Title: Camera failed
rows.Problem: Issue persists after reset and multiple attempts to resolve
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear wide (x1.0) camera is not functioning despite reset attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function is completely failing, rendering a key device feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: There is some rear Wide(x1.0) camera HW error in the attached log. Please visit to CS center and request to check the rear Wide(x1.0) camera module or related HW.

rows.Title: Screen refresh rate feels unoptimized at 60Hz
rows.Problem: The 60Hz refresh rate is very unoptimized; when switching to 60Hz, the screen feels like it is running at 10-12Hz, which is highly unsatisfactory.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen feels unoptimized at 60Hz, behaving as if it's running at only 10-12Hz.
rows.Severity Reason: The user perceives a significant performance lag, making the screen feel unresponsive and unoptimized, which severely impacts usability.
rows.R&D Comment: There are no abnormal logs; issue reproduction steps and video are missing. If seen again, reproduce with video, logs, and systrace.

rows.Title: PIP Mode not working properly while rotating device
rows.Problem: Inconsistencies in auto rotate and PIP mode animations on a flagship level phone
rows.Summarized Problem: PIP mode fails to function correctly during device rotation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent animations but does not result in device crash or complete loss of functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: No further OS VER 14 release planned. Please check issue on latest OS VER 15 and update accordingly.

rows.Title: Overheating issue
rows.Problem: Phone heats abnormally after using Amazon UPI scan, causing glitches and difficulty typing, internet drops from 5G to 2G
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone overheats during Amazon UPI scan usage, leading to performance glitches and internet connectivity loss.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheats during specific app usage, causing functional glitches and loss of connectivity, making the device unusable in real-time operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating occurs due to high CPU and network consumption by Amazon UPI scan app, with multiple package launches and high data usage; countermeasure includes optimizing app resource consumption and reducing background activity.

rows.Title: Battery drainage issue
rows.Problem: Battery level rapidly decreased from 7% to 3% without significant usage, dropping to 1% by 4:24 PM despite minimal device usage.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain without significant usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drains rapidly to 1% without noticeable usage, indicating potential device unusability.

rows.Title: AOD not working
rows.Problem: The Always on display is very dim and not visible in normal lighting conditions. When double-tapped to turn on, brightness increases, but otherwise it remains dim. The AOD brightness varies from 2 to 60 nits, and is affected by overall display brightness settings, especially when adaptive.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always On Display is too dim and not visible under normal lighting conditions, despite being adjustable on tap.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility in normal lighting but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: video recording problem
rows.Problem: Video recording shows 50/50 stuttering when switching from 1440P 60 HDR to 2160P 60 HDR. Stuttering may affect screen recording display accuracy.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recording stutters at 2160P 60 HDR resolution, causing inconsistent playback and potential screen recording issues.
rows.Severity Reason: Stuttering at high resolution prevents smooth video recording, making the feature unusable under normal use conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: This model uses Exynos1380 chipset with max UHD@30fps support; YouTube app attempts 4K 60fps playback, which is unsupported. Issue reported to Google (b/329373194).

rows.Title: Wi-Fi not turning on
rows.Problem: Wi-Fi not turning on
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi is not turning on and fails to connect due to PCIe link down.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot establish Wi-Fi connection, preventing basic network functionality and usability.
rows.R&D Comment: PCIe link down has been failed with Wi-Fi and AP. Please guide that customer should contact to local service center for checking FPCB.

rows.Title: Notes Functions not working
rows.Problem: When trying to open the notes app and go to drawing option, it doesn't work and automatically reaches the home page.
rows.Summarized Problem: The drawing feature in the Notes app fails and redirects to the home screen when accessed.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work properly but does not cause device crash or data loss, only partial functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue fixed in new version. Please wait for new version of Samsung Notes on market app update will release soon.

rows.Title: Auto restart device but not turn on
rows.Problem: Phone restart automatically but not turning on when cx hold the power for longer than usual then it turned on
rows.Summarized Problem: The device restarts automatically without turning on when the power is held for longer than usual.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to turn on after restart, making it unusable during the boot process.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide complete ramdump logs to analyse the root cause of the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to use Keep open Setting
rows.Problem: Users cannot keep more than one application open in recent apps on Galaxy M35. The feature works on other devices like Galaxy F15 and M53.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot keep multiple applications open in the recent apps on Galaxy M35, while the same feature works on other devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a feature, where functionality differs across devices but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: As per current scenario, devices with 8GB RAM can only have one app kept open in recents. This behavior is normal; future updates may allow changes, but for now, the current status will be maintained.

rows.Title: Jitter and Lag while scrolling apps
rows.Problem: Scrolling apps causes stutter, jitter, or hang for a second, affecting all applications including Samsung apps. Issue persists since phone purchase.
rows.Summarized Problem: Scrolling applications causes noticeable stutter and lag due to system performance issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device to freeze or hang during scrolling, making app navigation unusable and impacting overall user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Storage not updating after file deletion
rows.Problem: Storage display incorrect after file deletion; shows same storage size until device restarts, then shows accurate storage
rows.Summarized Problem: The device incorrectly displays storage after file deletion, showing the same storage size until restart, when it then shows accurate values.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent storage display during active use, affecting user trust and usability, but does not prevent device operation or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Tap & Pay feature unavailable in Samsung Wallet
rows.Problem: Tap & Pay feature unavailable in Samsung Wallet despite NFC capability
rows.Summarized Problem: Tap & Pay feature is unavailable in Samsung Wallet despite the device having NFC capability.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a wallet app with NFC support, but the device is not unusable or crashing.
rows.R&D Comment: As the device does not have DRK support, Pay card is not supported. Hence it is decided to go with Mini version of Samsung Wallet which is the current expected behavior.

rows.Title: Device lags while playing any game
rows.Problem: Device lags during game play, especially with small games like Shadow Fight 4, despite having ample free memory and RAM Plus enabled. Performance degrades significantly when gaming, even on a mid-range device with Snapdragon Gen 2 chip.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant lag when playing games, even small ones, despite having sufficient memory and optimized settings.
rows.Severity Reason: Gaming causes high CPU usage and device temperature rise, leading to noticeable lag and degraded performance, making the device unusable for gaming tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Device temperature increases during gaming, especially in multiwindow mode, due to high CPU usage. Counter Measure: Disable alternate game performance management, play in cool and normal mode, avoid fast charging, reduce brightness, and ensure good network conditions.

rows.Title: Battery reducing every 30 seconds
rows.Problem: Battery is reducing by 1 percent every 30 seconds even with no background apps, clean memory, and device care showing great battery condition
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery is draining by 1 percent every 30 seconds despite no background apps or high usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Device is losing battery at a rapid rate, indicating a potential hardware issue affecting core power management.
rows.R&D Comment: Voltage has dropped below 3.4V with observed fluctuations; device should be sent to HQ for hardware inspection of SOC-voltage mismatch.

rows.Title: Network fluctuating
rows.Problem: Losing signal while using 5G mode and making calls, using Saku data.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience frequent signal loss and connectivity issues when using 5G mode and making calls.
rows.Severity Reason: Signal loss during active calls and 5G usage renders the device unusable for communication, a core function.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: No Network and Fluctuation Problem
rows.Problem: Phone A23 with BSNL SIM shows no 4G/VoLTE, downgrades to 2G during calls, no internet. VoLTE works on A14 with BSNL SIM. When BSNL SIM is placed in A14, VoLTE works. When same SIM is placed in A23, VoLTE does not work. Testing shows inconsistency in network registration on A23.
rows.Summarized Problem: VoLTE and 4G network registration fail on device A23 with BSNL SIM, while working on other devices and SIMs.
rows.Severity Reason: Device fails to maintain 4G/VoLTE connectivity during calls, leading to loss of internet and call quality, making the device unusable for communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Bug report Captured popup appeared in watch repeatedly
rows.Problem: Error reports appear repeatedly on Galaxy Watch4 indicating the report will be sent to mobile, but it is not actually sent. User experience with Samsung support has been poor.
rows.Summarized Problem: A popup message indicating a bug report will be sent to mobile appears repeatedly on the Galaxy Watch, but the report is not actually sent.
rows.Severity Reason: The message appears repeatedly, causing user confusion, but does not result in a device crash or data loss, and is not a complete failure of a core function.
rows.R&D Comment: When an accessory log is sent from Samsung Members, the connected watch's log is acquired and a log acquisition screen is shown. This is normal behavior.

rows.Title: GPS not working
rows.Problem: GPS is not working. I tried all troubleshooting steps, but no success.
rows.Summarized Problem: GPS functionality is not working on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: GPS is a core navigation and location feature; its failure prevents basic device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Vibration when adjusting volume
rows.Problem: Slight vibration when increasing or decreasing volume to extreme levels, occasionally not working after December update on A55 device. Cannot capture video as vibration is not visible in recordings.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience slight vibration when adjusting volume to extreme levels, which may not be visible in recordings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user interaction with volume controls but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs during volume adjustment to extreme levels; logs are missing during the event. If it reoccurs, new logs should be collected immediately after the event.

rows.Title: haptic feedback vibration is low
rows.Problem: the haptic feedback vibration on my s21fe exynos is very low after the latest november security patch update
rows.Summarized Problem: The haptic feedback vibration is significantly reduced after the latest security patch update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a user experience feature, affecting feedback consistency but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Logs seem normal, no abnormality can be seen. Seems like motor h/w is defective. Counter Measure: Please check for motor hardware and replace the defective component.

rows.Title: Poor Network warnings popup during online gaming
rows.Problem: Ping issues occur during online games despite stable network connection and low ping (20-30 ms), with game consistently showing 'Poor Network' warnings.
rows.Summarized Problem: Online games show 'Poor Network' warnings despite stable and low ping connections.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent network warning display during gameplay, affecting user experience but not causing device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera Failed popup
rows.Problem: please find pic of the issue along with system log
rows.Summarized Problem: A failure popup appears when using the camera function.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function fails with a popup, making it unusable during operation.

rows.Title: Screen freeze error
rows.Problem: Screen freezing occurs despite reset, cache clearing, and storage deletion; no third-party apps installed
rows.Summarized Problem: The device screen freezes even after device reset, cache clearing, and storage deletion, with no third-party apps installed.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen freezing prevents normal device operation and renders the device unusable during use.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: OCTA's touch I2C signal operation is not working properly; Countermeasure: Replace OCTA first, then mainboard if symptoms persist.

rows.Title: Sound not coming in recorded video
rows.Problem: Unable to hear sound after recording video
rows.Summarized Problem: No sound is heard in recorded videos.
rows.Severity Reason: The audio is missing during video recording, which affects the usability of the camera function but does not cause device crash or total failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Modify the "va-mic-mono-lpi" and "speaker-dmic-endfire" controls to make them compatible

rows.Title: Lagging during game play in low graphics
rows.Problem: Lag and heat issue on Samsung phone while playing short term games in low graphics, resulting in choppy, slow gameplay and overheating
rows.Summarized Problem: Device lags and overheats when playing games in low graphics on Samsung phones, causing choppy and slow gameplay.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive and overheats during gameplay, leading to choppy performance and potential instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: After charging, the phone's initial temperature is relatively high; using Instagram voice calls while gaming increases temperature, triggering frequency limitations. Counter Measure: Cool the phone to room temperature before gaming, and use in-game voice chat while clearing background apps to reduce heating and lag.

rows.Title: Can't change the password of App timer in digital wellbeing application
rows.Problem: I can't change the password of App timer in digital wellbeing application because I forgot the password. There's no option to re-set it, all it's showing is to contact the customer care service. But the customer care service is asking to go on a physical Samsung service centre.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot reset the password for the App Timer in the Digital Wellbeing application, as there is no password recovery option available.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents password recovery but does not cause device crash or complete failure of core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: If you don't remember your password, use the master pin code. Master pin code is Digital Wellbeing's App version. If Digital Wellbeing's App version is 5.1.02.8, please input pin code 51028. We plan to support a password retrieval function in the next version.

rows.Title: Fast charging stop working
rows.Problem: Phone does not detect charger initially, requires multiple plug-in attempts to detect, then charges slowly, taking approximately 4 hours to fully charge.
rows.Summarized Problem: Fast charging fails to initiate and instead charges slowly after multiple plug-in attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: Device fails to charge efficiently, resulting in significantly prolonged charging time, which impacts usability and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: In the log, there is no information when your phone connected with charger. Please guide the customer to get the log when issue occurs for further analysis.

rows.Title: usb device not recognise error during call
rows.Problem: usb device not recognise error during call. ethernet works fine when connected, but usb device not recognised during call. after cutting the call, ethernet adapter works again. please fix in s23
rows.Summarized Problem: USB device is not recognised during calls on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs intermittently during calls and affects functionality under specific conditions, but does not cause complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: No further OS VER 14 release planned. Please check issue on latest OS VER 15 and update accordingly.

rows.Title: Drawing does not work in notes app widget
rows.Problem: Drawing does not work in notes app widget. This happens always.
rows.Summarized Problem: Drawing functionality is not working in the notes app widget.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional and always fails, preventing users from using the widget as intended.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue fixed in new version. Please wait new version of samsung Notes on market app update will release soon. Thank you

rows.Title: Photo Editor Not Functioning Properly
rows.Problem: Issue with Samsung Photo Editor Not Functioning Properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Photo Editor fails to function properly due to issues during restoration of photo analysis data during smart switch.
rows.Severity Reason: The photo editor does not work fully but can be partially used after restoration, indicating a partial malfunction.
rows.Resolve Type: Issue Fixed(Fixed automatically by Main branch)
rows.R&D Comment: When the smart switch occurs, if the analyzed information of the photos from the previous device is restored in new device, the analysis information increased but there was an issue during restoration so photo editor cannot saved normally. Duplicate restoration issue was resolved during Smart switch with large amount of analyzed images. - P240213-05083 : modification done. Please guide to user like below [Guide] In this issue case, analyzed information will not be deleted automatically.

rows.Title: Rear camera slow to start
rows.Problem: Rear camera is slow to start after recent update; front camera works fine
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear camera takes a long time to start after a recent software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a delay in camera startup but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Camera module fails to initialize fast AEC; Countermeasure: User clears camera data/cache and restarts device.

rows.Title: No network problem after recent update
rows.Problem: Phone faces no network and no SIM for 1-3 minutes, repeated 4-5 times per hour after system update
rows.Summarized Problem: Device fails to register network and detect SIM after system update, with intermittent occurrences.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent network registration failure, affecting connectivity but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Mobile phone is still lagging or froze
rows.Problem: Phone getting slow and suddenly restarting. Then heating up. Cpu temperature going around and above 70°C
rows.Summarized Problem: The mobile phone is experiencing persistent lag and sudden restarts, leading to slow performance and overheating.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is becoming unresponsive and overheating, which can lead to system instability and potential hardware damage.
rows.R&D Comment: There are multiple KP on different call stacks in a single day, check for hardware inspection

rows.Title: Video player unresponsive during slow-motion video generation
rows.Problem: Video player is unresponsive when attempting to generate slow-motion video clips from existing footage
rows.Summarized Problem: The video player fails to respond when generating slow-motion video clips from existing footage.
rows.Severity Reason: The video player becomes unresponsive during a core feature operation, preventing users from completing a basic editing task.

rows.Title: Latency between video and sound on every app
rows.Problem: Latency between video and sound occurs on every app when using Bluetooth headphones. Videos lag for a second and audio delay starts. Issue persists after cache wipe and factory reset. Headphones work fine on other devices.
rows.Summarized Problem: There is a latency issue between video and audio when using Bluetooth headphones across all apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects audio synchronization across apps but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is intermittent or device-specific.
rows.R&D Comment: A2DP delay observed in logs; recommend checking settings in Soundassistant app under Bluetooth Metronome.

rows.Title: Wrist detection on Watch 4 device is broken
rows.Problem: Wrist detection is broken after One UI 6 Watch update, with no foreign matter or damage found; wear-off occurs due to non-contact of electrode sensor
rows.Summarized Problem: Wrist detection on Galaxy Watch 4 is no longer functioning after the One UI 6 update due to electrode sensor non-contact.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to detect wrist wear, which is a core functionality for the watch, rendering it unusable for basic operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Wear-off occurred due to non-contact of electrode sensor; recommend checking for foreign matter or visiting a service center for sensor inspection.

rows.Title: camera captured blurry image with poor focus
rows.Problem: camera captured blurry image with poor focus, color and other issues when scanning documents
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to capture clear and focused images when scanning documents.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera cannot produce sharp images for document scanning, making it unusable for its primary function.
rows.R&D Comment: When capturing close and slanted objects with a large sensor, lens design leads to poor focus; users should be guided to stay farther away and use zoom.

rows.Title: Pro video mode 9:21 ratio causes elongated video
rows.Problem: Video recorded in pro video mode with 9:21 ratio appears elongated, making objects look stretched and video quality degraded.
rows.Summarized Problem: Videos recorded in pro video mode with 9:21 ratio appear elongated, distorting object sizes and reducing video quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The distortion significantly degrades video quality and usability, making content appear unnatural and misleading.

rows.Title: Unable to change wallpaper
rows.Problem: Unable to change lock screen wallpaper
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change their lock screen wallpaper.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing users from customizing their lock screen, but the device remains otherwise functional.
rows.R&D Comment: No further OS VER 14 release planned. Please check issue on latest OS VER 15 and update accordingly.

rows.Title: TITLE not showing while playing the video
rows.Problem: After updating the app, TITLE not showing while playing the video. Previously it was working normally without any issues. After the latest updates, many problems occurred.
rows.Summarized Problem: The video title is not displayed when playing videos, especially when the video is not accessed through Gallery or MyFiles.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality in specific use cases but does not cause device crash or complete failure.

rows.Title: frame drop issue when switch to 2160p hdr 60 fps on youtube
rows.Problem: frame drop issue when switch to 2160p hdr 60 fps on youtube
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube experiences frame drops when switching to 2160p HDR at 60fps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot support 2160p at 60fps due to chipset limitations, causing playback instability and frame drops, making video viewing unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by the Exynos1380 chipset not supporting 2160p at 60fps; the YouTube app requests a resolution beyond hardware capability, and the countermeasure is to play at FHD 60fps instead.

rows.Title: Camera captured hazy effect image on 10X zoom
rows.Problem: Camera on 10x zoom shows hazy effect, very irritating, requires developer fix
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces a hazy image when using 10X zoom, affecting image clarity and user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The hazy effect significantly degrades image quality, making photos unusable and impacting core camera functionality.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification
rows.R&D Comment: When zoom is operated during shooting, the angle of view decreases and light variation occurs, leading to color loss and image haze; the issue is due to differences in camera modules and lens conditions.

rows.Title: Battery draining fast
rows.Problem: Phone battery is draining fast after December software update
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone's battery is draining rapidly after the December software update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is significant but not causing device crash or complete failure, and the issue is reported post-update, suggesting a partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Device battery drain is observed post-update; require extended usage logs to confirm and analyze root cause.

rows.Title: Phone getting lags during normal usage
rows.Problem: Phone experiences input lags, app loading time delays, jitters, and stutters during normal usage.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone experiences significant input lags, jitters, and stutters during normal usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive and unusable during normal operation due to severe lag and stuttering, affecting core user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: The lag is caused by power saving mode limiting device performance and an ANR in a third-party VPN app; countermeasure is to disable the VPN app.

rows.Title: 5G network takes considerable time to connect after turning on the mobile data
rows.Problem: 5G network takes considerable time to connect after turning on the mobile data
rows.Summarized Problem: The device takes a long time to connect to 5G after turning on mobile data.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in 5G connection timing, which persists despite user troubleshooting and proper network conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Lag While Recording video
rows.Problem: Lag while recording video happening in every S23 I own after the November patch update
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recording experiences lag after the November patch update on all S23 devices.
rows.Severity Reason: Lag during recording severely impacts user experience and makes video capture unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: WiFi Calling not working
rows.Problem: WiFi Calling is not working consistently, despite trying all suggested options. This is causing significant inconvenience.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi Calling is not working consistently on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents a core communication feature from functioning, causing significant user inconvenience and device usability problems.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Imobile app keep crashing
rows.Problem: Imobile app crashes every time when trying to login, started after last security patch update on Samsung Galaxy S23
rows.Summarized Problem: The iMobile app crashes repeatedly during login attempts on Samsung Galaxy S23 after a security patch update.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes during login, a critical function, making the user unable to access their banking services.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a third-party app defect in iMobile by ICICI Bank; countermeasure is to have the third-party app owner fix the issue.

rows.Title: Camera zooming produces painted and crayon-like images
rows.Problem: Photos captured while zooming out appear painted and like crayon drawings
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera produces painted and crayon-like images when zooming in.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visual distortion during zoom but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Visual texture distortion during zoom. Countermeasure: Improve image processing in zoom mode to preserve natural textures.

rows.Title: Home Page getting changed Automatically
rows.Problem: Home Page is changing automatically after OS upgrade to Jan 2025
rows.Summarized Problem: The Home Page is changing automatically after an OS upgrade, disrupting user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the Home Page layout, affecting user interface consistency but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification
rows.R&D Comment: The 'Add to Home' concept currently does not place apps on the Home Page when space is available, which contradicts UX expectations. A countermeasure has been proposed to ensure apps are added to the Home Page when possible, maintaining layout consistency.

rows.Title: Unable to update S wallet App
rows.Problem: Samsung wallet couldn't update and has many bugs
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Wallet app cannot update and has multiple bugs.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to update and has multiple bugs, making it non-functional and impacting core payment functionality.

rows.Title: Biometric option restarts phone
rows.Problem: Phone restarts when tapping biometric option in security and privacy
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone restarts when tapping the biometric option in security and privacy settings.
rows.Severity Reason: Device restarts unexpectedly upon user interaction, making the device unusable during the process.
rows.R&D Comment: Given logs are insufficient to identify root cause; require complete RDX logs for analysis.

rows.Title: System UI keep Stop popup Occur
rows.Problem: Automatically stopped
rows.Summarized Problem: The System UI periodically stops and displays a popup notification.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent UI instability but does not lead to device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: ANR occur in SystemUI due to accessing telephonyManager API in MobileConnectionRepositoryImpl. Telephony team suggested to apply try catch in problem code block and it is applied in UTAH branch with CL#30708369. As discussed with our Part Leader, only critical patches are allowed to be applied in PROD_UTAH, so it will not be applied in PROD_UTAH. The changes will reflect in B OS (OneUI 8.0). Please maintain current state for UTAH models.

rows.Title: Unable to access document session in My Files
rows.Problem: Unable to access the document session within My Files
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access document sessions in the My Files app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents access to document sessions but does not cause device crash or complete failure of core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Error during load of Google Drive files leads to StringIndexOutOfBoundsException; Countermeasure: Updated app version with fix and user sign-out/workaround steps.

rows.Title: Camera stop working
rows.Problem: Camera is not working suddenly
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera function has suddenly stopped working.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera is completely non-functional, preventing basic device usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Power on camera failed; sensor open fail, possibly due to hardware failure. Counter Measure: Reboot device and send to SS center if issue persists.

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor not working
rows.Problem: After software update, fingerprint sensor is not working. User has tried multiple times to register fingerprint but it remains unresponsive.
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint sensor is not responding after a software update, despite multiple attempts to register the fingerprint.
rows.Severity Reason: The fingerprint sensor is completely unresponsive, preventing user from unlocking the device, which is a core security and usability function.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: One no match and one bad quality fingerprint due to protective film affecting light transmission. Countermeasure: Check if user uses protective film that interferes with fingerprint quality.

rows.Title: Wifi Not working in device
rows.Problem: WiFi and Hotspot do not turn on; the interface brightens slightly then stops. Long press to access settings results in the switch stopping mid-action, same behavior with Bluetooth.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi and Hotspot fail to activate, with the interface freezing at a partial state, and Bluetooth exhibits the same behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot establish basic network connectivity, rendering core functionality like internet access unavailable.
rows.R&D Comment: WLAN driver loading fails, suspecting a hardware issue within the WiFi chipset. HW inspection required at CS center.

rows.Title: Drag and drop for text from browser not working
rows.Problem: Drag and drop for text from browser not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Drag and drop functionality for text from browser is not working.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a specific context (browser to app), but does not prevent overall device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is caused because Google Docs does not accept text drop from Samsung Internet. This is a third party app issue. Please maintain current status.

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor not working
rows.Problem: Fingerprint sensor not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The fingerprint sensor is not functioning properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The fingerprint sensor is a core biometric function required for device access, and its failure prevents user authentication.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Poor image quality from fingerprint sensor; Counter Measure: Thick protective film may interfere; recommend checking sensor at customer service center without protective film.

rows.Title: Unable to connect eSIM in watch
rows.Problem: Please check screen recording
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot connect to eSIM on the watch.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a missing eSIM profile and unsupported operation, preventing connection but not causing device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No eSIM profile downloaded; device initialized without profile. Counter Measure: Verify customer has properly downloaded eSIM profile.

rows.Title: Camera is not working
rows.Problem: Front and back camera including torch is not working. When trying to turn on torch, it shows 'can't turn on torch because the light is being used by another app'
rows.Summarized Problem: The front and back camera and torch are not working, and the torch cannot be turned on due to another app using the light.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera and torch functions are completely non-functional, preventing basic device usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Mouse cannot resize apps in multi-window mode
rows.Problem: The mouse cannot resize apps in multi-window mode; clicks register on background objects instead, causing major inconvenience. This happens with all apps. Window moving works, but resizing fails and triggers home screen scroll.
rows.Summarized Problem: The mouse fails to resize apps in multi-window mode, with clicks registering on background elements instead.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot effectively manage multiple apps, making the multi-window feature unusable for productivity tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue has been fixed in the latest binary.

rows.Title: Captured Images look dull and there is lack of focus in the photo
rows.Problem: Photos taken on Samsung f55 look dull and lack focus compared to Redmi k50i, with visible dullness in pink and brown colors under same lighting and distance conditions
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos taken on the device appear dull and lack focus, especially in colors like pink and brown, under consistent lighting and distance conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo appearance but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and is noticeable only in visual quality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Normal phenomenon; Countermeasure: Normal phenomenon

rows.Title: Dolby Atmos sound has broken
rows.Problem: Dolby Atmos sound has broken after the 6.1.1 AI update on S23 Ultra. The sound feels less loud compared to before, despite being on the latest software patch. Many users report the same issue, and no fix has been provided.
rows.Summarized Problem: Dolby Atmos sound functionality has degraded or stopped working after the 6-1-1 AI update on the S23 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects sound quality but does not cause device crash or total failure; users can still use other audio modes.
rows.R&D Comment: Customers should be guided to select their preferred audio mode (Dolby Auto/Movie/Music or Dolby Off) among available options.

rows.Title: Google play system update failed
rows.Problem: Google play system update failed error
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Play system update fails due to credential re-entry requirement.
rows.Severity Reason: The update fails to proceed, preventing users from receiving system updates, which is critical for device functionality and security.

rows.Title: Sound Picker keeps stopping
rows.Problem: Sound picker stops working
rows.Summarized Problem: The sound picker feature stops working unexpectedly.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature stops working, preventing users from selecting sounds, which is a core functionality in UI settings.
rows.R&D Comment: NullPointerException thrown in SecSoundPickerFragment when accessing internal routine; solution applied in V OS via CL#30191070.

rows.Title: Lines appear while taking video
rows.Problem: 2 lines appear while taking video
rows.Summarized Problem: Two lines appear during video recording.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in video recording functionality, not rendering the device unusable but affecting visual output.
rows.R&D Comment: This failure is due to camera sensor hardware fault. Please visit nearest Samsung support Centre for further help.

rows.Title: Mobile Data is Not working
rows.Problem: Mobile data is on but no network symbol. Tried phone restart, network reset, airplane mode, sim tray eject and insert, but no network connection.
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile data shows as connected but no network symbol appears, despite attempts to reset or reinsert the SIM.
rows.Severity Reason: Device fails to establish a network connection even after multiple restarts and SIM resets, rendering mobile data unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No disconnection observed in logs; data connection reported with no cause. Countermeasure: Provide CP silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Unable to Update sleep tracking
rows.Problem: Sleep tracking is gone haywire with missing hours and incorrect start and end times. Heart rate data is also missing. The watch detects sleep start and end times significantly off from actual times.
rows.Summarized Problem: Sleep tracking is malfunctioning with incorrect start and end times and missing data.
rows.Severity Reason: The sleep tracking function is completely off, leading to inaccurate data and potential user confusion about actual sleep duration and quality.

rows.Title: AI chat assistance not working
rows.Problem: AI chat assistance is not working on Samsung Messages after an update. Tried clearing cache and restarting, but issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: AI chat assistance feature is not functioning in Samsung Messages after a system update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing or not working, but the device remains otherwise usable and core functions are intact.
rows.R&D Comment: No further OS VER 14 release planned. Please check issue on latest OS VER 15 and update accordingly.

rows.Title: Cannot find Good Lock app in Galaxy Store
rows.Problem: Unable to find Good Lock app on Galaxy Store; app is not available in user's region despite being useful and supported by Samsung users.
rows.Summarized Problem: Good Lock app is not available on Galaxy Store due to regional restrictions.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is missing from the store in the user's region, preventing access to a useful feature, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Good Lock is not available in the user's region currently, but we plan to launch global availability later.

rows.Title: Network reception issue with BSNL 4G
rows.Problem: Samsung Galaxy S24 FE has poor 4G network reception on BSNL SIM, while other devices show better reception at the same location and same SIM.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Galaxy S24 FE has poor 4G network reception on BSN
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves inconsistent network performance compared to other devices on the same SIM and location, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Battery Getting drain in normal Usage
rows.Problem: Battery usage summary shows 53% consumption in a day, but sum of individual app battery usage adds up to only 29.3%. This suggests unlisted background processes or activities are causing additional drain.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery consumption exceeds the sum of individual app usage, indicating background processes are draining battery beyond app-level visibility.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial malfunction: the battery usage discrepancy suggests background processes are active, but not fully accounted for in app-level breakdowns, affecting user experience without rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery usage may differ from the sum of battery usage for each app in the app list because the battery usage list does not display some system usage and system app usage, and apps with less than 0.1% usage are not shown. This is normal operation based on concept.

rows.Title: Camera quality degraded after Update
rows.Problem: Camera quality has degraded after update, especially in low light with high zoom, resulting in shaky star images due to camera shake and motion.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera quality degrades after update, especially in low light with high zoom, causing shaky star images due to motion and camera shake.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction under specific conditions (low light, high zoom), not causing device crash or data loss, but affects user experience significantly.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Night mode in high zoom and low light causes image shake due to noise reduction algorithm. Counter Measure: Same as cause; no improvement in algorithm implementation.

rows.Title: Volte does not latch in BSNL SIM
rows.Problem: No composer or file upload option; background log collection occurs; VoLTE works with 4G BSNL SIM but not with original 5G BSNL SIM; flight mode toggling does not resolve issue
rows.Summarized Problem: VoLTE fails to register on BSNL 5G SIM but works on 4G BSNL SIM, indicating a compatibility issue between VoLTE and 5G BSNL network support.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality (VoLTE works on 4G but not 5G), indicating intermittent failure rather than complete device unavailability or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera not working
rows.Problem: Camera is not working after device update
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera is not functioning after a device update.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera is a core device function, and its failure renders a key feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: There are not enough logs to find root cause for this issue. Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to Add Phone Number in Profile Sharing Card
rows.Problem: The phone number cannot be added for profile card sharing
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot add a phone number to the profile sharing card.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially unavailable, preventing phone number input but not causing device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Cannot retrieve phone number from USIM. Countermeasure: Verify USIM status to ensure correct information retrieval.

rows.Title: Phone heats up after rough usage of 2 mins of camera
rows.Problem: Phone heats up during camera usage with continuous on/off cycles, 5G data usage, and package usage; temperature rises to 39-40 degrees, which is under spec; thermal management system is working fine.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone heats up during prolonged camera usage due to continuous on/off cycles and high data usage, with temperature rise under specified limits.
rows.Severity Reason: The temperature increase is within specified limits and does not affect device usability or performance.
rows.R&D Comment: In the given set of logs no overheating found when using social media apps. Temperature only rise to 39-40 degree due to continuously camera on/off, 5g data usage and pkg usage. Temperature raise in this scenario is under spec. Thermal management system is working fine to control heat in the device.

rows.Title: Not able to play 4k content on phone
rows.Problem: Using Z Fold 5 with Netflix 4k UHD plan but unable to play 4k content despite software and app updates
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot play 4K content on their phones despite having a 4K UHD Netflix plan and device updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial failure in media playback functionality under specific conditions, but does not result in device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is irreproducible on our end; no widevine errors in logs. User needs to delete app data/cache and check playback specs.

rows.Title: Theme not applying fully in dark mode
rows.Problem: Theme does not apply fully when dark mode is enabled or disabled; user reports inconsistency and lack of resolution despite multiple complaints
rows.Summarized Problem: The theme fails to apply fully when dark mode is enabled or disabled, resulting in inconsistent appearance across the interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality in UI appearance but does not cause device crash or data loss, and user experience is affected rather than rendered unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: When dark mode is applied, theme resources are not applied; users should be guided that dark mode and theme resources cannot be used together.

rows.Title: Network reception issue
rows.Problem: Device has network reception issue with 4G frequency bands 70
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences poor network reception when switching from 4G to 3G with BSNL SIM, particularly on 4G frequency bands 700MHz and 2100MHz.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction in network reception, affecting performance but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Device logs show LTE RAT; need modem logs for detailed analysis. Countermeasure: Request modem logs for detailed analysis.

rows.Title: Camera not working
rows.Problem: Camera is not functioning on both front and back after several attempts to resolve, including clearing storage and restarting. Issue persists even after updating to the latest mobile version.
rows.Summarized Problem: Both front and back cameras are not functioning despite multiple troubleshooting steps and software updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function is completely unavailable on both sides, rendering key device functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Camera module is faulty; recommend hardware inspection at service center.

rows.Title: unable to draw small circles using capacitive stylus
rows.Problem: Cannot draw small circles using capacitive stylus. It reads as a dot or a long press. There is excessive touch lag. The stylus works fine on other devices. Small dots in video are attempts to draw small circles.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot draw small circles with a capacitive stylus, which appears as a dot or long press, and experience excessive touch lag.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of stylus input, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification

rows.Title: Unable to add widgets
rows.Problem: Unable to add widgets attaching recording
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot add widgets that attach recording functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from adding recording-related widgets, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Launcher code has been updated and fix to prevent NameNotFoundException when loading application info in widget list

rows.Title: No Compatible display error occurs while trying to connect via dex
rows.Problem: Here is the screen recording you asked
rows.Summarized Problem: A display compatibility error occurs when attempting to connect via Samsung DeX.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial failure in display connection during DeX setup, preventing successful pairing but not causing device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to Set Routine Wallpaper
rows.Problem: Unable to set routine-based wallpaper in the Modes & Routines app, despite multiple attempts and troubleshooting steps including app updates, restarts, and permission checks.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set a routine-based wallpaper in the Modes & Routines app.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing or not working properly, but the device remains usable and core functions are intact.
rows.R&D Comment: Error in data management during wallpaper application and restoration; corrected in U OS Wallpaper & Style app 2.5.29. Users should clear app data via Settings > Apps > Show system apps > ON > Wallpaper and Style > Storage > Clear Data.

rows.Title: Can't open RINGTONES to change it
rows.Problem: I did everything you said But I m still facing the same issue Can't open RINGTONES to change it
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot open the RINGTONES setting to change their sound settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from modifying ringtone settings, which is a core functionality in sound settings, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed with commit id a3603c2d8e9abab65545a5b9c6142f500019a680 for master branch. NullPointerException was thrown while accessing internal routine. Prevention code added and delivered with V OS deployment.

rows.Title: Lag and frame drops while playing game
rows.Problem: Lag and frame drops occur during gameplay, with slow touch responses
rows.Summarized Problem: Game experiences lag and frame drops with slow touch responses during gameplay.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction during gameplay, affecting responsiveness but not causing device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please help to reproduce issue again, take screen record and log right after issue occurs.

rows.Title: Unable to upload images to any website using chrome browser
rows.Problem: Images are greyed out and unable to select images or files to upload. Download manager shows download unsuccessful for files and PDFs from any app.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot upload images to websites via Chrome due to greyed-out image selection and failed downloads using the native download manager.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure in media upload and download, which affects user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: We are unable to reproduce the issue. Further analysis is difficult without timely logs and reproduction. Network instability appears to be a contributing factor.

rows.Title: Video in YouTube going back to portrait after leaving landscape
rows.Problem: Video in YouTube going back to portrait when leaving landscape mode and re-entering, despite keeping landscape orientation
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube video orientation resets from landscape to portrait when leaving and re-entering the app, despite user setting landscape mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent behavior in video playback orientation but does not render the app unusable or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: We have checked the issue in the latest binary, but the issue didn- t reproduce at our end. The exact root cause is not clear from provided logs. If the issue persists, please raise a new issue with logs and video attached.

rows.Title: Wallpaper freezing when phone is completely open
rows.Problem: Wallpaper is frozen when phone is completely open and restores when opened or closed
rows.Summarized Problem: The wallpaper freezes when the phone is fully open and returns to normal when the phone is opened or closed.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent display behavior but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: No further OS VER 14 release planned. Please check issue on latest OS VER 15 and update accordingly.

rows.Title: phone got automatically reset
rows.Problem: my phone was getting reset multiple times while opening and using phone
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone is automatically resetting multiple times while in use, causing instability in operation.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is repeatedly resetting, which renders it unusable and indicates a critical system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Hardware defects such as AP can cause these problems. It is necessary to check for hardware defects.

rows.Title: Secure folder not working
rows.Problem: Secure folder installation fails due to security policy; device is provisioned as Device Owner, preventing secure folder creation
rows.Summarized Problem: Secure folder cannot be installed or used because the device is provisioned as Device Owner.
rows.Severity Reason: The secure folder feature is completely blocked by device provisioning, making it unusable for users who need it.
rows.R&D Comment: The device is provisioned as Device Owner, hence Secure folder creation is prohibited; users must remove device from provisioning as 'Device owner' via admin.

rows.Title: Device getting freeze and restart suddenly
rows.Problem: My phone is freezing up sometimes and reboots all of a sudden
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently freezes and restarts unexpectedly.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to sudden freezes and restarts, leading to loss of functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: There are several UFS link layer errors in the logs. It seems to be a hardware issue involving the AP or UFS component, requiring hardware inspection for signal and power integrity. The user should be guided to visit the customer service center for device evaluation.

rows.Title: Camera stop working
rows.Problem: When I open the camera app, it is not working and shows a message that camera failed to open
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera app fails to open and displays a 'camera failed to open' message when launched.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera is a fundamental feature; failure to open prevents basic device functionality and user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Several HSI2C error logs indicate a suspected hardware issue. Please check the camera module at SS center.

rows.Title: Dailer got stuck between dark and light mode
rows.Problem: The dailer got stuck between dark and light mode and is not working normally
rows.Summarized Problem: The dialer application is stuck between dark and light mode and does not function normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the dialer interface, preventing normal use but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: No further OS VER 14 release planned. Please check issue on latest OS VER 15 and update accordingly.

rows.Title: camera is keep crashing
rows.Problem: my camera is keep crashing and i am not able to click pictures
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera app keeps crashing and users are unable to take pictures.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera app crashes repeatedly, preventing users from taking pictures, which is a core functionality.

rows.Title: Camera not working properly
rows.Problem: The first picture is portrait which is working properly, the second is main camera which shows warning, and the third is video which shows security policy prevents use of camera. Selfie camera works fine. Diagnosis confirms rear camera works well.
rows.Summarized Problem: The main camera shows a warning and video recording is blocked by a security policy, while the selfie camera works normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The main camera function is partially impaired but not completely non-functional, and the issue is preventable via user settings.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Security policy blocks camera access. Countermeasure: Guide user to disable camera-related security policies in Settings > Biometrics and Security > Other Security Settings.

rows.Title: Apps crashing during QR scanning and upload from storage
rows.Problem: Apps are crashing when scanning and uploading QR codes from storage
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps crash when scanning and uploading QR codes from storage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete app crashes, making the functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The problem occurred in mediaProvider, Google mainline module. We reported this issue to Google.

rows.Title: Device not compatible for application installation
rows.Problem: Device not compatible for this application. This one need to install
rows.Summarized Problem: Devices are not compatible with the application installation process, preventing installation of the Watch7 Plugin App.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents installation of an app on certain devices, but does not render the device unusable or cause a crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Samsung phones cannot install apps via Play Store; Watch7 Manager can be controlled via GW app or Samsung Galaxy Store.

rows.Title: Samsung Note frequently flash
rows.Problem: Samsung tab s9 fe plus notes not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The notes feature on Samsung Tab S9 FE Plus is not working properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a core feature, preventing proper functionality but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The UI thread and recognition thread are causing a mutual exclusion deadlock; the solution is to modify the recognition thread to avoid accessing high-level UI modules.

rows.Title: Background wallpaper rotates between portrait and landscape in landscape mode
rows.Problem: Background wallpaper goes to portrait and then rotates to landscape while using phone in landscape mode even with auto rotate turned on
rows.Summarized Problem: The background wallpaper incorrectly rotates from portrait to landscape when the phone is in landscape mode, despite auto-rotate being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI consistency but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and only occurs during specific screen orientations.

rows.Title: Sound quality with Dolby Atmos turned on is very poor
rows.Problem: The sound quality of my s23 with Dolby Atmos turned on is very poor. When Dolby Atmos is turned off, it is just okay. The issue started after updating the phone to one UI 6.1.1. Before that, the sound quality was superb, rivaling a portable speaker. It is a widespread issue among s23 series. The user has shared a screenshot and reported the issue multiple times but no official statements have been issued.
rows.Summarized Problem: Sound quality is significantly degraded when Dolby Atmos is enabled on the S23 series, despite being previously excellent.
rows.Severity Reason: The sound quality degradation is severe and directly impacts core audio functionality, making the device unusable for users seeking high-fidelity audio.
rows.R&D Comment: Dolby Atmos Movie, Music mode has been changed to have a richer effect than before, and internal verification has confirmed there is no problem with the preference of the currently applied version. Please communicate with customers to select their favorite mode among Dolby Auto/Movie/Music or Dolby Off.

rows.Title: Secure Folder not working
rows.Problem: Secure Folder stopped working after first 1 to 2 months of use. When attempting to open, displays a message stating 'due to security privacy secure folder doesn't work'.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Secure Folder feature is no longer functional and displays a privacy-related error message when attempted to be opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a feature that was previously working, with no indication of device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: As per logs, when device owner is created, secure folder creation is not allowed. This is intended behavior. Maintain current status.

rows.Title: Multi-photo carousel display overlap
rows.Problem: When viewing or posting a multi-photo carousel, parts of the first photo overlap onto the second in Instagram.
rows.Summarized Problem: Parts of the first photo in a multi-photo carousel overlap onto the second photo when viewed or posted in Instagram.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual presentation of a multi-photo carousel but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This is Facebook's UI concept. Samsung cannot modify this policy or concept. Please keep current status as 3rd party app behavior.

rows.Title: USB connected disconnected flash message popup repeatedly
rows.Problem: The USB connector connected option shows up again after a long interval, with the notification popping up over 1000 times, indicating a constant recurrence. The issue can only be temporarily suppressed by snoozing the notification. It has recurred after previous resolution attempts via smart switch and customer care.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device repeatedly shows a USB connected/disconnected notification after a long period, indicating a persistent hardware or software recognition issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes constant pop-up notifications, leading to user disruption and potential confusion, with evidence of over 1000 occurrences, indicating a major system-level malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: OTG recognition and unrecognition are repeated, possibly due to hardware damage on the USB connector. Counter Measure: If the issue persists, the user should visit a service center for hardware inspection.

rows.Title: front camera video is very dull and not clear
rows.Problem: The front camera is still the same even after following the steps you suggested. The mobile is standard, no extra screen guard or anything
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera produces dull and unclear video footage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of video quality, not complete failure or device crash, but affects user experience during video use.
rows.R&D Comment: Light blur occurs due to fingerprints or foreign substances on the camera lens. Users should clean the lens and, if the issue persists, visit a service center for camera module replacement.

rows.Title: Ultra-wide video quality becomes blurred while zoom in and slight shaking
rows.Problem: The ultra-wide video quality on my Samsung A55 5G becomes blurred when zooming in and shows slight shaking, with loss of detail. The footage does not meet expectations and is considered unacceptable.
rows.Summarized Problem: Ultra-wide video on the device becomes blurred and shaky when zoomed in, with loss of detail.
rows.Severity Reason: The video quality is severely degraded under normal use, making the footage unusable and failing to meet user expectations for a core camera function.
rows.R&D Comment: The UW camera is a fixed focus type camera that guarantees 1M focusing distance. Close distances outside the hardware guarantee result in blur due to lens focus removal. It is necessary to verify performance within the hardware guarantee distance.

rows.Title: Galaxy AI feature not working in keyboard
rows.Problem: Samsung AI keyboard features such as chat assist, writing style, spelling and grammar are not working properly on Galaxy S24 Ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: AI features in the Samsung keyboard are not functioning properly on the Galaxy S24 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: The AI features are missing or not working, but the keyboard remains usable for basic typing.

rows.Title: Galaxy Store App not open Properly
rows.Problem: Galaxy Store and themes app not working since last update. Cleared data and tried other tricks, but apps still not opening even with good network connection
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy Store app fails to open after a recent update, despite clearing data and having a stable network connection.
rows.Severity Reason: The app does not open, but partial functionality may still be available; user can still access content via other means after troubleshooting steps.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No fatal logs found; app appears functional but fails to open. Countermeasure: Guide user to uninstall and reinstall updates.

rows.Title: App Info popup Screen Not remove while swipe home Screen page
rows.Problem: I found a lil bug while sliding the lower bar
rows.Summarized Problem: The app info popup does not disappear when swiping home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user interaction with the home screen but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Notifications stopped working for Snapchat app
rows.Problem: Notifications stopped working for Snapchat app after reinstalling the app. All permissions were granted.
rows.Summarized Problem: Snapchat app notifications stopped working after reinstall, despite all permissions being granted.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification feature is partially malfunctioning after app reinstall, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Internet speed issue
rows.Problem: User unable to get proper internet speed in open area, despite having Jio SIM; others nearby can connect and pay successfully; device shows zero download speed due to poor signal reception.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device fails to achieve proper internet speed in open areas despite having a Jio SIM, while nearby users experience full connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: User cannot complete essential transactions (e.g., payment) due to zero download speed, making the device functionally unusable in real-world scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Battery life is very poor
rows.Problem: Battery life is very poor. I get around 3-4 hrs of screen on time with 100% battery
rows.Summarized Problem: The device has very poor battery life, lasting only 3-4 hours of screen on time with a full charge.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to sustain battery life under normal usage, indicating a major malfunction in power management or battery performance.

rows.Title: Galaxy Store not working
rows.Problem: Galaxy Store shows server not working in your country and displays error messages
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy Store fails to load and shows server error messages indicating issues with regional server availability.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to load properly, preventing users from accessing the app store, but functionality can be restored via manual update steps.
rows.R&D Comment: User has sales code INS and MCC 402 (Bhutan); guide to uninstall updates and reinstall Galaxy Store to resolve server error.

rows.Title: Captured image gets darker after processed
rows.Problem: Processed images become darker and skin tone turns brownier when taken in normal daylight conditions, despite disabling auto HDR and scene optimizer, and clearing app data.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera images become darker and skin tone turns brown after processing in normal daylight conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality in specific lighting conditions but does not cause device crash or data loss, and can be mitigated by user settings.
rows.R&D Comment: Brightness and color may be photographed differently depending on the environment or conditions in which you are photographing. This is a common characteristic of the camera.

rows.Title: Routine not working
rows.Problem: No routines are working since the last update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Routines are not functioning after the last update.
rows.Severity Reason: No routines working makes the device unusable for automation tasks.

rows.Title: One UI home isn't responding
rows.Problem: One UI home isn't responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The One UI home screen is not responding to input events.
rows.Severity Reason: The home screen fails to respond to user input, making the interface unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by a failure to handle a focus event in time in the main thread; no root cause identified due to lack of context on running tasks, and reproduction failed.

rows.Title: device automatically switches between Super Fast Charging and Fast Charging while plugged in
rows.Problem: device automatically switches between Super Fast Charging and Fast Charging while plugged in
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically switches between Super Fast Charging and Fast Charging while plugged in, causing inconsistent charging behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves inconsistent charging behavior but does not cause device failure or data loss, and is reported as intermittent or software-related.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no kernel log at the time of the problem. Please secure the log immediately with the charger connected at the time of the problem.

rows.Title: Secsoundpicker is stopping
rows.Problem: Secsoundpicker is stopping me to change my ringtone
rows.Summarized Problem: The sound picker app stops when attempting to change the ringtone due to missing file data.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes when trying to change ringtone, preventing users from setting a new ringtone, which is a core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Crash in sound picker occurs when the applied ringtone file is not found and the ringtone picker cannot find associated data. Fixed with OneUI 6.1.1 upgrade (CL# 29021157).

rows.Title: DeX app displays a blank screen
rows.Problem: The Samsung DeX app displays a blank screen after connecting to a Windows 11 laptop, both wired and wirelessly, despite appearing to connect successfully.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung DeX app shows a blank screen after connecting to a Windows 11 laptop, preventing user interaction with the desktop environment.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full use of the DeX interface but does not cause device crash or data loss, and the problem is intermittent or context-dependent.
rows.R&D Comment: The black screen issue is related to the PC app; both PC and phone logs are needed for further analysis. Users should collect logs via the DeX app settings and report errors.

rows.Title: app widget disappear after exit from safe mode
rows.Problem: Preloaded app widgets disappear after exiting safe mode, while Google and other preloaded widgets remain visible in safe mode. This behavior is inconsistent with the known behavior of safe mode disabling third-party apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: App widgets disappear after exiting safe mode, despite being visible during safe mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a UI element (widget visibility) under specific conditions, but does not prevent device usability or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not reproducible in latest OS version; no ANR or crash found. Recommend checking in latest OS with fresh logs and video if issue persists.

rows.Title: Secsound speaker keep stopping
rows.Problem: Secsound speaker keep stopping
rows.Summarized Problem: The speaker keeps stopping unexpectedly when playing sound.
rows.Severity Reason: The device's speaker stops working unexpectedly, preventing basic audio functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Crash in sound picker occurs when ringtone file is not found; fixed in OneUI 6.1.1 with CL# 29021157.

rows.Title: Phone hang up often and restart automatically stop working
rows.Problem: Device freezes and hangs, even after software update and service center visit. Issue persists despite job sheet creation and updates.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone frequently hangs and restarts, causing device instability.
rows.Severity Reason: The device repeatedly freezes and restarts, making it unusable and indicating a critical system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: No specific problem found in logs. Please share another set of logs with same time video and/or more detailed problem description and issue time.

rows.Title: Back Gesture stop working in Youtube app
rows.Problem: Going Back Gesture stop working and unable to close the app, requiring device restart
rows.Summarized Problem: The back gesture in the YouTube app stops working, preventing users from navigating back or closing the app, leading to frequent device restarts.
rows.Severity Reason: The back gesture is a core navigation function; its failure prevents users from exiting the app or navigating back, rendering the device unusable during the incident.
rows.R&D Comment: Video time 17:03. Please video of issue scenario and logs taken right after issue occurrence. Current logs don't capture the problematic scenario.

rows.Title: Rear Camera keeps closing
rows.Problem: Camera keeps closing as soon as it's opened or within couple of seconds. This happens only with rear camera not with front camera.
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear camera closes immediately after being opened, while the front camera functions normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to remain open, preventing normal use of the rear camera function, which is a core feature.

rows.Title: Black screen while using Facebook
rows.Problem: Black screen appears while using Facebook
rows.Summarized Problem: A black screen appears when using the Facebook app, interrupting user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial functionality failure during app usage but does not result in device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely a temporary problem in the Facebook app; no root cause identified, and Samsung has no control over the app's source code.

rows.Title: Call popup window removed from notification panel when pressing Home button
rows.Problem: When a phone call arrives and you have opened other apps, pressing the Home button causes the call popup to disappear, requiring the call app to be minimized to receive the call
