rows.Summarized Problem: Call popup disappears when pressing the Home button, requiring users to manually minimize the call app to receive calls
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects call reception usability but does not cause device crash or data loss, and only occurs under specific app-switching conditions
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by com.android.bips - DefaultPrintService being handled by Google's system app, and Samsung has no POC to report or resolve it

rows.Title: Face unlock security issue
rows.Problem: Device unlocks with any person's face, including strangers, despite being set to biometric face unlock. This poses a serious privacy risk.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device allows unauthorized users to unlock using any face, including strangers, violating privacy expectations.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue enables unauthorized access, posing a serious privacy and security risk that compromises device integrity.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause: no required logs to solve the issue. Countermeasure: NA

rows.Title: Unable to open file/photo browser
rows.Problem: Unable to open file/photo browser and app crashes when trying to upload content on Gmail or other apps; photos and videos stop mid-upload or show interruption in dialog.
rows.Summarized Problem: The file/photo browser fails to open and causes app crashes when attempting to upload files to Gmail or other apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes during a core functionality (file upload), making it unusable for essential tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs in the mediaProvider, Google mainline module; reported to Google at https://partnerissuetracker.corp.google.com/u/0/issues/393957945.

rows.Title: Unable to Login Samsung Wallet App
rows.Problem: Trying to log in Samsung wallet but error appears every time
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot log in to the Samsung Wallet app, encountering an error every time.
rows.Severity Reason: The login function fails consistently but does not cause device crash or data loss, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Test version of Samsung Wallet PF (5.8.73) installed, not officially supported. Countermeasure: Factory reset required to remove test version and test login again.

rows.Title: Internet Not Working
rows.Problem: Device keeps loading when trying to scan and pay at a roadside merchant using PhonePe, Amazon Pay UPI; NR only mode sometimes fails and no internet is available.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device fails to establish internet connection, especially when using payment services, and NR only mode does not consistently resolve the issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to connect to the internet during critical transactions, rendering it unusable for essential functions like payments.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Device getting Hanged while Using 3rd Party Apps
rows.Problem: Device hangs during use of third-party apps, unexpected behavior not expected
rows.Summarized Problem: Device hangs when using third-party apps, causing poor performance and user frustration.
rows.Severity Reason: Device hangs during app usage, making it unusable for core functions, leading to significant user disruption.
rows.R&D Comment: The crash is caused by a network resolution failure in CronetUrlRequest (net::ERR_NAME_NOT_RESOLVED), and users can resolve it by clearing the Netflix app cache.

rows.Title: Device consumes too much battery
rows.Problem: Device consumes too much battery, barely giving 6 hours of SOT on full charge with moderate use, despite low brightness and dimming mode. Software optimization is poor.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device consumes excessive battery power under moderate usage conditions, resulting in only 6 hours of screen on time.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain reasonable battery life under normal usage, making it unusable for daily operations.
rows.R&D Comment: User video call via WhatsApp causes high current consumption; camera activity is identified as the main contributor, though marked as normal in logs.

rows.Title: Unable to add debit card in Wallet
rows.Problem: Samsung Wallet unable to add debit card; error says card not supported. Card is SBI debit with NFC, used since 2022, NFC enabled. Website states SBI cards are supported. User sent log file but no screenshot available.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot add SBI debit cards to Samsung Wallet due to error indicating card not supported, despite NFC and official support claims.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to work for a supported card type, but the issue is not a complete system crash or data loss, and is attributed to third-party card tokenization rules.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs because the BIN (652294) is not enabled for tokenization by Mastercard; the same cause is confirmed in logs and countermeasure.

rows.Title: network disconnection
rows.Problem: Network disconnection occurs every 15-30 minutes, causing payments, form fills, and video calls to get stuck, preventing communication with others.
rows.Summarized Problem: Frequent network disconnections occur every 15-30 minutes, disrupting essential functions like payments and calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device functionality to fail repeatedly, preventing users from making calls or completing transactions.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Mobile data not working
rows.Problem: Mobile data is not working after keeping Wi-Fi on for a long time. Requires mobile data restart to fix.
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile data fails to work after prolonged Wi-Fi usage and requires a restart to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction under specific conditions, not causing complete device unusability but requiring user intervention to resolve.

rows.Title: Galaxy kids app automatically moved to end of apps when power saving mode on
rows.Problem: Galaxy kids app is automatically moved to the end of all apps when power saving mode is turned on
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy Kids app is automatically moved to the end of the app list when power saving mode is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of app visibility in power saving mode, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue has been fixed in latest OneUI home; please check latest binary update and maintain current status

rows.Title: Force Close Occurs while Open Now Brief
rows.Problem: Now Brief is not working. Personal Data Intelligence keeps stopping and popping up when trying to open it.
rows.Summarized Problem: Now Brief fails to load and repeatedly crashes when attempted to open.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes upon opening, preventing users from accessing a core feature, making it unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: App version v7.0.3.2 has been modified to fix errors on the onboarding screen of Now Brief and will be rolled out sequentially (~2/21).

rows.Title: Unable to Download Package in Bixby
rows.Problem: Bixby unable to download package when turned on, getting server error despite internet working well
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby fails to download required software packages for offline processing, resulting in a server error despite internet connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot perform basic Bixby functionality due to failure in downloading essential software packages, rendering a core feature unusable.

rows.Title: Unable to browse or open any content in apps
rows.Problem: Though it shows 5g, it wont browse or open any content in apps
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows 5G connectivity but fails to browse or open content in apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows 5G signal but cannot access content in apps, indicating a critical failure in network functionality that prevents core usage.

rows.Title: Frequent frame drops when using Instagram and YouTube
rows.Problem: Frequent frame drops occur during use of Instagram and YouTube, with video pausing but no audio pause. Issue is more common on Instagram. Cleared cache and restarted phone; problem persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback experiences frequent frame drops during use of Instagram and YouTube, causing interruptions in video flow.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable lag in video playback but does not result in device crash or data loss, and is intermittent rather than consistent.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely due to outdated app versions; retesting with latest app versions is recommended.

rows.Title: Data Icon Not Changing in Quick Panel
rows.Problem: The data icon light does not respond properly when mobile data is turned on or off in the quick panel.
rows.Summarized Problem: The data icon light does not blink properly when mobile data is toggled in the quick panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual feedback of a core function but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.

rows.Title: capture image looks like an oil painting with no detailing
rows.Problem: My Samsung s25 is very poor at processing images. It looks like an oil painting with no detailing. Is that the software issue or any thing else ?
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera on the Samsung S25 fails to process images with proper detail, resulting in blurry or abstract visuals resembling oil paintings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in image processing, where the camera does not deliver expected visual detail, but the device remains otherwise functional.

rows.Title: Phone crashing and restarting
rows.Problem: Phone just crashed and restarted. There are several UFS link layer errors in the logs. It seems to be a hardware issue involving the AP or UFS component. Signal and power integrity should be checked. User needs to visit customer service center for hardware inspection.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone crashes and restarts due to UFS link layer errors, indicating a potential hardware issue with the AP or UFS component.
rows.Severity Reason: The device crashes and restarts, making it unusable, and the root cause points to hardware-level failures that affect core system stability.
rows.R&D Comment: There are several UFS link layer errors in the logs. It seems to be a hardware issue involving the AP or UFS component. Signal and power integrity should be checked. Please guide the user to visit customer service center to check the device (AP or UFS component).

rows.Title: Device stutters at 90 Hz refresh rate
rows.Problem: Device stutters at 90 Hz refresh rate while running smoothly at 60 Hz
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences noticeable stutters when running at 90 Hz refresh rate, unlike smooth performance at 6-0 Hz.
rows.Severity Reason: The stutters at 90 Hz make the device feel unresponsive and degrade user experience significantly, especially on high-refresh-rate displays.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is caused by a change in SF phase, leading to frame drops; it was fixed by adjusting the SF phase and will be applied on V OS.

rows.Title: Samsung Store and themes not opening
rows.Problem: Samsung Store and themes fail to open, showing loading indefinitely or network connection errors. Network is stable as other apps function normally. Clearing cache and data, and factory reset do not resolve the issue. After factory reset, wallpaper settings were altered unexpectedly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Store and themes fail to open, showing loading or network errors despite stable network and working apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure of a feature, but does not prevent device usability or cause data loss or crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: The network used by the user in the log looks unstable. Please try to connect by changing the network environment. This issue is not Galaxy Store client issue.

rows.Title: Unable to access locked Samsung Notes
rows.Problem: After syncing from old Samsung device to new Samsung S24 via Smart Switch, user changed Samsung account location from UAE to India. Now unable to access locked notes on both devices. Error message: 'Can't open a note locked by another account'.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access locked notes on their devices after switching Samsung account location during sync, due to account mismatch in locked note ownership.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure—locked notes are inaccessible due to account mismatch, but users can still use unlocked notes and the core feature remains functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Locked notes in Samsung Notes are tied to the Samsung Account at the time of locking; account changes during sync cause ownership mismatch. Users can resolve by resetting to the original account.

rows.Title: Wallpaper keeps restoring to original stock wallpaper
rows.Problem: Wallpaper keeps restoring to original stock wallpaper when changing to new wallpapers, even with Dynamic Lock off and no routine usage
rows.Summarized Problem: The device restores to the original stock wallpaper after a new wallpaper is set, regardless of user actions or settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent user experience but does not prevent device operation or lead to data loss or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Samsung Finance app forcibly changes home and lock screen wallpaper; users should disable or remove the app to resolve.

rows.Title: Camera flicker while zoom IN/Out
rows.Problem: My camera is flickering and I am getting some kind of vibration while zooming out
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera flickers and vibrates when zooming in or out.
rows.Severity Reason: The flickering and vibration during zooming severely affect camera usability and stability, making the function unreliable and potentially unsafe to use.
rows.R&D Comment: The camera module is defective; service center should replace the camera module.

rows.Title: Battery drops too much when device is idle
rows.Problem: Battery drops significantly even when no apps are opened and device is idle, despite battery stats not matching actual drain
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences excessive battery drain when idle and no apps are running.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drains excessively under normal usage conditions, leading to device becoming unusable quickly.
rows.R&D Comment: Caused by background activity from third-party apps like Lenskart and Facebook; countermeasure is to advise app owners for deeper analysis, current status maintained.

rows.Title: YouTube no video playing goes to Pip mode
rows.Problem: YouTube goes to Pip mode when no video is playing
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube enters Pip mode when no video is playing, which is incorrect behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where a feature behaves incorrectly under a specific condition, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Add filter in photo icon
rows.Problem: Add filter in photo icon / option is not showing
rows.Summarized Problem: The filter option is not visible in the photo editor interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The filter option is missing, preventing users from applying filters, but the core functionality of the photo editor remains available.

rows.Title: Internet Not Working
rows.Problem: Sending video of problem
rows.Summarized Problem: Internet connectivity is not working on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves network registration, which is a partial malfunction that prevents full internet access but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Photos and Video stop responding during upload
rows.Problem: When updating profile pictures on multiple apps like Pinterest, the app closes with the message 'Photos and Video stop responding'. This is a recurring issue across apps, not isolated to one.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photo and video upload functionality fails and causes apps to crash during profile picture updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes apps to close unexpectedly during profile updates, disrupting core user functionality across multiple apps.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is in the mediaProvider module of Google's mainline; reported to Google and will be resolved in the February mainline update. Users are advised to use alternative media pickers like Gallery or Document picker.

rows.Title: Automatically restarted
rows.Problem: Automatically restarted
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically restarts unexpectedly.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts automatically, making it unusable and indicating a critical system-level failure.
rows.R&D Comment: SysMMU READ fault from MFC due to buffer size inconsistency based on SBWC enable/disable settings in NALQ; requires ramdump for confirmation; additional debug logs added in driver for future debugging.

rows.Title: Data stops working frequently in Full NW area
rows.Problem: Data stops working frequently despite full signal, affecting calls and online meetings, while other phones work fine with Jio 5G
rows.Summarized Problem: Data connectivity fails frequently despite full network signal, preventing call and meeting participation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents device usability during critical communications, leading to network failures under normal conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Multiple SMS on SIM2 blocks RF on SIM1 due to DSDS configuration. Countermeasure: User had multiple SMS on BSNL SIM, blocking active RF on SIM1; DSDS devices only allow one SIM to have active RF resources.

rows.Title: Server error during offline processing in Bixby app
rows.Problem: Server error occurs when pressing offline process for download in Bixby app
rows.Summarized Problem: A server error occurs when attempting to initiate offline processing in the Bixby app.
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents the feature from working fully but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Spam call setting crash
rows.Problem: Disabling spam call setting causes app crash
rows.Summarized Problem: Disabling the spam call setting in the phone app causes the app to crash.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes when a user disables the spam call setting, making the feature unusable and preventing user interaction with a core function.
rows.R&D Comment: There are not enough logs to analyze the problem. If the problem occurs again after rebooting the phone, please capture the log. We will find ways to guess and improve what may be problematic.

rows.Title: Face unlock not working in low light
rows.Problem: Face unlock not working in low light. Device has frequent crashes. Face was not detected or out of camera view in dark environment. Recognition was successful in case of detect faces.
rows.Summarized Problem: Face unlock fails in low light conditions due to poor detection in dark environments.
rows.Severity Reason: Face unlock is a core biometric authentication feature; failure in low light renders device unusable for secure access.
rows.R&D Comment: Face was not detected or out of camera view in dark environment. For better recognition in low illumination, please provide following guide: set bright wallpaper on lock screen and lift phone toward face in dark environment.

rows.Title: Notifications jittering on Edge Style Mode in Always On Display
rows.Problem: Notifications in Edge Style Mode appear to be jittering when received on Always On Display, with unstable transitions between down and up states
rows.Summarized Problem: Notifications in Edge Style Mode on Always On Display exhibit jittering and unstable transitions between states.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual stability during notification display but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Patch applied for settings; Countermeasure: User must update software via Settings > Software Update

rows.Title: Bad performance and poor quality photos
rows.Problem: very bad performance and poor quality photos
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos have poor quality and performance due to shaking, moving subjects, or lens contamination and direct light exposure.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction in photo quality under specific conditions, not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Shaking, moving subjects, lens contamination, and direct light exposure lead to noise and blurring. Countermeasure: Clean lens and retake photos in controlled lighting.

rows.Title: Ultra wide camera shakes vigorously while shifting from 10x or 5x zoom to 0.6x
rows.Problem: The ultra wide camera shakes vigorously while shifting from 10x or 5
rows.Summarized Problem: The ultra wide camera shakes vigorously when transitioning from 10x or 5x zoom to 0.6x.
rows.Severity Reason: The shaking during zoom transition causes instability and potential loss of image quality, impairing core camera functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: UV damper peeling and misalignment cause driving force error; improved jig and carrier height measurement will address root cause.

rows.Title: WhatsApp call audio not heard by receiver
rows.Problem: Receiver cannot hear voice during WhatsApp calls when phone screen locks or app is in background, despite proper permissions and app reinstall. Issue persists after restart and app update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Receiver cannot hear audio during WhatsApp calls when the phone screen is locked or the app is in the background.
rows.Severity Reason: The receiver is completely unable to hear audio during calls, which prevents effective communication and renders the call function unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: WhatsApp version is outdated. Countermeasure: Retest in latest WhatsApp version with new logs and video if issue persists.

rows.Title: Face unlock not working
rows.Problem: Face unlock not working at times. Sending logs after an unsuccessful unlock and successful unlock at same lighting conditions and 5sec gap.
rows.Summarized Problem: Face unlock fails intermittently under certain lighting conditions due to poor image quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent failure of a core authentication function but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Sometimes, face recognition was not successful due to insufficient quality of face images under backlight condition. Direct lighting from your back or above could make face images blurry. And it can somtimes cause poor recognition performance. Please clean surface of selfie camera area. And please lift up phone toward your face or adjust direction to avoid lighting influence on camera. Please check selfie preview condition on 'Camera' app to check this.

rows.Title: Samsung Pass not activating
rows.Problem: Samsung Pass not activating
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Pass is not activating on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely not working, preventing user from using Samsung Pass functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: PPP information was overwritten with 0 during registration with KnoxMatrix EscrowVault. Counter Measure: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: camera performs poorly with blurry photos
rows.Problem: The camera continues to perform poorly with blurry photos, lagging performance, and grainy night videos, not focusing the subject. These issues are worse than previous devices.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces blurry photos and fails to focus on subjects, especially in low light conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: Blurred photos and failure to focus severely impact core camera functionality, making it unusable for basic photography.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by shallow depth of field and motion blur in specific scenes; users are advised to use pro modes like MF or astro mode for better results.

rows.Title: Notification History disappears before 24hrs
rows.Problem: Notification history does not stay for 24 hours and disappears before completion. The history shows 6 notifications in recently dismissed but only 4 in the last 24 hours section, despite having around 30 notifications.
rows.Summarized Problem: Notification history fails to retain records for the full 24-hour period, showing inconsistent or missing entries.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a core feature, where history is not fully preserved but still functional in parts.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue has been addressed with a software patch; users are advised to update their device via Settings > Software Update.

rows.Title: Airplane Mode affects mobile network restoration
rows.Problem: When airplane mode is toggled, the mobile network does not restore, even after turning it off. A restart is required to regain network connectivity.
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile network fails to restore after airplane mode is toggled, requiring a restart to recover connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to restore network connectivity after airplane mode, making it unusable without a restart, which impacts core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be caused by the UE's inability to detect the SIM; the operator should check and update the SIM.

rows.Title: OTP Not Receive In Galaxy App
rows.Problem: Unable to receive OTP
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to receive OTP in the Galaxy app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in authentication flow, preventing OTP delivery but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue seems temporary or due to other reasons as mentioned in the TR.

rows.Title: Studio App is not working
rows.Problem: I am unable to edit videos in my gallery app
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot edit videos in the gallery app due to Studio App malfunction.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is not functioning at all, preventing core video editing functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The ANR issue in the MyFilter is presumed to be a bug caused by rapid GPU model loading; users should close and reopen the camera app, and the issue will be fixed in MR1.

rows.Title: Wallpaper automatically switched to default
rows.Problem: Wallpaper disappears from lockscreen and home screen daily at 7:43 am, switching automatically to default. Issue occurs only in the morning, not when changing wallpaper during day or night.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically switches to default wallpaper at 7:43 am each day, disrupting user-set visuals on both lockscreen and home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction of the display feature, affecting user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Frame skipped while zooming
rows.Problem: A frame is skipped when zooming the camera to 3x, followed by a return to wide mode after object focus.
rows.Summarized Problem: A frame is skipped when zooming the camera to 3x, followed by a return to wide mode after object focus.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction during zoom operation, causing visual stutter but not rendering the device unusable or leading to data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The phenomenon is due to camera switching to tele mode at 3x zoom and returning to wide mode upon focus; this behavior is intentional and not a defect.

rows.Title: average resting HR and the graph is not showing in Samsung Health app
rows.Problem: cannot see the average resting HR and the graph in Samsung Health app on galaxy fit3
rows.Summarized Problem: The average resting heart rate and its graph are not displaying in the Samsung Health app on Galaxy Fit3.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing, preventing users from viewing vital health data, which is essential for device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The resting HR data is not being calculated or stored in the device database, leading to absence of data in the app.

rows.Title: Calendar delete option not there
rows.Problem: Calendar delete option not there
rows.Summarized Problem: The delete option is missing in the Calendar app when attempting to delete an event.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing users from deleting events, but the functionality is not fully broken or causing device-wide issues.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Expected to be fixed in OneUI 7.0 update. Countermeasure: Same as cause.

rows.Title: KNOX NOT ABLE CREAT WORK PROFILE
rows.Problem: KNOX NOT ABLE CREAT WORK PROFILE SOFTWARE UPDATE NOT WORKING. SERVICE CENTER PEOPLE COULD NOT DO ANYTHING. THEY MENTIONED IT IS BEYOND THEIR UNDERSTANDING.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot create a work profile using Knox, and service centers are unable to resolve the issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The inability to create a work profile prevents secure device setup, which is essential for enterprise use, making the device unusable for business users.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No SAK found in device; Counter Measure: Inject new security keys during troubleshooting.

rows.Title: low light photography experience has degraded significantly
rows.Problem: weird halo and lens flare forms in night time pictures, especially around street lights, persisting despite cleaning lenses, changing lenses, and adjusting shooting angles; not present when phone was first purchased and worsens with software updates
rows.Summarized Problem: Night mode in low light photography produces persistent halos and lens flares around street lights, which were not present initially and worsen with software updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo quality in specific conditions but does not cause device crash or complete failure of core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: The lens flares and halos occur under strong light sources during night mode use and are currently within normal operational range; no action is needed beyond user awareness.

rows.Title: Analog Accessory detected but not compatible popup occurs while connect earphone
rows.Problem: Analog Accessory detected but not compatible notification keeps popping up while earphones are working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: A notification popup appears stating 'Analog Accessory detected but not compatible' when connecting earphones, even though the earphones function normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification persists but does not interfere with device functionality or performance, indicating a partial malfunction of the audio compatibility UI.
rows.R&D Comment: The notification can be considered normal due to lack of information about the specific accessory type; the system cannot verify compatibility without accessory details.

rows.Title: Volume automatically decrease and not show silent symbol
rows.Problem: Volume automatically decreases and does not show silent symbol
rows.Summarized Problem: The device volume automatically decreases and the silent symbol is not displayed.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the sound settings UI, where volume behavior and visual feedback are inconsistent.
rows.R&D Comment: The Truecaller app is setting volume to zero; recommend checking or configuring the app settings or disabling the app to resolve.

rows.Title: Grey overlay appears in gallery while scrolling using keyboard
rows.Problem: Grey overlay appears in gallery while scrolling using keyboard
rows.Summarized Problem: A grey overlay appears when scrolling through the gallery using keyboard input.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects usability during navigation but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor not working
rows.Problem: Fingerprint sensor not working properly due to poor image quality from sensor
rows.Summarized Problem: The fingerprint sensor fails to work properly due to poor image quality, especially when the finger is dry or the user touches with a fingertip.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the fingerprint authentication function but does not prevent device usage or cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Poor image quality from fingerprint sensor due to thick protective film, dry finger, or light touch. Countermeasure: Recommend removing thick protective film and using the center part of the fingerprint for enrollment and verification.

rows.Title: Fingerprint not working
rows.Problem: Fingerprint not working on S25 Ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint authentication is not functioning on the S25 Ultra device.
rows.Severity Reason: The fingerprint sensor fails to recognize the registered pattern due to poor overlap and similarity, resulting in partial functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Poor overlap and similarity with registered fingerprint part. Countermeasure: Enroll frequently used central parts of fingerprint and keep sensor area clean.

rows.Title: Google Pixel Watch identified as headphones in BT List
rows.Problem: Google Pixel Watch identified as headphones
rows.Summarized Problem: The Google Pixel Watch is incorrectly identified as headphones in the Bluetooth device list.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a misidentification in Bluetooth pairing but does not prevent device usage or cause system crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs because there is no value in the field given when searching on Google Pixel Watch. This needs to be corrected on Google Pixel Watch so that the icon is displayed as a watch.

rows.Title: Phone freezes and restarts
rows.Problem: Phone freezes for a few seconds and then restarts itself, happening randomly and unexpectedly. Device restarts without warning, leading to frustration and concern about device reliability.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone randomly freezes for a few seconds and then restarts unexpectedly.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts unexpectedly, making it unusable and potentially leading to data loss or user frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: We could not find abnormal reset in the log file. The last reset was user-requested. Please provide a detailed reproduction scenario and a new dump file when the issue occurs.

rows.Title: Separate app sound not working
rows.Problem: Separate app sound not working on phone. Was working on previous device S20FE 5G
rows.Summarized Problem: Separate app sound setting is not functioning on the device, despite working on previous model.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing or not working in the current device, but the issue does not cause device crash or data loss, and is limited to a specific UI setting.
rows.R&D Comment: We could not reproduce the issue; logs show no app selected in separate app sound setting but UI shows selection. User needs to provide preconditions and reset settings to verify.

rows.Title: Internet gets disconnected
rows.Problem: Internet gets disconnected. Sending logs and screen recording. Sending another screen recording and log of network disconnection in Jio5G in Kolkata, Bhawanipore. This is pathetic with such a premium model from samsung. Exchange my phone with a new functional device. My device is not usable.
rows.Summarized Problem: The internet connection frequently disconnects, making the device unusable.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to frequent network disconnections, especially on a premium model.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to share files via quick share
rows.Problem: Samsung shows file sharing on display for sharing but not on other android mobiles
rows.Summarized Problem: Quick Share feature fails to display on other Android devices after successful initiation on Samsung phones.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of the Quick Share feature across devices, not rendering on all Android devices but working on Samsung.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue likely stems from device-side configuration or visibility settings; both sender and receiver device logs are needed for full diagnosis.

rows.Title: clock and notification icons are overlapping on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: The clock and notification icons are overlapping i can no longer view anything on lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock and notification icons are overlapping, making it impossible to view content on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The overlapping icons prevent users from viewing any content on the lock screen, rendering the screen unusable.

rows.Title: Samsung Note keep Crashing
rows.Problem: These types issue coming again and again
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Notes app is crashing repeatedly on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes repeatedly, making it unusable and disrupting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: SecurityException occurred due to missing permissions during operation; fix implemented in version 4.4.20.93 via app update.

rows.Title: Unable to remove App from App time List
rows.Problem: Once app timer is set, there is no way to undo it
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot remove or undo an app timer once set in Digital Wellbeing.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot undo a set app timer, leading to a partial malfunction in timer management, but device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No undo mechanism for app timers. Countermeasure: Users can delete app timers by long-pressing or selecting 'Delete' in the timer list.

rows.Title: Animation flicker while scrolling recent app list
rows.Problem: Noticeable graphical glitches and screen tearing during navigation through the UI, with delays in animations and app switching, causing sluggish responsiveness.
rows.Summarized Problem: Animations flicker and lag during scrolling through the recent apps list, causing a sluggish and unresponsive user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The device feels unresponsive and exhibits noticeable graphical issues that degrade core usability during navigation, especially on a flagship device.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. Also, the issue does not occur in the latest OS 15 launcher APK; please update to latest OS.

rows.Title: Heating issue while playing game
rows.Problem: Device overheats significantly during gameplay in BGMI, leading to FPS drops and making gameplay nearly impossible. The issue worsens in hot seasons and affects overall gaming experience.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats severely during gameplay in BGMI, causing FPS drops and severely impacting gaming performance.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheating during gameplay makes the game unplayable and disrupts core functionality, leading to a complete loss of usability in gaming scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: The last game session log shows GPU-related activity; system logs are limited to 3 minutes, and detailed analysis requires immediate reporting without device restart.

rows.Title: Studio App crash in device
rows.Problem: App crashes most times
rows.Summarized Problem: The Studio App crashes frequently during use, especially when updating video thumbnails.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes repeatedly, making it unusable during video editing tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: ANR occurs in AndroidX library while updating item thumbnails. Countermeasure: Fix will be included in next Android OS upgrade; users advised to reduce number of imported videos.

rows.Title: turn off the app timer on digital well-being
rows.Problem: I cant turn off the app timer on digital well-being there is no option to turn off the timer please fix this issue i am frustrate.. video of screen record attached...
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot turn off app timers in Digital Wellbeing as there is no option to delete or disable them.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to remove app timers, but the feature exists and can be accessed via existing UI paths, indicating a partial malfunction rather than full system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Users can delete app timers by long-pressing or selecting 'Delete' on the timer list in Digital Wellbeing home screen; the current functionality is intact, but the user interface does not clearly guide this action.

rows.Title: Unable to OK Credit App
rows.Problem: App cannot install after update and crashes occasionally
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps fail to install after update and crash intermittently during installation.
rows.Severity Reason: App crashes and fails to install, preventing users from using essential applications.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue caused by internal service failure in Google Quick Search Box; countermeasure is to address ANR due to improper resource delivery in the app.

rows.Title: Jio Network not Latching In
rows.Problem: Jio Network not latching in
rows.Summarized Problem: Jio network fails to register on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves network registration failure, which is a partial malfunction affecting connectivity but does not render the device unusable.

rows.Title: Share photo, video or GIF from gallery shows unsupported
rows.Problem: When sharing photos, videos, or GIFs from the phone's gallery to apps like Instagram or WhatsApp, the file shows as unsupported and does not share. This occurs across all formats including MP4, JPEG, JPG, MOV, GIF, and PNG. The issue persists after restart and with all permissions enabled.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot share photos, videos, or GIFs from the gallery as the content is marked as unsupported across all formats and apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from sharing media, which is a core functionality, leading to a complete failure of basic usage.

rows.Title: Video freezing while watching Instagram reels
rows.Problem: Video keeps freezing sometimes while watching Instagram reels
rows.Summarized Problem: Video freezes intermittently when watching Instagram reels.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction during video playback, but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.

rows.Title: automatically restarts more than 10 times in an hour
rows.Problem: Samsung Galaxy Note 10 Lite has freezing and hanging issues, automatically restarting more than 10 times in an hour. During incoming calls, the screen turns black and missed calls are not visible in call logs.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device repeatedly restarts more than 10 times within an hour, causing instability and loss of call information during incoming calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is repeatedly crashing and restarting, making it unusable during calls and leading to loss of call data.
rows.R&D Comment: Several app not responding errors occurring continuously. Another set of logs required to check why problem occurred first time. Please enable show all background ANR and crash pop up from developer options. Complete dumpstate logs folder required

rows.Title: Unable to connect SMB folder from Network storage
rows.Problem: Whenever I try to connect the SMB shared folders it throws an exception Unexpected value 17
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot connect to SMB shared folders due to an exception when attempting to access network storage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing shared network folders, which is a critical functionality for file sharing and device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: SMBJ library does not support SMBv1; Counter Measure: Set minimum SMB protocol to SMB2 and maximum to SMB3 on NAS.

rows.Title: App flicker while open and scroll
rows.Problem: Phone is malfunctioning
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps flicker when open and scrolling, causing phone malfunction.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device malfunction during basic operations, making it unusable under normal use.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. Also, as no release is planned for OS 14 and the issue is not occurring in latest OS 15 launcher apk. Please help to update to latest OS.

rows.Title: Voice not recorded clearly during video recording
rows.Problem: The voice is not being recorded clearly while recording the video
rows.Summarized Problem: Voice is not being recorded clearly during video recording.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in voice recording functionality during video capture, which affects user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to Open Profiles in Prime Video App
rows.Problem: Prime Video app on Galaxy A55 fails to open profiles. User has tried clearing cache, data, and reinstalling both Amazon and Prime Video apps, but the issue persists. Screen recording attached.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Prime Video app fails to open user profiles after multiple troubleshooting attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to load profiles, which is a partial malfunction of a core feature, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a third-party app issue; the root cause is the app's failure to load an image, leading to profile display failure. The issue should be reported to the app owner and resolved by them.

rows.Title: Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Lock screen and wallpaper not accessible. App crash
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen and wallpaper are not accessible and the app crashes when accessed.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes when accessing the lock screen and wallpaper, making the feature completely unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: String Resource not found exception. Countermeasure: Fix released; user to upgrade software.

rows.Title: Camera app not working
rows.Problem: Camera app displays camera initialization fails when opening rear camera. Front camera works normally.
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear camera app fails to initialize upon opening, while the front camera functions normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera app fails to initialize on the rear camera, rendering a major functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause: Monomer problem, camera module not properly fastened or broken. Countermeasure: Replace the rear camera module.

rows.Title: Samsung wallet app not connecting
rows.Problem: Samsung wallet app is showing error and not connecting
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Wallet app is showing errors and failing to connect.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to connect, preventing users from using the wallet feature, but the core functionality is not completely unavailable.
rows.R&D Comment: Caused by enabling force update for India users; resolved via server configuration. Users are advised to retry.

rows.Title: Screen pixels jitter during WhatsApp video call
rows.Problem: Screen pixels washed off during WhatsApp video call; request for improvement in next update
rows.Summarized Problem: Screen pixels jitter and wash off during WhatsApp video calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video call display quality but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is reported as a UI improvement request.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: WhatsApp app fails to form proper UI during video calls. Countermeasure: Issue lies in WhatsApp's source code; Samsung has no control or visibility into the app's implementation.

rows.Title: Display flickering while using multitouch
rows.Problem: Display is flickering while using multitouch, especially during zooming and gameplay with in-game joystick and other finger actions
rows.Summarized Problem: The display flickers when multitouch is used, particularly during zooming and in-game interactions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects multitouch functionality during key user actions but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Customer is using a noisy charger; recommend using a good ground charger and proper grip to reduce flickering.

rows.Title: YouTube PIP Mode Not Working
rows.Problem: After minimizing YouTube video, unable to pause or cut it. Paused video cannot be resumed using on-screen button; pause button remains stuck and does not transition to play. Resumption possible only via headphone buttons. Cannot pause again once in PIP mode without switching to full screen and back.
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube PIP mode fails to allow pausing and resuming via on-screen controls, with pause button stuck and no ability to resume or pause after returning from full screen.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot control playback in PIP mode, leading to partial functionality loss, but device remains usable and no data loss or crash occurs.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is known and reported to Google (b/388937020); Google is under investigation.

rows.Title: Unable to load PDF file in Notes
rows.Problem: The Notes app cannot load a PDF file properly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Notes app fails to load PDF files.
rows.Severity Reason: The app cannot load a PDF file, which is a major functional failure preventing users from using the app for document viewing.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is caused by the analysis of PDF data for AI translation. The algorithm has been improved and will be released in version 4.4.29.13.

rows.Title: Home screen not responding
rows.Problem: Home screen not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The home screen is not responding to user interactions.
rows.Severity Reason: The home screen is completely unresponsive, making the device unusable for basic navigation.
rows.R&D Comment: The attached log shows no ANR; recommend checking on latest version to verify the issue.

rows.Title: App icons vanishing after clicking
rows.Problem: App icons vanish after clicking; software lags during navigation using swipe gestures
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons disappear when clicked, and the software lags during navigation with swipe gestures.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of UI elements and navigation lag, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Tried to reproduce this issue; logs do not match attached video. Recommend restarting device and checking latest build with video for further analysis.

rows.Title: Skin shows orange shade in 50MP camera photos
rows.Problem: Human skin shows an orange shade when taking photos with the 50MP camera, which is very irritating and has not been resolved despite repeated reports.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 50MP camera incorrectly renders human skin with an orange tint in photos.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo quality but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and only impacts specific image rendering.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: One UI Home isn't responding
rows.Problem: One UI Home isn't responding
rows.Summarized Problem: One UI Home is not responding and fails to process input events, causing a hang in the launcher interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The launcher is not responding to input, leading to a complete failure of the home screen functionality, making the device unusable until resolved.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue may stem from multiple threads requesting draw operations simultaneously or GPU wait issues; additional logs are needed for definitive analysis.

rows.Title: Contact getting deleted automatically
rows.Problem: Contacts are being deleted automatically from the app, likely due to synchronization with Google contacts.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contacts are being deleted automatically from the app, likely due to synchronization with Google contacts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of contact management due to sync behavior, but contacts can still be recovered via trash.
rows.R&D Comment: Contact deletion record: There is a contact deletion history on WhatsApp. However, it seems that the deletion of contacts from the Google account is related to the synchronization of the deletion of contacts on WhatsApp, as the deletion of contacts on WhatsApp is visible after the deletion of contacts from the Google account. If the deletion history is related to GMS contact synchronization, you can restore in your trash in your contacts app. And you can recover your contact from Google.

rows.Title: Enable to download images and PDF and files in WhatsApp
rows.Problem: Enable to download images and PDF and files in WhatsApp
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp lacks the ability to download images, PDFs, and files.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Photo editing not working
rows.Problem: Photo editing not working on s25 ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: Photo editing functionality is not working on the S25 Ultra device.
rows.Severity Reason: The photo editing feature is completely non-functional, preventing users from using a core camera function.

rows.Title: Recent Apps showing floating in the air
rows.Problem: While closing the recent apps, one of them is floating in the air
rows.Summarized Problem: Recent apps display with a floating effect when closing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial UI malfunction that affects visual appearance but does not prevent device usage or cause system crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Fix to clear translationY when entering recents. This modification has been applied since OneUIHome 16.0.5.17 version and will be updated through regular MR.

rows.Title: Quick Panel quick button Icon Not working
rows.Problem: Icons like mobile data, location, extra dim don't highlight when pressing in control panel, only highlight after unlocking or after some time.
rows.Summarized Problem: Icons in the Quick Panel do not highlight when pressed, only highlighting after the phone is unlocked or after a delay.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality of icon interaction but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and occurs intermittently.

rows.Title: double tap to lock the screen
rows.Problem: The double tap to lock the screen function is not working when enabled, but works after toggling the option.
rows.Summarized Problem: The double tap to lock screen function fails to work when enabled, despite being toggled on.
rows.Severity Reason: The function does not work consistently but works after toggling, indicating a partial malfunction.

rows.Title: Camera Focus not working after Update
rows.Problem: Focus issue after update Also Camera hdr balance problem
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera focus is not working properly after the software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The focus function is partially malfunctioning, preventing optimal camera performance but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Focus issue attributed to de-zoom attribute and shallow depth of field; Countermeasure: Same as cause, indicating no actionable fix proposed.

rows.Title: Link One Drive To Gallery App
rows.Problem: Error message 'server error occur, try again later' when linking OneDrive to Samsung Gallery
rows.Summarized Problem: Users receive a server error when attempting to link OneDrive to Samsung Gallery.
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents successful connection but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue symptom seems to be cleared as the customer has completed the connection and is using the sync service well.

rows.Title: Lock screen clock style changing to default
rows.Problem: Lock screen clock style keeps changing to default after customization, requiring repeated reconfiguration. The custom pink wallpaper clock style is overridden by the default clock style.
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen clock style resets to default after customization, requiring frequent reconfiguration.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes repeated user effort to reconfigure the lock screen, but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Frequently hang and slow continuously contact updating
rows.Problem: Frequently hang and slow continuously contact updating
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently hangs and slows down during contact updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes significant lag and hangs during a core function (contact sync), making the device unusable for basic communication tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Multiple processes consuming high CPU resources during contact sync. Countermeasure: Investigate and optimize CPU usage in contact update processes.

rows.Title: Quick Icon not working especially Mobile data
rows.Problem: Icons in the new notification panel are not working, especially for Mobile data. This issue appeared after the first update, while the old panel functioned correctly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Quick icons in the notification panel, particularly for Mobile data, are not responding after the software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional, preventing users from accessing a key network setting, which renders a core functionality unusable.

rows.Title: Lock Screen screen is not turning on after getting notifications
rows.Problem: Lock screen is not turning on after getting notifications from any app, despite sound and vibration working and settings being correctly configured.
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen does not turn on after receiving notifications from any app, even though sound and vibration are functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: The lock screen fails to wake up after notifications, which impacts user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Check Power Management Settings: Go to Settings > Battery and device care > Battery > Power mode. Ensure that the power mode is not set to a very aggressive power-saving mode, as this might prevent the lock screen from turning on to save battery. Review Do Not Disturb Settings: Navigate to Settings > Sound and vibration > Do not disturb. Make sure that Do Not Disturb is not enabled or configured in a way that might suppress notifications from waking the screen. Notification Settings: Go to Settings > Notifications to verify notification priority and wake-up behavior.

rows.Title: Galaxy one drive black option not working
rows.Problem: Galaxy one drive black option not working, how to enable backup folder
rows.Summarized Problem: The backup folder option in the Galaxy One Drive is not working and cannot be enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not functional but does not prevent device use or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: It is assumed that the user attempted to Unlink and then Relink. Currently, the issue appears to be resolved as it is in a Linked state.

rows.Title: Delay response while tap on Mode button on Quick Panel
rows.Problem: Turning on modes such as sleep, theater etc taking longer than expected
rows.Summarized Problem: The device takes longer than expected to respond when tapping the Mode button on the Quick Panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a delay in response during mode activation, which affects usability but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Contact app keep closing automatically
rows.Problem: Contact app keeps closing automatically when tapping on move contacts
rows.Summarized Problem: The contact app crashes when users tap on 'move contacts' due to an index out of bounds error when no contacts are saved on eSIM.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes completely when attempting to move contacts, making the feature unusable and disrupting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Show 'Move Contact Tip' only when eSIM has saved contacts; handle index -1 case in MoveContactsPresenter

rows.Title: App Icon not changing when applying theme
rows.Problem: Some app icons are not perfectly fitted when applying theme
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons do not update correctly when applying theme settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial UI malfunction where icons fail to scale properly, but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: AppIcon scaling value is set from ThemePackage resources and a RelativeScale value is calculated.

rows.Title: Phone switching between higher and lower band despite higher band availability
rows.Problem: The phone switches back to lower band even when a higher band is available, connecting only in specific areas and failing to maintain higher band connection elsewhere, while not switching to higher band in other areas despite its availability.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone fails to maintain connection on higher network bands and intermittently switches to lower bands despite higher band availability.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction in network band selection, affecting connectivity in specific areas but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Wallpaper 'Minor are not Allowed to Use this service' popup Occures while Use Generative AI
rows.Problem: Unable to use generative AI to load background images
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot use generative AI to load background images due to age restrictions.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially unavailable due to age-based restrictions, but users can still access it with proper account settings.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Age restriction requires a non-minor Google account. Countermeasure: Users must verify their age via Google account settings.

rows.Title: Device Heatup without doing intensive task or Game
rows.Problem: Device heats up significantly without performing intensive tasks or gaming, likely due to processor (Exynos) overheating at normal temperatures, even with proper device care and updates.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats without performing any intensive tasks or gaming, indicating a potential processor-related issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats under normal usage conditions, which could lead to performance degradation or hardware damage, making it unusable in daily operations.

rows.Title: Bengali numbers not shown when setting Bengali language
rows.Problem: Bengali numbers are missing when Bengali language is set on device; need Bengali numbers instead of Western numbers
rows.Summarized Problem: Bengali numbers are not displayed when Bengali language is set on the device, leading to a mismatch in number representation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in language-specific number display, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.

rows.Title: Charging isn't stopping after reaching 100%
rows.Problem: Charging continues after reaching 100% even with basic battery protection enabled, contradicting the expected behavior of the setting.
rows.Summarized Problem: Charging continues after reaching 100% despite basic battery protection being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of battery protection, where charging does not stop as expected but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Normal battery protection operation in attached log. Battery will discharge only if higher than what the system needs current is consumed. Please guide the customer that in order to see that their battery level drops below 100% they will need to operate the device in a scenario that would consume very high power (e.g. camera, video playback, game etc.).

rows.Title: Login error in Samsung Account desktop application for Windows 11
rows.Problem: Getting error while logging into Samsung Account desktop application for Windows 11 for last few months
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to log into the Samsung Account desktop application on Windows 11 for several months.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a persistent failure in authentication but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Frequently freezing and restarting
rows.Problem: Frequently freezing and restarting often. Done clearing cache and reset settings but same. Not manageable to use the phone in these situations.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently freezes and restarts, making it unusable despite clearing cache and resetting settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to frequent freezing and restarts, preventing normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by UFS link layer errors, indicating a hardware-level problem in the AP or UFS component; the recommended countermeasure is to guide the user to visit the customer service center for hardware inspection.

rows.Title: Overheating
rows.Problem: Device becomes noticeably warm during normal use, charging, gaming, and downloads. It remains warm even when idle and heats up sharply during gaming, reaching uncomfortable levels within 30 minutes.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during normal use, charging, gaming, and downloads, remaining warm even when idle.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating during normal use and gaming makes the device uncomfortable and potentially unsafe, indicating a critical thermal issue.
rows.R&D Comment: Suspected hardware AP (GPU) issue due to stuck AS_ACTIVE bit and unstable GPU clock or faulty FPGA connector.

rows.Title: Contacts storage is draining my phone battery daily
rows.Problem: Contacts storage is draining my phone battery daily
rows.Summarized Problem: Contacts storage is draining phone battery daily.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves battery drain due to frequent database operations, but it is not a complete failure or crash and is reported as temporary and not occurring on all devices.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by WhatsApp's continuous update operations; Samsung has no control over the app's source code and cannot debug or fix it. Recommendation: Facebook should investigate the root cause in their app.

rows.Title: SIM Card Setting
rows.Problem: Network connectivity issues after updating to the latest security update; SIM card shows a round circle with cross icon even when flight mode is on, does not work, requires device restart
rows.Summarized Problem: After a security update, the device shows a cross icon for the SIM card even when flight mode is on, and requires a restart to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents normal network access and requires device restart, making the device unusable until rebooted.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Image Quality Difference Between 12 MP and 50 MP Camera
rows.Problem: Image quality from 50 MP camera mode is very bad after update, while it was fine before the update
rows.Summarized Problem: Image quality in 50 MP camera mode is significantly worse after the update compared to before, despite being better in previous versions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in image processing performance after an update, affecting visual output but not causing device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The high-resolution mode uses AI-based image processing, different from the 12MP hardware processing pipeline, leading to differences in brightness, tone, and color in certain scenes.

rows.Title: Test mode String (*#0*#) is not working
rows.Problem: Test Mode string Code is not working on Galaxy A16 5G
rows.Summarized Problem: The test mode string (*#0*#) is not working on the Galaxy A16 5G device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work, but the device remains usable and no data loss or crash occurs.

rows.Title: String Not working
rows.Problem: Connection problem or Invalid MMI code message is displayed when trying to dial *#0#. WhatsApp application locks differently compared to friends' devices, despite being updated to latest version. Device registration in Samsung Members app is present, and issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: Invalid MMI code *#0# results in a connection error, and WhatsApp behavior differs from other devices despite updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a specific feature (MMI code) and inconsistent app behavior, but does not prevent device overall operation or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Customer tries to run invalid string (*#0#) and that is the reason not working

rows.Title: Sleep data missing on Galaxy Watch4 after One UI 6 update
rows.Problem: Sleep tracking is gone haywire; missing sleep data on a daily basis. The watch stops tracking sleep and heart rate for an hour, though start and end times are correct. There is almost an hour of missing sleep data and heart rate.
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy Watch4 stops tracking sleep and heart rate for an hour after One UI 6 update, resulting in missing sleep data and heart rate readings.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to track a core health function (sleep) for a significant period, leading to loss of critical user data and functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Sleep tracking failure occurs due to arm movement detection issues; logs are needed for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Device getting freeze and unable to switch off
rows.Problem: My phone froze for some time, and I was unable to switch it off
rows.Summarized Problem: The device freezes and becomes unable to switch off.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unable to switch off, which makes it unusable and may lead to a complete system freeze.

rows.Title: Unable to open notification history from setting
rows.Problem: I can't access notification history sometimes
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access notification history from settings.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial malfunction occurs intermittently, preventing consistent access to notification history.

rows.Title: Battery drain issue
rows.Problem: Significantly reduced battery life since February security patch update on Galaxy S23 Plus. Previously achieved 6 to 7 hours screen-on time; now barely reaches 4 hours. Battery drain is rapid when using hotspot, calling, and camera with multiple apps simultaneously.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience significantly reduced battery life after a software update, especially during heavy usage like hotspot, calling, and camera use with multiple apps.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain occurs during heavy usage scenarios, affecting functionality but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain is caused by high app usage during simultaneous functions; the issue is attributed to user behavior, not a software defect.

rows.Title: Camera failed pop up occur
rows.Problem: Camera failed error warning message
rows.Summarized Problem: A warning message appears when the camera fails to function properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to work but does not cause device crash or data loss, only showing a warning message.

rows.Title: White screen while incoming call
rows.Problem: Cannot see anything when receiving a call, preventing call pickup
rows.Summarized Problem: Device shows white screen during incoming calls, preventing users from seeing the call and picking it up.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot see incoming calls, making it impossible to respond, which renders the telephony function unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both suggest performing a factory reset to restore missing system permissions, particularly related to RetailMode.

rows.Title: Face unlock not working
rows.Problem: Face recognition fails in low lighting due to poor image quality from blurred camera images
rows.Summarized Problem: Face unlock fails in low lighting because the camera produces blurred images that prevent successful facial recognition.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work reliably under certain conditions, but users can still use other unlock methods and the issue is not critical to device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Face recognition fails in low light due to blurred images from insufficient camera lighting. Countermeasure: Recommend bright lighting, brighter wallpapers, better positioning, cleaning lens, and centering face in camera view.

rows.Title: External HDD not being connected
rows.Problem: External HDD not connecting to device
rows.Summarized Problem: External HDD fails to connect to the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a potential power shortage, not a device crash or data loss, but prevents proper device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no special communication error from the USB driver point of view. There is a possibility of power shortage, so please connect external power to HUB, connect HDD, or connect HDD alone. Or please check if it is the same on other types of phones, and if the problem persists, please let me know the HDD model product information.

rows.Title: Camera cutout option not working
rows.Problem: Show/hide camera cutout option not working as expected
rows.Summarized Problem: The show/hide camera cutout option in the status bar is not functioning as expected.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing or not working partially, preventing users from controlling camera cutout visibility, but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: The root cause is unclear from logs; if the issue persists, further investigation with logs and video is needed.

rows.Title: Duplicate records for daily activity badges in Samsung Health
rows.Problem: Duplicate records for daily activity badges in Samsung Health
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Health is generating duplicate records for daily activity badges.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of activity tracking, but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue caused by badge update date being in February; fixed in Samsung Health v6.29.5

rows.Title: Unable to receive OTP
rows.Problem: User is not able to receive OTP despite having attached screen recording and log. OTP service is working properly for login.
rows.Summarized Problem: User is unable to receive OTP despite the OTP service being functional for login.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent failure in receiving OTP, but the service works for login, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device unusability.

rows.Title: Widget UI overlaps
rows.Problem: Widgets behave abnormally after being removed and added multiple times
rows.Summarized Problem: Widgets overlap and display incorrectly after being removed and added multiple times.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes abnormal widget behavior but does not prevent device usage or cause system crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: The problem occurs due to incorrect cellSizeBasedOnDefaultGrid usage during template span map update; the fix is to update cellSizeBasedOnDefaultGrid before updating the template span map.

rows.Title: RCS message is not working
rows.Problem: The chat features (RCS) have not been shown in Samsung Messages for the past five days. Only SMS is working, and RCS chat is not enabled because there is no option to turn it on.
rows.Summarized Problem: RCS chat functionality is missing in Samsung Messages, with no option to enable it and only SMS working.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access modern messaging features, rendering the messaging app partially non-functional and preventing use of RCS capabilities.
rows.R&D Comment: No required logs are present to analyze the issue. Kindly help to register the issue with proper set of logs. Steps to capture logs are attached in #C00003.

rows.Title: Swipe lock not working
rows.Problem: Lock screen stuck bug, occurs intermittently after 30 to 1 times of use
rows.Summarized Problem: The swipe gesture on the lock screen is not working and intermittently causes the screen to get stuck.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs intermittently and affects functionality but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Issue not reproducible in latest binary; Countermeasure: Verify in latest binary

rows.Title: Recent app animation glitch
rows.Problem: Animation glitch in recent apps menu persists after security update and device restart; network instability occurs with frequent 4g to 5g switching and no data connection, even after SIM switch
rows.Summarized Problem: Recent apps animation glitch persists and is accompanied by network instability including data connection loss and frequent 4-5G switching.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects core device functionality including app navigation and connectivity, leading to usability problems and potential data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. Also, as no release is planned for OS 14 and the issue is not occurring in latest OS 15 launcher apk, please help to update to latest OS.

rows.Title: flickering of camera with vibrating sound
rows.Problem: The issue of flickering of camera with vibrating sound is real
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera displays flickering with a vibrating sound.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera flickering with a vibrating sound indicates a major functional failure that affects core device operation and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: The camera module is defective; service center should be guided to replace the camera module.

rows.Title: Drawing assist not working
rows.Problem: Drawing assist not working when selecting image, automatically logs out
rows.Summarized Problem: The drawing assist feature fails to work and causes automatic logout when an image is selected.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature failure leads to loss of session and inability to use the photo editor functionality.

rows.Title: Sluggish performance while opening recent apps
rows.Problem: Massage app opens in full screen when going back and instantly opening recent apps, while it works properly in other apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device becomes sluggish and causes the messaging app to open in full screen when navigating back and opening recent apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction in app navigation and performance during app switching, but does not render the device unusable or lead to data loss.

rows.Title: Google Discover UI changed while change screen resolution
rows.Problem: Display resolution issues when switching between resolutions cause fonts and content to appear distorted; issue resolves after phone restart, suggesting a software bug.
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Discover UI displays incorrectly when screen resolution changes, with content appearing distorted and fonts enlarged, resolving after a phone restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI consistency during resolution changes but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and resolves after restart.
rows.R&D Comment: It needs to be checked by Google: b/378382983 [AGSA] Google Discover scaling changes when changing resolution

rows.Title: Captured Image getting Blur
rows.Problem: Images are blurred, tried hard resetting the phone multiple times but the camera has difficulties focusing on documents. Not every click results in blurred images but most of the times the subject focused on gets blurred.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera captures blurred images, especially when focusing on documents.
rows.Severity Reason: Blurred images prevent proper document viewing, making the camera function unusable for key tasks.
