rows.R&D Comment: It is estimated that the camera module is defective. However, the cause of the defect cannot be analyzed only with the attached data. Please visit the service center and guide them to replace the camera module.

rows.Title: Set routine App is not working Properly
rows.Problem: A lost mobile notification routine was set to turn on data, location, set volume high, vibration, and flash screen and light, but it now triggers on every message instead of only when 'Lost' is detected. Clearing data of modes and routines did not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: A lost mobile notification routine on the lock screen is incorrectly triggering on every message instead of only when 'Lost' is detected.
rows.Severity Reason: The routine triggers on every message, causing unintended behavior, but core functionality is not fully absent.
rows.R&D Comment: The camera flash notification is enabled via accessibility settings, possibly triggered by the routine action; disabling flash notification in settings and verifying behavior is recommended.

rows.Title: device getting restart frequently
rows.Problem: personal data intelligence force closed and device restarted
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently restarts due to the personal data intelligence feature force closing.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts frequently, leading to loss of personal data and device unavailability.
rows.R&D Comment: We analyzed each TG, but it is difficult to find the cause due to lack of log. If the problem occurs again, please upload the log. If the log is uploaded additionally, we will proceed with additional analysis.

rows.Title: White Glare during Capture Image
rows.Problem: Camera shows white glare and pixel tearing during image capture
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera displays white glare and pixel tearing during image capture.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visible visual distortion but does not prevent full camera functionality.

rows.Title: Wifi is getting disconnected immediately
rows.Problem: Wifi is getting disconnected immediately after connected. Tried all ways possible by resetting, switching on and off but unable to solve
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi connection drops immediately after establishing, despite attempts to resolve via resets and power cycling.
rows.Severity Reason: The device loses connection immediately after connecting, making Wi-Fi unusable and disrupting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The AP does not send beacon frames during connection attempts, suggesting a temporary malfunction; recommend user to reboot the AP.

rows.Title: Portrait mode focus issue
rows.Problem: Portrait mode focus is very crappy
rows.Summarized Problem: The portrait mode in the camera has very poor focus performance, making it unusable.
rows.Severity Reason: The focus issue in portrait mode renders the feature largely unusable, preventing effective image capture.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed by applying proper dual camera operation log for portrait video operations

rows.Title: Camera not working
rows.Problem: Camera not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera function is not working on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera is completely non-functional, preventing basic device usage.

rows.Title: People Recognition feature is incorrectly grouping different individuals under the same profile or misidentifying faces
rows.Problem: The People Recognition feature is incorrectly grouping different individuals under the same profile or misidentifying faces. This leads to inaccurate photo organization and affects the overall usability of the feature.
rows.Summarized Problem: The People Recognition feature incorrectly groups different individuals under the same profile or misidentifies faces, leading to inaccurate photo organization.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature partially fails in functionality, resulting in inaccurate photo organization but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: If the analysis data has become corrupted, clearing only the Gallery app data may not be sufficient; users need to clear data from CMHProvider in settings.

rows.Title: Charging beep notification
rows.Problem: Beep notification occurs with every 1% during charging, until nearly 23%, then stops.
rows.Summarized Problem: A beep notification triggers with each 1% of charging progress until nearly 23%, then stops.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user experience during charging but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to use phone call while running MS Teams
rows.Problem: Unable to use phone call to make calls while running MS Teams
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot make phone calls while MS Teams is running.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to make calls during active MS Teams usage, which prevents basic communication functionality.

rows.Title: Sim card is getting disabled and enabled on its own
rows.Problem: Sim card is getting disabled and enabled on its own. attaching video of the same and the log
rows.Summarized Problem: The SIM card is intermittently disabling and re-enabling itself without user input.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes the device to lose network connectivity intermittently, leading to potential loss of service and user frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: 5G stopped working
rows.Problem: 5G stopped working after the update. Device remains in 4G mode only despite restarts, manual service provider selection, and new SIM card insertion. 5G works on another device with same SIM.
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G connectivity has stopped working after the update, with device consistently operating in 4G mode only despite troubleshooting.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unable to use 5G, which is a core connectivity function, making it unusable for high-speed data access in supported areas.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Charging getting Fluctuate
rows.Problem: Charging problem
rows.Summarized Problem: Charging voltage fluctuates during use, leading to inconsistent charging performance.
rows.Severity Reason: Charging instability can lead to device malfunction or data loss, making the device unusable under certain conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Improve algorithm to correct and request voltage adjustments when deviation exceeds ±100mV; Q7/B7/Q7M/S26 preliminary development phase completed.

rows.Title: Camera not focus in 30x after update
rows.Problem: In 30x the camera is not focus after the update
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to focus in 30x mode after the software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function is completely broken in a key mode (30x), rendering the device unusable for photo capture in that setting.
rows.R&D Comment: The lens appears caught; users need to visit a service center for diagnosis. Correct logs must be provided upon recurrence.

rows.Title: IMS & W3school crashing
rows.Problem: Multiple apps crashing without reason; speaker stops working after closing apps, works fine after restart
rows.Summarized Problem: Multiple apps crash unexpectedly and speaker stops working after app closure, functioning only after restart.
rows.Severity Reason: Multiple apps crashing without cause indicates device instability and potential loss of functionality during use.
rows.R&D Comment: Logs needed at time when issue is happening, please share updated logs

rows.Title: Camera Capture Image getting More warm & not optimized
rows.Problem: More warm photo click and not good optimization
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera images are getting warmer and lack proper optimization.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of image quality, affecting photo appearance but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Screen tries to rotate automatically and get freezed during game play
rows.Problem: Screen tries to rotate automatically and get freezed for 2-3 seconds while playing game
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen automatically rotates and freezes for 2-3 seconds during game play.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent display malfunction during gameplay but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue belongs to a third-party application. It should be checked and fixed by the third-party app owner. No source code or internal logs are available for root cause analysis.

rows.Title: Network Not Latch In device
rows.Problem: Please fi d the attached screen recording.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to establish network registration.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot register with the network, leading to a complete loss of connectivity, making the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Physical device not detected in the device. It is specific HW /device issue. HW gone bad

rows.Title: Photo editor is not responding
rows.Problem: When try to edit photo ex: smoothing image I see photo editor nor responding error
rows.Summarized Problem: The photo editor fails to respond when attempting to apply smoothing effects.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is not responding during a core editing function, making it unusable for users attempting to edit photos.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Deadlock in a previous session due to thread interaction in SNAP framework. Countermeasure: Update to cache change from snap compute team (FLUMEN CL:30785644) to resolve deadlock.

rows.Title: Voice wake-up not working
rows.Problem: Voice wakeup keeps stopping. This problem observed last 2 to 3 days
rows.Summarized Problem: The voice wake-up feature is failing and repeatedly stops after being activated.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature intermittently fails, preventing users from using voice commands, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: There is a bug when BixbyWakeup starts and we fixed it at the latest version. So Please update BixbyWakeup.

rows.Title: SIM cards not being detected
rows.Problem: After software update, one of two SIM cards is not being detected on S23 Ultra. Only one SIM is shown. The same SIM works in other devices. Switching SIM slots does not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: One SIM card is not being detected after a software update on the S23 Ultra, despite working in other devices and with proper insertion.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of network functionality, affecting only one SIM card, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Observation: Both SIM cards are present and in service in logs. Action: Investigate whether hardware or SIM card issue by testing in other devices and swapping SIMs.

rows.Title: Call timer not showing
rows.Problem: When answering a call, the timer does not start 6 out of 10 times, showing only 'Incoming Call' with a hang up button. After a delay, the timer starts but the other party cannot hear the caller, requiring multiple retry attempts.
rows.Summarized Problem: The call timer fails to start upon answering calls and occasionally results in audio drop, requiring multiple retries.
rows.Severity Reason: The timer failure occurs intermittently and affects call functionality, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be a network retransmission causing timer initiation failure; request for CP silent logs for verification.

rows.Title: Camera videos taken are completely unstable sometimes
rows.Problem: Videos taken are completely unstable sometimes, even with FHD and HDR settings adjusted.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recordings on the camera are unstable under certain conditions, despite adjusting settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The videos are completely unstable, which prevents reliable usage of the camera function, making it unusable in critical scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Quick panel icons disappearing after restart
rows.Problem: Notification center contents disappear after restart, intermittently occurring after January 2025 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Quick panel icons disappear intermittently after device restart following the January 2025 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent loss of functionality in the notification center, affecting user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Reboot problem
rows.Problem: recently again I have received reboot problem in my phone
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing repeated reboots.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts unexpectedly, making it unusable and potentially leading to data loss or instability.

rows.Title: App shortcuts not working with back tap gestures
rows.Problem: App shortcuts are not working with back tap gestures; they require the app to be opened first, unlike regular back taps which work fine. Functionality works when other apps are in full screen or as popups.
rows.Summarized Problem: App shortcuts fail to activate with back tap gestures and require the app to be opened first.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a specific functionality but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Charging Notification flicker
rows.Problem: Inconsistent and constantly changing brightness when the phone is charging and screen is off
rows.Summarized Problem: The charging notification flickers and causes inconsistent brightness when the phone is charging and screen is off.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects screen behavior during charging but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Focus not working in 1X zoom
rows.Problem: Camera not working properly sometimes results in blur in 1x zoom, working fine at 0.6x or more than 3x
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera focus fails in 1x zoom, resulting in blurred images.
rows.Severity Reason: Focus failure in 1x zoom leads to poor image quality and renders the camera function ineffective in a key usage scenario.
rows.R&D Comment: Lens of Wide Camera Lens was stuck at close distance point; recommend camera module exchange and customer guidance to service center.

rows.Title: SBI app not downloading
rows.Problem: Not able to download an application, even though the country of device and application is same, India Frequency is always
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to download the SBI app from the Google Play Store despite matching device and app country settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in app download functionality under specific conditions, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera getting crash
rows.Problem: After the latest security update, my phone is not running properly with every app and whole UI crashing, full of lags and jitters, and unexpected restarts. Unable to use phone normally.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera is crashing after the latest security update, causing system instability and frequent app and UI crashes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes system-wide crashes and unexpected restarts, making the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: ANR has already occurred on the system server before QuickStar call stack, which seems to be a chain reaction. Before the first ANR occurred, the log did not find anything unusual in the system situation, which makes it difficult to determine the direct cause.

rows.Title: Option to click picture doesn't come during video recording
rows.Problem: Option to click picture doesn't come most of the time when video recording
rows.Summarized Problem: The option to take a picture during video recording is missing most of the time.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing intermittently but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: If HDR10+ is enabled, photo snapshot is not supported; users must disable HDR10+ to take snapshots.

rows.Title: WhatsApp not opening
rows.Problem: WhatsApp auto exits after restart when opening
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp application fails to open and exits automatically after restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes immediately upon launch, preventing user from accessing a core communication tool, making the device unusable for messaging.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a problem from app side. App developer need to fix this issue. We are not reporting one or sometimes issue until not reproduced manually.

rows.Title: Not able to set lockscreen text color to white
rows.Problem: Not able to set lockscreen text color to white, setting to white makes it set to black
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set the lockscreen text color to white, and when attempting to do so, it defaults to black instead.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI function, where the intended color change fails but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Incorrect handling of color input in lockscreen settings. Countermeasure: Ensure software version is up to date and users can reset display settings to default, then reconfigure text color.

rows.Title: Camera video start jitter while zoom
rows.Problem: Video flickers and freezes during zoom, with black frames lasting about 15 seconds in the recorded video. The preview screen on the phone may also be black during this time.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recording freezes and shows black frames when zooming during recording, with potential black preview on screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete loss of video content during recording, making the feature unusable under normal use conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue timing log is missing; need to capture logs during recording with zoom and verify preview screen behavior during black frames.

rows.Title: Quick Panel Internet Symbol Stays On After Data Off
rows.Problem: Internet symbol stays on after data is turned off, even when no internet connection exists
rows.Summarized Problem: The internet symbol remains displayed on the quick panel after data is turned off, even when no internet connection is active.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the accurate display of network status, leading to user confusion but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Phone Dialer Crashed
rows.Problem: Phone dialer gets hanged and crashes while in use, despite having sufficient RAM and unused storage space exceeding 220 GB.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone dialer application crashes and hangs during use, even with sufficient RAM and storage.
rows.Severity Reason: The dialer crashes and hangs, making it unusable during operation, which directly impacts core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The current contact list is extensive and synchronized across multiple accounts, consuming significant resources during sync; logs are needed to confirm root cause and reproduce issue.

rows.Title: Camera flickering while using 5x lens in video mode
rows.Problem: Camera gets flickering while using 5x lens in video mode, especially in low light, due to sensor switch to tele sensor causing brightness change
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera flickers when using 5x zoom in video mode, especially in low light, due to sensor switching causing brightness changes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent malfunction during video recording at high zoom but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.

rows.Title: Galaxy Watch4 not reading wrist, no heart rate, no sleep detection
rows.Problem: Galaxy Watch4 after One Ul 6 update is not reading wrist, no heart rate, no sleep detection, no BIA sensor working. No improvement after reset or other actions.
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy Watch4 fails to detect wrist movement, heart rate, and sleep patterns after the One Ul 6 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Critical health data is not being collected, rendering core health monitoring functions inoperable.

rows.Title: Charging notification during battery increase from 0% to 25%
rows.Problem: During charging from 0% to 25% of battery, the device shows a notification for each percentage increase indicating 'battery charge remaining and need to charge the phone'. This occurs repeatedly during the first 25% charge, and stops when charge exceeds 25%. This behavior is considered an error during initial charging.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device displays repetitive charging notifications during the first 25% of battery charge, which is unnecessary and disrupts user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification appears during a normal charging phase and causes user distraction, but does not prevent device operation or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Secure folder is not found
rows.Problem: Secure folder is not found in my device
rows.Summarized Problem: The secure folder feature is not available on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The secure folder feature is completely missing, which prevents users from securing sensitive data on the device.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Galaxy A21 does not support Knox solution including secure folder due to hardware policy. Countermeasure: Performance improvement efforts are underway.

rows.Title: Unable to play 4K video properly in device
rows.Problem: Defective UFS can cause slow read/write speeds leading to stuttering, lag, or delays during 4K video playback. Corrupted files may also occur. The device's Exynos 1280 chipset only supports 4K@30fps, and the test video used is 4K@60fps, which is unsupported.
rows.Summarized Problem: 4K video playback is unstable due to defective UFS storage and unsupported video resolution.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to play supported 4K@30fps content properly, resulting in lag and stuttering, which severely impacts core functionality of video playback.
rows.R&D Comment: Defective UFS leads to slow read/write speeds and unsupported 4K@60fps video; app should not allow higher resolutions beyond chipset support.

rows.Title: WiFi Not Working
rows.Problem: WiFi names are not coming and connection drops when moving away from router, reconnects when near router
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi connection drops when moving away from router and fails to show available networks at distance.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent connection failure at distance, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Networks filtered due to low signal strength. Countermeasure: Users should stay within proper range of the AP and reconnect.

rows.Title: Animation Lag observe in device
rows.Problem: Animation is not good, Lagging observe while closing / opening apps
rows.Summarized Problem: Device exhibits lagging during app opening and closing with poor animation performance.
rows.Severity Reason: Lagging during app transitions affects user experience but does not cause device to crash or become unusable.

rows.Title: Prime Video App Not Working
rows.Problem: Prime Video app is crashing frequently and cannot be opened. Device freezes during app opening. Restarting does not resolve the issue. Downgrade and update of app versions have no effect.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Prime Video app crashes frequently and fails to open, causing device freezing during startup.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes repeatedly and fails to open, making it unusable, which directly impacts core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue belongs to a third-party application. It should be checked and fixed by the app owner. No source code or commercial contract exists between Samsung and the app developer.

rows.Title: Charging information display wrong while connect to Charging
rows.Problem: When my tablet Galaxy Tab A7 lite is connected to charger, it shows only 1 minute remaining to full charge regardless of actual battery level
rows.Summarized Problem: The device incorrectly displays a 1-minute remaining charge time when connected to a charger, regardless of actual battery level.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in charging information display, not causing device failure or data loss, but misleading users about battery status.
rows.R&D Comment: The incorrect charging time calculation is caused by insufficient adapter power, and users must replace the adapter with a standard one to resolve.

rows.Title: Phone freezes and restarts automatically
rows.Problem: Phone freezes and restarts automatically while functioning and even restarts while phone is at idle
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone repeatedly freezes and restarts, even at idle, suggesting a system-level instability.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to frequent restarts, indicating a critical system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by multiple Watchdog Bark events, suggesting a potential hardware issue; the countermeasure is to investigate hardware components.

rows.Title: Lock screen hangs up sometimes
rows.Problem: Lock screen hangs up sometimes. Notice I am unable to perform any action. Also lockscreen and notification tray is visible same time.
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen occasionally hangs, making it impossible to perform any actions.
rows.Severity Reason: The lock screen hangs, preventing user interaction, which renders the device unusable during those instances.

rows.Title: Samsung Health is stopping popup
rows.Problem: Samsung Health is stopping
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Health stops functioning and fails to show popups.
rows.Severity Reason: The app stops working intermittently, preventing user notifications but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The Samsung Device Health Manager service is not handled by Samsung Health; users should clear app data and restart device.

rows.Title: Camera recording video not saving
rows.Problem: Camera recording video but not saving it shows the attached error
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recording in the camera app starts but fails to save the recorded content.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to save recorded videos, which prevents users from retaining their recordings, making the feature unusable.

rows.Title: Phone app getting hanged & response slow
rows.Problem: Phone app getting hanged
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone app is experiencing slow response and hangs during operation.
rows.Severity Reason: The app hangs and responds slowly, making it unusable during calls, which is a major functional failure affecting core telephony operations.

rows.Title: Charging estimated time not display on Lock screen
rows.Problem: No estimated time displayed on lock screen during charging; only charging percentage shown
rows.Summarized Problem: The estimated charging time does not display on the lock screen during charging, only the percentage is shown.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a charging feature, not causing device unavailability or data loss, but affecting user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: The absence of estimated time display in high temperature conditions is due to battery protection logic; this behavior is intentional to prevent user confusion.

rows.Title: Unable to change my ringtone
rows.Problem: I am unable to change my ringtone since a long time. My sound picker is not working.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change their ringtone due to a non-functional sound picker.
rows.Severity Reason: The sound picker fails to function, preventing users from changing ringtone, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.Resolve Type: Issue Fixed(Fixed automatically by Main branch)
rows.R&D Comment: The crash for sound-picker due to negative index error has been fixed with OneUI 6.1 upgrade including CL# 30310096. Please check with next release.

rows.Title: Text to Call on another device stops working
rows.Problem: The 'Text to Call' feature on another device stops working two days after being enabled and does not ring when a call comes in.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Text to Call' feature stops working two days after being enabled and fails to ring during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to function during calls, rendering the device unable to receive incoming calls via text-to-call functionality, which is a critical communication feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Now bar not showing sports info
rows.Problem: Now bar not showing sports from google
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar on the lock screen is not displaying sports information from Google.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning, affecting only specific content display on the lock screen without making the device unusable.

rows.Title: One UI not responding
rows.Problem: Device has lagging issues; apps take long to respond; device restarts after repeated app access; One UI shows 'not responding' when touched; issue occurs across apps including Samsung Members.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's One UI is unresponsive and lags severely when interacting with apps, causing frequent restarts.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive and restarts repeatedly, severely impacting usability and stability of core app interactions.

rows.Title: Do not disturb mode getting turned on
rows.Problem: Do not disturb mode getting turned on by Galaxy watch manager even after sync with phone is turned off
rows.Summarized Problem: Do not disturb mode activates on Galaxy Watch even when phone sync is off.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature activates under normal settings, but users expect it to be disabled when phone sync is off, leading to partial malfunction.

rows.Title: Game is crashing many times while playing
rows.Problem: Game crashes multiple times during gameplay, device gets hot, and battery backup is not improved. Clearing cache and app data does not resolve the issue. The crashes occur in the PUBG app due to a null pointer dereference in a third-party library. This is a third-party application issue with no access to source code or commercial agreement with the app developer.
rows.Summarized Problem: The PUBG game crashes frequently during gameplay, leading to instability and device overheating.
rows.Severity Reason: The game crashes repeatedly during use, causing device instability and potential data loss, making the device unusable for gaming.
rows.R&D Comment: The crash is due to a null pointer dereference in a third-party library within the PUBG app. The issue is app-side and belongs to a third-party application; no source code access or contractual relationship exists between Samsung and the app developer. Requires third-party fix.

rows.Title: Boxes when made in samsung notes shows inconsistency in thickness
rows.Problem: Boxes when made in samsung notes shows inconsistency in thickness
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience inconsistent thickness when drawing boxes in Samsung Notes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in the thickness rendering of drawn shapes, not causing device failure or data loss but affecting usability of the feature.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by pen speed affecting thickness instead of pressure; countermeasure involves applying touch point data (pressure, tilt, orientation) across all stroke points to enable variable thickness expression.

rows.Title: Camera Image Quality Noise in Low Light or Zoom
rows.Problem: Pictures have visible noise, especially in low light or when there are many objects in the frame, which becomes clear upon zooming.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera images show visible noise in low light or when zooming, especially with many objects in the frame.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image clarity in specific conditions but does not cause device failure or crash.

rows.Title: Gallery folder stuck
rows.Problem: Samsung Gallery app sticks in a folder when opening, and tapping back closes the app without returning to the home page.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Gallery app gets stuck in a folder and fails to return to the home page when the back button is tapped.
rows.Severity Reason: The app partially fails to function after navigating to a folder, preventing user from returning to the home screen.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is not reproduced. We need to reconfirm this issue. If you upload the log again, we'll check it out.

rows.Title: UI not responding
rows.Problem: UI HOME KEEP STOPING
rows.Summarized Problem: The home screen UI is frequently stopping and not responding.
rows.Severity Reason: The UI is failing to respond, making the home screen unusable, which directly impacts user interaction and device usability.

rows.Title: Ai feature working Properly in Gallery
rows.Problem: Camera AI features not working, no edits like Best face and Remaster
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera AI features such as Best face and Remaster are not working, resulting in no AI edits.
rows.Severity Reason: The AI editing functions are not working, which prevents users from applying AI enhancements, but the core camera functionality remains available.

rows.Title: AI features not working properly
rows.Problem: Ai eraser features are not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: AI eraser features in the Gallery app are not working properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The AI eraser feature is not functioning, which partially impacts user functionality but does not render the app unusable.

rows.Title: Do Not Disturb for watch6 gets removed automatically
rows.Problem: When a mode is created with an action to turn on Do Not Disturb for watch, the Do Not Disturb action gets removed automatically. Only other actions are present.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Do Not Disturb action for watch6 is automatically removed when creating a mode, resulting in the feature being unavailable.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing from the mode, preventing users from setting up a working Do Not Disturb profile on the watch.

rows.Title: No Network problem while playing game
rows.Problem: Network problem occurs when playing Freefire, not only on this device but also on other Samsung A35 5G phones during gameplay
rows.Summarized Problem: A network disconnection occurs when playing Freefire on Samsung A35 5G devices, affecting multiple users simultaneously.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue manifests during gameplay and affects multiple users with the same device model, indicating a partial malfunction in network stability under specific usage conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: VoNR functionality was not working
rows.Problem: VoNR functionality was not working and it was switched to VOLTE
rows.Summarized Problem: VoNR functionality fails during calls and defaults to VOLTE.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to use modern VoNR calling technology, switching to older VOLTE, which impacts call quality and modern network capabilities.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Charging stops at certain battery percentage
rows.Problem: Device stops charging at a certain battery percentage and restarts immediately, happening every time during charging.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device stops charging at a specific battery level and restarts the charging process immediately.
rows.Severity Reason: The device stops charging at a certain battery level and restarts repeatedly, which prevents proper charging and may lead to battery degradation or device malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Was the battery level always high when the problem occurred? Serial number of the charger used.

rows.Title: Downloading and installing apps from Play Store takes longer time
rows.Problem: App downloads take significantly longer than normal, affecting all apps including updates. RAM management is poor, preventing smooth multitasking with two apps. Request to improve system functionality.
rows.Summarized Problem: App downloads from the Play Store take significantly longer than normal, and poor RAM management prevents proper multitasking.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes poor performance and prevents users from running multiple apps simultaneously, making the device unusable for basic tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: The app encountered a NetworkRequestException during retrieval of items due to failed RPC call; users are advised to clear cache and disable auto-updates.

rows.Title: Signal suddenly goes to No Service or Emergency Calls Only during Airtel 5G usage
rows.Problem: Frequent network drops occur while using Airtel 5G, causing signal to show No Service or Emergency Calls Only. This leads to difficulty placing or receiving calls. During gaming, high ping and connection instability are observed. Calls sometimes fail to connect with no audio or timer start.
rows.Summarized Problem: Network drops and instability occur during Airtel 5G usage, resulting in signal loss and failed call connections.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents reliable call functionality and network usage, making the device unusable for communication during 5G usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera captured dark image in night mode
rows.Problem: Camera clarity degraded after March security update, images appear dark in night mode
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera produces dark images in night mode after March security update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of night mode functionality, not complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Night mode will try to brighten up the content present in the scene. In the captured condition there is not enough light present in the scene. Cleaning the lens will help with image clarity.

rows.Title: Blue background appear while recording video
rows.Problem: Blue background appears during video recording in museum, while other video outputs are normal
rows.Summarized Problem: A blue background appears during video recording in specific environments like museums.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video recording in specific conditions but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is not reproducing consistently. We will continue to monitor and resolve it.

rows.Title: Overheating occurs even with light usage like browsing and calls
rows.Problem: Galaxy S21 FE continues to overheat despite minimal background apps, disabled unnecessary features, and avoiding use while charging. Overheating occurs during light usage such as browsing and calls.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy S21 FE overheats during light usage such as browsing and calls, even with minimal background apps and no charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats under normal usage conditions, which could lead to performance degradation, battery damage, or safety risks.
rows.R&D Comment: Attached dumpstate does not contain SSRM logs. So, unable to analyze the issue.

rows.Title: Bluetooth No sound transmitted while connect wireless TWS earbuds
rows.Problem: No sound is transmitted when connecting wireless TWS earbuds via Bluetooth, though connection is successful. Audio works after restarting the phone until the next disconnect/reconnect.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth audio fails to transmit sound to TWS earbuds, despite successful connection, and only works after phone restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is intermittent and resolves with a phone restart, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete failure or device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Bluetooth audio stream initialization issue; Countermeasure: Request CP silent logs for diagnosis.

rows.Title: Quick Panel sound modes toggle and glitch
rows.Problem: When changing the sound modes it automatically toggles between all the 3 modes and glitches. This continues even when locking the phone and restarting.
rows.Summarized Problem: The sound modes in the Quick Panel automatically toggle between all three modes and glitch when changed, persisting even after locking and restarting the phone.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes continuous malfunction of a core audio setting, leading to inconsistent user experience and device usability.

rows.Title: Secure Folder photos automatically deleted after update
rows.Problem: Photos captured before 30 August were automatically deleted from secure folder after software update; photos after 30 August are not deleted, and no logs exist to confirm deletion events.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos captured before 30 August are being automatically deleted from the secure folder after a software update, with no deletion logs available for verification.
rows.Severity Reason: Photos are being deleted without user control, leading to potential data loss and user trust issues, especially for photos captured before a specific date.
rows.R&D Comment: The customer stated that specific capture images from a certain point in time were deleted from the secure folder. Based on log analysis, the most recent S/W update was on 03/09/24 at 9:08 pm, and there are no logs related to file deletion from the secure folder due to delayed log acquisition.

rows.Title: Samsung cloud application is not opening and it is constantly crashing
rows.Problem: Samsung cloud application is not opening and it is constantly crashing, data is not syncing, Samsung notes app is not working due to data sync failure
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Cloud app crashes repeatedly and fails to open, leading to data sync issues and affecting the functionality of the Samsung Notes app.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes repeatedly, preventing access to essential data and causing functional failure of related apps like Samsung Notes.
rows.R&D Comment: The app does not show abnormal termination in logs; customer needs to reattach dump logs for further analysis.

rows.Title: Camera when switching lens zooming 3x and above jitteriness and shaky video or photo
rows.Problem: When switching camera lens, mostly while zooming to 3x and above, there is jitteriness and the whole video or photo becomes shaky and the OIS makes a constant rattling noise until interrupted by shaking the mobile. Even after months of updates, the issue persists. Clearing camera app cache and data did not help.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video and photo become shaky and OIS makes a rattling noise when switching camera lens at zoom levels 3x and above.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes significant visual instability in video and photos, making content unusable during high-zoom usage, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: It is estimated that the camera module is defective. However, the cause of the defect cannot be analyzed only with the attached data. Please visit the service center and guide them to replace the camera module.

rows.Title: During charging with Samsung Charger from 0% to 25% it's showing notification during each % increase
rows.Problem: During charging from 0% to 25% of battery it's showing notification during each percentage increase in battery charge that "1 or 2 or 3 or 5 or 6 or 7 or
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows unnecessary battery level notifications during charging from 0% to 25%.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification appears during a normal charging phase and is repetitive, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Battery draining too fast
rows.Problem: Battery draining too fast without using phone, even after 4 hours of screen time, requires 100% charge after March security patch update
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains rapidly when the phone is not in use, even after 4 hours of screen time, requiring full charge after a security patch update.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable due to rapid battery depletion without phone usage, leading to frequent recharging and potential user frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery draining caused by WhatsApp usage during long calls; countermeasure is to investigate WhatsApp's background behavior and optimize power consumption.

rows.Title: Wifi not turning on
rows.Problem: Wifi is not turning on my galaxy f23 5g phone only shows turning on but didn't get on
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi is not turning on; device shows 'turning on' but fails to connect.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish WiFi connection, which is essential for basic internet access and device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: There is FW crash, Need full ramdump to further check. If the issue persists even after rebooting the device. Please get the device checked at nearest CS center.

rows.Title: Jitter in background wallpaper during app open and close
rows.Problem: Animation flashing and jittery scaling of background wallpaper when opening and closing apps rapidly or normally
rows.Summarized Problem: Background wallpaper exhibits jittery animation when apps are opened and closed, causing visual instability during rapid app transitions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial visual malfunction during normal app usage, not causing device unavailability or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Jitter in background wallpaper during app open and close is due to animation limitations when apps are rapidly opened and closed; current status should be maintained.

rows.Title: ONE UI not responding
rows.Problem: System UI isn't responding and One UI Home isn't responding; phone is slow since software update
rows.Summarized Problem: The One UI Home screen and System UI are not responding, causing significant slowness and unresponsiveness.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI is unresponsive, making the device unusable and affecting core navigation functions.

rows.Title: System UI Not Responding
rows.Problem: Phone hangs and becomes unresponsive, especially when using Samsung provided wallpaper, causing severe lag
rows.Summarized Problem: The system UI is unresponsive and the device lags significantly, especially when using Samsung provided wallpapers, causing it to hang and become unresponsive.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unresponsive and unworkable, making it unusable for normal operations.

rows.Title: Bluetooth audio completely blank after any kind of call
rows.Problem: Bluetooth audio completely blank after any kind of call
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth audio becomes completely blank after any call ends.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete loss of audio during and after calls, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs after a call ends, and no useful logs were available; logs must be collected immediately upon issue occurrence.

rows.Title: Note application gets auto restart while using
rows.Problem: Note app freezes and automatically restarts, causing loss of recording data and efforts
rows.Summarized Problem: The note app freezes and restarts unexpectedly, leading to loss of recordings and user data.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crash results in loss of data and user efforts, making the core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Samsung Notes was killed by LMKD (low memory killer) but no memory logs are available; please keep current state.

rows.Title: Hijri calendar not showing proper date
rows.Problem: Hijri calendar is not showing proper date even after adjustment; shows 25 Ramzan instead of 24
rows.Summarized Problem: The Hijri calendar is displaying incorrect dates, showing 25 Ramzan instead of 24 after adjustment.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where the date display is incorrect after user adjustment, but the calendar remains functional and does not crash or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Battery backup is not good
rows.Problem: Battery discharging very fast and only 4 hours of backup on screen on time; device hanging
rows.Summarized Problem: The device drains battery rapidly and only provides 4 hours of backup on screen, with the device hanging during use.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is hanging and draining battery at an excessive rate, making it unusable for normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Instagram consumes excessive battery in background due to high foreground and background usage; users should restrict background data and disable push notifications.

rows.Title: Unable to switch ON Wi-Fi and Bluetooth
rows.Problem: Unable to switch ON wifi and Bluetooth in my cell
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot turn on Wi-Fi and Bluetooth on their device.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to enable fundamental connectivity features, rendering basic functionality like internet access and pairing unavailable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: WIFI IC has not been recognized since booting time. Counter Measure: If the same problem continues to occur after rebooting, please visit CS Center for HW inspection.

rows.Title: Camera's Slow motion and Panorama mode quality got worse
rows.Problem: After software update, Camera's Slow motion and Panorama mode quality got worse. Previously, slow motion mode maintained normal lighting, but now it dims lighting by about 95% even with sufficient outdoor lighting, making it nearly invisible indoors.
rows.Summarized Problem: Slow motion and Panorama mode in the camera now dims lighting significantly, making video content nearly invisible in indoor settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality in specific modes but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is partially attributable to system limitations.
rows.R&D Comment: Due to limitation of fps in slow motion mode, brightness generally tends to be lower compared to Photo mode. Please maintain current status as it is difficult to modify brightness.

rows.Title: One UI stopped working
rows.Problem: One UI stopped working due to an error after the March security update
rows.Summarized Problem: One UI is no longer functioning after the March security update.
rows.Severity Reason: The system interface is completely non-functional, rendering a core user experience feature unusable.

rows.Title: Voice recorder application doesn't record
rows.Problem: Voice recorder application doesn't record; shows can't record during incoming calls. The issue occurred at one point and then stopped, but is now back.
rows.Summarized Problem: The voice recorder application fails to record audio, especially during incoming calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially non-functional during specific use cases, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: As checked in attached logs the issue scenario is not captured. Request user to kindly reboot device once > reproduce issue and then attach logs immediately after issue occurs.

rows.Title: Now bar Live notifications sports on Google does not work
rows.Problem: Live notifications for sports on Google do not work as depicted; after unfollowing teams, they reappear with 'follow' option when searching for teams starting with 'a'.
rows.Summarized Problem: Live sports notifications on Google do not work after unfollowing teams, reappearing with 'follow' option upon search.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature partially malfunctions after user action, but does not cause device freeze or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Issue in com.google.android.googlequicksearchbox app; Countermeasure: Update app version, clear cache, and verify with fresh logs if issue persists.

rows.Title: Battery drain after security update
rows.Problem: Battery drain observed after security update, percentage dropped from 90% to 85% out of 140 total apps, with 21 apps in use and 45 installed
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains significantly after a security update, dropping from 90% to 85% within a short period.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drain is noticeable but not severe enough to cause device unavailability or crash, though it affects overall usage experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Update process consumed about 1G data and 5.3% CPU, with battery consumption estimated at 5%—not extreme, but logs are incomplete; recommend user to capture logs before charging for further analysis.

rows.Title: Gesture setting
rows.Problem: Palm swipe to capture still not working, this issue is not getting solved. It's been like 2 3 weeks.
rows.Summarized Problem: Palm swipe to capture gesture is not working and has not been resolved after two to three weeks.
rows.Severity Reason: The gesture function is completely missing, rendering a key interaction feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The exact root cause is not clear from logs; if the issue persists, a new issue with logs and video should be raised.

rows.Title: Camera control app not showing on Galaxy Watch 4
rows.Problem: Camera control app is not showing on Galaxy Watch 4 and user cannot control phone camera.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera control app is not showing on Galaxy Watch 4, preventing users from controlling their phone's camera.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is missing from the interface, preventing partial camera functionality but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Camera controller will work only for flagship models, flip and fold models. For innovation models camera controller will not show and will not work. If you setup with flagship model in watch side automatically controller app will shown.

rows.Title: Text alignment issue in BT popup screen
rows.Problem: Text alignment issue persists after software update
rows.Summarized Problem: Text alignment is incorrect in the Bluetooth popup screen and remains after software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI display but does not prevent device usage or cause system failure.

rows.Title: White balance doesn't work properly
rows.Problem: The display looks red colour more. The white color doesn't look white, it looks reddish. I see that the redness doesn't go away in natural mode. And white balance doesn't work.
rows.Summarized Problem: The display's white balance is malfunctioning, causing white to appear reddish and not correcting in natural mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual accuracy but does not cause device crash or data loss, and only impacts appearance rather than core functionality.

rows.Title: Now bar not displaying live scores on lock screen
rows.Problem: Now bar is not displaying live scores on lock screen, even when following IPL teams and the tournament, and this issue occurred during last month's Champions Trophy cricket tournament
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar fails to display live scores on the lock screen despite user following relevant teams and tournaments.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing in a critical real-time information display, rendering the lock screen unusable for sports fans.

rows.Title: Battery drain unusual with mild usage
rows.Problem: Battery drain is unusual and faster than expected with very mild usage
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences unusually fast battery drain even with minimal usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drains rapidly under normal usage conditions, which renders the device unusable without charging.

rows.Title: Contacts Storage is using battery
rows.Problem: Contacts Storage is using maximum battery percentage even when not in use, automatically consuming battery despite stopping sync process. Other Galaxy users do not face this issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contacts Storage app is continuously consuming battery even when not in use, leading to excessive battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is actively using battery at high levels without user intervention, which significantly impacts device usability and battery life.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Contacts Storage app performs frequent background queries causing high battery consumption. Countermeasure: Reduce background operations in Contacts Storage app.

rows.Title: Now bar not working on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Now bar doesn't show up when using music or Google Maps
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar feature fails to display on the lock screen when using music or Google Maps.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not function during common app usage but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: charging suddenly stops and then restarts while charger is still connected
rows.Problem: Charging suddenly stops and then restarts while the charger is still connected, does not happen when fast charging is off, occurs with Samsung official 45W charger
rows.Summarized Problem: Fast charging intermittently stops and restarts while the charger remains connected.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes the device to lose charging functionality unexpectedly, leading to potential user frustration and device instability during use.
rows.R&D Comment: Caused by increased VBUS_ADC check delay (250ms to 500ms) in OP_MODE; improved by reflecting B7/Q7/Q7M/M tasks.

rows.Title: Gaming Hub keeps getting hanged every time while play Fram TripleMAtch
rows.Problem: A particular game in the Gaming Hub keeps getting hanged every time I try to play it. When I click the play button, the screen just gets stuck. I have been playing this game for a while now and its stuck in level 301 now. I have restarted the device several times but the issue still occurs.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Gaming Hub game 'Farm Triple Match' freezes and gets stuck during gameplay, preventing progress and requiring restarts.
rows.Severity Reason: The game freezes completely during gameplay, causing device unresponsiveness and preventing user progress, making the experience unusable.

rows.Title: Edge Panel handle disappears when sleep mode is turned on and off
rows.Problem: The Edge Panel handle disappears when sleep mode is turned on and off, requiring manual toggle to restore. This causes inconvenience as the Edge Panel is useful.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Edge Panel handle disappears when sleep mode is toggled, requiring manual intervention to restore.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality of a useful UI element but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please record video and get log immediately when Edge panel is not showing.

rows.Title: Modes and routine app get stuck and get closed while enter in mode History
rows.Problem: Modes and routine app get stuck and get closed whenever i try to see running History of app
rows.Summarized Problem: The Modes and Routine app gets stuck and closes when attempting to view mode history.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes or gets stuck during a core functionality (viewing history), making it unusable for users.

rows.Title: Camera unable to focus properly in Portrait Mode
rows.Problem: In portrait photo mode, faces of most people are blurred while only a few are clearly visible, indicating poor focus performance in the front camera.
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera fails to focus properly in portrait mode, resulting in blurred faces for most people in photos.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction in a key camera function, affecting photo quality for most users but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: AOD bright is too dim
rows.Problem: AOD is too dim
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always-On Display is too dim, affecting visibility.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility but does not prevent device usage or cause system failure.

rows.Title: Google Play System Update Stuck
rows.Problem: Google Play system update is stuck on Oct 2024, seriously Samsung as the phone was released in Feb 2025. We pay a premium for flagship phones, then y not the basic updates on time?
rows.Summarized Problem: The Google Play system update is stuck and not progressing despite the phone being released in February 2025.
rows.Severity Reason: The update is stuck, preventing essential system functionality and user access to app updates, making the device unusable for core features.
rows.R&D Comment: The Google Play system update was blocked by Samsung's policy and consultation with Google; the update has been resumed and users are advised to retry.

rows.Title: Photos get blurred after picture refinement in notification panel
rows.Problem: Photos become blurred only after picture refinement completes in the notification panel, despite clean lenses and reset camera settings. The blurring occurs during post-processing, indicating a flaw in image refinement.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos become blurred after picture refinement completes in the notification panel due to a flaw in post-processing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image clarity after refinement but does not cause device crash or complete failure of core functions, and users can still take clear photos under normal conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Blurring occurs in close-range shots due to shallow optical depth in wide-angle cameras; users should be guided to maintain distance when shooting.

rows.Title: Battery draining started after update of 6.1
rows.Problem: Battery is draining rapidly in idle mode, worse than expected, like it's drinking water. After update of 6.1, battery drain increased significantly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains rapidly in idle mode after the 6.1 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable due to rapid battery drain, requiring frequent charging and disrupting normal usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Long wakelock by com.finazzi.distquake app in background causes battery drain; users should clear app cache and check again.

rows.Title: Galaxy Buds 2 Pro not working properly
rows.Problem: Not getting audio from YouTube and Spotify etc. Sometimes getting audio but can't increase or decrease volume and it goes to highest volume level
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy Buds 2 Pro fails to deliver audio from apps like YouTube and Spotify, and volume control is non-functional.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot hear audio from apps and volume control is completely broken, making the device unusable for core audio functions.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is a side effect of patch 27408544, which was introduced as a workaround for dual app audio support; it now causes audio failure and volume control issues when switching between apps.

rows.Title: judder frame drop during video playback
rows.Problem: Frequent judder and frame drop during video playback in Netflix or YouTube, especially during HDR or high quality video, when motion smoothness is set to adaptive refresh. Judder is visible during camera pans behind lady's heads in video.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback experiences judder and frame drops during high-quality or HDR content, particularly when motion smoothness is set to adaptive refresh.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video smoothness during specific playback conditions but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is hard to reproduce due to Netflix's secure playback and lack of viewing logs; request for CP silent logs to investigate.

rows.Title: Camera Quality Degradation
rows.Problem: Portrait Mode Issue: In 1x and 3x Portrait mode, the edges of the subject appear blurry and unnatural.
rows.Summarized Problem: The edges of subjects appear blurry and unnatural in 1x and 3x Portrait mode on the Galaxy S21 FE camera.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects specific portrait mode functionality but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The portrait application succeeds in logs; sharpness issues not found. Requires earlier version images for analysis. Android 15 update expected for improvements.

rows.Title: Camera not working
rows.Problem: Camera not working intermittently
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera function intermittently fails to work.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails intermittently, preventing users from using a core device function, leading to device unusability.

rows.Title: Home Screen Folder Disappears After Naming
rows.Problem: After adding two apps, a folder is created. After naming the folder, it disappears and leaves a blank space in the app drawer. The apps are no longer visible in the folder. Apps are TELEGRAM and TESTBOOK.
rows.Summarized Problem: App folders disappear after being named, leaving a blank space in the app drawer and making apps inaccessible.
rows.Severity Reason: The folder functionality is partially broken, affecting user experience but not causing device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. Also, as no release is planned for OS 14 and the issue is not occurring in the latest OS 15 launcher apk, please help to update to latest OS.

rows.Title: Detect popup occurs in Device
rows.Problem: Phone shows popup intermittently with no available software updates
rows.Summarized Problem: A popup appears intermittently on the device when no action is taken, despite no available software updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The popup appears intermittently and interferes with device usability but does not cause a crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: We have reported this issue to Google through bugnizer id # https://partnerissuetracker.corp.google.com/issues/411331731 if anything comes from Google we will update here

rows.Title: Secsound Speaker keep Stopping
rows.Problem: When I apply settings for sound and vibration, the device shows 'Sec Soundpiker keeps Stopping' and sometimes returns to previous window. I cannot change my ringtone after trying 20 times. Clearing data and restarting does not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The ringtone settings feature displays an error message indicating the Secsound speaker keeps stopping, preventing users from changing their ringtone.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents ringtone changes but does not cause device crash or data loss, and users can work around it by clearing data and restarting.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a problematic ringtone file set by the Muzio Player app; users should delete the file and disable the app, then reconfigure ringtone via settings.

rows.Title: System not responding popup
rows.Problem: System UI not responding on Samsung galaxy s21 ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: The system UI is not responding, causing a lag or freeze on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI not responding makes the device unusable, leading to a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: 16k++ notification cancel in just 5 mins, which is causing high CPU usage of system server. Also, many binder calls made by WhatsApp with system server. This issue has already been reported to WhatsApp. Please wait for fix.

rows.Title: Ui home not responding
rows.Problem: Ui home not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The home screen UI is not responding and causes popups on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The home screen is partially non-responsive, affecting user interaction but not causing device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. Also, as no release is planned for OS 14 and the issue is not occurring in the latest OS 15 launcher apk, please help to update to latest OS.

rows.Title: Camera video recordings display blurring and loss of focus at 2x zoom
rows.Problem: Samsung video recordings display blurring and loss of focus, especially at 2x zoom. All videos show a general decrease in image sharpness. Facial clarity is clear at 1x zoom but degrades after reaching 2x magnification, with clarity loss occurring approximately one second after zooming to 6x.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recordings blur and lose focus when zoomed to 2x, with sharpness degradation occurring after one second of magnification.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video clarity during zoom but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is not fully disabling the feature.
rows.R&D Comment: From x2, the Remosaic crop zoom is applied. In high brightness, it has a lot of details, but in low brightness, it uses strong noise reduction due to the high amount of noise. It displays in normal quality.

rows.Title: Control panel looking weird
rows.Problem: The notification and control panel on top, where bluetooth, wifi, etc. settings are, gets into a weird shape and does not return to normal.
rows.Summarized Problem: The control panel on the top displays a distorted shape and does not return to normal after malfunctioning.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a visual malfunction in a key settings panel but does not prevent device operation or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: As discussed, V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model to be released soon. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly

rows.Title: Netflix widevine becoming downgraded to L3
rows.Problem: Widevine is downgraded to L3 level despite updates, even after over a year of attempts to fix it. Clearing data, reinstalling app, and updating Google Play services did not resolve it. The issue affects functionality and feels incomplete for a high-quality device.
rows.Summarized Problem: Netflix Widevine is downgraded to L3 security level, preventing proper playback and rendering.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents core media functionality (Netflix playback) from working properly, rendering a key feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Device lacks Widevine keys; error occurs in OEMCrypto validation. Countermeasure: Widevine key must be rewritten at service center.

rows.Title: Instagram
rows.Problem: Phone is getting completely hanged when opening Instagram and going to any accounts profile and then going to reels section and then clicking on reel. Nothing happens. Requires holding side button for long to reboot. This issue occurs repeatedly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram app hangs when navigating to reels section after viewing profile, causing device to freeze and requiring manual reboot.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes completely during normal app navigation, making it unusable until rebooted, which is a major functional disruption.

rows.Title: WhatsApp status is overlapping in Instagram story
rows.Problem: WhatsApp status is overlapping in Instagram story when both are opened on each other and WhatsApp has not showing status properly
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp status overlaps with Instagram story when both are opened simultaneously, and WhatsApp fails to display status correctly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of status display, affecting user experience but not causing device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: User should clear WhatsApp cache and test with strong network; if issue persists, share logs and videos.

rows.Title: Unable to Open shared gallery Image in WhatsApp
rows.Problem: Unable to Open shared gallery Image in WhatsApp App
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot open shared gallery images in WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in image sharing functionality, not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is reported as a third-party app problem (WhatsApp), and the cause and countermeasure both point to WhatsApp's handling of BIN files during image sharing.

rows.Title: Instagram app causes screen freeze and auto restart
rows.Problem: Screen freezes and buttons stop functioning while scrolling through Instagram, occurring twice a day. Device randomly freezes and restarts during app usage, especially while scrolling or watching Reels.
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram app causes screen freezes and random restarts during scrolling or Reels playback.
rows.Severity Reason: Device freezes and restarts during normal use, making the app unusable and potentially disrupting user experience significantly.

rows.Title: Overheating while using Instagram App
rows.Problem: Instagram app causes phone to overheat significantly within 2 to 4 minutes of use, reaching temperatures above 103 to 109 degrees Fahrenheit, leading to battery drain and making the device unbearable to hold. The issue is isolated to Instagram and does not occur with other apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram app causes significant device overheating within minutes of use, leading to high temperatures and battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheats to extreme levels (103–107°F) during app use, making it physically uncomfortable and potentially damaging, and affects usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Instagram app has high CPU load as detected in CCU; Counter Measure: Recommend updating Instagram and clearing its cache to reduce CPU load.

rows.Title: Video becomes blur when zooming during shooting
rows.Problem: Video becomes blurry when zooming in during video recording, especially when focusing on distant objects. This issue has persisted since the phone purchase and is not resolved by software updates.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video quality becomes blurry when zooming in during recording, particularly on distant subjects.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents proper 4K video capture and affects core camera functionality, making it unusable for users needing clear zoomed footage.
rows.R&D Comment: The blurriness is due to hardware and sensor limitations; newer models like S24 Ultra and S25 Ultra show improved performance.

rows.Title: N78 bands not working
rows.Problem: Samsung A145G N78 bands not working; device connects to 5G on N28 band (700 MHz) instead of N78 band (3500 MHz) when 5G is live in the area
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to connect to 5G on N78 band (3500 MHz) and instead connects to N28 band (70 Tz), despite 5G being live on N78 in the area.
rows.Severity Reason: The device intermittently connects to a lower-band 5G service instead of the intended N78 band, resulting in partial functionality but not complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Gallery not responding
rows.Problem: Gallery is not working during remastering process
rows.Summarized Problem: Gallery fails to respond during image remastering process
rows.Severity Reason: The gallery function does not work as expected during a specific operation, leading to a partial failure in user interaction.

rows.Title: Gallery photos and videos lost after updating to one UI 6.1

rows.Summarized Problem: All photos and videos have been lost after updating to one UI 6.1.
rows.Severity Reason: Data loss renders the device unusable for users who rely on stored media.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is from WhatsApp side; third-party app issue, cannot be resolved by Samsung.

rows.Title: Edge panel not shown in landscape mode
rows.Problem: Edge panel disappears in landscape mode. It is visible in portrait mode but not in landscape mode.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Edge Panel is not displayed in landscape mode, despite being visible in portrait mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a UI element in a specific orientation, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The EdgePanel does not support landscape UI on phone devices due to lack of screen space; this is a known UX concept from previous OS versions.

rows.Title: Facebook images corrupted in Samsung Gallery
rows.Problem: Facebook images downloaded to Samsung Gallery are corrupted, though they appear fine in Google Gallery, My Files, Messenger, and other apps

rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image display in one gallery app but not others, indicating partial malfunction rather than full device failure.

rows.Title: keyboard copy paste option not working
rows.Problem: select or copy-paste option on the keyboard completely blanks the background, making written text invisible

rows.R&D Comment: This issue is not reproducing at our end; users are advised to check in next OS update with preconditions and logs.

rows.Title: notifications sound getting muted
rows.Problem: notifications sound getting muted even after software update and restart, no volume adjustment logs available
rows.Summarized Problem: Notifications sound is muted despite user attempts to adjust volume settings, with no supporting logs showing volume changes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the sound settings where volume adjustment is not reflected in logs, but the core functionality is not fully broken.
rows.R&D Comment: The attached log lacks volume adjustment records during the issue occurrence; users are advised to restart and manually adjust notification volume, with logs to be collected upon recurrence.

rows.Title: WhatsApp opens automatically after unlocking device in morning
rows.Problem: Whatsapp opens automatically after unlocking phone in morning, only during morning unlock sessions
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp opens automatically after the user unlocks the device in the morning.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where an app opens unexpectedly, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Possible cause: background app refresh; countermeasure: provide CP silent logs

rows.Title: Phone getting hangs and the screen remains still after the update
rows.Problem: My phone hangs and the screen remains still after the update. Because the display is unresponsive, I am unable to access anything. The phone then restarts. After the upgrade, this has occurred more than five times. Please resolve the issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone hangs and the screen becomes unresponsive after an update, preventing access to the device and causing repeated restarts.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unresponsive, preventing user access and requiring restarts, which renders the device unusable.
