rows.Title: Camera Lens Switching not Smooth
rows.Problem: Camera lens switching issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera lens switching is not smooth during operation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the camera function, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Camera module is defective; service center replacement is required.

rows.Title: Camera quality not good in low light
rows.Problem: Camera performance is poor in low light, especially on 3x and 5x telephoto lenses, with high grain and poor picture and video quality. Front camera also suffers. Quality is worse than on 30k phones.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera performs poorly in low light conditions, with grainy images and inadequate video quality, especially on telephoto lenses and front camera.
rows.Severity Reason: Low light performance is significantly degraded, leading to unusable image quality that fails to meet user expectations for basic functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The telephoto camera has inferior sensor pixel size and f-number compared to wide camera in low light; recommend using wide camera or Night Mode for better results.

rows.Title: Screen gets stuck even if i press back button or lock button
rows.Problem: My screen gets stuck even if i press back button or lock button. This crashing is happening very frequently even though its been barely an year since i got this mobile.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen gets stuck when back or lock buttons are pressed, leading to frequent crashes.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen failure prevents normal interaction with the device, making it unusable during operation.
rows.R&D Comment: As discussed, V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model to be released soon. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Photos from Facebook cannot be viewed in Samsung Gallery
rows.Problem: Photos downloaded from Facebook cannot be viewed in Samsung Gallery. Colors are missing. Same pics can be viewed in WA gallery or Google Photos.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos downloaded from Facebook cannot be viewed in Samsung Gallery with missing colors.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents viewing of Facebook photos in the gallery but does not cause device crash or data loss, and functionality is partially available in other apps.

rows.Title: phone is making emergency calls automatically
rows.Problem: phone is making emergency calls automatically, sometimes even without me pressing the power button. Occasionally, it even happens with a single press. Blocked numbers are getting temporarily unblocked for 2 hours on their own.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone is making emergency calls automatically without user input and is also temporarily unblocking blocked numbers.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes unexpected emergency calls and unblocking of numbers, leading to potential misuse and device malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Insufficient log coverage; no call traces to analyze call initiation. Countermeasure: Provide CP silent logs for analysis.

rows.Title: Unable to send a default pdf manager/opener for pdf's received in the Parallel app version of WhatsApp
rows.Problem: Unable to send a default pdf manager/opener for pdf's received in the Parallel app version of WhatsApp. This is to Bring to your notice that the issue is not related to The Original version of WhatsApp. I'm able to set a default media file app for .pdf and .pptx on the original version and it's opens automatically
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set a default PDF opener for files received in the parallel (dual) version of WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents a key functionality (default PDF opener) from working in the parallel version, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The platform does not support setting default apps in dual messenger environments; users must manually select an app each time, which is the intended behavior of Google AOSP.

rows.Title: Unable to export notes files into pdf
rows.Problem: Unable to export notes files into pdf it takes very long buffering time and couldn't export at all
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot successfully export Samsung Notes files to PDF due to excessive buffering and failure to complete the export process.
rows.Severity Reason: The export function fails completely, with long buffering and no completion, preventing users from accessing their notes in a usable format.

rows.Title: Over heating during mild usage

rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats under normal usage conditions, which can lead to performance degradation or potential hardware damage.

rows.Title: Automatic network goes to Emergency call only or no Service
rows.Problem: Network issue: automatic network goes to emergency call only or no service. Unable to use internet or call services over 4G; only works on dark 5G. Problem persists after sim change, operator switch, reset, and location change. Occurs after March security update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device automatically drops to emergency call only or no service on 4G, only working on dark -5G, despite attempts to resolve via sim, operator, reset, and location changes.

rows.Problem: GPay final pin enter screen is overlapping with home buttons
rows.Summarized Problem: The GPay final pin entry screen overlaps with the home buttons on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user interaction but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: System ui not responding
rows.Problem: System ui not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The system UI is not responding, causing sluggish interaction and potential unresponsiveness.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI not responding renders the device interface unusable, leading to a degraded user experience and potential functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: As discussed, V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model to be released soon. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Dual Messenger option not showing
rows.Problem: Dual Messenger option is not showing in my phone S25ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: The Dual Messenger option is not visible in the device settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the interface but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Device has device owner present; Dual Messenger is not available as per normal behavior. Maintain current status.

rows.Title: Unable to change the Sound Of Alarm
rows.Problem: Sound of my alarm is not ringing. When I try to change alarm ringtone, it shows 'call ongoing' which prevents me from selecting a sound.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change their alarm ringtone due to a false 'call ongoing' message appearing when selecting a new sound.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full functionality of changing alarm sound but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: WhatsApp call fails to terminate properly, leaving audio mode in a hung state. Countermeasure: Restart WhatsApp or update to latest version.

rows.Title: HomeUp app features missing on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: HomeUp app features are not available in the lock screen, preventing users from changing task manager style.
rows.Summarized Problem: HomeUp app features are missing from the lock screen, preventing users from customizing their task manager style.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a feature, limiting functionality but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. Also, as no release is planned for OS 14 and the issue is not occurring in the latest OS 15 launcher APK, please update to latest OS.

rows.Title: Camera not working
rows.Problem: Front camera is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera is not functioning despite attempts to use it.
rows.Severity Reason: The front camera fails to work, rendering a key feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cannot loop front cameraID, which is a hardware issue

rows.Title: System process is not responding
rows.Problem: I was unable to capture screen. All working was stopped for few seconds. System process is not responding means process handler crashed due to some reasons, is it?
rows.Summarized Problem: The system process handler is unresponsive, causing screen capture to fail and system functions to stop temporarily.
rows.Severity Reason: The system process is unresponsive, leading to a complete halt in functionality for a period, making the device unusable during that time.

rows.Title: Phone gets heat up easily during video call
rows.Problem: Phone gets heat up easily during video call and switches network from 5G to 4G, occurring continuously from the start
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone overheats during video calls and switches network from 5G to 4-than, occurring consistently from the start
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheats during video calls, leading to network switching and potential performance degradation, making the device unusable under normal usage conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: As discussed, V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model to be released soon. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced, pls report PLM accordingly

rows.Title: Work profile apps in folders appear active after work profile is turned off
rows.Problem: Work profile apps in folders appear active after work profile is turned off
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps in work profile folders remain appear active even after the work profile is turned off.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the work profile interface, but does not render the device unusable or lead to data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Modified the condition to always enter the parent honey when dragging exit is not supported by AppGroup.

rows.Title: Camera take 6 to 8 seconds for opening
rows.Problem: It's still lagging. In every app camera take 6 to 8 seconds for opening
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera takes 6 to 8 seconds to open in every app, causing significant lag.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera lag severely impacts usability and performance across all apps, making it difficult to use the device effectively.
rows.R&D Comment: As discussed, V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model to be released soon. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Samsung Pass is unavailable
rows.Problem: Samsung Pass is unavailable passkey104 error
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Pass is unavailable due to a passkey104 error.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely unavailable, preventing users from using Samsung Pass, which is a core authentication function.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: PPP information was overwritten with 0 during KnoxMatrix EscrowVault registration. Counter Measure: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Keep Screen On while viewing feature not working
rows.Problem: Screen turns off when viewing content, despite face detection working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen turns off during content viewing when the 'Keep Screen On' feature is supposed to remain active.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working as intended, but the device remains usable and core functions operate normally.
rows.R&D Comment: This function uses face detection based on front camera input; mis-detection due to environmental factors like lighting or angle, and no visual data is stored during operation for analysis.

rows.Title: Portrait Video Autofocus
rows.Problem: Portrait Video Autofocus on Galaxy S24 Ultra Is Unusable
rows.Summarized Problem: Portrait video autofocus is not working properly on the Galaxy S24 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: The autofocus function is completely unusable, making portrait video capture ineffective.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed by applying proper dual camera operation log for portrait video operations

rows.Title: unable to play call recordings from the samsung phone app
rows.Problem: I am unable to play call recordings from the samsung phone app. It's saved perfectly and I can listen to it from the file manager app but not from the samsung phone and when I click on play, it says buffering.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot play call recordings within the Samsung Phone app, although recordings are saved and accessible via file manager.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a feature, where playback fails in one app but works in another, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: As discussed, V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model to be released soon. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Intelligence feature not working
rows.Problem: cant able to use any intelligence features related to photos for a many days it shows checking for update then nothing has happened
rows.Summarized Problem: Intelligence features in the Gallery app are not functioning and show a loading screen without progressing.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to respond after showing a loading screen, preventing users from using photo-related intelligence functions, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Calls are auto-recording even when not recording from specific number
rows.Problem: Calls are auto-recording even when set to not record calls from specific number or contact in Samsung dialer app
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung dialer app fails to respect user settings for not recording calls from specific numbers, resulting in automatic recording.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature setting is not working, leading to unintended call recordings, which compromises user control and privacy.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Images are appearing glitched only in Gallery
rows.Problem: Images downloaded from Facebook appear glitched only in the Gallery app, while they open fine in other apps. Clearing cache, data, and thumbnails, and restarting the phone have not resolved the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Images downloaded from Facebook display with glitches only in the Gallery app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image display in a specific app but does not cause device crash or data loss, and functionality in other apps remains intact.

rows.Title: Glitch Observer while Use contact app and Instagram
rows.Problem: Phone keeps refreshing every 15 seconds when using contact app and Instagram
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone repeatedly refreshes every 15 seconds when using contact app and Instagram.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent app behavior but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: If the Instagram app is crashing, users should update the app and restart their device.

rows.Title: WhatsApp flickers every 10 seconds
rows.Problem: WhatsApp flickers every 10 seconds; home screen customized display shows error for 5 to 10 minutes after restart; facial recognition is unresponsive even after diagnostics showing face recognition error.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp flickers every 10 seconds and facial recognition fails under poor lighting conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: Facial recognition failure and app flickering affect usability but do not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Face recognition fails under unclear images due to backlight; WhatsApp flickering may be linked to app-level rendering issues. Recommendations: clean camera surface, adjust device position, register face in well-lit areas, and add alternative appearances for glasses or facial hair.

rows.Title: YouTube PIP window getting stuck sometimes
rows.Problem: Application not responding properly
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube PIP window occasionally gets stuck and fails to respond properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The application fails to respond properly, causing intermittent malfunction of a core feature, but does not render the device unusable or lead to data loss.

rows.Title: Animation broken when going from Settings to Google Play System Update
rows.Problem: The animation while going from Settings to Google Play System Update in pop-up view is broken. A screen recording is attached for reference. Please try to fix this broken animation in the next update
rows.Summarized Problem: The animation when transitioning from Settings to Google Play System Update in pop-up view is broken.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual experience during navigation but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure.

rows.Title: Camera Auto close while zoom to 5X
rows.Problem: Camera app suddenly closes and doesn't respond when switching to 5x zoom
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera app crashes when zooming to 5x.
rows.Severity Reason: The app completely fails to respond during a core camera function, rendering the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Camera HAL did not detect the wide camera, likely a hardware issue. Countermeasure: Replace the module or motherboard.

rows.Title: camera battery drain and overheating
rows.Problem: when opening the phone camera, it drains the battery more quickly and overheats
rows.Summarized Problem: Opening the camera causes rapid battery drain and overheating.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats and drains battery quickly during camera use, which impacts core device functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Heating and battery drain during camera use are caused by high CPU consumption from a heat-intensive game; countermeasure confirms issue is user-triggered, not device-level.

rows.Title: Unable to setup Mobile plan on Watch
rows.Problem: Unable to select after screen shows airtel logo. No selection available for next process
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot select a mobile plan on the watch after the screen displays the airtel logo.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents completion of a key setup step but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The subscription page is a third-party web sheet not controlled by the GW app; this is a 3rd party defect, not a plugin issue.

rows.Title: Unable to install e sim on watch
rows.Problem: Unable to install e sim on watch
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot install eSIM on the Galaxy Watch.
rows.Severity Reason: The eSIM installation feature is completely unavailable, preventing users from setting up connectivity on the device.
rows.R&D Comment: The ODA activation flow fails due to CompanionAppEligibility response being 0 from the server; the Airtel server operator should investigate why eligibility is reduced to 0 for the related API.

rows.Title: No sound assistant in good lock app
rows.Problem: There is no sound assistant in good lock app
rows.Summarized Problem: The sound assistant feature is not working in the good lock app.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing full functionality of the lock screen app, but the app itself remains usable.

rows.Title: phone is working only in 2G mode
rows.Problem: After the latest upgrade on 29 March 2025, the phone lost 4G and 5G services and now works only in 2G mode. All settings appear correct. The phone previously worked on 5G for four to five months in India. The user confirms the phone supports 4G/5G bands of their operator. Another phone of the user works fine, indicating the issue is not with the device or network.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone no longer connects to 4G or 5G networks after a software upgrade and only operates in 2G mode, despite supporting those bands and working correctly on other devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unable to access modern network services (4G/5G), rendering it unusable for standard mobile communication, which is a core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: SIM card profile issue or SIM reading error; Countermeasure: User should try changing SIM card or reinserting it.

rows.Title: Heating issue
rows.Problem: Customer faces heating issue after software updates due to high CPU and network consumption from apps like WhatsApp and Amazon MP3, and usage in multiwindow mode on weak network.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats after software updates due to high CPU and network usage from specific apps and usage patterns.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating occurs under device specs due to app and usage factors, not a device malfunction or crash, but a performance-related issue under normal conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Heating is caused by high CPU and network consumption from apps like WhatsApp and Amazon MP3, and multiwindow usage on weak networks; countermeasure is the same as cause.

rows.Title: Sudden stopped fast charging
rows.Problem: Galaxy S24 Ultra suddenly stopped fast charging. No water damage, no fall. Same charger works on another S24 Ultra. Tried all basic troubleshooting: fast charging enabled, cables and adapters checked, port cleaned, Safe Mode tested, Wipe Cache done. Issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy S24 Ultra has suddenly stopped fast charging despite no physical damage or environmental factors and basic troubleshooting steps being completed.
rows.Severity Reason: The device exhibits partial malfunction in fast charging functionality, but does not completely cease operation or cause data loss or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by potential SBU-VBUS SHORT detection, possibly due to non-genuine accessories, cable or connector aging, or foreign substances. Recommendation: remove non-genuine accessories, clean or replace cable, and if issue persists, visit service center for connector inspection.

rows.Title: Microphone stopped working
rows.Problem: Microphone stopped working during recording and voice messages, but works during calls.
rows.Summarized Problem: The microphone stops working in non-call scenarios such as recording videos and sending voice messages, though it functions during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The microphone fails in essential functionality (recording and voice messages) outside of calls, rendering key features unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: When checking the log, MCST, SMBU, SAMS big data are checked. During the Call, the Mic was blocked by user (finger, protective tape or phone case). Even though the microphone is not blocked, if the problem continues to occur, it needs hw check. Please visit the service center for HW inspection.

rows.Title: Slow charging after February security update
rows.Problem: After the February security update, slow charging occurs most of the time when connecting to the charger, though sometimes fast charging starts instead. Using a genuine 25W Samsung adapter and cable with latest software.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits slow charging most of the time after the February security update, with intermittent fast charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent malfunction of charging performance, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a missing adsp_chg log due to permission restrictions in the user version; the recommended countermeasure is to collect UD binary logs with adsp_chg enabled during the charging scenario.

rows.Title: GPS location not working for Samsung Health workouts
rows.Problem: Watch unable to fix satellites and get GPS location for Samsung Health workouts, started after One UI 6 watch update
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy Watch is unable to acquire GPS satellite signals for Samsung Health workouts after the One UI 6 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full functionality of GPS-based workouts but does not cause device crash or data loss, and can be resolved with user guidance.
rows.R&D Comment: Please guide the customer to test in an open area with phone connected, Auto Pause Off, and wait 20 minutes; if GPS icon still blinks, visit service center.

rows.Title: Camera Image quality not good
rows.Problem: Front camera is 2mp, rear camera is slightly better. Image quality is poor despite all settings. Samsung should provide software update to improve image processing.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera image quality is poor, especially on the front camera, and does not improve with settings adjustments.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of camera performance but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Image quality of A16-5G is comparable to A15-5G; 1080P offers better clarity. Counter Measure: Need customer to provide video shooting app and log to verify source.

rows.Title: No network is showing
rows.Problem: No network is showing. Sim card is inserted, but showing ERROR WHILE SEARCHING FOR NETWORK.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows error while searching for network despite having a sim card inserted.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish network connection, preventing basic functionality like calls and data.
rows.R&D Comment: HW components (DevInst, BUS, MID, PID, USID, RF_Component) reported as not good; recommend part check and replacement at service center.

rows.Title: Data doesn't work Properly
rows.Problem: Data doesn't open the connection symbol. No data access or data symbol. Issue occurs after some periods. Tried safe mode and 4G/5G settings, phone reset already done.
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile data connection fails and does not show data symbol even after trying safe mode, resets, and switching between 4G and 5G.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent failure of data connection, but the device remains usable and does not crash or freeze.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: People and Pet category not created in Gallery
rows.Problem: Can't see the people and pets option in my gallery
rows.Summarized Problem: The people and pets category is missing in the gallery.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not available, preventing users from accessing a specific content option, but the overall device functionality remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: The absence of face/pet analysis information in logs makes it difficult to verify the issue; the lack of analysis data also hinders confirmation and resolution.

rows.Title: Digital wellbeing and Samsung tts consuming battery in background
rows.Problem: Digital wellbeing and Samsung TTS are running in the background and consuming 1% battery each per hour, despite not being used. Together, they consume 10% battery over 5 hours. User wants to stop them from running in the background.
rows.Summarized Problem: Digital wellbeing and Samsung TTS are running in the background and consuming battery despite no usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Background battery consumption leads to significant battery drain over time, impacting device usability and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Samsung TTS is loaded by applications using text-to-speech; it can be loaded by apps instead of running independently.

rows.Title: bluetooth device does not show up in media output
rows.Problem: connected bluetooth device does not show up in media output. must restart bluetooth device multiple times for it to reflect
rows.Summarized Problem: A connected Bluetooth device fails to appear in media output and requires repeated restarts to appear.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent failure of a key media functionality but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.

rows.Title: Error in contact searching using dial-pad
rows.Problem: Contact search fails after typing 't' in the name 'pk tri', though it works until 'pk'. The issue occurs when a space is present in the search term.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contact search fails when a space is present in the search term, such as 'pk tri'.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a known behavior in previous versions and is not a malfunction but a normal operation pattern.
rows.R&D Comment: The behavior is normal due to a space in the search term; this is consistent with previous versions.

rows.Title: Unable to change date and time after updates
rows.Problem: Unable to change date and time after software or binary updates; some options are grayed out or hidden after February update
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change the date and time after recent software and binary updates, with some settings options appearing grayed out or hidden.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial functionality is missing after updates, preventing users from adjusting date and time settings, but device remains usable.

rows.Title: YouTube not showing collab or remix option enabled for shorts
rows.Problem: Samsung Z Fold 6 has a serious issue of not showing collab or remix option enabled for shorts on YouTube. The remix option is disabled on all shorts, which needs to be addressed by developers ASAP.
rows.Summarized Problem: The remix and collaboration options are not visible on YouTube Shorts for Samsung Z Fold 6 users.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing across all shorts, preventing users from engaging with content creation tools, which is a core functionality in the YouTube Shorts ecosystem.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Creator restrictions or copyright issues may disable the Remix feature. Countermeasure: Same as cause; no actionable fix from Samsung side.

rows.Title: 5G networks will revert to 4G after the March 2025 update
rows.Problem: 5G networks will revert to 4
rows.Summarized Problem: The device reverts from 5G to 4G network after the March 2025 update, despite being registered on 5G.
rows.Severity Reason: The device loses 5G connectivity, which is a major functionality failure affecting core network performance and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: DUT is registered on 5G only but network sends mobility command to LTE; Counter Measure: No device-side issue observed, the issue is in the network command flow.

rows.Title: sensors have stopped reading the data completely
rows.Problem: many sensors have stopped reading the data completely. Before the update, it used to detect all activities like jogging, weighted exercises, cycling, walking, and sleep without flaws, but now it does not record any of these activities except for some.
rows.Summarized Problem: Sensors on Galaxy Watch 4 have stopped reading data completely, failing to record activity data such as jogging, exercise, cycling, walking, and sleep.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to record essential activity data, rendering core functionality of the wearable unusable for health tracking.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Dump log is missing sensor hub kernel logs and sleep activity logs; Counter Measure: Obtain system log dump immediately after waking up when the issue occurs.

rows.Title: Live notifications sports on Google does not work
rows.Problem: Live notifications for sports on Google do not work as depicted. After unfollowing teams and saving settings, teams are still displayed with 'follow' option when searching, disabling the live notification feature.
rows.Summarized Problem: Live notifications for sports on Google are not working correctly after user settings are saved.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature partially fails after user action, but does not cause device crash or complete unavailability.

rows.Title: Idle/No Action
rows.Problem: Dialing *#9900# shows connection problem. VoNR functionality not working and switched to VOLTE.
rows.Summarized Problem: VoNR functionality is not working and is being switched to VOLTE on Samsung A35 5G.
rows.Severity Reason: VoNR failure results in call quality degradation and inability to use modern voice services, making the device unusable for voice calls.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Quick Panel
rows.Problem: Cannot see whether mobile data, location, or work profile is on/off when locking and unlocking the device
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot see the status of mobile data, location, or work profile when the device is locked and unlocked.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects usability of key device settings but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Audio not hearable in device
rows.Problem: Audio disturbances and audio not hearable despite mic working; no improvement after attempted solutions
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience audio disturbances and inaudible audio output despite microphone functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: Audio is not fully functional but mic works, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be a hardware-side blockage or defect in the microphone path; users should visit a Samsung service center for repair.

rows.Title: Hang after restart
rows.Problem: Device hangs for 10 to 15 seconds after restart, despite being powerful. This issue occurs across all Samsung phones and affects usability.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device hangs for 10 to 15 seconds after restart, causing a noticeable delay in usability.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unusable immediately after restart, creating a significant user experience gap and indicating a critical system-level performance issue.
rows.R&D Comment: Please check whether problem is reproduced or not. If problem occurs, please upload log immediately.

rows.Title: System UI crashing
rows.Problem: System UI crashing, same issue happening in safe mode, not resolving with photos provided
rows.Summarized Problem: The System UI crashes, even in safe mode, indicating a system-level instability.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI crashing in safe mode suggests a fundamental system failure that prevents normal device operation.

rows.Title: Sound not working
rows.Problem: Call sound is muted even though incoming calls are shown on screen. Alarms start ringing after device optimization, but WhatsApp calls do not ring. Reset and restarts do not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Audio sound is muted during calls and WhatsApp calls, despite incoming call notifications being displayed.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to produce sound during calls and WhatsApp calls, making communication impossible and rendering the device unusable for basic functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model. As discussed, kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced, pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Speech to text or dictation Features not working
rows.Problem: Speech to text or dictation software is not working properly and accurately on your phone. Please improve and rectify ASAP. Even Android 8 was better. How long will it take?
rows.Summarized Problem: The speech to text or dictation feature is not working properly on the Samsung keyboard.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional, which prevents users from using basic text input functionality, making the device unusable for certain tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No logs available at time of issue. Countermeasure: Extract and attach logs immediately after reproducing the problem.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi and Hotspot functionalities have stopped working
rows.Problem: After the recent One UI update, Wi-Fi and Hotspot functions have stopped working. When enabled, nothing happens or the phone restarts automatically. Attempts to fix via cache clearing, network reset, and safe mode have failed.
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi and Hotspot functions are completely non-functional after the One UI update, causing the device to restart when attempting to use them.
rows.Severity Reason: The functions are completely non-functional and cause the device to restart, making the phone unusable for basic connectivity tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a failure in the WiFi driver initialization and HAL startup, as indicated in system logs. The same error occurs during both driver loading and firmware mode initialization, suggesting a deep system-level incompatibility post-update.

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor not working
rows.Problem: Fingerprint scanner is not working properly after following all troubleshooting steps including cleaning, removing screen protector, re-registering fingerprints, and factory reset.
rows.Summarized Problem: The fingerprint sensor is not functioning properly despite multiple troubleshooting attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial failure of a core biometric function, but the device remains usable with alternative authentication methods.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Poor image quality from fingerprint sensor due to protective film, dry skin, or improper finger placement. Countermeasure: Recommend removing thick protective film, using the center of the finger, applying lotion for dry skin, and checking hardware at customer service if issue persists.

rows.Title: Unable to switch off select automatically button in Network operator
rows.Problem: Issue screenshot attached for reference
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot disable the 'select automatically' option in the network operator settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not functional, but users can still access and navigate the setting, allowing partial control.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: OS version 12; no further release planned. Countermeasure: Same as cause.

rows.Title: Rear camera 1x not working
rows.Problem: Rear camera not working on 1x-2x, works fine at 0.6x and 3x+. The 1x lens is shared across apps like WhatsApp, GPay, DocScanner. Issue persists after reboot and across all apps. Screenshot provided.
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear camera 1x function is not working across all apps, despite working at other zoom levels.
rows.Severity Reason: The 1x lens is used by multiple core apps, and its failure affects overall device usability across key functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Several MIPi error logs indicate potential sensor fault or connection issue; recommend reboot and hardware inspection if problem persists.

rows.Title: significant battery draining issue
rows.Problem: Experienced significant battery drain in just 6 minutes with no apps open, no background activity, sleep mode enabled, auto-sync off, and NFC and location services disabled. This appears to be a serious optimization problem that needs to be addressed.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device loses significant battery charge in a short time even with no apps running and all background features disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drains rapidly under no load conditions, leading to device becoming unusable before reaching normal usage time.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both indicate abnormal current consumption at low voltage levels, suggesting a hardware or software power management flaw; recommend device inspection and firmware optimization.

rows.Title: Software Update failing
rows.Problem: Samsung Fit 3 software update is failing
rows.Summarized Problem: Software update fails on Samsung Fit 3 device during installation.
rows.Severity Reason: The update failure prevents the device from receiving necessary software updates, rendering it unable to function properly or receive new features.

rows.Title: Dark mode Not applying on Widget
rows.Problem: Dark mode is not applying to the widget; it remains white even after toggling on and off.
rows.Summarized Problem: The widget does not apply dark mode settings and remains white regardless of user toggling.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI appearance but does not prevent device operation or cause system crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: The widget fails to update properly due to a temporary system delay; users are advised to remove and re-add the widget.

rows.Title: Talkback not working properly
rows.Problem: TalkBack reads English properly but fails to read Malayalam text when opening detailed content, despite working during notifications. Issue is specific to A56 model and not present on M35.
rows.Summarized Problem: TalkBack fails to read Malayalam text in detailed views on the A56 device, despite working during notifications.
rows.Severity Reason: TalkBack partially fails to function for a key accessibility feature (Malayalam text reading) in specific contexts, but does not cause device crash or total unavailability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Issue lies in TTS engine's language support; countermeasure: Try switching TTS engine language to Malayalam and report to Google TTS team with slow speech sample.

rows.Title: Galaxy App does not work
rows.Problem: The galaxy app does not work. This improves the wifi experience
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy app is not functioning properly, affecting Wi-Fi experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is missing functionality, but does not cause device crash or total failure, only impacts specific feature performance.
rows.R&D Comment: Network issues may be causing server inconsistencies, leading to app non-functionality; need to verify server consistency and network configuration.

rows.Title: Bluetooth not connect
rows.Problem: Bluetooth device not connected with device
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth device fails to connect to the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a connection failure, but the device may still function otherwise, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Remote device terminated connection; likely due to remote device being uncharged or off. Countermeasure: Collect CP silent logs for further analysis.

rows.Title: Device freeze frequently
rows.Problem: No photo or video since phone froze
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently freezes, resulting in loss of photos and videos.
rows.Severity Reason: Device freezing causes complete loss of data and renders the device unusable.

rows.Title: Light sensor not working
rows.Problem: Light sensor stops working randomly
rows.Summarized Problem: The light sensor intermittently stops working, preventing accurate ambient light detection.
rows.Severity Reason: The sensor fails randomly, leading to inconsistent functionality but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Inconsistent log timestamps and insufficient data; Counter Measure: Provide CP silent logs for accurate analysis.

rows.Title: 5G Sub-Network Not Working
rows.Problem: Device only connects to 4G despite being in a 5G coverage area and using a 5G-enabled SIM card, after software update and setting checks.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to connect to 5G and only connects to 4G despite being in a 5G coverage area and using a 5G-enabled SIM card.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unable to connect to 5G, a primary network capability, rendering the user unable to access faster network speeds and potentially limiting functionality in 5G-enabled areas.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Always On Display Alignment Issue in Scheduled Mode
rows.Problem: When AOD is set to Scheduled mode, the clock and icons appear slightly misaligned or shifted, rather than staying centered on the screen.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always On Display feature shows misaligned clock and icons when in scheduled mode, instead of staying centered.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual alignment but does not prevent device operation or cause functional failure.

rows.Title: Good Lock Modules Home Up and QuickStar Not Available on Samsung A56
rows.Problem: Good Lock Modules Home Up and QuickStar Not Available on Samsung A56
rows.Summarized Problem: The Home Up and QuickStar modules are not available in the Good Lock app on the Samsung A56 device.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access essential customization modules, resulting in partial functionality loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please check it again, If you do not see the list, please remove app data to get the new list from a store server

rows.Title: Unable to disable and update Call forwarding feature
rows.Problem: Call forwarding is happening to a small number and cannot be disabled or updated. Network disconnects when checking forwarding. System log file is not generated.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot disable or update call forwarding, and the system fails to generate logs during the process.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional and causes loss of control over call routing, leading to unintended call redirection and network disconnection.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Font style setting crashed while enter setting
rows.Problem: Font style getting crashed while trying to enter it setting
rows.Summarized Problem: The font style setting crashes when attempting to enter it.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes when accessing the font style setting, making the feature completely unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: When re-entering the Font Style Settings after deleting the currently applied FlipFonts, an IndexOutOfBoundsException occurs because the current Font Index value is -1. This defect was fixed in U OS by changing the structure of the Current Font Index. Until the U OS update, users should switch to another FlipFonts first, then delete the package they intend to uninstall.

rows.Title: Flash option not available in video mode
rows.Problem: Flash option is not available in front camera video mode; appears to show flash on/off icon after clearing camera app data, then disappears over time; issue has persisted for a long time
rows.Summarized Problem: The flash option is missing in front camera video mode, despite showing a flash icon temporarily after app data clearing, and has persisted over time.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a design limitation (front camera lacks flash) rather than a malfunction or device failure, and does not impact core functionality or usability.

rows.Title: Device getting overheated
rows.Problem: Device overheating even when notifications and NFC are off, seems defective after recent update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats even when notifications and NFC are off, indicating a performance issue after a recent update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheating renders it potentially unsafe or unusable under normal conditions, posing a risk of damage or failure.
rows.R&D Comment: V OS Ver 15 is already planned for this model. Kindly help share behavior on V OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly

rows.Title: Bluetooth audio fails to switch from call mode to media mode after WhatsApp calls
rows.Problem: Bluetooth audio fails to switch from call mode to media mode after WhatsApp calls, preventing media playback until device restart. Issue persists across multiple TWS earbuds and is specific to WhatsApp.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth audio fails to switch from call mode to media mode after WhatsApp calls, preventing media playback until device restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from playing media after calls, making the device unusable for audio sessions during and after calls.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is from WhatsApp side; WhatsApp app is a 3rd party app developed by Meta, and there is no role of Samsung in its development. Root cause cannot be debugged due to lack of source code access.

rows.Title: Device getting Overheat while turn ON Hotspot
rows.Problem: Device overheats within 2 minutes after turning on hotspot, without heavy usage or overload, despite hotspot functioning normally
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats rapidly within two minutes after turning on hotspot, even with no heavy usage or high load.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheats rapidly, which could lead to hardware damage or safety risks, making it unusable under normal conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating during hotspot use is caused by heavy gaming activity and high CPU/data consumption in weak networks; countermeasure aligns with root cause.

rows.Title: Data Protection recovery code lost
rows.Problem: User lost Enhanced Data Protection recovery code and requests EDP state reset
rows.Summarized Problem: User has lost their Enhanced Data Protection recovery code and needs to reset the EDP state.
rows.Severity Reason: User cannot recover data protection settings without the recovery code, but the system allows a reset with consent, so it is a partial functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: For users who have lost their recovery codes, please obtain deletion consent from the customer and perform EDP state reset.

rows.Title: Alarm sound doesn't ring
rows.Problem: Alarm sound doesn't ring even when all settings are ok; it only beeps and the alarm sound is not heard. Clearing cache and force stopping the app did not resolve the issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The alarm sound fails to play properly and only emits a beep, despite correct settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The alarm function is partially malfunctioning but does not completely disable device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a third-party app (WhatsApp) setting the audio mode to ringtone, which interferes with alarm playback. The countermeasure is to identify and address the third-party app's audio mode configuration.

rows.Title: Device hotspot gets turn off after some time
rows.Problem: Devices connected to phone's hotspot get offline after minutes
rows.Summarized Problem: Connected devices lose connection and go offline after a short period when using the phone's hotspot.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent disconnection of client devices, which affects usability but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The hotspot appears to function correctly on the phone side; the issue may stem from client-side laptop configuration. Recommend client-side verification and detailed Wi-Fi verbose logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Call connectivity gone while network auto switch
rows.Problem: When phone displays 5g network and switches automatically to 4g, call and internet connectivity is lost. Same happens with 4g switch. Issue occurs only during network auto switch. Problem resolves after phone restart. Previously reported to multiple platforms.
rows.Summarized Problem: Call and internet connectivity are lost when the phone automatically switches between 5g and 4g networks, and the issue resolves after a phone restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent loss of call and internet connectivity during network switching, affecting functionality but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Video Call effect setting no on/off option
rows.Problem: No on/off option available for video call effects; user wants to turn off background effects in video call
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot turn off video call effects due to lack of on/off option in settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially functional but lacks a clear on/off toggle, preventing user control over video call background effects.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No on/off option in video call effect settings. Countermeasure: Guide users to reset or disable effects via Quick Panel in One UI 6.0+.

rows.Title: colors not stable and too much brown type color
rows.Problem: photos and video colors not stable and too much brown type color and still lips are too dark
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos and videos have unstable colors with excessive brown tint and dark lips.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects color accuracy in media but does not cause device failure or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: The color was slightly pinkish and the face saturation was slightly increased to improve it. You can check that it is improved during V OS upgrade.

rows.Title: mobile heating during listening songs or making a phone call
rows.Problem: mobile heating even listening songs or making a phone call itself
rows.Summarized Problem: The device heats up significantly when playing music or making phone calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats during normal usage, which could lead to performance degradation or safety risks.

rows.Title: Camera failed error message when trying to take photo from the rear camera
rows.Problem: I am seeing the camera failed error message when trying to take photo from the rear camera. The issue started coming yesterday night then in the morning the camera app was working.
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear camera displays a 'camera failed' error message when attempting to take a photo.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a failure in photo capture functionality but does not completely disable the camera app or lead to device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Adding Null checks so that if Linkedlist is null Settings addition is not performed.

rows.Title: Custom Notification not working in Modes & Routine
rows.Problem: Custom notification fails to send about 70% of the time when set as a routine. Tried deleting and recreating routine, clearing app cache, restarting app, allowing all permissions, and removing app restrictions. Issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: Custom notifications set in routines fail to send reliably, occurring approximately 70% of the time.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to work consistently but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Runtime logs are missing, making it infeasible to diagnose the issue. Please provide logs and video reproduction.

rows.Title: Text disappeared while scrolling in Member App
rows.Problem: In the notice section of the Members app, text disappears when scrolling. The issue persists after uninstalling and reinstalling the app.
rows.Summarized Problem: Text disappears when scrolling in the notice section of the Members app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality during user interaction but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The screen is not displaying due to a WebView error. Please update to the latest WebView version and check again. If the issue persists, try resetting the WebView data by following the provided steps.

rows.Title: Unable to access network drive in My file App
rows.Problem: Cannot access network drives set up from my lap and bell giahub due to incorrect login or SMBv1 connection method
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access network drives due to incorrect login credentials or use of unsupported SMBv1 protocol
rows.Severity Reason: Partial functionality failure; users can only access drives under specific conditions, not universally
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Incorrect login or use of SMBv1; Countermeasure: Use user name without domain or enable guest account

rows.Title: Server error popup occurs when trying to post on Samsung Members
rows.Problem: Samsung Members app throws "server error plz try again" when creating a long post, despite being updated to the latest version. This has been happening for 20 days.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Members app displays a server error popup when users attempt to create a long post.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial failure in post creation, but the app remains usable for other functions.
rows.R&D Comment: The error was caused by an invalid keyword in post content; the keyword has been removed from the disallowed list.

rows.Title: Portrait mode has very bad edge detection
rows.Problem: Portrait mode has very bad edge detection; it was brilliant before. I have attached before-and-after photos for comparison.
rows.Summarized Problem: Portrait mode now has poor edge detection, significantly worse than before the software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a core camera feature, affecting performance but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by errors in depthmap generation due to difficult feature matching between two cameras. The countermeasure is to improve depthmap accuracy during feature matching.

rows.Title: Super Fast Charging is no longer working
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 6.1 on my Galaxy S21 FE, Super Fast Charging is no longer working. Only normal charging is detected, even with the original Samsung 25W charger and cable (which works fine on other Samsung phones). Additionally, charging only starts when I flip the Type-C cable. Wipe cache and setting checks have been done. Please fix this or push a patch if this is a known issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Super Fast Charging is no longer functioning after an OS update, with only normal charging detected and charging behavior dependent on cable orientation.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to perform a major function (fast charging) after an update, resulting in reduced usability and user frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: The USB Killer recognition log remains. If the problem persists after cable replacement, a USB killer may occur due to charger malfunction. Users should visit a service center to check terminal connector abnormalities and be advised to use an authentic charger.

rows.Title: Samsung Wallet shortcut not responding
rows.Problem: Samsung Wallet shortcut to swipe and open is not responding properly. It sometimes doesn't open at all or opens after multiple attempts. The shortcut bar is missing from the homescreen despite being enabled in settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Wallet swipe shortcut is not responding and the shortcut bar is missing from the homescreen despite being enabled in settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The shortcut fails to open consistently and is missing from the homescreen, but the core functionality of the app remains accessible via other methods.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is insufficient. The issue does not occur in OS 15, suggesting it is resolved in newer OS versions; recommend updating to latest OS.

rows.Title: Samsung keyboard toolbar not working
rows.Problem: Samsung keyboard toolbar is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung keyboard toolbar is not functioning due to application-side toolbar disablement.
rows.Severity Reason: The toolbar is completely disabled at the application level, preventing user interaction with key features like emojis and image input.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Toolbar disabled via privateImeOpt; Countermeasure: Same root cause, no change proposed.

rows.Title: Camera image quality is not good
rows.Problem: The camera picture quality is not up to mark and the camera lags significantly during use, especially noticeable on a 50MP camera. This is a significant issue compared to previous devices like Samsung M34 which had better camera performance.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces low-quality images and lags significantly during use, failing to meet expected performance standards for a 50MP device.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera lags and fails to deliver expected image quality, which is a major functional failure for a high-spec device with a 50MP sensor.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Hardware unit problem. Countermeasure: Hardware unit problem.

rows.Title: Recent Key not working
rows.Problem: Recent Key not working, Back and Home Key works. Frequently occurs and resolves with a restart.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Recent Key is not functioning properly while Back and Home Keys work normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a navigation feature that occurs intermittently and resolves with a restart, but does not render the device unusable.

rows.Title: Battery draining faster than usual during normal video watching
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster than usual during normal video watching, and up to 10-15% in 10-20 minutes when using map services like Google Maps or Uber, even with screen off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device battery drains faster than usual during normal video watching and significantly more when using map services with screen off.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is severe during normal usage and escalates under specific conditions, leading to rapid depletion and potential device unavailability.
rows.R&D Comment: Need exact time and usage conditions to verify the battery drain pattern; current logs lack sufficient detail.

rows.Title: Phone getting heated up when using
rows.Problem: Phone is getting heated up when using. Extreme heat. When it goes below 20%, extreme heat produced. It doesn't charge at that time even if charger plugged and battery drains to 0% and gets off.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone generates extreme heat during use, especially when battery drops below 20%, and fails to charge while overheating, leading to battery drain and shutdown.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to extreme heat and failure to charge, posing safety and functionality risks.

rows.Title: Now bar not working on lock screen
rows.Problem: Now bar is not available or displayed on lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar is not displayed on the lock screen after a recent update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing on a key screen, preventing users from seeing real-time information, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Super slow motion not working
rows.Problem: Super slow motion is not working after March security patch update
rows.Summarized Problem: Super slow motion feature is not working after the March security patch update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing after an update, but the device remains otherwise functional.
rows.R&D Comment: There's no information of Video player in the attached log and I couldn't analyze issue at all. Please share new dumpstate log file which is got right after the problem happens.

rows.Title: widget is not syncing with the current Clock app settings
rows.Problem: Lock screen clock stuck on London despite removing it from the Clock app; London still appears even after adding only Tokyo; tried clearing app data, resetting widgets, changing clock style, and using Good Lock/LockStar — no solution found
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen clock widget continues to display London even after it has been removed from the Clock app settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where a widget displays outdated settings, but the device remains usable and no core functions are affected.

rows.Title: Call background wallpaper not setting up and showing up
rows.Problem: Call background wallpaper not setting up and showing up after One UI 7 update. Featured background wallpapers are stuck at preview and not showing on calls. Please fix the issue and call background bug is very ugly and the color is very annoying.
rows.Summarized Problem: Call background wallpaper fails to set and display after One UI 7 update, remaining stuck in preview mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The call background fails to show, resulting in a visible and annoying solid color that impacts user experience during calls, making the function unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Show Contact photo background in case of Contact Number not saved photo image. Counter Measure: Fix to show default background in this case. This modification will be included in next MR version. If you want to not see the solid color, please do in below 3 ways: 1. Save the picture you want to display in the contact. 2. Configure the profile card image in the contact. 3. Set to Custom image in the background of the call.

rows.Title: Camera auto focus not working
rows.Problem: S24 ultra camera doesn't auto focus on a person. Autoframing also doesn't auto focus. When it does focus, it loses focus quickly. It should auto focus on a person and maintain it.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to auto focus on a person and loses focus quickly during use.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to maintain focus on a person, which is a core functionality required for video recording, making it unusable in real-world scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: The lens is not moving; possible hardware issue or software error. Requires log and video for accurate diagnosis.

rows.Title: Drawing assist feature not working
rows.Problem: After the update to oneUI 7, the "drawing assist" stopped working and is not generating images
rows.Summarized Problem: The drawing assist feature is not generating images after the oneUI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working after an update, but does not cause device crash or data loss, only partial functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The feature is blocked by safety filters due to the presence of the keyword 'flag'; this is an intended result from safety filters to prevent inappropriate image generation.

rows.Title: Sluggish lock screen
rows.Problem: There is a slight delay when locking the phone's screen after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone experiences a slight delay when locking the screen after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a noticeable but not complete failure of screen locking functionality, resulting in a delay that affects user experience but does not prevent device usage.
rows.R&D Comment: We have checked the issue in the latest binary, but the issue didn't reproduce at our end. The exact root cause is not clear from the provided logs. If the issue persists, please raise a new issue with logs and video.

rows.Title: Delayed or failed incoming call
rows.Problem: Incoming calls are delayed or fail to connect on Samsung Galaxy S23 when using an Airtel SIM, specifically due to lack of VoLTE support in the Mobile Networks settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: Incoming calls are delayed or fail to connect on Samsung Galaxy S23 when using an Airtel SIM due to lack of VoLTE support.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality (call connection failure) under specific conditions, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: VoLTE menu is not displayed in Mobile Networks menu for Airtel SIM (INDIA_AIRTEL 40498) due to unsupported country/sim configuration; the system removes VoLTE UI by exception, leading to call disconnection.

rows.Title: Samsung Pass error PASSKEY.401
rows.Problem: Samsung Pass throws error PASSKEY.401 after device formatting and reset
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Pass displays error PASSKEY.40
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents device authentication and renders Samsung Pass unusable after reset, blocking access to device features.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: PPP information overwritten with zero during KnoxMatrix EscrowVault registration. Counter Measure: Provide CP silent logs for analysis.

rows.Title: Task changer view not set properly
rows.Problem: Task changer view shows recent apps in vertical list briefly before switching to stack
rows.Summarized Problem: The task changer view displays recent apps in a vertical list briefly before transitioning to a stack, indicating improper view configuration.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the task changer view, causing inconsistent behavior but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The type of view entering the recents has not been updated normally; exception processing will be applied in OneUI8. Users can recover by rebooting or rotating in Recents or changing the navigation bar to button from gesture.

rows.Title: Keyboard disconnects intermittently
rows.Problem: samsung tab s9 ultra original keyboard disconnects intermittently, leading to repeated keystrokes and other disruptions. the problem stops if touchpad is turned off. i have tried the solutions posted online and on members community and didnt solve the issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The physical keyboard on the Samsung Tab S9 Ultra disconnects intermittently, causing repeated keystrokes and disruptions in typing.
rows.Severity Reason: The keyboard disconnects intermittently, disrupting typing functionality but does not cause device crash or complete failure.

rows.Title: Font size on homescreen and app screen is very small in default option
rows.Problem: Font is very small on homescreen and app screen in default font size option
rows.Summarized Problem: The font size on the homescreen and app screen appears very small when using the default font size setting.
rows.Severity Reason: This is a cosmetic UI issue that does not affect device usability or core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: No Network
rows.Problem: The phone's network is not coming after the last update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to register with the network after an update, showing no network connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot establish network connection, making basic functions like calls and data unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: No SIM card was detected; possible SIM or device defect. Users should contact mobile operator or service center to verify SIM and device status.

rows.Title: Application launch and closure times going slow
rows.Problem: Samsung S24 Plus application launch and closure times are exhibiting performance issues. Battery drain is excessive
rows.Summarized Problem: Application launch and closure times are slow, leading to excessive battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: The device exhibits sluggish performance and excessive battery drain, which impacts usability and overall device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The app is launching very briefly in repeated cycles, leading to excessive battery drain. This is due to normal battery discharge based on user usage.

rows.Title: PRO VIDEO & PRO PHOTO mode is not working properly
rows.Problem: When I open the PRO VIDEO & PRO PHOTO mode the camera is showing the upside down screen in both the modes. In normal photo and video camera is working totally fine.
rows.Summarized Problem: The PRO VIDEO & PRO PHOTO mode displays an upside-down screen, causing incorrect image orientation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects only specific camera modes and does not prevent overall device usability or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The problem occurred because the DOF adapter calibration setting was turned on. This setting is for users who record using a DOF adapter attached to their phone, so please turn it off in the Camera Assistant app when you do not use the DOF adapter.

rows.Title: Folder background color cannot be changed
rows.Problem: The folder background color cannot be changed in UI 7. There is no option to change folder color anywhere in S24.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change the folder background color in the UI.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a key UI element, preventing customization but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Messages app briefly flashes before loading
rows.Problem: The Messages app briefly flashes or blinks on the screen before loading properly after updating to One UI 7 with Android 15.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Messages app briefly flashes or blinks before fully loading.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a visual glitch during app launch, affecting user experience but not causing device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Phone rings notification tone without notification
rows.Problem: Phone rings notification tone and vibration without receiving any notification, even when notification sound is disabled for most apps
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone emits notification tone and vibration without any actual notification being received, even when notification sounds are disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the notification system where tone and vibration occur without a valid trigger, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: In the attached logs, only one scenario of notification playback is captured, with no vibration observed during playback; vibrations are primarily touch-based during YouTube use. Media playback from YouTube is the only captured event. Logs appear normal; user is requested to capture logs immediately after reproduction.

rows.Title: Software Update Stuck at 50% Downloading
rows.Problem: Stuck at 50% downloading, tries multiple times but same error
rows.Summarized Problem: The software update gets stuck at 50% downloading and fails repeatedly despite multiple attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The update process fails to complete after reaching 50%, causing repeated attempts but no resolution, indicating a partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be due to a network problem; countermeasure is not actionable as the user successfully updated previously.

rows.Title: Software Update stuck on 18%
rows.Problem: Software update stuck at 18% after restart and power cycle attempts
rows.Summarized Problem: A software update is stuck at 18% and does not progress despite restart and power cycle attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The update process is stalled but does not cause complete device failure or data loss, and the user can still use the device normally.
rows.R&D Comment: It seems there is some network issue.

rows.Title: Additional option getting out of screen
rows.Problem: When a user long presses a message in the Messages app, an additional option appears alongside the emoji section and hides, going out of the screen. The option is scrollable and visible when dragged to the left.
rows.Summarized Problem: An additional option in the message reaction menu goes out of screen when long-pressed, causing UI overflow.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user interaction but does not cause device crash or data loss; it is a partial UI malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is expected behavior when scrolling; provide CP silent logs for further analysis.

rows.Title: Cannot perform more than 1 file operation at once
rows.Problem: Why it is happening even when the background apps were closed or there was no file operation was going on other than that?
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot perform multiple file operations simultaneously due to system limitations.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot support concurrent file operations, making it impossible to perform basic file tasks like deleting or moving files.
rows.R&D Comment: A146 is a lite model, so MyFile doesn't support multi-operation at once; logs show multiple operations executing simultaneously, preventing folder deletion.

rows.Title: Sound of any video goes silent abruptly
rows.Problem: Audio of any video being played abruptly becomes silent despite maximum volume after last system update
rows.Summarized Problem: Video audio playback suddenly becomes silent despite maximum volume settings after a system update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects audio functionality during video playback but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is triggered by a third-party app modifying volume settings.
rows.R&D Comment: The root cause is a third-party app (X.com.twitter.android) changing device volume. No source code available; requires third-party app fix.

rows.Title: Bluetooth not connecting
rows.Problem: Bluetooth does not connect easily to available devices; requires re-pairing and restarts to resolve; audio/media disturbances occur when paired.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth fails to connect reliably and causes audio disturbances when paired, requiring re-pairing and restarts.
rows.Severity Reason: Bluetooth connection failure leads to device unusability and audio disturbances, disrupting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Bluetooth connection and disconnection logs show unstable pairing; Counter Measure: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Fingerprint not working
rows.Problem: fingerprint doesn't work properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The fingerprint sensor is not working properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The fingerprint function is completely failing, making a key authentication method unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Fingerprint sensor didn't work. Please contact CS center, and check fingerprint sensor.

rows.Title: Not getting complete signal strength
rows.Problem: After February update, getting poor signal strength for Wi-Fi and mobile networks. Wi-Fi only works when within 1 meter of modem. Mobile networks show only 5G or good 4G outside buildings. Issue has persisted for two months.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience inconsistent and weak mobile and Wi-Fi signal strength after the February update, with signal quality dependent on proximity to the modem or outdoor location.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects signal reliability but does not cause device crash or complete failure; it is intermittent and impacts usability in specific environments.
rows.R&D Comment: We understood the situation, but from the attached logs we don't find much information about the root cause of the issue. We can only see many networks getting filtered out due to low signal strength and may be causing the issue. Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Update your phone notification shows when software is up to date
rows.Problem: Phone shows "Update your phone" notification despite being up to date
rows.Summarized Problem: The device displays an "Update your phone" notification even when the software is already up to date.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification is misleading and causes user confusion, but does not prevent device operation or cause functional failure.

rows.Title: Battery charging speed slowed
rows.Problem: Battery charging speed slowed after oneui 6 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery charging speed has slowed down after the OneUI 6 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of charging performance, not complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: While charging in screenoff state, full current is being passed. Device temperature rises after reboot, and charging limits are applied during boot to prevent overheating when applications are used.

rows.Title: Dual Messenger showing system-level and background apps
rows.Problem: Dual Messenger is showing system-level and background apps like Chrome, Android System WebView, Meta App Installer, Settings, and Android Switch in the list, even though these apps are not meant to be cloned. This appears to be a glitch in the soft.
rows.Summarized Problem: Dual Messenger is incorrectly displaying system-level and background apps that are not intended to be cloned.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the Dual Messenger feature, showing unintended apps, but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The default packages installed in Dual Messenger are intended for proper functionality of a separate user profile; this behavior is by design, not a bug.

rows.Title: Phone is on silent but still vibrates on notifications
rows.Problem: Vibration setting for notifications is set to silent but the phone still vibrates when notifications come
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone vibrates despite being set to silent in vibration settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The vibration setting is incorrectly applied, causing unexpected physical feedback despite silent mode being enabled.

rows.Title: Unstable 5G
rows.Problem: 5G support is available in my area and everything appears normal, but the connection is unstable.
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G connectivity is unstable despite being available in the area and appearing functional.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent instability in 5G connection, which affects usability but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.
