rows.Summarized Problem: Color banding appears in captured images, particularly in dark tones, and persists despite software updates and factory reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality in specific conditions but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: We need a defective device for further analysis, if sent to Korea, we can check the display module.

rows.Title: Doesn't follow up completely and misinterprets
rows.Problem: Gemini voice assistant never properly catches my voice and always misinterprets it, sometimes leaving hearing in just halfway. This happens every time, regardless of attempts.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Gemini voice assistant fails to properly recognize user voice and often misinterprets commands or cuts off mid-sentence.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent interaction but does not completely disable functionality or lead to device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Voice model misidentification; Countermeasure: Retrain voice model in Gemini app settings.

rows.Title: device lags while accessing control and notification panel
rows.Problem: after one ui 7 update the phone ui became so laggy showing shutters when accessing control and notification panel and overall there are minor lags and frame drops throughout usage there is som much space for optimization
rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits lag and frame drops when accessing control and notification panels after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction during UI navigation, causing noticeable lag but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.

rows.Title: Black line appears on home screen
rows.Problem: Black marks appear on the home screen after locking the screen, following a software update
rows.Summarized Problem: Black lines appear on the home screen after locking and unlocking the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual display but does not cause device malfunction or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Please visit the nearest service center to check the phenomenon. If possible, please record the screen when the phenomenon occurs.

rows.Title: Dark mode doesn't turn off at scheduled time
rows.Problem: Dark mode does not switch off at its scheduled time and must be manually turned off. Sleep mode also requires manual switching off when it should turn off automatically.
rows.Summarized Problem: Dark mode fails to turn off at its scheduled time and requires manual intervention, and sleep mode also does not switch off automatically.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a scheduled feature, requiring manual action but does not cause device unavailability or data loss.

rows.Title: Device still rings on getting calls despite being on silent mode
rows.Problem: Phone is on silent mode but still plays a ringtone when receiving calls or notifications
rows.Summarized Problem: Device plays a ringtone when on silent mode, indicating a failure in silent mode enforcement.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is functioning as if it's not in silent mode, causing unintended sound output when calls are received, making it unusable in quiet environments.
rows.R&D Comment: The ringtone volume is set to 15 every time the user receives a call. Please check whether there is a policy for setting the ringtone volume. setting->Modes and Routines->Routines

rows.Title: sluggish in opening the app from notification panel
rows.Problem: the notification bar was not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification bar fails to function properly when opening the app from the notification panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects usability of the notification panel but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Lock screen widgets appear on notification panel
rows.Problem: Lockscreen widgets appear whenever I open the notification drawer
rows.Summarized Problem: Lockscreen widgets appear when the notification drawer is opened
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction of the lock screen interface but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was not reproducible in the latest binary; users are advised to verify in the latest device build

rows.Title: Weather app showing wrong location
rows.Problem: Samsung Weather app shows incorrect location data, displaying Balekuppam instead of the correct and recognized area name Ponnai
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Weather app incorrectly displays location data, showing Balekuppam instead of the correct location Ponnai.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects accuracy of location display but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and is limited to UI presentation.

rows.Title: Bluetooth option disappear in Notification Panel
rows.Problem: When opening Bluetooth panel from notification window, Bluetooth option disappears after selection, showing only an overlay. This is irritating.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth option disappears after selection in the notification panel, showing only an overlay.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in the interface, disrupting user interaction but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Setting panel opens with notification panel
rows.Problem: When trying to open the setting panel, the notification panel opens instead.
rows.Summarized Problem: The setting panel opens with the notification panel appearing instead.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in the user interface, preventing intended access to settings.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery logs show increased current consumption during screen on with moderate brightness and speaker volume at 8, especially during video viewing, which may cause higher power usage than normal usage.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences increased battery consumption during screen-on use, especially when video is viewed with medium brightness and speaker volume at 8.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction under specific usage conditions, not causing device unusability or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: If the phenomenon persists, check for battery aging or component issues at a service center.

rows.Title: Call type space is blank
rows.Problem: The call type field is blank when reporting a call, despite previously showing options like fraud, spam, robo.
rows.Summarized Problem: The call type field is blank when users report a call, preventing them from selecting call type such as fraud or spam.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work fully, as users cannot select call type, but the core call reporting function remains partially available.

rows.Title: Brightness not working properly
rows.Problem: Display brightness drops in sunlight, then becomes good, then drops again, making it difficult to see content.
rows.Summarized Problem: The display brightness fluctuates in sunlight, making it difficult to see content consistently.
rows.Severity Reason: The brightness setting fails to maintain a stable level in sunlight, leading to intermittent visibility issues that impair device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The brightness limit is not properly defined in high ambient light; users are advised to update to the latest version to apply a defense code and fix the issue.

rows.Title: DIY Home feature not available in Home UpApp
rows.Problem: DIY Home feature not visible in Home UpApp after updating to One UI 7 on S23.
rows.Summarized Problem: The DIY Home feature is missing from the Home UpApp after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not available after an update, but the user can still access it via app update, indicating partial functionality rather than complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The DIY feature was initially released as a beta; users need to update the HomeUp app to access it.

rows.Title: When searching for a name in contact list, it automatically goes on top of the list
rows.Problem: After updating UI7 in S23 Ultra, selecting a contact from the contact list and searching their name or number causes it to automatically move to the top of the list. With many contacts starting with the same alphabet, the contact becomes invisible after touching the list.
rows.Summarized Problem: When searching for a contact, the result automatically moves to the top of the list, making it invisible when there are many contacts with the same starting letter.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction in contact retrieval and visibility, affecting usability but not preventing device operation.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs due to list redraw during order changes from SamsungSearch's frequently searched contacts. The solution is to redraw only when actual contact data changes or during explicit refresh, not on real-time updates.

rows.Title: battery drain
rows.Problem: battery drain and heating reported
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain, primarily during YouTube streaming with high speaker volume.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is severe and occurs under specific usage conditions, leading to rapid depletion and potential device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drained mainly by YouTube streaming with high speaker volume; no abnormal log behavior, but high usage duration observed.

rows.Title: Display UI Home Screen Widgets not displayed properly in Landscape mode
rows.Problem: Widgets are not displayed properly in landscape mode after UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: Widgets on the home screen are not displayed properly in landscape mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects widget display in a specific orientation but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to connect with Mobile NW
rows.Problem: Still the error found
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to connect to mobile networks despite the error persisting.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a persistent error in network connection, but does not completely prevent device usage or cause device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: SMS Verification Messages Failing Due to Auto-Appended Characters
rows.Problem: SMS verification messages automatically append two equal signs (==) at the end of the text, causing the message to fail during automated verification processes for banking apps, while regular SMS messages are unaffected.
rows.Summarized Problem: SMS verification messages automatically append two equal signs, causing verification to fail for banking apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents successful verification of critical banking transactions, leading to potential user lockout or failed authentication.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not clear. Video and logs are missing; cannot analyse the issue. Please attach new logs and video in sync.

rows.Title: Unable to login to Samsung shop
rows.Problem: There are two ways to login to Samsung shop: using mobile number or Samsung account. Each method is considered as a separate account.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot login to Samsung shop using either mobile number or Samsung account without being treated as separate accounts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in account recognition, leading to inconsistent login behavior but does not prevent full device usage.

rows.Title: Static noise from device
rows.Problem: Hearing static noise like electrostatic after OneUI 7 update on S24U
rows.Summarized Problem: Users hear static noise similar to electrostatic after updating to OneUI 7 on S24U.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs intermittently and affects audio perception but does not cause device malfunction or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Check logs; no abnormalities found. Requires user to reproduce with screen recording and playback to confirm noise.

rows.Title: Battery drain observed in the device
rows.Problem: Massive and quick battery drain after Ome UI 7 update on My S23 Ultra, screen on time is very low, settings do not support battery saving, 5G cannot be turned off in battery saving mode, battery drains even in light performance mode. One UI 7 was supposed to increase battery performance but instead causes significant drain.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences massive and rapid battery drain after the Ome UI 7 update, with screen on time drastically reduced and no battery saving options available.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to extremely short screen on time and lack of battery-saving features, making it impractical for daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: Background apps like Instagram and WhatsApp are running for extended periods; clearing their cache resolves the issue temporarily.

rows.Title: AOD wallpaper not being displayed
rows.Problem: AOD wallpaper is not showing up after updating to One UI 7 and the latest AOD version on Samsung Galaxy S24FE
rows.Summarized Problem: The AOD wallpaper is not displaying on the Samsung Galaxy S24FE after updating to One UI 7 and the latest AOD version.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the AOD wallpaper feature, which affects user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Mouse cursor icon appears on center of display
rows.Problem: A mouse cursor type icon appears on center of display for 1 to 2 seconds. Screenshot does not capture the icon
rows.Summarized Problem: A mouse cursor icon briefly appears in the center of the display and is not captured in screenshots.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a cosmetic visual anomaly that does not affect device usability or functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Please share more details. Under which user scenario does it appear? Is it temporary or permanent? Please share a symptom image or video with timestamp.

rows.Title: Dark mode doesn't turn off at scheduled time
rows.Problem: Dark mode doesn't turn off at its scheduled time and must be manually switched off each day
rows.Summarized Problem: Dark mode fails to turn off at its scheduled time and requires manual intervention each day.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to function as scheduled, leading to daily manual work and user inconvenience, making it unusable without user action.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue didn't reproduce in the latest binary; root cause is unclear. If it persists, logs and video are required.

rows.Title: Unable to log in to the Game Plugins
rows.Problem: Unable to log in to the Game Plugins app after the UI 7.0 update. It does not open or appear on the device.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot log in to the Game Plugins app after the UI 7.0 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to open or appear after an OS update, but core device functionality remains intact.
rows.R&D Comment: Game plug-ins are no longer supported in Android V-os; functionality is now integrated into GameBoosterPlus and Goodlock.

rows.Title: Bixby removed from Digital Assistant App choices
rows.Problem: Bixby is no longer available as an option when selecting the default digital assistant app; only Google and Chat Gpt are visible after update to 1ui7.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby is no longer available as a selectable option in the digital assistant app settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from a core selection menu, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Bixby is intentionally placed at the same level as Digital Assistant in settings and not under it; this is part of the design concept, and no change is required.

rows.Title: Blur engine not working on widgets
rows.Problem: Blur engine not working correctly on widgets, widgets become transparent, blur applies only when moved to the left, all other widgets are transparent without blur
rows.Summarized Problem: Widgets appear transparent and lack proper blur effect due to incorrect bitmap processing during screenshot conversion.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes widgets to appear transparent and visually inconsistent, severely impacting user experience and interface clarity.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: There is a case that does not match the window size when converting bitmap after being transmitted to semGetScreenshotFileDescriptor. Countermeasure: Modify bitmap conversion to match windowBounds width/height and log intermediate results at each processing stage.

rows.Title: Media sound has become very low
rows.Problem: Media sound output very low after one ui 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The media sound output has become significantly lower after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects sound volume but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is partially recoverable through user inspection of hardware.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No abnormal logs found; hardware defects possible. Countermeasure: Guide customer to service center to check for physical blockages or speaker damage.

rows.Title: Battery Drain
rows.Problem: Battery Drain Fastly after updating in 7.0
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences rapid battery drain after updating to version 7.0.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of battery performance, specifically after an update, but does not result in complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Dear user, it seems there is higher data activity which is leading to higher current consumption and faster battery drain. plz observe ur data usage and see which apps are draining battery. if still issue is observed plz observe battery drain in night time.. while u leave device unused. and observe how much battery drain. if still there is issue plz report again. Also report issue before ur device gets switched off and u feel battery draining faster.

rows.Title: Voice focus feature accepting voice from far distance
rows.Problem: Voice focus feature accepts voice from far distance, up to 1 meter, even when in voice focus mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The voice focus feature incorrectly accepts voice input from up to 1 meter distance when in voice focus mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not function as intended under normal user scenarios, leading to degraded audio experience but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Slow touch response
rows.Problem: Touch response is slow in settings and lock screen; wallpaper appears suddenly without animation; animation feels unpolished; device shows "One UI stopped working" twice; battery performance seems poor
rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits slow touch response, unpolished animations, and intermittent system instability with poor battery performance.
rows.Severity Reason: Touch response lag and animation issues affect usability, but the device remains functional and does not crash or lose data.

rows.Title: Unsupported attachment error while sharing in gallery and telegram
rows.Problem: Gallery to telegram or other apps sharing videos or photos shows unsupported attachment error after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Users encounter an unsupported attachment error when sharing photos or videos from the gallery to apps like Telegram.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full functionality of content sharing but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is caused by third-party app limitations and requires user-provided sample files for reproduction; no resolution is possible within Samsung's control.

rows.Title: Google Play Store isn't responding
rows.Problem: Google Play Store isn't responding from last 15 minutes
rows.Summarized Problem: The Google Play Store is unresponsive and has not responded for the past 15 minutes.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is completely unresponsive, preventing users from accessing the app store, which is a core functionality for device usage.
rows.R&D Comment: The cause is native crashes with segmentation faults in the Google Play Store app. Countermeasure: Clear cache and disable auto-update in settings.

rows.Title: Unknown error when choosing routine profile
rows.Problem: An unknown error occurs when choosing any routine profile; all tasks are executed, error appears only once on first selection, reappears after device restart, does not appear on subsequent changes.
rows.Summarized Problem: An unknown error occurs when selecting a routine profile, despite all tasks being executed.
rows.Severity Reason: The error appears intermittently and does not prevent device operation, but affects routine profile selection functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: App launch issue
rows.Problem: Opening one app causes a different app to open unexpectedly
rows.Summarized Problem: When launching one app, the device unexpectedly opens a different app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes unexpected app behavior but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.Resolve Type: Issue Fixed(Fixed automatically by Main branch)
rows.R&D Comment: Hello, according to our analysis, Issue is not reproducing in the latest ONEUI Home. please help to check and get the same concluded Thanks

rows.Title: Now Bar visibility issue
rows.Problem: Now bar turns white during IPL score updates and no score is shown on lock screen, occurring only during matches when notifications are received
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar turns white during IPL matches and fails to display scores on the lock screen when notifications are received.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality during specific events but does not cause device crash or data loss, and works normally otherwise.

rows.Title: Unable to disable unreachable call forwarding
rows.Problem: Phone has entered call forwarding without number; unable to disable, automatically declined by device
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot disable unreachable call forwarding on the device, which automatically declines the disable request.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to allow users to disable a critical setting, leading to unexpected call forwarding behavior and user frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Wifi calling not showing in status bar
rows.Problem: Wifi calling is not showing in status bar even though it's active in the settings
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi calling is not displayed in the status bar despite being enabled in settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the UI despite being configured, but the underlying network functionality may still work.
rows.R&D Comment: Server did not respond for IKE SA INIT request. After 3 times request trying, IKE was given up and made the negotiation fail. This is NW issue. It should be checked from operator side.

rows.Title: Navigation button drops down when YouTube is scrolled down
rows.Problem: When opening the YouTube app and scrolling down, the navigation buttons drop down
rows.Summarized Problem: Navigation buttons drop down when scrolling in the YouTube app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the UI during app interaction but does not prevent core functionality or lead to device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a bug in the YouTube app's code, specifically in method calls related to navigation handling. There is no Samsung involvement; the problem lies in the third-party app and cannot be resolved by Samsung.

rows.Title: System UI keeps accessing device location every few minutes
rows.Problem: System UI keeps accessing device location every few minutes, causing significant battery drain compared to One UI 6.1.1. This issue persists despite clearing data and cache of Google Play Services and is reported by many users across social media forums.
rows.Summarized Problem: System UI repeatedly accesses device location, leading to excessive battery consumption.
rows.Severity Reason: The repeated location access causes significant battery drain, impacting device usability and user experience.

rows.Title: Unable to hide the status bar
rows.Problem: Unable to hide the status bar during screen recording after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot hide the status bar during screen recording after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The status bar remains visible during screen recording, preventing users from fully controlling the recording interface, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: No transparent clock in Home screen widget
rows.Problem: No transparent clock in Home screen widget compare to previous version please update this
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock widget on the home screen does not support transparency, unlike in previous versions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, affecting visual consistency but not rendering or device functionality.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification
rows.R&D Comment: Transparency is not supported due to visibility concerns with analog clock hands on various wallpapers; this issue is to be maintained as MCS.

rows.Title: Call background shows random color instead of saved background
rows.Problem: When a call comes, the device shows a random colored screen instead of the saved call background. This issue occurred in One UI 7, was fine in One UI 6, and affects Samsung S23 5G users. The random color corresponds to the contact's saved photo background, which is not properly handled during calls.
rows.Summarized Problem: The call screen displays a random background color instead of the user's saved call background, especially when the contact has no photo.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in the call interface, disrupting user experience but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Show contact photo background in case of contact number not saved photo image. Counter Measure: Fix to show default background in this case.

rows.Title: Text size getting changed automatically in Lock screen
rows.Problem: Lock screen time size changes automatically after a few minutes, even when user has set it; the text reverts to original size and position, and the lock screen is edited automatically despite user having set a PIN
rows.Summarized Problem: The text size on the lock screen automatically reverts to its original setting after a few minutes, despite user adjustments.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes persistent UI inconsistency and forces user to manually re-edit the lock screen every time, leading to frustration and potential usability failure.

rows.Title: Unable to open banking app
rows.Problem: Banking apps are not working properly after updating to one ui 7
rows.Summarized Problem: Banking apps are not working properly after the update to one ui 7
rows.Severity Reason: The banking apps are not functioning properly after an update, which affects usability but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: screen freezes while closing recent apps
rows.Problem: When closing recent apps, a pop-up appears saying 'processing notification' and the screen freezes for a few seconds.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen freezes for several seconds when closing recent apps, accompanied by a 'processing notification' pop-up.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a noticeable delay during app closure but does not result in device unavailability or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a Chrome-related issue reproducible in the GMS bundle; reported to Crbug with IDs 416181574 and 424066119. Google will address it in future Chrome updates.

rows.Title: Widgets take more than 1 min to load after restarting the device
rows.Problem: After restarting my mobile, widgets take more than one minute to load after the One UI upgrade
rows.Summarized Problem: Widgets take over a minute to load after device restart following the One UI upgrade.
rows.Severity Reason: Widgets fail to load promptly after restart, impairing usability but do not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Quick Panel Overlapping Observation In Music Notification
rows.Problem: When YouTube Music notification is displayed and the notification menu is expanded, swiping up to close the notification drawer shows an underlying activity overlay. Not tested with other media apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Quick Panel overlaps with the underlying activity when YouTube Music notification is displayed and the notification menu is expanded.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual consistency and usability of the notification interface but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Bottom speaker not working after UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Bottom speaker is not working after UI 7 update on S23 Ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: The bottom speaker is not functioning after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The bottom speaker, which is essential for system audio playback, is completely non-functional after the update, making device usage impractical.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue scenario is not captured in logs; only system sound playback (keyboard, low battery, lock screen, charger) is logged, all routed through the bottom speaker, indicating a missing or failed audio path detection.

rows.Title: photos disappear on attempt of preview
rows.Problem: photos disappear when I attempt to preview them
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos disappear when attempting to preview them.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot view photos after taking them, making the photo feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause: Photos lost after taking photos. Countermeasure: Reset camera and clear camera app data.

rows.Title: Now Bar position on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Now bar feature not working as expected on Lock Screen; appears above fingerprint sensor instead of below, unlike Samsung Galaxy S25 model.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar on the Lock Screen is positioned above the fingerprint sensor instead of below, deviating from the expected S25 behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual consistency and user experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Call background changes to random color
rows.Problem: Call background image changes to random color when making or receiving a call
rows.Summarized Problem: Call background image randomly changes to a solid color during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent visual experience but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Shows contact photo background when contact photo is not saved; Countermeasure: Show default background in this case.

rows.Title: Video codec not supported error
rows.Problem: Cannot play videos in Samsung Video Player, including x265 normal and 10bit x265 videos.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Video Player fails to play videos using x265 codec, including 10-bit versions, showing a 'codec not supported' error.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot play common video formats, rendering the video player functionally unusable for a wide range of content.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue not reproducible without reproduction path and video logs; requires user to provide detailed reproduction steps and recorded video to validate the problem.

rows.Title: phone restarts many times in a day
rows.Problem: phone restarts many times in a day
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone restarts frequently throughout the day.
rows.Severity Reason: Frequent restarts make the device unusable and indicate a major system instability.
rows.R&D Comment: EOL model. Please check and have sample HW inspection and share results

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Device has severe battery drain, especially when using high-resource apps like Instagram and PUBG. Battery drain occurs even when screen is off and during normal use.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain, particularly during high-CPU usage, with high discharge rates when screen is on and off.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is severe and occurs during active use, leading to rapid depletion and potential device unusability.

rows.Title: Secure shutdown not working
rows.Problem: The secure shutdown is not working. Despite the toggle being on, the user is able to switch off the phone without being prompted for passcode or fingerprint verification.
rows.Summarized Problem: The secure shutdown feature is not working, allowing users to shut down the phone without requiring passcode or fingerprint verification.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to enforce security during shutdown, enabling unauthorized device off-switching without authentication.

rows.Title: heating problem in device
rows.Problem: heating problem after update
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats after software update due to high CPU usage by third-party apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats significantly, likely leading to performance degradation or hardware damage, indicating a critical system-level issue.
rows.R&D Comment: High CPU usage by third-party apps (com.csam.icici.bank.imobile and com.snapwork.hdfc) is causing excessive heating and battery drain; no Samsung-specific root cause found.

rows.Title: Telegram App Crashes During Audio/Video Calls
rows.Problem: Telegram App Crashes During Audio/Video Calls After One UI 7 Update
rows.Summarized Problem: Telegram app crashes during audio or video calls after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes immediately after call initiation, making the feature unusable and disrupting communication functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Native crash in org.telegram.messenger due to SIGSEGV indicating memory access error in app code or libraries.

rows.Title: AUTO RESTART
rows.Problem: Phone is restarting at random times during tasks, showing app optimization progress at 85% before restarting after completion. This started after UI 7 update and has occurred twice in the past 4 hours.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone randomly restarts during tasks, showing 85% app optimization progress before rebooting.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts mid-task, disrupting user workflow and making the device unusable during active use.
rows.R&D Comment: SYSMMU fault occurred with no debugging info; patches released to dump debug data and disable recovery in fault cases.

rows.Title: Cant reply WhatsApp msg from notification bar in landscape mode
rows.Problem: Cant reply WhatsApp msg from notification bar in landscape mode
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot reply to WhatsApp messages from the notification bar in landscape mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a specific device orientation, preventing users from performing a basic interaction but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Bixby not working
rows.Problem: Have tried all the mentioned steps. None of them are working.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby is not functioning despite attempts to resolve via available steps.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working, but users have tried all recommended steps, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete failure or device instability.
rows.R&D Comment: I can't reproduce this issue. If it occurs again, please dump log right after issue occurs.

rows.Title: Lag in notification panel when tried to pull down in landscape mode
rows.Problem: The animation is still not smooth when pulling down the notification panel in landscape mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel animation is slow and unresponsive when pulled down in landscape mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable lag in a key UI interaction but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Media download slow in telegram
rows.Problem: Images and videos take too long to load in Telegram; user has tried clearing cache, uninstalling and reinstalling, hard reset, and updated to Android 7 but issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: Media files take excessively long to download in Telegram, despite multiple troubleshooting steps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents timely access to media content, significantly impacting user experience and usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The cause is the absence of logs at the time of occurrence; the logs start later and do not cover the incident time, making root cause analysis impossible.

rows.Title: App switch bezel fill delay
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, the top right bezel corners take one second to fill in when switching between apps, causing a visual refresh that resets progress in other apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The bezel corners take a second to fill in during app switching, causing visual disruption and loss of app progress.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a noticeable visual glitch and resets app progress, but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: We have checked the issue in the latest binary, but the issue didn't reproduce at our end. The exact root cause is not clear from provided logs. If the issue persists, please raise a new issue with logs and video.

rows.Title: Issues in both wifi and mobile network range
rows.Problem: Issues on both Wifi range and Mobile network range
rows.Summarized Problem: The device has issues with both Wi-Fi and mobile network range.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects both network types but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Call notification not getting removed from notification panel
rows.Problem: Call notification remains on notification panel after call ends, even after attempting to remove or clearing all notifications
rows.Summarized Problem: Call notifications remain on the notification panel after a call ends and do not disappear despite attempts to remove or clear them.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification persists after a call ends, affecting user experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Pictures lost after software upgrade
rows.Problem: I lost all my pictures after software upgrade
rows.Summarized Problem: User lost all pictures stored in the Secure Folder after a software upgrade.
rows.Severity Reason: User lost all pictures, which are critical personal data, indicating a major data loss issue.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Files in secure folder were deleted due to WhatsApp app package absence; Counter Measure: Verify file existence in secure folder and check WhatsApp media directory via Gallery or My Files app.

rows.Title: Black bar displayed on top left corner when screen set to AOD
rows.Problem: A black bar appears on the top left corner when setting AOD and double-clicking to activate the screen. The bar cannot be removed completely.
rows.Summarized Problem: A black bar appears on the top left corner of the screen when AOD is activated and cannot be removed.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual appearance during AOD mode but does not prevent device operation or cause functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was not reproducible in the latest binary; QA is advised to verify in the latest build.

rows.Title: Notification redirects to notification panel instead of app
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, clicking on an app notification on the lockscreen redirects to the notification panel on the homescreen instead of opening the app upon unlocking.
rows.Summarized Problem: App notifications on the lockscreen redirect to the notification panel instead of opening the app when clicked.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in the notification flow, preventing app launch as intended but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Frame drop while closing keyboard emoji search
rows.Problem: Massive frame drop when closing keyboard emoji search since One UI 6.1, persists after One UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: A significant frame drop occurs when closing the emoji search in the keyboard.
rows.Severity Reason: The frame drop severely impacts smoothness of interaction and usability during a common task.

rows.Title: Lockscreen clock size gets small
rows.Problem: Lock screen clock size is small and becomes normal after restart
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen appears small and returns to normal after device restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects usability but does not cause device malfunction or data loss; it is intermittent and resolves after restart.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Issue not reproducible in latest binary. Countermeasure: Verify in latest binary.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery draining very fast after UI7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains very fast after the UI7 update due to high network usage by apps.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable quickly due to rapid battery depletion after update.

rows.Title: Battery drain observed in the device
rows.Problem: Battery drains very fast, faster than expected for a 5000mAh device, lasting less than 8 hours despite normal usage.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device battery drains extremely fast, significantly shorter than expected for a 5000mAh capacity.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains faster than normal usage expectations, leading to device being unusable due to frequent recharging.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: YouTube Music app (UID 10361) consumes excessive background power (3h 20m 31s). Countermeasure: Optimize background power usage of YouTube Music app.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Phone battery draining fast after update 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone's battery drains quickly after the latest software update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain fast leads to device being unusable without frequent charging.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain issue observed; request for longer log capture to analyze real usage patterns.

rows.Title: Slow charging and sluggish battery percentage
rows.Problem: Phone charges slowly, showing battery percentage that jumps from 1-5% to 90% after restart, and battery drains fast even when not in use, especially after updating to One UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone experiences slow charging and sudden battery percentage jumps, with rapid battery drain even when not in use.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain occurs even when the device is idle, leading to unexpected power loss and device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery consumption during screen-off period appears similar to pre-update levels; if it accelerates during inactivity, logs should be provided with approximate time.

rows.Title: Circle feature not working
rows.Problem: Circle to search is not working and have some lag
rows.Summarized Problem: The circle search feature is not working and exhibits lag.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not functioning properly but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The logs are not in sync with the video attached. Please attach video and dumpstate logs in sync to analyse the issue.

rows.Title: Frame drop during video recording
rows.Problem: Significant frame drop observed while recording video in both 60 FPS and 30 FPS modes. Issue persists even after factory reset. Video shows drop between 1-4 seconds.
rows.Summarized Problem: A significant frame drop occurs during video recording in both 60 and 30 FPS modes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visible frame drops during recording, leading to poor video quality and a degraded user experience in a core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The logs attached do not contain any running scenario for video usecase, so it is not possible to further debug root cause for this issue. Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi turns off automatically
rows.Problem: Icons marked in status bar are missing in normal home screen look
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi turns off automatically and status bar icons are missing on the home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of Wi-Fi functionality and UI element visibility, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Device gets overheated even in normal use
rows.Problem: Device gets overheated even in normal use
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during normal usage, even when not engaged in intensive tasks.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating during normal use makes the device potentially unsafe and affects usability, especially if it leads to thermal shutdown or performance degradation.
rows.R&D Comment: Heating instances seen during device reboot; temperature rises due to high system server load and current consumption. Recommend user to report usage scenarios and share logs when heat is felt.

rows.Title: Status bar dot cannot be removed
rows.Problem: A dot appears next to the time on the left side of the status bar, following three app notification icons. Users previously had the option to remove this dot to show all app icons, but that setting is now missing in the current version of One UI.
rows.Summarized Problem: A dot appears next to the time on the status bar, preventing full display of app notification icons and removing a user-configurable option.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing a user-configurable option, leading to a partial UI malfunction, but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Loss of 5G network
rows.Problem: Frequent loss of 5G network after UI 7 update on Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience frequent loss of 5G network connectivity after updating to UI 7 on Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete loss of 5G connectivity, which is a critical network function essential for device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: SA disabled during network reconfiguration; Countermeasure: Device cooling recommended during heavy usage.

rows.Title: Exposure setting in camera quick tool not visible
rows.Problem: After one UI 7 update, the exposure setting in camera quick tools is not visible as advertised. User experience is affected.
rows.Summarized Problem: The exposure setting in the camera quick tools is missing after the UI 7 update, affecting user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not visible as advertised, impacting user experience but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification

rows.Title: Now bar comes in the middle of the screen
rows.Problem: Now bar is in the middle of the lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar appears in the middle of the lock screen, disrupting the user interface layout.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual layout of the lock screen but does not prevent device usage or cause system failure.

rows.Title: AI Selection feature is slow
rows.Problem: The new AI selection feature is much slower than smart select. Kindly bring back that or make this one faster
rows.Summarized Problem: The AI selection feature is significantly slower than the smart select feature.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature operates slowly compared to an existing option, causing a noticeable performance gap but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to setup samsung pass
rows.Problem: Unable to setup samsung pass in new S24 ULTRA. Tried clearing cache and data. Needs a fix. Samsung Wallet is temporarily not available. Try again later.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set up Samsung Pass on the new S24 ULTRA due to Samsung Wallet being temporarily unavailable during setup.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely unavailable during setup, preventing users from configuring a core device security function.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: PPP information is overwritten with 0 during KnoxMatrix registration. Countermeasure: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to run GOS lite
rows.Problem: Game plugin not working properly after updating to one ui 7, showing error 'Unable to run GOS lite' when launching
rows.Summarized Problem: Game plugin fails to launch due to error 'Unable to run GOS lite'.
rows.Severity Reason: The game plugin is completely non-functional, preventing users from launching games, which is a core feature for device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: From Android V-os, game plug-ins are no longer supported. The GameBoosterPlus function has been added as the GameBooster main function, and the rest of the functions will be provided through Goodlock.

rows.Title: Portrait mode blur inaccurate
rows.Problem: Portrait mode blur is inaccurate after One UI 7 update. Edges around headset and face are not processed cleanly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The portrait mode blur effect is inaccurate, with edges around the headset and face not being processed cleanly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the blur effect in portrait mode, affecting specific edges but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The rear Portrait mode extracts parallax information using two cameras and creates a depthmap that contains distance information to give a blur effect depending on the distance. Fine blur effect errors may occur if there is an error in depthmap, particularly with thin subjects or repetitive backgrounds.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Phone battery drains quickly after UI 7 update, requiring charging 3-4 times a day
rows.Summarized Problem: The device battery drains rapidly after the UI 7 update, requiring frequent charging.
rows.Severity Reason: Frequent charging makes the device unusable for daily use, indicating a major functional failure.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery draining too fast after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain after the UI 7 update, primarily due to continuous data usage by social media apps in poor network conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is severe enough to render the device unusable without charging, especially after a software update.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: High data usage by Instagram and Amazon MP3 in poor networks; Countermeasure: Same as cause, indicating no effective mitigation yet.

rows.Title: Youtube music multiple instances in recent app tray
rows.Problem: YouTube Music app remains open after being locked and shows multiple instances in recent app tray
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube Music app shows multiple instances in the recent apps tray after being locked.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the app tray display, causing incorrect instance count, but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not reproducing in the latest ONEUI Home; will be fixed in Homescreen version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: No missed call alert received when device is in flight mode
rows.Problem: Missed call alert is not received when phone is in flight mode; same SIM works on other devices, indicating issue with phone settings or telecom notification flow
rows.Summarized Problem: The device does not receive missed call alerts when in flight mode, despite working on other devices with the same SIM.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a key feature (missed call alerts) under specific conditions (flight mode), but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: No missed call notification will be sent from Telecom side if device is in Airplane mode; seems like it might be sent from operator itself; not related to Samsung Call Concept

rows.Title: Multiple issue observed in the device
rows.Problem: Battery life has deteriorated significantly. The "Enter Pin" caption, number pad on Lockscreen and fingerprint screen have gone black and there is no way to turn them white entirely except the number pad. Cannot bypass the OK button after entering pin anymore. Earlier method of bypassing by deleting last two digits no longer works.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life has significantly deteriorated and the device cannot bypass the OK button after entering a pin.
rows.Severity Reason: Device usability is severely impacted due to battery degradation and inability to bypass the OK button, which prevents normal operation of the lock screen flow.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery discharge data shows abnormal consumption during screen on and off; request QA to provide correct logs for analysis.

rows.Title: Notification panel not going up when swiped up from bottom of the screen
rows.Problem: Notification panel does not go back when swiping from the bottom of the screen, making it feel like the phone is stuck at one screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel fails to respond to a swipe-up gesture from the bottom of the screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing notifications but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is not fully disabling functionality.

rows.Title: Wifi call not available on home screen
rows.Problem: Wifi calling is not available on the home screen and only appears when the notification panel is dragged down after a new update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Wifi calling is not available on the home screen and only appears when the notification panel is dragged down.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially available only after interacting with the notification panel, indicating an incomplete implementation rather than a full failure or device crash.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue has been identified and a fix is planned for the next OS release.

rows.Title: watch doesn't have esim option
rows.Problem: the watch doesn't have esim option even though it is an LTE version and unable to connect to service provider
rows.Summarized Problem: An LTE version watch lacks ESIM support and cannot connect to service providers, especially with prepaid SIMs.
rows.Severity Reason: The watch fails to connect to service providers due to lack of ESIM support, but it remains usable with postpaid numbers and compatible devices.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Airtel does not support watch pairing with prepaid SIMs; Counter Measure: Guide customer to confirm postpaid number and 4G service; share mobile number/IMSI for operator verification.

rows.Title: Text on Now Bar not visible clearly
rows.Problem: No solution provided repeatedly
rows.Summarized Problem: The text on the Now Bar is not visible clearly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, affecting readability but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Clock and date on AOD doesn't change its position
rows.Problem: AOD clock and date does not change its position when the device is locked or time passes, remaining in the same fixed location for hours.
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock and date on the Always On Display remain fixed in position and do not update when the device is locked or time changes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the dynamic display behavior but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and users can still use the device normally.

rows.Title: App icon missing or replaces with other app icons
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, app icons on many apps are disappearing and sometimes showing icons of other apps. Only the app name is visible, especially for apps inside folders. The issue returns when returning to the home screen after opening an app.
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons are disappearing or being replaced with other apps' icons after updating to One UI 7, especially for apps in folders.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects app visibility but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Notification tone cannot be heard and no notification pop up
rows.Problem: Silent notification issue and notification tone is not heard, notification popup not coming in all applications
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot hear notification tones and do not see notification pop-ups in applications.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from receiving alerts, making the device functionally unusable for important notifications.

rows.Title: Samsung messages app shows Registration Failed
rows.Problem: Samsung messages shows "Registration failed" repeatedly after switching to Galaxy A36, while Google Messages works fine. User wants to use Samsung Messages RCS.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Messages fails to register for RCS on Galaxy A36, showing 'Registration Failed' repeatedly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full use of Samsung Messages RCS functionality but does not cause device crash or data loss; it resolves after reboot.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Network configuration not ready; Countermeasure: Autoconfiguration performed after reboot.

rows.Title: Over heating observed in the device
rows.Problem: Abnormal heating observed on Galaxy S24 during normal use, especially when connected to fast charging and using applications like Flipkart. CPU and battery temperatures reach 41.2°C and 53.1°C respectively, with gaming applications increasing CPU usage and temperature rise.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during normal use, particularly when charging and running applications, with elevated temperatures observed in both battery and CPU/GPU sensors.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating occurs during typical usage scenarios but is within expected temperature ranges and not causing device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: While connected to fast charging and using applications like Flipkart, device temperature rises to 39–4-40°C, which is within expected limits due to high CPU usage from gaming and app activity. This is normal under specified usage conditions.

rows.Title: Display brightness goes low during recording/taking photos/videos in sunlight
rows.Problem: Display brightness goes low during recording/taking photos/videos through camera in sunlight condition
rows.Summarized Problem: The display brightness drops unexpectedly during video or photo capture in sunlight.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality during camera use but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both indicate that brightness-related logs are missing due to delayed log extraction; recommend immediate log capture when the issue occurs to identify root cause.

rows.Title: Device lags on using 5g
rows.Problem: Device gets slow and laggy while using 5g, FPS drops during game play
rows.Summarized Problem: Device lags and experiences frame drops when using 5g during game play
rows.Severity Reason: Lag and FPS drop during gameplay make the device unusable for core activities like gaming
rows.R&D Comment: High thermal activity limits frequency, causing performance drop; background apps consume memory and trigger fatal errors; recommend optimizing background app management and thermal throttling

rows.Title: Device taking a long time to process the image
rows.Problem: Processing time taken for more than 15 minutes but still not completed
rows.Summarized Problem: The device takes over 15 minutes to process an image, indicating a significant performance lag in image processing.
rows.Severity Reason: The processing time exceeds 15 minutes, which renders the camera function practically unusable and causes a major functional delay.
rows.R&D Comment: Only PostProcessThread stuck found in MFP soln for S24, No MFP logs present/insufficient logs to debug.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Serious battery drain issue observed on Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra after update to 7.0 UI. Delay in lock screen by microseconds when locking the phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain and minor lock screen delay after updating to the 7.0 UI.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain severely impacts device usability and longevity, making the device impractical for daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: High discharge rate while screen on (17.70%/hr) and insufficient screen-off logging. Countermeasure: Request additional logs to capture battery drain during extended screen-off states.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery is not good and old, please recommend customer replace a new one at CS Center
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences excessive battery drain due to an old and deteriorated battery.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery is old and malfunctioning, leading to rapid drain which renders the device unusable without immediate replacement.

rows.Title: Pictures in gallery is shown with .dwg thumbnail
rows.Problem: Gallery app shows .dwg files as thumbnails in new OneUI 7.0, which is not supposed to happen
rows.Summarized Problem: The gallery app displays .dwg files as thumbnails, which is incorrect and inconsistent with expected behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in thumbnail rendering, where non-image files are incorrectly shown, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.

rows.Title: Overlapping of modes button in quick panel
rows.Problem: Overlapping issue of modes button in quick panel
rows.Summarized Problem: The modes button in the quick panel is overlapping with other elements.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial visual malfunction that affects usability but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Issue not reproducible in latest binary; Countermeasure: Verify in latest binary

rows.Title: Battery drain and overheating
rows.Problem: Battery backup is very low and none of the steps worked
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain and overheating, leading to poor battery backup.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows severe battery drain and overheating, which renders it unusable due to rapid power loss and potential safety risks.
rows.R&D Comment: Heating is caused by increased battery thermistor readings and high ambient environment; countermeasure is to address thermistor values and ambient conditions.

rows.Title: Remove help text from lock screen
rows.Problem: Cannot remove help text from lock screen after One UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot remove the help text from the lock screen after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, preventing users from customizing the lock screen, but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Multiple issues observed
rows.Problem: Charging indicator misaligned on AOD screen but aligned on lock screen; Game Booster 'Block During Game' feature missing
rows.Summarized Problem: The charging indicator is misaligned on the AOD screen, and the Game Booster app lacks a 'Block During Game' feature in its settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The charging indicator misalignment affects usability during charging, and the missing feature reduces functionality in gaming scenarios, but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Display mode change resets total modes widget
rows.Problem: Changing display resolution mode from the widget resets the total modes widget
rows.Summarized Problem: Changing display resolution mode resets the total modes widget.
rows.Severity Reason: The widget resets upon mode change, causing partial malfunction of the display settings interface.
rows.R&D Comment: Updated sesl glance; issue not reproducible with latest version of Modes & Routine

rows.Title: Wifi and Bluetooth does not work
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, both Wi-Fi and Bluetooth stopped working. The switches do not turn on in quick settings or main settings. Bluetooth sometimes turns on by itself but cannot be controlled manually. A factory reset did not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi and Bluetooth are not functioning and cannot be manually controlled after a system update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot connect to networks, making basic connectivity impossible and rendering the device unusable for daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: WIFI initialization is failing when booting. (WIFI and BT are the same IC with combo chipset.) Please visit CS Center for WIFI IC related HW issue and request WIFI / BT related HW inspection.

rows.Title: Bluetooth logo shown instead of app logo in separate app sound feature
rows.Problem: When using the separate app sound feature, the app's logo is displayed instead of the Bluetooth logo, indicating a display glitch in audio settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Bluetooth logo is incorrectly displayed instead of the app's logo when using the separate app sound feature.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual feedback in audio settings but does not prevent core functionality from working.
rows.R&D Comment: Insufficient log time coverage; issue not reproducible in testing.

rows.Title: Sound lag observed while playing a Youtube video
rows.Problem: There is sound lag while playing anything like mus
rows.Summarized Problem: Sound lag occurs during video playback, particularly on YouTube.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of audio playback during media consumption, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Multiple issues observed in the device
rows.Problem: Camera struggles at 3x on S23, battery drains almost 50% in half a day without gaming or camera use, issues occur after updating to One UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain without gaming or camera usage, and the camera struggles at 3x zoom on S23 after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain of 50% in half a day without usage is severe and impacts device usability, making it impractical for daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue cannot be reproduced at our end due to insufficient details. No media logs found. If issue occurs, proper reproduction steps and preconditions are needed.

rows.Title: Device not working properly
rows.Problem: Phone screen gets stuck for a few seconds between operations. Issue started after software reset at service center, data lost. Phone worked fine for two days then issue returned after One UI 7 update. Factory reset attempted but problem persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences intermittent screen freezing during operation, leading to poor responsiveness and data loss.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive with screen freezes, disrupting core usability and potentially causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue did not reproduce in the latest binary; root cause is unclear from logs. If it persists, a new issue with logs and video should be raised.

rows.Title: Instagram HDR Reels have more saturation on S25
rows.Problem: Saturation is more on S25 while watching HDR reels on Instagram compared to S23, which delivers proper saturation. Both devices run on One UI 7 and software is up to date.
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram HDR reels on S25 display higher saturation than on S23, leading to inconsistent visual quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual consistency in a key media feature but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: GMS log analysis indicates temporary app slowness; retest recommended in latest version.

rows.Title: Multiple issues observed in the device
rows.Problem: Phone starts to lag and freezes during calls, switching from 120 to 60 Hz, requiring lock and unlock to recover. Device performance is inconsistent compared to S25.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device lags and freezes during calls when switching from 120Hz to 6
rows.Severity Reason: The phone freezes during calls and requires repeated lock/unlock, making it unusable in real-time scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: We can't know what is issue with only log. User should share video to record the issue with log.

rows.Title: Reduce Animation in Vision Enhancement causes Samsung Shop app to behave abnormally
rows.Problem: When reducing animation in Vision Enhancement settings, Samsung Shop app starts behaving abnormally
rows.Summarized Problem: Reducing animation in Vision Enhancement settings causes Samsung Shop app to behave abnormally.
rows.Severity Reason: The app behavior is abnormal but not fully non-functional or crashing, indicating a partial malfunction.

rows.Title: phone completely frozen
rows.Problem: phone completely frozen and didnt respond while surfing through instagram reels, keyboard lagging, previously occurred during instagram usage
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone becomes completely frozen during Instagram usage and fails to respond, leading to a system crash requiring restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unresponsive, rendering it unusable during critical operations like browsing, and requires a restart to recover.
rows.R&D Comment: Caused by incorrect HDR10+ metadata in HLG-based videos from Instagram server, leading to infinite memory allocation and kernel panic; resolved server-side by META.

rows.Title: Instagram Screen Freezes and Restarts
rows.Problem: Screen froze up while watching Instagram reels and automatically restarted
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen freezes and automatically restarts when watching Instagram reels.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction during video playback, interrupting user experience but does not make the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue originated in META's server side due to HDR10+ metadata in HLG images and was resolved by META; no software or device-specific fix required.

rows.Title: Youtube video flickers in green color
rows.Problem: Video flickers in green color when using Samsung Browser for long periods, persists after clearing data and caches
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback flickers in green color when using Samsung Browser for extended periods.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs intermittently and persists after clearing cache, but cannot be reliably reproduced, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Tried to reproduce the issue on same device, binary and samsung internet version. It can not be reproduced. it seems to be a temporary issue. If issue occurs pls let us know the preconditions if any, so that we can analyze the issue in more detail.

rows.Title: App icons missing from homescreen and app tray
rows.Problem: Three installed apps—Samsung Internet, Camera, and Dialer—are missing from quick launch access and nowhere in the apps list. Devices have been rebooted and the One UI home app force-stopped, but icons remain invisible.
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons are not visible on the homescreen or app tray despite being installed.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial visibility of app icons, affecting user access but not causing device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The 'Show favorites' option is off in HomeUp, so favorites icons are not displayed. Users should enable 'Show favorites' to see icons.

rows.Title: Multiple issues observed
rows.Problem: Auto blocker not available on this phone. Request to enable Q0000 or RF test menu
rows.Summarized Problem: The device lacks an auto blocker feature and does not support the Q0000 or RF test menu.
rows.Severity Reason: The auto blocker is not available due to the absence of SAK (Samsung Attestation Key), which is a system-level limitation, resulting in partial functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Auto blocker support requires SAK; this device lacks SAK, so auto blocker is not supported. No countermeasure is needed as it is a platform limitation.

rows.Title: Battery drain quickly
rows.Problem: Battery is draining too quickly even in ideal mode after latest security patch
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains quickly even in ideal mode after the latest security patch
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable due to rapid battery depletion, requiring frequent recharging
rows.R&D Comment: Log data shows no abnormal battery level changes; however, short log duration may miss root cause. Recommend extended logging if issue recurs

rows.Title: Call background wallpaper not showing
rows.Problem: Selected wallpaper does not show during calls
rows.Summarized Problem: The selected wallpaper fails to display during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the call background display, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Fix to show default background in case of missing contact photo; user can configure via contact image or custom background settings.

rows.Title: Battery drain after update
rows.Problem: S23 Ultra exhibits substantial battery drain after One UI 7 update, despite cache clearing and background process optimization, with screen-on time reduced by 1 to 1.5 hours.
rows.Summarized Problem: The S23 Ultra experiences significant battery drain after the One UI 7 update, reducing screen-on time by one to one and a half hours.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows substantial battery drain, which directly impacts usability and device functionality, making it unusable for extended periods.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue should be checked by Meta side, so, I have reported this issue like below. "Meta eng team is under investigation. Please keep it as it is 3rd party app issue."

rows.Title: Unable to transfer call from handset mode to BT buds
rows.Problem: Not able to take calls from any bluetooth headsets, including galaxy buds
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot transfer calls from handset mode to Bluetooth headsets, including Galaxy Buds.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot use Bluetooth headsets for calls, but the functionality is not completely broken—only partially missing, affecting specific use cases.

rows.Title: Phone call app not showing contacts and Truecaller closing often
rows.Problem: Phone call app is not showing contacts and Truecaller app frequently closes after update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone call app fails to display contacts and the Truecaller app frequently closes after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The phone call app not showing contacts prevents basic functionality, and Truecaller closing frequently disrupts call management, making the device unusable for communication.
rows.R&D Comment: The app is not starting because the contact database is contaminated. A workaround exists but deletes local contacts; clearing data and cache in contact store restores functionality.

rows.Title: Battery draining fast
rows.Problem: Battery draining issue and device overheating and lagging
rows.Summarized Problem: Device battery drains quickly and causes overheating and lagging after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery drain, overheating, and lagging, which are major functional failures affecting core device operation.

rows.Title: DeX crashes when change audio output to display device
rows.Problem: Dex crashes when media output is changed from device to display device
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung DeX crashes when switching audio output to display device.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes when changing audio output, making the DeX environment unusable during the operation.
rows.R&D Comment: It seems HDMI adapter or monitor problem. Please ask user to test with other HDMI adapter or other monitor.

rows.Title: Lockscreen swipe and setting swipe stopped working
rows.Problem: After UI 7 update, lockscreen swipe and setting swipe stopped working. Device did not allow unlock via touch even when face unlocked. Touch response showed touch working, but functionality failed. Issue persisted after unlocking via face and navigating to camera app.
rows.Summarized Problem: Lockscreen and setting swipes are no longer functional after UI 7 update, preventing normal device interaction.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot be unlocked or navigated properly via touch, making it unusable for basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue not reproducible in latest binary; kindly verify in latest device binary.

rows.Title: 5G network becomes inactive
rows.Problem: 5G network becomes inactive every 30 minutes and does not resume until airplane mode is toggled or device is restarted. The 5G symbol stays but only shows upward arrow; no downlink data is received or displayed.
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G network intermittently drops after 30 minutes and fails to resume without airplane mode toggle or device restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete loss of internet bandwidth and prevents normal device usage during the outage period, rendering the device unusable for internet activities.
rows.R&D Comment: Dear user, it looks like NW is congested and not providing response for data being sent in UL to NW. From provided logs, it is not a consistent issue; sometimes no downlink data is received. If this issue persists, please go to service center and get your device checked.

rows.Title: Pictures taken in complete darkness with 12 MP and 50 MP camera have poor quality
rows.Problem: Photos captured in complete darkness using the 12 MP and 50 MP cameras on the S25 Ultra show poor image quality, with the 12 MP image appearing almost black and white. The issue is attributed to insufficient flash light during capture, despite auto exposure adjustments.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos taken in complete darkness using the 12 MP camera have poor image quality due to insufficient flash light and inadequate auto exposure adjustment.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue results in subpar image quality in low-light conditions, affecting user experience but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The difference in flash light between the two cameras leads to poor image quality in low light; auto exposure adjusts light levels appropriately, but the 12 MP result is still suboptimal.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery level dropped from 60% to 50% after 50 minutes of use with a single application running at minimum brightness, location services off, Wi-Fi on, and room temperature. This behavior is new and started after the latest update. Device has 153 installed applications. Battery logs are attached.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain after 50 minutes of light usage, a new issue following the latest update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain from 60% to 5-than 50% in 50 minutes indicates rapid consumption, which may lead to device shutdown or reduced usability, especially under normal conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drainage seems normal; request QA to provide correct logs for further analysis

rows.Title: Samsung Health steps not displayed when phone is locked
rows.Problem: Samsung Health steps not work on lock phone
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Health does not display step count when the phone is locked.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing when the device is locked, making it unusable for users who rely on step tracking.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by incorrect handling of BR event for OOBE; fixed in version 6.30, and users will see the fix after upgrading the app.

rows.Title: Battery backup not good
rows.Problem: How can I send you video and screenshot of bad battery backup
