rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences poor battery backup when the screen is off, with significant power consumption due to background GMS apps.
rows.Severity Reason: Background GMS apps are consuming substantial battery power even when the screen is off, leading to rapid battery drain and reduced device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Background GMS apps consume power during screen off. Countermeasure: GMS is a third-party app; Samsung has no control over its background activity.

rows.Title: Rotate to landscape feature showing disabled
rows.Problem: Rotate to landscape feature is not available. I am not able to on and off this feature.
rows.Summarized Problem: The rotate to landscape feature is disabled and cannot be enabled or disabled by the user.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not available, preventing user control, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Free Grid is enabled; turning it off makes the feature available. Countermeasure: Same as cause.

rows.Title: Multiple issues observed
rows.Problem: Performance issue and overheating when using camera and taking videos in 4k and hdr mode, and when phone is off, showing temperature above 40 degrees.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences lag and overheating during 4K HDR video recording and when powered off.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats to above 40 degrees and shows lag during video recording, which impacts usability and may cause device damage or instability.

rows.Title: Battery drain and heating during social media and web browsing
rows.Problem: Significant battery drain and device heating during normal use such as web browsing and social media activities, especially after updating to One UI 7. This was not an issue on previous versions of One UI.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences excessive battery drain and overheating during normal use like web browsing and social media after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain and heating during normal use make the device unusable for daily tasks and may lead to data loss or device shutdown.
rows.R&D Comment: According to analysis by GMS team, apps like 'com.facebook.katana' and 'com.instagram.android' are consuming power; these are third-party apps with no role of Samsung in their development.

rows.Title: Device become very slow after latest update
rows.Problem: Device has become very slow after latest update, screen functions poorly, battery drains quickly
rows.Summarized Problem: Device performance has significantly degraded after the latest update, with sluggish screen response and rapid battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable due to severe slowness and high battery consumption, indicating a major functional failure in system performance.
rows.R&D Comment: High device temperature leads to performance throttling; logs show normal CPU usage but sustained high temperature causing frequency limits.

rows.Title: Call not connecting
rows.Problem: Call is not connecting, must switch to airplane mode to resolve
rows.Summarized Problem: Calls are not connecting and require switching to airplane mode to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents the device from establishing calls, rendering a core communication function unusable.

rows.Title: Game freezes when WhatsApp call is picked
rows.Problem: Game freezes when WhatsApp call is picked and remains frozen after call ends
rows.Summarized Problem: Game freezes when a WhatsApp call is picked and remains frozen after the call ends.
rows.Severity Reason: The game becomes unresponsive and remains frozen after a call ends, making it unusable during and after the call.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue belongs to 3rd party application. It should be checked and fixed by the app owner.

rows.Title: Battery drains quickly after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Battery drains quickly after One UI 7 update. Charging speed has slowed down, taking 30 to 35 minutes extra. Phone sometimes hangs or runs slowly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone experiences rapid battery drain and slower charging after the One UI 7 update, with frequent app switching exacerbating battery consumption.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain and slow charging significantly impact device usability, making it difficult to use the phone without frequent recharging.
rows.R&D Comment: Frequent app switching increases battery consumption due to resource concentration during app switching; battery consumption spikes after software updates as apps recompile.

rows.Title: Same icon is showing for multiple different apps
rows.Problem: Icons are disappearing or same icon is showing for multiple apps in a folder
rows.Summarized Problem: Multiple apps are displaying the same icon in folders, causing confusion and incorrect app identification.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of app icon display, leading to user confusion but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared.

rows.Title: App icons not visible in folders
rows.Problem: Icon hide in home page
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons are not visible on the home screen when in folders.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the home screen interface, preventing users from accessing apps properly.

rows.Title: Pictures permanently deleted from gallery and recycle bin reappear
rows.Problem: Permanently deleted pictures from gallery and recycle bin reappear in gallery after a few days
rows.Summarized Problem: Deleted pictures reappear in the gallery after being permanently removed from both gallery and recycle bin.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where deleted content reappears, disrupting user expectations but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.

rows.Title: Multiple issue observed in the device
rows.Problem: Device hangs frequently after One UI 7 update, making it difficult to use. Performance issues occur despite restarts, cache clearing, and phone formatting.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently hangs and experiences performance issues after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs frequently, making it difficult to use, which renders core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Watchdog reset due to telephony API call during location service synchronization when phone app is not created. Countermeasure: Android 16 update includes a fix for location service not holding locks during telephony API calls.

rows.Title: Issues with color fidelity and fading when using 5x zoom
rows.Problem: issues with color fidelity and fading when using 5x zoom feature while recording videos and clicking photos
rows.Summarized Problem: Color fidelity and fading occur when using the 5x zoom feature during video recording and photo capture.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality during video and photo use but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Navigation bar overlaps YouTube Shorts screen
rows.Problem: Navigation bar overlaps YouTube screen, especially YouTube Shorts, causing out-of-bounds display and misclicks during interaction.
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar overlaps the YouTube Shorts screen, causing out-of-bounds display and misclicks.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user interaction but does not cause device crash or data loss; it is a partial malfunction impacting usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Navigation bar is displayed at fixed position but YouTube app content lacks margin; issue is within Google's app code and not under Samsung control.

rows.Title: Device overheats on enabling just gps
rows.Problem: Device overheats during normal usage when only gps is enabled, preventing at least 30 minutes of gaming on a flagship phone
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats during normal usage when only GPS is enabled, especially during gaming.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating occurs during normal usage and gaming, but is not severe enough to cause device crash or data loss, and is attributed to known heat-intensive scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: In the given set of logs temperature has increased due to game play. Gaming is a heat intensive scenario and these apps takes a lot of cpu usage. SPA is working properly to control the heating. So, temperature increases and it is normal for the device to heat. Thermal management system is working fine to control heat in the device.

rows.Title: Application icons missing in the folder
rows.Problem: Application icons missing in the folders
rows.Summarized Problem: Application icons are missing from folders in the launcher.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a core UI element, leading to missing icons in folders, but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared.

rows.Title: Battery drains faster
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster and also overheating and lag while normal usage after updating in one ui 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences faster battery drain and overheating with lag during normal usage after a UI update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows significant battery drain and overheating, which are critical issues affecting usability and device performance.

rows.Title: Battery life reduced after One UI update
rows.Problem: Battery life decreased from 8-9 hours to only 6 hours after the One UI update, using 135% battery capacity.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life has dropped from 8-9 hours to 6 hours after the One UI update.
rows.Severity Reason: Device usability is significantly reduced as users can no longer rely on battery life for daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Increased background power consumption by apps and system processes. Countermeasure: Reduce background power usage by optimizing app and system idle behavior.

rows.Title: Always On display not aligned properly
rows.Problem: Always On display things are not aligned properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always On Display elements are misaligned on the screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The misalignment is intentional and part of the design to prevent screen burn-in, not a functional failure.

rows.Title: Battery drains quickly
rows.Problem: Battery drains quickly getting only 2hrs screentime
rows.Summarized Problem: The device battery drains quickly, providing only about two hours of screen time under typical usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is noticeable but not severe enough to render the device unusable or cause data loss, and is attributed to app usage patterns rather than a systemic flaw.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain is normal due to high Instagram usage; no action needed beyond user awareness.

rows.Title: Instagram app causes device to freeze and restart
rows.Problem: Device freezes and restarts automatically when using Instagram or watching reels, with screen freeze lasting up to 2 minutes. Issue occurs after 7 months of usage on a flagship device (S23).
rows.Summarized Problem: Device freezes and restarts when using Instagram or watching reels, with screen freeze lasting up to s2 minutes.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes and restarts during normal usage, making the device unusable for social media functions.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by metadata in HLG images on META's server, which was fixed server-side. No device-specific or software issue.

rows.Title: Device freeze and restart automatically
rows.Problem: Device freezes and restarts automatically, with fast battery drain after updating UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The device freezes and restarts automatically after updating UI 7, causing fast battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to repeated freezing and restarts, leading to loss of functionality and rapid battery drain.
rows.R&D Comment: Iterator type size(256) of uint_8 is smaller than Blob size(426) and it never reach its size

rows.Title: Battery drain quickly
rows.Problem: Battery drains quickly despite using minimum brightness, auto brightness, single app usage, background app management, and optimized performance settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain even with all battery-saving settings enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is severe enough to make the device unusable without frequent charging, impacting daily usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: High CPU usage by GMS due to repeated WiFi scans at 30-second intervals. Countermeasure: No actionable solution on Samsung side; issue is in Google's GMS app.

rows.Title: Word suggestions display in light theme even in dark mode
rows.Problem: When typing in the Samsung keyboard in WhatsApp, the system auto-suggests words and displays them in light theme even when the device is set to dark mode. This behavior started after the UI 7 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung keyboard displays word suggestions in light theme despite the device being set to dark mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI consistency but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The system auto-corrects words due to enabled auto-suggest settings; users can disable this in Samsung Keyboard settings to resolve.

rows.Title: App logo showing Gpay
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7.0, multiple app logos on S22 Ultra appear identical, including WhatsApp, Telegram, PayTM, and Google Pay.
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons on the launcher display incorrect or identical logos, including those of WhatsApp, Telegram, PayTM, and Google Pay.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects multiple apps and causes confusion in app identification, but does not prevent device operation or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared; scheduled for OneUI Home app update on May 9th.

rows.Title: User can unlock device without password or fingerprint
rows.Problem: User can unlock phone without entering password or using fingerprint
rows.Summarized Problem: Users can unlock the device without entering a password or using fingerprint after the update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device can be unlocked without authentication, compromising user security and privacy.

rows.Title: battery drain issue
rows.Problem: Device shows only 3 hours 11 minutes of battery life with 61% consumption after reset and using light performance mode, with only X and Instagram used for several hours each.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain despite using light performance mode and minimal app usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is severe enough to result in short battery life and impacts device usability.

rows.Title: Device goes into DND mode automatically after restart
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, device automatically goes into DND mode upon restart
rows.Summarized Problem: Device automatically enters Do Not Disturb mode after restart following an update to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction of device settings after restart, but does not render the device unusable or lead to data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure are identical and point to Zen mode logs indicating DND settings are not properly configured; no actionable fix found in logs.

rows.Title: Network connectivity issues
rows.Problem: Frequent network and call disconnections after updating to UI 7, causing daily disturbance. Calls disconnect and network drops occur, though LTE is in service and most calls are successful.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience frequent call and network disconnections after UI 7 update, despite LTE being in service.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent call and network drops, but most calls remain successful and no data loss is reported.
rows.R&D Comment: One instance of call drop observed is a network issue; this is a temporary network issue.

rows.Title: Multiple issues observed
rows.Problem: Massive battery draining after UI 7 update, device overheats to boiling level, gaming lag and frame drops occur, not meeting flagship series expectations
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences severe battery drain, overheating, and lag during gaming, especially in BGMI, leading to poor performance and user discomfort.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable during gaming due to extreme battery drain and overheating, with performance lag significantly impacting user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a third-party app (com.imo.android.imoim) consuming excessive CPU resources; the app developer must optimize its code to reduce resource usage.

rows.Title: Home up animation feature doesn't work
rows.Problem: The home up animation feature is not working after update to UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The home up animation feature is not working after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing after an update, but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Camera captures blurry pic & is unable to capture sharp details
rows.Problem: The camera performance has significantly degraded since the One UI 7 update. Image quality, particularly in telephoto and moon/sun photography, is now substantially inferior to the pre-update performance. Issues include blurry images and an inability to capture sharp details, such as the pinpoint depiction of the sun, which is now a diffused smudge.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to capture sharp details, resulting in blurry images, especially in telephoto and moon/sun photography.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera cannot capture sharp details, which is a major functional failure affecting core image capture functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The 1st image is not an original jpg, it is difficult to analyze the cause of the issue. If you could provide an unedited original video, it would be helpful for analysis. In the case of the 2nd image, the sharpness of the leaves in the backlit scene appears to be normal. If you have reference videos from before the update, they would also be helpful for analysis.

rows.Title: Overheating in device
rows.Problem: Heating issues after One UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats after updating to One UI 7, likely due to background activity from third-party apps.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating can lead to device instability, performance degradation, or hardware damage, making the device unusable under sustained use.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Background services in Instagram app consuming high CPU power. Countermeasure: Third-party app issue; Samsung has no control over app behavior.

rows.Title: Device lags and power button not responding
rows.Problem: Device hung for 30-40 seconds during use, power button not responding on long press, eventually restarted on its own
rows.Summarized Problem: The device lags significantly and fails to respond to long press of the power button, causing a hang and eventual restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs for 30-40 seconds during use and fails to respond to a basic function (power button), making it unusable for a period of time.

rows.Title: Wallpaper and style service keeps stopping
rows.Problem: Wallpaper and style service keeps stopping. Can't change clock location and can't use photo ambient wallpaper.
rows.Summarized Problem: The wallpaper and style service keeps stopping, preventing users from changing clock location and using photo ambient wallpaper.
rows.Severity Reason: The service failure prevents core functionality like clock location adjustment and ambient wallpaper use, making the lock screen unusable.

rows.Title: Rotate to landscape mode not working
rows.Problem: The option to enable rotate to landscape mode is not available in settings on Samsung A36 device.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot enable screen rotation to landscape mode in device settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in settings, preventing users from using landscape mode, but device functionality remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Free Grid is enabled in homeup. Countermeasure: Disable Free Grid in homeup to enable screen rotation.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery is draining faster than usual, even though other devices with less battery capacity last longer than this device
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences faster-than-usual battery drain, even compared to devices with smaller battery capacities.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is noticeable and exceeds expectations, but the logs indicate normal discharge rates under typical usage conditions, suggesting a partial malfunction rather than a complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drainage appears normal based on logs; request QA to provide more detailed battery usage logs to validate observed drain.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains quickly after update; factory reset did not resolve the issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain after an update, even after a factory reset.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain renders the device unusable without charging, affecting daily use.

rows.Title: Battery drain and overheating
rows.Problem: Device experiencing battery drain and overheating after update to One UI 7, with high data usage and old Instagram version in use
rows.Summarized Problem: Device suffers from significant battery drain and overheating after updating to One UI 7, likely due to high data usage and outdated app version.
rows.Severity Reason: High data usage and prolonged battery drain indicate potential device unusability and risk of overheating, which can lead to hardware damage or safety issues.

rows.Title: Multiple issues observed
rows.Problem: After the UI 7 update, phone drains battery faster and heats up quickly. Battery consumption increased by 15-25% during usual afternoon charging. User is playing high-power games and using outdated Telegram version, which contribute to power consumption.
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone experiences increased battery drain and overheating after UI 7 update, exacerbated by high-power gaming and outdated app usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Device shows significant battery drain and heating, which can lead to reduced usability and potential safety risks.

rows.Title: Device getting restart on its own
rows.Problem: Phone restarting on its own and becoming very slow after format/reset
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is restarting on its own and has become significantly slow after a reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is restarting and slowing down, which renders it unusable and indicates a major system-level failure.
rows.R&D Comment: There are several UFS link layer errors in the logs. It failed to initialize UFS component with power_fatal_error. This appears to be a hardware issue requiring inspection of the H/W board, interface between AP and UFS component, and signal/power integrity. Customer should be guided to visit service center for inspection.

rows.Title: App opening and closing animations glitch
rows.Problem: App opening and closing animations glitch during screen recording. When opening multiple apps simultaneously, animations glitch, and the screen sometimes flashes or the corner radius of app opening animations becomes boxy instead of rounded, or app closing or opening animation behaves abnormal.
rows.Summarized Problem: App opening and closing animations glitch with boxy corners and screen flashing during rapid app switching.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects animation quality but does not prevent app functionality or cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: From video can't see any defect. Also such fast movement is not normal user scenario

rows.Title: 5G connectivity unexpectedly lost
rows.Problem: 5G connectivity has been unexpectedly lost following the One UI 7 update on Samsung S23, which was not present in the previous One UI 6.1 update. Troubleshooting steps including APN reset, contacting Airtel support, and device restart have not resolved the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G connectivity is unexpectedly lost after the One UI 7 update on Samsung S23.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a partial malfunction that occurs after an update and does not fully disable device functionality, but affects a key network feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Vibration not working when call pick up and call end
rows.Problem: Vibration is not working specifically when call pick up and call end after One UI 7 update, although other vibration settings work normally.
rows.Summarized Problem: Vibration fails to activate when a call is picked up or ended, despite working for other vibration settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The vibration function is partially malfunctioning during call events, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs because the media vibration intensity is set to 0 in the system; changing it to a non-zero value resolves the problem.

rows.Title: Battery draining fast
rows.Problem: Battery drain has significantly increased after the One UI 7 update, reducing daily usage time from a full day to multiple charges. The issue persists despite restarts and setting adjustments.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing significantly faster battery drain after the One UI 7 update, reducing daily usage time and requiring multiple charges.
rows.Severity Reason: The rapid battery drain impacts device usability and productivity, making the device impractical for daily use.

rows.Title: Transition when quick panel is pulled down in landscape mode takes time
rows.Problem: Animations have become inconsistent and slightly laggy during video playback in landscape mode, with the transition when swiping to view quick panel taking one whole second to swipe down
rows.Summarized Problem: The animation when swiping to view the quick panel in landscape mode during video playback is slow and laggy.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable lag during video playback but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.

rows.Title: Now bar not showing on lock screen
rows.Problem: Now bar not showing at bottom of screen after UI7 update on S23 FE
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar does not display at the bottom of the lock screen after the UI7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a key UI element but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Speaker & Mute option not available in ongoing call notification
rows.Problem: Speaker mute options are not visible on notification panel in Samsung S22 Ultra after UI 7 update, showing same design as before on first swipe, latest design on second swipe
rows.Summarized Problem: Speaker mute option is missing from the call notification panel on Samsung S22 Ultra after UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially missing in the notification panel, affecting user experience but not causing device malfunction or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Speaker & Mute option is available when clicking down arrow key in the notification panel. Please guide customer accordingly.

rows.Title: Contact selection automatically changes to random details
rows.Problem: When trying to select a contact for calling, the app automatically changes to random contact details
rows.Summarized Problem: Contact selection in the call app automatically changes to random contact details.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect contact selection during calling, leading to potential miscommunication, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Battery drain faster after update
rows.Problem: Continuous battery drain issue after one UI 7 update. Everyone is facing this. Battery usage exceeds 100% with significant power consumption from background apps like Instagram and WhatsApp.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences excessive battery drain after UI 7 update, with background apps like Instagram and WhatsApp consuming over 100% battery power.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain exceeds 100% and is caused by background apps consuming excessive power, leading to device unusability before charge replenishment.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Background apps like Instagram and WhatsApp consume excessive power. Countermeasure: Third-party app (WhatsApp) is not under Samsung control; power consumption is due to app behavior, not Samsung software.

rows.Title: App icons automatically disappears
rows.Problem: App icons automatically disappear after UI 7 update on S22 Ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons disappear automatically after a UI update on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes the device interface to become unusable as essential app icons vanish unexpectedly.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared.

rows.Title: Device didn't take charge after 93% and got really hot
rows.Problem: Phone stopped charging at 93% and became hot; battery drains quickly
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone stops charging at 93% and becomes hot, indicating rapid battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: The device stops charging and overheats, which can lead to battery damage or safety risks.

rows.Title: Speaker sound interrupts bluetooth audio every time any audio feed start
rows.Problem: Bluetooth audio interrupts whenever there is an audio feed start or stop on the phone, such as scrolling past a video, even though both audio sources work fine afterward.
rows.Summarized Problem: The speaker audio interrupts Bluetooth audio every time an audio feed starts or stops on the phone.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent disruption of audio playback but does not prevent full device functionality or lead to data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs during audio feed start/stop events; logs show no BT playback history. Request for logs during reproduction.

rows.Title: Sort option not there to switch the app drawer in alphabetical order
rows.Problem: No option to sort apps alphabetically in the app drawer, despite requirement for vertical layout
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot sort apps alphabetically in the app drawer, lacking a dedicated sorting option.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a missing UI option for app sorting, which affects usability but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Sort option is available in the homescreen search box. Please click on +3 dots to see

rows.Title: Lag and slow response observed in the device
rows.Problem: After updating to one UI 7, the device shows slow responsiveness, faster battery drain, and noticeable heating on the side. The device feels less fluid with animations.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits slow responsiveness and lag after the one UI 7 update, with increased battery drain and heating.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is experiencing significant lag and heating, which directly impacts usability and stability, making it feel unresponsive and potentially unsafe to use.
rows.R&D Comment: High CPU usage by 'com.google.android.youtube' is causing device heating and performance lag; reassign to relevant team to investigate and optimize app resource consumption.

rows.Title: Phone app and contacts app does not display anything when launched
rows.Problem: Phone app and contacts app do not display anything when launched and phone heating issues are observed along with battery drain
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone and contacts apps fail to display content when launched.
rows.Severity Reason: The apps do not load at all, making core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Large database deletions during onupgrade cause 10-second timeout; Countermeasure: Move onupgrade operation to background and allow recovery via data clearing.

rows.Title: Phone froze and restarted
rows.Problem: Device froze and automatically restarted during video playback
rows.Summarized Problem: The device freezes and automatically restarts during playback of HDR videos with incorrect metadata.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to repeated freezing and restarts during video playback, causing a complete loss of functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Incorrect HDR10+ metadata in HLG-based HDR videos causes infinite memory allocation and kernel panic. Countermeasure: Fixed on META server side; issue no longer reproducible on affected devices.

rows.Title: Unable to take scrolling screenshot
rows.Problem: After One UI® 7.0 update on Samsung S24 Ultra, scrolling screenshots appear different in the gallery despite clicking the scroll screenshot option.
rows.Summarized Problem: Scrolling screenshots appear distorted or different in the gallery after taking them on Samsung S24 Ultra post-One UI® 7.0 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the screenshot function where output is inconsistent, but the core functionality is not completely broken.
rows.R&D Comment: User issue is unclear; requires detailed explanation and recording to analyze the problem.

rows.Title: Battery is draining faster
rows.Problem: Battery is draining faster than before the UI 7 update and selfie camera heats up within 4 to 5 minutes of receiving a call
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains faster than before the One UI 7 update and the selfie camera heats up during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is noticeable but not severe, and the heating issue is observed only during calls, not causing device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery consumption is within normal range due to app usage patterns; no abnormal behavior detected.

rows.Title: People tab not coming in gallery
rows.Problem: People tab not reflecting as category though selected in gallery
rows.Summarized Problem: The people tab is not appearing as a category in the gallery.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a specific context but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The current face analysis service requires reanalysis after updates; taking photos after OS update helps initiate the process.

rows.Title: Battery drain issue
rows.Problem: Battery drain issue after the One UI 7 update. Before the update, the battery was good.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain severely impacts device usability and daily operation, making the device unusable without frequent charging.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is currently under investigation. Once fixed, it will be updated via the Play Store.

rows.Title: Device lags and switches off after update
rows.Problem: Phone suddenly hangs and switches off on its own and drains battery tremendously after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device lags severely and unexpectedly shuts off after the UI 7 update, causing significant battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive and shuts off unexpectedly, rendering it unusable and posing a risk of data loss or hardware damage.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Incorrect HDR10+ metadata in HLG videos from server leads to infinite memory allocation and kernel panic. Countermeasure: Fixed on server side by META; no longer reproducible on devices.

rows.Title: Fast Charging switches to Normal Charging after a few seconds
rows.Problem: Battery drains rapidly when idle. Fast and Super charging do not work; device shows Fast Charging for a few seconds then switches to Normal Charging. Issue persists across different Samsung chargers and cables.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device shows Fast Charging for a few seconds before switching to Normal Charging, resulting in ineffective charging and increased idle battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain fast charging, leading to inefficient charging and significant battery drain, which impacts core device usability.

rows.Title: Graphical glitch during WhatsApp video call
rows.Problem: A brief graphical error occurs when initiating a video call in WhatsApp, followed by the app closing momentarily, though no issues occur during actual calls.
rows.Summarized Problem: A brief graphical glitch occurs when starting a WhatsApp video call, causing the app to close momentarily.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a brief app closure during video call initiation, disrupting user experience but does not prevent full functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Video call app has translucent pixel format leading to visual glitch and app closure. Countermeasure: Add background layer to animate translucent pixel format.

rows.Title: Call background showing blur
rows.Problem: Profile card image becomes blurred when answering a call and cannot be seen, whereas it was previously clear and visible during calls.
rows.Summarized Problem: Profile card image blurs when answering a call, making it unreadable.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility during calls but does not prevent functionality or cause device failure.

rows.Title: Battery drain faster after update to ONE UI 7
rows.Problem: Battery drain faster after update to ONE UI 7 and phone was heating too much
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences faster battery drain and excessive heating after updating to ONE UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows significant battery drain and overheating, which may lead to data loss or device instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Phone overheating during 5G use with non-charging and background app activity causes high power consumption and elevated temperature, leading to battery drain.

rows.Title: Screen froze during Instagram usage
rows.Problem: The screen froze for about ten seconds during Instagram usage, causing disconnection of Galaxy Buds 2 Pro and Galaxy Watch 4 Classic LTE, followed by a phone reboot. This occurs repeatedly and only while using the Instagram app from Google Play Store. Cache clearing and reinstallation have not resolved it.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen freezes during Instagram use, causing device reboot and loss of connected devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen freeze causes device restart and loss of connected peripherals, rendering the device temporarily unusable during app usage.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was resolved on the server side by META. Reproduction is no longer possible on affected devices.

rows.Title: Vibrate when call answered and vibrate when call ends option not working
rows.Problem: Vibrate when call answered and vibrate when call ends both option is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The vibration options for when a call is answered and when it ends are not functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: VibrationSettings media magnitude is set to 0; Counter Measure: Set media vibration intensity to a non-zero value in Settings.

rows.Title: Pictures are blurry even without portrait and even on focusing at one particular point
rows.Problem: Rear camera is taking blurry photos even without portrait mode, and focusing at a point still results in blurry images
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear camera produces blurry photos even when focused on a specific point and without portrait mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to produce clear images under normal usage conditions, making photo capture unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The lens of the wide camera cannot move due to coil fault, gap, or foreign object; recommend camera module exchange and advise against using the phone on bicycles or motorcycles.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Faster battery drain after UI 7 update, provided resolutions not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences faster battery drain after UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain significantly reduces device usability and operational time, making it unusable for daily use.

rows.Title: Battery drain after update
rows.Problem: Device consumes more battery after latest update, screen on time is very low. User plans to sell device and end relationship with Samsung. Previous issue on battery backup raised 2 months ago. GMS logs show WhatsApp app consuming power continuously.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain after the latest software update, with WhatsApp app identified as a major power consumer.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain severely limits device usability and leads to user dissatisfaction and potential device abandonment.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: WhatsApp app consumes excessive power continuously. Countermeasure: GMS analysis indicates WhatsApp is a third-party app with no Samsung involvement; power consumption depends on usage and test cases.

rows.Title: Login issue with Samsung Account
rows.Problem: User unable to login to Samsung Account using email ID. System shows incorrect name or birth date or email not registered, despite correct personal details. Account status shows blocked and email not verified. Likely created by father with possible typo.
rows.Summarized Problem: User cannot log in to Samsung Account due to incorrect name or birth date or unverified email, with account status showing blocked and unverified.
rows.Severity Reason: User is unable to access their account, which is essential for device functionality and personal settings.

rows.Title: Camera quality is not good
rows.Problem: Camera is producing crap quality images frequently despite phone being 3 months old and updated with latest OS
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces low-quality images despite the device being up to date and in good condition.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera is producing consistently poor image quality, which directly affects core functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Please attach the original picture for more accurate problem analysis. We can't check the information taken without the original picture and the debugging information.

rows.Title: Battery drain and overheat
rows.Problem: Device experiences battery drain, overheating, and slow charging after software update. Performance degraded significantly post-update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain and overheating after software update.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable due to rapid battery depletion and overheating, which directly impacts core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is currently under investigation. Once fixed, it will be updated via Play Store.

rows.Title: Battery drains faster
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster and phone starts heating after 20 to 30 minutes
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences faster battery drain and overheating after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery depletion and overheating, which can lead to shutdown or safety risks.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is currently under investigation. Once fixed, it will be updated via the Play Store.

rows.Title: Notification says refining picture after taking a picture
rows.Problem: A notification popup appears saying 'refining picture' and stays for a long time after taking a picture in the camera app
rows.Summarized Problem: A persistent notification saying 'refining picture' appears after taking a picture in the camera app.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification remains for a long time, causing user annoyance, but does not prevent core camera functionality from working.
rows.R&D Comment: The actual log coverage for the situation causing this was absent in the logs. Can you please reupload the logs at the time if this issue occurs again

rows.Title: Quick Panel not working
rows.Problem: Swiping left or right from the screen opens only notifications and does not display other quick panel elements as set in panel settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick panel on the device does not display additional elements when swiping left or right; it only shows notifications.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to provide intended functionality, preventing users from accessing full panel elements, but the device remains otherwise usable.

rows.Title: Media sound gets muted when notification comes while connected to bluetooth
rows.Problem: Media sound gets muted for the duration of notification vibration when connected to bluetooth, even in vibrate mode. This only occurs when notification vibration is synced to the notification sound, not when using a different vibration effect.
rows.Summarized Problem: Media sound is muted when a notification arrives while connected to Bluetooth, specifically when the notification vibration is synced to the notification sound.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete loss of audio playback during notifications, making media consumption unusable in a common scenario.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs due to notification stream volume being muted when vibration is synced to sound; the root cause is not captured in logs, and the countermeasure confirms the same behavior.

rows.Title: Wallpaper and Style keep stopping error pop up occur
rows.Problem: Error pop up occurs consistently in the LockStar app within the GoodLock module
rows.Summarized Problem: The Wallpaper and Style feature in the Lock Screen consistently shows error pop-ups and stops functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: The error causes the feature to stop working, leading to a major functional failure in a core UI component.

rows.Title: Battery backup reduced after One UI 7.1 update
rows.Problem: Battery backup reduced from 7-8 hours to 4-5 hours after updating to One UI 7.1. Tried wiping cache, enabling battery saver, turning off Wi-Fi and Bluetooth scanning, putting apps to sleep, enabling dark mode, setting 60 Hz refresh rate, minimizing apps in RAM, factory reset, and software update from service center. Still experiencing only 4-5 hours of battery life.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life has significantly decreased from 7-8 hours to 4--5 hours after updating to One UI 7.1.
rows.Severity Reason: Device usability is severely impacted as it cannot sustain normal daily use without frequent recharging.
rows.R&D Comment: High CPU usage by YouTube app (24-25%) suggests third-party app inefficiency; Samsung has no control over Google's app code and cannot debug or fix the root cause.

rows.Title: Screen freezes during scrolling Instagram
rows.Problem: Screen freezes during scrolling Instagram after recent UI 7 update. Phone gets stuck with Bluetooth turned off. Only restarting phone resolves the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device screen freezes when scrolling through Instagram, causing usability disruption.
rows.Severity Reason: Screen freezing during scrolling prevents normal use of a core social app and requires constant restart, making the device unusable in practical scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: App-related freezing due to outdated Instagram app or UI 7 update. Countermeasure: Update Instagram app, clear cache and data, restart device.

rows.Title: Time shows horizontal thick line on tiny front screen
rows.Problem: After folding the phone, the tiny front screen shows a horizontal thick line where time should be displayed, covering full screen width
rows.Summarized Problem: A horizontal thick line appears on the tiny front screen where the time should be displayed, covering the full screen width after folding the phone.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visibility of time on the lock screen but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and is only observed under specific usage conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is linked to a third-party app (YouTube Music) and requires user to clear cache and update app; no internal cause identified.

rows.Title: Mobile network Auto option not available
rows.Problem: Unable to set network mode to auto connect
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set mobile network mode to auto connect.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not available, but users can still perform intended operations through intentional settings.

rows.Title: Battery drains faster
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster after updating to one ui 7 and lock screen charging animation is problematic
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's battery drains faster after updating to one ui 7, with additional issues on the lock screen charging animation.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain significantly impacts device usability and operational duration, making it unusable for daily use without charging.
rows.R&D Comment: Cellular Rx signal strength (RSRP): Device was mostly in poor network area and hence drainage is happening

rows.Title: UI lagging after ui7 update
rows.Problem: UI is lagging especially with keywords and overheating occurs
rows.Summarized Problem: The user interface lags significantly after the ui7 update, especially when using keywords, and is accompanied by overheating.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag affects overall usability and is accompanied by overheating, which may lead to device instability or performance degradation.
rows.R&D Comment: Please share symptoms video with same time matching timestamp logs

rows.Title: Battery backup reduced after updating to One UI 7
rows.Problem: Battery life has decreased from two charges per day to three to four charges per day despite unchanged usage patterns.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life has significantly decreased after the One UI 7 update, requiring three to four charges daily instead of two.
rows.Severity Reason: The device requires significantly more charging due to increased power consumption, indicating a major functional degradation in battery performance.
rows.R&D Comment: Instagram app is consuming excessive CPU in background; reported to Meta for investigation and potential fix in v382.

rows.Title: App icon did not change after update
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7.0, app icons did not change even though all apps were updated via Samsung Store
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons remain unchanged after updating to One UI 7.0 despite individual app updates via Samsung Store
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual consistency but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure
rows.R&D Comment: This issue has been fixed in latest OneUI home so please help to check after update from store, thank you

rows.Title: Google app icon not showing
rows.Problem: App icon disappears completely during closing animation
rows.Summarized Problem: The Google app icon disappears completely during the app closing animation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of app visibility, but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared.

rows.Title: System UI isn't responding on opening Samsung Members
rows.Problem: System UI is unresponsive when opening Samsung Members
rows.Summarized Problem: The System UI becomes unresponsive when opening the Samsung Members app.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI unresponsiveness prevents normal device operation and may lead to a complete freeze or crash.

rows.Title: Device gets hanged & touch became unresponsive
rows.Problem: Phone touch stopped working after update, getting hanged for more than hours
rows.Summarized Problem: The device becomes unresponsive and touch input stops working after an update, with prolonged hang periods.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unresponsive, making it unusable for extended periods, which constitutes a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: If user feels sluggish in any scenario, please re-raise the issue without rebooting and share logs and video during the issue time along with describing the scenario where user felt sluggish.

rows.Title: Rear camera flickers
rows.Problem: Rear primary camera vibrates for more than one minute, then returns to normal; vibration is noticeable and felt; issue occurs after software update
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear primary camera vibrates for over a minute after a software update before returning to normal.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera vibration persists for over a minute, rendering the device unusable during that period and indicating a major malfunction of a core camera function.
rows.R&D Comment: UV Damper peeling due to improper assembly and misalignment causes driving force error; improved jig and OVS inspection will address root cause.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster when using Insta, especially during gameplay with Dream Cricket 2025, despite good screen-off discharge rate and no abnormal background behavior.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences excessive battery drain when using Insta and playing Dream Cricket 2025.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain occurs during specific app usage, but not across all scenarios or consistently, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain is caused by high usage of Dream Cricket 2025; the drain is attributed to app-specific performance, not system-level issues.

rows.Title: Slight delay when notification panel is swiped down
rows.Problem: There is a slight delay and lag when swiping down to view the notification panel. Battery drains faster after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience a noticeable lag when swiping down to view the notification panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a minor delay in interface response but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is difficult to reproduce without specific app context and video logs. Additional information is required to identify the root cause and implement a reliable countermeasure.

rows.Title: Long press notification app name overlaps notification text
rows.Problem: Long pressing a notification to enter the notification center renders a broken UI where the app name text overlaps the notification text, regardless of the app
rows.Summarized Problem: App name text overlaps notification text when long pressing a notification to open the notification center.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial UI malfunction but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Call background color tone changes after call ends
rows.Problem: Color tone differs between before and after call ends
rows.Summarized Problem: The background color tone changes after a call ends, differing from the pre-call state.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a visual inconsistency but does not affect device usability or core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: As per attached dumpstate, there are no abnormal logs. This issue cannot be reproduced. Please update the software since there have been changes related to this.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery is draining much faster than usual, even with minimal usage and standard settings, after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain even with minimal usage after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain significantly impacts device usability and daily operation, making it difficult to use the device without frequent charging.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixes available in Continuity Service App (AP3A.240905.015.A2.S711NKSU5CYDA) via Galaxy Store, Instagram; QA to test latest binary and register new PLM if issue persists.

rows.Title: Authenticator in accessibility doesn't turn off when power saving mode is on
rows.Problem: Authorization issue when switching to power saving mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The accessibility authenticator does not turn off when power saving mode is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where a feature fails to deactivate under specific conditions, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This is the intended behaviour of MPSM mode to save battery drainage. MPSM is the same as Google's Battery Saver policy. This is the Google concept.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster after security patch update
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains faster after the security patch update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain significantly reduces device usability and operational time, making it unusable for daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Wake locks from background jobs are holding the device awake. Countermeasure: Reduce wake lock duration for background services.

rows.Title: Device overheating during video calls
rows.Problem: Device overheats during video calls on WhatsApp, Google Meet, and Zoom, even in cool environments and on both Wi-Fi and mobile data, affecting usability and comfort. Temperature rises to about 38 degrees Celsius during calls, which is within normal limits for the scenario.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats during video calls, reaching up to 38°C, which is within normal limits for the usage scenario.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating occurs during video calls but remains within normal thermal limits for the scenario, indicating a partial performance issue rather than a critical failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The log confirms that during WhatsApp video calls, device temperature reaches up to 38°C, which is within normal limits for VT call scenarios, with average current consumption of 954mA and ambient temperature at 26–28°C.

rows.Title: Automatic brightness not working
rows.Problem: Automatic brightness is not working correctly after one UI 7 update. Phone automatically dims down after 30 seconds of usage and brightness needs to be increased manually. I have phone on power saving mode.
rows.Summarized Problem: Automatic brightness function is not working and screen dims after 30 seconds of usage, especially when power saving mode is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a core display feature, where brightness adjusts incorrectly under specific conditions, but does not cause device unusability or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Power saving mode with screen timeout set to 30 seconds was enabled in ONE UI 7.0. Counter Measure: Turn off 'Set Screen timeout to 30 seconds' when using power saving mode.

rows.Title: App icons not changed after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Some app icons look the same as in One UI 6 even after updating to One UI 7. All updates are installed but the issue persists. Is this a bug?
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons remain unchanged from One UI 6 after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the UI where app icons do not update, but the device remains usable and no data is lost.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue has been fixed and user will get the fix version via store in next MR so please help to maintain the current status, thank you

rows.Title: Device lag
rows.Problem: Device is unresponsive and sluggish
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing significant lag and unresponsiveness.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unresponsive and sluggish, making it unusable for basic operations.

rows.Title: Refining process takes too long on clicking pictures
rows.Problem: Image processing takes excessively long after installing One UI 7, failing to complete even after 14 hours despite reducing optimization, clearing cache, and resetting camera.
rows.Summarized Problem: Image refining takes excessively long and fails to complete after prolonged processing time.
rows.Severity Reason: The image processing fails to complete within a reasonable time, causing significant delay and potential device unresponsiveness during use.

rows.Title: Hotspot fails to turn on
rows.Problem: Hotspot fails to turn on after update, requires multiple restarts to recover
rows.Summarized Problem: The hotspot feature fails to turn on after the OS update and requires repeated device restarts to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents the device from establishing a network connection, rendering the hotspot functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Failed to get interface index from scan result notification in wifi logs; Countermeasure: Recommend user to check hardware Wi-Fi chipset and visit service center.

rows.Title: Device getting auto restart
rows.Problem: Phone stuck at restart phase for more than six times after One UI 7 update, indicating abnormal power off issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device repeatedly restarts and gets stuck during the restart phase after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is repeatedly restarting, making it unusable and indicating a critical system failure in power management.
rows.R&D Comment: Abnormal power off issue observed. Please visit the service center to have the device checked for defective parts and get the device fixed.

rows.Title: Selfie camera stops working
rows.Problem: Selfie camera stops working and shows an error. User has tried restart, reset, app deletion, and system update with no resolution.
rows.Summarized Problem: The selfie camera fails to function and displays an error despite multiple troubleshooting attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to work entirely, rendering a core feature unusable, which significantly impacts user experience and device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: CameraService connection failure in camera.qcom.so; Countermeasure: Front camera sensor (S5K3LU) to be checked and replaced at a hardware center.

rows.Title: Purple tint visible when brightness is low and dark mode is enabled
rows.Problem: A purple tint is visible when phone brightness is low and dark mode is enabled.
rows.Summarized Problem: A purple tint appears on the screen when brightness is low and dark mode is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance under specific conditions but does not prevent device operation or cause functional failure.

rows.Title: Battery life significantly decreased after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Battery life significantly decreased following the One UI 7 update. Prior to the update, battery performance was satisfactory without any power-saving measures; all tablet features were used without restriction. Now, feature deactivation is required to maintain acceptable battery life, which undermines the value proposition.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life has significantly decreased after the One UI 7 update, requiring feature deactivation to maintain acceptable performance.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable without power-saving measures, directly impacting core functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: High background power consumption by apps like YouTube, Instagram, and WhatsApp post-Update. Countermeasure: No change detected in power usage metrics; same background time patterns observed.

rows.Title: Alarm sound low after One UI 7
rows.Problem: Alarm volume is too low after One UI 7 update; louder on older device, same issue on multiple devices
rows.Summarized Problem: Alarm sound volume is significantly reduced after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The alarm volume is too low, making it difficult to hear, which compromises usability and safety.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue scenario is not captured in logs; users need to attach logs when the issue occurs to identify the root cause.

rows.Title: Battery Drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster after update, especially when using features like Bluetooth and location, which were previously turned off. The update appears to have introduced a bug causing significant power consumption.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains rapidly after the device update, especially when background services like Bluetooth and location are active.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery depletion, requiring frequent charging and disrupting normal usage.
rows.R&D Comment: GMS app is running continuously in background, consuming significant power; this is a third-party app not under Samsung control.

rows.Title: Battery drain on light usage
rows.Problem: Battery drains quickly even when phone is used lightly
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain even during light usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drains rapidly under minimal usage, making the device unusable without charging.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by continuous app wakeups in screen-off state from a third-party app (YouTube). The countermeasure is to have the third-party app developer fix the wake-up behavior.

rows.Title: Battery drains faster
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster than before. Screen on time has dropped from around 8 hours to barely 6 hours despite using adaptive brightness and light performance profile. User has tried clearing app cache and switching from 5G to 4G, but issue persists. Extra brightness setting in display is enabled, which increases display brightness and leads to higher battery consumption.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's battery drains faster than expected, with screen on time dropping significantly despite using adaptive brightness and low performance settings, likely due to an enabled extra brightness option.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drain is severe enough to impact daily usability, with screen on time reduced from 8 to 6 hours, making the device impractical for regular use.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Extra brightness setting in display increases display brightness and leads to higher battery consumption. Countermeasure: Recommend users disable the extra brightness option for better battery efficiency.

rows.Title: Now brief not getting any activity updates
rows.Problem: Selected all content in service but didn't get any update in now brief
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief feature is not displaying activity updates despite selecting all content in service.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality where updates are missing, but the core feature remains operational under certain conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Now brief works based on user's app usage and context information; users may need to verify app usage and context settings before expecting updates.

rows.Title: Lock Screen shows for a second before turning off after double tap
rows.Problem: After completing minor tasks and locking the phone via double-tap, a one-second delay occasionally occurs before the screen locks, displaying only the wallpaper. This behavior is inconsistent with expected functionality.
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen displays the wallpaper for a second before turning off after a double-tap lock, creating an inconsistent and disruptive user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in screen lock behavior, causing inconsistency in expected functionality, though it does not render the device unusable or lead to data loss.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drain persists after UI 7 update on S24 Ultra, no improvement despite following steps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain after the UI 7 update on S24 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain prevents device usability and may lead to frequent recharging, making the device impractical for daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: Caused by excessive CPU usage from third-party app Truecaller; countermeasure is to direct to app owner for investigation as no commercial agreement exists between Samsung and the app.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drops significantly after 9 hours of use, even with battery saver on, following an OS update. Additional battery consumption occurs while typing a review.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain after extended use, especially following a system update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain leads to device becoming unusable without charging, causing functional disruption during daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Screen color and font become blurry
rows.Problem: Screen color, font, and text appear blurry and not readable. The issue is visible on the device itself but normal when viewed via screenshot on another device. After factory reset, the issue returns after 5 minutes.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen display shows blurry text and colors, making content unreadable, with the issue returning after a short period post-reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects readability but does not cause device malfunction or crash, and resolves temporarily after reset.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by Relumino outline mode being enabled; users should be guided to turn it off.

rows.Title: Battery draining fast
rows.Problem: Battery draining fast after ONE UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device battery is draining rapidly after the ONE UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is causing device to lose charge quickly, making it unusable without frequent recharging.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain caused by apps like Instagram, WhatsApp, and Snapchat consuming high CPU and network resources; countermeasure suggests reducing background activity of these apps.

rows.Title: Video zoom not covering whole screen on Hotstar
rows.Problem: Video zooms only half on Hotstar and YouTube video plays in background without audio, sometimes blacked out
rows.Summarized Problem: Video zoom on Hotstar only covers half the screen and YouTube videos play in background without audio, sometimes blacked out.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial functionality failure in video playback and display, but device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Known app-side issue on Android devices; affects multiple OS versions; requires third-party app fix.

rows.Title: Network switched from 5G to 4G automatically while playing game
rows.Problem: Game connection drops from 5G to 4G after start, persistent for one to two months, reset did not resolve
rows.Summarized Problem: Game loses 5G connection and switches to 4G during gameplay, persisting for months despite device reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent disconnection during gameplay but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi Calling turns off on device restart
rows.Problem: Wi-Fi Calling turns off when the phone restarts. It should remain on after reboot.
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi Calling turns off after device restart and should remain enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to persist after reboot, affecting user experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No log available for Wi-Fi Calling state after reboot. Counter Measure: User must collect logs if Wi-Fi Calling turns off post-restart.

rows.Title: Ghost touch issue
rows.Problem: Ghost touch problems after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience ghost touch problems after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent touch malfunctions but does not render the device unusable or lead to data loss.

rows.Title: phone freezing and then restarting when scrolling reels
rows.Problem: phone freezing and then restarting when scrolling reels
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone freezes and restarts when scrolling reels.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes and restarts during normal use, making the experience unusable.

rows.Title: Device overheat issue
rows.Problem: My device is overheating just from using WhatsApp
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats when using WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats during normal usage, which could lead to performance degradation or damage.

rows.Title: Now bar not working
rows.Problem: Now bar not working on lock screen; AOD display does not show settings
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar feature is not displaying on the lock screen, preventing users from seeing AOD settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing on the lock screen, which is a core part of the user interface and prevents users from accessing AOD settings.
rows.R&D Comment: Duplicate issues exist; the root cause is the same, and this issue should be closed and monitored in P250528-00583.

rows.Title: Device freezes and auto restart
rows.Problem: Phone freezes when using Instagram app, then auto restarts and takes a lot of heat when playing games
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone freezes and auto restarts when using Instagram and generates excessive heat during gaming.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes and auto restarts, making it unusable during app usage and causing significant heat buildup, which impacts core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue originated in META's server due to HDR10+ metadata in HLG images and was resolved via server-side fix; no further action required on device side.

rows.Title: Heating observed in device on using camera or while playing games
rows.Problem: Device gets very hot when using camera app or playing games for 30 minutes, reaching nearly 50 degrees Celsius, despite normal temperature when screen is off
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats significantly during camera use or gaming sessions.
rows.Severity Reason: Device reaches nearly 50°C during usage, indicating potential safety or usability risk due to excessive heat generation.
rows.R&D Comment: Logs coverage is insufficient to analyse the issue; thermal performance under load is not adequately captured.

rows.Title: Degraded picture quality with unusual brightness
rows.Problem: After oneui7 update, photo gets distorted when zoomed in, with degraded clarity, unusual brightness, and poor video stabilisation. The 10x, 3x lenses, and portrait mode 1x and 0.6 show subpar performance with over-exposure, excessive noise, grain, reduced saturation, color, and contrast.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos and videos show degraded clarity, unusual brightness, and poor stabilisation, especially when zoomed in or in specific modes like portrait or 10x/3x.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction in image quality under specific conditions, but does not cause device crash or complete loss of function.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by low quality optimization settings and ProMode lacking HDR support; users are advised to switch to Auto Mode and adjust quality settings to maximum.

rows.Title: Now bar not aligned on lock screen
rows.Problem: Now bar not aligned properly on lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar is misaligned and appears above the fingerprint sensor on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual alignment but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure.

rows.Title: Heating observed in device on using camera
rows.Problem: The device overheats significantly during camera usage, reaching over 45°C even with minimal use and no heavy apps or background processes running. This overheating is not due to device operation peculiarities but rather environmental factors like direct sunlight and low network conditions.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats significantly during camera use, reaching over 45°C, even with minimal usage and no background apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats to over 45°C during camera use, which is a significant thermal issue that could lead to hardware damage or safety risks.
rows.R&D Comment: There are two instances of camera usage found: 1. Temperature rises to 41°C in high environmental temperature and low network conditions due to direct sunlight exposure; 2. Temperature reaches 39°C when using camera in WhatsApp and navigation in multiwindow mode. The heating is attributed to environmental thermal energy, not device operation peculiarities.

rows.Title: Device heating during video playback on YouTube
rows.Problem: Phone overheats while charging and watching videos on YouTube, especially in multiwindow mode with apps like WhatsApp using camera.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats when watching videos on YouTube while charging, especially in multiwindow mode with camera-using apps.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating occurs during normal usage but does not cause device failure or data loss, though it may affect user comfort and long-term battery health.
rows.R&D Comment: While using YouTube in multiwindow mode with camera-using apps, device temperature rises to 41°C; thermal management system is functional and this is within expected charging temperature limits.

rows.Title: Home Screen Icons Alignment
rows.Problem: Home screen icons do not align correctly
rows.Summarized Problem: Home screen icons are misaligned and do not appear in correct positions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual layout but does not prevent device usage or cause system crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not reproducing in the latest ONEUI Home. Will be fixed in Homescreen Version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: Google security version reset to February after update
rows.Problem: Google security version reset from April to February after One UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's Google security update version has been reset from April to February after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The update resets the security version, which affects user trust and device status, but the core functionality remains available.
rows.R&D Comment: Please share image file showing error / video with one set of more logs

rows.Title: Device became unresponsive
rows.Problem: Device became unresponsive; unable to clear apps or notifications, unable to open settings; app drawer not opening; phone was working fine before and suddenly became unresponsive; restart did not resolve the issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device suddenly became unresponsive and failed to respond to basic operations like clearing apps or notifications, with the app drawer not opening and settings inaccessible.
rows.Severity Reason: The device became completely unresponsive to core functions, preventing user interaction with the interface, which renders the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: As per the video, the time is "1:57" and from the logs the dumpstate time is "2025-05-13 23:43:02" and the uptime is only "Uptime: up 0 weeks, 0 days, 4 hours, 15 minutes". So the issue scenario logs are not present. If the issue persists, then register it again and please provide a more detailed explanation of the problem phenomenon along with the proper logs and video of the issue scenario.

rows.Title: Battery performance degraded
rows.Problem: Battery performance degraded with huge battery drain during moderate usage, dropping from 100 to 0 percent in 2-3 hours with only 1 hour of SOT and 10 minutes of gaming
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain during moderate usage, dropping from 100% to 0% in 2-3 hours despite normal health diagnostics.
