rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable within hours of moderate usage due to rapid battery depletion, indicating a major functional failure in power management.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is currently under investigation. Once fixed, it will be updated through the Play Store.

rows.Title: Instagram Reels screen freezes
rows.Problem: Instagram Reels screen freezes repeatedly while using the app on S23 device.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Instagram Reels screen freezes repeatedly during use on the S23 device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent freezing but does not make the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by META server problems with HDR10+ metadata in HLG images and has been resolved on the server side; no further action required.

rows.Title: Notification not showing on lockscreen
rows.Problem: Notification is visible in home screen quick panel but not on lock screen. Issue occurs intermittently and is currently only observed with WhatsApp.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp notifications appear on the home screen quick panel but do not display on the lock screen, intermittently.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is intermittent and affects only a specific app (WhatsApp), resulting in partial functionality failure rather than complete device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Issue not reproducible in latest binary; Counter Measure: Verify in latest binary

rows.Title: Quick Panel settings not expanding fully
rows.Problem: Quick setting panel does not open fully after initial pull and gets stuck at initial view. Scrolling does not resolve it. Issue occurs after upgrading from UI v6 to v7 and resolves intermittently.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Quick Panel settings do not expand fully after being pulled and gets stuck at the initial view, despite scrolling, with intermittent resolution after upgrades to UI v7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the usability of the panel but does not cause device malfunction or data loss; it is intermittent and resolves over time.

rows.Title: Call drops observed
rows.Problem: Connectivity issues, call drops and internet connectivity issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Call drops and internet connectivity issues occur during usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of call connectivity, with intermittent drop events but no complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Server-side authentication error (401 unauthorized) during IMS registration; CP logs needed to verify channel conditions and data flow.

rows.Title: Samsung keyboard not auto fetching OTP
rows.Problem: Samsung keyboard no longer auto fetches OTP from SMS app and shows it on the keyboard
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung keyboard no longer auto-fetches OTP from SMS and displays it on the keyboard.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, but the keyboard still functions for basic typing and other inputs.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Slow document scanning speed via camera
rows.Problem: Document scanning via camera is slow and produces single-file outputs instead of multiple files, requiring PDF format output.
rows.Summarized Problem: Document scanning via camera is slow and generates single-file outputs instead of multiple files.
rows.Severity Reason: The scanning process is slow and produces incorrect output format, but the device remains usable and does not crash or lose data.
rows.R&D Comment: The recognition rate is improving; execution speed will be enhanced in the next version.

rows.Title: Device auto restart while using instagram and also overheating
rows.Problem: Phone gets very hot while using simple apps like Instagram and gets stuck, then restarts itself
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats and restarts when using Instagram, even with minimal app usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts during normal app usage, making it unusable and posing a safety risk due to overheating.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by META server content with HDR10+ metadata in HLG images; it was resolved on the server side and no longer reproducible.

rows.Title: App icon disappearing frequently from folders
rows.Problem: Some app icons are disappearing frequently from Samsung app folders, with names and placeholders still visible. Occasionally, app icon images are mixed between different apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons frequently disappear from folders and are incorrectly mixed between apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of app icon display, causing visual confusion but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared.

rows.Title: Face lock gets activated on its own
rows.Problem: Face unlock option gets activated on its own even when face data is deleted and screen lock face option is turned off, showing error message on lock screen. Issue persists after restart and reappears in a day or two.
rows.Summarized Problem: Face unlock option activates unexpectedly on the lock screen even when face data is deleted and the feature is turned off.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature activates unexpectedly despite being disabled, leading to a visible error and potential user confusion, making the device appear to malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Charge percentage overlap on icon in Battery Status Widget
rows.Problem: Battery Status Widget has charge percentage overloop on icons and Now Bar is not centered in Always On Display
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery status widget displays overlapping charge percentages on icons and the Now Bar is not centered in the Always On Display.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual clarity and consistency in the battery widget but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was not reproducible in the latest binary; QA is advised to verify in the latest build.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery is draining too fast in oneui 7, especially when using youtube, whatsapp, and facebook with high brightness. Screen off battery drain is also high, though normal consumption is reported.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain, especially when using apps like YouTube with high brightness and when the screen is off.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drains too quickly, making the device unusable without frequent charging, especially under normal usage conditions.

rows.Title: Device getting charged very slow
rows.Problem: Slow charging issue persists despite all required steps being taken
rows.Summarized Problem: The device charges very slowly despite all required steps being completed.
rows.Severity Reason: Slow charging prevents effective device usage and may indicate a critical battery or charging system malfunction.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery life is poor
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences excessive battery drain, leading to poor battery life.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain causes the device to lose charge rapidly, making it unusable without frequent recharging.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Frequent app crashes (com.edunext.dpsindrapuramschool) lead to excessive system resource usage and battery drain. Countermeasure: Avoid using the problematic app and ensure all apps are updated to reduce OS compatibility issues.

rows.Title: Ghost touch observed while using Youtube
rows.Problem: Device has auto touch problem after software update, causing frustration
rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits ghost touch behavior during YouTube usage, leading to unintended interactions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes frustration and unintended actions but does not result in device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Suspicious hardware defect in touch sensor panel, possibly due to external impact or moisture. Countermeasure: Guide users to inspect and potentially replace the display panel at service center.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery percentage display missing and battery drains quickly after UI update to UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows missing battery percentage and experiences rapid battery drain after updating to UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: Rapid battery drain and missing battery percentage make the device unusable for daily use, leading to significant functional impairment.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is not occurring with the latest released version; battery consumption increased due to new features in One UI 7, and performance improvements in the latest release will resolve it.

rows.Title: Battery backup reduces
rows.Problem: Battery performance deviates from typical behavior after One UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery backup performance decreases after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a deviation in battery behavior, affecting usage but not causing device failure or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is currently under investigation. Once fixed, it will be updated via the Play Store.

rows.Title: Camera image quality degraded
rows.Problem: After the One UI 7 update, photo and video quality has significantly declined, showing increased noise and loss of detail, especially on the telephoto lens. A factory reset has been performed, but the issue persists. Comparative images before and after the update are provided.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photo and video quality has degraded significantly after the One UI 7 update, with increased noise and loss of detail, particularly on the telephoto lens.
rows.Severity Reason: The degradation in image quality affects core camera functionality and user experience, especially in low-light conditions, making it unusable for high-quality photography.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no change in image quality according to One UI update. The image was taken at high ISO in low light, and the provided image appears to be a processed version, not the original. More original image data is needed for detailed analysis.

rows.Title: Pointer popped randomly around middle of the screen
rows.Problem: Pointer popped randomly around middle of the screen, not resolved after full reset, occurred in last 3-4 minutes
rows.Summarized Problem: The pointer on the launcher randomly jumps to the middle of the screen and is not resolved after a full reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The pointer malfunction occurs intermittently and affects user interaction but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue will be fixed in the Homescreen Version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: Battery drain and heating
rows.Problem: Device gets heating issues and battery drain after security patch update, with performance issues.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain and overheating after a security patch update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain and heating impair device usability and may lead to performance degradation or safety risks.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery asoc is 77% means battery has been degraded by 23% and its efficiency has been decreased. User is advised to go to service center and replace the battery.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Unoptimized battery performance during daily usage and idle drain
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences excessive battery drain during normal daily use and idle states.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain significantly impacts device usability and longevity, leading to frequent recharging and potential device inoperability.
rows.R&D Comment: Power consumption is high due to Instagram running in background; please update Instagram to the latest version.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, low battery backup is noticed. No battery degradation suspected.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience rapid battery drain after updating to One UI 7, with no indication of battery degradation.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is noticeable post-update but not severe enough to cause device unavailability or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: As per logs, drainage appears normal at 0.78% per hour; request QA to provide logs under controlled conditions with background apps removed.

rows.Title: Device has become slow and display refresh rate reduced
rows.Problem: After One UI 7 update, phone has become very slow, display refresh rate reduced, battery backup decreased, camera performance reduced, over heating, and 5G network connectivity low
rows.Summarized Problem: The device has become significantly slower after the One UI 7 update, with reduced display refresh rate and degraded overall performance.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is experiencing severe slowness and reduced refresh rate, impacting core usability and performance across multiple functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain mainly due to third-party apps (InstagramPro, YouTube); recommend updating all apps and ensuring device idle for overnight testing.

rows.Title: Device suddenly resets after ending WhatsApp call
rows.Problem: Device suddenly resets after ending WhatsApp call. Mobile charged was 47%.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device resets unexpectedly after ending a WhatsApp call.
rows.Severity Reason: Device resets after call ends, leading to loss of device state and potential data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please share issue video with matching one more set of logs with timestamp

rows.Title: Wallpaper not showing
rows.Problem: Call background screen shows plain color instead of assigned background or caller background. Camera app is slow when navigating menus and clicking. Weather widget lags and stutters. Battery usage is not auto-marked and is high. Previous version (One UI 6.1) had no such issues.
rows.Summarized Problem: The selected wallpaper does not display on the device screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance but does not cause device malfunction or crash, and only occurs in specific contexts like call background.
rows.R&D Comment: Fix to show default background when contact photo is not saved; will be included in next MR version. Users can configure background via contact photo, profile image, or custom background settings.

rows.Title: Camera failed warning comes up on launching camera
rows.Problem: Still camera not working
rows.Summarized Problem: A warning appears when launching the camera, and the still camera function is not working.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function is completely non-operational, preventing users from taking photos, which is a core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: As per logs, this is a hardware-specific issue; recommend checking the rear camera module and guiding customers to service center for hardware inspection.

rows.Title: Glance not showing for Samsung topics
rows.Problem: Device Samsung Galaxy M30s is not showing glance for Samsung topics since 2024
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen glance feature for Samsung topics is not displaying on the Samsung Galaxy M30s device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element on the lock screen, preventing full functionality but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: WiFi keeps searching network & doesn't connect
rows.Problem: When I try to turn on the WiFi on my device, it keeps displaying searching for wifi and does not connect. I have finished trying network reset also factory reset but still same issue continues.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device continuously shows 'searching for wifi' and fails to connect to any network despite attempts at network reset and factory reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish a WiFi connection, preventing basic internet access and rendering the device unusable for online functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: WiFi chipset cannot power up due to PCIe interface issue. Countermeasure: Hardware inspection of WiFi chipset and PCIe bus is required; users should be guided to visit service center.

rows.Title: Battery drain faster
rows.Problem: Battery life decreased from 6 hours to 4 hours on average usage after updating from ONE UI 6.1 to 7.0, likely due to poor optimization of ONE UI 7.0.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life has decreased from 6 hours to 4 hours during average usage after updating to ONE UI 7.0.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is experiencing significant battery drain, which affects core usability and daily operation, making it unusable for normal tasks.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery consumption has increased by 10 to 20 percentage. Unclear whether clearing cache partition helps and if it affects internal storage.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device battery consumption has increased significantly, with unclear impact of cache clearing on internal storage.
rows.Severity Reason: High battery drain can lead to device becoming unusable quickly, especially under normal usage.
rows.R&D Comment: As per logs, battery drainage is not captured; request QA to provide logs with background apps removed and phone at 100% charge.

rows.Title: Video has high contrast in low light
rows.Problem: HDR10 has contrast problems in low light; video appears high contrast when played on SDR monitors
rows.Summarized Problem: Videos taken in low light with HDR10 appear with high contrast when viewed on standard displays.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video appearance in low light but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to HDR10 content appearing high contrast on SDR monitors; recommended to play on HDR-compatible displays or maintain current image quality level.

rows.Title: Status bar overlaps on main activity
rows.Problem: Status bar glitch when opening notification section of any personal chat on WhatsApp
rows.Summarized Problem: The status bar overlaps the main activity when opening a personal chat notification in WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a visual malfunction during a common interaction but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Significant lag and performance issues
rows.Problem: Device experiences significant lag and performance issues after updating to One UI 7, with sluggish UI, non-smooth app transitions, and reduced responsiveness. Lag persists despite clearing cache and updating apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits significant lag and sluggish performance after updating to One UI 7, affecting UI responsiveness and app transitions.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive during normal usage, significantly impacting user experience and usability of core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: The user is using the device in power saving mode continuously for two days. In power saving mode, performance is prioritized over power saving, limiting device frequency and causing sluggishness. User should switch to normal mode for optimal performance. If issue persists, detailed logs and video are needed.

rows.Title: Device switches from 5G to 4G
rows.Problem: The phone gets hot and switches from 5G to 4
rows.Summarized Problem: The device switches from 5G to 4G when it gets hot.
rows.Severity Reason: The device switches from 5G to 4G during overheating, which indicates a major connectivity and thermal issue that may cause instability or loss of service.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Screenshare icon stays on status bar after ending screenshare
rows.Problem: Screenshare icon stays on status bar even after ending screenshare after updating to one ui 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The screenshare icon remains visible in the status bar after screenshare has ended.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the user interface consistency but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Battery draining fast
rows.Problem: Battery consumption is high due to Instagram running in background; app uses significant power despite dark mode and optimization features not working.
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram app consumes excessive battery in background, leading to rapid battery drain despite existing power-saving features.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is consuming 8.52% of battery in background, causing rapid battery drain, making device unusable without charging.
rows.R&D Comment: Instagram app consumes significant battery in background; recommend updating to latest version to reduce power usage.

rows.Title: Rotate to landscape mode is disabled
rows.Problem: Rotate to landscape mode is disabled
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's ability to rotate to landscape mode is disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, but the device remains usable and does not crash or freeze.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue will be fixed in the Homescreen Version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: Device keeps switching 5G mode to 4G mode always
rows.Problem: Phone slows down, freezes, and overheats after UI 7 update, frequently switching between 5G and 4G mode, requiring flight mode to resolve
rows.Summarized Problem: Device frequently switches from 5G to 4
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain 5G connectivity, forcing user to manually enter flight mode, indicating a critical network instability that renders the device unusable under normal conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Battery drain issue
rows.Problem: I have an S24 FE 5G. After updating to One UI 7, I have a battery drain issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain severely impacts device usability and user experience, making the device unusable without charging.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is currently under investigation. Once fixed, it will be updated through the Play Store.

rows.Title: Audio from the phone’s speaker sounds distorted and crackles
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7.0, audio from the phone’s speaker sounds distorted and crackles, especially at higher volumes during media playback or calls. Bluetooth audio quality is also degraded, sounding tinny and flat across devices.
rows.Summarized Problem: Audio from the phone’s speaker sounds distorted and crackles, especially at higher volumes, with degraded Bluetooth audio quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects sound quality during media playback and calls, but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is not fully reproducible across all scenarios.

rows.Title: App icons missing
rows.Problem: Apps are going blank and texting is getting hang after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons are missing and apps go blank after UI 7 update, causing text messaging to hang.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes apps to go blank and text messaging to hang, making the device unusable for basic functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery is draining fast after update
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains rapidly after software update due to increased CPU usage from Instagram.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable due to rapid battery depletion, impacting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Instagram app increase in CPU usage post-update; Countermeasure: Fix to be implemented in Instagram v382 by META.

rows.Title: No animation when locking device
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, there is no animation and lag when locking the device using Double Tap to Lock or side button. It takes time to lock and sometimes requires pressing the side button twice.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits lag and lacks animation when locking, causing delay and requiring multiple attempts to lock.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable delay in locking but does not prevent device usage or result in data loss.

rows.Title: Scanning and connecting Watch 6 Classic and Earbuds 3 Pro issues
rows.Problem: Degraded performance in scanning and connecting Watch 6 Classic and Earbuds 3 Pro after One UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth connectivity and scanning performance are degraded when connecting Watch 6 Classic and Earbuds 3 Pro after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction in Bluetooth functionality, affecting specific device connections but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Contact search result display issue
rows.Problem: When searching contacts and tapping a result, the display name changes and wrong contact details are used during calling
rows.Summarized Problem: When a contact is searched and tapped, the display name changes and incorrect contact details are used during calling.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect contact information to be used during calls, leading to potential miscommunication, but does not cause device crash or complete failure.

rows.Title: Device overheat causing 5G network to drop to 4G and lag
rows.Problem: Device frequently overheats during multitasking and simple activities like video calls, YouTube streaming, or web browsing, causing 5G to drop to 4G with significant lag. Camera quality has also degraded, especially at 2X and 3X zoom. Issue persists after reset.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats during normal use, leading to 5G drop to than 4G and noticeable lag, with degraded camera quality.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating causes network degradation and performance lag, making the device unusable during normal tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Unofficial app [app.rvx.android.youtube] causes high CPU usage, leading to overheating; recommend removing the app.

rows.Title: Navigation button overlaps on UPI pin screen
rows.Problem: Navigation buttons overlap with the bottom numbers of the keyboard when using gesture input on the UPI pin screen
rows.Summarized Problem: Navigation buttons overlap with the keyboard numbers on the UPI pin screen during payment or balance checks.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial UI malfunction, making input ambiguous but does not prevent device operation or crash.

rows.Title: Apps like chatgpt, instagram keeps crashing
rows.Problem: My phone keeps crashing and is slower after latest ui7 update. Apps keep crashing especially chatgpt and instagram. After switching to safe mode for 2 hours it has become stable. But as soon as i remove safe mode apps keep crashing every 10 minutes
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram and other apps keep crashing after the latest UI7 update, with stability restored only in safe mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unstable and apps crash frequently, especially after a system update, indicating a major functional failure that affects usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Restart device, update app, clear cache and data to resolve crashes.

rows.Title: Device freeze and auto restart while using instagram
rows.Problem: Device freezes instantly and automatically restarts with excessive heat on display and back side
rows.Summarized Problem: The device freezes instantly and restarts while using Instagram, accompanied by excessive heat buildup.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to freezing and automatic restart, with significant heat generation indicating a critical system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Heap overflow occurred due to iterator size (256) being smaller than blob size (426); changed iterator type to size_t to accommodate blob size.

rows.Title: Lock Screen module not working
rows.Problem: The LockStar module is not functional after the UI7 update on tab s9
rows.Summarized Problem: The LockStar module is not working after the UI7 update on tab s9.
rows.Severity Reason: The module is completely non-functional, preventing users from using a key feature of the lock screen.

rows.Title: Multi window display issue
rows.Problem: Multi window display is not proper while playing Instagram, now bar not in center and sometimes tiled towards right
rows.Summarized Problem: Multi window display is not proper while playing Instagram, with now bar not centered and sometimes tiled to the right.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects multi-window functionality but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is not fully disabling the feature.

rows.Title: Lock screen clock alignment issue
rows.Problem: Lock screen clock can't be aligned. It keeps disappearing.
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen cannot be properly aligned and frequently disappears.
rows.Severity Reason: The clock function is partially malfunctioning, causing inconsistency in user experience but does not prevent device usage.

rows.Title: Battery Draining Rapidly
rows.Problem: Battery is draining unusually fast even during idle or minimal use after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain even during idle or minimal use after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is severe and occurs even during minimal usage, leading to device being unusable without frequent charging.

rows.Title: Saved contacts blocked after update
rows.Problem: Saved contacts are being blocked on calls after updating to OneUI 7 with Android 15. Calls from contacts are blocked even when settings show calls unblocked. Restarting device does not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Saved contacts are being blocked during calls after a system update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from receiving calls from their saved contacts, making the device functionally unusable for communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: G shock watch not showing notifications
rows.Problem: Bluetooth notification feature stops working after initial connection; no new notifications appear on the watch despite working on friend's device, same issue on multiple S23 phones; customer care suggests flagship phones may block notifications due to privacy settings
rows.Summarized Problem: The G shock watch fails to receive notifications from smartphones after the initial connection, despite working on some devices, suggesting a compatibility issue with certain phone models.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure across specific devices, not rendering the device unusable, but affecting user experience in a targeted way.
rows.R&D Comment: Logs do not contain sufficient information for BT connection/notification; please capture logs as per steps mentioned & provide dumpstate & btsnoop logs

rows.Title: Unable to turn on Dolby Atmos in game settings
rows.Problem: Dolby Atmos gaming toggle is missing in OneUI 7, unlike OneUI 6. It was previously supported in S24 Plus, but now shows unsupported in Call of Duty. This is a regression from previous version.
rows.Summarized Problem: Dolby Atmos gaming toggle is missing in OneUI 7, preventing users from enabling it in games like Call of Duty.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a new UI version, affecting user experience but does not cause device malfunction or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Dolby Atmos for gaming switch is removed from OneUI 6.1.1 and now turns on automatically when Dolby Atmos is enabled. Call of Duty manages this via third-party app. Current status will be maintained.

rows.Title: Battery draining after updating phone
rows.Problem: Battery draining rapidly after updating phone, was previously functioning well
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone's battery is draining rapidly after an update, despite previously functioning well.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is experiencing rapid battery drain, which significantly impacts usability and may lead to unexpected shutdowns.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Short log file limits analysis; Counter Measure: Request extended battery usage log from 100% to 20% under normal use.

rows.Title: Battery drains faster after updating to One UI 7
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster after updating to One UI 7. Charging speed slows down after 50%, compared to before when it slowed after 80%. Using original Samsung charger (25W adapter & 3A cable), phone takes 80 minutes to fully charge. Only gets 7 hours of battery life.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains quickly and charging slows significantly after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows significantly reduced battery life and abnormal charging behavior, making it unusable under normal usage conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Input current limited by AICL; check TA or cable; if issue persists, hardware check required.

rows.Title: Poor quality of portrait picture's sharpness & tone
rows.Problem: Camera quality has degraded significantly after UI 7 update, with poor sharpness and tone in portrait shots, affecting overall image quality despite high purchase price
rows.Summarized Problem: Portrait photos have significantly degraded in sharpness and tone after the UI 7 update, resulting in poor image quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial degradation of image quality in a specific use case, not complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The Quality optimization option is set to "Minimum" in Intelligent optimization menu of camera option. It may cause the image quality degradation. Please change this option to "Maximum" and try to capture again.

rows.Title: Multiple clock issues, the selected alarm turns white in color and alarm data not visible
rows.Problem: When selecting one or more alarms using long press, the selected alarm turns white in color and the data of that particular alarm will not be visible. When selecting multiple alarms and clicking "Move", it shows 6 folders created but doesn't display the folder names. When selecting any folder, the selection fails to display properly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Selected alarms turn white and data becomes invisible when long-pressed, and folder names are not displayed during move operations.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial malfunction of alarm selection and folder display functionality prevents full use of alarm management features.
rows.R&D Comment: The Group alarm BG and move dialog box along with the background changes for alarm List have been made. Changes are made with the commit id: 070ecdb7f6abbbcd07f79eb748f606c253ff2df0, 8406599ab69991284fea85e5352f47518019fd1a, ff724f1449c109f4533137d0bc9535c526c566a2. Changes will be reflected with the Clock APK version 12.4.10.4 and Theme APK version 15.0.40w.1

rows.Title: picture gets partially black
rows.Problem: Gallery photos are displaying as partially black after the 7.0 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Gallery photos display with partial black areas after the 7.0 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image visibility but does not cause device failure or crash, only a partial display defect.

rows.Title: Gesture swipe from left to go back doesn't work after one UI 7 update
rows.Problem: The gesture swipe from left to go back doesn't work often after upgrade to one UI 7. The right gesture to go back functions work just fine. It's just the left one.
rows.Summarized Problem: The left gesture swipe to go back on the navigation bar fails after the one UI 7 update, while the right gesture works normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a core navigation function but does not cause device crash or data loss, and only impacts one side of gesture input.

rows.Title: Battery drain and heating issue
rows.Problem: Low battery backup and over heating, which was not present in beta version. Request update to overcome this issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain and overheating, especially compared to the beta version.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device to lose battery quickly and overheat, leading to potential device failure or user abandonment.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: WhatsApp app holds partial wakelocks for extended durations. Countermeasure: Limit WhatsApp background data and reduce media auto-download to reduce battery consumption.

rows.Title: Find my phone reset remotely
rows.Problem: A scammer tricked me into logging into a Gmail account linked to an Indonesian location. Shortly after, my Samsung device was remotely reset via the Find My Device feature, despite being connected to my regular home Wi-Fi.
rows.Summarized Problem: A scammer exploited a Gmail account to remotely reset a Samsung device via the Find My Device feature, despite the device being connected to a known home network.
rows.Severity Reason: The remote reset of the device compromises user data and security, enabling unauthorized access and potential data loss.

rows.Title: AOD displays application or widget on lockscreen wallpaper
rows.Problem: AOD displays application or widget on lockscreen wallpaper for a fraction of seconds
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always On Display shows application or widget content briefly on the lockscreen wallpaper.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a brief display of app widgets on the lockscreen, which is a partial malfunction but does not render the device unusable or lead to data loss.

rows.Title: Battery backup issues
rows.Problem: My perfectly performing S23 Ultra has battery issues ever since updating to one UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain after updating to one UI 7, resulting in reduced battery backup.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows excessive power consumption beyond rated capacity, with actual drain exceeding computed values, indicating a major power misuse issue that affects usability.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue belongs to a 3rd party application downloaded from Play Store; no commercial contract exists between Samsung and the app owner, and no source code is available. The issue is attributed to the third-party app's power consumption behavior.

rows.Title: Screen freezes
rows.Problem: Phone freezes and cannot take screenshots or videos; unable to perform actions or send error logs
rows.Summarized Problem: The device screen freezes during use, preventing user interaction and media capture.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unresponsive, preventing any user action or media recording.
rows.R&D Comment: Heap overflow occurred due to iterator size mismatch; resolved by changing iterator type to size_t to accommodate larger blob sizes.

rows.Title: Gesture recognition not working
rows.Problem: Gesture controls are not being registered or are too late, making navigation difficult. Bixby is not understanding voice commands.
rows.Summarized Problem: Gesture controls are not being registered or are too late, making navigation difficult, and Bixby fails to understand voice commands.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of gesture controls and voice command recognition, impacting usability but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Gesture-based actions are being performed normally, but touch is quickly lifted after gesture starts, causing app exit to home screen. Need to confirm if this behavior is the actual issue and check Bixby side.

rows.Title: Camera quality is not good
rows.Problem: Camera quality is not good after update. Previously satisfactory camera quality has degraded, with noticeable differences in image quality and filters after UI 7 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera quality has significantly degraded after the UI 7 update, with noticeable differences in image quality and filters compared to previous versions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of camera functionality, with degraded image quality but not complete failure or device instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide original image. Images can be different in background brightness.

rows.Title: Battery drain issue
rows.Problem: Phone is experiencing reduced battery usage compared to before the update, despite consistent usage patterns. Bluetooth will need to be disabled, but connectivity to Galaxy Watch will be affected.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone is draining battery faster than before the update, even with consistent usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain significantly impacts device usability and user experience, making the device impractical for daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain during screen on state is increased; Instagram CPU overload will be fixed in v382, but overall power consumption issue remains unresolved.

rows.Title: Circle to search doesnt select texts in search
rows.Problem: After first search result, second circle to search does not select text and shows share option instead. Previously, there was an option to select text even if text was not recognized. Icons are big and battery drains 25% faster.
rows.Summarized Problem: The circle to search feature fails to select text after the first search result and instead shows a share option.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work as intended after the first result, preventing text selection, but the core functionality is not completely broken and can be partially worked around.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Google Search app's behavior; countermeasure involves clearing cache of the Google app.

rows.Title: App restarts when switching apps
rows.Problem: Apps do not stay in background; when switching apps, previously opened apps restart, even with sufficient RAM available. This occurs with WhatsApp, games, and other apps. Issue appears after UI 6.1, suggesting memory management problem.
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps restart when switching between applications, causing loss of session state and disrupting user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The app restarts upon app switching, leading to loss of user session and data, making the device unusable for continuous tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: App not started during quick switch, causing previous app to reopen; issue fixed in latest OneUI home APK; update required.

rows.Title: Battery drains fast
rows.Problem: Battery drains fast while device is normal
rows.Summarized Problem: The device battery drains rapidly under normal usage conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is significant under normal usage, indicating potential system-level inefficiency that may lead to device unusability.

rows.Title: Edge Panel leftward slide error
rows.Problem: A leftward slide on panel eight triggers an unforeseen error, halting the intended function and requiring immediate attention.
rows.Summarized Problem: A leftward slide on panel eight triggers an unexpected error, halting the intended function.
rows.Severity Reason: The error halts the intended function, making the feature non-operational and disrupting user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: 3rd party panel has not been updated for latest google OS so please delete 3rd party panel that cause error.

rows.Title: Fingerprint Sensor Not Work
rows.Problem: Fingerprint sensor not working as expected
rows.Summarized Problem: The fingerprint sensor is not functioning properly and fails to respond to biometric input.
rows.Severity Reason: The sensor failure prevents users from authenticating securely, making device access impossible.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Failed communication between AP and fingerprint sensor, likely hardware-related. Countermeasure: Service center inspection of hardware.

rows.Title: Dolby Atmos isn't working in Apple Music
rows.Problem: Dolby Atmos isn't working anymore in Apple Music after updating to One UI 7 with Android 15. No good quality audio, no support of Dolby Atmos in Apple Music after the update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Dolby Atmos audio is not working in Apple Music after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a specific app after an update, but audio processing is still functional when streamed through the app, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Dolby Atmos processing is working when audio streams through Apple Music app; the issue may stem from app-level handling or user settings, and users should confirm whether the problem occurs in phone-side settings or app content support.

rows.Title: Delay between double-tapping to lock the screen
rows.Problem: There is a delay between double-tapping to lock the screen and the screen actually turning off, despite hearing the lock sound immediately.
rows.Summarized Problem: A delay occurs between double-tapping to lock the screen and the screen actually turning off, despite the lock sound being heard immediately.
rows.Severity Reason: The lock screen function is partially malfunctioning, with a delay in actual screen shutdown after user input, but the screen does eventually turn off.

rows.Title: Microsoft apps not opening
rows.Problem: Microsoft apps are not opening after Samsung One UI 7 update on 14.05.2025. Cleared cache, force stopped, uninstalled and reinstalled, but issue persists. Battery drains rapidly from 90% to 6-60% in three hours, which was not happening before the update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Microsoft apps fail to open after the Samsung One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Apps are completely failing to open, making core functionality unusable.

rows.Title: Popup view Shows curropt in Home Screen
rows.Problem: Bug in a pop up view show like this
rows.Summarized Problem: A corrupted popup view appears on the home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the display of a UI element but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: We have checked the issue in the latest binary, but the issue didn't reproduce at our end. The exact root cause is not clear from the provided logs. If the issue persists, please raise a new issue with logs and video attached.

rows.Title: Status Bar Notification icons overlap with the clock
rows.Problem: Notification icons overlap with the clock for a moment when going from lock screen to home screen, happening every time.
rows.Summarized Problem: Notification icons briefly overlap with the clock when transitioning from lock screen to home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a brief visual glitch during screen transition but does not affect device usability or functionality.

rows.Title: Slow charging
rows.Problem: Slow charging on 25w after one ui 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Device charges slowly at 25W after UI 7 update, with heat generation due to the update.
rows.Severity Reason: Slow charging at 25W under normal conditions indicates a major performance issue that affects core functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Heat generation due to device update causes temporary limitation of charging current; device returns to normal charging when in room temperature.

rows.Title: Not showing exposure opinion in camera app
rows.Problem: Not showing exposure opinion in camera app
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera app does not display exposure opinion in normal mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is unavailable in normal mode, but users can access it via pro mode, indicating partial functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: S21FE and all FE models do not support exposure adjustment in normal mode on OneUI 7 or earlier versions. Countermeasure: Users can use pro mode for advanced settings.

rows.Title: Unable to remove sports update from Not Interested part under Search personalisation settings
rows.Problem: Cannot remove sports update from 'Not Interested' section in Search personalisation settings; the option reappears after removal attempt
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot successfully remove sports updates from the 'Not Interested' section in Search personalisation settings, as the option reappears after removal attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, preventing users from fully customizing content preferences, but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to Set Date and Time
rows.Problem: Cannot set the time manually
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot manually set the device's time and date.
rows.Severity Reason: The function is missing, preventing users from manually adjusting time and date, but the device remains otherwise usable.

rows.Title: Rounded Corners Cutting Off Widget Content
rows.Problem: Widget has overly rounded corners, content is cut off, making it unreadable, persists after restart and regardless of resizing.
rows.Summarized Problem: Widget content is cut off due to overly rounded corners, affecting readability.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects usability by making content unreadable, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Ivory filter remove from camera & Photo editor App
rows.Problem: Ivory filter is no longer available in camera and photo editor app after update
rows.Summarized Problem: The Ivory filter is missing from the camera and photo editor app after the update.
rows.Severity Reason: The filter is no longer available, but the core camera functionality remains intact and users can still use other filters.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification
rows.R&D Comment: The Ivory filter was previously provided by a third-party vendor due to contract changes; we are working with the vendor to re-upload it and will introduce user-created filters starting with S25.

rows.Title: network disconnects or 5G signal disappears
rows.Problem: the device either disconnects automatically or the 5G signal disappears when connected to Jio 5G network, while functioning normally on other networks like Airtel
rows.Summarized Problem: The device loses 5G connectivity on Jio network, while maintaining stable connection on other networks.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is network-specific and does not affect all networks, indicating partial malfunction rather than full device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to send video or picture in whatsapp status
rows.Problem: Cannot send video or picture in WhatsApp status on S25 Ultra. Uninstall and reinstall WhatsApp does not resolve the issue. Also unable to delete status.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot send videos or pictures to WhatsApp status and are unable to delete status entries.
rows.Severity Reason: The core functionality of sending media to WhatsApp status is completely broken, preventing users from using a key feature of the device's social interaction tools.
rows.R&D Comment: MediaCodec error during playback prevents media processing; recommend updating media handling in WhatsApp app or patching codec handling in ExoPlayer.

rows.Title: keyboard bottom is getting merged with navigation buttons
rows.Problem: using navigation buttons (not gesture) while on the screen during upi pin entry for payment or balance check, bottom numbers of keyboard merge with navigation buttons. this occurs only with gpay, not paytm. issue between gpay upi app keyboard and one ui 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The bottom numbers of the keyboard merge with navigation buttons when using navigation buttons for upi pin entry in GPay.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality during a critical task (UPI transaction) but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is limited to one app (GPay).

rows.Title: Payment Issue in Galaxy Store
rows.Problem: Money deducted from account during purchase of a font from Galaxy Store, but purchase not completed and option to buy appears already paid.
rows.Summarized Problem: User's payment is successfully processed in Galaxy Store but the purchase is not completed and the option to buy appears as already paid.
rows.Severity Reason: The purchase fails to complete after successful payment, leading to a partial malfunction in the transaction flow.

rows.Title: Display issue on Fold 4
rows.Problem: Inner display goes blank when opened, shows no SIM card detected message for a few seconds, and wifi stops working; device requires restart to recover, with inner display issue persisting.
rows.Summarized Problem: The inner display on Fold 4 fails to function properly when opened, showing no SIM card message briefly and then going blank, with wifi disruption and requiring restart to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The inner display failure prevents normal device usage and causes functional disruption during device operation.

rows.Title: Game booster option not available in gaming hub
rows.Problem: Cannot see the game booster option in gaming hub; reinstallation did not resolve the issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The game booster feature is unavailable in the gaming hub.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a missing feature rather than a device crash or data loss, but it affects user functionality in a specific use case.
rows.R&D Comment: The game booster app is not provided for JDM models due to company policy; this is consistent across all JDM devices.

rows.Title: Scheduling Not work In Dark Mode
rows.Problem: Dark mode should automatically turn off at 7:30 am but stays on even when battery is above 30% and dark mode is set to turn off at that time.
rows.Summarized Problem: Dark mode fails to automatically turn off at scheduled time, remaining active even when battery is above 30%.
rows.Severity Reason: The dark mode does not turn off as scheduled, disrupting user routine and affecting usability of time-based settings.

rows.Title: Separate app sound not working
rows.Problem: Separate app sound not working after one ui7 update on my samsung s21fe
rows.Summarized Problem: Separate app sound functionality is not working after a UI7 update on Samsung S21FE.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a sound feature after an update, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: We tried reproducing the issue but it is not occurring; fixing requires the issue to be reproducible at our end and user needs to reset settings and provide preconditions.

rows.Title: Samsung Pass isn't working
rows.Problem: Samsung PASS isn't working. It's showing that Temporarily not available, Try again later.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Pass app shows 'Temporarily not available' message and fails to function properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional, preventing users from using Samsung Pass as intended.
rows.R&D Comment: Modified the condition to check if it is an FMM lock response. The fix will be distributed via SamsungPass 2Q regular app update.

rows.Title: Heating issues
rows.Problem: Significant heating issues even with limited application usage
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant heating even with only 3-4 apps running.
rows.Severity Reason: The device heats up significantly under normal usage conditions, which could lead to performance degradation or safety risks.
rows.R&D Comment: Temperature rise occurs during app updates, indicating a system-level heat generation issue during background operations.

rows.Title: Battery drain after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Battery drain issue persists after One UI 7 update; user asks if downgrade to One UI 6.1 is possible
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain makes device unusable without charging, severely impacting daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is under investigation; once fixed, it will be updated via the Play Store.

rows.Title: Battery draining fast after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Battery is draining rapidly after the One UI 7 update, previously fine before the update
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains rapidly after the One UI 7 update, despite being fine prior to the update.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable due to rapid battery drain, requiring frequent charging.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Third-party app (Instagram) causing high CPU usage; Countermeasure: Confirm if specific Instagram app version is responsible and verify fix from Instagram side.

rows.Title: Ghost touch
rows.Problem: Phone sometimes automatically touches anywhere on the screen and the issue resolves after locking the screen. This happens unexpectedly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone exhibits unexpected automatic touch actions on the screen, which resolve after locking the screen.
rows.Severity Reason: Ghost touch causes unpredictable screen interactions, making the device unusable until manually reset.
rows.R&D Comment: A73 model lacks TSP Cal data support, leading to abnormal touch baseline during boot; rebooting or powering off/on can temporarily resolve ghost touch.

rows.Title: Unable to image search in gallery
rows.Problem: Phone gallery people image search option is showing after updating UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot perform image search in the gallery after UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The image search feature is not functioning as expected, but the core gallery functionality remains available.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: User enabled 'Gallery labs' which is for internal testing and not stable. Counter Measure: Guide users to disable 'Gallery labs' and restart the gallery app.

rows.Title: Notification Panel is always in dark mode
rows.Problem: After updating OneUI 7.0, the notifications panel is always in dark mode with no transparency or background blur. Users want an option to set background blur intensity.
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel is permanently in dark mode with no transparency or background blur options.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Visibility Issue in NowBar
rows.Problem: When the now bar shows live scores notifications, the score text color becomes white and matches the background, making it invisible.
rows.Summarized Problem: The live scores notification in the Now Bar has white text that matches the background, making it unreadable.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of content in a key UI element but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: AOD turns on automatically when power saver is turned on
rows.Problem: Power Saving Mode does not reduce battery consumption or limit background activities as expected. Features like CPU speed reduction, screen brightness adjustment, or app restrictions do not activate. The battery drains at the same rate as when Power Saving Mode is off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Power Saving Mode fails to activate battery-saving features and does not reduce battery consumption.
rows.Severity Reason: Power Saving Mode is a core battery management feature; its failure results in uncontrolled battery drain and undermines the primary purpose of power saving.

rows.Title: Hang in device observed while using biometric in settings
rows.Problem: See the results
rows.Summarized Problem: Device hangs when using biometric authentication in settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs during a critical user interaction, making the feature unusable and potentially leading to user frustration or abandonment.

rows.Title: Game Plugins FPS monitor not working
rows.Problem: Game Plugins FPS monitor not working after One UI 7 update, shows "unable to run GOS lite" when opened
rows.Summarized Problem: The FPS monitor feature in Game Plugins is not working and shows an error message when attempted to open.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to load but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is not fully broken but missing functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: GamePlugin is no longer supported from Android V-os; functionality has been moved to GameBooster and Good-lock app.

rows.Title: Unlocking is slow
rows.Problem: Unlocking is slow and jerky
rows.Summarized Problem: Unlocking the device is slow and jerky.
rows.Severity Reason: The unlocking process is slow and jerky, making it difficult to use the device efficiently, which impacts usability and overall user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Please share one more set of logs with matching video and timestamp

rows.Title: Wifi takes time to connect and detect
rows.Problem: Frequently used Wi-Fi network Mywifi2.4 is not connecting automatically after detection, unlike in OneUI 6.1. This issue occurs after the OneUI 7.0 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to automatically connect to a frequently used Wi-Fi network after the OneUI 7.0 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work as expected but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The automatic Wi-Fi connection feature fails when Mobile Data is off; data usage and location permissions are required for detection.

rows.Title: Camera image quality degraded
rows.Problem: Camera quality and color tone have been downgraded after UI 7 update, especially in 1x, 2x, and 3x lenses in portrait mode. Saturation and sharpness are too high, making pictures look unrealistic, dark, and grainy with excessive noise, particularly in portrait mode across all lenses.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera image quality has degraded after UI 7 update, with increased noise, unrealistic color tones, and poor sharpness in portrait mode across all lenses.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera performance is significantly compromised, resulting in unrealistic and grainy images that affect user experience and photo reliability, especially in common usage scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: The image quality degradation is due to sensor pixel size limitations in low light with 2x and 3x lenses; photos appear blurry due to hand tremors, and the issue is exacerbated by high saturation and sharpness settings.

rows.Title: Faster battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains 25-30% faster than before after updating to One UI 7, with same setup and usage conditions.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains 25-30% faster after updating to One UI 7, despite consistent usage and charging conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a noticeable increase in battery consumption but does not cause device unavailability or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Multiple wake-up calls detected from YouTube app; issue is third-party and outside Samsung's control; recommend clearing cache in YouTube app.

rows.Title: Airtel 4G data not working
rows.Problem: Airtel 4G data is not working sometimes
rows.Summarized Problem: Airtel 4G data connectivity is intermittent and unreliable.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent failure of a network feature, preventing consistent data access but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Not able to play Freefire max on mobile data
rows.Problem: The game does not start or load when using mobile data or power saving mode, even on Wi-Fi. It works only when both mobile data and power saving mode are disabled.
rows.Summarized Problem: FreeFire max game fails to start or load on mobile data and when power saving mode is enabled, even on Wi-Fi.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects game launch under specific network and power settings but does not completely disable device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Gemini doesn't show camera option
rows.Problem: Gemini live camera option is not available on S23 Ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: The Gemini live camera option is missing on the S23 Ultra device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not available, but the device remains usable overall.
rows.R&D Comment: Gemini is a Google application; issue reported to Google (b/438038696).

rows.Title: Device overheating
rows.Problem: Device heats up to 43 degrees C, causes lag and FPS drops during gaming
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats to 43 degrees C, causing lag and FPS drops during gaming.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheating leads to lag and performance drop, making gameplay unresponsive and device unusable under load.
rows.R&D Comment: Heating is suspected due to high CPU consumption by system_server; ambient temperature, network conditions, data throughput, and GFX usage also impact thermal behavior. No current mitigation actions are in place.

rows.Title: Chat service registration notification persists after registration
rows.Problem: Chat service shows as not enabled and repeatedly prompts to enable, despite multiple prior registrations
rows.Summarized Problem: The chat service registration notification persists even after successful registration.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature repeatedly prompts users to register when it is already done, leading to a poor user experience and potential frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Device becomes noticeably hot during normal usage
rows.Problem: Device becomes noticeably hot during normal usage such as while charging, during voice or video calls, and when using basic apps or watching videos. This overheating raises concerns about battery health and long-term device performance.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during normal usage, including while charging and using apps, raising concerns about battery health and long-term device performance.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating during normal usage makes the device unusable and poses a risk of battery damage and safety issues.

rows.Title: Unable to install Key Cafe
rows.Problem: KEY CAFE INSTALLATION GETTING CANCELLED
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot install the Key Cafe app during setup.
rows.Severity Reason: The app installation process is cancelled, preventing users from accessing a core feature.

rows.Title: Unread email count not updating in app
rows.Problem: After last update, Samsung email does not clear notification for read email. If any email received, notification appears on top left, but after reading email, it does not clear. Even after closing the app, the email icon shows unread emails, e.g., if 2 emails received, after reading both and closing app, it still shows 2 unread emails.
rows.Summarized Problem: The app fails to update the unread email count after reading emails, showing incorrect unread notifications even after closing the application.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect notification display but does not prevent app usage or cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: We are not able to reproduce this issue at our end. If the issue is still reproducing, please raise the issue again with proper video and logs along with reproduction steps for further analysis.

rows.Title: Not receiving calls from MT side
rows.Problem: Network issue for two months; receives call notifications but cannot hear ringtone; needs frequent restart; network sound is very bad; tried all networks, sound still poor
rows.Summarized Problem: Device fails to receive calls from the mobile side due to poor network audio quality and inconsistent call reception.
rows.Severity Reason: User cannot hear incoming calls or receive them at all, making communication impossible and rendering the device unusable for basic phone functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Gmail content hides behind keyboard when email body is long
rows.Problem: Email body content gets hidden behind keyboard when longer, requiring keyboard to be closed to see content. UPI pin keypad buttons are also cut off after update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Email body content is hidden behind the keyboard when longer, requiring user to close keyboard to see it.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial functionality is impaired as users cannot see their email content while typing, affecting usability but not causing device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Samsung Health is slow and lagging
rows.Problem: Samsung Health is slow and lagging
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Health app experiences slow and lagging performance.
rows.Severity Reason: The app suffers from partial malfunction due to background processes causing delays, but does not completely fail or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Background processes cause app state to wait for events; issue is not reproducible in latest version and will not occur.

rows.Title: Notification blocker option not available
rows.Problem: Gaming options like game priority, booster, FPS, CPU temperature are missing. Notifications blocker is also missing after recent update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification blocker and gaming features such as game priority and FPS are no longer available after the recent update.
rows.Severity Reason: Gaming features and notification blocking are partially missing, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by incorrect configuration; users should use 'Do not disturb' in Mode & Routine settings. A countermeasure is provided to guide users to the correct setting path.

rows.Title: Quick panel overlaps the home app screen
rows.Problem: The full quick settings panel appears on the home screen even though the notification drawer has not been pulled down, floating above apps. This happens intermittently and restarts temporarily fix it.
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick settings panel incorrectly appears on the home screen, floating above apps and interfering with app usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial disruption of the home screen experience but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Scroll capture not working in call logs
rows.Problem: Scroll capture is not working in call logs after update. It used to work flawlessly before, and now the scroll capture button is missing in call logs, while it appears in other apps perfectly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Scroll capture functionality is missing in call logs after the update, despite working previously in the same app and in other apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working in a specific context (call logs) but still works in other apps, indicating a partial malfunction rather than a complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The allowlist that supports screenshot scrolling does not include Call Logs; a structural change to a view-based comprehensive screenshot scroll is needed for One UI 8.0.

rows.Title: Split window not working properly with physical keyboard
rows.Problem: Alt tab shifts between two apps in split screen and now considers split screen as a single app, causing multitasking between two or three split screen apps to fail when using a physical keyboard
rows.Summarized Problem: Split screen multitasking fails when using a physical keyboard, as alt tab now treats split screens as a single app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction in multitasking functionality but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.

rows.Title: Tracking auto focus not working
rows.Problem: Tracking auto focus not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera's tracking auto focus function is not working.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing, making the camera unable to perform a basic tracking function.

rows.Title: Lag in device
rows.Problem: Phone became choppy after updating to One UI 7, lagging significantly even while writing this report
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant lag after updating to One UI 7, particularly during normal usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag makes the device unusable during regular operations, impairing user experience significantly.
rows.R&D Comment: Instagram app is consuming high CPU usage; this is a third-party app with no Samsung involvement, and the issue is not attributable to Samsung software.

rows.Title: Android Auto communication error
rows.Problem: Android Auto showing error after major update to S24 Ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: Android Auto displays a communication error after the S24 Ultra software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The error occurs after a software update and affects app connectivity, but users can mitigate it by disabling Android Auto in Secure Folder.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to Secure Folder and Android Auto connection, currently under investigation by Google; users can disable Android Auto in Secure Folder to resolve temporarily.

rows.Title: Google speech recognition using mic despite denied access
rows.Problem: Google's speech recognition app uses the microphone without permission even when access has been explicitly denied, raising privacy concerns about One UI's permission enforcement.
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Assistant continues to use the microphone despite user-denied permissions, violating privacy expectations.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue allows unauthorized access to microphone input, posing a significant privacy risk and undermining user trust in device security.
rows.R&D Comment: The root cause is insufficient log data post-reboot; countermeasure is to guide users to collect logs immediately after reproduction.

rows.Title: Unable to image search in gallery
rows.Problem: Cannot see people in gallery search options. Only location and documents available when people search category is enabled in settings
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot see people in gallery search options despite enabling the people search category.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially missing—people search is available but not functional, limiting usability without full failure of the system.
rows.R&D Comment: The face analysis service requires full reanalysis when new engine is applied, especially in OneUI7 and Android 15, which explains the delay in detecting people in search.

rows.Title: Swipe down from right side on Instagram stories
rows.Problem: Swiping down from the right side on Instagram Stories grayes out the complete screen
rows.Summarized Problem: Swiping down from the right side on Instagram Stories grayes out the entire screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The gesture is not functioning as intended, preventing user interaction with Instagram Stories, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Instagram app gesture handling issue. Countermeasure: Recommend updating app to latest version and clearing cache; issue may be third-party.

rows.Title: BT device gets auto-connected after disconnecting
rows.Problem: Bluetooth device reconnects automatically after being disconnected, even when not manually reconnected or after Bluetooth is turned off. User had to unpair and re-pair the device to stop it.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth device automatically reconnects after being disconnected, causing user to need to unpair and re-pair the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent connection problems but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The device (Grandi10) attempts to reconnect after disconnection, and the phone cannot control this behavior.

rows.Title: Not able to check contacts or call anyone
rows.Problem: After installing the latest software update, the contacts app is not functioning properly and the user is unable to check contacts or make calls, despite caller ID being active.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot check contacts or make calls after a software update, rendering the phone unusable for basic communication.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from using the phone for essential communication functions, making it unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Large database deletions during onupgrade exceed 10-second timeout, preventing provider execution. Countermeasure: Modify onupgrade to operate in background; clear local contacts data and re-sync with Samsung/Google.

rows.Title: Google Play Protect is off and no option to turn it on
rows.Problem: No option to turn on Google Play Protect in system settings or Play Store after updating to One UI 7 (Android 15).
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot turn on Google Play Protect due to missing options in system settings or Play Store.
rows.Severity Reason: The absence of a security feature (Google Play Protect) compromises device security, making it vulnerable to malware and unauthorized access.

rows.Title: App icon shows older after update
rows.Problem: App icon shows older version from ONU UI 6.1 even after updating to ONE UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons display outdated version despite OS update to ONE UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual consistency but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not reproducing in the latest ONEUI Home. Will be fixed in Homescreen Version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: Processing notification message after closing incognito tab
rows.Problem: Screen freezes for a few seconds when processing a notification after closing the incognito tab, despite sufficient RAM and storage.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen freezes for several seconds when processing a notification after closing an incognito tab.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a temporary freeze but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not reproducing in the latest ONEUI Home; will be fixed in Homescreen version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: App display overlaps while minimizing
rows.Problem: Scheduled light and dark mode not working; must manually enable after each restart. Tile malfunction during minimization.
rows.Summarized Problem: App display overlaps and malfunctions when minimized, with scheduled light and dark mode failing to persist after restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of UI elements but does not prevent device operation or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Spotify plays on its own when phone is opened
rows.Problem: Spotify music automatically plays after phone is opened, during calling or using camera, despite being paused beforehand.
rows.Summarized Problem: Spotify automatically plays music when the phone is opened, such as during calls or camera use, even when previously paused.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a feature (workout mode) that triggers unintended media playback, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The workout mode triggers media playback when apps like Dialer or Camera are opened; users can disable this mode to prevent the behavior.

rows.Title: Now bar not showing live sports score
rows.Problem: Now bar is not showing live sports scores. Not seeing live notifications for scores from Sports from Google in Lock screen (Now bar). Have configured all the settings as required.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar on the Lock Screen is not displaying live sports scores or notifications from Google Sports.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a key notification area, preventing users from receiving real-time sports updates, but the device remains usable overall.

rows.Title: weather app showing wrong location
rows.Problem: weather app shows incorrect location when user is in Lengpui
