rows.Summarized Problem: The weather app displays the wrong location when the user is in Lengpui.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect weather information but does not prevent app usage or cause device malfunction.

rows.Title: Bluetooth icon missing in status bar
rows.Problem: Bluetooth icon is missing from the status bar after the UI 7 update, preventing users from seeing device connectivity at a glance
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth icon is missing from the status bar after UI 7 update, hindering users' ability to see device connectivity at a glance
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user visibility of device connectivity but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss

rows.Title: Now bar not showing live sports score
rows.Problem: The now bar for live sports stopped showing after clearing the live sport notification from the notification panel. Turning the now bar on/off does not restore it
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar for live sports scores is not displaying after a notification was cleared from the notification panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality of a key UI element but does not cause device crash or data loss, and can be partially resolved by user action.

rows.Title: Alarm not working
rows.Problem: Alarm not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The alarm function is not working because the alarm sound is disabled in the alarm settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The alarm fails to play sound due to master sound being off, which prevents users from hearing the alarm, but the core alarm functionality remains partially active.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Master alarm sound is off in alarm settings. Countermeasure: User should enable alarm sound in the Clock app under Alarm tab.

rows.Title: Black screen during screen transition in apps
rows.Problem: Black screens with lines appear during screen transitions in some apps, such as WhatsApp video call and flo app, when moving between screens.
rows.Summarized Problem: Black screens with lines appear during screen transitions in apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs during a screen transition, affecting visual experience but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue belongs to a third-party application; no source code or commercial contract exists between Samsung and the app owner. Requires app owner investigation.

rows.Title: Touch is not responding on those particular areas
rows.Problem: Touch is not responding on those particular areas after updating to UI 7.0. Touch sensitivity has decreased. Device was used normally until the issue appeared. Testing with *#0*# shows non-responsive touch areas. Samsung members device diagnosis shows full touch dots, but issue reoccurs.
rows.Summarized Problem: Touch is not responding on specific areas of the screen after UI 7.0 update, with reduced sensitivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents basic interaction with the device, such as typing, and affects core functionality of the screen.
rows.R&D Comment: Touch sensor in display module has HW defect (Tx channel 13 is cracked). Display module should be checked and replaced if necessary at Service center.

rows.Title: Static noise in video specially on black area
rows.Problem: Static noise in video specially on black area even on bright part of also around flower still not sharp and clear
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recordings show static noise, especially in black areas and around flowers, with poor clarity and sharpness.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video quality in specific conditions but does not cause device crash or complete failure, limiting usability in certain scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: The noise is caused by high ISO settings in slow motion mode; countermeasure is to maintain current settings and guide users to avoid slow motion in low light.

rows.Title: Flight mode do not turn on/off properly
rows.Problem: Airplane mode is not turning on properly, making it impossible to turn off. Requires restart to resolve
rows.Summarized Problem: Flight mode fails to turn on and off properly, requiring a device restart to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents proper use of flight mode, making it impossible to disable without a restart, rendering the device unusable in certain scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs to diagnose the issue.

rows.Title: Lag while launching gaming hub
rows.Problem: Device becomes significantly slow during launch of gaming hub, with high RAM usage and slow processing speed after update, even after cleaning RAM.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant lag when launching the gaming hub, with slow processing speed and high RAM usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable during gameplay launch due to severe lag and slow processing, impacting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: New charging animation not shown on the lockscreen
rows.Problem: New charging animation not shown in phone
rows.Summarized Problem: The new charging animation is not displayed on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The animation is missing from the lock screen, which is a partial malfunction of a visual feature, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The charging animation is shown on the top-right status bar instead of the Nowbar, indicating a display positioning issue in the lock screen UI.

rows.Title: Internet browsing and apps takes long to load and open
rows.Problem: Since the last update, the internet browsing has become very slow, even when internet speed is high and stable. All the apps takes a lot of time to load, load images and open web pages. Only facing this issue since the last update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Internet browsing and app loading are significantly slow after the last update, despite stable internet connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects core functionality of internet access and app usability, making device operation inefficient and frustrating.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No Samsung browser or Chrome usage logs; Instagram in-app browser usage detected. Request to reassign owner. Countermeasure: Restart device and update Instagram app.

rows.Title: Sports not shown on now bar
rows.Problem: Sports scores are not showing on now bar for the last two days, even during live games. All required settings are enabled and teams are followed.
rows.Summarized Problem: Sports scores are not displaying on the now bar despite live games and proper settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a specific context (live sports scores) but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Modes and smart view button overlap
rows.Problem: Sometimes the mode button is above smart view button
rows.Summarized Problem: The mode button overlaps with the smart view button on the quick panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visual overlap but does not prevent device operation or cause functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Phone heats up while using Instagram
rows.Problem: When using Instagram, the phone heats up and the battery drains very quickly. This issue started after the latest update and persists even after uninstalling and reinstalling the app. No such issues existed before the update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone overheats and battery drains quickly when using Instagram.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats during normal usage, which can lead to performance degradation or safety risks.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Instagram causing high CPU usage, now fixed by Instagram. Countermeasure: Clear app cache and data.

rows.Title: battery life is coming in only 5 to 5:30 hours
rows.Problem: My battery life is coming in only 5 to 5:30 hours. It's very short. Its battery in ONE UI 6. It lasted 7 to 8 hours. Now it has become very low. And the phone is getting very hot. Uploading videos through feedback. You can watch this of battery life. It's very low. It needs to be improved and send it to the Firmware team.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's battery life has significantly decreased to only 5 to 5.5 hours of usage, and the phone is getting very hot during use.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery life is extremely short, which makes the device unusable for normal daily use, and overheating indicates potential hardware or system-level instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating caused by Instagram app CPU overutilization has been observed. Improvement of the Instagram app is required.

rows.Title: App icon size gets back to default
rows.Problem: App icon size changes back to default after customization, especially after updating to One UI 7. Settings no longer apply consistently, requiring manual reconfiguration each time.
rows.Summarized Problem: Customized app icon size resets to default after updates, requiring frequent manual reconfiguration.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of user customization, but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue with the homeup has been fixed. An alternative option exists in home screen settings to adjust icon size and labels.

rows.Title: Navigation Bar Open Google Assistant by swiping corner is not working
rows.Problem: Opening Google Assistant by swiping the navigation bar corner is not working after UI 7 update. No setting found for this feature. Tried switching to Google Assistant and Grmini, but still doesn't work. Feature may have been removed.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot open Google Assistant by swiping the corner of the navigation bar after UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing after an update, but the core navigation functionality remains intact; users can't access the feature but can still use other functions.

rows.Title: UI often becomes unresponsive
rows.Problem: The UI often becomes unresponsive, causing the mobile to freeze for a few seconds before restarting. This issue started after the updates on 19th May.
rows.Summarized Problem: The user interface frequently becomes unresponsive, causing the device to freeze for a few seconds before restarting.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent freezing but does not render the device completely unusable or result in data loss.

rows.Title: Video blurry at 0.5x
rows.Problem: Video becomes blurry and grainy at 0.5x zoom level, persists after latest One UI 7 update and despite troubleshooting efforts.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video quality degrades and becomes blurry and grainy when using 0.5x zoom.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video clarity at a low zoom setting but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: HSI2C error interrupt and ACK not received during write operations; Countermeasure: Same as cause, indicating a hardware-level communication issue in the camera subsystem.

rows.Title: serious software issue detect popup
rows.Problem: receiving pop up message regarding serious software issue but no update available
rows.Summarized Problem: Users receive a pop-up message indicating a serious software issue, but no update is available.
rows.Severity Reason: The pop-up indicates a serious software issue, which may lead to device instability or malfunction, and no update availability suggests a critical system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please help provide video with same time video matching timestamp. Counter Measure: Please help provide video with same time video matching timestamp

rows.Title: Ghost window appears when swiped from top with 2 fingers in Dex mode
rows.Problem: In an app opened in full screen in Dex mode, when swiped from top with 2 fingers, a "ghost window" appears. This translucent ghost window is additional to the app already open in the background in full screen mode. When the same thing is done for one more time, another such window appears (with the previous window remaining in place), and the system stops responding, and touch does not work.
rows.Summarized Problem: A ghost window appears when swiping from top with two fingers in Dex mode, leading to system unresponsiveness and touch failure.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes system unresponsiveness and touch failure, making the device unusable during operation.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a Dex window leak. The DeX will be fully changed from OneUI 8.0, so please check with OneUI 8.0 MR.

rows.Title: Degradation in camera quality
rows.Problem: Camera quality has significantly degraded since the UI7 update, resulting in consistently poor output and severely impacting user experience for photography and videography.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera quality has deteriorated significantly since the UI7 update, leading to poor image and video output.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of camera performance, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is irreproducible; both UOS and VOS use the same solution libraries and configurations, suggesting the problem may be environment-specific or not rooted in code.

rows.Title: Unable to run: GOS Lite error
rows.Problem: Game plugins removed; reinstalling app shows "Unable to run: GOS Lite" which affects gaming skill
rows.Summarized Problem: Game plugins no longer work and show an error when reinstalled, preventing game execution.
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents game execution, which is essential for gaming skill, making the device unusable for gaming.
rows.R&D Comment: GamePlugin is no longer supported from Android V-os. The individual app setting function has been changed to the main function of GameBooster, and the rest of the functions will be supported through the Goodlock app. Please delete GamePlugin app.

rows.Title: Weather lockscreen not working properly
rows.Problem: Weather lockscreen shows inappropriate weather conditions, such as fog when it's sunny or raining, and sometimes shows no data at all. Tried resetting apps and clearing data without success.
rows.Summarized Problem: The weather lockscreen displays incorrect or missing weather data, showing fog instead of actual conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The lockscreen displays incorrect weather data, leading to user confusion and a major malfunction of a core feature on the home screen.

rows.Title: picture quality is not good
rows.Problem: Poor quality photos with blurred edges, lack of focus, low detail, and low clarity in zoom shots. Captured images consistently show poor quality regardless of usage conditions.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos captured by the camera have poor quality, with blurred edges, lack of focus, and insufficient detail, especially in zoom shots.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to produce clear, focused images under normal use, resulting in consistently poor photo quality that undermines core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: User did not allow autofocus to stabilize before capturing. Counter Measure: User did not allow autofocus to stabilize before capturing.

rows.Title: Device getting overheat in idle state
rows.Problem: Device overheats significantly when idle, even with no background apps running and all settings optimized. Screen usage time drops to 5-6 hours max after UI 7 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats when idle, even with no background apps and optimized settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats significantly when idle, which can lead to performance degradation or hardware damage, making it unusable under normal conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Heating instances observed when using third party app Instagram; CPU load of the app is suspected to be the cause; requires further review from third party side.

rows.Title: Content not compatible with phone
rows.Problem: App shows error saying 'This content isn't compatible with your phone' when opening on Galaxy F55 running Android 14, asking user to contact content provider for support
rows.Summarized Problem: Good Lock app shows compatibility error on Galaxy F55 running Android 14, preventing access to LockStar and Task Change features.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to launch with a compatibility error, preventing access to specific features, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: App Icon Not Changed after One UI Update
rows.Problem: Icons design did not change after One UI 7 update, despite all apps being updated
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons do not update after One UI 7 upgrade, remaining as One UI 6 style.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of UI elements, not affecting device usability but impacting visual consistency.
rows.R&D Comment: It is confirmed that ThemePark AppIconPack is applied. The AppIconPack was created for One UI 6 and appears in One UI 7 devices. A new ThemePark AppIconPack for One UI 7 must be recreated to apply updated icon styles.

rows.Title: Lock Screen Clock Animation Not Working
rows.Problem: The new lock screen clock animation does not work on the Tab S9 FE; the clock appears statically when the screen is woken up with no animation.
rows.Summarized Problem: The new lock screen clock animation fails to appear or animate on the Tab S9 FE device.
rows.Severity Reason: The clock animation is missing entirely, but the core lock screen functionality remains intact and the feature is not fully broken.
rows.R&D Comment: Animation in motion clocks is not supported due to system GPU limitations.

rows.Title: Torch and side switch off button not working
rows.Problem: Torch function and side switch off button are not working after update. Camera light A works but other functions do not. Device usability is affected as torch is a critical feature.
rows.Summarized Problem: Torch function and side switch off button are not working after software update, affecting core device usability.
rows.Severity Reason: Torch is a critical function for device usability, and its failure renders a key feature inoperable after update.

rows.Title: System error message displays on launching Bixby
rows.Problem: Bixby is not working properly after One Ui 7 Update. Simple Works lags after Update. Samsung Message is missing after One Ui 7 Update
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby is not working properly after the One UI 7 update, with missing Samsung Message and lag in Simple Works.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial malfunction of Bixby functionality after update, with missing features and lag, but device remains usable.

rows.Title: keyboard disconnects intermittently
rows.Problem: samsung tab s9 ultra original keyboard disconnects intermittently, leading to repeated keystrokes and other disruptions. the problem stops if touchpad is turned off. ps. i have updated to one ui 7 and tried all the solutions posted online and on members community and didnt solve the issue. some people are posting that only replacing the keyboard with new unaffected one can solve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The BT keyboard on the Samsung Tab S9 Ultra disconnects intermittently, causing repeated keystrokes and disruptions, and stops working when the touchpad is turned off.
rows.Severity Reason: The keyboard disconnects intermittently, leading to repeated keystrokes and disruptions, which severely impacts device usability and input functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The comment provided is insufficient to identify the timing and nature of the issue. Please ensure that when a problem occurs, you record the incident for at least -1 minute along with timestamp information (e.g., the time displayed on the screen) and immediately secure the logs.

rows.Title: Weather App is Not showing correct information
rows.Problem: Weather app shows incorrect location as Lakanpur when user is actually at Banharpalli, Odisha, India, with temperature discrepancy of 38°C vs 37°C for locations 16 km apart
rows.Summarized Problem: Weather app displays incorrect location and temperature data, showing Lakanpur instead of the user's actual location Banharpalli, Odisha, India.
rows.Severity Reason: The app shows a wrong location and temperature, which is a partial malfunction affecting accuracy but does not cause device freeze or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Directed this issue to TWC. To be registered as an improvement item in TWC and to be monitored for improvement. [Note] This location data is commonly shown not only by Samsung but also by all partners, and it takes time to improve.

rows.Title: Mobile network not working
rows.Problem: Mobile network not working during calls, though mobile data works and VoLTE is enabled
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile network fails during calls despite VoLTE being enabled, while mobile data works.
rows.Severity Reason: User cannot make calls, rendering the device unusable for basic communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Countermeasure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Galaxy bud manager widget background not transparent
rows.Problem: Galaxy buds manager widget has a black background instead of transparent, which looks out of place compared to other app widgets that have a blur effect.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy Buds manager widget has a black background instead of being transparent, making it visually inconsistent with other app widgets.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual consistency but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: User advised to update device and clear cached data; issue not reproduced in latest version.

rows.Title: A blue circle appears on the screen while scrolling
rows.Problem: A blue circle appears while scrolling through apps and disappears when recent apps are removed. It reappears after some time.
rows.Summarized Problem: A blue circle appears intermittently during app scrolling and disappears when recent apps are dismissed.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI consistency during navigation but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Defense codes and modifications for this phenomenon will be applied to OneUI 8.0. The problem will be solved by touching the scroller.

rows.Title: Overheating
rows.Problem: The device gets hot while using the camera, even without background apps or in a cool room with a fan. The thermal sensor reaches around 61°C within minutes, despite being updated and having a factory reset.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during camera use, reaching 61°C within minutes despite being in a cool environment and with no background apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device reaches high temperatures during normal use, which may lead to performance degradation or safety risks, indicating a critical thermal issue.
rows.R&D Comment: In Samsung camera usage, device temperature reaches up to 42°C with 30% CPU and 26% camera usage; thermal control operates well and prevents further heating, suggesting a temporary heating event under load.

rows.Title: Error message pops up on launching secure folder
rows.Problem: Secure Folder shows "App not compatible with your phone's operating system" error when trying to install after updating to One UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: Secure Folder fails to install on Galaxy S24 after One UI 7 update, showing an incompatibility error.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to install, preventing users from accessing a core security feature, making the device less usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: User deleted Secure Folder app via adb; Countermeasure: Install via Galaxy Store; Factory Reset if needed

rows.Title: Fingerprint recognition requires pressure
rows.Problem: Fingerprint recognition requires pressing hard to work after an update
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint recognition requires significant pressure to work after an update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a core biometric function, requiring user effort to operate but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Contact expand often shows another contact
rows.Problem: When tapping a contact to search, it often expands another contact instead of the intended one
rows.Summarized Problem: Tapping a contact to search incorrectly expands another contact instead of the intended one.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction in contact search functionality but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by real-time list refresh during contact expand due to Samsung Search frequently searched contacts order changes. The fix prevents list redraw on FSC order changes, updating only when actual contact data changes or during re-render.

rows.Title: Update darwainbox App not possible
rows.Problem: Unable to update darwainbox app after UI update 7.0. Battery drains very fast and heating occurs during extended phone use.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot update the darwainbox app after UI update 7.0, and the device experiences rapid battery drain and heating during prolonged use.
rows.Severity Reason: The app update failure prevents essential functionality, and battery drain and heating impair device usability during normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: No abnormal heat generation was observed when using apps such as camera, YouTube, and Twitter, with temperatures remaining at around 37°C. Current consumption averaged 689mA under LTE/WiFi and non-charging conditions.

rows.Title: App history removal during call removes phone call app
rows.Problem: Removing a background app from app history during an active call removes the call app, leaving no way to end the call on my side. The person on the other end must end the call.
rows.Summarized Problem: Removing a background app from app history during an active call removes the call app, making it impossible to end the call on the user's side.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents the user from ending a call, rendering the device unusable in a critical situation.
rows.R&D Comment: In the attached logs, the complete logs capturing call scenario are not present. From logs it is not possible to analyse the issue properly. Request you to please provide dumpstate logs capturing the complete issue scenario

rows.Title: Front Camera not working
rows.Problem: Front camera not working and face lock not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera is not functioning, and face lock is also not working.
rows.Severity Reason: The front camera failure prevents basic device functionality such as facial recognition and photo capture.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: I2C error during sensor initialization; Counter Measure: Swap front camera module

rows.Title: Alarm background changes to Spotify interface when setting Spotify song as alarm
rows.Problem: When setting a Spotify song as alarm, the alarm background automatically changes to Spotify's interface and users can no longer customize the alarm background.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users can no longer customize the alarm background when setting a Spotify song as alarm, as it automatically changes to Spotify's interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the alarm customization feature, preventing user control over background settings but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The change is now a normal operation in oneUI 7, displaying the current playing song's image and gradient background as per the latest clock guide.

rows.Title: battery drain
rows.Problem: Update causes battery drain on Z Fold 4, device not allowing entry into recovery mode
rows.Summarized Problem: Z Fold 4 experiences significant battery drain and fails to enter recovery mode after an update.
rows.Severity Reason: Device fails to enter recovery mode and shows abnormal battery drain, indicating potential system instability and device unavailability.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain is caused by poor network conditions and limited log coverage; countermeasure confirms same root cause.

rows.Title: Lockstar app not functioning
rows.Problem: Lockstar app has not been functioning since the OneUI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The Lockstar app is not working after the OneUI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is completely non-functional, preventing users from using the Lockstar feature entirely, which is a core lock screen function.

rows.Title: One Ui home is not responding
rows.Problem: One Ui home is not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The One UI home screen is not responding to user interactions.
rows.Severity Reason: The home screen fails to respond to user actions, impacting usability but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. Also as no release is planned for OS 14 and following issue is not occurring in latest OS 15 launcher apk. Please help to update to latest OS.

rows.Title: loud read notifications in Modes and Routines aren't working
rows.Problem: loud read notifications in Modes and Routines aren't working
rows.Summarized Problem: Loud read notifications are not functioning in Modes and Routines settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in specific settings, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: As per logs, there are no modes & routine set. Please provide logs if issue still reproducible.

rows.Title: Screen casting unable to set screen size to monitor
rows.Problem: Unable to set screen size to that of my monitor (Samsung M7). Even with aspect ratio set to Full screen on connected device, the aspect ratio remains that of the mobile device.
rows.Summarized Problem: Screen casting fails to match monitor aspect ratio, showing mobile device aspect instead of monitor's full screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects screen alignment during casting but does not cause device crash or data loss, only a partial display mismatch.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Sports from Google option not appearing in Now Bar Setting
rows.Problem: The live cricket score option is still not showing. All settings are perfect, now bar doesn't show on lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The live cricket score option from Google is not appearing in the Now Bar setting, and the Now Bar does not display on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a key interface, but the overall device remains usable and core functions operate normally.

rows.Title: Processing notification message at the bottom of the screen after closing incognito tab
rows.Problem: When swiping to remove a notification from the status bar, such as closing a private window in Google Chrome, the screen shows 'processing notification' and then freezes, preventing use of other apps. This occurs across multiple apps and is not limited to Chrome.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device screen freezes for several seconds after removing a notification, especially from private browser windows, disrupting app usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen freeze prevents user interaction with other apps, making the device temporarily unusable during the freeze.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a Chrome issue within the GMS bundle; reported to Crbug with IDs 416181574 and 424066119. Google will address it in future Chrome updates.

rows.Title: Internal error of the device pops up on launching the app
rows.Problem: Facing this issue with GoodLock application
rows.Summarized Problem: The Good Lock app crashes with an internal device error when launched.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on launch, preventing user access to the feature, which is essential for device security.

rows.Title: Spam call blocking not working
rows.Problem: Spam call blocking feature is unable to block unwanted calls, despite user attempts to restart and check app settings. Issue persists over several days.
rows.Summarized Problem: The spam call blocking feature is failing to block unwanted calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely failing to function, preventing users from blocking spam calls, which is a core usability function.
rows.R&D Comment: It is difficult to determine the exact timing of the issue, making analysis challenging. If you could capture the phenomenon and dump the logs at the moment the problem occurs and upload them, we can further investigate. When capturing, please ensure that the time of the incoming call causing the issue is displayed.

rows.Title: Battery widget not displayed on homescreen
rows.Problem: Battery widget does not display battery percentage of Samsung Watch 3 on home screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery widget on the home screen fails to display the battery percentage of Samsung Watch 3.
rows.Severity Reason: The widget fails to show battery percentage, which is a partial malfunction of a key battery-related feature, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Auto app installation
rows.Problem: Google Play Store installed an app without user permission, despite App Protection being enabled. User wants to know how to safeguard the phone and prevent unauthorized installations.
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Play Store installs apps without user consent, even when App Protection is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of app installation controls, allowing unauthorized app installs without user awareness or permission.
rows.R&D Comment: Disable Auto-Install in Google Play Store Settings to prevent unauthorized app installations.

rows.Title: System UI Not Responding
rows.Problem: System UI not responding error message shows frequently during fast multitasking and when closing apps, starting after the May 1, 2025 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The System UI fails to respond during multitasking and app closure, causing frequent unresponsiveness errors.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI freezing during common user actions makes the device unusable and disrupts user workflow.

rows.Title: Samsung Wallet not working
rows.Problem: Samsung Pass is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Pass functionality is not working due to incorrect PPP value initialization during registration with KnoxMatrix EscrowVault.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents core authentication functionality from working, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: PPP information overwritten with initialized 0 value during registration with KnoxMatrix EscrowVault. Countermeasure: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Homescreen lag
rows.Problem: Software not working properly, always keeps lagging, themes colours not comfortable for eyes
rows.Summarized Problem: The homescreen experiences persistent lag due to poor software performance and inefficient app execution.
rows.Severity Reason: The device remains unresponsive during normal use, impacting usability and causing user frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: Performance issue: ART is interpreting bytecode instead of running native code, leading to high CPU usage and slow app launch; multiple apps are optimized/interpreted simultaneously during boot, unlock, and idle, increasing CPU load and device temperature.

rows.Title: Multi control is not working
rows.Problem: Multi control is not working. It is showing that accessibility feature is turned on.
rows.Summarized Problem: The multi-window feature is not functioning properly and shows accessibility feature is turned on.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working but does not completely disable device usability or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Upon unsubscribing, a pop comes up
rows.Problem: When selecting unsubscribe in a text message, a popup frequently flashes or refreshes
rows.Summarized Problem: A popup frequently flashes or refreshes when users select unsubscribe in a text message.
rows.Severity Reason: The popup refreshes intermittently, causing user confusion but does not prevent core functionality or cause device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is reported to Google for concept verification/limitation. Please help to check it out in latest version of AM app.

rows.Title: Device gets locked on its own
rows.Problem: phone is getting locked frequently while using it, sometimes it's get locked just after opened it
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone frequently locks itself shortly after being opened, even while in use.
rows.Severity Reason: The device locking unexpectedly during usage makes it unusable and disrupts normal operation.

rows.Title: Front camera starts clicking picture
rows.Problem: Front camera continuously takes pictures without any user gesture
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera continuously takes pictures without any user gesture or action.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera operates without user input, leading to unintended photo capture, which disrupts user experience and may result in privacy concerns or device malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Pushing arcsoft library v290 (with v289 as base) with reduced misrecognization (false positives) rate

rows.Title: Calendar widget font too small
rows.Problem: Calendar widget font is extremely small and buttons are almost touching the edges
rows.Summarized Problem: The font size in the calendar widget is too small and buttons are nearly touching the edges.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual consistency and usability but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue will be fixed in the Homescreen Version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: Glitch while unlocking the phone
rows.Problem: While unlocking my phone it first shows AOD then goes back to lockscreen. This glitch started today after the update
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone shows AOD before returning to lockscreen during unlocking, causing a glitch in the unlock flow.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes an inconsistent user experience during unlocking but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: System not responding
rows.Problem: System not responding again and again, causing restart and excessive hang
rows.Summarized Problem: The system frequently hangs and restarts, causing significant lag and unresponsiveness.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to repeated hangs and restarts, severely impacting user experience and functionality.

rows.Title: App icon disappears or duplicates
rows.Problem: Home screen icons sometimes disappear and show wrong icons for apps. No Bluetooth icon appears in notification bar when device is connected.
rows.Summarized Problem: Home screen app icons intermittently disappear or show incorrect icons, and Bluetooth notification icon is missing when connected.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the home screen interface, affecting app visibility and user experience, but does not prevent device operation or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed isTransparentDrawable to be initialized to false when iconView is cleared. It is scheduled to open on 5/9 with OneUIHome App Update.

rows.Title: Lag in using TalkBack
rows.Problem: Phone lags when using TalkBack, despite having a more powerful processor than previous model. User with blindness relies on TalkBack and reports poor performance.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone lags when using TalkBack, a screen reader essential for visually impaired users.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag impacts usability for a user with blindness, but the issue does not cause device crash or data loss, and functionality remains partially available.

rows.Title: Key notifications not working properly
rows.Problem: Special word notifications like report and parichay are not triggering when received
rows.Summarized Problem: The device does not trigger routine notifications for specific keywords like 'report' and 'parichay' when notifications are received.
rows.Severity Reason: The routine fails to activate on keyword matches, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, only missing expected functionality.

rows.Title: Search option not working properly
rows.Problem: Search option in notes is not working properly as i am unable to search a word even in small document
rows.Summarized Problem: The search function in the notes app is not working properly, preventing users from searching words even in small documents.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot perform basic searches in small documents, resulting in partial functionality failure but device remains usable.

rows.Title: Clicked pictures are blurry
rows.Problem: camera is taking blurr photos
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos taken by the camera appear blurry.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to capture clear images, resulting in a partial malfunction of the photo-taking function.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Maximum protection feature is consuming more battery than basic protection, raising concern about its efficiency.
rows.Summarized Problem: The maximum protection feature is consuming more battery than the basic protection feature, leading to excessive battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is causing significant battery consumption, which renders the device unusable for extended use without charging.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is currently under investigation. Once fixed, it will be updated through the Play Store.

rows.Title: Private share crashes when launched
rows.Problem: Private Share app crashes every time upon launch
rows.Summarized Problem: The Private Share app crashes every time it is launched.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes every time it is launched, making the feature completely unusable.

rows.Title: Jio sim not working properly
rows.Problem: Jio SIM shows full signal but internet is extremely slow or doesn't work at all on Samsung Galaxy A9 tablet. Device shows RACH failures and poor network connection despite correct SIM and network settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: Jio SIM shows full signal but internet connection is extremely slow or non-functional on the tablet due to RACH failures and poor network performance.
rows.Severity Reason: Device fails to establish stable network connection, resulting in no or very slow internet, rendering the device unusable for basic online functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: RACH failures due to weak signal area and poor frequency performance. Countermeasure: User should move to a better signal area; if issue persists, service center check required.

rows.Title: Tap and pay does not work
rows.Problem: Tap and Pay feature is unavailable on Galaxy M55s 5G despite NFC being present and Wallet installed, and despite being advertised at launch
rows.Summarized Problem: The Tap and Pay feature is missing and unavailable on Galaxy M55s 5G despite NFC and Samsung Pay being installed and advertised at launch.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing, preventing a core user functionality (payment) from working on a device advertised to support it.
rows.R&D Comment: We support only Mini for M55 and same is updated as part of APP Confirmation. https://dna.sec.samsung.net/ssb/createnewapp/66b9d34e1b918a47adb2f85c

rows.Title: Home screen display color looks very dull
rows.Problem: After upgrading to oneui 7, the screen colours faded. It looks dull and it can not be resolved
rows.Summarized Problem: The home screen display color has become very dull after upgrading to OneUI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure.

rows.Title: Sports from google not displayed on the Now Bar
rows.Problem: The google sports on nowbar don't work
rows.Summarized Problem: Google sports content is not displayed on the Now Bar.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing content display but does not cause device malfunction or crash.

rows.Title: Animation not working on lock screen clock style
rows.Problem: Animated clock style does not show any animation effect when changing clock style on lock screen, while it works properly on other Samsung devices.
rows.Summarized Problem: The animated clock style on the lock screen fails to display animation effects when changed, despite working correctly on other Samsung devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual feedback of a feature but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and is limited to a specific UI element.

rows.Title: Now bar only showing Spotify and no other app
rows.Problem: Now Bar only shows Spotify and not other apps, despite user settings being fully configured.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar on the lock screen only displays Spotify and does not show media notifications from other apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a feature, where only one app is supported instead of all apps, but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue does not reproduce in logs; only Spotify notifications are received. Request for user video and logs to confirm reproduction.

rows.Title: Clock style setup on lock screen
rows.Problem: Lock screen clock animation is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock animation on the lock screen does not appear when setting up clock styles.
rows.Severity Reason: The animation is missing during clock style setup, affecting visual feedback but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure.

rows.Title: Blinking in apps observed while launching
rows.Problem: Blinking of apps while launching and nav bar not transparent
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps blink when launching during app startup animation.
rows.Severity Reason: The blinking occurs during app launch but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes, only affecting visual consistency.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is fixed with commit: 5ca96bb7147bdf890024625027604911e6c47a2b7, app launch animation params has been updated.

rows.Title: Vibrate when answered or call ends
rows.Problem: Vibrate when call answered or ended not working despite all settings in place
rows.Summarized Problem: The device does not vibrate when a call is answered or ends, even when vibration settings are configured.
rows.Severity Reason: The vibration function is not working under normal settings, but the overall device remains usable and no data loss or crash occurs.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Vibration settings set to zero in media usage; Counter Measure: Adjust media vibration intensity to a non-zero value in Settings > Sounds and Vibration.

rows.Title: Transition when quick panel is pulled down in landscape mode takes time
rows.Problem: Quick panel lags slightly when opened in landscape mode or fullscreen during light usage with power saving mode off
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick panel lags when pulled down in landscape mode or fullscreen during normal usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs during light tasks and does not cause device unusability or data loss, but results in noticeable lag during common operations.

rows.Title: Notification panel shown instead of quick panel on swipe
rows.Problem: Notification panel opens when swiping from both sides instead of quick settings panel when dragging from the right side
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to access the quick settings panel by swiping from the right side; instead, the notification panel opens.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user expectation for accessing quick settings but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Current user action is not to pull down from statusbar. It's launcher swipe one and it opens notification panel only. If you want to pull down quick setting directly, please pull down from statusbar (indicator) area.

rows.Title: Network automatically shifts from 5G to LTE
rows.Problem: The network automatically shifts from 5G to LTE and this is just too frequent and the frequency even doubled after the OneUI7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently switches from 5G to LTE, especially after the OneUI7 update, causing inconsistent network performance.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves frequent network switching, which affects connectivity stability but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Modes and smart view button overlap
rows.Problem: Quick options in notification panel randomly overlap between smart view and modes panels
rows.Summarized Problem: Smart view and modes buttons overlap in the notification panel quick options.
rows.Severity Reason: The overlap causes partial malfunction of the quick panel interface, affecting user experience but does not prevent device operation.

rows.Title: Camera lags at wide angle
rows.Problem: The wide-angle camera freezes or lags when switching to the lens, while the main 1x camera works fine. The issue started with One UI 6.1 and persists after One UI 7 updates, even under cool conditions and with no overheating.
rows.Summarized Problem: The wide-angle camera lags and freezes when used, despite the main camera functioning normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera freezes during use, making it unusable for photo and video capture, which is a major functional failure in a core feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: YT video resolution changes to 480p when trying to switch to 2160p
rows.Problem: YouTube automatically switches from 4K to 480p when attempting to watch 4K videos, and screen recording at 2160p stops when this happens.
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube automatically drops video resolution to 480p when users try to watch 4K content, disrupting viewing and screen recording experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing 4K content and interrupts screen recording functionality, making core video features unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: YouTube app version 20.20.36 (outdated) with known resolution handling bug. Countermeasure: Update app to latest version, clear cache, and verify behavior; if persists, issue is 3rd party.

rows.Title: optical image system twitching noise
rows.Problem: The main camera has a twitching noise from the optical image system that occurs only once when accessing the primary camera.
rows.Summarized Problem: The optical image system produces a twitching noise when the primary camera is accessed.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs only once per access and affects camera operation but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: ois system twitching sound comes while opening camera. Counter Measure: Update latest mcu fw (LS23_R33M)

rows.Title: Remaster feature not working
rows.Problem: The Remaster feature in the Gallery app produces dark images after updating to One UI 7, while it was working correctly just minutes before the update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Remaster feature in the Gallery app now produces dark images after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is no longer working correctly, causing degraded image quality, but it is not causing device crash or complete failure.

rows.Title: Device lags in app launch and normal operations
rows.Problem: Performance and RAM management has been reduced after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant lag during app launch and normal operations after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device lags severely during app launch and normal operations, making basic usage difficult and impacting usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The available logs lack sufficient information to thoroughly examine the performance issue; users should be guided to report via Samsung Members with screen captures of the issue.

rows.Title: Vibrate when answered or call ends doesn't work
rows.Problem: None of the services attached in the screenshot is working. It could be a bug.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device does not vibrate when a call is answered or ends.
rows.Severity Reason: The vibration feedback is a critical function for call interaction, and its absence makes the call experience unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Not able to select Call Type
rows.Problem: Unable to select 'Call Type' option for reporting spam calls to Hiya service after updating to OneUI 7.0.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot select call type when reporting spam calls to the Hiya service.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in the spam call reporting flow, preventing users from reporting spam calls, but the core device functionality remains usable.

rows.Title: Lockscreen display zoomed in
rows.Problem: Lockscreen gets zoomed in automatically, showing only the top left quadrant when the phone is locked, occurring only at night and not during the day. The issue happens randomly and is observed upon waking up.
rows.Summarized Problem: The lockscreen display is zoomed in, showing only the top left quadrant when the device is locked, especially at night.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the usability of the lockscreen but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and only occurs intermittently.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was not reproducible in the latest binary; kindly verify in the latest device version.

rows.Title: dxf and dwg format files showing in gallery
rows.Problem: Dxf and dwg format files showing in the gallery after the one UI update
rows.Summarized Problem: DXF and DWG file formats are incorrectly displayed in the gallery after a UI update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where specific file types appear in the gallery, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: At Android 15, the MIME type of DWG files changed to images, causing them to appear in the gallery. This issue was reported to Google and resolved via Play Store updates; a temporary workaround is acceptable.

rows.Title: Security policy prevents installation of secure folder
rows.Problem: Unable to access secure folder after UI update showing security error
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access the secure folder after a UI update due to a security policy error.
rows.Severity Reason: The secure folder is a core security feature; its unavailability prevents users from accessing protected data, making the device insecure and unusable for sensitive tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: As per logs, device owner (DO) was created and later removed; factory reset is recommended to restore secure folder access. Maintain current status.

rows.Title: Camera not starting up
rows.Problem: Camera not working after software update from version 14 to 15
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to start after a software update from version 14 to 15.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera is completely failing to start, rendering a core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: There are no camera related logs in the attached file, it seems the attached logs are not properly taken at the issue time. Please help to reboot the device and reproduce the issue again and take logs just after reproducing the issue. Also help to attach video of the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to restore backup after installing Smart Switch PC app
rows.Problem: Smart Switch PC app shows backup but unable to restore. After updating, it shows no backup even after manually specifying path. Reinstalling restores backup but again unable to restore. BackupHistory.xml file is removed during uninstall, affecting backup list.
rows.Summarized Problem: Smart Switch PC app fails to restore backups after installation or update due to missing BackupHistory.xml file upon uninstall.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot restore critical data, making the feature unusable and leading to data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: BackupHistory.xml is removed during uninstall; users must manually register backup folders via the app menu path to restore data.

rows.Title: Camera not available
rows.Problem: Camera app is not available to update
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera app is not available for update.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera app is missing from updates, but the device remains usable and core functions are not fully disabled.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. Also as no release is planned for OS 14, requesting to please maintain as no more release planned.

rows.Title: Sound quality is not good
rows.Problem: Audio quality is very poor during video or audio recording in Laud Music DJ events; music is not clear compared to other phones, same situation on Galaxy M55s
rows.Summarized Problem: Audio quality is poor during recording in music events, unlike other phones.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction during recording, not complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: We request user to provide logs covering video recording scenario to verify the issue; no recording logs are available in current logs.

rows.Title: Capture images have poor quality
rows.Problem: Front and back camera images are unclear and have poor quality, despite cleaning the lens and restarting the phone multiple times
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera captures images with poor quality, appearing blurry and dull regardless of cleaning or phone restarts
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function does not perform as expected, but it is not completely non-functional or causing device crash or data loss

rows.Title: Lag observed in the device
rows.Problem: phone is lagging too much and it gets stuck in one place, automatically restarts, and sometimes loops to power off
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences severe lag, freezing, and automatic restarts.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to frequent freezing and restarts, indicating a major system instability.
rows.R&D Comment: UFS link layer errors suggest hardware issues; recommend checking signal and power integrity on the H/W board between AP and UFS component. User should visit customer service center for hardware inspection.

rows.Title: Long screenshot lines get cut off
rows.Problem: While taking long screenshots, especially of documents or webpages, the stitching fails resulting in smudged areas or misaligned text where lines continue across screens.
rows.Summarized Problem: Long screenshots show smudged or misaligned text due to stitching failures when lines span across screens.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction in screenshot functionality but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The scroll capture algorithm fails to find overlapping matches between consecutive frames, preventing proper stitching; future updates will provide an alternative.

rows.Title: Widgets seem to be compact and not using full space of the screen
rows.Problem: After upgrading to One UI 7, home screen, lock screen, and app drawer widgets appear smaller and do not use the full width of the display. On the lock screen, app icons are centered instead of aligned to the corners.
rows.Summarized Problem: Widgets on the lock screen and home screen are displayed too small and not using the full screen width, with app icons centered instead of aligned to screen corners.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual layout and user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause system crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: The grid is set to 6x8 intentionally; users can adjust grid settings in home screen settings.

rows.Title: Call App getting crash
rows.Problem: Call app is not working properly; voice focus and call recording features are missing. User installed the app from unknown sources, uninstalled updates, and no option to reinstall or update available in Galaxy Store. Device behavior suggests potential app instability or missing functionality.
rows.Summarized Problem: The call app is not working properly due to missing voice focus and call recording features.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to perform core call functions such as recording and voice focus, rendering the call feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Voice focus is not supported for this device; app instability due to installation from unknown sources and update removal.

rows.Title: Gallery App Remaster Feature Shows Black Transparent Layer
rows.Problem: When applying remaster on an image, the feature shows a black transparent layer instead of improving the image.
rows.Summarized Problem: The remaster feature in the gallery app displays a black transparent layer instead of improving the image.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to perform its intended function, resulting in a visible and inconsistent output that undermines user experience and image quality.
rows.R&D Comment: Model added in SR Block. FLUMEN CL 31201732, REL CL ID 42466, REL CL ID 43657, REL CL 31462780

rows.Title: Clock animation not working in Lock screen
rows.Problem: The clock animation on the lock screen is not working after updating to One UI 7.0, despite the changelog mentioning animated clocks.
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock animation on the lock screen is missing or not functioning after the One UI 7.0 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a visual element of the lock screen, impairing user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Battery draining and heating up
rows.Problem: Battery draining more and heating up the device even after clearing cache
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is draining battery and heating up rapidly even after clearing cache.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is overheating and draining battery rapidly, which can lead to performance issues and potential damage, making it unusable under normal usage conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: standby current is under 25mA, RUT over 20hours (user's screen on time is long); let me know the exact time when user feel fast drain, I'll analyze it.

rows.Title: Network is dripping
rows.Problem: Network is completely dripping after ui7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Network registration is failing after the UI7 update due to poor PRX chain and significant RX imbalance.
rows.Severity Reason: The network registration failure prevents device from establishing a stable connection, making the device unusable in basic communication functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Poor PRX chain. huge rx imbalance seen

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: New battery installed on device shows only 6 hours of backup, less than a one-year-old phone. Calibration done, service center claims no issue with battery.
rows.Summarized Problem: A newly installed battery provides significantly reduced backup time compared to a one-year-old battery, despite calibration and service center assurances.
rows.Severity Reason: The device's battery performance is severely degraded, leading to insufficient backup time and potential user inconvenience during daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: Service center must initialize Battery Cycle to 0 after installing new battery. But few service centers skips this step. Please assign to the person who is Service Center in-charge so that he can guide service center appropriately.

rows.Title: Good Lock app does not open
rows.Problem: Good Lock app does not open after OS update; shows update congratulation screen and fails to launch
rows.Summarized Problem: The Good Lock app fails to open after the OS update and displays a congratulation screen instead of launching.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to launch entirely, preventing users from accessing the lock screen functionality, making the device unusable for basic security features.
rows.R&D Comment: Galaxy A55 is available in Home Up for One UI 7. Please update the latest version Home Up via Good Lock app.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Severe battery drain after security patch and UI update, screen on time drops from 4-5 hours to 3 hours or less. Lock screen lags when double-tapping to lock.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences severe battery drain after software updates, with screen on time reduced from 4-5 hours to 3 hours or less, and lock screen lags when double-tapped.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain significantly reduces device usability and operational time, especially under normal use conditions, leading to frequent recharging.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain occurs during active use; normal consumption when screen is off or in standard apps. Recommend log analysis during real-world usage to identify root cause.

rows.Title: Media player not opening from notification panel
rows.Problem: The media player at the top is not opening correctly in some cases
rows.Summarized Problem: The media player in the notification panel fails to open correctly in some cases.
rows.Severity Reason: The media player fails to open in some cases, resulting in partial functionality failure but does not render the device unusable.

rows.Title: Notification sounds goes mute and only vibrates
rows.Problem: Whatsapp and slack notifications go mute and no sound plays except vibrations
rows.Summarized Problem: Notification sounds are muted and only vibrations are played for apps like WhatsApp and Slack.
rows.Severity Reason: Apps receive no audio notifications despite being configured to play sounds, which is a partial malfunction of the notification system.

rows.Title: Audio issue with wired earphones
rows.Problem: After updating to Android 15, audio randomly stops or produces a buzzing sound when using wired earphones, despite working on other devices. This issue appears to be software-related and started post-update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Wired earphones experience random audio stoppage or buzzing noise after Android 15 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent audio failure but does not completely disable device functionality or lead to data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no media playback seen in the current logs. Please check and provide logs taken immediately after the issue occurs, along with the time of occurrence.

rows.Title: Refining process takes too long on picture capture
rows.Problem: Taking pictures shows a never-ending refining process, preventing picture transfer. This occurs after the recent update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera's photo refinement process runs indefinitely, causing delays and preventing picture transfer.
rows.Severity Reason: The refining process does not complete, blocking the ability to transfer photos and rendering the camera function unusable during capture.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Insufficient memory during photo refinement; Countermeasure: Platform/System Limitation

rows.Title: Contact expand often expands another contact
rows.Problem: Attached recordings show contact expand often expands another contact
rows.Summarized Problem: When a contact is expanded, it often expands another contact instead of the intended one.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent user experience during contact selection but does not result in device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs due to list redraw on order change from SamsungSearch's frequently searched contacts. Fixed by modifying redraw logic to only refresh when actual contact data changes or during explicit refresh, not on order changes.

rows.Title: Charger and wired earphones stopped working
rows.Problem: Charger and wired earphones stopped working after updating to One UI 7. Tried all troubleshooting steps but nothing worked.
rows.Summarized Problem: Charger and wired earphones stopped working after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: Device connectivity functions are completely failing, making it unusable for basic operations like charging and audio.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue likely caused by USB Type-C port malfunction; recommend testing with another earphone and visiting a service center for port inspection.

rows.Title: Top speaker does not work for system volume
rows.Problem: Top speaker does not work for system volume but works for other audio types like app or notifications.
rows.Summarized Problem: The top speaker does not function for system volume, despite working for app and notification audio.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects system volume functionality but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: As per the dual speaker concept, music or long duration playback will be played on both top and bottom speakers; notification and system tones play only on the bottom speaker. User should be informed about the dual speaker concept in Samsung models.

rows.Title: Sports notifications not showing on now bar
rows.Problem: Sports from google ipl notification not showing on now bar
rows.Summarized Problem: Sports notifications from Google IPL are not appearing on the Now Bar.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification feature is missing for a specific content type, preventing users from receiving timely updates, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: WhatsApp video and photo folders removed from gallery
rows.Problem: WhatsApp video and photo folders are removed from gallery, forcing users to open the app to view content, which is irritating and inconsistent with expected behavior
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp video and photo folders are missing from the gallery, requiring users to open the app to view content.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access media directly in the gallery, making it difficult to browse content without opening the app, which is a core functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to multimedia data bucket limits and folder handling in the gallery; the issue stems from how folders are filtered or counted in storage paths, and the countermeasure suggests no change in current logic.

rows.Title: Sports from Google not working
rows.Problem: Accidentally cleared sports notification from Google live match reports; Now bar sports from Google is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Sports content from Google is no longer visible in the Now Bar after accidental clearing of notification.
rows.Severity Reason: The core functionality of viewing live sports match reports from Google is missing, rendering a key feature unusable.

rows.Title: Post update Pubg getting 30fps
rows.Problem: After update, PUBG runs at 30 fps instead of 59-60 fps, causing significant lag. GamePlugin was removed, and developers no longer show CPU, FPS, memory, and GPU status in settings, which may hide performance issues.
rows.Summarized Problem: PUBG game performance drops significantly after update, running at only 30 fps instead of 59-60 fps, causing noticeable lag.
rows.Severity Reason: The game runs at half its intended frame rate, resulting in a severely degraded user experience and device usability during gameplay.
rows.R&D Comment: GamePlugin is no longer supported from Android V-os. The individual app setting function has been changed to the main function of GameBooster, and the rest of the functions will be supported through the Goodlock app. Please delete GamePlugin app.

rows.Title: Instagram not optimized for latest Android version
rows.Problem: Home button becomes unresponsive and fails to return to previous screens or open apps; error message states feature is not optimized for latest Android version after upgrading to ONE UI 7.0
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram app displays a message stating it is not optimized for the latest Android version, and the home button on the device becomes unresponsive or fails to function properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The home button malfunction affects user navigation but does not cause device crash or data loss, and the issue is partially related to app compatibility rather than core system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: High CPU usage observed in key background processes (com.snapwork.hdfc, system_server, etc.) suggests underlying performance issues; however, the root cause appears to be app-level optimization, not Samsung system-level failure.

rows.Title: Screen gets stucked while taking screenshot
rows.Problem: After One UI 7 update, screen gets stuck when taking screenshot using power and volume down buttons, unable to open or do anything for 3-5 minutes.
rows.Summarized Problem: Screen gets stuck and becomes unresponsive after taking a screenshot using power and volume down buttons.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable for 3-5 minutes after the action, preventing user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Missing event log: Window-Manager :take a screenshot, triggered by keyCombination. User missed timestamp logs; full logs needed for analysis.

rows.Title: 5G not working properly
rows.Problem: Network is not working properly. It shows either emergency calling or no service. 4G is not supported and 5G is not working properly.
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G and 4G networks are not functioning properly, showing only emergency calling or no service.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish any network connection, rendering basic communication functions unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Due to extremely low signal strength, the network does not respond to TAU requests from the device; users should try in a different location and re-open if issue persists.

rows.Title: 5GHz does not work
rows.Problem: 5GHz band does not work with OneUI 7, works fine with OneUI 6 on both bands
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi 5GHz band stops working on OneUI 7, functioning correctly on OneUI 6.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects only specific firmware versions, causing partial functionality loss but does not render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The error code -19 suggests a firmware or driver incompatibility; updating firmware or drivers may resolve the issue.

rows.Title: Apps screen grid not available
rows.Problem: After updating the device with a new software update, the app grid feature is missing. The user can only slide horizontally, while a friend with the same device has the grid feature. This is a feature absence post-update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The app grid feature is missing after a software update, leaving users unable to view apps in a grid layout.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a specific view, affecting user experience but not causing device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: In One UI 7.0, when app sort is set to alphabetical, the interface uses vertical scrolling instead of a grid, which is now the standard due to navigation efficiency and alignment.

rows.Title: Sports notifications not showing
rows.Problem: Now bar not showing live score of sports
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar is not displaying live sports scores.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a key functional area, preventing users from seeing real-time sports scores, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: IRCTC app can't access server after update
rows.Problem: IRCTC app shows inability to access server after update, though server is working fine on web
rows.Summarized Problem: The IRCTC app cannot access the server after an update, despite the server being functional on the web.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to connect to the server, which is a partial malfunction affecting functionality but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Recent tab not opening
rows.Problem: Recent items sometimes do not open
rows.Summarized Problem: The recent tab in the home screen fails to open intermittently.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the home screen functionality but does not prevent device use or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The home screen app appears not to be moving; log analysis is insufficient and no OS 14 update is planned, but the issue does not occur in OS 15 launcher.

rows.Title: Contact search expands unintended contact
rows.Problem: When searching for contacts with minimum characters, selecting a contact causes it to move to frequently searched section and opens the next contact's dial option without user selection.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contact search incorrectly expands and selects unintended contacts during search, moving selected contacts to frequently searched section and opening dial option for unselected contacts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction in contact search functionality, leading to unintended user actions but does not result in device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The feature where selected contacts are changed to frequently searched contacts will only take effect when the app is restarted in the next version.

rows.Title: Cover screen preview is upside down
rows.Problem: Cover screen preview is now upside down in Samsung Galaxy Flip6 after software update. Frequency: all the time after last software update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The cover screen preview is displayed upside down on Samsung Galaxy Flip6 after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the display orientation of a key UI element but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs when 'camera assistant - Clean preview on HDMI displays' is enabled, causing incorrect surface usage; the fix checks cable connection before sending extra surface, and users are advised to disable the option until binary release.

rows.Title: Phone calls interface not displaying anything
rows.Problem: Applications are crashing after recent software update. Unable to access contacts, search, or find apps. WhatsApp not working. Multiple issues occurring.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone calls interface is not displaying any content after a recent software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The interface failure prevents users from accessing basic phone functionality, making the device unusable for calls.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Large database deletions during onupgrade cause timeout and provider failure. Countermeasure: Move onupgrade operation to background runtime; clear local contacts data and re-sync with Samsung/Google.

rows.Title: Device taking too long to charge
rows.Problem: After update not charging in normal time
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is taking significantly longer than normal to charge after an update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is not charging properly, which can lead to extended usage time and potential device malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: DCD timeout due to unstable USB recognition or cable/connector issues. Counter Measure: Check with different cable and charger; if issue persists, service center inspection of IFPMIC is needed.

rows.Title: Not able to move data from secure folder
rows.Problem: Downloaded items like videos or photos sometimes fail to move in or out of the secure folder after a few months. Some items can be moved successfully, but others cannot, especially those downloaded recently. The system shows a move failure, but other downloads work fine. Users are unsure of the cause.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot move downloaded videos or photos in and out of the secure folder, with inconsistent success and failure across items.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects only some downloads and is intermittent, preventing full access to files but not rendering the device unusable.
