rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs due to long file names causing move failures. Users should be guided to rename files, and the file name length constraint will be reviewed for improvement.

rows.Title: Audio keeps playing after exiting Instagram
rows.Problem: Audio continues to play after exiting Instagram when a video is playing in the app
rows.Summarized Problem: Audio continues to play after exiting Instagram when a video is playing in the app
rows.Severity Reason: The audio playback does not stop after exiting the app, leaving users with unexpected sound playback, which can be disruptive and interfere with device usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Volume set to zero by app during playback; Countermeasure: Same as cause

rows.Title: Ui not responding
rows.Problem: Attached photos show ui responsiveness issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The user interface is not responding properly on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The UI is not responding, making the device unusable for basic interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: System native crashes and kernel panic resets suggest memory corruption; recommend factory reset and hardware inspection if issue persists.

rows.Title: Phone freezes forever
rows.Problem: Phone freezes permanently and cannot be swiped back, open settings, or restart normally. Issue occurs randomly and only resolves when battery is completely drained or force restart is performed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone freezes permanently and cannot perform basic operations like swiping back or opening settings, even after a normal restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unusable due to a permanent freeze, preventing user from accessing core functions or performing basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: User should not use the device when temperature is high or while charging to avoid freeze; new logs are needed immediately after the issue occurs.

rows.Title: Swiping home with back button causes ghosting of previous app screen
rows.Problem: Swiping home and immediately pressing back causes ghosting of previous app screen, occurring every time. This is annoying on a premium phone and affects the homescreen experience.
rows.Summarized Problem: Ghosting occurs when swiping home and pressing back, showing a previous app screen incorrectly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the home screen animation, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Apps with Google's predictive back animation cause ghosting due to V OS not supporting non-linear animations. Countermeasure: Non-linear animation support will be normalized in the next B OS.

rows.Title: Bluetooth functions glitchy and suddenly disconnects
rows.Problem: Bluetooth functions become glitchy and suddenly disconnect, causing media to play automatically when nothing was played, even with headphones or speakers connected. This happens repeatedly during use, and the connection is unstable.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth connectivity becomes unstable, causing sudden disconnections and automatic playback of media without user input.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes frequent disconnections and unintended media playback, making the device unusable during audio sessions.
rows.R&D Comment: There are several packet retransmissions due to which the issue occurred. Please reproduce the issue and provide necessary log for debugging. Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Wonderland missing from Good Lock
rows.Problem: Wonderland plugin is not available in the Good Lock application under the Plugins tab.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Wonderland plugin is missing from the Good Lock application's Plugins tab.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing but not fully broken; users can still access other plugins and the app functions otherwise.
rows.R&D Comment: Wonderland requires high memory and performance; not supported on Galaxy A3 series. We are working on broader device compatibility.

rows.Title: Photo Remasterer Darkens the whole photo
rows.Problem: Photo Remasterer Darkens the whole photo
rows.Summarized Problem: The Photo Remasterer feature darkens the entire photo output, resulting in incorrect image processing.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature completely alters image appearance, making photos unusable and affecting user experience significantly.

rows.Title: Lag during multitasking in notes app
rows.Problem: Glitch in Samsung Notes app during multitasking when scrolling between instances; keyboard closes before fully appearing, causing layout shift and empty space in SpenComposer
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience lag and layout glitches when multitasking in the Samsung Notes app, particularly when scrolling between instances and the keyboard fails to fully appear.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent lag and visual layout problems during multitasking but does not result in device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Keyboard closes before fully showing due to rapid touch input during layout change; Countermeasure: Same as cause, addressing the same user interaction path.

rows.Title: Alarm does not ring when tab cover is on
rows.Problem: When the tab cover is on, the alarm only vibrates and does not ring. When the cover is removed, the alarm rings and resumes normal behavior. Alarm volume settings are correct and should trigger both ring and vibration when cover is closed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The alarm fails to ring when the tab cover is on, only vibrating instead.
rows.Severity Reason: The alarm function is partially malfunctioning but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Alarm does not ring when cover is on; volume settings are correct. Countermeasure: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera photos blurry and grainy
rows.Problem: Photos and videos taken in plenty of light are still grainy and noisy, resembling oil pastel or painting
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos and videos taken in good lighting conditions are blurry and grainy, with poor image quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of image quality under normal lighting conditions, not causing device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Image quality is judged normal; no unusual logs found; issue is likely user-perceived, not technical.

rows.Title: Icons alignment get changed on landscape mode
rows.Problem: icon layout being messed up and app grid is weird
rows.Summarized Problem: Icons alignment is incorrect when device is in landscape mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual layout of icons but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue will be fixed in the Homescreen Version 16.0.09.13 or above

rows.Title: Task bar doesn't disappear when apps are open
rows.Problem: Taskbar does not disappear even when apps are open
rows.Summarized Problem: The task bar does not disappear when apps are open, affecting user interface visibility.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the UI element, where the task bar remains visible during app usage, but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The floating taskbar is hidden when Samsung Notes app is clicked; no exact reproduction steps available, additional logs added for future root cause analysis.

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor not working
rows.Problem: Fingerprint sensor not working on lock screen or home screen, works on biometric page but not on lock screen. No software update, issue persists with or without screen guard. No injury to finger.
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint sensor fails to work on the lock screen despite working on the biometric page.
rows.Severity Reason: The fingerprint sensor is not functioning on the lock screen, which is a primary authentication method, making the device unusable for secure access.
rows.R&D Comment: It seems the first fingerprint template was corrupted, but no logs explain why; recommend providing CP silent logs for root cause analysis.

rows.Title: A black cursor keeps on appearing on the screen and then disappears
rows.Problem: A black cursor appears on the screen for a few seconds and then disappears. It is not visible in screenshots. This issue is reported by other users as well. It is unclear whether this is a UI bug or an enabled function.
rows.Summarized Problem: A black cursor appears briefly on the screen and then disappears, making it invisible in screenshots.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual feedback but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The cursor appears when devices with mouse properties connect; in future OS versions, cursor display will be disabled to reduce user annoyance.

rows.Title: Camera focus not working properly
rows.Problem: Camera focus is still not working properly after trying the suggestion
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera focus functionality is not working properly despite attempts to resolve it.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera focus function is completely failing, preventing basic operation of the camera feature.
rows.R&D Comment: In order to accurately identify the problem, please attach the original image saved after shooting in the problem situation. And, if the attached file is not a dumped log in the problem situation, please attach the log obtained in the problem situation with the image.

rows.Title: Face unlock gets automatically disabled
rows.Problem: Face unlock is automatically disabled despite trying provided solutions
rows.Summarized Problem: Face unlock functionality is automatically disabled on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working as expected, but the issue does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Issue not reproducible in latest binary. Countermeasure: Verify in latest binary.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Heavy battery drain when idle. Device drops to 5% and below quickly even with minimal usage. Battery depletes rapidly despite deleting unused apps and performing simple tasks.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain when idle, dropping to 5% or less quickly despite minimal usage and app deletion.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot be used for basic tasks due to extremely short battery life, making it functionally unusable without frequent charging.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta as follows, and the Meta engineering team is currently investigating it: Once the app is fixed, it will be updated through the Play Store.

rows.Title: Bluetooth turns off
rows.Problem: Bluetooth blocking
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth is being blocked by Android's API policy changes, preventing third-party apps from controlling it.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot control Bluetooth due to Android policy changes, making it unusable for users relying on third-party app connectivity.

rows.Title: Contact saving option still shows after adding contact
rows.Problem: After adding a contact, the option to save contact still appears
rows.Summarized Problem: After adding a contact, the save option remains visible instead of disappearing.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not fully function as intended, causing a partial malfunction in the contact addition flow.
rows.R&D Comment: Fix to dismiss add contact dialog after clicking.

rows.Title: Sports notification on now bar not working
rows.Problem: Now bar not showing live sports scores despite enabling all Google settings and following teams and leagues
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar is not displaying live sports scores, even after enabling all required settings and following relevant teams and leagues.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working despite user configuration, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Green line issue
rows.Problem: Green line issue after latest update
rows.Summarized Problem: A green line appears on the display after the latest software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects display visibility but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is reported as a known issue with multiple users.
rows.R&D Comment: The green line issue is likely caused by hardware defects such as Display Driver IC damage, COP bending crack, or data line foreign matter, and users should visit a service center for resolution.

rows.Title: Device not responding and screen turns off
rows.Problem: Device not responding and screen automatically turns off after updating to One UI 7 without any reason
rows.Summarized Problem: Device becomes unresponsive and screen turns off automatically after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unresponsive and screen turns off unexpectedly, making it unusable without clear trigger or recovery.
rows.R&D Comment: Please share video and one more log set matching timestamp

rows.Title: Notification grouping not working for apps other than system apps
rows.Problem: Notification grouping is not working for apps other than system apps. Like in this example, notifications from the PW app are not grouped. And in the image given below, you can see that notifications from the SMS app are grouped.
rows.Summarized Problem: Notification grouping fails for third-party apps, while it works for system apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure for third-party apps, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to update Google Play Services
rows.Problem: Unable to update Google Play Services on S24 Ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot update Google Play Services on the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: The update function is missing or not working, preventing service updates but does not render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Weak internet connection or insufficient storage may prevent update. Countermeasure: Users should check internet connection and free up storage space.

rows.Title: Notification panel is in black color without dark mode
rows.Problem: Notification panel is completely black without night mode, persists after reset and theme uninstall
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel appears black when dark mode is not enabled, despite user settings and theme resets.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI appearance but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure.

rows.Title: cannot find Lengpui Mizoam India in samsung weather app
rows.Problem: I cannot find Lengpui Mizoam India in samsung weather app. I only use samsung weather app
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Weather app does not show Lengpui and Mizoam, India in location search.
rows.Severity Reason: The user cannot find a valid location in the app, which is a partial malfunction of the location search feature.

rows.Title: Can't set only 5g in my secondary sim
rows.Problem: Can't set only 5g in my secondary sim. Please update my phone and fixed the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set only 5G on their secondary SIM card.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a network setting, preventing full 5G configuration on a secondary SIM, but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Dynamic lock screen inconsistent color rendering
rows.Problem: Dynamic lock screen exhibits inconsistent color rendering; background and bottom text occasionally display as gray or black despite configured white theme
rows.Summarized Problem: The dynamic lock screen displays incorrect colors, showing gray or black instead of the configured white theme.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual consistency but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: call background is weird
rows.Problem: My call background is weird despite re setting it in settings and also rebooting the device
rows.Summarized Problem: The call background displays incorrectly when the contact does not have a saved photo, showing a default or unexpected image instead of a proper background.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent behavior in call background display, but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Fix to show default background in case of missing contact photo; will be included in next MR version.

rows.Title: Block all spam and scam calls option does not work
rows.Problem: The "Block calls from unknown numbers" option doesn't work properly; users still receive calls from unknown numbers even when enabled. The "Block all spam and scam calls" option also fails to block promotional or spam calls.
rows.Summarized Problem: The call blocking feature fails to block spam and scam calls, allowing unknown numbers to receive calls despite the option being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning, as it only blocks calls from hidden/private numbers, not all unknown numbers, resulting in incomplete protection.
rows.R&D Comment: The call blocking feature works only for hidden/private numbers; the "Block all spam and scam calls" option appears functional for suspected spam and fraud, but does not block all unknown calls. The issue is attributed to incomplete filtering logic in the system.

rows.Title: Performance profile mode not showing in Device Care
rows.Problem: Performance profile mode not showing in Device Care
rows.Summarized Problem: The performance profile mode is not displaying in Device Care.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from Device Care, preventing users from adjusting performance settings, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Keyboard and mouse not working in tab
rows.Problem: Keyboard and mouse connected via USB dongle stopped working after UI 7 update. No connection logs found in device logs. User tried changing settings, OTG, and device battery but issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: Keyboard and mouse connected via USB dongle are no longer functional after UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: User cannot use essential input devices after update, rendering the device unusable for basic tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: We suspect damage at USB connector; recommend customer visit service center for device check.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, battery life has significantly decreased, requiring two to three charges daily instead of one. Despite using all recommended battery optimization settings, the issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences severe battery drain after One UI 7 update, requiring multiple charges daily despite optimal settings.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is severe enough to render the device unusable for daily use, requiring frequent charging.
rows.R&D Comment: This is an issue that needs to be checked in Instagram app; the app is outdated (package com.instagram.android: 3e2da3a). Users should update the app, clear cache and data, and monitor for persistence.

rows.Title: Heavy Battery draining
rows.Problem: Heavy Battery draining
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing heavy battery draining after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain significantly impacts device usability and operational duration, making the device unusable without charging.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is being investigated; it will be fixed in v382 via Play Store.

rows.Title: Phone is getting heating up while doing normal task
rows.Problem: Phone is getting heating up during normal tasks, even without using apps like Instagram or Facebook, and battery drains quickly. The phone is new and the issue persists after several days, affecting overall user experience.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone overheats during normal usage and drains battery rapidly, even without running apps or games.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating during normal tasks makes the device unusable and causes rapid battery drain, which directly impacts core device functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: The overheating is caused by excessive camera usage over a short period, which leads to a temperature rise from 35°C to 47°C. The issue is judged as normal thermal behavior under heavy camera use, and no specific software or hardware fault is identified.

rows.Title: Notes app disappeared from recents and didn't resume on relaunch
rows.Problem: Samsung Notes app unexpectedly disappeared from memory and did not resume from where it was left when relaunched, while user was in the middle of writing a note.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Notes app unexpectedly disappears from recents and fails to resume from the last state when relaunched.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to resume properly, disrupting user workflow but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: There are no logs related to Notes found within. So I request to register problem within 5-10min so the problem reason can be detected.

rows.Title: Heating observed on playing heavy games
rows.Problem: Phone heats up significantly during heavy game play, such as Call of Duty Mobile, especially after battles, and was not an issue in previous UI versions. Heating subsides after closing the game.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats during heavy game play, particularly in high-performance modes, and cools down after game closure.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating occurs during gameplay but resolves after exiting the game, indicating a partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Heating is caused by high FPS gameplay settings; recommend adjusting game settings to balance mode to reduce CPU/GPU load and temperature.

rows.Title: Live score not showing in notification panel
rows.Problem: Live score is not showing in the notification panel after enabling the sports feature from Google. It does not work despite multiple attempts.
rows.Summarized Problem: Live score is not displaying in the notification panel after enabling the sports feature.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working despite user attempts, but the device remains usable and no critical function is disrupted.

rows.Title: Secure Folder not working
rows.Problem: Unable to use Secure Folder; prompts error 'Security policy prevents the installation of secure folder' after Android 15 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot install or use the Secure Folder due to a security policy error after Android 15 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full use of a feature but does not cause device crash or data loss, and can be resolved via factory reset.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Device Owner (DO) was created and later removed; factory reset resolves the issue. Countermeasure: Recommend factory reset to restore secure folder functionality.

rows.Title: Samsung Notes Folders and Content disappear
rows.Problem: Folders and content in Samsung Notes app have disappeared after data restoration from Samsung Cloud. User had deleted notes and synchronized deletions to cloud, but folders and content are missing post-restore. No recovery in trash or bin.
rows.Summarized Problem: Folders and content in Samsung Notes app have disappeared after data restoration from Samsung Cloud.
rows.Severity Reason: Users lose critical data, and the issue prevents access to important notes and folders, making the app functionally unusable for core tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: The Samsung Notes app does not allow recovery of deleted notes due to privacy policies; users must rely on sync to keep data, and auto-sync must be enabled to ensure data retention.

rows.Title: Unable to install icici bank application
rows.Problem: Unable to install icici bank application after updating galaxy a55 on one ui7. Tried all possible ways but installation fails.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot install the icici bank application after updating to One UI 7 on Galaxy A55.
rows.Severity Reason: Installation fails due to version downgrade detection, but the app is still available and can be installed via other methods.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Downgrade detected during app installation due to version mismatch. Countermeasure: Same as cause, indicating no improvement needed.

rows.Title: Glitch in recent apps section
rows.Problem: Error when sharing videos and images, even in member posts
rows.Summarized Problem: Error occurs when sharing videos and images in the recent apps section, even in member posts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a malfunction during content sharing but does not prevent device usage or cause a crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. Also, as no release is planned for OS 14 and the issue is not occurring in the latest OS 15 launcher apk, please help to update to latest OS.

rows.Title: Calendar notifications not displayed
rows.Problem: Not getting calendar notifications for meetings. Tried changing settings but still no notifications.
rows.Summarized Problem: Calendar notifications are not displaying for meetings despite settings adjustments.
rows.Severity Reason: User cannot receive meeting reminders, which is a partial malfunction of a core calendar feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Mute notifications enabled on phone and wearable device settings. Countermeasure: Guide user to disable mute settings in wearable and phone notification settings.

rows.Title: Now Bar Sports from Google toggle not found
rows.Problem: Google sports live score not showing in now bar though it is enabled
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Sports from Google' toggle is missing in the Now Bar settings, and Google sports live scores are not displaying despite being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a key UI element, preventing users from accessing content, but the device remains functional and does not crash or freeze.

rows.Title: Image shift when switching camera zoom
rows.Problem: Image shift happens when switching from 2x to 3x zoom in camera
rows.Summarized Problem: Image shifts when switching from 2x to 3x zoom in the camera.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction during camera zoom transition, causing visual shift but not rendering the device unusable or crashing.
rows.R&D Comment: The image shift is due to parallax caused by different camera positions; the system must smoothly transition between center points during zoom change.

rows.Title: Sound in recorded videos is very bad
rows.Problem: Voice in videos is strange, sometimes absent, voice focus doesn't work, sound cuts off, and after clearing app data, camera lags and quality deteriorates. Background noise is also present in some videos.
rows.Summarized Problem: Audio recording in videos is faulty, with missing voice, strange noise, and voice focus failure.
rows.Severity Reason: The audio recording function is completely failing in some cases, leading to unusable video content with no voice or strange background noise.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Notification sound plays during calls when sound in calls is disabled
rows.Problem: Repeat notification sounds play during calls even when 'allow alarm/notification sound in calls' is turned off, affecting hearing ability
rows.Summarized Problem: Notification sounds continue to play during calls even when disabled in call settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes continuous sound playback during calls, directly affecting user hearing and usability.

rows.Title: Esim goes automatically off
rows.Problem: Esim automatically off after UI 7 update on Samsung A55
rows.Summarized Problem: The ESIM on Samsung A55 turns off automatically after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The ESIM function is completely failing, preventing reliable network connectivity, making the device unusable for mobile services.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Power saving mode has a lag in turning on
rows.Problem: There is a lag in the power saving option turning on; it does not show immediately and only appears after a delay or when the device is turned off. The power saving symbol remains on the battery icon even when power saving is off. Requires restart to resolve, and the issue persists after restart.
rows.Summarized Problem: Power saving mode takes a long time to activate and remains visible even when turned off, causing delays and requiring device restart to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to respond promptly, leading to a significant delay in user interaction and requiring restart, which impacts usability and device responsiveness.
rows.R&D Comment: The lag is due to internal system actions being delayed; the same behavior is both the cause and the countermeasure.

rows.Title: YT video resolution changes to 48-0p when trying to switch to 2160p
rows.Problem: youtube issue
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube video resolution unexpectedly drops to 480p when attempting to switch to 2160p.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in video resolution switching, preventing full resolution access but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Black screen on launch
rows.Problem: Device displays a black screen for a millisecond when launching, followed by the dialer app opening
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows a black screen for a millisecond upon startup before loading the interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a brief visual glitch during boot, not affecting device usability or functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue will be fixed in the Homescreen Version 16.0.09.13 or above.

rows.Title: YouTube crashes or drops to 144p/240p when selecting 4K 60fps or HDR
rows.Problem: YouTube crashes or drops to 144p/240p when selecting 4K 60fps or HDR. 4K 60fps playback and recording are not supported, which is disappointing. Essential features like App Lock, internet speed in status bar, 3-finger screenshot gesture, and image-to-document conversion in Gallery are also affected.
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube fails to play 4K 60fps or HDR content and drops to lower resolutions, with 4K 60fps playback and recording unsupported.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot support 4K 60fps or HDR playback, making core video functionality unusable and preventing users from enjoying high-quality content.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a chipset limitation; 4K@60 fps is not supported on the device.

rows.Title: Music player not visible on notification panel
rows.Problem: Cannot see live notifications in notification bar for media player when playing songs or any media in background
rows.Summarized Problem: The media player notification is not visible on the notification panel when music is playing in the background.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the notification display, preventing visibility of media player updates, but does not cause device freeze or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: overheating and battery drain
rows.Problem: device overheats when opening instagram, camera, youtube, or with internet on, despite ui 7 update; excessive cpu usage by instagram app
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats and experiences significant battery drain when using apps like Instagram, camera, or YouTube, even with minimal activity.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats and drains battery during normal usage, making it unusable and posing a safety risk.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is currently under investigation. Once fixed, it will be updated via Play Store.

rows.Title: Clock size gets small automatically on lockscreen
rows.Problem: The clock on my lock screen has been set to a bigger size as per my likes, but sometimes the clock size is reduced without my will. Even when I change the size and confirm, the size remains the same. This issue started after updating from one UI 6 to one UI 7.
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock size on the lock screen unexpectedly reduces and does not persist after user adjustments.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user customization but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Heating observed in the device
rows.Problem: Device heated before 15 minutes
rows.Summarized Problem: The device heats up quickly, reaching high temperatures within 15 minutes of use.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats during normal usage, which may affect performance or cause thermal throttling, but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: After adding graphite area, the thermal performance of the machine has been optimized.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Quick battery dropping due to high CPU occupation by Instagram
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain caused by high CPU usage from Instagram.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain leads to device becoming unusable quickly, especially in real-world usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Instagram CPU occupation is causing high battery drain. Countermeasure: Fix will be implemented in Instagram v382, confirmed by META.

rows.Title: Buds and watch are not connecting
rows.Problem: After the one UI 7 update, the phone does not connect to buds 3 pro, buds 2, and most importantly to watch 4, which was also updated with the recent security patch. The phone must be restarted to regain connection. This has happened at least 10 to 12 times in the past few weeks.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone fails to connect to Bluetooth devices such as buds and watch after the UI 7 update, requiring a restart to restore connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents device pairing and usage, and occurs repeatedly after a software update, rendering core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Bluetooth connection info shows incomplete or failed device handshake post-update. Countermeasure: Provide CP silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: After upgrading to UI 7, the device experiences excessive battery consumption, with no prior proof provided before or after the upgrade.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain after upgrading to UI 7, with no prior evidence of the issue.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain renders the device unusable without charging, leading to frequent shutdowns or limited usage.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is under investigation; a fix is expected in version 382 via Play Store.

rows.Title: Lag in device
rows.Problem: Device is lagging with high RAM usage and overheating, even after factory reset with no installed apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing significant lag and overheating due to high RAM usage, even after a factory reset with no apps installed.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unresponsive and overheating, which can lead to instability or crashes and severely impacts usability.
rows.R&D Comment: SAP library doesn't exist at all. Samsung Health Monitor app doesn't know which wearable will be connected. That's why Samsung Health Monitor app registers events from both Tizen and Wear OS. We've serviced this way since long times ago. It is not app side issue.

rows.Title: Device show connected, but doesn't work
rows.Problem: Input stops after closing the keyboard cover on ProElite Cantilever Bluetooth Keyboard, trackpad sensitivity issue after One UI 7.0 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth keyboard input stops when the cover is closed on the ProElite Cantilever keyboard.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to function as intended after a simple action (closing the cover), rendering the keyboard unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide synchronised dumpstate & btSnoop logs and video showing the issue, captured immediately after the problem occurs, with soft keyboard closed during testing.

rows.Title: Black bar appears when swiping back from landscape app to homescreen
rows.Problem: When opening an app in landscape orientation and swiping back to homescreen, a black bar appears on the wallpaper, causing visual glitch.
rows.Summarized Problem: A black bar appears on the wallpaper when swiping back from a landscape-oriented app to the homescreen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a visible visual glitch but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure.

rows.Title: Lag observed in the device
rows.Problem: The phone keeps lagging and restarting and is not working properly after updating to One UI 7. This is a software bug that needs to be fixed with a new update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant lag and restarts after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive and restarts, making it unusable, which is a major functional failure.

rows.Title: Calendar app showing wrong date
rows.Problem: Samsung calendar app showing yesterday's date and then today's date when opened, indicating a bug
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung calendar app incorrectly displays the wrong date, showing yesterday's date and then today's date upon opening.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in date display, affecting user experience but not rendering the app unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Logs attached don't contain information about calendar live icon update. Please capture logs at correct time when live icon of calendar is updated for proper analysis.

rows.Title: 120Hz refresh rate isn't functioning as smoothly
rows.Problem: The device's 120Hz refresh rate performance is not smooth, with frame skipping in the main thread, which occurs at different times than when the user records video. This is due to user perception, not actual device performance issues.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 120Hz refresh rate on the display is not smooth due to frame skipping in the main thread, causing inconsistent performance that users perceive as sluggish.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a partial malfunction in display performance, not causing device unavailability or data loss, but affecting user experience during high-motion usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Frame skipping in the main thread causes perceived sluggishness; the issue is user-perceived, not device-level.

rows.Title: Customize and change wallpaper
rows.Problem: Unable to customize and change wallpaper on lock screen. Network status 5G/4G does not show on unlocked home screen when data is off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot customize or change wallpaper on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a core UI function but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Vibration stopped working
rows.Problem: Vibration issue persists after trying all software troubleshooting steps including restart, safe mode, setting resets, diagnostics, and app removal. Issue still exists despite full software resolution.
rows.Summarized Problem: Vibration function is not working despite all software troubleshooting steps being completed.
rows.Severity Reason: The vibration function is completely absent after exhaustive software troubleshooting, rendering a core device feedback mechanism inoperable.
rows.R&D Comment: There is a hardware defect in the COIN DC motor component or motor connector pin assembly. Please check the hardware side and share analysis.

rows.Title: Clock animation not working on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Clock animation is not working on the lock screen after One UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock animation is not working on the lock screen after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a visual element but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure.

rows.Title: Routines not working as set
rows.Problem: Routines are not helping; they fail to execute or appear in the list after One UI 7.0 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Routines created in earlier versions of One UI are not visible or functional in One UI 7.0, leading to failure in execution or search.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot perform scheduled tasks due to routines failing to execute or appear, making the device unusable for automation.
rows.R&D Comment: In the attached logs, the issue scenario is not captured. After the One UI 7.0 FOTA update, issues such as routines executing without appearing in the list or failing to be searched have been identified. This occurs because routines created in One UI 5 or earlier are not visible in One UI 7 and above. While this issue is expected to be resolved in One UI 8.0, implementing an immediate app update in the current One UI 7 environment is challenging.

rows.Title: Getting b7002 error while doing in app purchases on galaxy store
rows.Problem: Getting b7002 error while doing in app purchases on galaxy store. Was working fine two days ago but stopped suddenly. Checked all necessary steps with customer card but no resolution.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to make in-app purchases on Galaxy Store after a sudden failure, despite previous successful usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents users from completing essential in-app purchases, making the feature unusable and impacting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Due to a change in bypass payment policy, in-app purchases are no longer allowed. Users are blocked and may not be able to be unblocked in future cases.

rows.Title: Dark mode not applying on Voice recorder now bar card
rows.Problem: When going to the lock screen, the now bar for voice recording appears in light mode instead of dark mode, despite the device being in dark mode.
rows.Summarized Problem: The now bar for voice recording appears in light mode on the lock screen when the device is in dark mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the UI element on the lock screen, affecting visual consistency but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Orientation mode not working properly in YouTube PIP mode
rows.Problem: When playing YouTube in picture in picture mode, opening another app often results in landscape orientation instead of portrait, despite auto-rotate being off.
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube picture in picture mode fails to maintain portrait orientation when switching apps, despite auto-rotate being disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent behavior during multitasking but does not render the device unusable or lead to data loss.

rows.Title: Lag observed while using calendar widget
rows.Problem: Frequent stuttering and lag occur when switching between homescreen pages, especially when calendar widgets are added. Lag is also present when scrolling through calendar widgets on the homescreen.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience lag and stuttering when switching between homescreen pages and scrolling through calendar widgets.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects navigation and interaction but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. Also, as no release is planned for OS 14 and the issue is not occurring in latest OS 15 launcher apk, please help to update to latest OS.

rows.Title: Sound quality is very bad
rows.Problem: The sound quality during calls is poor, and YouTube playback continues to use call path audio even after ending the call, resulting in consistently low sound quality.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone produces poor sound quality during calls, and YouTube playback continues to use call path audio after the call ends.
rows.Severity Reason: Poor sound quality during calls and persistent low audio quality after call ends significantly impacts user experience and usability of core communication function.
rows.R&D Comment: If customer plays YouTube during a call, it will be played as a call path, not a multimedia path, resulting in poor sound quality. The user corrects YouTube during the call, the sound quality is not good, it seems that the call was terminated, and even after the call was terminated, the sound quality remains poor.

rows.Title: Weather app not smooth feels like lag fps drop
rows.Problem: Weather app not smooth feels like lag fps drop
rows.Summarized Problem: The weather app feels laggy with dropped frames and poor smoothness during use.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent performance lag but does not cause device crash or data loss, and the app remains functional.
rows.R&D Comment: On analysing the attached dumpstate, I can't see frame drop related errors. It would have been great if systrace was attached as systrace makes it quite easy to debug performance issues. Please suggest customer to follow this link https://developer.android.com/topic/performance/tracing/on-device to capture a systrace. Please also keep in mind record the trace only of issue scenario. Start recording the trace -> reproduce the issue -> stop the trace.

rows.Title: Blur background for widget not working
rows.Problem: Widget background blur not working properly after UI 7, Samsung Health widget not updating and sometimes not able to put widget...only blank template is visible
rows.Summarized Problem: The background blur feature for widgets is not working properly, resulting in a blank template being displayed instead of the intended blurred background.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of widget appearance but does not prevent device usage or cause system crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Missing Google Go Photo Video Permission
rows.Problem: Google Go lacks "Photos and videos" permission on Galaxy M35, preventing image downloads. Issue persists after troubleshooting including cache clear, app reinstall, reset, and factory reset. Works fine on other devices M21 and M30.
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Go app on Galaxy M35 does not have the 'Photos and videos' permission, preventing image downloads.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents a core functionality (image downloads) but does not cause device crash or data loss, and the app works on other devices.
rows.R&D Comment: Attached screenshots and logs are not in sync; please attach new logs and video in sync for analysis.

rows.Title: Sports not shown on now bar
rows.Problem: Now bar settings are on but no sports updates are showing
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar is not displaying sports updates despite settings being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in the Now Bar, but the interface is still functional and settings are accessible.

rows.Title: Sports from google not displayed on now bar
rows.Problem: Google notifications and live notifications are turned on but live scores are not visible on now bar. Google search personalization and web activity are also turned off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Live sports scores from Google are not displayed on the Now Bar despite notifications being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a core display area but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Device Upscaler Not Working Properly in Gallery
rows.Problem: Device Upscaler feature no longer works correctly after updating to One UI 7, causing images to turn dark or glitch, unlike on One UI 6.1 where it worked better.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Device Upscaler feature in Gallery stops working correctly after One UI 7 update, resulting in dark or glitched images.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature partially malfunctions after an update, affecting image quality but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: FPS drop observed while playing games
rows.Problem: Severe lag and FPS drop issue experienced while playing BGMI, with FPS dropping to 12–15 and occasionally as low as 5 FPS, despite the device having a Dimensity 6300 chipset
rows.Summarized Problem: Players experience severe lag and drastic FPS drops during gameplay, especially in heavy games like BGMI.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive during gameplay with FPS dropping to as low as 5, severely impacting user experience and gameplay functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Memory is low while playing heavy games, causing performance degradation due to low memory watermark and swap issues.

rows.Title: Copy pasting in browser not working
rows.Problem: Copying and pasting elements inside the web browser does not work. Only text copy and paste works. Tried with keyboard shortcuts and on-screen menu. No issue with other functions. Problem occurs in Chrome and Samsung's native browser. Similar issues reported by users on Reddit.
rows.Summarized Problem: The browser fails to copy and paste elements, only allowing text copy and paste to work.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial malfunction of a core browser function, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.

rows.Title: Lag observed while writing in notes app
rows.Problem: Words written with the stylus are not recorded correctly in the Samsung Notes app, and the input becomes inaccurate
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Notes app fails to accurately record stylus input, causing input inaccuracies during use.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to record stylus input correctly, leading to loss of user data and functionality during note-taking.

rows.Title: Sports from google not showing on Nowbar
rows.Problem: Live scores not working in nowbar
rows.Summarized Problem: Live scores from Google are not displaying in the Now Bar.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing users from viewing live scores, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Navigation bar overlaps in GPay
rows.Problem: Bottom navigation bar does not hide when entering UPI PIN page in GPay, causing obstruction and difficulty in PIN entry. This issue occurs across apps and is triggered after Android update, with upi payment input keys covering the keyboard.
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar fails to hide when entering UPI PIN in GPay, obstructing input and interfering with user interaction.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects usability in a key payment flow but does not cause device crash or data loss, and only occurs intermittently or in specific app contexts.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Now bar not showing live sports score
rows.Problem: Now bar is not working as expected for sports
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar fails to display live sports scores on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work as expected, but the device remains usable and no data loss or crash occurs.

rows.Title: Type-C earphones shows USB connected disconnected
rows.Problem: Phone charging works perfectly but when using Type-C earphones, USB connected/disconnected notifications pop up and the earphones don't work. This started after a phone update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Type-C earphones trigger incorrect USB connected/disconnected notifications and fail to function after a phone update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device functionality failure and user confusion, preventing proper use of earphones during operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Defect in USB connector pins causes abnormal behavior; H/W inspection required.

rows.Title: Call speaker is significantly distorted
rows.Problem: The call speaker output remains significantly distorted despite exhaustive troubleshooting using all Samsung Support recommendations
rows.Summarized Problem: The call speaker produces significantly distorted audio during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The distortion prevents clear communication during calls, making the device unusable for voice interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Cannot play game in full screen
rows.Problem: Game cannot be played in full screen after One UI 7 update due to display software settings affecting camera cutout overlap
rows.Summarized Problem: Games cannot be played in full screen due to display software settings that cause camera cutout overlap.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of game display functionality caused by software settings, not a complete system failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by app settings in the DisplayCutoutController overriding camera cutout handling; the same settings are applied as a countermeasure.

rows.Title: Screenshot captured automatically
rows.Problem: Taking screenshot while watching video without touching the device
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically captures screenshots while the user is watching a video without any manual input.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes unintended screenshot capture during video playback, which disrupts user experience but does not result in device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Unintended back tap from Registrar app triggers automatic screenshot. Countermeasure: Update app to Registar 1.0.61 to fix back tap behavior.

rows.Title: Overheating and battery drain
rows.Problem: Phone slows down, overheats, and battery drains quickly during normal and idle usage after updating to May Update. Factory reset did not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats and drains battery quickly during normal and idle usage after an update, even after factory reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats during charging and idle states, leading to significant battery drain and potential performance degradation, making the device unusable under normal conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: No abnormal heating instance observed in logs; in case of issue, secure logs immediately and revert.

rows.Title: Taken photo are blur
rows.Problem: Photos are blurred and error occurs while sharing log files; log files may not be from problem situation
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos taken are blurry due to unclear camera operation or image editing, and log files do not reflect the problem condition.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction in photo clarity and reproduction, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue may be related to hardware (camera module) or environmental factors like hand tremors; user should provide original image and problem-specific log files for accurate diagnosis.

rows.Title: Dream 11 notification not coming
rows.Problem: Dream 11 app does not receive notifications while other apps do
rows.Summarized Problem: Dream 11 app fails to receive notifications while other apps work normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The app does not receive notifications, which is a partial malfunction affecting user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Keyboard keeps popping up while browsing
rows.Problem: Keyboard keeps popping up and closing again and again while browsing
rows.Summarized Problem: The keyboard repeatedly pops up and closes while browsing the internet.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent disruption during browsing but does not prevent full device usage or lead to data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: AppBlock is using Accessibility Service to interfere with keyboard behavior. Countermeasure: Disable Accessibility Service for AppBlock in Settings.

rows.Title: Unexpected SIM signal loss
rows.Problem: Since updating to UI 7.0, I've been experiencing unexpected mobile data outages and intermittent loss of SIM signal
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience intermittent loss of SIM signal and mobile data outages after updating to UI 7.0.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete loss of mobile connectivity, rendering the device unusable for calls and data.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Poor Image Quality
rows.Problem: Camera image quality degraded after UI 7 update, photos appear greasy and noisy, earlier version (6.1) performed better than version 7.0
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera image quality has degraded after the UI 7 update, resulting in greasy and noisy photos compared to the previous version.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of camera performance, where image quality is degraded but not entirely absent or causing device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: This is not the original picture pointed out as a problem when checking the attached image. Log alone is difficult to analyze problems related to image quality. For more accurate problem analysis, please deliver the undamaged original picture where the problem occurred. We will proceed with further analysis after obtaining the original photo.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Check attached screenshots
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences excessive battery drain, particularly due to third-party app usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of battery performance, with specific app-level power consumption, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: According to analysis by GMS team, the "com.whatsapp" app is consuming power; this is a third-party app with no Samsung involvement, and its memory usage varies with test cases and device usage.

rows.Title: App icons in the folder are not correctly displayed
rows.Problem: App icons in the folder are not correctly displayed, for example for LinkedIn and YouTube icon it will show as Whatsapp icon and many others as mentioned in the screenshot. After One UI 7 upgrade only happening this issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons in the folder are incorrectly displayed, showing wrong apps like WhatsApp instead of LinkedIn or YouTube.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves incorrect display of app icons, which affects usability but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Battery life decreased after OneUI 7 update
rows.Problem: Battery life decreased by almost 3 hours after updating to OneUI 7 with Android 15, from 10 hours to around 7 hours under same usage conditions.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life has decreased by nearly 3 hours after updating to OneUI 7 with Android 15 under same usage conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows significantly reduced battery life under normal usage, which impacts usability and daily operation.

rows.Title: Heating in device
rows.Problem: Device overheats when using Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and outdated software, even after uninstalling unused apps
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats when using Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and outdated software, even after uninstalling unused apps.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheating can lead to performance degradation, potential damage, or safety risks, making it a high-severity issue.
rows.R&D Comment: According to given set of logs, pkg -> 'com.instagram.android' is consuming a lot of cpu causing device to heat. Looks like it's an third party app defect issue.

rows.Title: Homescreen display has a black bar after closing apps
rows.Problem: After closing any apps, half screen shows black bar
rows.Summarized Problem: After closing apps, the homescreen displays a black bar across half of the screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial screen display malfunction but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: As per the attached logs, the exact root cause cannot be found and reproduction steps are unclear. We need specific steps to reproduce the issue to investigate further.

rows.Title: Multi control not working properly
rows.Problem: When trying to move cursor from one device to another in Multi Control, the cursor does not go through. Devices connect successfully but cursor transfer fails.
rows.Summarized Problem: Cursor movement fails when switching between devices in Multi Control, despite successful device connection.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a feature, preventing full functionality but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: If the fix is able to included in the binary, swpl has to run additional MR update. But I checked this with the swpl, they won't do another MR(EOL) so there is nothing I can do. P615 dont have any plan MR for 13 or 14. Please use similar continuity service like DEX or Link to Windows.

rows.Title: Now bar animation glitch on lock screen
rows.Problem: Nowbar elements overlap and show a glitch when unlocking the device
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar on the lock screen displays overlapping elements and glitches when the device is unlocked.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual display of a key lock screen feature but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Watch sensor not working properly
rows.Problem: Unable to detect heart rate, stress, and sleep monitoring. These features used to work but are now not functioning.
rows.Summarized Problem: Heart rate, stress, and sleep monitoring sensors are not detecting any data despite previous functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working, but core device functions remain operational, indicating partial malfunction.

rows.Title: Wallpaper is getting dim
rows.Problem: Wallpaper is getting dim and phone is in dark mode; light mode is not working and wallpaper is getting dull
rows.Summarized Problem: The wallpaper appears dim and dull, especially in dark mode, with light mode not functioning properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a cosmetic visual effect related to display settings, not affecting core device functionality or performance.
rows.R&D Comment: The dimming is a normal screen timeout behavior; logs and screen records indicate capture artifacts, not actual display issues. Requesting clarification if issue persists.

rows.Title: Charging speed is getting slow
rows.Problem: Charging speed has slowed down after software updates, especially after ONE UI 7. Previously, phones charged within 1 to 1.5 hours with a 15-watt charger; now it takes over 2 hours. This issue is observed across multiple devices including Galaxy M52 5G and A53 5G.
rows.Summarized Problem: Charging speed has significantly slowed down after software updates due to overheating protection mechanisms.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of charging performance under certain conditions, not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Possible causes of slow charging are due to background app use and device temperature rise; charging current is reduced to prevent overheating, causing delays in charging.

rows.Title: Screen and notification bar flickering upon unlocking
rows.Problem: Screen and notification bar flicker upon unlocking, and call background functionality is inoperable
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen and notification bar flicker when unlocking the phone, and call background functionality is not working.
rows.Severity Reason: The flickering affects usability and disrupts the user experience during device interaction, especially upon unlocking.

rows.Title: Instagram causes mobile heating
rows.Problem: Using Instagram causes mobile heating and aggressive battery drain
rows.Summarized Problem: Using Instagram causes excessive heating and rapid battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheats and drains battery aggressively during app usage, making it unusable and potentially damaging.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. Meta has acknowledged the issue and stated it will be fixed in version v382. Users are advised to update the app, clear data and cache, and report logs if the issue persists.

rows.Title: Device Getting overheat while scroll insta & Youtube
rows.Problem: Phone overheats when scrolling through Instagram and YouTube, causing network to switch to 4G. Overheating occurs during normal use and even at room temperature.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats when scrolling through Instagram and YouTube, leading to network switching to 4G and reduced usability.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating during normal app usage causes device to become unusable and affects network connectivity, posing a major usability and safety risk.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating caused by Instagram CPU overload will be addressed in v382, confirmed by META; monitor post-update.

rows.Title: home screen glitches when rotate tab landscape to portrait
rows.Problem: home screen glitches when rotate tab from landscape to portrait after updating to oneui7
rows.Summarized Problem: The home screen displays incorrectly when rotating from landscape to portrait after updating to OneUI7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a visual malfunction during screen rotation, affecting user experience but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Google Sports not working in Now Bar
rows.Problem: Google Sports is not working at all in Now Bar while other applications function normally
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Sports is not working in the Now Bar section of the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a specific context but does not prevent overall device usability or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Now bar features have suddenly stopped working
rows.Problem: Now bar features have suddenly stopped working in my S24 mobile for the last three days, even though the now bar is on in the settings
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar features on the Lock Screen have suddenly stopped working despite being enabled in settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional after being enabled, preventing users from accessing real-time suggestions on the lock screen.

rows.Title: Gallery application not working
rows.Problem: Gallery application not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The gallery application is not functioning properly and fails to operate as expected.
rows.Severity Reason: The gallery application is not working, which prevents users from accessing a core feature, making the device unusable for photo management.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by insufficient log data showing delayed extraction after forced termination; countermeasure is to re-send logs promptly for further analysis.

rows.Title: Device Overheats During Usage
rows.Problem: The Samsung A35 device overheats during normal usage such as chatting on WhatsApp or watching reels on YouTube, even during small tasks. While there was a temporary reduction in heating, the issue has returned and negatively impacts user experience.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during normal usage like chatting on WhatsApp or watching YouTube videos, affecting user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating occurs during common tasks, but the device does not become unusable or crash, indicating a partial malfunction rather than a critical failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The heat levels reach up to 41°C under specific scenarios (5G, VT call, third-party apps), which is within normal limits based on external temperature and usage conditions; overheating is possible due to concurrent app usage and high current consumption.

rows.Title: Photos are grainy and blurry in low light
rows.Problem: Photos taken in low light are grainy, blurry, and lack detail, especially after updating to One UI 7, despite clearing camera app data and cache.
rows.Summarized Problem: Night mode in the camera fails to produce clear, detailed photos in low light conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a core camera feature under specific conditions, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is irreproducible and consistent across VOS and UOS; solution is same on both platforms with specific tuning commits applied.

rows.Title: Phone app not showing contacts and closes itself after opening
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7.0, the contacts app does not show any contacts and closes immediately upon opening. The app shows 'updating contacts' for over 14 hours despite having all contacts stored in Gmail. Clearing cache and data, and restarting the phone have not resolved the issue. No contacts are visible, preventing calls from being made.
rows.Summarized Problem: The contacts app fails to display contacts and crashes upon opening after an OS update.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes and fails to show contacts, making it impossible to make calls or access contact information, rendering the device unusable for basic communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: onUpgrade performs large operations from version 1708 to 1900, taking over 10 seconds and causing contact provider issues. Countermeasure: Move large operations to background and advise users to clear app data via Settings > Apps > Contacts > Clear Data as a temporary fix.

rows.Title: Contact app not working
rows.Problem: Contact app and call functionality not working; troubleshooting steps include clearing data, uninstalling and reinstalling app, but issue persists
rows.Summarized Problem: The contact app and call functionality are not working despite software updates and troubleshooting attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The contact app is completely non-functional, preventing users from accessing contacts, which is a core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: onUpgrade operation takes over 10 seconds with large contact database, causing provider issues. Countermeasure: move large operations to background; users should clear app data as a temporary fix.

rows.Title: Mobile hotspot turns on after restart
rows.Problem: Mobile hotspot turns on after phone restart; turns off and then fails to turn on again after some time
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile hotspot turns on after phone restart and then fails to turn on again after a period of time.
rows.Severity Reason: The hotspot functionality intermittently fails after restart, affecting user ability to connect to networks, but does not cause complete device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Remastering photos not available in gallery
rows.Problem: No option of remastering photos
rows.Summarized Problem: The remastering feature is not available in the gallery.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This device does not support Remaster feature due to device limitations. Please maintain current status.

rows.Title: Calendar app not showing correct date
rows.Problem: Calendar app date and date doesn't match
rows.Summarized Problem: The calendar app displays an incorrect date.
rows.Severity Reason: The date display in the calendar app is inconsistent, leading to a partial malfunction but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Remaster the image option not available in Gallery
rows.Problem: Remaster the image option is not available in Gallery
rows.Summarized Problem: The remaster image feature is missing in the Gallery app.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is unavailable due to device limitations, resulting in partial functionality loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This device does not support Remaster feature due to device limitations. Please maintain current status.

rows.Title: Photo Editor not working
rows.Problem: Gallery editing is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The photo editor function in the gallery is not working.
rows.Severity Reason: The photo editor is completely non-functional, preventing users from editing photos, which is a core feature of the camera module.
rows.R&D Comment: Update another method "convertToStringForCopyEdit()" that used in case of copying editing instead of using old method "convertToString()". This new method only convert the data of required attributes when copy editting instead of all atributes. It makes save data smaller and avoid larger than 4MB android limit or causing FC issue when copy editting.

rows.Title: Phone randomly restarting
rows.Problem: New phone randomly restarting
rows.Summarized Problem: A new phone is experiencing random restarts.
rows.Severity Reason: Device is becoming unusable due to unexplained restarts, which may indicate a hardware defect or system instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Six resets have occurred recently. It is a random reset of unknown reason, and if the number of resets increases, hw defect should be checked.

rows.Title: Smart Things widget doesn't show select devices
rows.Problem: After One UI 7.0 update, the SmartThings widget stopped showing devices in the widget, but device list is visible when long pressing to edit
rows.Summarized Problem: The SmartThings widget no longer displays devices in the widget view, although device list is visible when long-pressing to edit.
rows.Severity Reason: The widget fails to show devices in the main view, but functionality is partially available through editing, indicating a partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue caused by Google Work Manager enqueueing tasks without execution; team working on fix in next app update 1.8.33. Temporary fix: long press app, click info, clear data and reinstall.

rows.Title: Videos not playing in media applications
rows.Problem: Videos not playing in any media application
rows.Summarized Problem: Videos fail to play in all media applications.
rows.Severity Reason: Media playback is a core functionality; failure across all apps renders the device unusable for basic content consumption.
rows.R&D Comment: Attached logs and video are not in sync. Please retest in latest version under strong, stable network and attach new logs and video in sync if issue persists.

rows.Title: Add to contacts and update existing contact option showing again after saving number through call log
rows.Problem: Showing add to contacts and update existing contact option again and again after saving a number through call log
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'add to contacts' and 'update existing contact' options keep appearing after saving a number via call log.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature reappears after saving, causing user confusion and partial malfunction of contact management.
rows.R&D Comment: Edit to dismiss add contact dialog. Verified in phone app version 15.7.39.

rows.Title: Quick Panel Glitch
rows.Problem: Glitch found in quick panel
rows.Summarized Problem: A glitch is present in the quick panel interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the display of the quick panel but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: No NowBar charging animation on lockscreen
rows.Problem: NowBar lock screen charging animation does not appear when charging while screen is locked. Device care widget is not completely transparent. Tremendous battery drain.
rows.Summarized Problem: The NowBar charging animation fails to display when the phone is locked and charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The animation is missing in a key UI state, affecting user experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Phone has become very laggy while unlock device
rows.Problem: Since I have updated my phone to one ui 7, I have noticed that there are some jerks in animation, especially when I unlock my phone. Phone has become very laggy, and I also feel like it's heating more than usual.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone experiences significant lag and jerky animations when unlocking, especially after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag during unlock severely impacts device usability and creates a poor user experience, making the device feel unresponsive.
rows.R&D Comment: The lag is caused by the system redrawing UI components during transition from lock screen to home screen; countermeasure is to optimize UI redraw process during screen transitions.

rows.Title: Unable to open camera app setting
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, tapping the setting icon in the camera app causes it to close without allowing changes to settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access or modify camera app settings after updating to One UI 7, as tapping the settings icon causes the app to close immediately.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera app fails to allow setting changes, preventing user configuration, but the app does not crash or become unusable overall.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs to investigate the issue.

rows.Title: Now bar not showing live sports score
rows.Problem: Now bar is not showing live sports score
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar on the lock screen is not displaying live sports scores.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, but the lock screen remains usable overall, and the issue does not prevent core device functionality.

rows.Title: Calculator app opens with 0 on right side of cursor
rows.Problem: Calculator app opens with a 0 on the right side of the cursor instead of the left, causing any number entered to be typed as '60' instead of '6'. This happens consistently after updating to One UI 7, and the issue is present in version 12.4.00.11.
rows.Summarized Problem: The calculator app displays a zero on the right side of the cursor, causing incorrect number input.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot correctly enter numbers due to incorrect cursor positioning, leading to erroneous input and potential data errors.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Timing issue causes firmware to return wrong cursor position in first load. Countermeasure: Fixed in version 12.4.00.13 and will be released soon via app store.

rows.Title: Snapchat notification content always hidden
rows.Problem: Snapchat notification content is always hidden regardless of settings, even after resetting secure folder settings
rows.Summarized Problem: Snapchat notification content is always hidden regardless of user settings in secure folder.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of notification visibility settings, not causing device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no log for the security folder, so it is impossible to check how the settings were set. Try turning the option on and off, and if the issue still occurs, please send us a video of the reproduction and a dump log.

rows.Title: Background blur and gesture animation control not working
rows.Problem: Background blur and gesture animation control not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Gesture animation and background blur controls are not functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working, but the device remains usable and no data loss or crash occurs.
rows.R&D Comment: all gesture animation tuning will be applied on swipe from sides and bottom gesture settings.

rows.Title: Buds not near you popup when placed in case
rows.Problem: Shows "your buds aren't near you" when buds are placed in case and case is closed
