rows.Summarized Problem: The device displays a 'your buds aren't near you' notification when buds are placed in the case and the case is closed.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification appears intermittently and affects user experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Vibrate when answered feature not working
rows.Problem: The vibrate when a call is answered feature is not working on S24 Ultra after One UI 7 beta update and persists in the latest official One UI 7.0 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The vibrate feature when a call is answered is not functioning on the S24 Ultra in One UI 7.0.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a specific context but does not cause device unavailability or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: The answer/end call vibration is currently controlled via Sounds and Vibration settings in One UI 7.0; it will be fixed in One UI 等, with force vibration for answer/end call in One UI 8.0.

rows.Title: Battery drain issue
rows.Problem: Battery drain observed after UI 7 update on Galaxy A16 5G
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain after UI 7 update due to system failing to enter suspend mode when screen is off.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable due to rapid battery depletion, preventing normal operation without charging.
rows.R&D Comment: The system fails to enter suspend mode during off-screen periods due to persistent wake locks from WLAN and display timers; countermeasure involves capturing standby power consumption and verifying suspend behavior via logs.

rows.Title: Now bar not showing live sports scores
rows.Problem: Now bar not showing live sports scores
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar on the Lock Screen is not displaying live sports scores.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, but the device remains usable and no major functionality is disrupted.

rows.Title: Now bar not showing live score
rows.Problem: Now bar is not showing live score
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar on the Lock Screen is not displaying live scores.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing live score display, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Device switches from 5G to 4G
rows.Problem: The phone is getting heated and is going from 5G to 4
rows.Summarized Problem: The device switches from 5G to 4G and becomes overheated during network usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is switching from 5G to 4G, which indicates a major network malfunction leading to potential performance degradation and overheating, making the device unusable under normal usage conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Location Tags Not Working
rows.Problem: Many glitches and bugs reported
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot turn on location tags as the process fails with multiple popups and no clear feedback.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to complete its intended function but does not cause device crash or data loss, indicating partial malfunction.

rows.Title: Battery widget not displaying anything
rows.Problem: Home screen has glitches, now bar location is unstable, sometimes below, above, or on left/right of fingerprint sensor, keyboard has ghost touches during typing
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery widget on the home screen is not displaying any content.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visibility of a key UI element but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not reproducing in the latest ONEUI Home version 16.0.09.19 or above.

rows.Title: YouTube shifts to 1080p60 from 4K
rows.Problem: YouTube tries to play 4K videos in 1080p or 1080p60 instead of 2160p when requested
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube fails to play 4K videos at 2160p resolution and defaults to 1080p or 1080p60 instead.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where the app does not respect the requested 4K resolution, but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue has already been reported to Google. Fix will be provided as a new version of YouTube in the Play Store.

rows.Title: Frame drop observed while playing games
rows.Problem: Video glitches occur on multiple apps like Instagram and YouTube after updating to One UI 7 and Android 15. Game FPS drops from 60 to 30 and experiences frequent FPS drops. Also faces battery drain and 5G connectivity issues. Same SIM, same device, friend experiences 5G properly but user does not.
rows.Summarized Problem: Game FPS drops from 60 to 30 and experiences frequent frame drops after updating to One UI 7 and Android 15.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive during gameplay with significant performance degradation, impacting core functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Please ask customer to take a video of issue when game FPS was limited to 30FPS

rows.Title: Quick panel transparency lost
rows.Problem: Quick panel has become dark and no more transparency is seen after updating to One UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The Quick Panel has lost its transparency and now appears dark after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance but does not impact device usability or core functionality.

rows.Title: Navigation bar overlaps
rows.Problem: The navigation bar is blocking the app, making it difficult to write. Previously, the app border extended to the navigation bar; this issue started after OneUI 7 and did not exist in earlier versions.
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar is overlapping the app interface, blocking content and impairing usability.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects app usability but does not cause device failure or data loss, and is partially mitigated by adjusting the navigation bar layout.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue needs to be checked from the app side, as the app needs to add an offset for the navigation bar.

rows.Title: WhatsApp calls automatically muted during incoming call
rows.Problem: WhatsApp calls automatically mute during incoming calls, even though normal calls work fine; muting occurs intermittently during both WhatsApp and regular calls
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp calls automatically mute during incoming calls, affecting usability and user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent failure of a core feature during calls, but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: No record found of call mute during WhatsApp; requires video evidence and user troubleshooting via call settings.

rows.Title: Spotify doesn't update the song
rows.Problem: Spotify keeps showing the last played song and does not update to the currently playing song. Audio from other apps stops when the last played song notification is cleared. The notification media card does not switch to the currently playing audio when a song is stopped.
rows.Summarized Problem: Spotify fails to update the currently playing song and continues to show the last played song, with notification media not switching when playback changes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent audio feedback but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Contact screen doesn't scroll when opened via messages
rows.Problem: Contact screen fully hangs when opening a contact from SMS app, but device does not hang
rows.Summarized Problem: The contact screen fails to scroll when opened from the SMS app, causing a full hang of the screen interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The contact screen completely hangs when accessed from SMS, making it unusable for users to view or interact with contacts.
rows.R&D Comment: No specific logs available and cannot reproduce on real device.

rows.Title: Keyboard panel overlaps search dialog box
rows.Problem: The new placement of search box is getting hidden by the keyboard pane, making it incompletely visible and creating a bad user experience
rows.Summarized Problem: The keyboard panel overlaps and hides the search dialog box, making it partially visible and impairing usability.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility and usability of the search function but does not cause device failure or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is not reproduced in latest binary; recommend updating software, clearing cache, and updating gboard.

rows.Title: Now brief not showing on lock screen now bar
rows.Problem: Now brief is not showing on the now bar in lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief is not displaying on the Now Bar in the Lock Screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing users from seeing important information on the lock screen, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Phone charges slowly and has unstable connection with USB cable; battery drains faster after UI 7.0 update; device gets heated up
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone experiences rapid battery drain and overheating, especially after the UI 7.0 update, with slow and unstable charging via USB.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is not usable due to rapid battery drain and overheating, which significantly impacts daily operation and may lead to data loss or device damage.

rows.Title: Game mode not working properly
rows.Problem: The game mode in the modes and routines app is not working properly and keeps pushing notifications while gaming, despite all necessary settings being turned on. The feature is too buggy.
rows.Summarized Problem: The game mode in the modes and routines app is not working properly and continues to push notifications during gaming.
rows.Severity Reason: The game mode is buggy and actively pushing notifications during gaming, which undermines the intended gaming experience and causes user frustration.

rows.Title: Widget pops up when notification panel is dragged down
rows.Problem: Unwanted widget appears when pulling down to open notifications panel and remains after restart
rows.Summarized Problem: An unwanted widget appears and persists when the notification panel is pulled down.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the user interface during a common interaction but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Camera screen shows green and red dots
rows.Problem: Screen shows green color and red dots when face appears in camera; issue persists after reset and safe mode boot
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera display shows a green background with red dots when a face appears.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen display anomaly prevents normal camera operation and user interaction, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Defect in front camera image sensor; Countermeasure: Recommend customer visit service center for camera module exchange.

rows.Title: Game Booster not compatible with device
rows.Problem: Game Booster not found in Galaxy Store; shows compatibility error when accessed via external link
rows.Summarized Problem: Game Booster is not available in the Galaxy Store and shows compatibility error when accessed via external link.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not available in the official store and users cannot access it through intended channels, but core functionality is not disrupted or lost.
rows.R&D Comment: Game Booster is not available in Galaxy Store; it is a third-party app and not part of the official ecosystem.

rows.Title: Phone randomly restarting
rows.Problem: My phone randomly restarts every 5 minutes and gets stuck before switching off. The device was previously working fine but now behaves unstably after an update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone randomly restarts and gets stuck every 5 minutes, indicating unstable power management.
rows.Severity Reason: The device repeatedly restarts and becomes unresponsive, making it unusable and suggesting a critical system-level failure.
rows.R&D Comment: There are several UFS link layer errors in the logs, indicating a hardware-level issue with the AP or UFS component; the user should be guided to visit a customer service center for hardware inspection.

rows.Title: Issue in camera quality while switching from 0.6x to 5x
rows.Problem: Video exposure shifts when camera is moved up, causing lower part of video to become extremely dark. Focus becomes haywire when switching from 0.6x to 5x zoom.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera exposure shifts and focus becomes unstable when switching from 0.6x to 5x zoom.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes consistent visual distortion and loss of focus, making video capture unreliable and unusable under normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Camera behavior is governed by zoom ratio; initial lens position resets based on previous focus, leading to incorrect exposure and focus when transitioning from 0.6x to 5x. The issue is inherent to the camera's zoom mechanism and will be addressed by recalibrating lens positioning during zoom transitions.

rows.Title: Side button functionality not working properly
rows.Problem: Side button frequently opens torch instead of gemini on long or double press, requiring repeated settings changes to temporarily fix. The issue returns after a few days.
rows.Summarized Problem: The side button incorrectly triggers torch instead of gemini on long or double press, requiring repeated manual resets to restore functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The side button intermittently fails to perform intended actions, leading to inconsistent behavior, but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The root cause is a misconfiguration in key dispatch handling for side button actions. A countermeasure is to guide users to check related apps like Routine and Good Lock for side button settings.

rows.Title: Phone gets hot while charging
rows.Problem: Phone gets hot while charging
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone overheats when charging after updating to oneUI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats during charging, which affects user experience but does not cause complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Lots of services are running, which causes system consumption heavily. Reduce usage of camera and speaker volume while using Facebook.

rows.Title: Turn on Wi-Fi scanning dialog box on using location feature
rows.Problem: Users receive a pop-up message asking to 'Turn On Wi-Fi Always' when creating location-based routines or using UPI payment apps like Gpay. This behavior did not exist in One UI 6.1.1.
rows.Summarized Problem: A pop-up dialog prompts users to turn on Wi-Fi scanning when using location features or making UPI payments, which was not present in previous versions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a user-facing prompt during common actions but does not prevent functionality or cause device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: To use network location and fused location while the Wi-Fi is off, the Wi-Fi scanning option must be enabled. Please guide the consumer to enable Wi-Fi scanning for location feature. Settings - Location - Location services - wifi scanning

rows.Title: Back gesture doesn't work
rows.Problem: Back gesture doesn't work sometimes in some apps; requires closing and reopening the app to resolve. Not limited to WhatsApp.
rows.Summarized Problem: The back gesture fails intermittently across multiple apps, requiring app restart to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent navigation failure across apps, disrupting user flow but does not render the device unusable.

rows.Title: Unable to change AOD clock style
rows.Problem: Users cannot change AOD clock style after updating to One UI 7; settings show 'LOCK SCREEN AND AOD', but changes only apply to lock screen, not AOD.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change the AOD clock style after updating to One UI 7, as changes only apply to the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a feature (AOD clock style) rather than complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The AOD clock and lock screen clock are integrated in One UI 6; this design choice is intentional and consistent across Samsung devices.

rows.Title: Unrestricted battery not able change settings optimised
rows.Problem: Battery drain rapidly after android 15 update, unable to change battery optimization settings for most apps
rows.Summarized Problem: After Android 15 update, phone experiences rapid battery drain and users cannot adjust battery optimization settings for most apps.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain prevents normal device usage and affects daily functionality, making the device unusable for extended periods.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Instagram app excessively consuming CPU in the background. This issue has been reported to Meta and is currently under investigation. Once fixed, it will be updated through the Play Store.

rows.Title: Photos quality worst and heavy grains after update
rows.Problem: Photo quality has deteriorated with heavy grain after update, no proper camera stabilization
rows.Summarized Problem: Photo quality has deteriorated with heavy grain after software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo quality but does not prevent device usage or cause system crashes.

rows.Title: Video playback appears pixelated and glitched in YouTube App
rows.Problem: Video playback appears pixelated and glitched in YouTube app on Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra (One UI 6.1), only in the app; works fine in Chrome. Likely caused by a rendering bug in the latest app or Android compatibility.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback in YouTube app appears pixelated and glitched on Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is limited to the YouTube app and does not affect overall device usability, but impacts video quality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be caused by a rendering bug in the app or Android compatibility; recommend guiding users to service center for PBA exchange.

rows.Title: swiping down quick panel glitch
rows.Problem: sudden glitch when swiping down the quick panel causes functional widgets box from home screen and lock screen to appear unexpectedly, persists after restart, resolves intermittently after some time
rows.Summarized Problem: A glitch occurs when swiping down the quick panel, causing an unexpected appearance of home screen widgets on the lock screen, persisting after restart and resolving intermittently.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent malfunction of the lock screen interface but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.

rows.Title: WiFi fails to connect or it gets much time to catch the WiFi device
rows.Problem: WiFi fails to connect or takes much time to catch the WiFi device when the router is far from the phone, especially on Samsung phones like Galaxy M52 5G and Galaxy A35 5G, compared to other Android phones.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung phones take significantly longer to connect to WiFi when the router is far away, compared to other Android phones.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in WiFi connectivity under weak signal conditions, affecting performance but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by Samsung's higher RSSI threshold for weak signal detection (−75 dBm for 5Ghz, −78 dBm for 2.4Ghz) compared to stock Android (−77 dBm for 5Ghz, −80 dBm for 2.4Ghz), which results in delayed network visibility. The countermeasure is to maintain this threshold to ensure seamless connectivity, consistent with Samsung's design goals.

rows.Title: Lag observed while switching between notification and quick panel
rows.Problem: Stuttering and lagging animation while switching between notification panel and quick panel, mainly when music live notification is there
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience stuttering and lagging animations when switching between notification and quick panel, especially with live music notifications.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable lag during a common user interaction but does not result in device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to resume call
rows.Problem: After hanging up a second call, unable to return to the first call during a call session
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot return to a previous call after ending a second call during an active call session.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in call functionality, preventing users from resuming a prior call but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains from 30% to 20% overnight after a UI 7 update, despite no background activity or storage issues. Phone is new and functioning otherwise.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain overnight, dropping from 30% to 20% after a UI 7 update, with no background activity or storage issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains significantly over a short period, leading to device unavailability for daily use and potential user frustration.

rows.Title: Battery Draining
rows.Problem: More battery draining observed after updating to UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: Device is experiencing increased battery drain after updating to UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial battery performance degradation, not complete failure, but noticeable in usage patterns.
rows.R&D Comment: User spends significant time in YouTube app using mobile data in poor signal areas, increasing energy consumption; recommend using WiFi instead of mobile data in weak signal environments.

rows.Title: camera cut out option not working properly
rows.Problem: camera cut out option not working when show camera cut out is selected, same issue with auto and hide camera cutout
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera cut out feature does not work when show camera cut out is selected, and fails under both auto and hide settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing under specific settings, preventing intended functionality but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The camera cut out feature is implemented at the app level, not the system; the issue may be app-specific. Users should test in other apps to verify if the issue is application-dependent.

rows.Title: People face category not created in Gallery
rows.Problem: In Gallery application, no people faces are shown in the search section, despite having photos of faces. The expected section for face-based photos is missing.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Gallery app does not display people face categories or associated photos during search.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: In the case of an OS update, taking photos regularly after the update will help the process start more quickly. FaceService operates as a background service and only works when the device is idle with the screen off and (nearly) fully charged. The analysis process requires a considerable amount of time. Please check whether your device has been maintained in a fully charged state for at least a week. Additionally, we suggest temporarily turning off 'Battery Protect'.

rows.Title: Screen not working after unfolding
rows.Problem: After One UI 7.0 update, phone screen does not come on when unfolding. Outer screen is blank. Phone remains on and receives notifications, but screen stays blank until after 2-3 minutes when it turns on on its own. Every time the phone is unfolded, screen is blank. User must now use phone unfolded.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone's screen fails to display after unfolding, remaining blank despite the device being powered on and receiving notifications.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen failure prevents normal device usage and requires the user to use the phone unfolded, which is not a viable or intended usage mode.

rows.Title: Video quality drops to 480p
rows.Problem: The video playback drops to 480p resolution when playing a 4K 60fps video, due to codec error on Exynos 1380 chipset.
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube video playback drops to 480p when playing a 4K 60fps video due to codec error on Exynos 1380 chipset.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot handle 4K 60fps video, resulting in degraded playback quality and failure to deliver expected video resolution.
rows.R&D Comment: The chipset (Exynos 1380) only supports up to 4K @30 fps; when attempting to decode 4K 60fps, the codec fails, and YouTube falls back to 480p. The error handling is application-level, and the resolution fallback is not user-configurable.

rows.Title: Now bar not showing on lock screen
rows.Problem: Now bar is not showing on lock screen despite all settings being turned on
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar is not displaying on the lock screen despite all settings being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, preventing full visibility of a feature on the lock screen.

rows.Title: Call Background not working
rows.Problem: Call background issue in CX device
rows.Summarized Problem: The call background feature is not functioning properly on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a feature, where the background does not display as expected during calls, but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: As per the logs, the default image is set by settings value; the issue is not reproducing in the latest version. If the issue persists, re-register the issue.

rows.Title: Fast charging doesn't working
rows.Problem: Fast charging doesn't working, only normal charging working. Using different Samsung charger with fast charging support also doesn't work
rows.Summarized Problem: Fast charging functionality is not working and fails even with a Samsung charger that supports fast charging.
rows.Severity Reason: Device cannot perform fast charging, which is a major function failure affecting core usability and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue scenario logs were not captured. Faulty charging port or charger can lead to slow charging. Please visit service center for HW inspection.

rows.Title: 2nd sim card not working
rows.Problem: After software update, second sim card is not working. Both sim cards were working before update. Sims are in correct slots and different devices work fine.
rows.Summarized Problem: Second SIM card is not working after a software update, despite being properly inserted and functional on other devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The second SIM card fails to function after an update, which prevents dual-SIM usage and renders the device unusable for users relying on dual SIM functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Physical device not detected during MIPi scan; specific device hardware issue. Countermeasure: Hardware gone bad; same root cause.

rows.Title: unable to take screenshots using the control panel
rows.Problem: After installing the recent software update, I am no longer able to take screenshots using the control panel. When I attempt to do so, a pop-up message appears stating: "Please allow Accessibility Service permission to use Screenshot." I have already contacted the customer support team and followed multiple troubleshooting steps they suggested in the settings. Unfortunately, the issue remains unresolved.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot take screenshots using the control panel due to a missing Accessibility Service permission request.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the screenshot feature, requiring user permission that is not clearly prompted or managed.
rows.R&D Comment: The Control center service requires Accessibility permission to function; this is a design-level requirement, not a bug.

rows.Title: Netflix not working on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Netflix app showing L3 video quality instead of L1 on device with security level 1, preventing proper use of L1 security level until app is reinstalled after reboot
rows.Summarized Problem: Netflix app displays L3 video quality on devices with L1 security level, preventing proper use of L1 security level until app is reinstalled after reboot.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of Netflix video quality on secure devices, but does not result in device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause: fallback security level not captured in logs; Netflix app sets property preventing L1 requests until reboot and app reinstall. Countermeasure: guide user to reboot and reinstall Netflix app.

rows.Title: Device overheating
rows.Problem: Device is overheating severely, unable to turn on and use phone
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is overheating severely and unable to turn on or use.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is overheating to the point of being unable to turn on, making it completely unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery's temperature is not stable, it's suspicious that thermistor has been damaged. It's strongly recommended that to visit CS and take a test.

rows.Title: Frequent FPS Drop in Real Racing 3 game
rows.Problem: Frequent FPS Drop in Real Racing 3 game when playing with Game Optimization set to Balanced and Battery Saver mode, despite previous stable performance with 60FPS in similar conditions.
rows.Summarized Problem: Real Racing 3 experiences frequent frame rate drops during gameplay, especially during scene transitions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent performance degradation during gameplay but does not result in device crash or complete failure of core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Frame drops occur during scene transitions due to tight CPU/GPU resource management for battery efficiency; fixed in next update version.

rows.Title: Blur portrait feature missing in gallery tool
rows.Problem: Blur portrait feature missing in photo editing tools after 7.0 update; old version had better functionality; editing and saving blurred photos results in noise
rows.Summarized Problem: The blur portrait feature is missing in the photo editing tools after the 7.0 update, leading to degraded image editing quality and noise when saving edited photos.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a core editing function, impacting user experience but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: From One UI 7.0, only 6 PBE effects are provided. Please keep the current status. Thanks.

rows.Title: Fast charging no longer works
rows.Problem: Fast charging and USB connectivity issues have developed after updating to One UI 7. Charging is inconsistent, and USB file transfer and PC detection are completely broken. The phone worked perfectly before the update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Fast charging and USB connectivity are inconsistent and broken after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to perform a basic core function (fast charging) and has broken USB connectivity, rendering the device unusable for essential tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Normal TA is detected and charging state is normal when cable is connected; test with another cable and use fast charger.

rows.Title: Wrong time display on quick panel
rows.Problem: Time in notification panel is behind and the actual time is ahead; correct time not shown
rows.Summarized Problem: The time displayed in the notification panel is incorrect, showing a time behind the actual time.
rows.Severity Reason: The time display is inaccurate, leading to user confusion, but the device remains functional and usable.

rows.Title: Camera quality has become so poor
rows.Problem: The camera quality has become so poor
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera image quality has deteriorated significantly after an OS update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial degradation of camera performance rather than complete failure or device malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by manual settings (e.g., EV -2, Spot Weight) altering image output; users should be advised to reset settings to default for consistent performance.

rows.Title: Automatic brightness not working properly
rows.Problem: Automatic brightness not working properly. It is good at outdoor but dims in bright indoor light and I can't see things on phone
rows.Summarized Problem: The automatic brightness feature dims in bright indoor environments, making it difficult to see content on the phone.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility in specific lighting conditions but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The terminal temperature rose above 40°C, and the maximum brightness was limited for thermal control. This is normal operation based on the thermal control concept and does not indicate any unusual issues.

rows.Title: Now bar sports isn’t working
rows.Problem: Now bar for sports isn’t working. I have turned on the notifications of Google but there is no option like live notifications.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar for sports is not working and there is no option for live notifications on the Lock Screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing and does not function, but the device remains usable overall.

rows.Title: Unable to play 2160p videos
rows.Problem: When playing 2160p videos, the device automatically switches back to 480p within 2-3 seconds and does not allow higher resolutions to be selected.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to play 2160p videos and automatically drops to 480p resolution within seconds.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot play high-resolution videos, resulting in a major functional failure that prevents users from viewing content at intended quality.
rows.R&D Comment: The Exynos 1380 chipset only supports 4K at 30fps; when attempting to play 4K 60fps videos, the codec fails, and YouTube restricts resolution options to 480p. The error handling is application-level, and 4K 30fps playback works fine.

rows.Title: Frame drop observed while taking video
rows.Problem: Camera video quality is only 480p despite FHD 60fps specification, though picture quality is acceptable
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recording experiences frame drops and degraded quality at expected FHD 60fps specifications.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction in video performance, not complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause: Camera damaged; Countermeasure: Restart device; check auxiliary camera; provide initialization log if needed

rows.Title: Wi-Fi sharing and power saving mode not available under Mobile hotspot
rows.Problem: Wi-Fi sharing and power saving options are unavailable on the device despite being available on another phone
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi sharing and power saving mode options are missing in the Mobile Hotspot settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a key network setting, preventing users from managing power saving and sharing, but the device remains otherwise functional.

rows.Title: Navigation Bar overlaps with screen content
rows.Problem: I can't close advertising window while watching movies due to navigation bar Close sign 'X' hide behind navigation bar
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar overlaps with screen content, causing the close button of an advertising window to be hidden and preventing users from closing it.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a specific UI interaction but does not prevent device usage or cause system crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by navigation bar positioning and can be mitigated by checking the effect of disabling goodlock navstar options.

rows.Title: Mobile data and wifi symbols not displayed on Quick panel
rows.Problem: Mobile data and wifi is on but not displaying in notification panel and the back button and keyboard lags a lot of times after the software update
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile data and Wi-Fi symbols are not displayed in the notification panel, and the back button and keyboard experience frequent lag after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of UI elements and intermittent lag, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Wifi icon and data icon are visible in latest binary (A35-EXXS5BYI2)

rows.Title: Dark mode not applied to Now Bar
rows.Problem: Now Bar stopped showing in dark mode after UI 7 update, previously worked fine for 1-2 days
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar on the Lock Screen is not displaying in dark mode after a UI update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a specific UI element but does not prevent device usage or cause system failure.

rows.Title: Automatically turn off and restarts when play some video or music at 40% battery or below
rows.Problem: My a34 automatically turn off and restarts when play some video or music at 40% battery or below
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically turns off and restarts when playing video or music at 40% battery or below.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shuts down and restarts during normal usage at low battery levels, making it unusable during media playback.

rows.Title: Hearing enhancements sound setting not working properly
rows.Problem: Left/right sound balance is incorrect when phone is in middle position, resulting in high treble and low voice; clear sound at edges but not stereo. Issue occurs with wired earphones, not Bluetooth. Full volume on phone shows no improvement; mono mode works with low volume.
rows.Summarized Problem: The sound balance setting on the phone does not function correctly with wired earphones, producing inconsistent audio output and lacking proper stereo sound.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent audio output but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss or crash.

rows.Title: Exits from media folder after trimming video
rows.Problem: Gallery app exits from media folder after trimming a video and saving as a copy, also occurs during image editing
rows.Summarized Problem: The gallery app crashes and exits from the media folder after trimming a video or editing an image.
rows.Severity Reason: The app exits completely after video editing, making it unusable for users who rely on video trimming functionality.

rows.Title: Network registration error
rows.Problem: Device not registered on network frequently
rows.Summarized Problem: Device frequently fails to register on the network.
rows.Severity Reason: Network registration is essential for device connectivity; failure prevents basic operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Poor PRX chain and high RX imbalance. Countermeasure: Address PRX chain and RX imbalance to stabilize registration.

rows.Title: WhatsApp old photos reappear in recent capture app
rows.Problem: Old WhatsApp photos and videos reappear in the gallery section despite being deleted multiple times, suggesting a bug in the gallery app or sync mechanism
rows.Summarized Problem: Deleted WhatsApp old photos and videos reappear in the recent capture app after deletion.
rows.Severity Reason: Photos reappear after deletion, indicating a fundamental data sync or restoration bug that undermines user trust and data integrity.
rows.R&D Comment: Photos reappear due to backup or sync from services like Google Photos or Samsung Cloud; users should check backup settings to prevent reappearances.

rows.Title: Image become darker after remastering
rows.Problem: Images are getting black after remastering, including every image
rows.Summarized Problem: Images turn black after remastering process in the photo editor.
rows.Severity Reason: All images become black, indicating a complete failure of the remastering function, rendering the feature unusable.

rows.Title: Theme Park app not working
rows.Problem: App is continuously showing error and not working after UI7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The Theme Park app is not functioning after the UI7 update due to compatibility issues with the new V OS.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is completely non-functional and shows persistent errors, preventing user access to a core application feature.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by incompatibility of the app's so file with V OS; the countermeasure is to update the app via the store to a version compatible with V OS.

rows.Title: Network issue
rows.Problem: Phone does not show network in notification bar even after mobile data is enabled in toolbar. Device shows mobile data is on but no internet access is possible.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone shows mobile data is on but fails to display network in the notification bar and cannot access the internet.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to show network status and cannot access internet, making basic functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to fetch SMS service centre number
rows.Problem: I am unable to configure SMS service centre number. It is disabled by default. Check in "Messaging - Settings - Advanced - SMSC" - it's showing not available
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot configure the SMS service centre number as it is disabled by default in the messaging settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing and prevents users from setting up SMS service centre numbers, but the device remains usable and no crash or data loss occurs.
rows.R&D Comment: The Android Messages app does not allow SMSC changes directly in the app. This is normal.

rows.Title: Wifi not working
rows.Problem: Wifi is not working at all. Tried resetting network settings and clearing cache files, but it didn't work. The wifi is not turning on.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi is not turning on and remains inactive despite attempts to reset network settings and clear cache.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot connect to WiFi at all, making basic internet access impossible, which renders the device unusable for core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: There is a FW crash. Need full ramdump to debug the issue further. If the issue persists even after rebooting the device, please get the device checked at the nearest CS center.

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor not working
rows.Problem: Fingerprint sensor stopped working after morning. User reports that when prompted to erase fingerprint data, saved fingerprints are deleted and cannot be re-added. Device states fingerprint data is corrupted and no option to restore or add fingerprints. Software is up to date.
rows.Summarized Problem: Saved fingerprint data is deleted when attempting to erase, and users cannot restore or add fingerprints after the operation.
rows.Severity Reason: Users lose access to biometric authentication entirely, rendering a core security and usability feature non-functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Failed communication between AP and fingerprint sensor; recommend reboot and service center inspection for hardware issues.

rows.Title: Device switching off automatically after UI security patch update
rows.Problem: Phone becoming an oven, lagging, and switching off automatically after one UI security patch update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device switches off automatically and becomes excessively hot after a UI security patch update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to overheating and automatic shutdown, which poses a safety and functional risk.
rows.R&D Comment: There are several UFS link layer errors in the logs, indicating a hardware-level issue such as ball crack or poor signal/power integrity; the device should be inspected at the service center.

rows.Title: Contacts application shows updating contacts and apps close
rows.Problem: After system UI upgrade, opening Contacts shows updating contacts and apps close. Call logs and dialer are not visible. Opening other apps like WhatsApp or Settings causes auto-close and return to home.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Contacts app shows 'updating contacts' and then closes, with other apps also auto-closing upon launch.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes immediately after opening, causing loss of access to core functions like call logs and dialer, making the device unusable for basic communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Large database triggers long onUpgrade operation exceeding 10-second timeout, causing provider failure. Countermeasure: Move onUpgrade to background runtime execution; clear local contacts data to recover sync from Samsung/Google.

rows.Title: YouTube app limits playback to 1080p
rows.Problem: YouTube app only allows up to 1080p playback even for videos that support higher resolutions like 1440p or 2160p
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube app restricts video playback to 1080p despite device support for higher resolutions like 1440p and 2160p.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure—higher resolutions are available but not supported in playback, preventing optimal viewing experience.

rows.Title: Taskbar option not working
rows.Problem: My tablet taskbar option is on but it is not working. Past 2 days I have do everything that I can. Now what to do sir.
rows.Summarized Problem: The taskbar option is visible but not functional on the tablet.
rows.Severity Reason: The taskbar option is present but does not work, leading to partial malfunction of the settings interface.
rows.R&D Comment: we have improved the taskbar code to fix this type of problem. Kindly help to update to latest ONEUI7.0 Market released binary.

rows.Title: Corrupt image showing in gallery
rows.Problem: Images appearing grey in gallery, occurs randomly
rows.Summarized Problem: Images in the gallery appear grey and show corruption randomly.
rows.Severity Reason: Images are displayed incorrectly, affecting user experience but not causing device failure or crash.

rows.Title: Camera flickers while taking photos and videos
rows.Problem: Camera flickers while taking photos and videos
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera flickers during photo and video capture.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera flicker prevents consistent photo and video capture, rendering the feature unreliable and unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: If the problem occurs all the time, please check camera module in service center.

rows.Title: Unable to connect wifi and hotspot
rows.Problem: After updating to one ui 7, cannot connect to wifi and hotspot. Issue persists after restarts and factory reset. No such issue in previous software version.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device fails to connect to Wi-Fi and hotspot after updating to One UI 7, with no resolution after restarts or factory reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents basic network connectivity, rendering the device unusable for internet access and essential functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Device fails to turn on Wi-Fi at boot due to vendor HAL failure. Countermeasure: Guide users to service center to check Wi-Fi hardware.

rows.Title: Samsung keyboard typing issue
rows.Problem: User cannot type 'I' and 'Eight' on the Samsung keyboard
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to type the letters 'I' and 'Eight' on the Samsung keyboard.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents basic typing functionality but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Issue not reproducing at end. Countermeasure: Recommend checking in next OS version and providing logs if issue recurs.

rows.Title: Battery protection icon visible when not plugged in
rows.Problem: The battery protection icon is showing even though the phone is not plugged in
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery protection icon displays incorrectly when the phone is not plugged in.
rows.Severity Reason: It is a cosmetic UI issue that does not affect device functionality or performance.

rows.Title: Sluggish during multitasking
rows.Problem: Phone lags severely during multitasking, basic apps become unresponsive, and memory issues prevent background app storage. Despite 4GB RAM, system shows low memory warnings and fails to run simple apps in background.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device lags severely during multitasking and fails to run background apps due to memory constraints despite having 4GB RAM.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable during basic operations due to severe lag and memory management issues, preventing normal app usage and multitasking.
rows.R&D Comment: System is reclaiming memory; high CPU and memory usage causes lag and low memory warnings under normal usage.

rows.Title: Text size auto changed in App
rows.Problem: App automatically changes text size after being killed and restarted, returning to original or set size
rows.Summarized Problem: The app automatically changes text size after being closed and restarted.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent text display but does not render the app unusable or crash.

rows.Title: Widgets not updating
rows.Problem: Widgets are not updating after UI 7 update, such as Samsung Health and Samsung Weather Forecast. Previously supported features like background blur and preview are shown during widget editing, which is inconsistent.
rows.Summarized Problem: Widgets are not updating after a UI 7 update, despite previously working functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a feature that was previously working, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. The issue is not occurring in the latest OS 15 launcher APK; please update to latest OS.

rows.Title: Phone still restarting and freezing up
rows.Problem: Phone still restarting and freezing up even after updating the software. Lots of glitches in the latest UI. Data loss during backup.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone repeatedly restarts and freezes after software updates, leading to data loss and UI glitches.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is repeatedly restarting and freezing, making it unusable and resulting in data loss, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: There are several UFS link layer errors; hardware check required (AP or UFS component), signal and power integrity issues.

rows.Title: Widget showing blank on lock screen
rows.Problem: The time widget on lock screen is sometimes not visible and shows blank, working after unlocking and locking the screen or entering the application
rows.Summarized Problem: The time widget on the lock screen occasionally displays blank and only becomes visible after unlocking or re-locking the device or entering the application.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent visibility failure of a key UI element on the lock screen, affecting user experience but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Bluetooth and Wifi turns off automatically
rows.Problem: Bluetooth and wifi automatically turn off and on immediately when phone is placed on charge, occurring two to three times
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth and Wi-Fi automatically turn off and on when the phone is charged, indicating a potential compatibility issue with charging state and connectivity settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent malfunction of connectivity functions under specific conditions (charging), but does not cause device unavailability or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The root cause may be airplane mode activation during charging; customer needs to observe airplane mode state at time of occurrence. CP silent logs are required for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Phone is draining quickly after update to one ui 7.0 and charging slowly. Using a 25w PPS charger, it takes nearly 2.5 hours to charge from 0% to 100%.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is draining battery quickly and charging slowly after the UI 7.0 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain and slow charging significantly impact device usability and user experience, especially with a prolonged charging time.
rows.R&D Comment: Possible causes of slow charging are due to background app use and device temperature rise; charging current is reduced to prevent overheating, causing delays in charging.

rows.Title: Cursor appears before 0 in input field
rows.Problem: The cursor (blinking input indicator) is placed before the zero in the Samsung Calculator app input field upon opening, leading to incorrect typing behavior where entering '482' results in '4820' instead of the intended value.
rows.Summarized Problem: The cursor appears before the zero in the calculator input field, causing incorrect typing behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in user input flow but does not prevent app usage or lead to data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a timing issue causing the firmware to return the wrong cursor position on first open; fixed in version 12.4.00.13 and available via QA store.

rows.Title: Gyroscope and Touch Control Delay in BGMI
rows.Problem: Noticeable delays in gyroscope response and touch controls while playing BGMI, causing gameplay to feel laggy, especially during aiming and fast movements. Issue persists even with background apps closed, performance mode enabled, and graphics set to smooth extreme.
rows.Summarized Problem: Players experience laggy gyroscope and touch controls during gameplay in BGMI, affecting responsiveness and performance.
rows.Severity Reason: The delay significantly impacts gameplay responsiveness, making it difficult to aim and move quickly, which is essential for competitive play.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue may stem from gyroscope fluctuation over 15dps; users need to perform a sensor self-test to verify whether the issue is real or due to device movement. A consistent test protocol is required to validate the problem.

rows.Title: Music player not working properly while playing games
rows.Problem: Music player not opening correctly while playing game
rows.Summarized Problem: The music player fails to open correctly when a game is being played.
rows.Severity Reason: The music player does not function during gameplay, which is a partial malfunction affecting user experience but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: As discussed with QA member, please share which music player customer is using. This is not Samsung music.

rows.Title: Unable to open One Drive via manage storage
rows.Problem: Unable to open One Drive or Google Drive from manage storage option, shows blank screen. In my files, both lagging first then loading.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot open One Drive from the manage storage option and see a blank screen, with lagging behavior in the 'My Files' section.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents access to One Drive but does not cause device crash or data loss, and functionality is partially available in 'My Files'.
rows.R&D Comment: We tried to reproduce the issue multiple times but could not succeed. Please update the next binary and verify the issue again. If the issue persists, attach new logs and videos for further investigation.

rows.Title: 5G not working
rows.Problem: 5G is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G connectivity is not functioning on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot establish 5G connection, which is a core network functionality required for modern mobile communication.

rows.Title: Mic mode option not showing in quick panel
rows.Problem: Mic mode option is not showing in quick panel when switching into voice focus mood
rows.Summarized Problem: The mic mode option does not appear in the quick panel when switching to voice focus mood.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing during a specific user interaction, affecting usability but not causing device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Heating observed in the device
rows.Problem: Heating occurs when using camera, especially in direct sunlight despite device operation being normal
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats when using camera, especially in direct sunlight, though normal operation temperatures are within specifications.
rows.Severity Reason: Heating occurs during specific usage in high environmental temperatures, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and temperatures remain within acceptable limits.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Device heats due to direct sunlight exposure, not internal operation; Counter Measure: Same as cause

rows.Title: App tray glitch
rows.Problem: Bug at recent app button after update
rows.Summarized Problem: The recent apps button is not functioning correctly after an update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Stuttering while typing
rows.Problem: Device stutters when typing in contact search, scrolling in WhatsApp chat, and searching contacts or gallery attachments in WhatsApp, with delays up to 15 seconds for information to appear.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences stutters and delays during typing and scrolling in apps, especially in contact search and WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: Stuttering and delays during core app interactions make the device unusable for basic tasks, indicating a major performance failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Device instability with only 3 minutes uptime; logs insufficient and device not stable. Require at least 5 minutes of stable uptime and proper logs for analysis.

rows.Title: Android Auto not working
rows.Problem: Android Auto does not work while Bluetooth music works fine
rows.Summarized Problem: Android Auto fails to function while Bluetooth music works normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Whatsapp screen is not working properly
rows.Problem: Whatsapp video call starting time screen shows a side part line in a straight way. When viewing the other person in full screen, they also see the same type of video, but the rest of the screen is okay. The issue appears to be software-related based on analysis.
rows.Summarized Problem: During WhatsApp video calls, the screen displays a side line in a straight line, and the other party also sees the same issue, indicating a display anomaly in the video feed.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video call visuals during active calls but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and the rest of the screen functions normally.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a display flickering bug in WhatsApp, and the countermeasure involves referencing known PLMs where WhatsApp has similar speaker icon behavior issues, indicating a software-level problem.

rows.Title: Content doesn't hide when in recent tab
rows.Problem: Security folder named 'key' shows original name in recent apps and content is visible through the screen without hiding
rows.Summarized Problem: Content of a security folder is visible in the recent apps tab instead of being hidden.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of UI visibility in a secure folder, preventing proper content concealment in recent apps but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Search option doesn't show the options
rows.Problem: I can't search for anything that I need or don't know how to navigate to, just because this searching is not working.
rows.Summarized Problem: The search function in Settings is not displaying any options or results.
rows.Severity Reason: The search feature is missing, preventing users from navigating or finding settings, but it does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No logs during indexing; Countermeasure: Change and restore language in Settings to resolve search issue.

rows.Title: Screen goes automatically blank while watching videos
rows.Problem: Screen automatically goes blank while watching videos due to proximity sensor mis-detection, even when the option to keep screen on is enabled
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen automatically blanks during video playback due to proximity sensor mis-detection, even when the screen-off-while-watching option is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen going blank during video playback renders the device unusable for content viewing, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Mis-detection of face presence by the proximity sensor due to environmental factors like occlusion or back-light; accurate analysis requires stored visual data, which is not available during operation.

rows.Title: Unable to login to Samsung cloud
rows.Problem: Samsung cloud notification for login keeps popping up and gets stuck on a screen, preventing progress
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to log in to Samsung Cloud due to a persistent notification that gets stuck on the screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from progressing past the login screen but does not cause a full device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a permission problem between the Samsung and Microsoft accounts; users can resolve it by reconnecting their accounts.

rows.Title: Device keeps switching from 5G to 4G
rows.Problem: Device keeps switching from 5G to 4
rows.Summarized Problem: The device switches from 5G to 4G despite being set to '5G only', unlike other Samsung models.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents consistent 5G connectivity but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is model-specific with intermittent behavior.

rows.Title: Contact sharing suggestions disable option not available in settings
rows.Problem: Contact sharing suggestions disable option is not available in setting
rows.Summarized Problem: The option to disable contact sharing suggestions is missing in the settings menu.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a key settings area, preventing users from customizing contact sharing behavior, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Contact sharing suggestions disable option has moved to GoodLock App -> HomeUp -> Share Manager since OS 15 version. Please refer to it for use and we apologize for any inconvenience.

rows.Title: Device over heat while play game
rows.Problem: Phone starts to overheat quickly when playing a light game like smash karts, which is one of the most CPU-intensive activities on the device. Even during daily usage, the phone feels slightly warm.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats quickly when playing games, even though the game is light and CPU-intensive usage is minimal.
rows.Severity Reason: The device reaches high temperatures (43 degrees) during gameplay, making it uncomfortable to hold and potentially affecting usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The app takes up high CPU and causes significant data transfer, leading to increased device temperature. This issue is due to a 3rd party application and requires the app owner to investigate.

rows.Title: Bluetooth pairing request by unknown source repeat again and again
rows.Problem: Unable to block Bluetooth pairing request by unknown source that occurs in milliseconds even after cancellation
rows.Summarized Problem: Users receive repeated Bluetooth pairing requests from unknown sources that persist even after cancellation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes irritation and interference but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: A nearby device in pairing mode triggers pop-up notifications. Countermeasure: Users should switch off the interfering device.

rows.Title: Captured image showing blur distortion while uploading on Instagram and social media
rows.Problem: Photos captured through camera show blur and pixel distortion when uploaded to Instagram and social media, but photos from screenshot folder upload without issues
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos captured by the camera show blur and pixel distortion when uploaded to Instagram and social media, but screenshots upload without issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of image quality during upload, but photos from alternative sources upload correctly.
rows.R&D Comment: This line artifact is usually happening when resizing large image to small one. This resizing logic is Instagram's policy. But to reproduce this issue, we need to get original image that showing image quality degradation. Please contact user and get the original image.

rows.Title: Notification Panel not working
rows.Problem: The notification panel does not blur instantly when accessed from the lock screen, resulting in a poor visual appearance.
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel fails to blur instantly when accessed from the lock screen, causing a poor visual experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual appearance of a core interface element but does not prevent device usage or cause system failure.

rows.Title: System sound not working
rows.Problem: System sound is now at only 30% volume even at full slider, while earpiece works normally, indicating speaker issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: System sound is significantly reduced on speaker, despite full volume setting, with earpiece working normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects audio functionality but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is partially resolved by using external audio devices.
rows.R&D Comment: Possibility of H/W component (speaker) defect. Guide customer to service center for hardware check.

rows.Title: Calculator show 0 value by default
rows.Problem: Calculator shows 0 value by default
rows.Summarized Problem: The calculator displays 0 by default when opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects initial user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification
rows.R&D Comment: Dear, this is new concept of Calculator app. Please keep current status. Thanks

rows.Title: Device is lagging and sound is breaking
rows.Problem: Device is lagging and sound is breaking
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing lag and audio output is breaking due to delays in audio thread writing.
rows.Severity Reason: The audio thread delay causes significant lag and audio interruptions, impairing core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Delay writing in audio thread. Countermeasure: Provide CP silent logs.

rows.Title: Camera not capturing detailed images
rows.Problem: Photos generate patchy details, especially when capturing moving objects. This does not occur in video recording and persists even after the latest update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to capture detailed images when capturing moving objects, resulting in patchy details in photos.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality during motion capture but does not cause device crash or total failure, and is present only in photos, not video.
rows.R&D Comment: The side effect of multiframe merging during motion is addressed by optimizing merging strength when movement is detected.

rows.Title: charging frequently disconnects
rows.Problem: charging connects and disconnects automatically frequently
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently disconnects during charging, causing inconsistent charging behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The charging connection drops frequently, leading to device instability and potential data loss during use.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Water detection and VBUS short detected in logs; Counter Measure: Check charger, cable, and power supply; recommend service center if environmental factors are ruled out.

rows.Title: Lock Star module not working
rows.Problem: Lock star module not showing all customization options
rows.Summarized Problem: The Lock Star module on the lock screen is not showing all customization options.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially missing, preventing full customization but not rendering the screen unusable.

rows.Title: Quick Panel UI not proper
rows.Problem: Bug appeared after one UI 7 update on galaxy S24 Plus
rows.Summarized Problem: The Quick Panel UI appears incorrect after the UI 7 update on galaxy S24 Plus.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial UI malfunction after an update, affecting visual consistency but not device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by timing issues and was resolved through structural modifications in B OS.

rows.Title: Notifications overlapping with lock-screen widgets
rows.Problem: Card-type lock-screen notifications are overlapping with lock-screen widgets enabled through customization, and cannot be edited as before the One UI 7.0 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Lock-screen notifications are overlapping with customizable widgets due to a change in notification card design post-One UI 7.0 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual layout and usability of the lock screen, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Battery icon not displaying
rows.Problem: There is no battery info on the screen displayed, even though Show Battery Percentage is ON
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery icon is not displaying on the screen despite the battery percentage being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of battery status but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Contact Name Auto changed when tap on it to call
rows.Problem: When searching for a contact and trying to call, the number is automatically changed to a name, but the name is the same. This is dangerous.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contact name automatically changes to a name during call initiation when it should remain unchanged.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a dangerous misrepresentation of contact information, potentially leading to incorrect calls.

rows.Title: battery drain issue
rows.Problem: battery drain issue after updating one UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain after updating to UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain renders device unusable without charging, leading to frequent shutdowns or reduced operational time.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain caused by third-party apps like VLC and Instagram; countermeasure involves charging and idle testing with log sharing.

rows.Title: Phone is automatically rebooting continuously
rows.Problem: Phone is automatically rebooting continuously more than a day, and it keeps restarting. Even after software update, the issue persists. Device cannot be used with features like Wi-Fi, hotspot, and flight mode.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone continuously reboots and fails to use essential features like Wi-Fi, hotspot, and flight mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is continuously rebooting, making it unusable and preventing access to core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: There are continuous FW crashes observed; need HW inspection at CS center.

rows.Title: Camera captured blurry image while zoom
rows.Problem: Getting blurry image when switching from 9.9x to 10x zoom in camera, even after updating to latest version. Over exposure and lens issue suspected to be software optimization problem
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera produces blurry images when switching from 9.9x to 10x zoom, despite software updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality during zoom but does not completely disable camera functionality or cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Mode button not display properly in Quick Panel
rows.Problem: There is a bug in the control centre, in the lower left corner. It sometimes works fine and sometimes goes wrong.
rows.Summarized Problem: The mode button in the Quick Panel does not display properly and intermittently fails to function.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent malfunction of a key UI element in the control centre, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Routine not working properly in Power Saving Mode
rows.Problem: The routine automation that should read aloud a notification when the battery reaches 85% during charging is inconsistent and fails most of the time, despite working occasionally.
rows.Summarized Problem: The routine automation fails inconsistently in Power Saving Mode when the battery reaches 85% during charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature works intermittently, leading to inconsistent user experience but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: camera performance
rows.Problem: camera performance is very poorer in one ui 7 android 15 also very worst camera experience in this phone with 50mp camera
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera performance is poor on UI 7 with Android 15, especially with the 50MP camera, resulting in a worse overall camera experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera performance is degraded but not completely non-functional, affecting user experience moderately rather than rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Now bar Overlap over the fingerprint scanner
rows.Problem: When media is in playback mode, the now bar covers the fingerprint scanner and obstructs the scanning process, making it difficult to use.
rows.Summarized Problem: The now bar overlaps the fingerprint scanner during media playback, obstructing user interaction.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue obstructs a critical user function (fingerprint scanning) during normal device usage, rendering the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. Also, as no release is planned for OS 14 and the issue is not occurring in latest OS 15 launcher apk. Please help to update to latest OS.

rows.Title: Unable to find Good Lock in Galaxy Store
rows.Problem: Cannot find Good Lock app in Galaxy Store on Samsung f56. Tried clearing cache and checking region, but app is still missing. Confirm if officially supported in region or if technical issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Good Lock app is not available in the Galaxy Store for Samsung F56 device.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is missing from the store, but the user can still use other lock screen apps, and the issue is limited to app availability rather than device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The device this customer is currently using is not supported by Good Lock.

rows.Title: mobile data does not automatically switch back to 5G after making or receiving a call
rows.Problem: mobile data does not automatically switch back to 5G after making or receiving a call. It remains stuck on 4G, and I have to manually toggle Airplane Mode on and off to reconnect to the 5G network.
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile data fails to automatically switch back to 5G after calls, remaining stuck on 4G and requiring manual Airplane Mode toggling to reconnect.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent connectivity problems but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: clock now bar card not working on status bar
rows.Problem: unable to switch now bar applications like music to clock, clock widget not available in now bar on status bar
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot switch now bar applications to clock on the status bar after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial functionality is missing—users can only access certain apps in now bar, but not clock, which limits usability of the feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Clock app is not a system app and does not update during FOTA due to deletable app policy; users should update clock app via Galaxy Store or Play Store.

rows.Title: Edges panel not working
rows.Problem: Edges panel is not working properly after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The edges panel is not functioning properly after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The analysis from provided logs is not sufficient. The issue is not occurring in the latest OS 15 launcher apk; please update to latest OS.

rows.Title: Heating observed in the device
rows.Problem: Heating issues observed on Samsung Galaxy S25 after reboot, temperature rises to 44 degrees due to initial load
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats immediately after reboot due to initial system load.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs during normal device startup and affects usability but does not cause complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The heating is caused by initial system load; users should avoid rebooting or report detailed usage scenarios with logs.

rows.Title: SMS not sent but received
rows.Problem: SMS sends failed on device but received by recipient; issue persists after SIM change, factory reset, and across devices; occurs consistently; secondary SIM works fine on other phones
rows.Summarized Problem: SMS is sent with a 'failed' status on the device but is successfully received by the recipient.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows SMS send failure while the recipient receives the message, indicating a critical connectivity or network issue that prevents reliable messaging functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by the network not sending a RP_ACK response after SMS delivery; the network needs to investigate why RP-ACK is not being sent to the mobile originator.

rows.Title: Task bar icons are not aligned properly
rows.Problem: task bar is not properly aligned it is misplaced
rows.Summarized Problem: Task bar icons are misaligned and misplaced.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the task bar alignment, affecting visual consistency but not rendering or device functionality.

rows.Title: Countdown not working in calendar widget
rows.Problem: The countdown is not working once the destination days are reached. It should show a negative number or a message such as "already reached". Please fix this bug.
rows.Summarized Problem: The countdown feature in the calendar widget does not display a negative number or 'already reached' message when destination days are reached.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to display expected content when destination days are reached, but the core functionality remains partially available.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification
rows.R&D Comment: Countdown uses 'day ago' instead of negative number with past event. It is right concept.

rows.Title: Lock screen wallpaper takes brief time to execute
rows.Problem: Lock screen wallpaper shows a loading animation when opening the lock screen editor, which takes a few seconds to load components such as the lockscreen, wallpaper, and object detection features.
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen wallpaper loading animation takes a few seconds to complete during setup.
rows.Severity Reason: The delay is part of a normal loading process for required components and does not impact device usability or function.
rows.R&D Comment: The loading delay is due to component initialization, including lockscreen, wallpaper, and object detection; no action required as it is intentional and within expected behavior.

rows.Title: Sluggish in selecting a contact
rows.Problem: Calling app is malfunctioning after software update; selecting a contact causes another contact to be selected and a call to connect unexpectedly.
rows.Summarized Problem: The calling app malfunctions when selecting a contact, causing an unintended contact to be selected and a call to connect.
