rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to function correctly during contact selection, leading to unintended calls and potential user confusion or security risks.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by list redraw during contact expand due to SamsungSearch order changes. The fix prevents list redraw unless actual data changes or refresh occurs, ensuring stability and usability.

rows.Title: Issue observed in device uptime
rows.Problem: Device uptime is reported as 250 hours, which corresponds to about 10.4 days of continuous use. User reports using the phone for only 3 to 4 hours per day, suggesting the device may not have been rebooted in over a week.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device uptime is abnormally high, indicating the phone has not been rebooted in over 10 days despite typical daily usage of 3 to 4 hours.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of system monitoring, as uptime is not accurately reflecting actual device usage due to lack of reboots, but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Uptime is actually the time since last reboot; user has not rebooted the device in over 10 days, and this needs to be verified with customer.

rows.Title: Superfast charging not working
rows.Problem: Phone charging only works in one angle and can get stuck, showing super fast charging but remaining stuck for hours, despite using original Samsung adapter and cable
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone's fast charging feature works only in one specific angle and can get stuck, causing prolonged charging delays.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to charge properly under normal conditions, leading to inconsistent and prolonged charging times, which renders the charging function unreliable and potentially unusable.

rows.Title: App crashes after update
rows.Problem: Apps crash when phone is on charging and when removed from charging, phone heats more than usual during charging
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps crash and device overheats when charging.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheats during charging and apps crash, leading to potential device instability and unsafe operation.

rows.Title: Update message persists after update
rows.Problem: Software update pending message shows despite device indicating it is up to date
rows.Summarized Problem: The device displays a pending software update message even though it shows as up to date.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in the update status display, leading to user confusion but does not prevent device operation or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: As per analysis from FOTA side, device already has the latest version. EOL Model. Pls check ?

rows.Title: Unable to connect device via Android Auto
rows.Problem: When I connect my phone to car by android auto it always shows error check attachment and bluetooth get disconnected from car automatically
rows.Summarized Problem: Android Auto connection fails with error message and Bluetooth disconnects automatically when connecting to car.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent failure in pairing and connection, but does not render the device unusable or lead to data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Disable Android Auto app in Settings > Apps > Android Auto. Counter Measure: Same as cause.

rows.Title: Glance not working
rows.Problem: Glance feature does not work on NASA astronaut wallpaper and stopped functioning
rows.Summarized Problem: The Glance feature fails to function on specific wallpapers, such as the NASA astronaut wallpaper.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working on a specific wallpaper, but the device remains usable and core functions are intact.

rows.Title: 5G network issue
rows.Problem: Device connects to Jio 5G network but internet does not work; internet works when switching to LTE. Issue started 2-3 months ago. No SIM or coverage issues. Problem likely related to 5G data routing or software compatibility.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device connects to 5G but has no internet access, while LTE works fine, indicating a software compatibility or 5G data routing issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality (internet only works on LTE), but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a potential software compatibility problem with 5G data routing and requires CP silent logs for further analysis.

rows.Title: Secure folder cannot be launched due to security policy
rows.Problem: A popup appears repeatedly stating that security policy prevents installation of secure folder. User has checked all settings and found no mismatches. The issue persists despite correct configuration.
rows.Summarized Problem: The secure folder cannot be launched because of a security policy restriction, despite proper configuration and no detected mismatches.
rows.Severity Reason: The secure folder is a core feature that users expect to function after setup, and its failure to launch due to a policy issue renders the device unusable for secure data storage.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by inconsistent device ownership properties (ro.organization_owned=false, persist.sys.knox.device_owner=true), and the countermeasure is to factory reset the device to correct these properties.

rows.Title: Unable to change music track
rows.Problem: Unable to change music track. Just stuck to one only.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change music tracks and are stuck on a single track.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature to change music tracks is completely non-functional, preventing normal use of the music playback feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Attached video and logs are not in sync. So, we cannot analyse the issue. Please attach new logs and video in sync. Counter Measure: Attached video and logs are not in sync. So, we cannot analyse the issue. Please attach new logs and video in sync.

rows.Title: Multi touch not working while gaming
rows.Problem: Automatic closure of apps, touch control not working, and screen multi touch failure during gameplay, especially when typing or scrolling in apps like reels, causing inability to record gameplay
rows.Summarized Problem: Multi-touch functionality fails during gameplay, leading to app closures and unresponsive touch controls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete loss of control during gaming, making it unusable for gameplay and recording.

rows.Title: Unable to turn on WiFI option
rows.Problem: Need to repeatedly send multiple times to turn on WiFi. Logs and video available.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot successfully turn on WiFi, requiring multiple attempts to activate.
rows.Severity Reason: The WiFi function fails to initialize properly, requiring repeated user input and failing to respond, making the device unusable for network connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: There is a FW crash issue. Need full ramdump to check further with QCom. If the issue persists after reboot, check hardware for WLAN IC problems.

rows.Title: Failed to create theme file
rows.Problem: Error while customising app icons
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot customise app icons due to an error when trying to create a theme file.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full customisation of app icons but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by incompatibility of the APK-based theme park with V OS. The solution is to use the latest version of the theme park from the store.

rows.Title: Digital wellbeing data not showing
rows.Problem: Digital wellbeing data isn't showing for June 1 to 7
rows.Summarized Problem: Digital wellbeing data is not displaying for a specific date range.
rows.Severity Reason: The data is missing for a defined period, affecting user visibility but not causing device failure or crash.

rows.Title: Latency issues during writing
rows.Problem: Latency lack during writing in Samsung Notes and search bar of apps or search engines
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience latency during writing in Samsung Notes and app search bars.
rows.Severity Reason: Latency during writing and searching severely impacts usability and device responsiveness, making core functions unresponsive.

rows.Title: Ai functions of writing assist not working
rows.Problem: AI functions of writing assist do not work properly, grommer edit and composer tool not working. The composer tool never works.
rows.Summarized Problem: AI writing assist functions, including grommer edit and composer tool, are not working properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The AI writing assist functions are completely failing, preventing users from using essential keyboard features.

rows.Title: Now Brief not showing on lock screen
rows.Problem: Now Brief was showing on lock screen 24/7 after purchase but after May update, it now appears only at specific times and disappears when clicked. Notification option is blocked.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief feature is no longer showing on the lock screen consistently and disappears when clicked after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature appears intermittently and disappears upon interaction, leading to partial functionality loss but not complete device failure.

rows.Title: Sim cards not detected
rows.Problem: Both sim cards not being detected after updating to One UI 7, leading to cell signal issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Both SIM cards are not detected after updating to One UI 7, resulting in no cell signal.
rows.Severity Reason: Device fails to detect SIM cards, leading to complete loss of network connectivity, making the device unusable for calls or data.
rows.R&D Comment: Physical device check fails during MIPI scan. HW gone bad. Need to send device to HW team or factory for further verification of MIPI failures.

rows.Title: Network 5G keeps disabling when phone heats
rows.Problem: 5G keeps disabling when phone heats and the hotspot is also unstable, my other device keeps saying no internet when on my phone i can use it
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G connectivity disables when the phone heats up, and hotspot becomes unstable, causing other devices to lose internet access.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device unusability in real-world conditions, especially in hot environments, leading to loss of connectivity for multiple devices.
rows.R&D Comment: If internal load is not high, device temperature may rise in high ambient environments; recommend checking cooling conditions and usage scenarios.

rows.Title: Call waiting option not working
rows.Problem: Call waiting not working since I purchase this device
rows.Summarized Problem: Call waiting functionality is not working on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The call waiting feature is completely missing, preventing users from receiving call notifications during active calls.

rows.Title: Shortcut apps on lock screen do not reset to original size when now bar is closed
rows.Problem: Shortcut apps on lock screen minimize when now bar is used and do not return to original size after now bar is closed
rows.Summarized Problem: Shortcut apps on the lock screen minimize when the now bar is active and fail to return to their original size after the now bar is closed.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality of lock screen interface but does not cause device to crash or become unusable.

rows.Title: Sound quality degraded
rows.Problem: Audio quality has drastically decreased with recent updates, resulting in reduced volume, weak bass, and muddy sound. Users are considering switching to other brands due to poor audio performance.
rows.Summarized Problem: Audio quality has significantly degraded after software updates, with users reporting muddy, low-volume sound and weak bass.
rows.Severity Reason: The audio degradation severely impacts user experience and leads to potential device abandonment, making it a critical usability and functionality issue.
rows.R&D Comment: It looks SPK issue. Enter *#0*#, check if the speaker works normally. If the sound is strange, please guide the diagnosis and repair progress at the nearest service center.

rows.Title: Device updated still shows update message
rows.Problem: One UI 7 not showing on phone despite being officially available
rows.Summarized Problem: One UI 7 update is not displaying on the device despite being officially available
rows.Severity Reason: The update feature is missing in the UI, but the device is still capable of receiving updates; partial malfunction of the software update interface
rows.R&D Comment: Ayushi, pls check with QA model owner & confirm by when One UI 7 FOTA will be available for customer

rows.Title: Instagram 2-step authentication error
rows.Problem: User gets error stating they need to update their app version, despite having the latest version installed
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are shown an error indicating they need to update Instagram app version, even when the app is already up to date.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in the authentication flow, preventing users from completing 2-step verification, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Device heating
rows.Problem: Phone back panel and device get hot when using videos with speaker at higher volume. Overheating is observed during media playback with high volume, and low network conditions add to heat. This is a known phenomenon in past Samsung phones, but current performance and charging speed reduction negatively impact user experience.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device heats up significantly during video playback with high volume and under low network conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The heating is a result of high CPU and network usage during media playback, which is normal under actual usage conditions, but causes user discomfort and performance degradation.
rows.R&D Comment: Heat generation is due to high CPU and network usage during media playback; countermeasure is to optimize resource usage under high volume and network conditions.

rows.Title: Today dialog box not coming in a single line
rows.Problem: Today and yesterday labels in app console log not aligned when swiping up, appears as a bug
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'today' label in the app does not appear in a single line when swiping up, causing misalignment and visual inconsistency.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual alignment but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and only impacts appearance during user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not clear; no relevant logs attached. User should provide video and logs for reproduction.

rows.Title: Device is updated still shows update message
rows.Problem: Device is up to date but showing update message in security and privacy settings
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows an update message in the security and privacy settings even though it is already up to date.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where the UI incorrectly displays an update message despite the device being up to date.
rows.R&D Comment: Need to update "Security update" or "Google Play System update" that's why showing update pending. Check with customer if he has pending update to install for these and feedback

rows.Title: Not able to view recent apps
rows.Problem: Mobile hangs when scrolling through recent apps
rows.Summarized Problem: The device hangs when scrolling through recent apps, preventing users from viewing them.
rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs during a critical navigation action, making it unusable to access recent apps.

rows.Title: Blurry photo when zoomed in
rows.Problem: Photos become blurry or show bulging when zoomed in. This is consistent whether zooming before taking a photo or after. Group photos show the worst effect.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos become blurry or distorted when zoomed in, especially in group photos.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality during zoom but does not prevent photo capture or cause device failure.

rows.Title: Charging issue
rows.Problem: Fast charging has stopped working after Android 15 update. It used to charge to 85% in 35 minutes, now takes much longer and has not worked consistently since the update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Fast charging has stopped working after Android 15 update, taking significantly longer than before to reach 85% charge.
rows.Severity Reason: The charging speed has degraded after an update, affecting usability but not causing device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not clear from the issue description. Battery logs show no slow charging issues. Maintain current status.

rows.Title: Auto trim not showing scissor option
rows.Problem: Auto trim feature not showing in video editing options
rows.Summarized Problem: The Auto Trim feature is not visible in the video editing options.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the interface but is not fully unsupported or causing device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Video editor's auto trim does not support this model due to performance issues.

rows.Title: Camera quality is not good
rows.Problem: Color dropping and blur in photos, especially in high resolution, appears inconsistent with premium phone expectations
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos show color drop and blur, particularly in high resolution, suggesting poor image quality under certain conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial visual degradation in photos, not complete failure or device instability, but affects user experience in a premium device.
rows.R&D Comment: Exposure varies with environment; blur is likely due to subject distance, and appears in OnePlus 11 as well. Sample photos in high resolution and 12MP are recommended for comparison.

rows.Title: Fingerprint also enabled on restarting the phone
rows.Problem: After a factory reset, fingerprint unlock is now working when the device locks offline, whereas previously it only allowed PIN unlock for security reasons. This change compromises device security.
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint authentication is now enabled during offline device lock, violating the previous PIN-only security setting.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue compromises device security by allowing fingerprint unlock when PIN-only should be required, potentially exposing user data.
rows.R&D Comment: Exact issue faced by customer is not clear. Even discussed with Tester Ayushi Jha but exact issue faced by customer is not clear. @ QA please check and feedback with exact customer query.

rows.Title: Voice focus feature not working
rows.Problem: Voice focus feature not working after one ui 7 update in f15
rows.Summarized Problem: The voice focus feature is not working after the UI 7 update in F15.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing during calls, affecting call functionality but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The feature is available in the quick panel (swipe down during call); users should be guided to locate it.

rows.Title: One UI system crash
rows.Problem: SM-S908E update one ui 7
rows.Summarized Problem: One UI system crashes when the device is idle or not in use.
rows.Severity Reason: The system crash occurs during idle state, making the device unusable.

rows.Title: Front camera pix distortion
rows.Problem: Front camera shows pixellation distortion, especially in low light when recording at 60 FPS. The issue is due to minimum exposure time set to 1/60 second, resulting in reduced brightness and increased noise compared to 30 FPS videos. Auto FPS defaults to 30 FPS, so 60 FPS is not supported in low light.
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera exhibits pixellation distortion when recording at 60 FPS in low light due to a minimum exposure time of 1/60 second, causing reduced brightness and increased noise.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video quality in specific conditions but does not cause device crash or complete failure; it is a partial malfunction under certain usage scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: The distortion occurs due to low-light exposure settings at 60 FPS; the Auto FPS feature defaults to 30 FPS, and 60 FPS is not supported in low light, leading to increased noise and reduced brightness.

rows.Title: Eye comfort shield not working in normal use
rows.Problem: Eye comfort shield is working only in maintenance mode and not in normal use. Turning it on or off and restarting the phone affects its state, but it does not persist after restart.
rows.Summarized Problem: The eye comfort shield feature does not persist after restart and only works in maintenance mode, failing to function during normal use.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to persist across restarts and only works in maintenance mode, leading to inconsistent user experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Users need to open Settings -> Display -> Eye Protection Mode: Check if the color temperature level is the lowest? If it is not the minimum, the user needs to adjust the color temperature bar and re-add the LOG

rows.Title: 3x camera wobbling
rows.Problem: 3x camera is wobbling during use, especially in portrait and pro video modes, resulting in shaky footage. This affects professional photography and videography.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 3x camera produces shaky footage during use, particularly in portrait and video modes, leading to inconsistent and unprofessional video output.
rows.Severity Reason: The wobbling causes significant instability in video footage, impacting professional use and rendering the feature unusable for high-quality content creation.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: MIPI error in camera sensor module; Countermeasure: Service center reassembly or replacement of camera module.

rows.Title: UI lag observed in device while opening and closing the device
rows.Problem: There is more lag than before after the update, so please check and fix the issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits noticeable UI lag when opening and closing, especially after the latest update.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag is present after an update but is not severe enough to cause device unavailability or data loss, and appears to be temperature-related.
rows.R&D Comment: Lag occurs due to high device temperature triggering frequency reduction; countermeasure is to maintain current status with CS guidance.

rows.Title: Voice recorder not working
rows.Problem: Unable to use voice assistant in Gemini, Bixby, YouTube or other apps that support voice assistant. Voice recording not working in voice recorder app; no audio captured during recording or voice search attempts. Mic appears to be malfunctioning.
rows.Summarized Problem: Voice recording and assistant functionality are not working across multiple apps, indicating a failure in voice input capability.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot perform basic voice interactions across multiple apps, rendering core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Sports update automatically set block in Google Setting
rows.Problem: Sports update automatically block problem
rows.Summarized Problem: Sports updates are automatically blocked in Google Search settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing users from accessing sports updates, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Clock style chosen is diff from what it is displaying on AOD
rows.Problem: The clock style selected does not match what is displayed on the Always On Display.
rows.Summarized Problem: The selected clock style on the lock screen does not match the display shown on the Always On Display.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a mismatch in visual presentation but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was not reproducible in the latest binary; users are advised to verify in the latest device version.

rows.Title: Recent menu elements not working properly
rows.Problem: Problem with recent menu
rows.Summarized Problem: Recent menu elements are not working properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The recent menu function is partially malfunctioning, preventing users from accessing recently viewed items.

rows.Title: Charging not showing on lock screen
rows.Problem: The charging information is not showing on Lock Screen but is showing on AOD
rows.Summarized Problem: Charging information is missing on the lock screen despite being visible on AOD.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of charging status on the lock screen, which is a key user-facing display, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to load multiple apps with wifi
rows.Problem: Multiple apps are not loaded on wifi after the latest update. Microsoft Authenticator notifications are also not working when connected to wifi.
rows.Summarized Problem: Multiple apps fail to load and Microsoft Authenticator notifications do not work over Wi-Fi after the latest update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects app functionality and notifications over Wi-Fi, but does not cause device crash or data loss, and can be partially resolved by restarting the device.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Wi-Fi app loading and notification issues post-update; Countermeasure: Users should check Wi-Fi connection and restart device.

rows.Title: Pause USB PD charging when gaming option not workable
rows.Problem: Pause PD charging is greyed out in game booster settings even though using a PD 3.0 (PPS supported) 32W charger
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Pause USB PD charging when gaming' feature is unavailable in game booster settings, even with a compatible PD 3.0 charger.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not accessible in settings, preventing users from pausing charging during gaming, but the device remains otherwise functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Charger and cable must support PD charging; users should refer to user guide. Counter Measure: Same as cause; users should check user guide and ensure compatible PD charger and cable.

rows.Title: Network issue
rows.Problem: Network drops to single point; speed test fails to run. Same SIM works on other phones. Issue occurs with both SIMs.
rows.Summarized Problem: Network connectivity drops to single point, preventing speed test functionality despite working on other devices with same SIMs.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish stable network connection, preventing essential functionality like speed testing, and the issue persists across both SIMs.
rows.R&D Comment: The networking for UID corresponding to org.zwanoo.android.speedtest(10355) is blocked. Kindly allow background data for Speedtest app and check again.

rows.Title: Screen does not turn on after update
rows.Problem: After the One UI 7.0 update on the Galaxy A34 5G, the screen does not turn on even after pressing the side button or double tapping the screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen fails to turn on after the One UI 7.0 update, even when the side button or double tap is used.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot be powered on, making it completely unusable.

rows.Title: Status Bar Icons Dimmed on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: On the lock screen, the status bar icons — such as battery percentage, network signal, Wi-Fi, and notification icons — appear dim/faded instead of at full brightness. When I tap the screen once, the icons brighten for about half a second to one second, and then dim again, even though the rest of the lock screen content (clock) is normal.
rows.Summarized Problem: Status bar icons on the lock screen appear dimmed and briefly brighten when tapped before dimming again.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of key status indicators but does not cause device failure or crash, and functionality remains mostly intact.

rows.Title: Device is automatically shutting down
rows.Problem: My phone Samsung A53 is automatically shutting down and the network is also disconnected. I even tried resetting the phone
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone automatically shuts down and loses network connection, even after resetting.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shuts down unexpectedly, which renders it unusable and affects core functionality like connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: The problem is due to an ongoing exception; further analysis requires logs, and a service center visit is recommended for replacement.

rows.Title: Camera stabilization issues
rows.Problem: Camera stabilization quality has significantly declined after Android 15 update, resulting in shakier videos and photos, and failure to perform as expected after purchase.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera stabilization is now ineffective after Android 15 update, causing videos and photos to be significantly shakier than before.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera no longer performs as expected after update, impacting core functionality and user experience significantly.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to outdated binary (YDB) and missing stabilization fixes; users should verify latest update for stabilization improvements.

rows.Title: App turns on automatically
rows.Problem: Storage booster application turns on at midnight to clean storage but cannot complete the process throughout the day
rows.Summarized Problem: The storage booster app starts automatically at midnight to clean storage but fails to complete its operation throughout the day.
rows.Severity Reason: The app starts automatically but fails to complete its task, resulting in partial functionality, though users can manually disable it.
rows.R&D Comment: The behavior is normal due to auto-delete settings; logs are insufficient to diagnose failure. Users can disable the feature in settings->device care->storage booster->disable auto del.

rows.Title: Network issue
rows.Problem: Sometimes, suddenly the network goes away even though there is good network reception on other phones for the same network
rows.Summarized Problem: The device suddenly loses network connection despite having good reception on other devices on the same network.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent network loss but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Transitioning from AOD to lock screen is not smooth
rows.Problem: The transition between Always On Display and normal/lock screen is not smooth. The animation stutters, and the content on AOD doesn’t align properly with the lock screen, causing a noticeable visual mismatch.
rows.Summarized Problem: The transition from Always On Display to lock screen is visually jarring due to stuttering animation and misaligned content.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a noticeable visual mismatch and stuttering during transition, affecting user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Battery backup issue
rows.Problem: Battery life reduced from 10 hours to 5 hours after update 15, same usage conditions. Phone drains battery faster despite no change in usage pattern.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life has decreased from 10 hours to 5 hours under identical usage conditions after update 15.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery consumption is higher than before, but the issue does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drainage at 0.61% per hour is normal; request QA to provide logs with background apps removed to validate battery usage.

rows.Title: After update to one UI 7 it stuks after screen lock and restarts
rows.Problem: The phone freezes and restarts after screen lock, with noticeable lag and poor smoothness compared to previous UI versions.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device freezes and restarts after screen lock, with significant lag and poor smoothness.
rows.Severity Reason: The phone freezes and restarts after screen lock, making it unusable and causing a major functional failure.

rows.Title: UI not working
rows.Problem: Apps are crashing, the phone is lagging severely, and it shuts off with 'ui not responding' message. After shutdown, it takes 10 minutes to boot back up. Camera applications are also malfunctioning due to UI issues.
rows.Summarized Problem: The user interface is not responding, causing app crashes, severe lag, and prolonged boot times, with camera applications also failing due to UI instability.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to frequent crashes and long boot times, severely impacting core functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: There are several UFS link layer errors in the logs. The issue appears to be hardware-related, involving the interface between the AP and UFS component. The device should be inspected for signal and power integrity issues at the hardware level. Users should be guided to visit the customer service center for inspection.

rows.Title: WiFi not indicated when connected
rows.Problem: WiFi automatically connects after disconnection, but connection is not indicated on screen. Issue resolves after mobile restart.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi connection is not visually indicated when established, despite automatic reconnection.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user awareness of connection status but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The device logs show a connection event but no status update in the UI; user needs to restart device for indicator to appear. A fix should ensure the status bar displays connection status upon successful WiFi link.

rows.Title: Wi-fi not turning on
rows.Problem: My device's WiFi feature is not turning on at all. This has been happening since the last 3 months, in between it came back for a week or two but again went away and I have been without WiFi since then. I request the Samsung team to look into this issue as this is not only for my device but I've seen many devices with the same problem
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi is not turning on on the device, despite previous intermittent functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The WiFi feature fails to initialize consistently, preventing basic network connectivity and device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: We suspect it to be a hardware issue. Please get the hardware checked at the nearest CS center.

rows.Title: SAMSUNG NOTES app crashing on opening
rows.Problem: SAMSUNG NOTES app keeps crashing on opening after 10-12 days of random occurrence; clearing cache and restarting device did not resolve the issue. Customer care attempted remote troubleshooting but could not fix it.
rows.Summarized Problem: The SAMSUNG NOTES app crashes repeatedly when opened, preventing user from accessing important documents.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on opening, making a core functionality unusable and preventing access to important data.
rows.R&D Comment: It looks some info was broken of Notes app. Please guide us to reinstall the APK after delivering attachment in a below comment to the user without deleting current Notes app, and it should be delivered within 2 weeks because it is a temporarily signed APK. If the same problem occurs even if you reinstall the app, please register a problem again with a new log. We apologize for any inconvenience.

rows.Title: Hotspot not working properly when switching to 5GHz frequency
rows.Problem: Hotspot works fine on 2.4GHz but does not work when switching to 5GHz frequency
rows.Summarized Problem: Hotspot fails to function when switching from 2.4GHz to 5GHz frequency
rows.Severity Reason: The hotspot is a core connectivity feature that fails under normal usage conditions, making the device unusable for network sharing.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Wifi disconnects automatically
rows.Problem: WiFi on 5Ghz keeps disconnecting and reconnecting; works partially on 2.4 GHz. This affects other devices on the network. Issue reported by other users. Log data attached.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi on 5GHz repeatedly disconnects and reconnects, affecting connected devices and network stability.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent disconnections and affects multiple devices, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please check with you ISP for configuration settings or restart or reset the router.

rows.Title: Not able to set SMSC number
rows.Problem: Unable to update the smsc number in the phone
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot update the SMSC number in the Samsung Messages app.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing or not functional, preventing users from configuring SMS settings, but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Issue with messages database; Countermeasure: Clear app data and update app.

rows.Title: Camera cutout not working with some games
rows.Problem: Camera cutout option does not work with some games when navigation bar is set to gestures
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera cutout fails to function with certain games when the navigation bar is set to gestures.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails in specific game scenarios but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Game restarts when switching apps
rows.Problem: Switching from a gaming app to another app causes the game to restart, especially after the One UI 7 update. This issue affects multiple games, not just Call of Duty, and was not present before the update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The game restarts when switching from one app to another, causing disruption during gameplay.
rows.Severity Reason: The game restarts immediately upon app switching, making gameplay unusable and interrupting user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by aggressive background app management in One UI 7, which terminates game processes. The root cause lies with the third-party app, and no Samsung-side fix is possible; the app owner must address it.

rows.Title: Green screen when playing YouTube Shorts in Chrome
rows.Problem: YouTube Shorts videos show green screen and the device hangs for 2 to 3 seconds before restarting after the latest software update on Samsung Galaxy A34 5G.
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube Shorts videos display green screen and cause device hang and restart after software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs and restarts, making the device unusable during video playback, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Screen not able to switch ON after pressing power button
rows.Problem: Screen not able to switch ON after pressing power button intermittently. This happens 10 out of 5 times. All starts after latest update which I have done yesterday on 14 Jun 2025
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen fails to turn on when the power button is pressed after a recent update, occurring intermittently.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot be powered on properly, making it unusable.

rows.Title: device frequently auto-restarts and screen freezes on AOD when flashlight is on
rows.Problem: after updating to One UI 7, device frequently auto-restarts and screen freezes on AOD when flashlight is on
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently auto-restarts and the screen freezes on AOD when the flashlight is on.
rows.Severity Reason: The device auto-restarts and screen freezes during AOD, which renders the device unusable during critical usage scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: The customer does not mention time when issue occurs or capture issue. It's difficult to analyze root cause. Please help to share one more set of logs with matching timestamp video and mention time when issue happens.

rows.Title: Apps taking too long to install
rows.Problem: Apps download quickly but take more than 10 to 15 minutes to install. Some installations fail and require restarts to resolve. After restarts, issues may persist.
rows.Summarized Problem: App installation takes excessively long, often exceeding 10 to 15 minutes, and may fail or require restarts to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: The installation process is significantly delayed, making app usage impractical and potentially leading to user frustration and device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: Request to provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Phone not displaying anything
rows.Problem: Some apps auto closing, unable to get some contacts
rows.Summarized Problem: The smartphone screen is not displaying anything, and some apps close unexpectedly with issues retrieving contacts.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is completely unresponsive, making it unusable for basic functions like viewing the screen or accessing contacts.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: onUpgrade has large work from 1708 to 1901, taking over 10 seconds with large contacts DB, causing contacts provider issues. Counter Measure: Move large work to background; users can clear contacts data via Settings > Apps > Filter and sort > Show system apps > Contacts Storage > Clear Data.

rows.Title: Lag observed in device while scrolling and touch
rows.Problem: After the recent update May 1 security patch, my phone has become very laggy and slow with scrolling and touch issues.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits lag during scrolling and touch interactions after a recent software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of touch and scrolling functionality, which affects user experience but does not render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Abnormal external noise from charger causes touch panel noise mode; recommend using genuine charger and changing charging location.

rows.Title: Do not disturb notifications not working
rows.Problem: In DND Mode, selected apps should not send notifications, but all app notifications are visible on the notifications screen even after clearing them.
rows.Summarized Problem: Notifications from apps are still appearing on the screen even when Do Not Disturb is active and only specific apps are allowed.
rows.Severity Reason: Selected apps are still receiving and displaying notifications despite DND settings, indicating a partial malfunction of the feature.

rows.Title: Issue in removing filters & backgrounds on video calls
rows.Problem: Background remains completely blurred after removing camera effect during WhatsApp video calls on Samsung devices
rows.Summarized Problem: Background remains completely blurred after removing filters on WhatsApp video calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the background removal feature during video calls, preventing full customization but not rendering the app unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely due to a software limitation in WhatsApp's camera effect handling on Samsung devices; countermeasure recommends checking hardware functionality via Samsung service center.

rows.Title: Device hangs
rows.Problem: Device hangs, appears to have a surface layer covering screen similar to Facebook Messenger bubble
rows.Summarized Problem: The device hangs with a surface layer covering the screen, resembling a Facebook Messenger bubble.
rows.Severity Reason: The device does not fully freeze or crash, but exhibits a surface layer issue and partial unresponsiveness, indicating a partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: User reports a surface layer covering screen; recommend checking apps with 'Appear on Top' setting in Settings to identify and disable suspicious apps.

rows.Title: Sports from google not working on lock screen
rows.Problem: Google Sports not showing on Now Bar in My Phone; Now Bar is not working for sports scores during live match
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Sports content is not displaying on the Now Bar during live matches.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is essential for real-time sports updates during live events, and its absence renders the lock screen unusable for users following live matches.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains too quickly even when not in use, lasting only 3.5 hours on an 80% charge with screen on.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain even when not in use, lasting only 3.5 hours on an 80% charge with screen on.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable quickly due to excessive battery consumption, limiting practical usage time.
rows.R&D Comment: Lots of services are running, which causes system consumption heavily. Reduce usage of camera recording and speaker volume while using Facebook; turn off WiFi when screen is off.

rows.Title: Strange video observed in recorded video
rows.Problem: Noise persists in recorded video despite following all error reporting methods; issue occurs only on this model and not seen in others
rows.Summarized Problem: Noise is present in recorded videos despite following all error reporting steps, and the issue is model-specific.
rows.Severity Reason: The noise persists in video recordings, affecting functionality but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.

rows.Title: Time taken to full charge the device not displayed
rows.Problem: charging information is not showing while device is charging it is showing only battery % like 75% it's not showing how much time it will take for charging
rows.Summarized Problem: The device does not display the expected charging time during charging, only showing battery percentage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of charging information, preventing users from knowing charging duration, but does not cause device freeze or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: If the battery temperature is high, the full charge pressure is limited to prevent battery swelling and increase life. Because the battery is not fully charged, the expected charging time is not displayed. Normal operation for battery protection. When the battery temperature decreases, it will charge normally.

rows.Title: Unable to turn on mobile hotspot
rows.Problem: The mobile hotspot feature has stopped functioning properly after update. Tapping the toggle has no effect and requires frequent restarts to work, recurring almost every second day.
rows.Summarized Problem: The mobile hotspot feature fails to turn on after update and requires frequent restarts to function.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional and requires frequent restarts, disrupting daily usage and rendering the device unusable for connectivity tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: The device fails to get capability from Wi-Fi firmware; recommend user to check hardware Wi-Fi chipset at service center.

rows.Title: Bixby not working with commands
rows.Problem: Bixby app does not respond to voice commands
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby app fails to respond to voice commands.
rows.Severity Reason: The app does not respond to commands, indicating a partial malfunction of the voice functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue occurs due to an outdated Bixby OnDevice version after an OS update. You can verify normal operation by performing an on-device update or disabling the on-device feature as follows: Store app -> Menu -> Updates -> "Samsung On-Device Resource Korean (South Korea)" Version 2.3.02.6 or higher. Alternatively, disable the Bixby On-Device feature by navigating to "Bixby Settings > Data Handling on Device > Off" to verify normal operation.

rows.Title: Not able to access secure folder
rows.Problem: The Secure Folder feature is not working at all. Unable to access it, and standard troubleshooting steps have not resolved the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access the Secure Folder feature on their device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional, preventing users from accessing a core security feature of the device.

rows.Title: Music notification click doesn't take to the app
rows.Problem: Clicking on live notification player doesn't take me to the music app
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot open the music app by clicking on a music notification.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing users from accessing the app via notification, but the device remains otherwise usable.

rows.Title: Youtube music not working properly
rows.Problem: Youtube music not working properly. Clock animation doesn't work on lock screen.
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube Music is not functioning properly on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing or not working, but the device remains usable overall.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Icons on status bar is not visible
rows.Problem: On fullscreen, the top area that usually displays notification, battery etc. is black and doesn't display content. The issue persists regardless of opening PDFs from file manager or notes app.
rows.Summarized Problem: Status bar icons are not visible on fullscreen, leaving the top area black and empty.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of essential notifications and battery status but does not cause device crash or complete failure of core functionality.

rows.Title: Sluggish device
rows.Problem: Device lagging severely, system UI and themes app not working, complete system hang for over 5 minutes, device feels slow and unresponsive
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing severe lag and system hangs, leading to complete system unresponsiveness.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unresponsive and hangs for over five minutes, rendering the system unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Sluggish device
rows.Problem: UI lag on home screen; 90Hz refresh rate not smooth
rows.Summarized Problem: The home screen UI is laggy and the 90Hz refresh rate feels unsmooth.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable lag but does not render the device unusable or crash.

rows.Title: Phonepay app widget often doesn't work
rows.Problem: Phonepay app widget often doesn't work; issue resolved temporarily after removal and reinstallation, with new log file attached
rows.Summarized Problem: The Phonepay app widget frequently fails to function properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The widget fails to work intermittently, but does not cause device unavailability or data loss, and can be resolved by reinstalling the app.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no information about this problem. Please attach new log file.

rows.Title: Camera not focusing
rows.Problem: Camera is not focusing well. Blurry noisy images. I have tried all settings in multiple scenarios, still not change.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to focus properly, resulting in blurry and noisy images regardless of settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of camera functionality but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs due to overlapping detection of peppers and red pepper leaves in the touch area; countermeasure is to get closer to the pepper and auto-focus on it.

rows.Title: Issues in vibration detected
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI-7.0, vibration has stopped completely. No vibration for notification, calls, messages, no haptic feedback
rows.Summarized Problem: Vibration and haptic feedback have stopped working after updating to One UI-7.0.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot receive notifications or feel haptic feedback, making the device unusable for basic communication functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Vibration software logs show normal activity; however, no vibration is felt, suggesting a possible hardware defect. Recommend hardware inspection or motor replacement.

rows.Title: Home screen wallpaper issue during application switching
rows.Problem: Wallpaper animation is disturbing when switching between applications
rows.Summarized Problem: Wallpaper animation becomes disturbing during application switching.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user experience during normal app switching but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Fingerprint not working
rows.Problem: Fingerprint fails to recognize even after multiple attempts, persisting for six months
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint recognition fails consistently despite multiple attempts and prolonged usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a core biometric function, preventing reliable authentication but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Poor image quality from fingerprint sensor due to thick protective film, dry skin, or light touch. Countermeasure: Recommend removing thick protective film and using the center part of the fingerprint during enrollment and verification.

rows.Title: Smart things app widget not loading
rows.Problem: SmartThings app widget keeps buffering and fails to load. User must repeatedly sign up and reinstall the app, which is impractical given their heavy dependency on the service for home automation.
rows.Summarized Problem: The SmartThings app widget fails to load and buffers repeatedly, preventing users from accessing home automation controls.
rows.Severity Reason: The widget failure prevents users from accessing essential home automation functionality, making the system unusable for critical operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue has fixed from app side. Please check with launcher version 04db2814c0bf92c18a7b5727dcd0caa160be0e15.

rows.Title: Lockscreen ClockStyle got reset after some time
rows.Problem: Lockscreen ClockStyle got reseted after some time
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock style on the lock screen resets after a period of time.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual consistency of the lock screen but does not prevent device usage or cause system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Object eraser not working properly
rows.Problem: Finger eraser edited through Galaxy AI did not remove the object and instead placed it in another location
rows.Summarized Problem: The finger eraser feature in the Gallery app fails to remove objects and instead places them elsewhere when using Galaxy AI.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature partially malfunctions, resulting in incorrect object placement rather than removal, but the core functionality is not completely absent.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue occurs when using Galaxy AI without long press or move button; unable to reproduce in lab conditions; screen recording recommended for full reproduction.

rows.Title: Sound quality degraded after update
rows.Problem: Sound quality degraded after updating to one UI 7; Equalizer settings are worse and rich bass sound is lost even at high volume; request to reset headphone sound settings to previous state
rows.Summarized Problem: Sound quality has degraded after updating to one UI 7, with loss of bass and poor audio output despite high volume settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of audio functionality, where sound quality is affected but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please ask the customer to report the log right after the issue is reproduced, we will check proper log once it's reported.

rows.Title: Now bar not working with Google map
rows.Problem: Now bar not working with Google map
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar feature fails to function when used with Google Maps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a feature rather than a complete system failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: If the "Now Bar" (also known as the Google Discover feed) is not working with Google Maps on your device, here are some steps you can take to troubleshoot and resolve the issue: Check App Updates: Ensure both the Google Maps and Google app are updated to the latest versions. Updates often include bug fixes and improvements. Clear Cache and Data: Go to your device's settings, navigate to Apps, find the Google app, and clear its cache and data. This can help resolve any glitches affecting the

rows.Title: Data on Jio fluctuates
rows.Problem: Data on Jio fluctuates and apps don't work or load properly after OneUI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Data connectivity on Jio fluctuates and apps fail to load after OneUI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Data fluctuation and app loading failure make the device unusable for core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: DNS probe failures and network resolution issues; Countermeasure: Same as cause, indicating no effective fix yet.

rows.Title: Vibration alert not working
rows.Problem: Vibration alerts during and at the end of calls stopped working after updating to One UI 7. Call alerts are ineffective with no vibration or notification during call start, in-call, or end.
rows.Summarized Problem: Vibration alerts for call start, in-call, and end are not working after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot receive any vibration feedback during calls, making it impossible to detect call events, which is essential for usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Media vibration intensity is set to 0 in the system; Counter Measure: Set media vibration intensity to a non-zero value in Settings > Sounds and Vibration > Vibration intensity > Media.

rows.Title: App icon not updated
rows.Problem: Old icon still present
rows.Summarized Problem: The app icon is not updating and displays an old version despite theme changes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial UI malfunction where an outdated icon persists, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Old ThemePark version leaves residual icon data; Countermeasure: Newer ThemePark version handles icon updates, users can apply default icons to resolve.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drain issue after update
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences excessive battery drain after software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality (battery drain) that affects device usage but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Network fluctuation
rows.Problem: Network fluctuates between 4G and 5G repeatedly despite resetting network settings and troubleshooting steps
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences repeated network switching between 4G and 5G, causing instability despite troubleshooting.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent network switching, which affects connectivity stability but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Accidental Touch Protection feature not working well
rows.Problem: Accidental Touch Protection feature isn't working well. The phone wakes up its screen and opens Emergency Call without unlocking, even when in pocket or bag. This happened after updating from One UI 6.1 to One UI 7. The feature was working before but now fails, especially with the presence of NOW BAR.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Accidental Touch Protection feature fails to prevent accidental screen activation and emergency calls when the phone is in a pocket or bag, even after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature failure causes unintended emergency calls, which can lead to serious safety risks and device misuse.
rows.R&D Comment: The Accidental Touch Protection function relies on TSP and light sensor; it checks brightness below 10lux and touch conditions, and if triggered, prevents touch. This condition was confirmed to be satisfied during the incident, suggesting a potential logic or sensor integration issue in the new UI version.

rows.Title: Secure folder not working
rows.Problem: Security policy prevents installation of secure folder
rows.Summarized Problem: The secure folder feature cannot be installed due to a security policy restriction.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is entirely unavailable, preventing users from accessing a core security function.

rows.Title: Degraded sound quality of Dolby
rows.Problem: Dolby sound quality is poor on Samsung S23 5G and M35, with audio performance not matching laptop-level experience. The sound is subpar despite other features working well, and users report it has been inconsistent for years.
rows.Summarized Problem: Dolby sound quality is significantly degraded on Samsung S23 5G and M35, failing to deliver the expected high-fidelity audio experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The audio experience is fundamentally flawed and fails to meet user expectations for a premium device, impacting core user satisfaction and perceived product quality.

rows.Title: Lag in device
rows.Problem: Fix this lag and battery issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences lag during normal use.
rows.Severity Reason: Lag makes the device unusable and affects overall user experience.

rows.Title: Device restarts automatically
rows.Problem: Phone keeps restarting and network connection is lost after some time
rows.Summarized Problem: The device restarts automatically and loses network connection after some time.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts and loses network connection, making the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Firmware or hardware issue with network daemon disconnect. Countermeasure: Reset device; if issue persists, service center check.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Constant battery drain even in standby with no usage or connectivity
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences constant battery drain even when not in use and with no connectivity or screen activity.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is draining battery continuously in inactive states, which renders it unusable without frequent charging and poses a significant user experience risk.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Transparent pop up occurs
rows.Problem: A transparent pop up appears and blocks screen interaction, preventing selection of options. It occurs whenever the screen is awake and persists for all pop ups.
rows.Summarized Problem: A transparent pop up blocks screen interaction and prevents user selection.
rows.Severity Reason: The pop up blocks all screen interactions, making the device unusable during screen awake states.
rows.R&D Comment: We could see the toast in the video but without synchronized logs, we cannot trace the exact condition; if a synchronized log and video are shared, we will re-investigate.

rows.Title: Device automatically takes screenshot
rows.Problem: Phone automatically takes screenshots when in off-screen state, screen turns on by itself, and performs actions like making UPI payments even after user settings changes
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically takes screenshots and performs actions like UPI payments when the screen is off, indicating a malfunction in screen state management.
rows.Severity Reason: The device performs unauthorized actions like UPI payments during off-screen state, which can lead to financial loss and device misuse.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause: Insufficient logs to identify screenshot trigger; countermeasure: User must provide complete logs including timestamped screenshots for analysis.

rows.Title: Front camera not working properly
rows.Problem: The front camera is not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera is not functioning properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The front camera fails to work, but the issue does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No camera-related crash in attached log file. Counter Measure: Request additional dumpstate file for further analysis.

rows.Title: Bluetooth issue
rows.Problem: Bluetooth call on watch gets off automatically
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth call on watch automatically disconnects during use
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails during active use, causing interruption of communication and device usability
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to use right side of the Keyboard
rows.Problem: Can't touch keys on the right most side of the screen
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot touch or use the keys on the rightmost side of the keyboard.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure on a specific area of the keyboard, preventing full usability but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was not reproduced in the binary A736BXXUAFYE6; touch input logs show correct delivery to keys, indicating potential environmental or device-specific variation.

rows.Title: Sluggish in device
rows.Problem: Screen freezing occurs frequently in short intervals. Restart, clear data, and factory reset have not resolved the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device screen frequently freezes during short intervals, despite multiple troubleshooting attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen freezing occurs frequently and disrupts normal device usage, making the device unusable in practical scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Insufficient logs and unclear problem description prevent analysis; request for new logs and reproduction steps from user.

rows.Title: Issue in removing filters and backgrounds on video calls
rows.Problem: Unable to remove filters and backgrounds on video calls in WhatsApp and Google Meet. Images flicker during calls. Problem appeared after software updates.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot remove filters and backgrounds during video calls on WhatsApp and Google Meet, with images flickering during use.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality during video calls but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is intermittent post-update.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Device drains battery rapidly while idle, even with all services off and power saving mode enabled. Phone overheats and eventually shuts down. Issue persists after hard reset, cache removal, and OS update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device drains battery rapidly while idle and overheats, even with all services off and power saving mode enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery drain and overheating, leading to shutdowns despite power-saving settings.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by the third-party app 'com.xunijun.app.gp' consuming excessive CPU resources. Countermeasure: The app developer must optimize its code for resource usage; this is a market issue with no Samsung involvement.

rows.Title: Recent menu elements not working properly
rows.Problem: When opened recent apps the background is ss of the menu when opened first and swiping through it that background doesn't change after the recent android update (14 to 15)
rows.Summarized Problem: The background of the recent apps menu remains static after the Android 14 to 15 update, failing to update when swiping through apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual consistency of the recent apps interface but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Call not answering from cover screen
rows.Problem: When answering a call from the cover screen, the device does not lift and the speaker mode and call ringtone have very low volume after the May security patch update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to lift and produce adequate sound when answering a call from the cover screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to perform a basic call function, making it unusable in a key use case.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Slow charging
rows.Problem: Charging slows down after some time, showing only 14 to 32 percent charge in 90 minutes. The device does not display remaining time to complete charge when off-screen.
rows.Summarized Problem: Charging slows significantly over time and fails to show remaining charge time.
rows.Severity Reason: Device charging performance is severely degraded, leading to prolonged charging times and user confusion about remaining time.
rows.R&D Comment: High device temperature triggers current limitation; device temperature of 44 degrees is abnormal and not under normal conditions.

rows.Title: Google security patch not available for May and June
rows.Problem: Google Play system update not received for May and June, still on April 2025
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are not receiving Google security patches for May and June, remaining on April 2025 version.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial failure in receiving updates, affecting only specific months and not causing device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to use best face feature
rows.Problem: unable to use the all feature in camera like best face
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot use the Best Face feature in the camera app.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working due to a missing prerequisite (Motion Photo enabled), but it is not a full system crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Best Face feature requires Motion Photo to be enabled. Counter Measure: Same as cause; users must enable Motion Photo to use Best Face.

rows.Title: Samsung Cloud and KMS Agent app not compatible with device
rows.Problem: Some inbuilt apps not supporting for my device
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Cloud and KMS Agent app is not compatible with the device, causing inbuilt apps to fail support.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial app compatibility, not rendering the device unusable, but affecting functionality of inbuilt apps.
rows.R&D Comment: The app exposed to the Google Store is an installation app compatible only with Wear OS devices and cannot be installed on phone apps. Customers should be informed that this is normal.

rows.Title: 2x portrait zoom in portrait mode not working
rows.Problem: 2x portrait zoom in portrait mode is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The 2x portrait zoom feature is not working in portrait mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing in a key usage scenario, rendering a core camera function unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Capture failure detected in debug logs; Counter Measure: Request CP silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: frequent freezing issues after One UI 7 update
rows.Problem: phone hangs repeatedly during normal usage, causing significant inconvenience in day-to-day tasks
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently freezes during normal usage after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes repeatedly during normal usage, making it unusable for daily tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: User has not attached any logs, for any analysis/fix, logs are required.

rows.Title: Fingerprints not working after UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Fingerprints are not registering on the device after updating to UI 7. The device fails to register fingerprints during registration, and this issue started post-update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint biometrics are not registering on the device after updating to UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to register fingerprints, which is a core authentication function required for unlocking the device, making it unusable without physical access.

rows.Title: Unable to pick calls
rows.Problem: Unable to pick calls. Happens once every 20 calls.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to pick calls, which occurs intermittently after every 20 calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs intermittently and affects call handling, but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Navigation Swipe Touch not working Properly
rows.Problem: False touches occurring when swiping back from side in full screen navigation, such as accidentally pressing like buttons in Instagram Reels or YouTube Shorts
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience false touches when swiping back from the side during full-screen navigation, leading to unintended interactions like pressing like buttons in media content.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes unintended interactions but does not prevent device operation or result in data loss or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: The screen recording log was not included in main dump log, making it challenging to analyze side back gesture logs. An attempt to reproduce the issue with the same model was unsuccessful.

rows.Title: green lines appear when sharing image on social media
rows.Problem: Green lines appear on images when sharing via social media platforms after capturing with 48 MP camera using flash on and off
rows.Summarized Problem: Green lines appear on images when sharing after capturing with 48 MP camera using flash.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visible artifacts in shared images, rendering content unusable for users.
rows.R&D Comment: It's fixed to send elevation value to sw heif decoder, eliminating buffer align mismatch during image decoding.

rows.Title: 48MP camera line issue
rows.Problem: green line showing in 48 MP camera photos
rows.Summarized Problem: A green line appears in photos taken with the 48MP camera.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visible artifacts in images, rendering photos unusable and affecting user experience significantly.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by a failure to send elevation value to the sw heif decoder, leading to buffer alignment mismatch during decoding. It is fixed by sending elevation value to the sw heif decoder, eliminating the buffer mismatch.

rows.Title: Archive option missing confirmation popup
rows.Problem: When clicking the "Archive" option on an app, no confirmation or warning popup appears. The app gets archived immediately, requiring a restore download which can take time, especially on slow networks. This leads to unintended app removal and user frustration.
rows.Summarized Problem: The archive function lacks a confirmation popup, causing unintended app archiving and requiring a restore process.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction—users may accidentally archive apps without warning, but the app functionality remains usable after restore.
rows.R&D Comment: Add a confirmation window for the archive action to prevent accidental app archiving.

rows.Title: Phone freeze while charging on AOD
rows.Problem: Phone keeps freezing while charging on AOD after oneui 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone freezes while charging on AOD after the OneUI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes during charging, making it unusable and affecting core functionality.

rows.Title: Device Heat up while using 5G
rows.Problem: When using 5G for downloading, the device heats up and automatically switches to 4G. This behavior is not user-controllable and raises concerns about 5G usability.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats when using 5G for downloads and automatically switches to 4G, reducing user control over 5G connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheating during 5G usage leads to automatic network switch, potentially compromising user experience and device safety.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating during 5G usage triggers automatic switch to 4G; hotspot and heavy data use increase device temperature, and thermal management needs improvement to prevent unsafe overheating.

rows.Title: Quality decreased after latest update
rows.Problem: Camera quality decreased significantly after latest update. Takes 15 to 20 seconds to process a photo and produces very poor quality image. Processing takes up to 10 seconds for a single photo.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera image processing is extremely slow and produces poor quality images after the latest update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable for basic photography due to severe lag and poor image quality, making the camera function practically ineffective.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not reproduced from our end. The mode/scene in which the error occurs is not clear; please help to attach a video.

rows.Title: App compatibility issue with device
rows.Problem: Gallery people option not showing and error appears in Play Store gallery app
rows.Summarized Problem: The Gallery app shows an error and the people option is not visible in the app.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing intermittently, preventing full functionality but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Database may be corrupted due to prolonged idle time; recommend clearing related data to initiate fresh reanalysis.

rows.Title: Battery drains fast
rows.Problem: Battery drains fast after updating to UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains rapidly after updating to UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The device experiences significant battery consumption, indicating a major performance issue that affects usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Insufficient log duration; request QA to provide correct logs for analysis.

rows.Title: Profile Card feature not working
rows.Problem: The profile card feature stopped working on the call screen after three weeks, despite all required settings being enabled. The background video for callers is still visible, but the profile card does not appear, even when the other user has profile card sharing activated.
rows.Summarized Problem: The profile card feature is not displaying on the call screen despite user settings being enabled and the other party having profile card sharing activated.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in the call interface but does not cause device crash or complete unavailability, only partial functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: SCallUI logs not captured. Not possible to analyse the issue. Please provide fresh dumpstate logs for analysis

rows.Title: Sim card not detecting
rows.Problem: When I insert my SIM card it automatically goes to airplane mode and no service
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to detect the SIM card and automatically enters airplane mode with no service.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to detect the SIM card and enters airplane mode, rendering network connectivity completely unavailable.
rows.R&D Comment: Physical RF front end devices missing during MIPI scan; device-specific hardware failure. Recommend sending device to factory for hardware repair.

rows.Title: wallpaper looks dim
rows.Problem: wallpaper looks dim on home screen after update, while other operations are normal
rows.Summarized Problem: The wallpaper on the home screen appears dim after the update, while other operations function normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance but does not impact core device functionality or usability significantly.

rows.Title: Battery draining
rows.Problem: Battery draining not getting good battery backup
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing excessive battery drain, resulting in poor battery backup.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unable to maintain a reasonable battery life, making it unusable for daily use without frequent recharging.

rows.Title: Calendar widget overlaped with notification panel
rows.Problem: ui 7 bug with the lock screen quick settings and notification panel
rows.Summarized Problem: The calendar widget is overlapping with the notification panel on the lock screen quick settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the display layout but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Battery getting drain without having Instagram in my phone
rows.Problem: Battery performance remains poor even after uninstalling Instagram and removing the app; device lasts only 5 hours on screen, with no improvement despite several days of monitoring. Battery drain is worse after installing the May 2025 patch.
