rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain even without Instagram installed, lasting only 5 hours on screen after a May 2025 OS update.
rows.Severity Reason: Device is unusable due to insufficient battery life, preventing normal daily use beyond 5 hours.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain caused by background wake locks from multiple apps; countermeasure: investigate app compatibility with new OS features and reduce unnecessary background activity post-update.

rows.Title: Secure Folder appearing in Recents screen
rows.Problem: Apps opened from the Secure Folder are now appearing in the general Recents screen, even though the 'Auto-lock Secure Folder' option is set to 'Each time I leave an app'.
rows.Summarized Problem: Secure Folder apps are now appearing in the general Recents screen when they should be auto-locked.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the Secure Folder functionality, where apps appear in Recents when they should not.

rows.Title: Error occurs when trying to make normal call on personal space
rows.Problem: When trying to make a normal call from personal space, an error occurs. WhatsApp call running in secure folder does not cause this issue. Outgoing calls from personal space work without error on previous M33 handset.
rows.Summarized Problem: An error occurs when attempting to make a normal call from personal space, while outgoing calls work without error in other scenarios.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial failure in a core function (making calls) under specific conditions, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No logs show outgoing calls from Secure Folder account. Counter Measure: Request logs when the issue is observed.

rows.Title: Screen recording in Secure Folder saved outside secure folder
rows.Problem: Screen recording while in Secure Folder is being saved outside of it, in non-encrypted Gallery. It used to be saved in secure folder gallery when on One UI 6 but after One UI 7 update it saves it outside the secure folder.
rows.Summarized Problem: Screen recordings in the Secure Folder are being saved outside the secure folder in a non-encrypted gallery instead of within the secure folder gallery.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the Secure Folder functionality, where recordings are not saved in the intended secure location, but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Logs are insufficient to analyse the cause. Also, issue reference like screenshot, recording, timing not clear. Please suggest user to share proper references like visual reference, timing etc also, they need to capture the dumpstate as soon as possible if issue occur.

rows.Title: Not receiving OTP & Message of any bank app
rows.Problem: Not receiving OTP and text messages from any bank app until device restart. Also unable to update apps from secure folder Play Store and not receiving WhatsApp calls and messages from secure folder WhatsApp app.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are not receiving OTPs and text messages from bank apps until they restart their device, and also face issues with app updates and messaging from secure folder apps.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot receive critical authentication messages (OTPs) from bank apps, which directly impacts security and usability of financial services.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Logs unavailable pre-restart; no data to analyze before restart. Countermeasure: User should capture logs before restarting device to enable proper diagnosis.

rows.Title: Contacts vanished sometimes
rows.Problem: Contacts disappear occasionally from calls app; quick share requires password even though never set; phone restarts frequently; overheats; charging fails sometimes
rows.Summarized Problem: Contacts occasionally disappear from the calls app and require password for quick share despite no prior setup.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes loss of critical data and device instability, including restarts and overheating, making the device unusable at times.
rows.R&D Comment: Telegram is inserting duplicate contacts, consuming significant resources; users should delete unnecessary accounts.

rows.Title: Headphone Symbol and Sound Issue
rows.Problem: headphone symbol visible and sound issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Headphone symbol appears and sound functionality is not working on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows a headphone symbol and suffers from sound issues, making audio functionality unusable.

rows.Title: One UI 7.0 Not Showing
rows.Problem: One UI 7 is not showing on the device, though it is officially available
rows.Summarized Problem: One UI 7.0 is not displaying on the device despite being officially available.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the device interface, but the device is otherwise functional and the issue does not prevent core operations.
rows.R&D Comment: A146B PRA and Fota completed. Please check after some time and confirm behavior.

rows.Title: Sound is Not Coming from Device
rows.Problem: headphone symbol visible on device screen sound issue facing in samsung A14
rows.Summarized Problem: The device does not produce sound despite the headphone symbol being visible on the screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where sound is absent but the device indicates a headset is connected, preventing full audio functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Earjack and SUB PBA inspection are required; users should be guided to visit a service center for inspection.

rows.Title: Unable to Set Notification Sound for Instagram
rows.Problem: Cannot set notification sound for Instagram app in new version; previously worked in older version via App info > Notification > Notification Category > Insta Direct > Sound.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set a notification sound for Instagram in the new app version, unlike in older versions.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in the new version, preventing users from customizing notifications, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Unable to Change App Widget Thickness
rows.Problem: Cannot change the thickness and thinness of clock widget and always on display option is missing
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot adjust the thickness of the clock widget and the always on display option is missing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, preventing customization but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Lock Screen Not Waking Up on Notification
rows.Problem: Lock screen does not wake up when a notification is received
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen does not wake up when a notification is received.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to respond to notifications, making it unusable in normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Good Lock issue
rows.Problem: Good Lock feature is not available on Galaxy A16, even though it exists on Galaxy A15
rows.Summarized Problem: The Good Lock feature is not available on Galaxy A16, despite being present on Galaxy A15.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing on a device, but the device is not a supported model for the feature, which limits usability rather than making the device unusable or crashing.
rows.R&D Comment: The device is not supported for the Good Lock service. Currently, Good Lock is not compatible only with the Galaxy A1x, A2x series.

rows.Title: Dialer App is Crashing
rows.Problem: Still not helping, from morning 3 msg send
rows.Summarized Problem: The dialer app crashes when attempting to send messages.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes, preventing users from sending messages, which is a core functionality.

rows.Title: Unable to Install Latest Update
rows.Problem: Latest software update is not installing on device
rows.Summarized Problem: The latest software update fails to install on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The update installation failure prevents the device from receiving critical software updates, rendering it non-functional or outdated.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Insufficient defect info. Countermeasure: Share same time video and one set of additional log file

rows.Title: Display Refresh Rate is Not Working Properly
rows.Problem: 120 hz refresh rate is not working after UI 7 update; device feels like 60 hz despite setting to adaptive refresh rate. Factory reset and setting reset did not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's 120 Hz refresh rate is not functioning correctly and behaves as if operating at 60 Hz after a UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The refresh rate is fundamentally not working, resulting in a degraded user experience and inconsistent performance that affects core display functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: It is confirmed that the refresh rate only works at 60 Hz in logs; the root cause is likely software-related, but requires a reproduction path for further analysis.

rows.Title: Spelling Error on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Spelling mistake on Lock Screen: 'double tab' written instead of 'double tap'
rows.Summarized Problem: The Lock Screen displays 'double tab' instead of 'double tap', causing a spelling error.
rows.Severity Reason: This is a cosmetic spelling error that does not affect device functionality or usability.

rows.Title: Call Drop Issue
rows.Problem: A new issue detected after previous steps; screenshot and video attached in prior logs.
rows.Summarized Problem: The dialer application drops calls unexpectedly.
rows.Severity Reason: Call drops render the device unusable during communication, which is a critical functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: It seems to be a HW issue. Please visit customer service center to check the HW.

rows.Title: High Battery Drain
rows.Problem: Battery is draining fast and device is laggy
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences rapid battery drain and significant lag after update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery drain and severe lag, impairing core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Touch sensor in display OCTA has HW defect (Tx channel 00 and 01 are cracked). Octa module should be checked and replaced if necessary at Service center.

rows.Title: Sound Assistant Plugin Issue in GoodLock
rows.Problem: Floating button for sound control panel tends to disappear in landscape mode after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The floating button for sound control panel disappears in landscape mode after UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially non-functional in a common usage scenario, affecting user experience but not causing device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Speaker Muted After Software Update
rows.Problem: After the recent software update, the device no longer allows separate audio output for different apps. Both apps now play through the same output, even when apps are set to use different devices. Previously, sound from different apps could be routed to separate outputs.
rows.Summarized Problem: After the software update, the device fails to route audio from different apps to separate outputs, causing all apps to play through the same audio device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of audio routing functionality, where app-specific audio output is not properly separated, but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue description is unclear; please provide more information: which apps do you use? What is expected behavior?

rows.Title: UI Not Updated After UI 7.0 Update
rows.Problem: Screenshot shows old UI elements like Instagram and YouTube Shorts HUD and navigation bar still active after UI 7.0 update, causing a yellow tinge on app backgrounds regardless of app
rows.Summarized Problem: Old UI elements such as HUDs and navigation bars persist after UI 7.0 update, causing visual artifacts like yellow tinge on app backgrounds.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial malfunction of UI elements persists across apps, affecting visual consistency but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Calculator Always Giving 0 Value
rows.Problem: Calculator app shows 0 value for any input, adding zero to numbers like 5 becomes 50, 10 becomes 100.
rows.Summarized Problem: The calculator app incorrectly adds a zero to all entered numbers, resulting in incorrect calculations.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes complete failure of basic calculator functionality, making it unusable for any numerical input.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Timing issue causing firmware to return wrong cursor position in first input. Countermeasure: Fixed in version 12.4.00.13 and available via QA store.

rows.Title: Unable to Clear Cache of Game App Clash of Clans
rows.Problem: I cant clear the cached data of clash of clans, I have tried several times
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot clear the cache of the Clash of Clans app despite multiple attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to clear cache, which is a core functionality for app management, but the issue does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: App cache clearing function is not accessible or not working as expected. Countermeasure: Provide clear in-app or system-level steps to clear cache via settings.

rows.Title: Game Booster Application Not Working
rows.Problem: Game Booster has no GPU option and FreeFireMax is not listed in the settings. Users experience touch issues and lag while gaming.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Game Booster application lacks GPU settings and does not list FreeFireMax in its category settings, causing touch issues and lag during gameplay.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure in a key gaming feature, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Best Face Option Not Available in Camera
rows.Problem: Best faces option not available in my samsung a 56 5g
rows.Summarized Problem: The best face option is not available in the camera app on Samsung A56 5G.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a specific use case (motion photo), but is not causing device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Device is Hanging while Using Application
rows.Problem: Device is hanging while using application
rows.Summarized Problem: The device hangs while using applications.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction during app usage, not complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Background dexopt not fully performed post-update; device should be fully charged and kept at low temperature to allow automatic dexopt during inactivity.

rows.Title: Unable to Connect BT
rows.Problem: Unable to connect Bluetooth device
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to connect to Bluetooth devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction in Bluetooth pairing, not rendering the device unusable, but preventing connection under specific conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Connection fails due to page timeout; ensure remote device is powered on, charged, and in pairing mode; OTA logs needed if issue persists.

rows.Title: Unable to See Any Contacts in Contacts App
rows.Problem: Contacts aren't showing up in the contacts app after UI 7.0 update. The app shows a message saying 'uploading contacts' and closes immediately. Phone logs and keypad are not visible.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contacts are not displaying in the contacts app after the UI 7.0 update, and the app closes immediately after showing a message about uploading contacts.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes immediately after attempting to load contacts, preventing users from accessing their contact list, making the device unusable for basic communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Large database deletions during onupgrade operation exceed 10-second timeout, causing provider failure. Countermeasure: Move onupgrade operation to background runtime; clear local contacts data and re-synchronize with Samsung or Google.

rows.Title: App Animation while Switching Apps is Not Consistent
rows.Problem: The new animation when switching between or swiping away recent apps feels laggy, clunky, and unpolished. Please refine the animation or give us the option to choose animation speed/style like before.
rows.Summarized Problem: The animation when switching between apps feels laggy and unpolished.
rows.Severity Reason: The animation is inconsistent and clunky, affecting user experience but not causing device malfunction or crash.

rows.Title: Camera not working
rows.Problem: Camera is not working after android 15 software update, factory reset did not resolve the issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera function is not working after an Android 15 software update, despite a factory reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera is a core functionality that is completely non-operational after an update, rendering the device unusable for basic tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: The root cause is a damaged camera module with abnormal MIPI communication; the countermeasure is to replace the hardware module via after-sales service.

rows.Title: Eye Comfort Shield Not Working Properly
rows.Problem: Screenshot taken with eye comfort shield on looks yellow after OneUI 7 update; appeared normal in OneUI 6
rows.Summarized Problem: Eye Comfort Shield causes yellow tint in screenshots after OneUI 7 update
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss

rows.Title: Audio Mute Issue
rows.Problem: Headphone symbol appears without any headphone connection, resulting in no sound output on speaker and no option to resolve it.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device displays a headphone symbol without any headphone connection, preventing sound from playing on the speaker.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot hear audio at all due to the mute state triggered by a false headphone detection, making the device unusable for basic audio functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Audio path is coming with headset path but no log found when headset is connected. Please reboot and check if reproducible; if always reproducible, visit service center.

rows.Title: Vibration is not Working
rows.Problem: Vibration is not working in device in any scenario
rows.Summarized Problem: Vibration function is not working in the device under any conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The vibration function fails completely across all scenarios, making a core device feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: SW-level processing appears correct; hardware defect suspected in COIN DC motor or motor connector pins. Countermeasure: Device inspection at Samsung service center for hardware damage.

rows.Title: Unable to Customize Navigation Key
rows.Problem: The persistent bottom navigation hint, previously customizable in One UI 6, is now permanently enabled in One UI 7, removing user choice and representing a downgrade rather than an upgrade. The removal of alternative navigation options is unacceptable, as navigation is a fundamental and non-removable feature.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users can no longer customize the navigation key after the update, with a persistent hint permanently enabled instead of being adjustable.
rows.Severity Reason: Navigation is a fundamental feature, and the loss of customization removes user control, making the experience unusable for some users.

rows.Title: Unable to Play 4K Video
rows.Problem: 4K SDR and HDR 10bit videos do not play in Samsung Video Player or other video players like VLC Media Player.
rows.Summarized Problem: 4K HDR and 10-bit videos cannot be played in Samsung Video Player or other video apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot play 4K HDR 10-bit videos, which are common in modern content, rendering media playback unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Exynos8825 chipset does not support 10-bit video playback; user cannot play 10-bit 4K videos due to hardware limitations.

rows.Title: WhatsApp Call Notification on Lockscreen
rows.Problem: WhatsApp call not showing in lockscreen even when all notifications are enabled
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp call notifications do not appear on the lock screen when all notifications are enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a notification feature, where the notification fails to display under specific conditions but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Charging Slow
rows.Problem: Phone not supporting fast charging after UI 7 update, even with authentic 25W Samsung charger and Type-C cable.
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone only charges slowly after UI 7 update, despite using a 25W authentic charger.
rows.Severity Reason: Device fails to achieve fast charging, which is essential for usability and user experience, leading to prolonged charging times and potential user frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Device is Overheating while Using
rows.Problem: Device is overheating during use
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The overheating occurs at a maximum temperature of 40 degrees, which is within thermal specifications and not causing device malfunction or performance issues.

rows.Title: Light Mode not working on YouTube after Quick Panel application
rows.Problem: YouTube remains in dark mode after applying light mode via Quick Panel
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube app retains dark mode after user applies light mode through the Quick Panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI consistency but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: YouTube app does not respect system light mode settings. Countermeasure: Retest with latest YouTube app version.

rows.Title: Auto Brightness Not Working Properly
rows.Problem: Screen brightens automatically in bright social media posts, making text unreadable despite adaptive brightness being turned off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Auto brightness adjusts screen brightness in bright social media content, causing text to become unreadable.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature partially malfunctions under specific conditions, affecting readability in some apps but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: It is difficult to confirm the exact phenomenon due to insufficient information. Please visit the service center to get a diagnosis.

rows.Title: Time Stamps of Images/Video are Not Correct
rows.Problem: Over 400 photos and videos are appearing at the top of the Recent folder with incorrect timestamps
rows.Summarized Problem: Images and videos in the gallery are displaying incorrect timestamps.
rows.Severity Reason: Incorrect timestamps cause users to misidentify the time of media, leading to confusion and potential data misrepresentation.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: WhatsApp app performs rapid database insertions leading to timestamp misalignment. Countermeasure: Update WhatsApp app from Play Store and disable media auto-sync in settings.

rows.Title: High Battery Drain Issue
rows.Problem: Battery drop observed in screen shot
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences high battery drain, especially after updates, due to increased power consumption from app installations and data synchronization.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain significantly impacts device usability and may lead to unexpected shutdowns or reduced operational time.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery consumption increases after device update due to app installations, data synchronization, and power saving app settings; users need to follow a specific logging procedure to confirm the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to Create Passkey
rows.Problem: Unable to create passkey on new Samsung device after replacing old device; system asks for old device PIN then new device PIN, both entered correctly, but then shows error 'Samsung Wallet is temporarily unavailable (passkey.401)' after which no further progress is possible. Tried resetting phone, no success.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot create a passkey on a new Samsung device after replacing an old one, as the system prompts for both old and new device PINs and then displays a temporary unavailability error.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from setting up a core authentication feature (passkey), rendering the device unusable for secure access to Samsung services.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: PPP information was overwritten with initialized 0 value during KnoxMatrix EscrowVault registration. Countermeasure: Request CP silent logs for issue.

rows.Title: Message App Flicker while Click on Link
rows.Problem: When clicked the unsubscribe hyperlink in messages app to stop receiving messages from sender, causes the popup to flicker a lot while opening and the screen becomes unresponsive sometimes
rows.Summarized Problem: The unsubscribe link in the messaging app causes a flickering popup and screen unresponsiveness when clicked.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen becomes unresponsive, which renders the device unusable during interaction with a core messaging function.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue reported to Google via issue tracker; request for CP silent logs for further analysis.

rows.Title: Space in Keyboard while using in WhatsApp
rows.Problem: There is a visible space between the keyboard and the typing box when using the emoji keyboard in WhatsApp on Samsung devices, regardless of whether Gboard or Samsung Keyboard is used. The issue persists after resetting the keyboard, clearing personalized data, and restarting the device.
rows.Summarized Problem: A visible gap appears between the keyboard and the typing area in WhatsApp when using the emoji keyboard.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the user interface layout but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and persists only in a third-party app's UI.
rows.R&D Comment: The space is caused by WhatsApp's own UI implementation; Samsung has no control over the app's source code and cannot debug or fix the root cause.

rows.Title: Relax mode not shown in Quick Panel
rows.Problem: Relax mode is active but not displayed in the Quick Panel, despite apps being restricted when it should be active.
rows.Summarized Problem: Relax mode is active but not visually indicated in the Quick Panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is functional but lacks visual feedback, resulting in partial user experience failure.

rows.Title: Internet speed is very slow or inconsistent despite 5G being shown in the status bar
rows.Problem: Internet speed is very slow or inconsistent despite 5G being shown in the status bar. At times, the network disappears completely for a few seconds to minutes.
rows.Summarized Problem: Internet speed is very slow or inconsistent despite 5G being shown in the status bar, with occasional network disconnections.
rows.Severity Reason: The network disconnects intermittently and speeds are inconsistent, making the device unusable for basic internet tasks despite showing 5G connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Captured images seem artificial while zooming
rows.Problem: Camera quality is reduced after software update. Images appear artificial, especially when zoomed. Quality was good before the update. Lens is clear.
rows.Summarized Problem: Images captured by the camera appear artificial when zoomed, especially after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image appearance during zoom but does not cause device crash or data loss, and quality is not fully broken.
rows.R&D Comment: As we checked the images, the image quality looks normal. We didn't change high-resolution image quality in the software update except color and brightness. We will take a deep look once sample images are shared.

rows.Title: Lag while pull down notification and quick panel
rows.Problem: Notification or control centre pulldown has serious lag issues on s23 with 256gb memory, persisting for months with no fix
rows.Summarized Problem: Pulling down the notification or quick panel causes significant lag on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag occurs during a standard user interaction and affects functionality but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Lag occurs due to garbage collection during pull-down action; countermeasure is the same as cause.

rows.Title: Weather App showing Wrong weather report
rows.Problem: Weather app shows incorrect weather data; reports rain when it is actually sunny.
rows.Summarized Problem: The weather app displays incorrect weather data, showing rain when the actual weather is sunny.
rows.Severity Reason: The app shows incorrect data, leading to a partial malfunction in weather reporting, but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Now bar not showing Sports form Google option
rows.Problem: Notifications from Google with sports updates are selected, but the sports content is not visible on the Now bar. Settings show voice, recorder, maps, but not sports updates.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar on the lock screen does not display Google sports updates despite user settings indicating interest in sports notifications.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially missing in the UI, preventing users from seeing relevant notifications, but the device remains usable and core functions are not affected.

rows.Title: App icons image in folder disappear or take last used app image
rows.Problem: App icons in folder disappear or show image of last used app; returns to correct image after click
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons in folders disappear or display the image of the last used app before returning to correct image upon interaction.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent icon display but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: updated code would request user to update software and then check as it has been fixed in latest versions of ONE UI HOME

rows.Title: Incoming call got hanged while tried to receive
rows.Problem: Incoming call got hanged while trying to receive. Call shown as denied but user attempted to receive. Call disconnected and user had to dial back three times, received as busy. Unable to detect if issue is Android or Samsung fault.
rows.Summarized Problem: Incoming call hangs during reception and fails to connect, requiring multiple retries before successful call establishment.
rows.Severity Reason: User is unable to receive calls and must repeatedly dial to reconnect, rendering the device unusable for basic communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to add ICICI MakeMyTrip credit card to Samsung Wallet
rows.Problem: Unable to add ICICI MakeMy
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot add ICICI MakeMyTrip credit card to Samsung Wallet due to unsupported card configuration.
rows.Severity Reason: The card is not supported by Samsung Pay due to Mastercard account settings, preventing users from adding the card entirely, which is a core wallet functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: As per Mastercard, the account range associated with the PAN is not enabled for Samsung Pay, resulting in PAN_INELIGBLE error. This issue is confirmed on both sides and requires a 3rd party resolution.

rows.Title: Body Fat Percentage Measurement Stuck at 67%
rows.Problem: Body fat percentage measurement gets stuck at 67% and stops despite hands not touching the sensor. This occurs consistently, not intermittently. The watch starts measuring automatically even when no input is given.
rows.Summarized Problem: The body fat percentage measurement gets stuck at 67% and fails to complete, even when hands are not touching the sensor.
rows.Severity Reason: The measurement fails to complete and consistently gets stuck at a single value, rendering the feature unusable and preventing accurate health data collection.
rows.R&D Comment: If possible, please guide the user to store the dump immediately after attempting to measure body composition. If there is water in the key, shake off the watch and dry it. Also, avoid measuring immediately after exercise to prevent two-handed contact errors.

rows.Title: Show contacts while sharing option gone after update
rows.Problem: Show contacts while sharing option gone after update which was there before
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Show contacts while sharing' option is missing after the update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is no longer available, but the core functionality is still present before the update, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.

rows.Title: App icons getting disappeared
rows.Problem: App icons disappear when opening the device for the first time after the latest UI update, reappearing on subsequent openings. The option to close all apps at once also intermittently fails and appears only after retrying.
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons disappear upon first launch after the UI update and reappear on subsequent launches, with intermittent failure of the 'close all apps' option.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects core usability by disrupting app visibility and navigation, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Text disappears on zooming out in Samsung Notes
rows.Problem: Text written in Samsung Notes disappears when zooming out and reappears when zooming in
rows.Summarized Problem: Text written in Samsung Notes disappears when zooming out and reappears upon zooming in.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of text visibility during zooming, but the content is recoverable after zooming in.
rows.R&D Comment: The user's note file has a cache error; recommend saving and reopening the file from My File app to resolve.

rows.Title: Unable to turn on call waiting on SIM 2
rows.Problem: Unable to turn on call waiting on SIM 2. It says "failed to read data"
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot enable call waiting on SIM 2, and the system displays 'failed to read data'.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely unavailable on SIM 2, preventing users from using a key communication function, resulting in device usability loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Failed data read during call waiting update; Countermeasure: Incomplete log truncation in call waiting service.

rows.Title: Poor battery backup after update
rows.Problem: Device shows very poor battery backup after update, with only 3.30-4 hours of usage time, despite no battery issues detected during testing.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significantly reduced battery backup after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery backup is severely degraded, leading to device usability issues as users may not be able to use the device throughout the day.

rows.Title: Media picker doesn't show any other folder apart from Favourites, Camera, Downloads, Screenshot
rows.Problem: Media picker doesn't show any other folder apart from Favourites, Camera, Downloads, Screenshot whenever I try to upload or share images on any of the apps. All third-party apps have been granted required permissions.
rows.Summarized Problem: The media picker only displays predefined folders like Favourites, Camera, Downloads, and Screenshot, failing to show other albums or folders.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing full media library, but does not cause device crash or data loss, and can be partially worked around via the 'Photos' tab.
rows.R&D Comment: The media picker uses Google's mainline AOSP PhotoPicker, which only provides five predefined album types; Samsung Gallery operates independently and cannot modify this behavior. Users can access full albums via the 'Photos' tab.

rows.Title: Touch protection feature not working properly
rows.Problem: The pocket protection feature is causing accidental emergency calls, even after disabling and re-enabling the feature and resetting all settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: The touch protection feature is malfunctioning and is triggering emergency calls accidentally.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is causing unintended emergency calls, which poses a serious safety risk and renders the device potentially unusable in critical situations.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Accidental emergency calls initiated via dialer when touch protection is active; Counter Measure: Issue scenario logs needed to verify root cause.

rows.Title: WiFi not turning on
rows.Problem: WiFi is stuck on searching networks and automatically turns off after upgrade to one UI 7, preventing user from connecting to WiFi.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi fails to connect and remains stuck in searching state after OS upgrade.
rows.Severity Reason: Device cannot establish WiFi connection, preventing basic network functionality and usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Mismatch between HAL layer and Wi-Fi driver; Countermeasure: Reboot device and report issue upon reproduction.

rows.Title: Unable to connect mobile hotspot and wifi
rows.Problem: The video recording was already sent a few days ago, sending it again. Error logs were sent yesterday.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to connect to mobile hotspot and Wi-Fi, with conflicting timestamps between video recording and error logs.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction due to mismatched log timestamps and lack of proper reproduction data, preventing full diagnosis.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide proper logs to check more. When you meet the problem again then collect log first and upload it without device reboot. If you reboot the device, it will remove problem logs.

rows.Title: Instagram crashes when launched
rows.Problem: Instagram crashes every time when launched
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram crashes every time when launched upon startup.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on launch, making it unusable immediately after opening.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a problem from app side. App developer need to fix this issue. We are not reporting one or sometimes issue until not reproduced manually.

rows.Title: Unable to set call type
rows.Problem: Nothing displayed in Call Type while trying to report a telemarketer call
rows.Summarized Problem: The call type setting displays nothing when attempting to report a telemarketer call.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not display content, preventing users from reporting telemarketer calls, but the device remains otherwise usable.

rows.Title: AOD doesn't display music and map
rows.Problem: AOD does not show when music player is playing or map is in use, and only becomes visible after clearing from recent apps. The issue affects the Now bar display.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always On Display fails to show when music or map is active, only appearing after clearing the app from recent apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents proper visibility of content during common usage scenarios, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Bixby not working properly
rows.Problem: Bixby responds with inappropriate or unrecognizable text, unable to process user input correctly
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby fails to understand or respond to user input with appropriate output.
rows.Severity Reason: Bixby fails to process user input correctly, resulting in unintelligible responses, but does not cause device crash or total failure.

rows.Title: Sluggish device
rows.Problem: Device starts to freeze frequently after the one 7 update, with noticeable sluggishness in animations and performance.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences frequent freezing and sluggish animations after the One 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to frequent freezing and sluggish performance, impacting core user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Performance issues not found in logs; dumpstate has limited buffer; recommend real-time reporting with app name and time for better analysis.

rows.Title: Device lags while playing a game
rows.Problem: Screen gets stuck multiple times after swiping, gameplay is ruined due to inability to rotate or aim, gyroscope in game not working consistently, sometimes fast and other times slow
rows.Summarized Problem: The device lags severely during gameplay, causing screen stuck issues and inconsistent gyroscope functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable during gameplay, severely impacting core interaction and control functions.
rows.R&D Comment: A system log collected by Samsung Members application has a limited buffer size. So, it may not include the issue that you mentioned. The log required for detailed analysis is maintained for only 10 minutes. Please report the issue right after it happens without restarting device and elaborate on it.

rows.Title: Lock screen clock size gets smaller
rows.Problem: The always on display clock sometimes becomes very tiny and remains that way. When editing the lock screen, it shows full size. This is a bug in one ui7.
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen becomes very small and stays that way after being set to full size.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the usability of the lock screen clock, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to reply from notification panel in landscape mode
rows.Problem: Unable to reply to WhatsApp messages directly through notification panel while using some apps in landscape mode and can only reply back when in portrait mode
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot reply to WhatsApp messages directly from the notification panel when in landscape mode, requiring them to switch to portrait mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality in a specific usage context but does not cause device crash or data loss, and users can still use the device normally in other modes.

rows.Title: App icon size gets back to default after resizing
rows.Problem: App icon size resets to default after being resized, even after uninstalling and reinstalling the lock screen app
rows.Summarized Problem: App icon size resets to default after user adjustment, even after reinstalling the lock screen app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of user-customized settings but does not prevent device operation or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Auto restart issue
rows.Problem: Device auto restarts and Bluetooth is not working. A pop-up showing 'SSRM warming' appears on display. All troubleshooting steps and device resets have been performed but the issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device repeatedly auto-restarts and Bluetooth fails to work, with a 'SSRM warming' pop-up appearing despite troubleshooting and resets.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to repeated auto-restarts and failure of critical functions like Bluetooth.
rows.R&D Comment: AP malfunction happened 286 times on this device. It might be caused by AP/DRAM/PCB issue on this device. This device should be inspected in HW perspective.

rows.Title: WhatsApp video call camera switch freezes
rows.Problem: During WhatsApp video calls, when i switch to the rear camera, it freezes and doesn't switch.
rows.Summarized Problem: During WhatsApp video calls, switching to the rear camera causes the app to freeze and fail to switch.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to function during a critical user interaction, preventing video call use and causing a complete failure of camera switching.
rows.R&D Comment: The logs do not show system-level issues; logs must be extracted immediately upon issue detection to identify root cause.

rows.Title: Unable to switch to rear view camera during WhatsApp video call
rows.Problem: Unable to switch to rear view camera during WhatsApp video call. Rear camera works with other apps. Issue persists after clearing cache, uninstalling and reinstalling WhatsApp. Call gets stuck. Issue only occurs on Samsung S series devices. Basic functionality is affected.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot switch from front to rear camera during WhatsApp video calls, despite rear camera working in other apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents a basic and essential camera functionality during video calls, rendering the feature unusable for users on Samsung S series devices.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to WhatsApp enabling VDIS for VT calls with the latest version; updating WhatsApp via Play Store resolves it.

rows.Title: Instagram Crashing
rows.Problem: Instagram keeps crashing on Samsung S25 Ultra after the recent update. Reinstalled multiple times, but no fix. Needs urgent attention.
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram app crashes repeatedly on Samsung S25 Ultra after the latest update.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes repeatedly, making it unusable on a key device, leading to a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The crash is due to a pending exception in the app's source code; META is responsible and needs to investigate and fix the root cause.

rows.Title: Back camera video pauses on WhatsApp video call when switching from front to back camera
rows.Problem: Back camera video pauses on WhatsApp video call when switching from front to back camera after One UI 6.1 update. Front camera works fine, issue only occurs on switching. Cleared cache, reinstalled app, disabled Video Call Effects — problem persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: Back camera video pauses during WhatsApp video call when switching from front to back camera.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from smoothly switching cameras during video calls, rendering the feature unusable in real-time communication.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to WhatsApp enabling VDIS for VT call; updating WhatsApp via Play Store resolves it.

rows.Title: Search for name in contacts to make a call shows different contact name
rows.Problem: Search for name in contacts to make a call shows different contact name but calling the right person when selected
rows.Summarized Problem: Contact search displays incorrect names during call initiation, though the correct person is ultimately called.
rows.Severity Reason: The search result is incorrect, leading to confusion, but the call function still works correctly, indicating partial malfunction.

rows.Title: Green screen after 25 seconds during YouTube Shorts playback
rows.Problem: When playing YouTube Shorts videos in Google Chrome on Samsung Galaxy A34 5G after the latest software update, the video shows a green screen for 25 seconds, followed by a hang of 2 to 3 seconds and then a restart. This occurs for all YouTube Shorts videos in Chrome post-update.
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube Shorts videos display a green screen for 25 seconds before the device hangs and restarts after the update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs and restarts during video playback, rendering the feature unusable and causing instability in core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Device reboots but no codec errors in logs; requires input-output dumps for further analysis. Issue not reproducible on Sherlock.

rows.Title: battery protection at maximum at 85% not working
rows.Problem: After UI 7 update, settings like folder icon grid cannot be set, transparency preview not applied, status bar server information header not smoothly running, and battery protection at 85% not working while charging continues
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery protection set to 85% is not functioning and device continues charging to 100%.
rows.Severity Reason: Device continues charging beyond battery protection threshold, indicating a critical malfunction in power management that undermines user safety and battery life.

rows.Title: Camera image washed out after update
rows.Problem: Camera light metering spoiled by OneUi 7 update, photos are almost washed out and overexposed
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera photos are washed out and overexposed after OneUi 7 update due to degraded light metering.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo quality but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and is not fully reproducible.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by degraded light metering in the camera, and the countermeasure confirms no loss of contrast in test images.

rows.Title: Battery is limited to charge till 85 % but it is still charging beyond it
rows.Problem: Battery is limited to charge till 85 % but it is still charging beyond it
rows.Summarized Problem: The device stops charging beyond 85% battery level despite continuing to charge.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is unable to fully charge, which may lead to unexpected power loss and reduced usability.

rows.Title: Unable to access all buttons in panel 2nd
rows.Problem: Cannot access all buttons in panel two in quick access menu
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access all buttons in the quick access panel two after recent updates.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial functionality is missing in a key access panel, preventing full user interaction but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Share option in New ui 7 shows all apps despite custom app selection
rows.Problem: Share option in New ui 7 shows all apps even though custom apps are selected; ui 6 worked correctly
rows.Summarized Problem: The share option in New UI 7 displays all apps regardless of custom app settings, unlike UI 6.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work as intended but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Website not working after update
rows.Problem: One website of daily use is not working after device update. Works with VPN, but not on regular connection. Same SIM and devices in family not affected.
rows.Summarized Problem: A specific website fails to load after device update, only working when using a VPN.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is intermittent and affects only specific content under certain network conditions, not causing device crash or total failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Device Auto restart
rows.Problem: Phone light restarted between 2-4am, showing Samsung logo without fully shutting down. Device restarted by device care, which is a normal user setting.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device performs a partial restart showing the Samsung logo without fully shutting down.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts unexpectedly without proper shutdown, leading to instability and potential data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Device restarted by device care, which is a normal setting enabled by the user.

rows.Title: Navigation Bar overlapping with Google Pay PIN screen
rows.Problem: Google Pay PIN numbers are getting hidden by the navigation buttons at the bottom, making it difficult to enter the PIN
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar overlaps with the Google Pay PIN screen, hiding the PIN input field and making it difficult to enter the PIN.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the usability of entering a PIN in Google Pay, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Wifi is getting turned off automatically when bluetooth is connected
rows.Problem: WiFi is getting turned off automatically when Bluetooth is connected. User has tried restarting, resetting WiFi and Bluetooth, cleaning cache, and updating router and phone. No fix found.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi disconnects automatically when Bluetooth is connected.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device to lose internet connectivity when Bluetooth is active, making the device unusable for core functions like browsing or messaging.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Firmware panic during Bluetooth/WiFi interaction; Countermeasure: Request CP silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: All applications crashing after UI 7 update
rows.Problem: All applications are crashing after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: All applications crash after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable as all applications fail to launch, preventing normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Scroll to capture more of the screen is not working
rows.Problem: The "Scroll to capture more of the screen" feature is not working after UI 7 update, causing annoyance and frequent errors.
rows.Summarized Problem: The scroll-to-capture feature is not working after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing after an update, leading to user annoyance but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Google Messages Not Opening
rows.Problem: Google Messages app freezes when tapped to open, preventing users from viewing or replying to messages despite receiving notifications and message previews.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Google Messages app crashes or freezes when opened, preventing users from viewing or replying to messages.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to open entirely, blocking core communication functionality and rendering the device unusable for messaging.
rows.R&D Comment: Ensure Google Messages is set as default SMS app and update app to latest version; provide silent logs for further analysis.

rows.Title: Paytm taking too long to fetch data and refresh
rows.Problem: Paytm app is slow and takes too long to fetch data and refresh, requiring switch to mobile data during use
rows.Summarized Problem: Paytm app is slow when fetching data and refreshing, leading to user needing to switch to mobile data.
rows.Severity Reason: The app exhibits partial malfunction under certain network conditions, but does not crash or render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: According to log, Wi-Fi Link Quality between the device and the Wi-Fi AP has no issue. If the issue happened with specific Wi-Fi AP, please let us know the Wi-Fi AP model name. I will try to reproduce the issue.

rows.Title: AI Core remains active in the background
rows.Problem: The AI core remains active in the background, having operated for approximately two hours. This daily occurrence often extends operational runtime to seven or eight hours.
rows.Summarized Problem: The AI core stays active in the background for two hours, extending device runtime to seven or eight hours.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes extended runtime but does not result in device unavailability or crash, indicating partial malfunction.

rows.Title: Camera quality is not good
rows.Problem: Instability focus and inaccurate color saturation issues result in poor image quality, especially under digital zoom and max softening settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces poor image quality due to instability in focus and inaccurate color saturation, exacerbated by digital zoom and max softening settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue leads to significant degradation in image quality, which directly impacts core camera functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Digital zoom and max softening settings reduce image sharpness; Fast capture option affects image processing. Counter Measure: Same as cause.

rows.Title: Phone screen dims automatically
rows.Problem: Phone screen dims automatically even when brightness is kept at max, after 2.5 minutes in sunlight
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone screen dims automatically after 2.5 minutes in sunlight, even when brightness is set to maximum.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the screen brightness control under specific environmental conditions, not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Device lags while using Phonepe app
rows.Problem: Samsung galaxy s24 ultra freezes while running phone pe app and nothing is working
rows.Summarized Problem: The device lags and freezes when running the Phonepe app, causing poor system responsiveness.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes and becomes unresponsive during app usage, making it unusable for essential functions.

rows.Title: Delay while locking device
rows.Problem: Noticeable delay when locking the screen
rows.Summarized Problem: There is a noticeable delay when locking the device screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The delay affects the user experience during screen lock but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Swipe for split screen not working
rows.Problem: Two finger swipe up to split screen feature is not working; user must select from options instead of triggering directly with swipe.
rows.Summarized Problem: The two-finger swipe-up gesture to split screen is not working and requires manual selection from options instead.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work as intended, but the device remains usable with alternative methods.

rows.Title: Security policy prevents installation of Secure Folder
rows.Problem: Error occurs when opening Secure Folder; request to resolve ASAP
rows.Summarized Problem: Secure Folder cannot be installed due to security policy restrictions
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot install a core security feature, preventing access to protected content
rows.R&D Comment: As per logs, device owner status was created and later removed; factory reset recommended to resolve, current status should be maintained

rows.Title: Apps and widget position changed after update
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7, app and widget display positions changed from being near corners to centered, and app sizes reduced so many are now in a single line.
rows.Summarized Problem: After One UI 7 update, apps and widgets are now centered on the home screen and appear smaller, reducing screen space utilization.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects layout and usability but does not cause device crash or data loss, only a visual and functional reduction in screen space utilization.
rows.R&D Comment: The attached logs are not sufficient for this issue. We need logs and video sync with time. Also, please update to the latest One UI version. If the issue reoccurs, take logs immediately after the phenomenon and send with detailed explanation.

rows.Title: Lag observed in the device
rows.Problem: The device exhibits noticeable lag after updating to One UI 7, with choppy scrolling, laggy keyboard and emoji panel, and slow app switching and basic tasks.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows severe lag after updating to One UI 7, affecting system responsiveness and basic operations.
rows.Severity Reason: Lag affects overall usability and makes basic operations slow and unresponsive, rendering the device less functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Fence waiting timeout in exynos_drm atomic helper indicates GPU rendering issues, likely causing UI lag; countermeasure aligns with root cause.

rows.Title: Phone screen doesn't wake up when notification is received
rows.Problem: My screen doesn't wake up when I receive notification when my phone is locked. I have enabled my lock screen notifications and selected all apps to display notification on lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone screen does not wake up when a notification is received while the device is locked.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen failure to wake up on notification prevents users from seeing alerts, but does not cause device crash or data loss or render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was not reproducible in the latest binary; users are advised to verify in the latest device version.

rows.Title: Now bar not working on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Live Google sports notification disappears when Now bar is turned on and device is rebooted, despite Google sending live notifications when Now bar is off. No Now bar appears after reboot.
rows.Summarized Problem: Live Google sports notifications disappear when Now bar is turned on and the device is rebooted, with no Now bar appearing afterward.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes loss of critical real-time notifications and complete absence of the Now bar feature, rendering a key functionality unusable.

rows.Title: Overheating
rows.Problem: Device continuously overheats, causing 5G network to drop to 4G, making the phone unusable. User requests software update or fix from Samsung.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats severely, causing 5G to drop to 4G and rendering the phone unusable.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating causes device to lose 5G connectivity, making the phone functionally unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Third-party app (YouTube) is consuming excessive CPU, causing device heating.

rows.Title: Poor signal
rows.Problem: Signals are poor after update, voice search command not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: After the update, the device shows poor signal strength and voice search commands fail to function.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain reliable communication, leading to impaired core functionality such as voice search, which is essential for user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Poor signal is because of low RSRP values in the test area, please try testing in some other location with good signal conditions

rows.Title: Buffering due to network issue
rows.Problem: Network buffering observed
rows.Summarized Problem: Network buffering occurs due to low Wi-Fi signal strength, likely caused by antenna issues in the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent buffering but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause: Low Wi-Fi signal strength indicates potential antenna damage. Countermeasure: Place device close to router and check network; if still poor, hardware antenna issue likely requires after-sales inspection.

rows.Title: 5G data not working
rows.Problem: After updating to one UI7, unable to access mobile data. Enabled 'preferred 5G' but see 'E' symbol instead of 5G when switching on mobile data.
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile data shows 'E' symbol instead of 5G after UI7 update, despite preferred 5G setting being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: User cannot access 5G data, which is a core network function, rendering mobile data unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The log provided doesn- t contain the CP log, and i can't check it more.

rows.Title: Overheating
rows.Problem: Device overheats, causing hands to burn at the back cover; user unable to take photos or videos due to heat.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats significantly, causing physical discomfort and impairing the ability to capture photos or videos.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating leads to physical burns and impairs device functionality, making it unusable under normal use conditions.

rows.Title: Status bar overlaps YouTube screen
rows.Problem: Status bar overlaps YouTube screen after opening
rows.Summarized Problem: The status bar overlaps the YouTube screen when opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a cosmetic UI overlap and does not affect device usability or functionality.

rows.Title: Sports from Google and Maps not displayed on NowBar
rows.Problem: Now bar does not display sports from Google and Maps
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar fails to display sports content from Google and Maps apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure in a UI element, affecting content visibility but not device usability or core operations.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue has been fixed in Google app version 16.2-24.* onwards, please update and check, let us know if the issue persists.

rows.Title: Device doesn't vibrates when calls are received
rows.Problem: Haptic feedback that is vibration stopped working. Whenever my phone is in pocket and a call comes, I am not able to feel that and the call gets missed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device no longer vibrates when calls are received, making it impossible to feel incoming calls when the phone is in a pocket.
rows.Severity Reason: Users miss calls entirely when the phone is in their pocket, which directly impacts usability and safety.
rows.R&D Comment: If there is no vibration, it seems HW might have been defective. So, kindly get the device checked from HW side or observe vibration after replacing Motor HW component.

rows.Title: More options in camera not showing
rows.Problem: The camera options do not show up properly and it happens every time. The camera works properly but the 'more' options do not show up on screen.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'more' options in the camera app do not display on screen, despite the camera functionality working normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing entirely, but the core camera function remains operational, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a UI visibility bug after One UI 7 update; we have fixed it and will integrate it into the next version upgrade. Users should disable 'Reduce animations' in Accessibility settings to resolve it.

rows.Title: Lag in closing apps
rows.Problem: Slow recent app closing animation
rows.Summarized Problem: The recent apps closing animation is slow and laggy.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of the app closing animation, which affects user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Samsung Pass unable to login
rows.Problem: Samsung Pass unable to login
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot log in to Samsung Pass after withdrawing from it, requiring a re-signup and data initialization.
rows.Severity Reason: Users experience partial functionality failure after withdrawal, but can still access the service after reinitialization.
rows.R&D Comment: User must re-sign up after withdrawing from Samsung Pass due to data initialization requirement; no technical fix available.

rows.Title: Game stops when switching apps during heavy gameplay
rows.Problem: Game stops and needs to be reopened after switching to another app during heavy gameplay, with screen dimming and locking occurring more quickly after One UI 7 update. This issue persists consistently.
rows.Summarized Problem: The game crashes or stops when switching to another app during heavy gameplay, causing frequent restarts and screen dimming.
rows.Severity Reason: The game stops functioning mid-play, leading to loss of progress and user frustration, and the issue is consistent and device-wide.
rows.R&D Comment: High memory and CPU pressure due to excessive resident processes and disabled Ram Plus option; enabling Ram Plus increases swap size and allows more apps to reside in memory.

rows.Title: SIM preferences reset on device restart
rows.Problem: After updating to Android 15 and UI7, SIM preferences for call, message, and data reset to SIM 1 every time the device restarts, even when previously set to SIM 2.
rows.Summarized Problem: SIM preferences reset to SIM 1 on every device restart after Android 15 and UI7 update, despite being previously set to SIM 2.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes consistent failure of user-configured SIM settings, leading to incorrect call, message, and data routing on every restart, making the device unusable for communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: DDS switch is requested by multiple modules. Exact cause is unknown due to insufficient logs. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: CX faces Routines disappear issue
rows.Problem: Routines created in One UI 5 or earlier are no longer visible in the Routines page after the One UI 7.0 update, and users cannot create new routines with the same conditions due to an error.
rows.Summarized Problem: Routines created in earlier versions of One UI are no longer visible in the settings after the One UI 7.0 update, and users cannot create new routines with specific conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: Users lose access to previously configured routines, which are essential for battery alerts and charging management, rendering core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: After the One UI 7.0 FOTA update, routines created in One UI 5 or earlier are not visible in One UI 7 and above. This issue is expected to be resolved in One UI 8.0, and users can currently restore routines via backup and restore settings.

rows.Title: Samsung My Files app crashing
rows.Problem: Samsung My Files app crashing again and again. NOT ABLE TO OPEN FILES FROM Categories
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung My Files app crashes repeatedly and fails to open files from the Categories section.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes repeatedly, preventing users from accessing files, which renders a core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Added exception handling logic for non-hierarchical URI to prevent crashes; users should clear download_uri data by renaming the Downloads folder and restoring it.

rows.Title: Extract Text feature from gallery photos not working
rows.Problem: Extract Text feature from gallery photos not working; shows 'No text found' message. Photo remastering also not working. Issues started after UI 7 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Extract Text feature from gallery photos fails and shows 'No text found' message, especially in Gujarati language.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional for supported languages, preventing users from extracting text from photos, which is a core usability function.

rows.Title: picture automatically deleted when cropping and increasing resolution
rows.Problem: When selecting a picture to crop and increasing resolution, the image is automatically deleted. This occurs only when browsing family members in the gallery and cropping their photos.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos are automatically deleted when cropping and increasing resolution in the gallery, especially when viewing family member images.
rows.Severity Reason: The image is completely lost during editing, which renders the feature unusable and results in data loss for user-selected photos.

rows.Title: UI is getting stuck and not responding
rows.Problem: The UI is getting stuck and not responding. The phone is not accepting the charge. Wifi is connected but not showing in status bar.
rows.Summarized Problem: The user interface is stuck and unresponsive, with the phone failing to accept charging and showing connected Wi-Fi incorrectly in the status bar.
rows.Severity Reason: The UI is completely unresponsive, and the device fails to charge, making it unusable.

rows.Title: Pop up window close glitch
rows.Problem: Pop up window close glitch; when closing a new tab from notification icon bar, UI shows processing notification and unable to open any app for about 3 seconds
rows.Summarized Problem: A pop-up window close glitch occurs, and after closing a tab from the notification icon bar, the UI shows a processing notification and apps cannot be opened for about 3 seconds.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction in app launch after a user action, but does not result in device freeze or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to scroll up apps menu, cant pull down quick panel and notification bar
rows.Problem: After installing one ui 7 update I often encounter unresponsiveness. I can''t scroll up apps menu, cant pull down quick panel and notification bar. Some apps suddenly stop responding to my clicks. I have to repeatedly use power button and restart the screen to get things done.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot scroll up the apps menu or pull down the quick panel and notification bar, with apps occasionally stopping response and requiring repeated restarts.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive and requires frequent restarts, severely impacting usability and basic functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Not able to use my phone application at all
rows.Problem: Not able to use my phone application at all. Nothing is visible. Not able to call. Not able to operate.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot use the phone application at all; no interface is visible and basic operations like calling are impossible.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes completely unusable as fundamental functions like calling and operation are entirely disabled.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue occurs when upgrading from u OS to v OS due to contacts provider failure, especially with large contact data. The fix has been implemented and is under validation; it will be included in the September MR binary.

rows.Title: App crashed when i click on downloads tab
rows.Problem: App crashed when i click on downloads tab
rows.Summarized Problem: The app crashes when the user clicks on the downloads tab.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes upon a core navigation action, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Added exception handling for non-hierarchical URI to prevent crash; users should clear download_uri data by renaming the Downloads folder.

rows.Title: Unable to change help text and clock face colour
rows.Problem: Cannot change help text and clock face colour
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change the colour of the help text and clock face.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, preventing users from customizing a visual feature, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Smart view and modes button overlapping issue
rows.Problem: Smart view and modes button overlapping each other and not even opening
rows.Summarized Problem: Smart view and modes buttons are overlapping and fail to open properly in the quick panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a UI element, preventing proper interaction but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Timing issues caused layout overlap; fixed by adjusting layout to match timing, resolved in OS update

rows.Title: Unable to setup work account
rows.Problem: Unable to setup work account after deleting work account data. Now unable to setup work account from start.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set up a work account after deleting existing work account data.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to perform a fundamental setup function, rendering the device unusable for work account configuration.

rows.Title: Unable to find gpu settings and game performance settings in the game booster plugin in good lock
rows.Problem: Cannot find GPU settings and game performance settings in the game booster plugin in Good Lock. Device with Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 and Adreno 740 lacks expected game optimization features.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot find GPU and game performance settings in the Game Booster plugin within the Good Lock interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The absence of essential game performance settings renders a flagship device's key functionality unavailable, contradicting user expectations for flagship devices.
rows.R&D Comment: The Game Booster plugin is missing in the latest Good Lock version 3.0.13.1; users should instead select game-specific optimization options directly in the Game Booster menu.

rows.Title: Video Quality Not Clear on Device
rows.Problem: Movie plays blurry at times and quality becomes clear after some time
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback appears blurry at times before becoming clear again.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent playback quality degradation, affecting user experience but not causing device failure or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: ringtone volume automatically goes to zero
rows.Problem: The ringtone volume automatically goes to zero when an incoming call is received, resulting in silent calls, while all other sounds and notifications work normally.
rows.Summarized Problem: The ringtone volume automatically drops to zero during incoming calls, making calls silent despite proper settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from hearing incoming calls, rendering the phone functionally unusable for communication.

rows.Title: Power Button Not Working
rows.Problem: Power button on side is not working after the security patch software update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The power button on the side of the device is not working after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The power button is a fundamental control for device operation, and its failure renders the device unusable.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi calling is getting disabled after update
rows.Problem: Wi-Fi calling is getting disabled after update. It should remain active once it is enabled
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi calling is being disabled after a system update and should remain active once enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is being unexpectedly disabled after an update, making it unusable for users who rely on it.
rows.R&D Comment: It received AUTHENTICATION_FAILED notify error from server. This is a server/network issue. Need to check further from the operator side why it responded AUTHENTICATION_FAILED notify error.

rows.Title: Nowbar isn't showing Google Sports live score
rows.Problem: Nowbar isn't showing Google Sports live score
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar is not displaying Google Sports live scores.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working after update, but the device remains usable and does not crash or freeze.

rows.Title: Calculator app begins with 0
rows.Problem: Calculator app begins with 0 and displays entered numbers before the 0
rows.Summarized Problem: The calculator app displays entered numbers before the initial 0 when opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the correct display of input values but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Noise issue in video
rows.Problem: Noise issue in video please fix it soon without degrading video quality by softening video
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recordings exhibit noise, especially during digital zoom, which cannot be reduced without degrading image sharpness.
rows.Severity Reason: The noise issue occurs during digital zoom and affects video quality, but does not cause device malfunction or crash, and is constrained by sensor limitations.
rows.R&D Comment: The noise occurs during digital zoom on the wide camera due to sensor limitations; no improvement is possible without degrading image sharpness. Maintain current status.

rows.Title: images not shown in gallery when sharing in social media apps
rows.Problem: gallery not showing full list of albums when sharing images in apps like WhatsApp; only a few albums are visible
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's gallery fails to show all albums when sharing images in social media apps like WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects partial functionality of image sharing but does not prevent full device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: If the Google Photos Picker is not working, users should update the Google Photos app, restart the device, or clear its cache and data.

rows.Title: audio latency with realme buds air 6 on bluetooth
rows.Problem: audio continues playing while video shuts off, causing audio to come early than video, leading to latency. Issue started around 15-16 June after a phone update and temporarily resolves with phone restart.
rows.Summarized Problem: Audio plays before video on realme buds air 6 via Bluetooth, causing noticeable latency.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in audio-video synchronization but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: It seems that it's been some time since the phone was disconnected from the bluetooth devices, so it's difficult to analyze the issue point. Please take the log right after it happens again.

rows.Title: Can't enlarge the clock on lock screen
