rows.Problem: I can't enlarge the clock on my lock screen any further, nor does it animate upon opening
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen cannot be enlarged and fails to animate when opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The clock fails to animate and cannot be enlarged, which affects user interaction but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: network issue where the sim slot 1 sometimes stops working
rows.Problem: device is getting slower day by day, network issue where the sim slot 1 sometimes stops working, device takes 5 to 10 minutes to get signal after restart
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences intermittent network failure with SIM slot 1, resulting in delayed signal recovery after restart and overall slowdown.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable for calls and data due to intermittent network failure and significant delay in signal recovery, impacting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: device heating up during normal use
rows.Problem: device heating up like crazy even when scrolling on insta or texting on whatsapp, no heavy usage or games
rows.Summarized Problem: The device heats up excessively during normal usage such as scrolling on Instagram or texting in WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats under normal usage conditions, which could lead to performance degradation or hardware damage.
rows.R&D Comment: No abnormal overheating instances recorded during Instagram or WhatsApp use; max temperature was 37-38 degrees. Request logs during overheating events.

rows.Title: Galaxy Watch 3 does not vibrate or show popup for MultiTimer app notifications
rows.Problem: Galaxy Watch 3 does not vibrate or show popup for MultiTimer app notifications — only red dot. Native timer works fine. All permissions set correctly. Issue appeared after pairing with Galaxy S24 (One UI 7 / Android 15).
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy Watch 3 fails to vibrate or display a popup for MultiTimer app notifications, despite receiving the notification in the side pane.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification is received but not properly displayed or vibrated, resulting in a partial failure of the user experience, though core functionality (native timer) remains intact.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a Fit3 plugin issue where null sound and vibration values result in AlertType = 0 during sync; countermeasure is to have MultiTimer post alarm category notifications and extract alert values based on alarm policy.

rows.Title: Data connection issue
rows.Problem: Data connection issue occurs intermittently and frequently.
rows.Summarized Problem: Data connection drops intermittently and frequently.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent data loss but does not prevent device usage or cause a complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Network Storage not working
rows.Problem: Network storage is not working properly even after correct username and password input; shows errors when connecting to PC.
rows.Summarized Problem: Network storage fails to connect to PC despite correct username and password entry.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial failure in connectivity under expected conditions, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The network storage manager cannot connect to PC; new logs are needed for further investigation.

rows.Title: Image Quality: Light is getting scatter while taking any photo
rows.Problem: While taking any photo from my Galaxy A54, there are errors found with light scattering. The issue persists even after resetting camera settings and diagnosing via member app.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos taken on the Galaxy A54 show light scattering, indicating poor image quality due to potential lens or surface contamination.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo clarity but does not cause device crash or complete failure; it is a partial malfunction that impacts user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Please clean the display at the top of the camera and Cam Deco and take a picture. If the issue persists, the internal camera lens is likely contaminated and requires service center visit.

rows.Title: Unable to crop images from right as the back gesture integers with the cropping tool
rows.Problem: Unable to crop images from right as the back gesture integers with the cropping tool. There is no such issue when cropping from left
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot crop images from the right side because the back gesture is misinterpreted as a crop action in the middle area of the photo editor.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction in the crop function, specifically on the right side, but does not prevent full usage or cause device failure.

rows.Title: Device Rebooting After One UI 7 Update
rows.Problem: Device randomly reboots when pressing volume buttons, opening media apps like YouTube, or switching to landscape mode after updating to One UI 7 / Android 14.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device randomly reboots after updating to One UI 7 when interacting with volume buttons, media apps, or switching to landscape mode.
rows.Severity Reason: Device reboots under normal usage conditions, making it unusable and potentially leading to data loss or system instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Device failed to create valid texture during UI rendering; logs cleared, root cause unknown. Countermeasure: Request RAMdump and dumpsys logs from warranty center immediately after issue occurrence.

rows.Title: Navigation Touch not working proper
rows.Problem: False touches happening when swiping back in full screen navigation, such as pressing like buttons in Instagram Reels or YouTube Shorts
rows.Summarized Problem: False touch events occur during navigation swipes, causing unintended interactions like pressing like buttons in media content.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction in navigation functionality but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The problem is not reproduced in the latest version. Please check again in the latest version.

rows.Title: Camera app lagging and freezes when switching to 0.5x or front camera
rows.Problem: Camera app lagging and freezes when switching to 0.5x or front camera, shows 'camera app stopping'
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera app lags and freezes when switching to 0.5x or front camera, displaying 'camera app stopping'.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera app freezes during normal operation, making it unusable for basic photography functions.

rows.Title: Internet switching doesn't work during calls
rows.Problem: Internet switching not work on second sim slot during call
rows.Summarized Problem: Internet switching fails on the second SIM slot during phone calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality during a call, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Gallery app crashing on open
rows.Problem: Gallery app crashes when opening, returns to home screen, causes phone to heat up and slow down after updates
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Gallery app crashes when opened, causing the device to heat up and slow down.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on launch, leading to device instability and performance degradation, making the device unusable for photo access.
rows.R&D Comment: The Gallery closing issue is related to a OneDrive issue; reported to OneDrive as #7252 [OneDrive][P250403-01390]. Please close it as a 3rd Party app issue.

rows.Title: Camera failed pop up occurs after working for a few seconds
rows.Problem: Camera fails to function after working for a few seconds, resulting in a pop-up error
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to function after a few seconds of operation, causing a pop-up error.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to function after a short period, making it unusable during operation, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Hardware issue with sensor power-on failure; Countermeasure: Customer to visit service center for front camera inspection

rows.Title: Sports from Google not working on Now bar
rows.Problem: I am facing problem with Now Bar. I completed all the settings. I already follow sports team & I already checked my Google settings everything is fine but still I am facing problem
rows.Summarized Problem: Sports content from Google is not displaying on the Now Bar of the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working despite proper settings, indicating a partial malfunction rather than complete device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Unlocking with another person's fingerprint
rows.Problem: Galaxy S21 FE is unlocking with another person's fingerprint that is not registered, indicating a failure in the fingerprint authentication system to distinguish between registered and unauthorized fingerprints. This is a major security concern.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device accepts unauthorized fingerprints during unlock, compromising user security.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is being unlocked by an unregistered fingerprint, posing a serious security risk and allowing unauthorized access.

rows.Title: Today and yesterday Text UI not proper while scroll in Logs
rows.Problem: In the new Samsung One UI 7, the call app shows 'Today' and 'yesterday' text labels incorrectly when scrolling through call logs. These labels were properly positioned in One UI 6 but are now misaligned and look ugly. The UI also feels unsmooth with occasional lag and requires refinement.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Today' and 'yesterday' labels in the call log are misaligned and appear incorrectly when scrolling, causing an unsmooth and visually unappealing user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI presentation and smoothness but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Google TalkBack not working properly
rows.Problem: Google TalkBack not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: Google TalkBack is not functioning properly on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss, only impacting accessibility functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: TalkBack is currently being created while working with Google. Both Google and Samsung are creating TalkBack based on the same code. Both companies are aware of the difference in TalkBack built by Samsung and Google in the market, and are preparing solutions.

rows.Title: USB not showing connected in the device
rows.Problem: USB cannot connect to phone; no options shown in files or notification panel, even after resetting settings
rows.Summarized Problem: USB device fails to show connection options on the phone, even after resetting settings.
rows.Severity Reason: User cannot access USB file transfer functionality, making device unusable for file sharing.
rows.R&D Comment: When checking the log, the terminal is not able to communicate with USB normally. USB connector H/W should be checked.

rows.Title: Unable to remove app notification
rows.Problem: A notification from an app stays on screen for 2 to 3 minutes and cannot be dismissed
rows.Summarized Problem: A notification from an app remains on screen for 2 to 3 minutes and cannot be dismissed.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification persists for an extended time, preventing user interaction, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: UI Icon coming on quick panel screen
rows.Problem: Ui bug on notification tray
rows.Summarized Problem: A UI icon appears incorrectly on the notification tray in the quick panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the UI element on the quick panel, affecting visibility but not causing device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Notification animation not working properly
rows.Problem: Notification animation not working properly. Earlier drop down icon first then notification appears with open up animation; now drop down icon and notification appear together.
rows.Summarized Problem: The animation of pop-up notifications is malfunctioning, showing drop-down icon and notification together instead of sequentially.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual flow of notifications but does not cause device failure or data loss, only a partial malfunction in UI behavior.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Navigation bar overlap
rows.Problem: Navigation bar is overlapping app details in many apps after updating to UI 7. This issue also occurs on UPI pin page and was not present in UI 6.
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar overlaps with app content in multiple apps after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects app usability but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and is limited to specific apps.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue belongs to a third-party application. The app is targeting Android 15 and uses edge-to-edge mode by default; the app developer needs to adjust its window insets configuration to avoid navigation bar overlap.

rows.Title: Clock disappears when changing position on lock screen
rows.Problem: Clock disappears when trying to change clock position on lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock disappears when the user attempts to change its position on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the usability of the lock screen clock but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Widget issue in notification panel
rows.Problem: Bug in notification panel after July update
rows.Summarized Problem: A widget in the notification panel is malfunctioning after the July update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a specific UI element but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to change app label color
rows.Problem: The app icon label cannot be read as it is black. There is currently no option to manually change the icon label color.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change the color of app icon labels, making them unreadable when black.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of app labels but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Unstability in 5G network
rows.Problem: Camera quality is very bad, pixels are breaking, and screen flickers in camera like old 2007 keypad phones. It is a new device and it has been happening since day 1. 5G networks are very unstable, other devices have good speed so 5G availability can't be blamed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences unstable 5G network connectivity and severe camera display issues with flickering and pixel breakage.
rows.Severity Reason: The 5G instability affects core connectivity, and camera issues with flickering and pixel breakage indicate a major functional failure in a primary user experience component.
rows.R&D Comment: Camera quality is lower than mainstream due to 8MP resolution; provide CP silent logs for further analysis.

rows.Title: Gallery App Freezes When Viewing Motion Photo
rows.Problem: Gallery app freezes completely when viewing a motion photo and becomes unresponsive, requiring force closure and restart to recover.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Gallery app freezes and becomes unresponsive when attempting to view a motion photo.
rows.Severity Reason: The app completely freezes and becomes unresponsive, preventing user interaction and requiring force closure to recover, making it unusable during the affected operation.
rows.R&D Comment: The mppserver process is frozen in do_freezer_trap state, requiring reproducibility confirmation and ramdump collection for further analysis; user is advised to reboot and report if issue recurs.

rows.Title: Multitasking issue with PW app during video playback
rows.Problem: When playing a video in the PW app, launching another app causes a black screen or temporary display shutdown. This occurs only when a video is actively playing, and does not happen when the video is paused or not playing.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback in PW app causes black screen or display shutdown when launching other apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue interrupts user interaction but does not cause device crash or data loss, and only occurs during specific app usage.

rows.Title: One UI 7 Not Showing
rows.Problem: One UI 7 Not Showing in My Phone. But This feature officially available in My Phone. So Please help me by solving issues as soon as possible.
rows.Summarized Problem: One UI 7 is not displayed in the phone's software update section despite being installed.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the UI, preventing users from seeing an available update, but the device still has the update installed.

rows.Title: Sim switch setting not working properly
rows.Problem: Dual SIM switching always shows error and feature cannot be used
rows.Summarized Problem: Dual SIM switching fails and shows error in the Sim Card Manager setting.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work fully but allows some usage, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Weather app showing updated time
rows.Problem: Weather apps show update time 30 minutes ahead of current time
rows.Summarized Problem: Weather apps display update time 30 minutes ahead of actual time.
rows.Severity Reason: The time discrepancy causes users to misinterpret current conditions, leading to incorrect decisions and potential usability failure.

rows.Title: Device is not charging
rows.Problem: After updating one UI 7 in my M34 I am facing charging issues. After connecting charger the device is not charging
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is not charging when connected to a charger.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to charge, which prevents basic functionality and renders the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The CC-VBUS short state was detected, limiting charging current; recommend checking cable, charger, and USB connector for foreign substances or damage.

rows.Title: Switch to 5G not working
rows.Problem: Overheating and not switching to 5G. Also having slow response and hanging
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats and fails to switch to 5G, with slow response and hanging during operation.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats and fails to switch to 5G, causing significant performance degradation and potential usability loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The online streaming app com.offshore.pikachu contributes to temperature increase and memory usage; app-side memory optimization is needed.

rows.Title: Video playback not smooth at 1080p, 1440p, 2160p
rows.Problem: 1080p, 1440p, and 2160p video playback is not smooth despite good 5G connection and high download/upload speeds
rows.Summarized Problem: High-resolution video playback on YouTube is not smooth despite a strong 5G connection.
rows.Severity Reason: Playback is not smooth but still functional under good network conditions, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no MediaPlayer logs for playback of the video shown in the attached video. Please try playing the video on YouTube Application or on another browser. If issue occurs again with other applications as well, please take logs timely.

rows.Title: Calculator not working properly
rows.Problem: After Android 15 update, Calculator shows '0' when opening. When inputting numbers, 0 automatically appends and needs to be replaced.
rows.Summarized Problem: The calculator app shows a default '0' when opening and automatically appends '0' when inputting numbers after the Android 15 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the calculator functionality but does not prevent full device use.
rows.R&D Comment: We updated the cursor position logic to replace the default '0' text when inputting numbers, and released version 12.4.00.13 on Galaxy Store.

rows.Title: Wifi not connecting
rows.Problem: Wi-Fi Quick Connect Failure: Quick toggle fails. "Obtaining IP address" loop then blank. Requires manual connection via full setup.
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi quick connect fails with a loop showing 'obtaining IP address' before blanking, requiring manual connection.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes difficulty in connecting to Wi-Fi but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Wi-Fi quick connect failure is due to a loop in IP address acquisition; countermeasure is to guide users through manual connection via full setup.

rows.Title: Downloads screen opens and minimizes immediately in My Files app
rows.Problem: Clicking on "Downloads" in "My Files" app opens the screen, shows no files, and immediately minimizes and goes to background.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Downloads screen in the My Files app opens with no files and immediately minimizes.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen fails to display content and minimizes immediately, resulting in partial functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Added exception handling for non-hierarchical URI; users should rename and restore the Downloads folder to clear corrupted download_uri data.

rows.Title: Time & date widget not displayed properly
rows.Problem: After upgrading to Android 15, after each reboot on home screen time and date widget is displaying just a black background in lieu of date and time. Each time I have to reboot again to retrieve the normal display.
rows.Summarized Problem: The time and date widget displays a black background instead of the actual time and date after each reboot, requiring a restart to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction of the home screen interface but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to connect Android Auto
rows.Problem: Unable to connect Android Auto via USB; works on another handset but not on this device, issue started after software update UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: Android Auto fails to connect via USB on this device, while working on another handset, starting after software update UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is partial and device-specific, but affects functionality with another device, indicating intermittent failure rather than full device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Disable Android Auto app in Settings > Apps > Android Auto. Counter Measure: Same as cause.

rows.Title: Screen recording during gaming
rows.Problem: Screen recording option was available before ONE UI 7 update but is now unavailable while playing games.
rows.Summarized Problem: Screen recording is no longer available during gameplay after the ONE UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing during gameplay, but users can still access it in other contexts or understand it as an OS-level limitation.
rows.R&D Comment: The screen recording feature is not supported by the device's OS or GameBooster app, and this is an OS-level limitation.

rows.Title: Background wallpaper of contact gets blur
rows.Problem: Contact photos get blur when calling or receiving calls after answering, which was not the case when the phone was purchased.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contact photos become blurred when viewing during calls or after answering calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual quality of contact photos during calls but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Default 0 not removed when entering a number
rows.Problem: Calculator displays 1000 instead of 100 when inputting a number, new behavior after Android 15 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The calculator incorrectly displays 1000 instead of 100 when entering a number, due to a bug in the input handling after Android 15 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect calculation results but does not make the device unusable or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: We updated the condition to correctly update cursor position after the first 0, and released version 12.4.00.13 on Galaxy Store to fix this issue.

rows.Title: Unable to use Bixby
rows.Problem: Issue occurs when trying to use Bixby; device is up to date
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot use Bixby after leaving it, as personal data deletion takes a week and re-signup is not possible until then.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents reusing Bixby, but does not cause device crash or data loss, and functionality is partially available after a delay.
rows.R&D Comment: Once you leave Bixby, it takes about a week to delete your personal data permanently. You have to try it again after a week. If the problem still happens, please let us know.

rows.Title: Samsung Pass not working
rows.Problem: The Samsung Pass app icon disappeared from the home screen and when opened via Settings, it asked to log in again. The login link went to spam folder, requiring a password reset. This occurred after other touch-related app glitches.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Pass app icon disappeared from the home screen and failed to load properly, requiring a password reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the app functionality, where the icon disappears and login fails, but the core app remains accessible after reset.
rows.R&D Comment: The pass icon was expected to migrate to Wallet, but data deletion occurred without log record; if the issue recurs, immediate logs are needed for analysis.

rows.Title: Contact app not opening
rows.Problem: Contacts folder not opening after software update; keypad not working properly; device unresponsive; user frustrated and unable to access service center
rows.Summarized Problem: The Contacts app is not opening after a software update, and the keypad is unresponsive, preventing user from accessing contact data.
rows.Severity Reason: The app failure prevents core functionality (accessing contacts) and renders device unusable for basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: onUpgrade method performs large operations taking over 10 seconds, causing contacts provider issues. Countermeasure: Move large operations to background and provide temporary fix by clearing app data.

rows.Title: Network issues
rows.Problem: Mobile network drops and internet not working after updating to One UI 7, even with full signal. Issue persists for over a month despite resets, SIM change, and manual APN setup.
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile network drops and internet fails after One UI 7 update, despite full signal and multiple troubleshooting attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unable to access the internet and mobile services, rendering basic functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Lag in notification panel
rows.Problem: Notification bar lagging and sound breaking, very frustrating
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel lags and has a broken sound, causing user frustration.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag and broken sound severely impact usability and device responsiveness, making the interface feel unresponsive.

rows.Title: Unable to use WhatsApp
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7.0, WhatsApp stopped installing via the Play Store and failed to update. The app was corrupted and could not be reinstalled through official channels. A workaround using an APK was found, but it does not sync with the Play Store for updates.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp fails to install and update through the official Play Store after a system update, requiring a third-party APK as a workaround.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is completely inaccessible via official channels, preventing core communication functionality and requiring workarounds that may compromise security and updates.

rows.Title: Remaster option not found
rows.Problem: Remaster image option not showing in photo editing on Samsung Galaxy A16
rows.Summarized Problem: The remaster image editing option is not appearing when editing photos on the Samsung Galaxy A16.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in the photo editing workflow, preventing users from applying remaster effects, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: unlock transition effect laggy and glitchy
rows.Problem: unlock transition effect seems laggy and glitchy with frame drops during home screen to lock screen transition
rows.Summarized Problem: The unlock transition effect on the Lock Screen is laggy and glitchy with noticeable frame drops during the home screen to lock screen transition.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visible lag and glitches during a key UI transition but does not prevent device usage or cause system crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to connect Internet & call
rows.Problem: Unable to connect to internet or make calls after Android 15 update, experiencing software glitches despite changing SIM, full reset, and service center visit.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot connect to internet or make calls after Android 15 update, despite troubleshooting efforts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents basic device functionality (internet and calls), making the device unusable for core communication tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to turn On Call waiting option
rows.Problem: Cannot receive new call notifications while on a call. Call waiting toggle is disabled by default in Call settings under Supplementary services.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot receive new call notifications while on an active call due to the call waiting feature being disabled by default and not accessible in settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not available or accessible, preventing users from receiving call notifications during a call, but the device remains otherwise functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Call waiting is a network-based feature; users must contact their carrier to enable it.

rows.Title: network stopped working
rows.Problem: Cellular network stopped working after recent update. Factory reset and hard reset attempted. Service center could not fix it, stating motherboard or IC change is needed. User cannot afford repair cost. Phone is now unusable.
rows.Summarized Problem: Cellular network connectivity has stopped working after a recent software update, despite multiple attempts to resolve via factory reset and service center intervention.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is no longer able to establish cellular connectivity, rendering it fundamentally unusable for basic communication functions.
rows.R&D Comment: It looks like a hardware-specific issue. Below mentioned devices are not able to communicate with MIPI.

rows.Title: WhatsApp video call black lines
rows.Problem: Black lines appear for a few seconds when tapping video call options in WhatsApp, then disappear. The issue occurs intermittently and does not affect overall functionality. User is frustrated as the device is only 5 days old and service center attributed it to software.
rows.Summarized Problem: Black lines appear briefly during WhatsApp video calls before disappearing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video call display intermittently but does not cause device crash or complete failure, allowing normal usage to continue.
rows.R&D Comment: Attached logs and video are not in sync. Please attach new logs and video in sync.

rows.Title: Call drop issue and data not working
rows.Problem: Call drop issue and data not working, incoming calls not connecting, LTE option not shown, WiFi data switching over improperly. Issue started after update and persists for three months. Logs do not show call failure or drop events.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences call drops, failure to connect incoming calls, and data issues including missing LTE and improper WiFi data switching, all persisting since an update and not captured in logs.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents basic communication functions and renders the device unusable for voice and data connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no call failure or call drop captured in logs; hence the issue cannot be conclusively identified or resolved with current information.

rows.Title: Glitch observe while locking the device
rows.Problem: The screen goes blank during lock screen animation, either halfway or immediately after starting.
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen animation fails and causes the screen to go blank during operation.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen going blank during animation renders the device unusable at the lock state, preventing user access.

rows.Title: Battery display mismatch
rows.Problem: Battery status tile has bug. Battery level shows 88% but the circle shows 100%
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery level display shows incorrect percentage, showing 100% when actual level is 88%
rows.Severity Reason: The display shows an incorrect value, leading to user confusion but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Swipe back gesture not working properly
rows.Problem: When performing the side/back swipe gesture, the app screen moves left and right but the back action does not trigger properly, causing a glitchy and unstable navigation experience with side-shifting animation and lag.
rows.Summarized Problem: The swipe back gesture fails to trigger a back action and instead causes unintended screen shifting, leading to a glitchy and unstable navigation experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The gesture malfunction causes inconsistent navigation but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.

rows.Title: 5g lte not working
rows.Problem: 5g lte not working after software update
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G and LTE connectivity is not working after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to connect to 5G/LTE networks, which are essential for mobile communication, rendering basic network functionality unavailable.

rows.Title: Mobile data disconnected and mobile network settings greyed out
rows.Problem: After installing the latest Android 15 and oneUI 7.0 software update, mobile data disconnected and mobile network settings are completely greyed out. Factory reset attempts did not resolve the issue. Calls work normally, and data works on the same SIM from another device.
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile data has disconnected and mobile network settings are greyed out after a software update, despite normal call functionality and working data on another device.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot access mobile network settings or data after an update, rendering core connectivity functions unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Secure Folder apps show in recent use app list
rows.Problem: Secure Folder app shows in recent use app list after software update, even when its icon is disabled in navigation bar. This behavior should not occur as it did before the update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Secure Folder apps now appear in the recent apps list regardless of its navigation bar icon state, deviating from pre-update behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in UI behavior, where an app appears in the recent apps list when it should not, but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Until One UI 7.0, the Secure Folder icon in the quick panel functions to show/hide the Secure Folder app icons on the home screen. This is not an operation that completely hides the Secure Folder's usability. It is normal behavior according to the Secure Folder's lock settings and Android's Multi User concept. We provide an 'Encryption' option that allows you to encrypt the Secure Folder space.

rows.Title: Edge panel not opening
rows.Problem: Edge panel does not open when trying to access it
rows.Summarized Problem: The edge panel fails to open when user attempts to access it.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not function as intended, but the device remains usable overall.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Touch not delivered to edge handler. Countermeasure: User should touch edge handle and swipe to open.

rows.Title: Half of the screen becomes blank when using Google Search or Circle
rows.Problem: When using Google Search or Circle to search, half of the screen becomes blank, making it difficult to read properly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Half of the screen becomes blank during Google Search or Circle searches, impairing readability.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen blanking prevents proper content viewing, rendering the search functionality unusable.

rows.Title: WiFi and WiFi Hotspot do not toggle ON sometimes at random
rows.Problem: WiFi and WiFi Hotspot do not toggle ON sometimes at random. This issue started after updating to OneUI 7. To fix it, I have to restart the phone. These are vital functions for a smartphone.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi and WiFi Hotspot fail to turn on intermittently, requiring a phone restart to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents essential smartphone functions from working reliably, leading to loss of connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: PCIe interface issue during boot prevents Wi-Fi from enabling. Countermeasure: Users should be guided to service center for hardware inspection.

rows.Title: Popup view stuck at bottom right side in Multi-Window
rows.Problem: Popup view for video or other apps is stuck at bottom right side; navigation buttons displaced in full screen; buttons stuck at top when closing app; phone becomes slow after update
rows.Summarized Problem: The popup view for video or other apps is stuck at the bottom right corner and causes navigation issues when closing apps, leading to a slow device after update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes navigation buttons to become unresponsive and leads to device slowness after update, making the device unusable in certain scenarios.

rows.Title: Photo and Video quality becomes dull and low-saturated after editing
rows.Problem: When I edit a photo or video (e.g., adjust brightness, apply filters, crop), the saved version becomes very dull, low in contrast, and loses saturation. The original looks fine, but after editing, the result looks lifeless and flat. This happens with normal photos, HDR photos, and videos as well. It seems like color profile is affected.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photo and video editing results appear dull, low in contrast, and lack saturation after processing, despite original content appearing normal.
rows.Severity Reason: The editing function fails to preserve color accuracy, resulting in a partial malfunction of the photo editing feature.

rows.Title: Calculator default 0 not removed when entering a number
rows.Problem: When entering a number, the default 0 gets suffixed to the input, causing the number to display incorrectly (e.g., typing 123 results in 1230).
rows.Summarized Problem: The calculator app incorrectly suffixes a default zero when entering numbers, leading to incorrect display.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect number input but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: We updated condition to update correct cursor after 0, so when you inputting a number, it will replace default 0 text. We released version 00.13 on galaxy store to fix this issue.

rows.Title: System UI isn't responding again and again
rows.Problem: System UI isn't responding again and again. I am writing this for the second time now
rows.Summarized Problem: The System UI is not responding and repeatedly crashes.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI crashing repeatedly makes the device unusable and indicates a critical failure in core system functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: DeadSystemException in AndroidRuntime; Countermeasure: Same as cause, indicating system-level failure with no recovery mechanism.

rows.Title: Auto lock and screen off when opening apps from task bar or side bar
rows.Problem: When trying to open apps from task bar or side bar in pop up window, the tab gets auto locked and screen gets off. The issue occurs randomly and is only visible in videos.
rows.Summarized Problem: Opening apps from the task bar or side bar triggers automatic screen lock and shutdown in a pop-up window.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes the device to lose usability during app access, rendering the multi-window feature non-functional in critical scenarios.

rows.Title: Circle to Search feature not working
rows.Problem: Circle to Search feature is not working properly on device, showing black screen after restart and clearing Google and Google Play services data.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Circle to Search feature fails to function and shows a black screen on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work consistently, but the device remains usable and no data loss or crash occurs.
rows.R&D Comment: Circle to Search is a Google-provided feature; issue cannot be reproduced in latest Google app version. We will monitor and report if persists. Recommend user updates Google app and clears storage.

rows.Title: battery drain issue
rows.Problem: Battery drains rapidly after Android 15 update on Samsung Galaxy A14 5G. Phone lasts only 3-4 hours on a full charge despite normal usage. User has already tried device care, disabling background apps, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, reducing brightness, and updating apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains rapidly after Android 15 update on Samsung Galaxy A14 5G, lasting only 3-4 hours on a full charge.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial battery performance degradation rather than complete device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Network issues
rows.Problem: Network is not stable. Volte signal is not showing. Unable to know about emergency. All settings have been used.
rows.Summarized Problem: Volte signal is not showing, leading to instability in network connection and inability to detect emergency calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to show Volte signal, resulting in loss of emergency communication capability, making the device unusable in critical situations.

rows.Title: Joystick freezes while playing games
rows.Problem: Joystick freezes after UI update in games, making it difficult to play
rows.Summarized Problem: The joystick freezes during gameplay after a UI update, disrupting game control.
rows.Severity Reason: The joystick freezing prevents gameplay entirely, making it unusable for users.

rows.Title: Lag in lock screen animation
rows.Problem: Animation delay and jittery
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen animation has noticeable delay and jitter.
rows.Severity Reason: The animation is delayed and jittery, causing partial malfunction of the lock screen interaction.

rows.Title: Transparency and blur option not showing in Theme Park
rows.Problem: Transparency and blur option not showing in Theme Park app
rows.Summarized Problem: The transparency and blur options are not displaying in the Theme Park app settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a key UI setting, preventing users from customizing appearance, but the app remains functional.

rows.Title: Phone call ends automatically without completing the ring
rows.Problem: Phone call ends automatically without completing the full ring. Download fails at 50% in Chrome and Samsung Internet browser. No download history visible.
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone calls end before completing the ring, and downloads fail at 50% with no history recorded.
rows.Severity Reason: Call connection failure prevents users from making or receiving calls, and download failure impacts core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Overheating
rows.Problem: Device overheats during normal usage such as opening WhatsApp, even with mobile data and Wi-Fi off.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats during normal usage even when mobile data and Wi-Fi are off.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats under normal usage conditions, which could lead to performance degradation or hardware damage.

rows.Title: USB connected pop up displayed
rows.Problem: A notification continuously pops up after removing the charger, the screen remains on constantly in always-on display mode, and the issue persists even after restarting the device
rows.Summarized Problem: A persistent USB connection notification appears after removing the charger, causing the screen to remain constantly on in always-on display mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents normal device usage by keeping the screen on continuously and disrupting user experience with an unremovable notification.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery consumption is high when using YouTube with weak network signal or frequent app interactions such as checking comments or swiping through Shorts videos.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain when using YouTube with weak network signal or frequent user interactions like checking comments or swiping through Shorts videos.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial battery consumption under specific usage conditions, not complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: High CPU usage from YouTube during active interactions and weak network conditions. Countermeasure: Recommend using Wi-Fi, maintaining continuous playback, and keeping speaker volume below 12 to reduce battery consumption.

rows.Title: Sluggish device performance
rows.Problem: App and system UI responses are slow; app installation and opening take long time, multitasking causes fluctuations, touch input not responsive. System performance issues on Samsung devices, especially Exynos, with native apps not optimized for device runtime.
rows.Summarized Problem: System and app responses are sluggish, especially on Samsung devices with Exynos processors, leading to poor touch and UI responsiveness during multitasking.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unresponsive during multitasking and touch input fails, making core interactions unreliable and unusable.

rows.Title: YouTube video quality drops
rows.Problem: YouTube app cache growth on Samsung Galaxy M35 5G causes video quality to drop from 2160p to 240p, even when set to 2160p, after cache reaches 150-200MB. Clearing cache restores quality immediately. This suggests a firmware optimization issue on the Exynos 1380 processor related to cache and high-resolution video handling.
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube video quality drops to 240p after app cache grows to 150-200MB, despite being set to 2160p, indicating a firmware issue in handling high-resolution video playback.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to play 4K video at supported frame rates, resulting in a significant degradation of user experience and inability to view high-resolution content as intended.
rows.R&D Comment: The device cannot play 4K60fps videos; users should be directed to 4K30fps content for better compatibility and experience.

rows.Title: Network issues
rows.Problem: Network strength drops and turns LTE after turning on hotspot. 5G to LTE transition observed.
rows.Summarized Problem: Network strength drops and device switches to LTE after enabling hotspot, with observed 5G to LTE transition.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a transition behavior under specific conditions, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Device got locked automatically
rows.Problem: Device automatically locks without user input
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically locks without user input or indication.
rows.Severity Reason: The device locks unexpectedly, which may interfere with normal usage but does not cause complete device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to restore contacts from Smart Switch Backup
rows.Problem: Contacts saved in a file named contact.bk and unable to extract or restore properly; phone shows errors during restore process and suggests downloading third-party apps
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot restore contacts from a Smart Switch backup file due to incorrect backup path and missing restore files.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure in contact restoration, not complete device failure or data loss, but prevents proper use of backup recovery.

rows.Title: Menu app icons are missing
rows.Problem: Home menu app icons keep on missing each time
rows.Summarized Problem: Home menu app icons are intermittently missing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a UI element, causing intermittent display failure but does not render the device unusable.

rows.Title: Camera zoom blur
rows.Problem: Camera becomes fully blurry when zoomed beyond 9.9x, likely a software or hardware issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera image becomes fully blurry when zoomed beyond 9.9x.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to produce clear images at high zoom levels, making photo capture impossible under normal usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Damage to the AF drive unit due to impacts or vibrations causes focus failure; recommend service center inspection.

rows.Title: Inaccurate weather prediction
rows.Problem: Weather prediction is inaccurate compared to Google and Apple weather, which show accurate data for the same location and time
rows.Summarized Problem: The app displays inaccurate weather predictions compared to reliable third-party services like Google and Apple.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of weather data accuracy, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue was reported to TWC (The Weather Channel, weather data provider) and registered as an item for improvement. It requires a server change from the weather provider. When the server change occurs, this issue will be resolved without any app change.

rows.Title: Record calls option not found
rows.Problem: Call recording setting is not seeing
rows.Summarized Problem: The call recording setting is missing from the device settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not visible, preventing users from enabling call recording, but the device still functions otherwise.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Call recording support is disabled in system configuration. Countermeasure: Disable call recording support in system configuration.

rows.Title: Unable to download Update
rows.Problem: Security patch update is not happening on Samsung A34 5G phone. Error occurs repeatedly during update process.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung A34 5G phone fails to download the security patch update, resulting in repeated errors during the update process.
rows.Severity Reason: The update failure prevents the device from receiving critical security patches, making it vulnerable and potentially unusable.

rows.Title: can't update a34 5g software
rows.Problem: Unable to download software update; update gets stuck in loop and fails to download; security patch update not available
rows.Summarized Problem: The device cannot download or complete software updates, including security patches, and gets stuck in a loop during the update process.
rows.Severity Reason: The update process fails completely, preventing installation of critical security patches and software updates, rendering the device vulnerable and non-functional in terms of system maintenance.

rows.Title: Unable to control YouTube on popup screen
rows.Problem: Unable to control YouTube on popup screen; small window appears but not touchable during background playback
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot interact with the YouTube popup window during background playback, making it unresponsive and non-touchable.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full control of YouTube in background playback but does not cause device crash or data loss, allowing partial functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: App-side interaction logging errors and missing handoff commands; Countermeasure: Clear cache and update app from Play Store

rows.Title: Touch lag
rows.Problem: Touch lag
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience touch lag after the latest update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of touch responsiveness, affecting user interaction but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Video recording has a flickering sound issue
rows.Problem: Video recording has a flickering sound. When in handsfree mode during a call, the other person hears flickering noise, same during video calls.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recording has a flickering sound, and handsfree call audio introduces noticeable flickering noise.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs during critical functions like video recording and calls, affecting communication quality and user experience, leading to device usability problems.

rows.Title: Low light videography and photography not good
rows.Problem: Low light videography and photography are horrible, especially when video stabilization is turned off. Performance is not as expected for a smartphone in the 1 lakh plus price range.
rows.Summarized Problem: Low light photography and videography perform poorly, with visible ghosting when video stabilization is disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue significantly impacts core camera functionality in low light, leading to poor user experience and failure to meet expectations for a premium smartphone.
rows.R&D Comment: In low light, both spatial and temporal noise reduction are strongly applied, causing ghosting artifacts; current state is optimized to avoid noise boosting, but performance is suboptimal.

rows.Title: Taskbar disappears when swiping up to open app in pop-up view
rows.Problem: When swiping up to bring the Taskbar and select an app to open in pop-up view, the Taskbar disappears and the current app stops and the device gets screen locked. This issue occurs especially when the previous app is full-screen or gesture hints are on.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Taskbar disappears and the device screen locks when swiping up to open an app in pop-up view.
rows.Severity Reason: The device screen locks and current app stops, making the device unusable during the action.

rows.Title: unable to use samsung wallet
rows.Problem: after reinstalling the application, it is not allowing me to login and throws me back to the login page
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot log in to Samsung Wallet after reinstallation, being redirected back to the login page.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to authenticate users, preventing access to a core feature and rendering it unusable.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drain
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain over the past few days.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain renders the device unusable without frequent charging, leading to device inoperability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cellular Rx signal strength (RSRP): Device was mostly in poor network area, and hence drainage is happening.

rows.Title: Lock Screen widgets texts overlap with widget icons
rows.Problem: Lock screen widgets texts overlap with widget icons, especially for battery widget
rows.Summarized Problem: Texts on lock screen widgets overlap with widget icons, particularly on the battery widget.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects widget usability but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Battery drain issues after UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Huge battery drain issues after UI 7 update and security patch, issue persists despite updates
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience significant battery drain after updating to UI 7, even after receiving a security patch.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain prevents device usability and may lead to rapid shutdowns, making the device functionally unusable.

rows.Title: Overheating battery while charging
rows.Problem: Battery overheats while charging even with background apps stopped and network services off
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery overheats during charging even when background apps and network services are disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheats during charging, which can lead to safety risks and potential damage, despite background activity being off.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating is caused by fast charging and weak network connection; thermal management system is functioning properly.

rows.Title: Screen shaking when trying to unsubscribe message
rows.Problem: Screen is shaking when trying to unsubscribe a message. Device has been restarted and restored, but issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen shakes when attempting to unsubscribe a message in the Android Messages app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of a core message management function but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Check the latest AM version: messages.android_20250706_00_RC00.phone_samsung_dynamic

rows.Title: Typing indicator showing before 0 in Calculator
rows.Problem: While opening Samsung Calculator app, 0 showing in typing location but typing indicator showing before 0
rows.Summarized Problem: The typing indicator appears before the digit 0 in the Samsung Calculator app, causing a visual inconsistency during input.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial UI malfunction where the indicator position is incorrect, but the app remains functional and does not crash or lose data.
rows.R&D Comment: The cursor position update was fixed in version 12.4.00.13 to ensure correct display after inputting a number.

rows.Title: Typing Indicator showing before 0
rows.Problem: When opening the calculator app, it shows a default zero. Typing a digit (e.g., 1) causes it to show '10'. Each time, the user must erase the zero, which is inconvenient. The app does not correctly replace the default zero with new input.
rows.Summarized Problem: The calculator app incorrectly displays a zero and fails to properly replace it with user input, causing an inconsistent and inconvenient user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction in input functionality but does not render the app unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The cause is the cursor displaying before the default zero, which prevents correct text replacement. The countermeasure is updating cursor position logic and releasing version 12.4.00.13 to fix the issue.

rows.Title: Maps not coming in now bar
rows.Problem: Maps not coming in now bar
rows.Summarized Problem: Maps are not displayed in the now bar on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from a key interface element, but the device remains usable and does not crash or lose data.

rows.Title: Hotspot not turning on when set to 5ghz
rows.Problem: Hotspot not turning on when set to 5ghz
rows.Summarized Problem: The hotspot function fails to turn on when configured to use 5GHz frequency.
rows.Severity Reason: The hotspot fails to activate on 5GHz, which prevents users from establishing a network connection on this band, rendering a key connectivity feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: The driver logs show repeated suspend states during hotspot operations. Countermeasure: Same driver logs indicate the same issue; no actionable fix identified in logs.

rows.Title: Mic Mode / Voice Focus feature disappeared during Call
rows.Problem: Mic Mode / Voice Focus feature has completely disappeared and is not appearing during calls, even after pulling down the full notification panel.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Mic Mode / Voice Focus feature is no longer visible or functional during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing during a key interaction (calls), affecting usability in noisy environments, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: SIM not connecting to network
rows.Problem: Airtel SIM is detected but not connecting to network after Android 15 update on Samsung Galaxy F15 5G. Device shows 'Unable to connect' during manual network search. SIM works in other phones. Issue started immediately after update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Airtel SIM is detected but fails to connect to network after Android 15 update on Samsung Galaxy F15 5G.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves network connectivity failure after an OS update, affecting functionality but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: wifi was disconnected after 5 or 7 min
rows.Problem: After samsung update, wifi networking became unstable and frequently lags. Even in different locations, wifi disconnects after 5 or 7 minutes and does not reconnect automatically. User has to manually turn off and reconnect.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi connection frequently disconnects after 5 to 7 minutes and fails to reconnect automatically, even across different locations.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain a stable WiFi connection, leading to repeated disconnections and manual reconnections, making the device unusable in normal usage scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Wi-Fi AP 'Vir78sen' has low signal strength, causing frequent disconnection. Counter Measure: Move closer to the Wi-Fi AP to improve signal strength.

rows.Title: No SIM no service
rows.Problem: Phone is lagging after update and showing no sim no service despite working SIM
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone shows 'no sim no service' error after update despite working SIM and exhibits lag.
rows.Severity Reason: Device shows a critical network registration error that prevents normal operation and is accompanied by lag, indicating a major functional failure post-update.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: One UI home not responding
rows.Problem: Home screen search function not working after Android 15 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The home screen search function is not working after the Android 15 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The search function is partially malfunctioning, preventing app discovery but not causing device freeze or crash.

rows.Title: 4k60 video lags on youtube
rows.Problem: 4k60 video on youtube lagging... before one ui 7 update it was not lagging
rows.Summarized Problem: 4K60 video playback on YouTube is lagging, which was not present before the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of video playback under specific conditions, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Video is not attached. Issue is not clear. So, we cannot analyse the issue. Please attach new logs and video in sync.

rows.Title: Call drop and voice break
rows.Problem: Call drop issue and voice break during call
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience call drops and voice breaks during calls after software update.
rows.Severity Reason: Call drops and voice breaks render the device unusable during communication, which is a critical functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unusual vibration during calls and modifying settings
rows.Problem: Unusual audio notifications, including a beeping sound accompanied by vibration, during calls and when modifying settings
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience unexpected beeping and vibration during calls and when modifying settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent audio and vibration feedback during normal device usage, affecting user experience but not causing device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue time in video does not match log file time; notification tone is played only by WhatsApp, suggesting potential misalignment in log capture or user behavior.

rows.Title: Wrong battery info is displayed
rows.Problem: Battery percentage displayed on screen is inconsistent with actual battery level shown in settings. The display shows 80% while settings show 50%. This issue occurs when using mobile data and does not appear when WiFi is disabled. When charging, the device shows no battery indication or vibration.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device displays an incorrect battery percentage on the screen, inconsistent with the actual battery level in settings, and fails to show any indication during charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery display is inconsistent and misleading, affecting user trust in battery status, but does not cause device failure or crash.

rows.Title: Battery drain and heating problem
rows.Problem: Even after factory resets, battery drain and heating are persistent. Phone lasts only 2 hours on screen, and shuts off when waking up from standby despite being at 16-17% battery at midnight.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences persistent battery drain and overheating, lasting only two hours on screen and shutting off when waking from standby.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to remain powered on for basic usage, leading to complete loss of functionality during daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain is caused by prolonged hotspot usage; users should be guided to check battery consumption when not using hotspot.

rows.Title: Unable to login or register to Galaxy App
rows.Problem: Unable to login or register to the Galaxy App. Tried to update the software and all still not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot login or register to the Galaxy App, even after software updates.
rows.Severity Reason: Login is a fundamental function required to access the app, and its failure prevents users from using core features.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Login failure after software update. Countermeasure: Login works with OTP and Samsung account auto-login on tested devices.

rows.Title: Groups are not visible in contact app
rows.Problem: Groups are not visible in contact app but shown in personal contacts; groups created by user are not displaying in the app
rows.Summarized Problem: Groups created in the contact app are not visible in the contact list.
rows.Severity Reason: The group feature is missing from the main contacts list, preventing users from viewing their group contacts, but the functionality exists and is visible in personal contacts.
rows.R&D Comment: Groups option is shown in contacts list below favorites and recently contacted (if enabled).

rows.Title: battery has very low backup not the full day
rows.Problem: battery has very low backup not the full day after charge first newly they will only use 50 percent one day with intense use
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's battery does not last a full day under normal use, only lasting about 50% of a day after charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains faster than expected during intense usage, but the device remains functional and does not crash or become unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drainage is normal at 0.59% per hour when screen off; QA requested to provide logs with background apps removed to validate usage patterns.

rows.Title: Modes and Routines app keeps crashing
rows.Problem: Modes and Routines app keeps crashing with "keeps stopping" error. Already tried force stop, clear data, reinstall updates, and wipe cache. Still crashes on launch.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Modes and Routines app crashes repeatedly upon launch, even after clearing cache, data, and reinstalling updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on launch, preventing users from using a core functionality (routines), making it unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: There are no crash fatal logs related to Modes and routine. Please provide logs if issue reproduces.

rows.Title: Device gets mute randomly
rows.Problem: Volume decreases randomly, affecting multiple devices in the S series, with reported issues on Samsung blog
rows.Summarized Problem: Device volume decreases randomly, causing audio to mute unexpectedly.
rows.Severity Reason: Volume reduction and muting occur intermittently, affecting functionality but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Airtel eSIM losing signal
rows.Problem: Airtel eSIM loses all signal at night, even though network is fine on other devices. Sim manager shows no number. Issue resolves after turning off and on the phone or restarting the eSIM in settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: Airtel eSIM loses all signal at night and fails to show a number in sim manager, despite network availability on other devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent loss of connectivity but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Setting Not working Properly
rows.Problem: This recent updates was totally unsuccessfull my phone does not work properly infact setting was not opened
rows.Summarized Problem: The Finder setting is not opening and the phone is not working properly after recent updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The setting fails to open, rendering a core functionality unusable, making the device effectively non-functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Degraded camera quality
rows.Problem: Facing camera issue and blur, ultra white, camera not clear
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera produces blurry and unclear images with significant shaking during use.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of the camera function, resulting in degraded image quality but not complete failure or device instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Shaking during capture reduces image clarity; minimizing camera shake improves image quality.

rows.Title: network issue
rows.Problem: facing network issue in s23 e-sim multiple times need to restart mobile phone
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences repeated network disconnections and reconnections on e-SIM in S23, requiring restart to restore service.
rows.Severity Reason: Device enters no service state and requires restart, indicating a critical network instability that disrupts usability.
rows.R&D Comment: SIM refresh triggers IMS de-registration and UE detachment, leading to temporary loss of service; full CP logs needed to identify root cause.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi won't auto-connect for now message popup sticks to screen
rows.Problem: The message 'Wi-Fi won't auto-connect for now' sticks to the screen and does not go away, making it difficult to type and use the screen. No solution available except restart.
rows.Summarized Problem: A Wi-Fi auto-connect message popup remains stuck on the screen, obstructing usability.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes difficulty in using the screen but does not result in device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The fix has been identified and will be included in the next OS release.

rows.Title: Now bar sports live notifications not working
rows.Problem: Now bar sports live notifications are not working. Google scores are not visible on Now bar after fulfilling all criteria. The feature shows live notifications in Google app but not in Now bar.
rows.Summarized Problem: Sports live notifications are not appearing on the Now Bar despite being visible in the Google app.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning as notifications appear in Google app but not on Now Bar, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Default messages becomes unresponsive and hangs
rows.Problem: The default Messages app does not function normally and occasionally hangs or becomes unresponsive after the latest software update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The default Messages app hangs and becomes unresponsive after the latest software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The app becomes unresponsive and hangs, making it unusable for communication, which is a critical function.
rows.R&D Comment: Check the latest AM version: messages.android_20250706_00_RC00.phone_samsung_dynamic

rows.Title: Back button quits Facebook app instead of returning to home page
rows.Problem: When pressing the back button in the Facebook app, it quits the app instead of returning to the home page with updated feeds and posts
rows.Summarized Problem: The Facebook app quits when the back button is pressed instead of returning to the home page with updated content.
rows.Severity Reason: The app does not return to the home page as expected, which affects user navigation but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to connect samsung watch ultra to esim
rows.Problem: Unable to connect samsung watch ultra to esim. Tried multiple times but unable to connect. This is the error message im getting
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot connect their Samsung Watch Ultra to an eSIM.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a repeated failure to connect, but the device remains usable and does not crash or lose data.
rows.R&D Comment: The error appears to be in the websheet flow, which is operator managed; require customer details like watch eID, MSISDN, and primary device IMEI to diagnose.

rows.Title: routine and modes and read caller name aloud functions have stopped working
rows.Problem: After new oneui update, routine and modes and read caller name aloud functions have stopped working. Not able to use modes and routine because it is not reading written statements. This was a very useful functionality which is not working after update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Routine and modes functions, including reading caller name aloud, have stopped working after the OneUI update.
rows.Severity Reason: The functionality is completely missing, making core features like routines and caller ID unreadable, rendering the device unusable for key user tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: System crash occurs in device after Update
rows.Problem: Phone becomes completely unusable after One UI 7 update, constantly freezing, restarting randomly, and entering bootloop. System UI and basic apps like Google fail to work. Soft and hard resets, cache clearing do not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device crashes and freezes after One UI 7 update, leading to bootloop and failure of basic system functions.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes completely unusable with frequent crashes, restarts, and bootloop, affecting core system functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Patch has been applied; users need to update via Settings > Software Update.

rows.Title: User unable to enroll in OS Beta program
rows.Problem: User unable to enroll in OS Beta program, keeps getting same message and nothing happens
rows.Summarized Problem: User cannot enroll in the OS Beta program due to missing SIM card detection.
rows.Severity Reason: The system fails to detect SIM card, which is a required condition for beta enrollment, making the feature completely inaccessible.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification
rows.R&D Comment: We need SIM card information. There is no SIM card in user's phone device. It could be showing Error Popup for Join Beta Project. Please insert SIM card and try again.

rows.Title: Now Brief not displaying on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Now Brief is not displaying on Lock Screen. Technical team has checked all settings and confirmed they are correct, but the feature still does not show on Lock Screen. No resolution has been provided, and no call has been received from helpline. User is considering returning the handset.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief feature is not displaying on the Lock Screen despite correct settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing under correct conditions but does not completely disable functionality, allowing partial use of the device.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Default zero doesn't stay there
rows.Problem: A type cursor appears before the zero digit when entering numbers, causing confusion and affecting typing experience.
rows.Summarized Problem: A type cursor appears before the zero digit when entering numbers in the calculator, disrupting the typing experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user input flow and causes confusion but does not prevent core functionality or cause device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Fixed in Calculator version 12.4.00.13; update via Galaxy Store.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drain issue started after Android 15 update, persists despite troubleshooting steps
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drain has started after the Android 15 software update and continues despite troubleshooting.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue persists after troubleshooting but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Status Bar goes blank
rows.Problem: After One UI 7 update, the status bar becomes completely blank when quickly dragging down from the top to open the notification panel. The notification panel sometimes fails to open, and the status bar appears blank upon unlocking.
rows.Summarized Problem: The status bar becomes completely blank when attempting to open the notification panel via gesture.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing notifications, which is a core interaction function, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to connect to WiFi
rows.Problem: Device unable to connect to WiFi, user has sent image proof again
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is unable to connect to WiFi, with repeated attempts resulting in connection failure.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent connectivity failure, not rendering the device unusable but preventing reliable WiFi access.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Network provider blocklist due to repeated connection attempts. Countermeasure: User should contact internet provider to resolve network-side issues.

rows.Title: Wifi connection causes cellular network loss
rows.Problem: Connecting to Wi-Fi causes cellular network to stop working temporarily, preventing calls and receiving messages. The issue appears and disappears intermittently, reported by multiple Samsung users after UI 7 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Connecting to Wi-Fi causes temporary loss of cellular network connectivity, preventing calls and messages.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial functionality failure during Wi-Fi connection but does not completely disable device operation or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Double tap not working
rows.Problem: Double tapping the screen to turn on the mobile doesn't actually turn on. After many attempts, double tapping also opens the device.
rows.Summarized Problem: Double tapping the screen fails to turn on the device and sometimes opens the device instead.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to turn on via double tap, making it unusable in critical situations.

rows.Title: Typing doesn't work in the Chrome search bar
rows.Problem: Unable to type in Chrome search bar after Android and One UI update
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot type in the Chrome search bar after the Android and One UI update.
