rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents input functionality in a key UI element but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to open secure folder
rows.Problem: Secure Folder does not work or open and shows "security policy prevents use of secure folder" when trying to access it. Device has no root, official software, and prior EMI-based configuration app was removed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Secure Folder feature is inaccessible and shows a security policy error when attempted to be opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot access the Secure Folder, which is a core security feature, and the error prevents user from using a fundamental security function.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Device Owner was created and later removed; Knox state shows lockSdp with DO locked. Countermeasure: Recommend factory reset to restore secure folder functionality.

rows.Title: Default zero doesn't replace when entering input
rows.Problem: When opening calculator, a default zero appears on display. Typing any digit replaces the zero, but after updating to UI 7, the zero is not properly replaced. For example, entering 100 results in 1000 unless the extra zero is manually removed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The calculator displays a default zero that is not replaced when typing digits, causing incorrect input values.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect input values but does not prevent the app from functioning entirely or cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The cursor was displaying in front of the zero, preventing replacement. Updated cursor position logic to ensure correct zero replacement after input; fixed in version 12.4.00.13.

rows.Title: Esim not working
rows.Problem: Esim not working. Stops suddenly. Restarting fixes it then after some time goes off again.
rows.Summarized Problem: Esim functionality is intermittently failing and stops working suddenly, requiring restart to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent failure of a core network feature, but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: System UI not responding
rows.Problem: My phone is continuously popping with system ui not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The system UI is continuously unresponsive, causing frequent pop-ups on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI is unresponsive, making the device difficult to use, which constitutes a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: There are several UFS link layer errors in the logs, indicating a hardware-level issue involving the AP or UFS component; the device should be inspected for signal and power integrity at the hardware level.

rows.Title: Lag in camera
rows.Problem: Camera performance has dropped after June update, with lag when switching between front and back cameras (especially in portrait mode), delay in clicking photos, and worse post-processing.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera experiences significant lag when switching between front and back cameras, especially in portrait mode, with delays in photo capture and degraded post-processing.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag during camera switching and photo capture severely impacts user experience and device usability, particularly in common usage scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Adaptive brightness not working properly
rows.Problem: Adaptive brightness is not working properly and users are experiencing approximately 10-15% less brightness than before after June update, requiring manual adjustment in dark environments
rows.Summarized Problem: Adaptive brightness function is malfunctioning after June update, resulting in significantly reduced brightness levels and requiring manual adjustment.
rows.Severity Reason: Users experience partial malfunction of brightness adjustment, but the device remains usable and no data loss or crash occurs.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Adaptive brightness algorithm is misconfigured post-June update; Countermeasure: Same log indicates ongoing misconfiguration, suggesting no effective fix implemented.

rows.Title: Bluetooth connected icon not shown in notification panel
rows.Problem: Bluetooth connected icon not shown in notification panel
rows.Summarized Problem: The Bluetooth connected icon is missing from the notification panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of a key status indicator but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Heating observed in the device
rows.Problem: Phone overheats significantly when using 5G alone, reaching 42-43 degrees Celsius even in cool room temperatures, causing severe lag and making the device unusable beyond 5 minutes. This issue started after updating to ONE.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats severely when using 5G, leading to performance degradation and rapid battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: The phone becomes unusable within minutes due to extreme overheating and performance lag, indicating a critical device usability failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Overheating during 5G usage; Countermeasure: Request CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Esim not working
rows.Problem: Esim not working most of the time and showing no sim card. Signal appears only after opening settings > sim manager > esim, or after restarting the device
rows.Summarized Problem: ESIM functionality fails most of the time, showing no SIM card, with signal only appearing after manual navigation or device restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent connectivity failure but does not render the device unusable or lead to data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: recent app button not working properly
rows.Problem: After upgrading to one ui7 recent app button not working properly gives error Knox security blocking
rows.Summarized Problem: The recent apps button is not working and shows a Knox security blocking error after upgrading to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional and prevents user from accessing recent apps, making device usage severely impaired.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by incorrect userId value being sent as '0' in device policy manager; fixed by correcting the value and raising request #49637.

rows.Title: Smart things app is not able to register my new device
rows.Problem: Smart things app is not able to register my new device. It is showing issue with wifi even when wifi speed is fair. With same wifi network on a different device I am able to connect my washing machine as well from smart things app.
rows.Summarized Problem: The SmartThings app fails to register new devices on a WiFi network, despite the network being functional for other devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to register devices, but functionality is partially preserved for other devices on the same network, indicating a partial malfunction.

rows.Title: Bottom smart view and modes UI button overlaps
rows.Problem: Bottom smart view and modes UI button collapses often and returns to normal by itself
rows.Summarized Problem: The UI button in the Quick Panel frequently collapses and temporarily disappears before restoring on its own.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent UI malfunction but does not prevent device operation or lead to data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is timing-related and cannot be reproduced in development; it was structurally fixed in B OS.

rows.Title: Emergency calls only shown despite good network strength
rows.Problem: Shows emergency contacts only even with full network range
rows.Summarized Problem: The device displays emergency contacts only when network strength is good, despite full range availability.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of network functionality, showing only emergency contacts instead of full contact list.

rows.Title: Samsung DeX not working with wired connection on S25
rows.Problem: Samsung DeX feature is not working with wired connection on S25. Monitor shows no signal. Tested on S23 Ultra and it works, so the issue is not with the monitor. Requires C-to-VGA adapter for connection.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung DeX fails to connect via wired connection on S25, showing no signal on monitor, despite working on S23 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is not a device crash or major malfunction, but a compatibility problem with monitor connection via AUX, which affects usability but does not render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: AUX communication failure occurs due to lack of proper adapter; users must use C-to-VGA adapter and verify all connections, including cables and monitors.

rows.Title: Esim not working
rows.Problem: Esim not working and not shown on status bar after restart; device shows network issues, mobile data fails intermittently; Esim functionality stops working after update to security patch on July 1, 2025; works briefly after restart but fails frequently
rows.Summarized Problem: Esim is not detected or functioning properly on the device, intermittently failing to show on status bar and causing mobile data to stop working, especially after the July 1, 2025 security patch update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents reliable network connectivity and mobile data usage, rendering the device unusable for basic communication functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: UI error occurs while swipe recent app list
rows.Problem: Bug when swapping applications during a call
rows.Summarized Problem: A UI error occurs when swiping to switch between recent apps during a call.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects app switching during calls but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The transition issue is fixed in the latest homescreen version. Please update and check it.

rows.Title: Circle to search feature not working
rows.Problem: Circle to search feature shows blank page when scrolling upward, content is visible only when scrolling back down. Issue is irritating and persists after UI 7.0 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The circle-to-search feature displays a blank page when scrolling upward and only shows content when scrolling back down, making it unusable during navigation.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature intermittently fails to display content, leading to partial malfunction during user interaction, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Google Quick Search Box app version is outdated. Countermeasure: Update Google app via Play Store and retest.

rows.Title: dolby atoms not working
rows.Problem: dolby atoms not working or it is very bad after one ui 7
rows.Summarized Problem: Dolby Atmos is not functioning properly after UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working as expected after a UI update, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Dolby Atmos is working with Auto profile and audio output matches between Android 14 and 15; issue may be related to UI 7 implementation or user-specific configuration.

rows.Title: Heart rate sensors stopped working
rows.Problem: Heart rate sensors stopped working after one UI update, making the device unusable
rows.Summarized Problem: The heart rate sensor on the device has stopped working after a UI update, rendering the device unusable for health monitoring.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue renders a core health feature non-functional, making the device unusable for its primary use case.
rows.R&D Comment: There are no essential logs for analysis. Please get the log as soon as the issue occurs (within 15 minutes is best): ① Galaxy Wearable App > More (Ξ) > Galaxy Wearable Info > [Galaxy Wearable] touch 10 times > select [Run Watch Dump]; ② wait; ③ MyFiles > Internal Storage > Download > log > GearLog > bundled-bugreport-xx.zip. Share the bundled-bugreport-xx.zip file, along with detailed problem description, app information used (S-health or other apps), and screenshots.

rows.Title: Lag observed in the device
rows.Problem: The device feels slow and sluggish, even with no background apps running, despite having 8 GB of RAM.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device runs slowly even with no background apps and sufficient RAM.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is experiencing significant lag, making it unusable for daily tasks despite having ample RAM.

rows.Title: People found option not showing in gallery
rows.Problem: The Samsung gallery feature people found option not showing
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'People Found' feature is not displaying in the Samsung Gallery.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the gallery interface, preventing users from accessing a specific functionality, but the device remains otherwise usable.
rows.R&D Comment: The database may be corrupted or inconsistent after prolonged idle time; clearing related app data initiates a fresh reanalysis.

rows.Title: No option to change folder color
rows.Problem: After applying icon pack, folder icon color changes to white and there is no option to change folder color
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change folder color after applying an icon pack, with folder icons appearing white and no option to adjust color.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a partial functionality in the UI, preventing users from customizing folder appearance but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Device not responding for wired headphones
rows.Problem: Device not responding to wired headphones after working fine previously
rows.Summarized Problem: Device no longer responds to wired headphones despite previously working correctly.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to respond to wired headphones, indicating a partial malfunction in audio connectivity, but does not cause full device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: It was recognized as Debug Accessory (Rd / Rd). If it is a headphone that works normally on other Samsung phones, it is necessary to check if there is a foreign object in the USB connector. Please visit the nearest service center and check it out.

rows.Title: Bottom navigation buttons overlap with editing controls
rows.Problem: Bottom navigation buttons overlap with the application's editing controls when modifying the watchlist, hindering user experience.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bottom navigation buttons overlap with editing controls, impairing user interaction during watchlist modifications.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects usability but does not cause device malfunction or data loss; it is a partial interface design flaw.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by improper layout implementation in the third-party Blinx app; the app developer must adjust layout to match device screen resolution.

rows.Title: S Pen selects whole text instead of specific text
rows.Problem: S Pen selects entire text when circling after home key, previously had option to share text
rows.Summarized Problem: S Pen selects entire text instead of specific text when circling, preventing share option from appearing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a core interaction feature but does not cause device crash or data loss, and functionality is partially impaired.

rows.Title: Effects option showing disable while editing the lock screen
rows.Problem: Effects option available while editing the lock screen is blocked and not accessible
rows.Summarized Problem: The effects option is blocked and not accessible when editing the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is unavailable during editing, preventing full customization of the lock screen, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Fast charging not working properly
rows.Problem: My charger is genuine and official samsung brick and wire too and they are in perfect condition. I have tried both, one does not charge the phone at all, the other charges at fast charging speed. The phone supports super fast charging and was working last night but not this morning. Both chargers work on other devices. One charger does not work on mine and the other works only on a specific orientation of the phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: Fast charging is not functioning properly on the device, with one charger failing to charge at all and the other only working under specific orientation.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to charge properly under fast charging conditions, which is a major functional failure affecting core usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Shorts of USB connector pins are detected, indicating hardware damage of the USB connector. Users should visit a service center to check and repair the hardware.

rows.Title: Samsung Internet crashing frequently
rows.Problem: Samsung Internet is crashing very frequently since evening. Restarting the phone does not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Internet app crashes frequently and does not resolve after phone restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes frequently, making it unusable and preventing normal browsing functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: After several attempts, we were unable to reproduce this ANR during internal testing. However, there are some improvements in code that are identified as general improvements which we are currently working on, and will be taken up in subsequent releases.

rows.Title: Clock style change from lock screen to AOD
rows.Problem: Clock is not changing from lock screen to AOD
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock does not update when transitioning from the lock screen to AOD.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in the transition functionality between lock screen and AOD, affecting only the clock style update.

rows.Title: Color Palette not working
rows.Problem: App colors are not changing; color palette stuck on last update
rows.Summarized Problem: The color palette in the app is stuck on the last update and does not respond to color changes.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning, preventing users from updating app colors but not causing device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: System UI not responding
rows.Problem: System UI is not responding after update, device bricked after Samsung update, service center says motherboard replacement needed, no valid options available in settings, video and logs lack information.
rows.Summarized Problem: The system UI is unresponsive after a software update, leading to device malfunction and requiring motherboard replacement.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI is completely unresponsive, rendering the device unusable and requiring hardware replacement.
rows.R&D Comment: Please attach correct video and log file.

rows.Title: WiFi and hotspot not turning on
rows.Problem: WiFi and hotspot not turning on after this month update
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi and hotspot are not turning on after the recent software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot connect to Wi-Fi or use hotspot functionality, which is essential for basic usage.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is not reproducing in the latest binary; updating to the new version is recommended.

rows.Title: Heating observed in the device
rows.Problem: Device is getting heated terribly and slows down despite low usage after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats and slows down during use, especially in weak signal conditions, despite low CPU usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheating leads to performance degradation and potential damage, making the device unusable under certain conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Heating was caused by unstable network conditions during charging and calls; countermeasure is the same as cause.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery dropped from 100% to 36% over 13 hours under normal usage with poor cellular signal and high TX power, despite no background app CPU monopolization.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain over 13 hours under normal usage due to poor cellular signal and high transmission power.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drops from 100% to 36% in 13 hours under normal usage, indicating rapid discharge that may impair device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain caused by poor cellular signal and high TX power; countermeasure suggests same root cause.

rows.Title: Mobile Hotspot not working
rows.Problem: Mobile hotspot not working even with data saver and power saving off, no heating, not connected to charger. Video and log file attached.
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile hotspot fails to function despite disabling data saver and power saving, and without device heating or charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the hotspot feature under specific conditions, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: As per the attached logs, no hostapd logs found. Please reproduce the issue and share Wi-Fi verbose enabled logs for analysis. Steps to enable: Go to Settings > About Device > Tap 7 times on Build Number to enable Developer Options > Go to Settings > Developer Options > Enable Wi-Fi verbose logging.

rows.Title: Back button not working
rows.Problem: When a pop-up window is enlarged, the back button and home button are covered, making it impossible to reduce the pop-up size. Users cannot go back to the small size, causing issues with all pop-ups.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot reduce a pop-up window size after enlargement, causing the back button to be covered and making navigation impossible.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from navigating back after using pop-ups, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Gallery incompatible
rows.Problem: Samsung gallery not supported on Galaxy A34
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Gallery is not supported on Galaxy A34, causing compatibility errors.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure due to unsupported app on device, but device remains usable.

rows.Title: GOS lite app is crashing
rows.Problem: App is crashing and not opening
rows.Summarized Problem: The GOS lite app crashes and fails to open.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes repeatedly, preventing users from using the game feature entirely.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: GamePlugin no longer supported on Android V-os. Countermeasure: Remove GOS lite app and provide features via Goodlock app.

rows.Title: Setting keep stopped popup occurs while enter in DND settings
rows.Problem: Unable to access do not disturb settings. Restarting multiple times does not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access do not disturb settings due to a persistent popup and app crash upon entry.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing a core feature (Do Not Disturb), rendering the settings menu unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: FATAL exception in Settings app due to NumberFormatException during resume of ZenModeSettingsActivity. Countermeasure: Same as cause; no change proposed.

rows.Title: Touch not working properly
rows.Problem: Touch not working properly after update
rows.Summarized Problem: Touch functionality is not working properly after the software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The touch function is completely non-functional, making the device unusable.

rows.Title: Volume key showing headphones sign and phone speaker not responding
rows.Problem: After update, device gets stuck in earphone setting when wire headphones are used, even after removing them. Volume key shows headphones icon and speaker does not respond. Device occasionally switches back to speaker mode, but currently stuck in earphone setting.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device gets stuck in earphone mode after using wire headphones, with volume key showing headphones icon and speaker not responding.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unresponsive to speaker output and gets stuck in a non-functional state, preventing normal audio use.
rows.R&D Comment: Phone detects jack insertion and switches between earphone and speaker output; possible short connection in jack hole or sub PBA.

rows.Title: Not able to play Game
rows.Problem: After software update, phone crashes when playing Genshin Impact. Game crashes frequently, hangs, and screen recording does not work properly. Game is fully downloaded but unstable during gameplay.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone crashes and hangs frequently when playing Genshin Impact, with screen recording not working properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The game crashes repeatedly, preventing gameplay and leading to loss of in-game progress and user frustration, especially after spending significant money on the device.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Number text input line is before the zero
rows.Problem: Once I opened calculator the number text input line is before the zero Which is very annoying for quick calculation every I need to change the position the line
rows.Summarized Problem: The number input line appears before the zero in the calculator, making quick calculations difficult and requiring frequent manual adjustment.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects usability during basic calculations but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The cursor was displaying in front of 0, so it won't be replaced by new inputting text. We updated the condition to correctly update cursor position after 0, ensuring input replaces the default zero text.

rows.Title: Home button and recent button missing from navigation bar
rows.Problem: Home button and recent button missing from navigation bar after UI 7 version and Android 15 software update
rows.Summarized Problem: The home and recent buttons are missing from the navigation bar after an update to UI 7 and Android 15.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of navigation elements, affecting user interface functionality but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue was caused by incorrect 'userId' value being sent as '0' in all cases, and has been fixed with a request raised - 49637

rows.Title: Phone getting lag and doesn't work
rows.Problem: Phone suddenly gets lag and doesn't work during usage, issue persists after restart, no crash or abnormal logs found in service center software update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone experiences sudden and persistent lag during usage, affecting overall responsiveness.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unresponsive during normal use, rendering it unusable for core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: There are no abnormal logs in the attached logs as cpu and memory usage are fine, also no fatal/crash were seen. If issue is seen again, please attach proper issue reproduction steps with issue video and issue time logs along with systrace.

rows.Title: Battery drained 56% to 10% overnight
rows.Problem: Device draining too much battery after new security update, dropped from 56% to 10% overnight
rows.Summarized Problem: Device drains battery rapidly after a security update, dropping from 56% to 10% overnight.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is severe and occurs overnight, leading to device being unusable without charging.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to Instagram app consuming excessive CPU in background; reported to Meta and expected to be fixed in version v382.

rows.Title: Quick Recording Video Stabilization Issue
rows.Problem: Video stabilization in Quick Recording mode has completely stopped working, and now videos are shaky and unstable
rows.Summarized Problem: Video stabilization has stopped working in Quick Recording mode, resulting in shaky and unstable videos.
rows.Severity Reason: The video stabilization feature, a core function in Quick Recording, is completely non-functional, making the recording experience unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: VDIS is not working properly in QuickTake Recording due to wrong resolution size; correct resolution size has been added as a measure.

rows.Title: Bluetooth and wifi buttons stopped functioning
rows.Problem: Bluetooth and wifi buttons stopped functioning after latest software update
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth and Wi-Fi function buttons have stopped working after a software update, preventing user from enabling or disabling wireless connections.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot control Wi-Fi or Bluetooth, which are essential for device usability and connectivity, leading to complete loss of functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Device fails to initialize WiFi driver at boot; Counter Measure: Guide users to service center to check hardware Wi-Fi chipset.

rows.Title: AI future not working properly
rows.Problem: AI future not working eyes close eyes open The hand is not getting removed
rows.Summarized Problem: The AI future feature in the Gallery does not work properly when the eyes are closed or open, and the hand is not being removed as expected.
rows.Severity Reason: The AI feature fails to function under specific conditions, resulting in incomplete or incorrect behavior, but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by internal filters blocking the image; a debugging log is needed to confirm the exact condition and trigger.

rows.Title: Front camera is not working
rows.Problem: Front camera is not working. It says camera failed after opening
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera fails to function and displays a camera failure message upon opening.
rows.Severity Reason: The front camera is completely non-functional, preventing basic device usage such as selfies or video calls.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Mipi error for front sensor actuator module. Counter Measure: Guide user to visit service center with front camera actuator module replacement.

rows.Title: Navigation buttons are invisible
rows.Problem: Navigation buttons are invisible after update and not working even after changing or resetting settings
rows.Summarized Problem: Navigation buttons are invisible after software update and do not respond despite resetting settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, preventing user interaction but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Seems like after enforce password change nav bar didn't get restore. Since issue is not reproducing at our end we need further communication from customer side to understand in what scenario it get reproduced

rows.Title: Bluetooth not working for calls
rows.Problem: Bluetooth works for media but not for calls. No call scenario logs available. Issue appears to be system-level, likely introduced by Android 15 / One UI 7.0 on Samsung Z Fold 3.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth functions correctly for media playback but fails to work for voice calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents core functionality (voice calls) from working, making the device unusable for basic communication.
rows.R&D Comment: No call scenario logs present; require logs and video footage captured immediately during the issue occurrence.

rows.Title: Sound clarity is not good on MT Side
rows.Problem: My voice is low and extra sounds around me make it difficult for the other person to hear me
rows.Summarized Problem: Sound clarity is poor during calls, with low voice volume and background noises.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects call quality but does not cause device malfunction or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs to diagnose the issue.

rows.Title: Wifi not working
rows.Problem: Wifi not working
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi is not functioning due to driver initialization failure and invalid argument errors in the WiFi service logs.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to initialize WiFi driver and firmware, preventing network connectivity entirely, rendering the device unusable for internet access.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: WiFi driver initialization failure due to invalid arguments in logs. Countermeasure: Device inspection at service center for firmware update and Wi-Fi verbose logging for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Secure folder appearing in recent apps after logout
rows.Problem: Secure folder is appearing in recent apps list after logout, which was not present previously
rows.Summarized Problem: Secure Folder appears in recent apps list after logout, despite not being visible on home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the recent apps list behavior, not causing device unavailability or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The appearance of Secure Folder in recent apps is normal behavior under Multi User and lock settings; no change needed.

rows.Title: Camera vibrate while focus on subject
rows.Problem: When opening the camera and focus starts on subject, the vibration motor activates automatically, causing camera screen blur. This issue started yesterday and persists despite device restart.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera vibrates during focus, causing screen blur and affecting image clarity.
rows.Severity Reason: The vibration during focus directly interferes with image stability and clarity, making the camera unusable for clear shots.
rows.R&D Comment: UV Damper peeling and improper assembly cause driving force error in AF mechanism; improved jig and OVS inspection will prevent separation and misalignment.

rows.Title: Now bar not working for live sports scores
rows.Problem: Unable to view live sports scores on Now bar; no button to trigger live score on Google search page; no sports or news updates appearing in Now bar
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot view live sports scores on the Now Bar, with no trigger button available on Google search page.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing, preventing users from accessing real-time sports updates, which is a core functionality on the Lock Screen.

rows.Title: Shikho app immediately crashes after opening
rows.Problem: Shikho app immediately crashes after opening. The app works perfectly on other Android 15 devices, indicating a device-specific compatibility issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Shikho app crashes immediately upon opening on Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 FE with Android 15.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes immediately upon opening, making it unusable for the user, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The crash is caused by the user setting background process limit to 'No background processes' in developer options; setting it back to 'Standard limit' resolves the issue.

rows.Title: Play tone when call ends not working
rows.Problem: The 'Play tone when call ends' setting is enabled but the tone does not play after ending a call. The issue persists despite restarts, safe mode, app reset, and checking sound and DND settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device does not play a tone when a call ends, even though the feature is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not functioning as intended, but the issue does not prevent full device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue scenario is not captured in logs; call event logs are missing. User is requested to capture logs immediately after the issue occurs.

rows.Title: Blue circle on screen
rows.Problem: A persistent blue circle has appeared on the screen and does not disappear, regardless of actions taken such as restarting or changing settings. It remains visible at all times and interferes with normal device use.
rows.Summarized Problem: A persistent blue circle appears on the screen and remains visible at all times, interfering with normal device use.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects normal screen usability but does not cause device crash or complete malfunction.

rows.Title: Bixby turns off the phone
rows.Problem: Bixby turns off the phone without asking for fingerprints or a password
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby turns off the phone without prompting for fingerprint or password authentication.
rows.Severity Reason: Bixby turns off the phone without requiring authentication, which is a partial malfunction affecting user experience but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Bixby was launched by Voice Wakeup and uses VoiceMatch to handle user requests without unlock; this is intended behavior, not a defect.

rows.Title: Comments not consistently displaying on YouTube
rows.Problem: Comments are not consistently displaying on YouTube
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube comments are not consistently displaying on the app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a feature, where comments fail to display consistently, but the app remains functional otherwise.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a MediaCodec$CodecException in ExoPlayer during media flush operations, and the root cause lies in Google's YouTube app source code, not Samsung's implementation.

rows.Title: Call Background not working properly
rows.Problem: Call background not working properly even after software update. This was a bug in one UI 7 update affecting millions of users.
rows.Summarized Problem: The call background feature is not working properly after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality but does not cause device crash or data loss; it persists after update but is not fully disabling device use.

rows.Title: Battery % icon on the top main screen does not change even in charging state
rows.Problem: Batter percentage icon on the top main screen does not change. Even while charging it does not show charging the percentage is stuck at 50. While charging my phone the lock screen shows correct battery percentage and not the main screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery percentage icon on the top main screen remains stuck at 50% during charging and does not update, while the lock screen correctly displays the charging percentage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the display of real-time battery status on the main screen, but the lock screen still shows correct information, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.

rows.Title: Mute observe On MT Side
rows.Problem: During normal calls, the person on the other side can't hear my voice. But when I switch to speaker mode, voice goes through clearly. Microphone works fine in voice recorder. Issue occurs even in full network areas. At home, where signal is weak, voice goes through.
rows.Summarized Problem: The user's voice is not transmitted clearly during normal call mode, despite the microphone working in voice recorder and speaker mode working properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects call functionality but does not completely prevent usage or cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be related to microphone signal routing in normal call mode; customer is advised to check hardware via loopback test, and logs should be provided if issue persists.

rows.Title: Internet doesn't work with 5G
rows.Problem: Internet doesn't work with 5G but works with 4G; phone shows 5G when internet is turned on but no connectivity.
rows.Summarized Problem: Internet connectivity fails when using 5G network but works on 4G.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent network functionality but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Missing touch screen and Camera Failed Issue
rows.Problem: Camera fails after platform reset due to sensor service death and camera HAL not resetting properly, causing segmentation fault when calling sensor APIs. Touch screen also missing.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera fails after platform reset due to sensor service death and camera HAL not resetting properly, causing segmentation fault when calling sensor APIs. Touch screen also missing.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function completely fails after platform reset, leading to device malfunction and inability to use core features like camera and touch input.
rows.R&D Comment: Get information about sensor service died or sensorInstance is null by camera hal module using libsensorndk API. If sensorInstance is null, then do not call any sensorservice api because it is not available. Check whether sensorInstance for the particular client package is null or not. If its null, then initialize mSensorManager, mSensor, mLooper, mSensorEventQueue again in client module.

rows.Title: Voice note recording application not working
rows.Problem: Voice note recording feature is not working properly; no sound is recorded in WhatsApp. Calling works normally; unsure if hardware or software issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp voice note recording feature fails to record sound, while calling functions normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The recording feature is not working, but calling works, indicating a partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Please attach the logs on the problematic timeline. Also, please explain issue much specifically, which one is making problem Samsung voice recorder or WhatsApp recording feature.

rows.Title: setting semi covered under search bar
rows.Problem: When swiping back from app drawer, the setting option overlaps the search bar for a second and then moves down
rows.Summarized Problem: The setting option overlaps the search bar when swiping back from the app drawer and then moves down.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a brief visual overlap and misalignment during navigation, affecting user experience but does not prevent core functionality.

rows.Title: Video refreshing on jiohotstar app
rows.Problem: While playing video on jiohotstar, it keeps on refreshing and making unable to watch a video, to resolve this issue, i have to restart the device. After it, video plays well for some time. All these started after one update with android 15.
rows.Summarized Problem: The video streaming feature in the JioHotstar app keeps refreshing and becomes unwatchable, requiring device restart to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of video playback but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue could not be reproduced due to lack of access to the JioHotstar app and insufficient log coverage; request for step-by-step reproduction path and logs needed for root cause analysis.

rows.Title: Samsung Video App crash
rows.Problem: Samsung video App unfortunately crash in one ui 7 Android 15
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Video Player app crashes on One UI 7 with Android 15.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes completely, making the video functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Crash caused by outdated video library app version (1.4.20.22) incompatible with Android 15; users should delete the app and use MyFiles or Gallery instead.

rows.Title: Unable to open locked notes
rows.Problem: Unable to open locked notes after updating Samsung account; tried logging in with both original and new accounts but issue persists
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot open locked notes after updating their Samsung account, as the note is tied to the original account used for locking.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality—locked notes cannot be opened with a different account, but the feature still works if accessed with the correct account.
rows.R&D Comment: A locked note is precisely linked to the account information used when locking it. Therefore, it is naturally impossible to open it with a different account. Even if the user deletes the original account and creates a new one with the same name, it is treated as a different account due to potential account duplication, so users must unlock with the original account.

rows.Title: Adoptive brightness option not visible
rows.Problem: Adoptive brightness option is not visible
rows.Summarized Problem: The adaptive brightness option is not visible in the device settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the UI, but the device remains usable and no core function is disrupted.

rows.Title: Mobile data not properly work
rows.Problem: Mobile data not properly work
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile data is not working properly in the mobile networks setting.
rows.Severity Reason: The mobile data function is not working, which prevents basic connectivity and device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Quick Panel UI is not proper
rows.Problem: Smart view and modes buttons are stacked on top of each other in the quick settings panel and scrolling is stuck. This issue persists after the latest security update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick settings panel has misaligned buttons and unresponsive scrolling, affecting user interaction.
rows.Severity Reason: Scrolling is stuck and buttons are stacked, which impairs usability but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is a layout timing problem where the parent view calculates width before child views are created. It has been fixed in B OS with structural modifications; no fix available in V OS.

rows.Title: Camera lagging during lens switch
rows.Problem: Camera lags when switching lenses and changing modes, screen blurs briefly, shutter button takes long time to respond, photo mode feels unsmooth, camera performance feels like budget device
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera lags significantly when switching lenses and changing modes, with screen blurring and delayed shutter response.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag and blurriness during camera operation impair core functionality and user experience, making the device feel unresponsive and unprofessional, especially in front of others.

rows.Title: Samsung members app refreshed when reopened from recent apps
rows.Problem: Samsung Members app refreshes every time it is reopened from the recent apps list, indicating poor memory management and apps not staying in RAM
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Members app refreshes every time it is reopened from the recent apps list, indicating poor memory management and apps not staying in RAM.
rows.Severity Reason: The app refreshes on re-opening, which affects user experience but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This is due to low memory; users should clean device memory and reboot to resolve.

rows.Title: Phone shut down from 70-76% charge
rows.Problem: Phone went from 70-76% charge to shut down and shows 0% battery when powered on, happening since update and hindering daily use
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone shuts down unexpectedly from 70-76% charge and displays 0% battery when powered on.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable due to sudden shutdown and incorrect battery reading, hindering daily tasks.
rows.R&D Comment: Since it is believed to be a phenomenon caused by aging battery, please guide the customer to visit the service center for inspection.

rows.Title: Images are unsorted in recent images folder
rows.Problem: Images with March dates are appearing at the top of the recent images folder, despite being from earlier dates, indicating unsorted order
rows.Summarized Problem: Images in the recent folder are not sorted by shooting date and appear out of chronological order.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in the display order of images, affecting user expectation of chronological sorting but not preventing device operation or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The 'Recent' album lists content based on device entry time, not shooting time; users may find this counterintuitive. Suggest excluding 'Recent' from essential albums to reduce confusion.

rows.Title: camera video audio quality is worst
rows.Problem: camera video audio quality is worst and there is no image optimization or enhance difference
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera's video and audio quality is poor with no image enhancement or optimization.
rows.Severity Reason: The video and audio quality is significantly degraded, making content unusable and unwatchable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Hardware unit problem. Countermeasure: Hardware unit problem.

rows.Title: Camera turns on by itself in background
rows.Problem: Phone's camera turns on by itself in the background for about 1 second, multiple times a day, even when the screen is off. This is not normal behavior and not caused by any user input.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone's camera activates unexpectedly in the background when the screen is off, posing a privacy risk.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves unauthorized camera activation without user input, which compromises user privacy and could lead to data exposure.

rows.Title: Camera quality has degraded noticeably
rows.Problem: The camera quality has degraded noticeably — photos look flat, lack clarity, and even mid-range phones are delivering better output.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera images now appear flat and lack clarity, with poorer output compared to mid-range phones.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function is partially impaired, with degraded image quality, but the device remains usable and core operations are not fully broken.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue may be due to software processing limitations; countermeasure suggests user comparison of 12MP and 50MP images shows 50MP has better detail, indicating expected performance variation by resolution.

rows.Title: WhatsApp Video Call Glitch
rows.Problem: WhatsApp video call shows horizontal white lines on the right side from top to bottom for a fraction of seconds before the call starts
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp video call displays horizontal white lines on the right side before starting.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a brief visual anomaly during video call initiation but does not prevent the call from starting or causing device failure.

rows.Title: Bixby assistant is not activating
rows.Problem: Bixby assistant is not activating. Power button or voice command is not waking up. Bixby option is not available in advanced settings. Opening the Bixby app now opens the Bix-than camera assistant instead of settings. Voice assistant is not working on this phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Bixby assistant is not activating and is missing from settings, with app opening incorrectly directing to camera instead of settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The Bixby assistant is completely unresponsive and inaccessible, preventing core functionality from being used.

rows.Title: System UI crashed and phone restart
rows.Problem: System UI crashed and phone restart. Device showed System UI not responding errors after restart. Logs and videos attached
rows.Summarized Problem: The System UI crashes and causes the phone to restart unexpectedly.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI crash causes the device to restart, making the device unusable until rebooted.
rows.R&D Comment: Correction has been added for the crash for B-OS. Please clear memory by optimizing device from Settings.

rows.Title: Lock Screen blank screen appears first then wallpaper comes
rows.Problem: After UI 7 update, when phone locks or unlocks, a blank screen appears first and then the wallpaper comes, making the locking and unlocking experience very bad
rows.Summarized Problem: On locking and unlocking, a blank screen appears before the wallpaper, disrupting the user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the usability of the lock screen transition but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Home button and recent apps button not showing
rows.Problem: Home button and recent apps button not showing after update to One UI 7.0; error shows as "Knox security restricts this action" when trying to use them
rows.Summarized Problem: Home and recent apps buttons are missing and show a Knox security restriction error when attempted to be used.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full navigation functionality but does not cause device crash or data loss, and can be partially resolved via policy settings.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by incorrect userId value being sent as '0' in device policy manager; fix has been implemented and request raised (49637)

rows.Title: Biometric prompt crashes app
rows.Problem: Biometric lock causes app crashes across all apps
rows.Summarized Problem: The biometric prompt in the lock screen causes apps to crash when triggered.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes all apps to crash upon biometric authentication, making the device unusable until resolved.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Fingerprint works in Lock Screen, WhatsApp, and Settings, but no crash logs are present. Countermeasure: User must provide detailed logs taken immediately after crash without reboot or delay, along with screenshots to determine timing and context.

rows.Title: Modes and Routines app keeps crashing
rows.Problem: Modes and Routines app keeps crashing with "keeps stopping" error after installing system update to one UI 7.0. Already tried force stop, clear data, reinstall updates, and wipe cache. Still crashes on launch.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Modes and Routines app crashes immediately upon launch after a system update to one UI 7.0, despite attempts to resolve via force stop, data clear, reinstall, and cache wipe.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on launch, preventing users from using a core functionality (routines), making the device unusable for specific use cases.
rows.R&D Comment: Changes for fixing fatal error have been applied in oneUI 8.0. The crash occurs during metadata loading when creating a new mode, due to missing conditions/actions in the database and invalid wizard steps. A circular progress indicator should be shown during metadata loading.

rows.Title: System UI, Process, OneUI, App errors occurs In device frequently
rows.Problem: Phone keeps rebooting or getting hanged, error popping up continuously, and fails to respond to basic actions like keyboard not appearing after writing a message
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently crashes, reboots, and displays errors in system UI and app processes, leading to unresponsiveness and failure to perform basic functions.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to frequent reboots and system errors, preventing normal operation and user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: UFS link layer errors detected; hardware-level check required (AP or UFS component) for signal and power integrity.

rows.Title: Live score cricket not working on Nowbar
rows.Problem: Live score cricket is not working on Nowbar option
rows.Summarized Problem: Live score cricket feature is not working on the Now Bar section of the Lock Screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing users from viewing live cricket scores, but the device remains otherwise usable.

rows.Title: Overheating during camera use
rows.Problem: Phone overheats when camera is used for 40 to 5
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats when the camera is used for 40 to 50 seconds.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves overheating during camera use, which is a partial malfunction and not a complete device failure or crash.

rows.Title: Outlook app crashes
rows.Problem: Outlook app crashes once in a while
rows.Summarized Problem: The Microsoft Outlook app crashes intermittently.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes intermittently, causing partial malfunction but does not render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Several crash logs are found. No actual crash exists; update app via market and re-register with new logs if needed.

rows.Title: Touch not responding while taking screenshot of quick/notification panel
rows.Problem: When taking a screenshot of the notification or quick settings panel, the screen stops responding to touch except for navigation gestures. Users must go back to home screen or restart to recover.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen stops responding to touch when taking a screenshot of the quick or notification panel, except for navigation gestures.
rows.Severity Reason: The touch functionality is partially broken during a common action, preventing full interaction but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Device getting crashed constantly
rows.Problem: Phone crashes constantly, freezing mid-task and showing "System UI not responding" pop-up, interrupting usage and impacting daily life
rows.Summarized Problem: The device crashes frequently during use, with system UI freezing and showing 'not responding' pop-ups.
rows.Severity Reason: The device crashes mid-task and freezes, making it unusable and interrupting daily activities.
rows.R&D Comment: java.lang.RuntimeException: Null or empty currentSystemRoutes. Something is wrong during boot when systemUI references router that is not registered.

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor isn't responding
rows.Problem: Fingerprint sensor isn't responding on some days; restart helps temporarily, but issue persists even after resetting accessibility settings and factory reset.
rows.Summarized Problem: The fingerprint sensor fails to respond on some days despite restarts and factory resets.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is intermittent and does not fully prevent device usage, but affects core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: If it is same after power off / on, please check fingerprint sensor & related connector at the customer service center.

rows.Title: Battery drain observed in the device
rows.Problem: Battery is draining quickly despite following all recommended troubleshooting steps including battery optimization, turning off Bluetooth/Wi-Fi, reducing brightness, closing background apps, disabling auto-sync, and updating apps. High data usage from apps like Brave Browser, Hotstar, Instagram, and Google Photos is contributing to increased battery consumption.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain due to high data usage from frequently used apps.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain occurs under normal user usage patterns with high app activity, but not due to device malfunction or system crash, indicating partial malfunction rather than full failure.
rows.R&D Comment: User used various apps frequently and streaming data usage exceeded 8GB; battery drain is caused by real user usage, not device-level issues.

rows.Title: Audio bar not working
rows.Problem: The audio display incorrectly indicates the end of the audio when playback starts, while media appears to be playing. The issue occurs intermittently and is not consistent across all instances.
rows.Summarized Problem: The audio bar incorrectly shows the end of audio playback during media playback, causing incorrect real-time audio position display.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects audio playback feedback but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Check logs; verify if issue occurs with other media playback apps; update software and app versions to test.

rows.Title: Lift to wake up not working during the call
rows.Problem: Lift to wake up not working during the call
rows.Summarized Problem: Lift to wake up function is not working during phone calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing during calls, which is a partial malfunction of the motion setting functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: PickUpController ignores Lift to Wake event during call. It is by concept. Please maintain current status

rows.Title: Status Bar Icon Shifts
rows.Problem: Taskbar icons on the right keep shifting when unlocking the phone
rows.Summarized Problem: The taskbar icons on the right shift when the phone is unlocked.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI consistency but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drain issue not resolved even after following provided steps
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences excessive battery drain despite following provided troubleshooting steps.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain prevents device usability and leads to frequent shutdowns or reduced operational time.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Sound issue while setting ringtone
rows.Problem: Sound goes off while playing media, but ringtones play. YouTube video sounds are off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Media playback sound is missing while playing videos, though ringtones play normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full audio functionality during media playback, rendering the device unusable for video consumption.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs because the device incorrectly detects a 3.5mm earphone as inserted; hardware defect (earjack, PBA) analysis is required.

rows.Title: Display yellowish tint
rows.Problem: Screen shows yellowish color, affecting image display and causing eye strain. Issue appeared two years ago, resolved after update, but has returned recently.
rows.Summarized Problem: The display shows a yellowish tint, distorting colors and affecting image appearance and user eye comfort.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual accuracy and user experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: EOL Model: Please check and share HW side analysis if issue persists continuously

rows.Title: Apps not aligned in recent bar
rows.Problem: Apps are misaligned and positioned towards the bottom left in the recent bar. The issue occurs intermittently and resolves after restarting the phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps in the recent bar are misaligned and positioned incorrectly, affecting user interface appearance.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a visible UI misalignment but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Hello, according to our analysis, Issue is not reproducing in the latest ONEUI Home. Please help to check and get the same concluded, Thanks.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains constantly without usage, even with minimal device activity.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences excessive battery drain even when not in active use.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains rapidly under minimal usage, indicating a critical system-level power issue that renders the device unusable without immediate intervention.

rows.Title: Camera quality degraded
rows.Problem: Every time I open Instagram, the camera turns blurry. This happens permanently and every time I use the app.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera becomes blurry when opening Instagram, indicating a persistent quality degradation issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs permanently and affects core functionality during app use, making the camera unusable in key scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Resolution-related quality degradation observed; however, no blur detected in HD tests, suggesting inconsistency in real-world conditions or app-specific rendering issues.

rows.Title: Unable to unlock Secure Folder
rows.Problem: Secure Folder remains locked despite correct Samsung account login. It shows 'Settings locked' and won't allow reset or access. User has tried clearing data, updating apps, and re-adding account. System logs are attached.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot unlock or reset the Secure Folder despite being signed in with a valid Samsung account.
rows.Severity Reason: The secure folder remains inaccessible, preventing users from accessing protected settings, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: 15 failed unlock attempts; insufficient logs. Countermeasure: User should capture logs immediately upon next attempt.

rows.Title: Unable to use bluetooth while calling
rows.Problem: not able to use Bluetooth while taking calls
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth is not functional during phone calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning during calls, preventing Bluetooth use in a specific context but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor issue
rows.Problem: Biometrics service not showing in Developer Options; fingerprint option shows white screen or 'Sensor isn't responding' error after Android 15 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint functionality fails to load or responds with error after Android 15 update, despite diagnostic test passing.
rows.Severity Reason: The fingerprint function is completely non-responsive, preventing user from authenticating, which is a core device usability feature.
rows.R&D Comment: There is failed communication between AP and fingerprint sensor, indicating a hardware-level issue. Contact service center to inspect the sensor hardware.

rows.Title: Plato app Create New Game button not working outside Secure Folder
rows.Problem: The Plato app’s 'Create New Game' button does not work outside the Secure Folder after a system update. The screen flickers without opening the popup. The feature works fine inside the Secure Folder. All touch events are delivered to the app, but no action is taken.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Plato app fails to open the 'Create New Game' popup when outside the Secure Folder, despite receiving touch input.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to respond to user input, making a core feature unusable outside the Secure Folder, which prevents normal app functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs due to system-level blocking of overlays outside Secure Folder; no logs available at the time of occurrence, but video confirms touch events are delivered but app has no response.

rows.Title: 5G not working
rows.Problem: 5G is gone after latest update
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G connectivity is missing after the latest software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device loses a core network function, preventing basic connectivity, making it unusable for mobile data.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to make SIM call while on WhatsApp call
rows.Problem: Unable to make a regular SIM call while already on a WhatsApp call; when attempting to make a SIM call and place WhatsApp call on hold, the call fails with message: "Can't call from a personal app Your organisation only allows you to make calls from work apps"
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot make a SIM call while on a WhatsApp call, with the call failing due to a policy message indicating only work apps are allowed to make calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from making a basic communication function (SIM call) during a concurrent call, rendering the device unusable for essential communication in real-world scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Dolby Atmos not functional with bluetooth
rows.Problem: Dolby Atmos is not functional on bluetooth audio devices that support surround sound
rows.Summarized Problem: Dolby Atmos does not function properly on Bluetooth audio devices that support surround sound.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a feature rather than a complete system failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Dolby Atmos is set properly with following the user setting and we can see Dolby processing log. When we also check with the same binary there is no problem. Dolby Atmos effect may feel just a little difference for some contents. If the customer really think if there is no difference when toggle Dolby Atmos on/off then guide to report the log right after the issue is reproduced.

rows.Title: Youtube lags on playing video at 4k60p
rows.Problem: When I play 4k60 video on youtube its lagging
rows.Summarized Problem: YouTube video playback lags when playing 4K60 content.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves lag during video playback, which affects user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue does not relate to DRM module; it is app-side and likely related to video decoding or rendering performance.

rows.Title: Registration for RCS/Chat Settings in Samsung Messages fails
rows.Problem: Registration for RCS/Chat Settings in Samsung Messages fails after updating to One UI 7 and resetting the phone. Device receives 401 error from server, preventing autoconfig retry for 12 hours.
rows.Summarized Problem: RCS/Chat Settings registration fails in Samsung Messages after an update due to a 401 error from the server.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot register for RCS/Chat Settings, which is a core messaging feature, and the error prevents autoconfig retry for 12 hours, rendering the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Device receives 400 error from server during registration. Countermeasure: Server-side fix required to allow retry after 12-hour timeout; device-side handling not feasible.

rows.Title: Camera cutout issue
rows.Problem: Efootball full screen issue started after OneUi 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera cutout occurs during Efootball gameplay, likely due to display rendering issues after OneUi 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects full-screen rendering in a specific app but does not cause device crash or data loss, only a visual anomaly.

rows.Title: Camera recording in green when using 2x zoom
rows.Problem: Camera recording in green when using 2x zoom
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera records with a green tint when using 2x zoom.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the camera's zoom function, resulting in color distortion during recording.
rows.R&D Comment: When adjusting the zoom, a greenish tint is suspected to be caused by a change in sensor mode. For an accurate analysis, a wide camera module is required, but analysis is difficult as the customer has one. Please visit the nearest service center to replace the wide camera module.

rows.Title: Phone launcher keeps crashing and phone gets locked frequently
rows.Problem: Phone launcher keeps crashing and phone gets locked frequently. I have tried clearing individual app cache/data, tried clearing cache partition of the phone via recovery mode and also tried factory reset of the phone and reconfigured the phone again. I see that issue is still persistent and its impacting my usage of the phone. Please do the needful.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone launcher crashes frequently and causes the phone to lock unexpectedly, even after clearing cache and performing a factory reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The launcher crashes and causes the device to lock, making the phone unusable during normal operation.

rows.Title: Circle to Search shows half black screen while scroll
rows.Problem: The Circle to Search feature on my S24 Ultra shows results initially but turns black or glitches when scrolling, hiding results completely. Clearing cache, updating apps, rebooting, and factory reset have not resolved it.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Circle to Search feature on the S24 Ultra displays results initially but turns black or glitches when scrolling, completely hiding content.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen turning black during scroll completely hides results, making the feature unusable and rendering the search function ineffective.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue has been reported to Google via https://partnerissuetracker.corp.google.com/issues/428861366 and is being monitored.

rows.Title: Searching contacts and clicking on the required contact highlights another
rows.Problem: Searching contacts and clicking on the required contact highlights another contact. This bug is after one ui 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: When searching contacts, clicking on a contact highlights a different one instead of the selected one.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes confusion in user interaction but does not prevent core functionality from working.

rows.Title: Blurry in 10x zoom camera
rows.Problem: Picture is blurry in 10x zoom camera despite clear lens
rows.Summarized Problem: Images are blurry when using 10x zoom, even with a clean lens.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of the camera zoom function under specific conditions, not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The haze appears to be caused by flare in the outdoor environment. If the issue persists even after cleaning the camera lens, a hardware inspection is required.

rows.Title: Hotspot disconnects frequently
rows.Problem: Phone frequently disconnects laptop from hotspot despite hotspot being on, no timer or restrictions set, issue persists after software update and has worsened
rows.Summarized Problem: A device frequently disconnects from the hotspot despite the hotspot being enabled and no restrictions set.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent loss of internet connectivity for another device, rendering the hotspot functionally unreliable and unusable.

rows.Title: Device is over heating and battery is draining too fast
rows.Problem: Device is over heating and battery is draining too fast. When I use for 2-5min display of the device start to heat. And also battery is dropping 1% for 2-5 min of usage. But there is no background running activity..and also i have diagnosed in Samsung member app. Everything is clear. I also tried in Safe mode, in safe mode I used for 5 minutes nearly 3% battery is dropped. I didn't use socials for while but also heating and battery draining. Today 8 AM IST to 10:30AM IST I did use, even unlocked
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats and battery drains rapidly during normal usage, even with no background apps running or in safe mode.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheating and rapid battery drain significantly impact usability and device performance, indicating a critical hardware or software issue.
rows.R&D Comment: Heating analysis has been mentioned in comment no #C00004. Battery analysis has already been mentioned in comment no #C00003.

rows.Title: Camera not working
rows.Problem: Camera not working after factory reset
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera function is not working after a factory reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera is a core feature that is completely non-functional after a factory reset, rendering the device unusable for basic photography.

rows.Title: Circle to search not working
rows.Problem: Circle to search not working despite Google notification stating support
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot use the circle search feature despite Google indicating it is supported.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not functioning despite official support notification, indicating a partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue raised to Google via https://partnerissuetracker.corp.google.com/issues/428861366; status to be maintained.

rows.Title: Auto pilot engaged screen appear while charging
rows.Problem: When charging, text appears on the screen indicating 'auto pilot engaged'. This occurs only during charging and is not related to settings or app usage.
rows.Summarized Problem: An 'auto pilot engaged' message appears on the screen during charging, which is not expected behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a visible message appearing on the screen during charging, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: User has set screen saver to 'Android game' in Display settings; changing to 'None' resolves the issue.

rows.Title: Distorted display during multi-tasking window resize
rows.Problem: The screen shows a static display whenever resizing multi-tasking windows, and occasionally when launching apps. This started after the One UI 7.0 update. Screen recording fails to capture the glitch, so a separate phone was used to record the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: A distorted static display appears when resizing multi-tasking windows and occasionally when launching apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The display distortion occurs during core user interaction (multi-tasking) and prevents normal device usage, making it a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Battleground app pop-up view screen broken; DpAsyncBlitStream does not support compress format. Mitigation: MTK patch merge and safeguard for compression-pixel format compatibility.

rows.Title: Sharpness and colors not good from rear camera
rows.Problem: After One UI 7 update, rear camera shows poor sharpness and color accuracy, especially in dark environments with gray-free surfaces, due to AWB algorithm misinterpretation and low light noise.
rows.Summarized Problem: Rear camera shows poor sharpness and color accuracy in dark environments due to AWB algorithm misinterpretation and low light noise.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality in specific conditions but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is not universal across all scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no change in image quality due to OS upgrade. In dark cases, light entering the camera is weak, resulting in more noise and weaker sharpness. The AWB algorithm may misjudge color temperature on gray-free surfaces, causing color distortion. This is not a camera defect but a known phenomenon in low-light conditions.

rows.Title: Widget visibility is not good in light mode
rows.Problem: The weather widget is not visible in standard mode and appears unclear when a light wallpaper is applied, though it is visible in dark mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The weather widget is not visible in light mode due to poor text and icon contrast against light wallpapers.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility in specific conditions but does not prevent core functionality or cause device failure.

rows.Title: Sound in recorded videos is very bad
rows.Problem: Voice in recorded videos is strange and sometimes absent, with strange background noise. After resetting and clearing app data, camera quality deteriorated and camera started lagging.
rows.Summarized Problem: Audio in recorded videos is distorted and sometimes absent, with strange background noise.
rows.Severity Reason: The audio issue prevents proper recording of voice and background sounds, making video content unusable for users.
rows.R&D Comment: Please reproduce again, collect a new dumpstate logs. Also, attach the recorded clip and an accompanying video so we can see how you reproduce this issue first hand. Thank you.

rows.Title: Modes & Routines keep stopping
rows.Problem: Error in Modes & Routines
rows.Summarized Problem: Routines keep stopping unexpectedly in the device settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The function is partially malfunctioning, causing routines to stop unexpectedly but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue not reproducible with latest routine 4.9.0.77 version. Please update to oneUI 8.0.

rows.Title: Font Color Display Issue
rows.Problem: Font color is inconsistent across app and home screens, appearing black in some areas and white in others, making it difficult to read and navigate.
rows.Summarized Problem: Inconsistent font color across app and home screens makes content difficult to read.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects readability but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Prime Video not playing screen is black audio is playing
rows.Problem: In amazon prime video is not playing screen is black nd audio is playinb
rows.Summarized Problem: Prime Video app fails to display video content, showing a black screen while audio continues to play.
