rows.R&D Comment: Many packages are running in verify filter; device not fully charged post-update, preventing bg dexopt compilation. Recommend charging to full capacity and reporting with logs and timestamps.

rows.Title: Create new album shows No.people.found
rows.Problem: Auto updating album in gallery stopped working after switching from Galaxy A34 5G to Samsung S24 5G. When creating a new album, it shows 'No.people.found'. This issue affects functionality and is urgent.
rows.Summarized Problem: The auto-updating album feature in the gallery fails to function after switching to Samsung S24 5G, showing 'No.people.found' when creating a new album.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing or malfunctioning, preventing users from creating albums and affecting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: If the device has been idle with screen off and charging for a long time, the database may be corrupted; clearing related app data can initiate a fresh reanalysis.

rows.Title: No Service logo showing for both SIM cards
rows.Problem: Device shows "No Service" logo for both SIM cards after July 2025 software update. None of the SIMs work. Wifi calling works for SMS and calls, but standalone network connectivity fails. SIMs work on other devices but not on this S22 Ultra.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device shows 'No Service' for both SIM cards after July 2025 update, with no standalone network connectivity despite working on other devices and functional via Wi-Fi calling.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial malfunction: network registration fails on both SIMs, but Wi-Fi calling works, indicating limited functionality rather than complete device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: MIPI test failed due to six hardware components (DevInst, BUS, MID, USID, STATUS, RF_Component) reported as 'Not Good'; recommend hardware inspection and replacement at service center.

rows.Title: Charging stopping at 79% showing fully charged
rows.Problem: Phone stops at 79% during charging and shows as fully charged, despite user-set limit of 80%. Occasionally reaches 80%, but often gets stuck at 79%.
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone stops charging at 79% and incorrectly shows as fully charged despite user-set limit of 80%.
rows.Severity Reason: Device shows incorrect charging status, leading to user confusion and potential overuse or damage due to incorrect charge level indication.

rows.Title: Sound quality via Bluetooth on Bowers & Wilkins Pi8 earphones has dropped significantly
rows.Problem: Bluetooth audio output quality on Fold 7 is extremely bad despite similar EQ settings on earphones app, Samsung EQ, and music player. Bass is missing and voice is prioritized, causing music volume to drop noticeably when voice kicks in.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth audio output on Fold 7 has severely degraded with missing bass and voice prioritization, despite consistent EQ settings across devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a major degradation in audio quality, making music playback unusable and disrupting user experience significantly.
rows.R&D Comment: EQ settings are not properly applied in the Bluetooth audio pipeline; logs show userEQ sessions with all zeros, indicating no actual EQ configuration.

rows.Title: Lag & frame drop when playing game
rows.Problem: Cannot play game since software update to UI 7.0
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience lag and frame drops when playing games after the UI 7.0 software update.
rows.Severity Reason: Game performance is severely degraded, making gameplay unusable, which directly impacts user experience during critical usage.
rows.R&D Comment: We need logs & videos & Systrace to analyze performance issues. How to capture Systritecture: 1. Settings - About phone - Software information - click 'Build number' for some times quickly to open 'Developer options'; 2. Settings - Developer options - System Tracing - start 'Record trace' - press home; 3. reproduce the issue (It's better to complete it within 1 min and take a video with another phone); 4. Settings - Developer options - System Tracing - stop 'Record trace' - view saved files; 5. sh

rows.Title: Internet speed in tab is far lower compared to my mobile
rows.Problem: Internet speed on tab is far lower than on mobile when both devices are at same distance from modem, with tab showing 1-20mbps versus mobile showing 100-30
rows.Summarized Problem: The tablet shows significantly lower Wi-Fi speeds compared to the mobile phone when both are at the same distance from the router.
rows.Severity Reason: The speed difference is substantial and consistent, with the tablet operating at 1-20 Mbps versus mobile at 100-300 Mbps, indicating a major connectivity issue that affects usability.
rows.R&D Comment: There is a hardware issue with the Wi-Fi antenna, as the Rx link speed is abnormally low and ant2rssi is significantly poorer than ant1rssi, suggesting a faulty antenna; recommend checking RSSI via *#0011# to confirm.

rows.Title: Google chrome and samsung calculator not visible in home page
rows.Problem: Google chrome and samsung calculator not visible in home page normal apps section
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Chrome and Samsung Calculator are not visible in the home screen app section.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a visibility problem on the home screen, which is a cosmetic UI issue and does not affect device usability or core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Apps are hidden by user settings. Countermeasure: User can unhide apps via Settings > Homescreen settings > Hide apps on Home and App screen.

rows.Title: Cannot calibrate the watch for blood pressure
rows.Problem: Cannot calibrate the watch for blood pressure
rows.Summarized Problem: The watch cannot be calibrated for blood pressure measurements.
rows.Severity Reason: The user cannot perform a basic calibration function, which is essential for blood pressure monitoring, but the issue does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Exercise bubble ui on bottom is not correct
rows.Problem: When ever the active activity is shown on watch home screen. The exercise bubble ui on bottom is not correct
rows.Summarized Problem: The exercise bubble UI on the bottom of the Samsung Watch Ultra is incorrectly displayed when the active activity is shown on the home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the UI element during normal operation, affecting visual consistency but not causing device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Not handling nowbar data during animation switch; Counter Measure: Check nowbar data availability after animation completion

rows.Title: Camera is not optimizing the color gradient
rows.Problem: Camera is not optimizing the color gradient despite reset settings and clean device
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to optimize its color gradient, even after full settings reset and device clean.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a core camera feature, preventing optimal performance but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Hardware unit problem. Countermeasure: Hardware unit problem.

rows.Title: Challenge not showing in completed challenges list
rows.Problem: Completed July Samsung Together challenge does not show in completed challenges list and points not awarded
rows.Summarized Problem: A completed challenge is not appearing in the completed challenges list and points are not awarded.
rows.Severity Reason: The challenge completion data is delayed due to server synchronization, causing a partial malfunction in tracking rather than full failure or device crash.
rows.R&D Comment: The Together's Global Challenge data is aggregated after the month ends due to timezone differences; users may see delayed visibility of badges and points.

rows.Title: System UI isn't responding
rows.Problem: System UI is not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The system UI is unresponsive to user input, particularly in gesture interactions.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI fails to respond to touch gestures, making core navigation impossible and rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: ANR caused by delayed touch event processing in navigation bar; system busy state prevents resolution, and phenomenon persists under device conditions.

rows.Title: Google feed gets disappeared automatically
rows.Problem: Google feed gets disappeared automatically; there is a 1-second delay when screen is off in FHD mode, but works fine in HD and QHD. Requires restart to recover Google feed.
rows.Summarized Problem: Google feed disappears automatically and requires a device restart to recover, with a 1-second delay in FHD mode when screen is off.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial functionality failure and requires user restart, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Super fast charging not showing 2.0
rows.Problem: Device shows "Super fast charging" instead of "Super fast charging 2.0" when using a 45W charger and compatible cable.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device displays "Super fast charging" instead of "Super fast charging 2.0" when using a 45W charger.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a partial malfunction in the charging indicator display, not affecting device functionality or performance.
rows.R&D Comment: For 45W charging, users must use an E MAKER cable supporting up to 5A; current cable supports only 3A, leading to incorrect indicator display.

rows.Title: Battery draining
rows.Problem: Battery drains from 70% to 35% in one hour with no usage of mobile for activities like video calls, maps, or apps. Device not used between 11:30 to 2:30.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device battery drains rapidly from 70% to 35% within one hour of inactivity, despite no usage of apps or functions.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drains significantly in a short period with no usage, indicating a major performance issue that renders the device unusable for extended periods.

rows.Title: Gesture animation not working in Home Up module of Good Lock
rows.Problem: Gesture animation not working in Home Up module of Good Lock
rows.Summarized Problem: Gesture animation is not working in the Home Up module of the Lock Screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The gesture animation is missing, which affects user interaction but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Wireless Android Auto keeps disconnecting
rows.Problem: Wireless Android Auto keeps disconnecting during a 30-minute drive
rows.Summarized Problem: Wireless Android Auto disconnects multiple times during a 30-minute drive.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes frequent disconnections during driving, making the feature unusable in real-world operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Insufficient log data from the device. Countermeasure: Request car manufacturer and model details, and new logs captured immediately after disconnection during driving.

rows.Title: Camera lag while switching front and rear camera
rows.Problem: Lag while switching front and rear camera
rows.Summarized Problem: Lag occurs when switching between front and rear cameras.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag significantly impacts user experience during camera switching, which is a core functionality.

rows.Title: Vita application hangs
rows.Problem: Vita application hangs whenever I open application. After restart, it works. Issues occur after Android OS update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Vita application hangs when opened and requires restart to function normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the application but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both indicate insufficient logs and unclear reproduction steps, making it impossible to deduce the root cause.

rows.Title: Map is not work properly
rows.Problem: Map is not work properly after new update
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Maps fails to function properly after a recent update, intermittently not working.
rows.Severity Reason: The map functionality is partially malfunctioning but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and appears to be intermittent.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: GPS service not actively running during location requests; no crashes detected. Countermeasure: Log analysis shows GPS provider not started, indicating potential configuration or service startup issue.

rows.Title: Do not disturb allow selected contacts list keeps resetting
rows.Problem: The list of contacts added to the 'Do not disturb' feature's 'Allow only selected contacts' setting gets removed or resets on its own after some time, sometimes hours or after restart.
rows.Summarized Problem: The selected contacts list in the Do Not Disturb feature resets unexpectedly, causing users to lose their custom settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature partially malfunctions, as users lose their configured contacts after a period of time, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: GPay not working
rows.Problem: GPay shows "G Pay can't be used on this device" after following instructions
rows.Summarized Problem: GPay is unable to function on the device, displaying a message indicating it cannot be used.
rows.Severity Reason: The payment feature is completely non-functional, preventing users from using the device for transactions.

rows.Title: No option to enable VOLTE for BSNL in settings
rows.Problem: No option to enable VOLTE for BSNL in settings on Samsung A16 5G, despite VOLTE being enabled by BSNL on other devices. This causes major call drop issues.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot enable VOLTE for BSNL in settings on Samsung A16 5G, leading to major call drop issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The absence of VOLTE setting in settings prevents users from controlling network functionality, causing major call drops and device usability issues.
rows.R&D Comment: Escalate to BSN- to verify SIM details and MCC/MNC for affected devices.

rows.Title: Unable to play any video
rows.Problem: Unable to play any videos after recent update, problem persists even after factory data reset. Also having trouble booting into recovery mode.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot play videos on the device after a recent update, even after factory reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents basic functionality (video playback) and persists despite a full factory reset, rendering the device unusable for media consumption.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue belongs to a third-party application. It should be checked and fixed by the third-party app owner. No source code or internal logs are available for Samsung to investigate.

rows.Title: Edit live photo automatically darkens
rows.Problem: When editing a live photo by selecting a frame and saving, the photo automatically darkens as if exposure has dropped. This issue appears new and may be related to a software update, as it does not occur on an unupdated Samsung tablet.
rows.Summarized Problem: Editing a live photo automatically darkens during the save process, causing incorrect exposure.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature malfunctions during a key operation, affecting user experience but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Overheating
rows.Problem: Device reaches up to 90°C with average temperature of 38.4°C, even when only Wi-Fi is active and other features like location and Bluetooth are off. User reports significant overheating issues despite minimal usage.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats to 90°C even with minimal usage, such as only Wi-Fi active, causing user concern and potential safety risks.
rows.Severity Reason: Device reaches extreme temperatures (90°C) under minimal usage, posing a safety risk and indicating a major thermal management failure.

rows.Title: Bixby not working
rows.Problem: Bixby is not working on Galaxy A56 5G device
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby is not functioning on the Galaxy A56 5G device.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access or use Bixby, a core feature, rendering a major functionality unavailable.
rows.R&D Comment: User must wait one week for data deletion before retrying; if issue persists, further investigation needed.

rows.Title: Charging stop working
rows.Problem: Charging issue after updating to One UI 7.0 on Galaxy M14 5
rows.Summarized Problem: Charging stops working after updating to One UI 7.0 on Galaxy M14 5G.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to charge, rendering it unusable without a power source.
rows.R&D Comment: Shorts detected in USB connector pins indicate hardware damage; users should visit service center for inspection and repair.

rows.Title: Pause PD charging is greyed out
rows.Problem: The phone is connected to a 32W (PD3.0 PPS supported) adapter but the pause PD charging is greyed out
rows.Summarized Problem: The pause PD charging function is greyed out when connected to a 32W PD adapter.
rows.Severity Reason: The function is unavailable due to PD communication behavior, but the device remains usable and does not crash or lose data.
rows.R&D Comment: The terminal recognizes the TA as the charger of the FPDO Type. Because it is recognized as FPDO Type by PD communication, the terminal is operating normally, and because it is recognized as FPDO Type, the "pause PD" function is not used.

rows.Title: Galaxy Wear doesn't show the super wide band speech feature
rows.Problem: Galaxy Wear doesn't show the super wide band speech feature with Galaxy Buds 3 Pro on S23
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy Wear does not display the super wide band speech feature when paired with Galaxy Buds 3 Pro on Galaxy S23.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in the device settings, but not fully broken—only unavailable on specific models, affecting partial functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Galaxy S23 does not support super wide band speech feature; users should use S25 or Z Fold 6 instead.

rows.Title: Wrong Storage and Memory Capacity
rows.Problem: Phone shows 32GB storage and 2GB RAM instead of actual 512GB storage and 12GB RAM
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone incorrectly displays storage and memory capacity, showing 32GB instead of 512GB and 2GB instead of 12GB RAM.
rows.Severity Reason: The displayed values are significantly incorrect, leading to user confusion about device capacity, which is critical for device usability and trust.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a Wearable Device Care screen showing wearable storage and memory specs, which is normal. Phone Device Care storage and memory is correctly loaded.

rows.Title: Audio delay when using any application
rows.Problem: Experiencing a delay of 5 to 10 seconds before audio plays when opening Instagram or playing music.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience a 5 to 10 second delay before audio plays when using apps like Instagram or playing music.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a noticeable delay in audio playback, but it does not cause device crash or complete failure of functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is app-side, caused by an outdated app version; countermeasure is to update the app via Play Store.

rows.Title: Home screen went black when going to the home screen from an app
rows.Problem: Going to the home screen from an app, the home screen went black for a few seconds before loading
rows.Summarized Problem: The home screen goes black for a few seconds when transitioning from an app, before loading.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent failure of the home screen display during navigation, but does not completely prevent device usage or cause data loss.

rows.Title: A blue circle appears while opening app tray
rows.Problem: A blue circle appears while opening menu sometimes
rows.Summarized Problem: A blue circle appears intermittently when opening the app tray menu.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is cosmetic and does not affect device usability or core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is not currently reproducible due to changes in OneUI 8.0 scroller logic; no action required.

rows.Title: Samsung TV remot options not working in SmartThings application
rows.Problem: Samsung TV remote options are not working in the SmartThings application after a recent update. Phone and TV are on the same network. App reset, uninstall, and reinstall attempts have failed. The TV app shows home screen but touch interactions do not work.
rows.Summarized Problem: Remote control functionality is missing or not responding in the SmartThings application for Samsung TV.
rows.Severity Reason: The remote control feature does not respond to touch inputs, preventing user interaction with the TV, but the core application remains functional and accessible.

rows.Title: Screenshot stitch function not working
rows.Problem: Gallery app unable to stitch multiple screenshots when scrolling
rows.Summarized Problem: The gallery app fails to stitch multiple screenshots when scrolling.
rows.Severity Reason: The function is missing in a key feature, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: WHATSAPP is not getting installed
rows.Problem: WHATSAPP is not getting installed. Software, memory, and all checks completed
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp is not installing on the device despite all system checks being completed.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to install, which prevents user from using a core communication app, rendering functionality unavailable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Installation failure due to invalid ProductIdOrigin; Countermeasure: Request CP silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Phone is not recognizing the sim1 properly and it keeps getting on and off
rows.Problem: Mobile network settings and sim card is automatically changing again and again with popup showing no sim card. This happens frequently after the latest system software update on 4th August. Phone is not recognizing sim1 properly and it keeps getting on and off.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone is not recognizing SIM1 properly and repeatedly switches network settings, showing a 'no sim card' popup after a system update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to recognize SIM1 consistently, causing repeated network setting changes and user disruption, making the device unusable for basic connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: NEXT AI @ Dear customer please check if issue occurs with only issue sim or all other sim cards. If issue is with only that SIM , kindly contact network provider to change sim card. If issue occurs with all SIM cards, kindly attach screen recording and attach logs of that particular issue timestamp only for conclusion of issue . Thanks

rows.Title: Takes a lot of time to refine the picture
rows.Problem: It takes a lot of time to refine the picture, and I have to wait a lot of time to send that one picture. The "refining picture" happens seldom.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera takes a long time to refine pictures, causing significant delay before sending.
rows.Severity Reason: The delay severely impacts user experience and usability during photo sharing, making the feature practically unusable in many cases.

rows.Title: Not able to switch to back camera in WhatsApp video call
rows.Problem: Not able to switch to back camera in WhatsApp video call
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot switch to the back camera during WhatsApp video calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing during video calls, preventing users from using the back camera, but the issue does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Camera Mode not showing in more option
rows.Problem: Camera modes not visible in more options, though the area works when touched; image capture is very slow
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera modes are not visible in the 'more' options, and image capture is slow.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera mode is completely invisible in the menu, preventing users from accessing essential features, and image capture is slow, impacting usability and performance.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause: No more mode after Reduce animations enabled. Countermeasure: Fixed and will be integrated in next version; users should disable 'Reduce animations' in Settings > Accessibility > Vision enhancements to resolve.

rows.Title: App icons not showing in app screen
rows.Problem: Glass effect on app icons isn't working on all apps, meaning some apps aren't showing
rows.Summarized Problem: Some app icons are not displaying due to a failure in the glass effect on the app screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of some app icons but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Cx faces not able to navigate music track
rows.Problem: Watch 6 classic doesn't let me navigate with the music track. Previously it was working, after the update it's gone. Giving and removing every feature. Very bad updates
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot navigate music tracks on the Watch 6 classic after an update.
rows.Severity Reason: The music navigation feature, which was previously functional, is now completely missing after an update, rendering a core user interaction unusable.

rows.Title: Black color cursor appearing on the Screen
rows.Problem: a black triangle appears when phone is on idle condition and is very irritating
rows.Summarized Problem: A black triangle cursor appears on the screen when the phone is idle.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is visually distracting but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both state: Please confirm if user has attached external mouse with the device

rows.Title: Icons not showing on app screen
rows.Problem: Some icons are not showing at all in the Theme park application after a new update. The glass effect is present but icon colors are faded. Need to fix icon visibility and color issues to ensure proper visual appearance.
rows.Summarized Problem: Icons are missing or faded in the Theme park app after a new update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of app interface elements but does not cause device crash or complete failure of core functions.

rows.Title: Call and text on other device not working properly
rows.Problem: Call and text on other device not working properly with S25 Ultra. It works for some time and then stops, showing error 'Can't make call. Make sure your phone is connected to a network and call and text is on both devices'
rows.Sub-Module: Call and text on other device
rows.Summarized Problem: Call and text functionality on other devices fails intermittently and stops working after some time, showing a network-related error message.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature works intermittently and fails after a period of use, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete failure or device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: Turn off and on Call & text on other devices at PD when the error message 'Can't make call. Make sure your phone is connected to a network and call and text is on both devices' appears.

rows.Title: Device's wifi connection is disconnecting frequently
rows.Problem: My device's wifi connection is disconnecting frequently, even when other devices are connected. This issue has been ongoing for two months.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi connection disconnects frequently, even when other devices are connected, and has persisted for two months.
rows.Severity Reason: The WiFi disconnects repeatedly, causing intermittent loss of connectivity, which impacts device usability and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: WiFi turned off via system UI request at 19:32, leading to disconnection. Countermeasure: Same as cause; confirm system UI behavior and prevent automatic WiFi disable.

rows.Title: not able to go forward from this 'Continue' page
rows.Problem: unable to go forward from this 'Continue' page in smartthings app
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot proceed past the 'Continue' page in the SmartThings app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents progression in a key app flow but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Battery life dropped drastically after updating to One UI 7
rows.Problem: Battery life dropped drastically after updating to One UI 7, with over 120% battery usage in just 7 hours of normal usage on a flagship device.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery life drops drastically after updating to One UI 7, with over 400% battery usage in 7 hours of normal use.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable due to excessive battery drain in normal usage, indicating a critical performance issue.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue belongs to a 3rd party application; requires investigation and fix by the app owner.

rows.Title: sound distortion
rows.Problem: sound distortion in audio at certain pitches persists after June 2025 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Audio sound distortion occurs at certain pitches and persists after the June 2025 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of audio function at specific pitches, but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No abnormal logs detected; hardware issues suspected. Countermeasure: Guide customer to service center to check for physical blockages or speaker damage.

rows.Title: Power saving mode triggers data saver mode
rows.Problem: Power saving mode automatically turns on data saver mode when activated.
rows.Summarized Problem: Power saving mode automatically activates data saver mode without user intent.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature behaves unexpectedly, causing unintended data restrictions, but does not result in device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: It is difficult to check because the same icon is not displayed on the indicator when testing on the same terminal. So you have to let me know which app provides the indicator's icon. Or let me know where the function is provided.

rows.Title: smart setting and mode icon is getting collapsed
rows.Problem: In notification panel the smart setting and mode icon is getting collapsed. You can see in bottom this is after one ui 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The smart setting and mode icon is collapsing in the notification panel after UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of a key setting icon but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Timing issues caused layout overlap; fixed by adjusting layout timing and included in OS update.

rows.Title: Face issue while login google account on Galaxy Watch 8 Classic
rows.Problem: Error occurs during login to Google account on Galaxy Watch 8 Classic via wearable app, with screen recording and error logs attached
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot complete Google account login on Galaxy Watch 8 Classic via wearable app.
rows.Severity Reason: Login failure prevents users from accessing core functionality of the device.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Countermeasure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Vascular load not working on Galaxy Wearable
rows.Problem: No result in vascular load after 10 days of use, algorithm fails to predict blood pressure during sleep due to low PPG amplitude and low signal quality
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy Wearable fails to predict blood pressure during sleep due to low PPG amplitude and poor signal quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The algorithm consistently fails to predict blood pressure during sleep, which is a core health function, leading to no actionable health data for users.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Algorithm fails during sleep due to low PPG amplitude and low signal quality; Counter Measure: Logs not available; user must manually run Watch Dump to retrieve logs.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster than expected even with no background apps and zero screen on time, consuming 7% in 5.30 hours instead of 3-4% on other Samsung devices.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device drains 7% battery in 5.30 hours under ideal conditions, significantly more than expected compared to other Samsung devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction under ideal conditions, not complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain is due to background services in Android 15; no action needed as it's expected behavior.

rows.Title: Custom colour not working for some app icons
rows.Problem: When applying custom colour to app icons, some icons do not change or show any icon at all.
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons fail to update or display when custom colours are applied.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality of icon appearance but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: When using glass or gradient effects, a shape must be selected; if not, icons fail to render. Users should select a shape to resolve the issue. Future versions will automatically select a shape in such cases.

rows.Title: Recent App view glitch
rows.Problem: Apps are overlapping on the overview button and the current app is shown on center and right side
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps are overlapping and the current app is incorrectly displayed on the app overview screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visual confusion but does not prevent device usage or cause system failure.

rows.Title: Phone heated by camera use
rows.Problem: Phone heated by camera use
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone heats up significantly during camera usage, reaching 38-39 degrees Celsius due to high CPU consumption from the camera service and elevated ambient temperature.
rows.Severity Reason: The heating occurs during normal usage and is within device specifications, but is noticeable and linked to high CPU consumption from the camera service, indicating a partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: High CPU consumption from camera service and elevated ambient temperature lead to increased battery thermistor readings. Counter Measure: Check device environment; re-raise issue if heating persists in normal conditions.

rows.Title: Difference in ringtone sound between flipped open and flipped close
rows.Problem: Difference in ringtone sound between flipped open and flipped close
rows.Summarized Problem: The ringtone sound differs when the device is flipped open versus flipped closed.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Network Issue
rows.Problem: No signal capture. Poor connectivity. Wifi works intermittently. Dual SIM auto connectivity fails. Internet connection very poor.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to maintain stable network connectivity, with no signal capture, intermittent Wi-Fi, and dual SIM auto-connectivity issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish or maintain network connections, making basic communication and internet usage unreliable and unusable in most situations.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to download Latest SW
rows.Problem: I can't update software
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot download the latest software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The software update functionality is completely broken, preventing device updates.

rows.Title: Fix the shape of latters option showing disable Handwriting help option
rows.Problem: In the samsung notes application these options are not clickable can u please help me with that
rows.Summarized Problem: The handwriting help and letter shape options in Samsung Notes are not clickable.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not functional but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Weather app showing incorrect information
rows.Problem: AQI shows 1 in India, but correct data is available on other websites
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung weather app displays incorrect AQI data in India, showing a value of 1 when it should be higher based on actual conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The AQI data is incorrect, but the app is not completely non-functional; users can still access other weather data, and the issue is specific to one metric.
rows.R&D Comment: Directed this issue to TWC. To be registered as an improvement item in TWC and to be monitored for improvement. The weather data provided by TWC is commonly displayed not only by Samsung but also by all partners, and it takes time to improve.

rows.Title: Black color cursor appearing on the Screen
rows.Problem: My phone shows undemanded cursor with no external mouse or keyboard connected
rows.Summarized Problem: A black cursor appears on the screen without any external mouse or keyboard being connected.
rows.Severity Reason: The cursor appears unexpectedly without user input, which is a noticeable UI issue but does not prevent device usage or cause system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Android OS shows a cursor when a device with mouse properties is connected; future OS versions will hide the cursor to improve user experience.

rows.Title: WhatsApp call ringtone not consistent across contacts
rows.Problem: Notifications and WhatsApp calls do not display on locked screen unless double-tapped. WhatsApp call ringtone is different for some contacts and must be set individually.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp call ringtone varies across contacts and notifications do not appear on the locked screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure in notifications and inconsistent feature behavior, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The inconsistent WhatsApp call ringtone and missing notifications on lock screen are due to app-level notification handling and default ringtone configuration; resolution involves improving app-level notification settings and default ringtone persistence.

rows.Title: Dual always on option not working for dual sim
rows.Problem: Cannot turn on the dual always on option when using both Jio and Airtel SIMs. Getting error "couldnt turn on dual sim always on". Device reset performed but issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: The dual always on feature is not available or functional when using both Jio and Airtel SIMs simultaneously.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a dual-SIM setup, preventing full device functionality but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Samsung Finance showing new sim detected always
rows.Problem: Samsung Finance app shows 'new sim detected' even though no SIM card has been changed
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Finance app continuously displays 'new sim detected' despite no SIM change.
rows.Severity Reason: The app shows a persistent incorrect message, affecting user trust but does not cause device failure or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: ECG and Blood Pressure features not functioning
rows.Problem: ECG and Blood Pressure features are not functioning on Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 Ultra. When selecting ECG, it prompts to open Samsung Health Monitor app, which displays 'Service is not available in your current location'.
rows.Summarized Problem: ECG and Blood Pressure features are not working on Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 Ultra due to service unavailability in the user's location.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is unavailable in the user's country (Saudi Arabia) due to regional restrictions, resulting in partial functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The SHM app is restricted in Saudi Arabia as it is a Software as Medical Device and only approved in specific countries; the app service is not available in the user's region.

rows.Title: Setup Samsung Pass
rows.Problem: Unable to setup Samsung Pass, error occurs each time
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot setup Samsung Pass due to repeated errors during authentication.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents successful setup of a feature but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: In the next version, password authentication will be the only method, preventing other authentication methods.

rows.Title: Unable to charge device with power bank
rows.Problem: Z Fold 7 sends power to power bank instead of charging, and when switching USB settings from "To This Device" to "To Connected Device", the behavior changes. Tried multiple times, no solution found.
rows.Summarized Problem: Z Fold 7 reverses power flow when connected to a power bank, causing incorrect charging behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The device incorrectly sends power to the power bank instead of charging, leading to improper functionality during use, but does not cause complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: It seems necessary to obtain and analyze the auxiliary battery and the cable used for connection.

rows.Title: can't Allow permission of notification in wearable app
rows.Problem: Cannot allow notification permission in wearable app and wearable app not showing in notification list. Also, not finding My Buds 3 Pro in the app. Already reported multiple times with no resolution. If unresolved, want to return phone fold 7.
rows.Summarized Problem: Wearable app does not allow notification permission and fails to detect My Buds 3 Pro via Bluetooth.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot grant notification permissions or find their device in the app, preventing core functionality like alerts and connectivity.

rows.Title: UI Glitch in Recent App List
rows.Problem: In split screen view, selecting another window causes the same window to open and a clone window appears near the screen.
rows.Summarized Problem: A clone window appears when switching between windows in split screen view within the recent app list.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a visual inconsistency but does not prevent device operation or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Once-time issue; fixed and improvement path included in next UI release.

rows.Title: Samsung wallet not opening
rows.Problem: Samsung wallet is not opening after last update
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Wallet is not opening after the latest update.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to open, preventing users from accessing a core payment feature, making it unusable.

rows.Title: Bluetooth mic recording missing in Samsung Notes
rows.Problem: Bluetooth mic recording is missing in Samsung Notes; voice is being recorded through tablet inbuilt mic despite Bluetooth headset being connected
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth mic recording is not available in Samsung Notes, causing voice to be recorded via tablet's built-in microphone instead.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing but does not prevent full device operation or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Mobile Network
rows.Problem: Mobile network takes too long to open and airplane mode deactivation option becomes available only after 4-5 seconds, with glitchy behavior when opening background apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile network takes excessive time to open and airplane mode deactivation is delayed, with background app switching showing glitchy behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The delay in network activation and deactivation, combined with glitchy background app behavior, significantly impacts device usability and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: After toggle mobile data, the SETUP_DATA_CALL command takes around 4 seconds to return. Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: unable to use vita application properly after android 15 update
rows.Problem: text box goes down when editing text in vita application after android 15 update, issue persists despite reinstalling app
rows.Summarized Problem: The text box in the vita application's editor drops unexpectedly when editing text after the Android 15 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction during text editing but does not prevent full device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a third-party app defect and requires input from the app owner; no countermeasure can be implemented by Samsung.

rows.Title: Delay to turn on aeroplane mode
rows.Problem: It takes too much time to turn on aeroplane mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The device takes an excessive amount of time to activate airplane mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The delay significantly impacts user experience and system responsiveness, making a core function unusable.

rows.Title: Samsung Pass error
rows.Problem: Samsung Pass passkey401 error log file
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Pass fails to register due to incorrect PPP value initialization during KnoxMatrix EscrowVault service interaction.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents proper authentication setup, making the feature unusable during registration.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: PPP value overwritten with 0 during registration; Countermeasure: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to Uninstall App from Device
rows.Problem: This app cannot be uninstalled and shows pop-up when performing settings actions, preventing normal use.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot uninstall a detected app, and it interferes with device settings functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The app prevents normal device operation by blocking settings actions and persisting despite attempts to remove it.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Phone application is not responding
rows.Problem: Phone application is not responding, contacts is not sync
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone application is not responding and contacts are not syncing.
rows.Severity Reason: The application failure prevents normal operation and contact synchronization, making the device unusable for key functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Contacts Database size is too big to handle. We don't have any clue why it becomes so big. To recover from Phone inactivity, user can delete this abnormal db with below process. Settings - Apps - "Contacts Storage"(should be enable "Show system apps") - Clear data. But user should keep in mind that this will clear all the previously saved contacts.

rows.Title: Unable to connect smart tag to galaxy s25 ultra due to software glitch in smart things app
rows.Problem: Connection screen is frozen in smart things app and connect button cannot be pressed during setup
rows.Summarized Problem: The smart tag connection screen freezes in the Smart Things app, preventing user from completing setup.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents completion of a key setup function but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is intermittent as reported by users.

rows.Title: Unable to join BETA ONE UI8
rows.Problem: getting an error while joining beta
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot join the beta version of ONE UI8 due to an error when attempting to enroll.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents beta enrollment but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Document closed suddenly showing file corrupted
rows.Problem: Samsung Notes app crashed while in a document, file showed as corrupted and cannot be reopened, not found in recycle bin
rows.Summarized Problem: A document in Samsung Notes closed unexpectedly and became corrupted, preventing re-opening and recovery.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashed during document editing, leading to data loss and file corruption, making the document unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The app crashed when saving a note, resulting in improper data storage and file corruption; no root cause found in logs.

rows.Title: App icons not visible after applying glass effect
rows.Problem: After applying glass effect from Theme Park, some app icons are not visible
rows.Summarized Problem: App icons become invisible after applying glass effect in Theme Park theme.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility of app icons, which is a partial malfunction of UI functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: When using glass or gradient effects, a shape must be selected for icon rendering; users need to select a shape, and a toast message is shown when shape is not selected. In future versions, the system will automatically select a shape to prevent this issue.

rows.Title: Screen getting pixelated while rotating
rows.Problem: screen getting pixelated while rotating
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen becomes pixelated when rotating the device while using the Battleground Gaming App.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visual distortion during rotation, making the screen unusable in gaming scenarios, leading to a degraded user experience and potential device malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Battleground app pop-up view screen broken, DpAsyncBlitStream:: unsupport the compress format. Counter Measure: Same as cause.

rows.Title: Internet stops working after a few minutes
rows.Problem: The device connects to Jio 5G SA network but internet stops working after a few minutes unless Airplane Mode or mobile data is toggled. LTE works perfectly. The APN settings are correct and VoNR is enabled. This appears to be a compatibility or software bug.
rows.Summarized Problem: Internet stops working after a few minutes on 5G network, requiring Airplane Mode or mobile data toggle to restore.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent network failure, affecting connectivity but not causing device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Jitter & Framedrop appears while recording video
rows.Problem: There is a sample video attached. Look how jittery the video is, so much frame drops, i feel embarrassed to say this video is coming from a so called flagship
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recording suffers from significant jitter and frame drops during use.
rows.Severity Reason: The video recording experience is severely degraded, leading to unwatchable footage and a major malfunction of a core camera function.
rows.R&D Comment: The user might be experiencing framedrop due to high device temperature, low battery, or memory crunch. Request user to clear cache and memory to optimize CPU performance; also handle high memory scenarios.

rows.Title: device does not properly differentiate between two SIMs
rows.Problem: device does not properly differentiate between the two SIMs when receiving messages or notifications despite different ringtones being set for each SIM
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to correctly identify which SIM is associated with incoming messages, leading to incorrect notification sound playback.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user experience by causing incorrect notification sounds, but does not result in device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Battery percentage drops when phone is powered off and charged
rows.Problem: Phone shows a lower battery percentage when charged after being powered off, with differences up to 15% on hot days, sometimes showing a 5% difference.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone displays a significantly lower battery percentage after being powered off and recharged, with differences reaching up to 15% on hot days.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery percentage inconsistency is significant and may indicate a malfunction in battery reporting or health, leading to user confusion and potential misjudgment of device charge status.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery dumps are not present and Dumpstate logs seem corrupted. Battery cycle (1199) is too high. Recommend battery replacement from Samsung service center. Capture logs and battery dumps if issue recurs.

rows.Title: Sluggish Observe
rows.Problem: Decline in touchscreen responsiveness and appearance of horizontal white lines on the display screen.
rows.Summarized Problem: The touchscreen responsiveness is sluggish and horizontal white lines appear on the display screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of touchscreen responsiveness and display anomalies, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Auto brightness not working properly
rows.Problem: Auto brightness is too bright in a dark room and does not match the user's set level. There is an issue with the magnetic and brightness sensors during diagnostic testing.
rows.Summarized Problem: Auto brightness is excessively bright in dark environments and fails to match user-set levels due to sensor issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The function is partially malfunctioning and does not operate as intended in specific conditions, but does not cause device unusability or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: There are no relevant light sensor logs available for analysis. If the problem continues after restarting the device, we recommend visiting a service center for further inspection and assistance.

rows.Title: navigation bar not opening when horizontal
rows.Problem: tab's navigation bar is not opening when it is placed horizontal
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar does not open when the device is in horizontal orientation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the navigation bar in specific orientations, but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue will be fixed in OneUI 8.0. Settings > Display > Taskbar off and on will resolve it temporarily before the software update.

rows.Title: Finance tab not processing messages and display transactions
rows.Problem: Finance tab in Messages app is no longer processing messages and displaying transactions; Useful cards section shows empty Finance tab.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Finance tab in the Messages app is no longer processing banking transaction messages and displaying them in the Useful cards section.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working as intended but does not cause device crash or data loss, only partial functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Due to Message recipient ID has been changed due to TRAI guideline, issue has occurred. We have fixed this issue and applied in ONEUI 8.0.

rows.Title: Phone number not associated with Samsung account
rows.Problem: Phone number isn't associated with a Samsung account. When trying to invite a person from contacts, the system shows no invitation history or details, even though the number is registered in the account section. Checked on website and settings. Only 'Find' and 'Auto hotspot' are visible. Device is up to date. Both users use Samsung devices. No device issues reported.
rows.Summarized Problem: A phone number is not recognized or linked to a Samsung account, preventing successful invitation from contacts.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to invite users due to missing account registration, but the core functionality (inviting contacts) is still partially available.
rows.R&D Comment: The error occurs when the invitee's number is not registered as a service number. Users should verify service number registration and provide logs after attempting an invitation if the issue persists.

rows.Title: Fingerprint not working
rows.Problem: Fingerprint not working after the latest OTA update
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint authentication is not working after the latest OTA update.
rows.Severity Reason: The fingerprint function is partially non-functional, but the device remains usable and does not crash or lose data.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No match due to static pattern ratio; Countermeasure: User must provide matched video and log for analysis.

rows.Title: One UI Home keeps crashing or becomes unresponsive
rows.Problem: One UI Home keeps crashing or becomes unresponsive, especially after closing apps. The device often lags or freezes, making it impossible to restart or power off until it responds again.
rows.Summarized Problem: One UI Home crashes or becomes unresponsive, especially after closing apps, causing device to freeze and making restart or power off impossible.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes and causes device to freeze, making it impossible to restart or power off, rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Unable to use generative edit option
rows.Problem: Unable to use generative edit option in s24 ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot use the generative edit feature in the Gallery app on the S24 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not available, but the core functionality is not fully broken or causing device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: During server verification, no requests were forwarded from the device. If you use a cloud solution, your network must be operating normally. Please check if the network environment is normal.

rows.Title: Google Maps app is crashing frequently
rows.Problem: Google Maps app is crashing frequently when I tap on the app, it exits to the home screen. Clearing cache, data, and uninstalling updates have been tried but failed. A video attachment is included.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Google Maps app crashes frequently when opened, causing the device to exit to the home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on launch, making navigation impossible and disrupting core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a problem from app side; app developer needs to fix it. Samsung cannot modify the app code.

rows.Title: Can't install instagram
rows.Problem: Unable to restore Instagram app after archiving; multiple attempts failed with error message during installation.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot restore or install the Instagram app after archiving, with repeated installation errors.
rows.Severity Reason: The app restoration failure prevents users from using a major social media feature, rendering functionality unavailable.
rows.R&D Comment: Attached screenshot and logs are not in sync. Please attach new logs and video in sync.

rows.Title: Unable to go back from app menu to homepage in landscape
rows.Problem: Cannot go back from app menu to homepage in landscape without clicking back button
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot navigate back from the app menu to the homepage in landscape mode without manually pressing the back button.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in navigation, preventing smooth user flow but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Notification panel not opening
rows.Problem: Notification panel is not opening while using any app. Neither is split screen feature working.
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel fails to open when using any app, and the split screen feature is also non-functional.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification panel is a core system feature required for device usability, and its failure prevents users from accessing app notifications or using split screen, which is a primary interaction pattern.

rows.Title: Battery percentage indicator in status bar freezes at a random value
rows.Problem: The battery percentage indicator in status bar freezes at a random value. While third party apps can read battery info, settings shows correct battery info. When this happens, the quick start module's indicator icons do not update on status bar, and there is no response to plugging in the charger, though charging is confirmed in settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: The battery percentage indicator in the status bar freezes at a random value and does not update, even though the actual battery level is correctly reported in settings and other apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the display of battery level in a key UI element but does not cause device crash or data loss, and functionality remains partially available.

rows.Title: Smartthings app freezing when connecting to TV
rows.Problem: Smartthings app freezes and only some functions work randomly when connecting to TV. Reinstalled app, restarted phone, remapped TV, but issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: The SmartThings app freezes and fails to function properly when connected to a TV, with only random functions working.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to function during TV connection, rendering key features unusable and preventing user interaction with smart devices.

rows.Title: Supplementary services not working
rows.Problem: Supplementary services like call forwarding and call waiting are not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Supplementary services such as call forwarding and call waiting are not functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot use essential call features, rendering basic communication functions unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a server issue; there is no response to DNS queries. Please check with LTE network or operator.

rows.Title: Call quality is very bad
rows.Problem: Call quality is very bad through ordinary calls. Only able to hear receiver voice through WhatsApp voice call. Either receiver or mine voice is not clear in ordinary calls.
rows.Summarized Problem: Call quality is poor during ordinary voice calls, with only one party's voice being heard and voice clarity issues.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot clearly hear voices during calls, making communication ineffective and potentially leading to misunderstandings or failure to connect.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Network conditions at user location result in high BLER and fluctuating 5G connectivity. Countermeasure: User should contact customer care for device check and log collection.

rows.Title: frequent over heating during normal usage
rows.Problem: frequent over heating issues and lag on s23fe after ui 7 it reaches upto 46 to 47 on general use only
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung S23FE experiences frequent overheating and lag during normal usage after UI 7 update, with surface temperature reaching up to 46-47 degrees.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating during normal usage can lead to device instability, performance degradation, and potential hardware damage, making the device unusable under typical conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: The overheating occurs when the device is exposed to direct sunlight, with surface temperature increasing linearly with battery temperature, while current consumption remains low; the issue is linked to high ambient temperature and fast charging, and is exacerbated by weak network connectivity.

rows.Title: UI System Not Optimizing
rows.Problem: Error occurs while switching apps from recent apps, device becomes non-functional and requires restart
rows.Summarized Problem: The UI system fails to optimize during app switching, causing device to become non-functional and requiring a restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes non-functional during normal usage, rendering it unusable until restart, which is a critical system-level failure.

rows.Title: Whatsapp call immediately goes silent
rows.Problem: A WhatsApp call immediately goes silent without any user intervention, while normal voice calls ring properly with notification.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp calls abruptly go silent during use without any user action.
rows.Severity Reason: The call functionality is completely broken, making it unusable for users.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by Truecaller hanging the ringer mode; users should remove Truecaller and test the issue.

rows.Title: camera app is very laggy
rows.Problem: The camera app is very laggy after the recent update, with a 3-second delay between switching to video mode or switching lens. The quick panel in the lock screen is very buggy with the clock.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera app experiences significant lag after the recent update, with delays when switching between video mode and lens.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag severely impacts core functionality and user experience, making the camera app unusable in real-time operations.

rows.Title: Unknown Apk silently installs and disappears
rows.Problem: An unknown APK file named prepost_20240108085019742.apk keeps getting automatically downloaded and installed on the device via Download Manager without user permission or manual action.
rows.Summarized Problem: An unknown APK installs automatically on the device without user consent and then disappears after installation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves unauthorized app installation, which can lead to potential malware infection and loss of device control, making the device potentially unsafe to use.

rows.Title: Camera is taking time to save the video
rows.Problem: Camera is taking time to save the video
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera app takes a long time to save videos.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a delay in video saving, which affects user experience but does not cause device crash or complete failure.

rows.Title: Image Quality Issue After Processing
rows.Problem: Photos are being processed to HDR even when auto HDR is turned off, resulting in loss of image details.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos are processed to HDR even when auto HDR is disabled, causing loss of image details.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where the camera fails to respect user settings, leading to unintended image processing.
rows.R&D Comment: Auto HDR is designed to recover details in bright areas; manual settings may not yield optimal results due to lack of optimization for user-defined parameters. Recommendation: users should use auto settings for best image quality.

rows.Title: Camera is not working
rows.Problem: Camera is not working on Samsung camera app, both front and back cameras. Works on third-party apps like Open Camera and WhatsApp. Error occurs after a few seconds of opening the app.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung camera app fails to function properly, showing an error after a few seconds, while third-party camera apps work normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to function in the primary app, but works in third-party apps, indicating a partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.

rows.Title: Apps Not Optimised for Latest Version of Android
rows.Problem: Apps on my device freeze after updating to the latest software and latest apps of Samsung, indicating a lack of actual Samsung app updates for the A34 model.
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps freeze after Android update due to lack of optimization during system upgrade.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of app functionality after update, but does not cause device unavailability or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: During the Android software upgrade, app optimization tasks (such as re-creating Dalvik/ART caches and AOT) are performed to ensure compatibility and only occur during the upgrade; these tasks do not happen afterward, leading to app freezes post-update.

rows.Title: DigiLocker Activation Not Working in Samsung Wallet App
rows.Problem: DigiLocker activation in Samsung Wallet redirects to a 404 error page instead of opening the DigiLocker login or registration page, preventing users from linking or using DigiLocker.
rows.Summarized Problem: DigiLocker activation in Samsung Wallet fails due to a 40
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to complete a core functionality (linking DigiLocker) required for app use, leading to complete failure of a key feature.
rows.R&D Comment: The correct URL has been updated on the server after checking with digilocker team, so that the linking aadhaar step will not fail.

rows.Title: Empty icon is showing
rows.Problem: Empty icon is showing
rows.Summarized Problem: An empty icon is displayed in the idle/no action state.
rows.Severity Reason: It is a cosmetic UI issue that does not affect device usability or functionality.

rows.Title: Outlook watch face missing on Watch 7
rows.Problem: Outlook watch face is missing from the Watch 7 after the recent OS update
rows.Summarized Problem: The Outlook watch face is missing after the recent OS update on the Watch 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The watch face is missing, which is a partial functionality issue affecting user experience but does not cause device unavailability or crash.

rows.Title: Video not play properly in device
rows.Problem: Video buffering or not playing in apps like educational, social media, or YouTube; only sound plays, no video; green line appears; video downloads have only sound, no video
rows.Summarized Problem: Videos fail to play in apps and downloads, with only sound and green lines appearing, indicating a video playback failure.
rows.Severity Reason: Video playback failure across multiple apps and downloads renders content inaccessible, making the device unusable for core media consumption.

rows.Title: Skin looks very redish in captured image
rows.Problem: Skin appears very redish and camera quality is very bad compared to 50 MP, video quality is also very bad
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera captures skin tones as overly red, resulting in unnatural and unappealing images.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and is limited to image rendering.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Color tuning makes skin appear overly red; Countermeasure: Same as cause, no change proposed.

rows.Title: Bixby not working
rows.Problem: Please find the attached video and suggest for the same. Thanks
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby is not functioning properly.
rows.Severity Reason: Bixby is a major feature that is not working, rendering a key functionality unavailable.

rows.Title: ChatGPT not log in
rows.Problem: Unable to log in to ChatGPT through login option or Google sign-in; shows error about Google Store update when it is already updated; authentication with OpenAI shows error. User needs access urgently for final exams.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot log in to ChatGPT due to authentication errors despite having updated Google Store.
rows.Severity Reason: User is unable to access a critical tool for academic studies, resulting in immediate functional disruption.

rows.Title: Voice clarity during call
rows.Problem: Voice is distorted during calls, despite increased volume. The issue is about clarity, not loudness.
rows.Summarized Problem: Voice is distorted during calls, affecting clarity and communication quality.
rows.Severity Reason: Distorted voice during calls makes communication difficult and undermines core functionality of voice calls.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no log related to voice call. Please get the log as soon as the problem is reproduced.

rows.Title: Wifi not Working
rows.Problem: Wifi not Working
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi is not functioning on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the WiFi connection, which may intermittently fail or require device reset, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The relevant log has already passed, making accurate analysis difficult. If this issue happened after rebooting the device, please visit customer center to check the device.

rows.Title: camera not working in any app
rows.Problem: phone camera not working in any app, screen stays black with message 'security policy prevents use of camera', despite clearing cache, restarting, checking permissions, and updating software
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone's camera fails to function in any app, showing a black screen and a security policy error message despite user troubleshooting.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera is completely non-functional across all apps, preventing basic device usage and user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: Hardware failure indicated by I2C and sensor logs; device requires service center evaluation.

rows.Title: Chat translation language pop up
rows.Problem: When trying to chat, a pop-up appears asking to download a language pack for chat translation. The system incorrectly detects the input language and suggests a different one, even when the user is not typing in that language. After downloading, it may prompt for another language pack. This occurs across all chat apps and is not app-specific.
rows.Summarized Problem: The chat translation feature incorrectly detects input language and prompts users to download unnecessary language packs.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent language detection errors but does not prevent core chat functionality or cause device instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Chat translation misjudges input language, leading to incorrect language pack suggestions; requires input text analysis to identify root cause and improve language detection logic.

rows.Title: can't access my secure folder
rows.Problem: Unable to access secure folder after system update; authentication switched from pattern to PIN without user awareness; device asks for PIN instead of pattern; no response when entering PIN; no error message; no Samsung account linked; persistent notification remains after deletion request.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access their secure folder after a system update because authentication has been changed from pattern to PIN without notification, and no error message is displayed when entering the wrong PIN.
rows.Severity Reason: The user is unable to authenticate or access a core security feature, which compromises device usability and data protection.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs due to a silent change in authentication method from pattern to PIN; users may have enabled AutoConfirmPin during setup, and without a Samsung account, password recovery is not possible.

rows.Title: Excessive heat during WhatsApp video call
rows.Problem: Device experiences excessive heat reaching approximately 43°C during WhatsApp video call, continuing to rise and leading to throttling.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats during WhatsApp video calls, reaching up to 43°C and causing throttling.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating occurs during video calls, affecting performance but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The logs indicate that temperature rise is due to continuous video call activity, multi-window mode, weak network, and fast charging; thermal management system is functioning effectively.

rows.Title: Device getting overheat while playing game
rows.Problem: Device temperature reaches 43 degrees Celsius during 10 minutes of gameplay, especially in heavy gaming scenarios like jp.konami.pesam, which uses high CPU. This is within expected specifications for gaming, but user finds it uncomfortable. Suggested solution: adjust game booster settings to battery saving mode.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats during gameplay, reaching 43°C in a 10-minute session, which is within expected gaming limits but causes user discomfort.
rows.Severity Reason: Overheating occurs during heavy gaming, but is within expected temperature range for such use cases and does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Device temperature reaches 43°C during gaming, which is within expected specifications for high CPU usage; user can mitigate by using battery saving mode in game booster settings.

rows.Title: Camera not working warning is showing up everytime
rows.Problem: Camera not working warning is showing up every time I open the camera. Problem persists despite trying all steps. Unable to see Google Play update from 1st August, only sees from 1st July.
rows.Summarized Problem: A warning message appears every time the camera is opened, indicating the camera is not working.
rows.Severity Reason: The warning message prevents the user from using the camera function, making it unusable in practice.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue was caused by ultra wide camera sensor I2C error. If the problem persists after reboot, customers should be guided to visit a service center for hardware inspection.

rows.Title: Notification panel and lock screen wallpaper overlap
rows.Problem: Notification panel and lock screen wallpaper transition issue on Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra with One UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel and lock screen wallpaper overlap during transition on Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra with One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual presentation but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The One UI 7 update has introduced bugs in home screen transitions, affecting notification panel and lock screen wallpaper overlap.

rows.Title: main camera is not working
rows.Problem: main camera is not working and network issue in s21 ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: The main camera is not functioning on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The main camera is completely non-functional, preventing basic device usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Log failed: pin conflict in pinctrl; module image processing not working; suspect H/W issue. Please check camera module at SS center.

rows.Title: Reminder repeated alert setting is lost during sync
rows.Problem: Reminder repeated alert setting is lost during sync. Frequency: happens always. Logs, photos/videos: NOT actually necessary, as it can be reproduced 100% of the times. Steps to reproduce: 1. Have 2 devices on One UI 7, with sync on (same account) in the Reminder app. 2. Create a repeated reminder on Device 1. Set it to repeat yearly on a date, say August 1. Tap "Select months to repeat on the 1st day", and select a few more months, say October, November. Thus this created reminder is set to
rows.Summarized Problem: The repeated alert setting in the Reminder app is lost during device sync.
rows.Severity Reason: The setting is completely lost during sync, leading to user data loss and incorrect reminder configuration, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The Recurrence type that user tried has been forcibly modified to repeat annually. (while uploading) Fixed Reminder sync logic.

rows.Title: My Galaxy Login Not Possible
rows.Problem: My Galaxy app shows 'log in not possible on this device' when trying to register for Samsung Care Plus. Handwriting help feature in Samsung Note app is not fully functional and three options are permanently disabled.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot log in to the My Galaxy app on Wi-Fi tablets, and the handwriting help feature in the Samsung Note app is non-functional.
rows.Severity Reason: The login failure prevents access to Samsung Care Plus, and the non-functional handwriting feature impacts core usability of the Note app on tablets.

rows.Title: Screen Recorder Missing
rows.Problem: Screen recorder not found after UI 7.0 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Screen recorder feature is missing after UI 7.0 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not available post-update, but the device remains usable and no critical functions are impaired.

rows.Title: Image thumbnails not appear in Recycle bin
rows.Problem: Cannot see image thumbnails in Recycle bin
rows.Summarized Problem: Image thumbnails do not appear in the Recycle bin section of the Gallery.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where thumbnails are missing, but the core functionality of viewing deleted images remains available.

rows.Title: Google Play not updated
rows.Problem: Google Play not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Play Store is not working on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is not functioning, preventing users from accessing essential apps and services.

rows.Title: Device getting restart and freeze
rows.Problem: device facing restart and freeze
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently restarts and freezes, causing system instability.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts and freezes, making it unusable and indicating a major system malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Random crashes due to hardware instability. Countermeasure: Recommend customer service center inspection and possible main PCB replacement.

rows.Title: Voice getting break and getting stuck during video calls
