rows.Problem: Voice getting break and getting stuck during video calls in Google Meet, WhatsApp, and other video calling apps. Issue persists even with software update, network reset, factory reset, and Wi-Fi. No SIM issue detected.
rows.Summarized Problem: Voice breaks and gets stuck during video calls across multiple apps including Google Meet and WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality during calls but does not completely disable the call or cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: User delay in log extraction prevents accurate root cause identification; users must capture logs immediately after issue occurs.

rows.Title: wifi continuously disconnecting
rows.Problem: wifi continuously disconnecting
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi connection is continuously disconnecting.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain a stable WiFi connection, leading to intermittent loss of network access, which renders the device unusable for online functions.

rows.Title: Clock not adjustable on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: When trying to change the clock on the lock screen, it automatically moves up and does not respond to downward input. The issue occurs consistently and sometimes causes the app to crash. Restarting the phone does not resolve it.
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen does not respond to user input and moves automatically when clicked, preventing users from adjusting it.
rows.Severity Reason: The clock cannot be adjusted, making it impossible for users to customize the lock screen time, which is a core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to the Adaptive Lock Screen Clock feature in One UI 8, which fails to function correctly on Galaxy S25 Ultra and is not responding to user input as intended.

rows.Title: Google Sign-In doesn't work in any app
rows.Problem: Google Sign-In doesn't work in any app; the login screen appears but tapping account or scrolling doesn't work. This issue started after updating UI7. Sign-in with Facebook works, but Google login fails across multiple apps including Wattpad.
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Sign-In is non-functional across multiple apps after a UI update, with login screen appearing but no interaction possible.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot use apps due to complete failure of a core authentication feature, rendering device functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: GMS log shows missing @GmsCoreVeId annotation in AccountPickerActivity. Countermeasure: Request CP silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Battery drains faster
rows.Problem: Phone experiences significant battery drain despite minimal usage, with background apps consuming power. Battery usage logs show high background activity from apps like Google Play Services, Windows Intune, and Samsung AirCommand.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone drains battery much faster than before due to background activity from multiple apps.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is severe and occurs during minimal usage, making the device unusable without charging.
rows.R&D Comment: Background apps like Google Play Services, Windows Intune, and Samsung AirCommand are consuming power; mitigation requires app-level background activity control.

rows.Title: Knox Matrix security status not showing
rows.Problem: Knox matrix isn't showing any security status and keeps processing every time when checked
rows.Summarized Problem: The Knox Matrix fails to display security status and continuously processes when checked.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot show security status, which is essential for users to know if their device is protected, making it unusable for security awareness.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue occurs due to failure in retrieving device security information from the server. The loading screen has been removed and replaced with a message indicating device status when data retrieval fails. This fix will be delivered via app update.

rows.Title: Recent apps screen app overlap
rows.Problem: In the recent apps screen, the same app appears twice or app thumbnails overlap
rows.Summarized Problem: App thumbnails overlap or duplicate in the recent apps screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visual confusion but does not prevent device usage or crash.

rows.Title: Device is getting Jitter & lag when Playing 60FPS video and Instagram app
rows.Problem: Samsung Galaxy A15 5G is having jitteriness and lag feeling, and even when playing 60FPS video and instagram it is still at 45FPS. If the refresh rate of that mobile is 60Hz, I will make it equal. I want to make it equal to 90Hz. Please update the software in the next update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences lag and jitter during 60FPS video playback and Instagram use, resulting in lower-than-expected refresh rate performance.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain a smooth 60Hz refresh rate during video playback and app usage, leading to a poor user experience and potential usability issues in high-performance scenarios.

rows.Title: Tab is not getting scan and connect to 5HZ Wifi automatically
rows.Problem: The device does not connect to 5 GHz Wi-Fi automatically and switches to 2.4 GHz every time, despite the router having band steering enabled.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to connect to 5 GHz Wi-Fi automatically and defaults to 2.4 GHz despite router band steering.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in Wi-Fi connectivity under specific conditions, but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The 5GHz bssid for SSID "Archer" network is getting filtered out due to low signal strength. Please keep the device nearby to the Wi-Fi AP.

rows.Title: DND Settings Details Section Unresponsive
rows.Problem: When trying to open the Details section under DND settings, the device becomes unresponsive and gets stuck. Additionally, no incoming calls come through even when 'allow all incoming calls' is enabled, affecting usability.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device becomes unresponsive when attempting to access the Details section of the Do Not Disturb settings, and no calls come through despite enabling 'allow all incoming calls'.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive and fails to deliver calls, rendering a core functionality unusable and impacting user experience significantly.
rows.R&D Comment: Users report DND mode unresponsiveness and call blocking despite allowing all calls; the issue appears to be related to lost permissions for calls and messages to bypass DND.

rows.Title: Camera lagging and getting stuck during interchange from rear to front camera
rows.Problem: Camera lagging and getting stuck during interchange from rear to front camera, proof screen recording
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera lags and gets stuck when switching from rear to front camera.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes significant lag and potential device unresponsiveness during camera switching, making the device unusable for video calls or quick photo capture.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Insufficient logs to find root cause. Countermeasure: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Long press notification menu overlaps
rows.Problem: Long press on notification causes menu overlap
rows.Summarized Problem: Long pressing a notification causes the menu panels to overlap incorrectly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects usability of the notification panel but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Share photo from gallery to Facebook nothing happened
rows.Problem: When selecting a photo from gallery and trying to share to Facebook, nothing happens and the gallery screen gets stuck. User can only go back, not redirected to Facebook.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot share photos from the gallery to Facebook; the screen gets stuck and does not redirect to Facebook after sharing.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to complete its intended action, but the device remains usable and no data is lost.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Internal Facebook app error in sharing flow. Countermeasure: Clear cache, update app, restart device; issue is temporary and app-based.

rows.Title: contact app shows updating contacts then closes
rows.Problem: contact app shows updating contacts then closes automatically and similar with call app. the app does not open after reset all settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: The contact app shows 'updating contacts' and then closes automatically, preventing users from accessing contacts or making calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes immediately after showing a loading message, making core functionality completely unavailable.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue occurs when upgrading from U OS to V OS due to large contact data volume; it has been fixed and is under verification, with a fix expected in September MR binary.

rows.Title: Mobile Hotspot Internet Speed Slow and Lags
rows.Problem: When connecting a laptop to the mobile hotspot, internet speed becomes very slow and lags continuously. The same hotspot works smoothly when connected to another mobile phone, indicating the issue is specific to laptop connections.
rows.Summarized Problem: Laptop connections to mobile hotspot experience severe lag and slow internet speed, while other devices connect smoothly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes significant performance degradation when using the hotspot on laptops, making internet access unusable despite working on other devices.
rows.R&D Comment: Please upload new dumpstate, silent, tcpdump, radio and modem logs from boot up.

rows.Title: Ethernet connection through lan converter RJ45 is not working
rows.Problem: Ethernet connection through lan converter RJ45 is not working on S23FE after July security update. Device does not detect Ethernet, though it works on other devices.
rows.Summarized Problem: Ethernet connection via RJ45 lan converter is not detected on S23FE after the July security update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents Ethernet connectivity on a specific device post-update, but does not cause full device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Device getting hot while using 5G
rows.Problem: Device gets super hot when using 5G for streaming, leading to frequent WiFi connection loss, causing user to switch to 5G regularly
rows.Summarized Problem: Device overheats when using 5G for streaming, causing frequent WiFi disconnections and user switching to 5G.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheating during 5G usage leads to instability and loss of connectivity, making the device unusable under normal usage conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Read caller name aloud functionality not working
rows.Problem: Read caller name aloud functionality not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The feature to read caller name aloud is not functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: The functionality is completely missing, preventing users from hearing caller names during calls, which is a core feature of call interaction.

rows.Title: Device getting hang
rows.Problem: Cx facing hanging issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing hanging, causing system performance degradation.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is hanging, which renders it unusable and indicates a major system-level performance failure.

rows.Title: Option showing disable in wearable app
rows.Problem: Some options not working in wearable application
rows.Summarized Problem: Certain options are not working in the wearable application when disconnected.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects some functions but not all, preventing full operation while allowing partial functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to the design of Buds Manager during disconnection; no countermeasure is provided.

rows.Title: Excessive background noise during Bluetooth calls
rows.Problem: Excessive background noise during Bluetooth calls on Galaxy S24 Ultra with One UI 7.0; noise suppression is significantly weaker than on older devices, affecting call clarity. Issue occurs on SIM calls (VoLTE/Wi-Fi Calling ON), and is consistent with OnePlus Buds Pro 3 and Galaxy Buds. Same earbuds work fine on iPhone and Galaxy S22.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth calls on Galaxy S24 Ultra exhibit excessive background noise due to inadequate noise suppression, especially on VoLTE/Wi-Fi Calling.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects call clarity but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is consistent across specific devices and earbuds, indicating partial malfunction rather than full system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Inadequate noise suppression in Bluetooth call handling on Galaxy S24 Ultra. Countermeasure: Request CP silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Device restart
rows.Problem: device facing restart issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing unexpected restarts.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarting indicates a system-level instability that could lead to data loss or device unavailability.

rows.Title: camera video stabilization not working
rows.Problem: Ultra Wide camera video stabilization is not working properly on Galaxy A55 after latest update, causing video to appear very shaky in 1080p 30fps mode, significantly affecting usability
rows.Summarized Problem: Video stabilization in the Ultra Wide camera on Galaxy A5
rows.Severity Reason: The video becomes significantly shaky, impairing usability and quality of recorded content, making it unusable for stable video capture.

rows.Title: unable to create work profile in intune application
rows.Problem: unable to create work profile in intune application
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot create a work profile in the Intune application.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature to create a work profile is completely unavailable on devices configured as Device Owner (DO), preventing secure work environment setup.
rows.R&D Comment: The device is configured as Device Owner (DO), which blocks work profile creation; users must contact IT or perform a factory reset to resolve.

rows.Title: Keyboard typing autocorrect error
rows.Problem: Autocorrect is messing up typing on Samsung keyboard, causing incorrect characters like doubling letters (e.g., hhello) when typing on Samsung Tab S10+.
rows.Summarized Problem: Autocorrect on Samsung keyboard incorrectly doubles characters during typing on Samsung Tab S10+.
rows.Severity Reason: The autocorrect malfunction causes incorrect text input, impairing usability but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: YouTube app causing device to get very hot
rows.Problem: Device getting very hot when using basic YouTube app
rows.Summarized Problem: Using the YouTube app causes the device to become very hot.
rows.Severity Reason: The device heats up during YouTube use, but heat generation is within normal levels under high-throughput conditions and ambient temperature factors.
rows.R&D Comment: The ambient temperature was above 30°C, causing the device's bottom temperature to rise to around 37°C during YouTube execution. A high-throughput scenario was used, resulting in a current consumption of approximately 400mA. Considering the ambient temperature, this is within normal heat generation levels. There were no instances where the overall heat generation in the logs was problematic.

rows.Title: WiFi not turning on
rows.Problem: WiFi fails to turn on and stays in off position until device is restarted. Issue occurs intermittently and persists after network settings reset. Problem started after last security update.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi fails to turn on intermittently and requires device restart to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent connectivity failure but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Wi-Fi vendor HAL fails to start. Countermeasure: Guide users to service center to check hardware Wi-Fi chipset.

rows.Title: Camera resolution is showing 12 8 12 MP but images are captured at 7 MP
rows.Problem: Camera is having 12 8 12 MP setup (S21 FE SD888) But every picture is of 7 MP in every mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera is advertised as having 12, 8, and 12 MP sensors, but all captured images are only 7 MP in resolution across all modes.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera's actual image output does not match its advertised sensor resolution, resulting in a partial malfunction of the imaging function.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue arises from a mismatch between sensor specifications and image output resolution; the system may be applying a downscaling factor or incorrect resolution mapping during image capture.

rows.Title: Waiting sound for normal call not played during dual WhatsApp call
rows.Problem: Cannot make normal voice calls while on a dual WhatsApp call. Waiting sound for normal calls does not play, causing missed calls.
rows.Summarized Problem: During a dual WhatsApp call, the waiting sound for normal voice calls does not play, leading to missed calls.
rows.Severity Reason: Users miss incoming calls due to lack of audible waiting sound, making the feature unusable in critical scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Active call and user handle mismatch prevents normal call initiation; solution involves terminating active call and improving handling of simultaneous multi-user calls.

rows.Title: USB controlled by option set to Connected device
rows.Problem: When connecting external USB C cable for charging, default "USB controlled by" option is set to "Connected device"
rows.Summarized Problem: The USB 'controlled by' option defaults to 'Connected device' when an external USB C cable is connected for charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a default behavior under specific usage conditions, but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The behavior is normal when a USB hub is connected; the display of 'Connected device' is intentional and supported.

rows.Title: Screen timeout not working properly
rows.Problem: Screen timeout is not working properly on Samsung A34; defaults to 5 minutes instead of 5 seconds, behaving like home screen timeout rather than lock screen timeout after UI 6.1 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen timeout on Samsung A34 is incorrectly set to 5 minutes instead of the default 5 seconds, causing the screen to stay on longer than intended after unlocking.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction of the lock screen behavior, but the device remains usable and does not crash or lose data.

rows.Title: Fastag balance not fetching in Samsung Wallet
rows.Problem: Fastag balance not showing after August update; always get error when fetching balance
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Wallet app fails to fetch Fastag balance, showing an error consistently after August update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working after an update, but does not completely disable device usage or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Battery performance has degraded after updation
rows.Problem: Battery performance has degraded after software update, with noticeable decrease in battery percentage and increased consumption. User reports higher battery usage despite 6000 mAh capacity and requests options to revert to previous software version.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery performance has degraded after software update, showing increased consumption and reduced runtime.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows significantly reduced battery life after update, indicating a major functional issue affecting core usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery discharge rate is normal when screen off, but screen-on discharge is high; possible software-induced inefficiency in power management.

rows.Title: Battery has dropped from 73% to 42% in 20 minutes
rows.Problem: The phone doesn't show which app is using battery during a rapid drop from 73% to 42% in 20 minutes, with no apps open except messenger. After the drop, the phone doesn't charge immediately when turned off. Battery drain occurs in different locations, and clearing cache did not resolve it.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences a rapid battery drop from 73% to 42% in 20 minutes with no visible app usage, and fails to charge properly after shutdown.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drain is rapid and occurs without app usage, leading to device unavailability and impaired functionality.

rows.Title: Back camera freezing during video call
rows.Problem: Back camera freezes when switched to back camera during video call, occurring daily in each call
rows.Summarized Problem: The back camera freezes when used during a video call.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera freezes during a critical function (video call), making the device unusable for communication.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to WhatsApp enabling VDIS for video calls; updating WhatsApp resolves it.

rows.Title: unable to read CGM sensor data and also not able to add my NFC enabled credit card
rows.Problem: NFC diagnostics shows normal, however I am not able to use NFC. Settings are enabled and I am unable to read CGM sensor data and also not able to add my NFC enabled credit card to samsung wallet by tapping. Looks to be some issue with NFC
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot read CGM sensor data and add NFC-enabled credit cards to Samsung Wallet, despite NFC settings being enabled and diagnostics showing normal.
rows.Severity Reason: NFC functionality is essential for core device operations like wallet access and health data integration, and failure prevents critical user interactions.
rows.R&D Comment: Any abnormal log is not found. We recommend that you have your hardware checked.

rows.Title: Grainy images and red skin tone on 50 mp camera mode
rows.Problem: Camera quality issues with grainy images, red skin tone, and lack of details in 50 mp mode, including indoor lighting and selfie camera
rows.Summarized Problem: The 50 MP camera produces grainy images, red skin tone, and lacks detail, especially under indoor lighting and in selfie mode.
rows.Severity Reason: Users experience significant visual degradation in photo quality, affecting core camera functionality and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue arises from noise reduction settings affecting sharpness; recommended solution is using Soft Photo Texture in Camera Assistant app.

rows.Title: Face system lag issue and restart
rows.Problem: Face system lags and restarts repeatedly, making the device unusable and freezing when opening single apps
rows.Summarized Problem: The face system lags and restarts repeatedly, causing the device to freeze when opening apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to repeated freezing and restarts when using the face system.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by UFS link layer errors, likely in hardware (AP or UFS component); the countermeasure is to guide users to visit customer service for hardware inspection.

rows.Title: Taskbar option not showing
rows.Problem: Taskbar option not showing
rows.Summarized Problem: The taskbar option is not visible to the user.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, preventing full visibility of a feature, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The main cause is unclear due to insufficient logs; the issue may be related to the 'Hide status and navigation bars' setting. A reset and device log capture are recommended to diagnose.

rows.Title: Phone app issue with settings
rows.Problem: Mobile sim data not showing. Galaxy Ai issue in settings app
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy AI feature is not working in the settings app, and mobile SIM data is not showing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a feature in the settings app, affecting data visibility but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Rear camera not working during WhatsApp video calls
rows.Problem: When switching to rear camera during WhatsApp video calls, the video feed shows only my name or black screen instead of the camera view. The rear camera works fine in WhatsApp status or other camera apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The rear camera fails to function during WhatsApp video calls, showing only a name or black screen instead of a live feed.
rows.Severity Reason: The rear camera fails to provide a live feed during video calls, rendering the feature unusable and preventing communication.
rows.R&D Comment: GMS log analysis indicates the issue is app-side and related to an outdated WhatsApp version; retesting with latest app version is recommended.

rows.Title: Samsung Health Data Not Restored
rows.Problem: Samsung Health data did not come back when switching from Galaxy A53 to Galaxy A21s; app started a new profile despite using the same Samsung account and having backed up data on the old phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Health data is not restored after phone switch, resulting in a new user profile being created.
rows.Severity Reason: The data is not restored, but the core functionality of the app remains accessible with a new profile, indicating partial malfunction.

rows.Title: Camera photos often come out underexposed or dark, especially indoors
rows.Problem: Camera facing quality issue and zooming issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera photos are frequently underexposed or dark, especially indoors.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial camera functionality (image quality) rather than complete failure or device instability.
rows.R&D Comment: The Quality optimization option is set to "Minimum" in Intelligent optimization menu of camera option. It may cause the image quality degradation. Please change this option to "Maximum" and try to capture again.

rows.Title: Wifi not working
rows.Problem: Wifi is not working after new version update. Screen has a green line in the center after update.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi fails to connect after software update, accompanied by a green line appearing on the screen.
rows.Severity Reason: WiFi failure prevents basic connectivity, making the device unusable for internet access.
rows.R&D Comment: PCIe link down has been failed with Wi-Fi and AP; customer should contact local service center for FPCB inspection.

rows.Title: Call and text on other device not working
rows.Problem: Call and text on other device does not work most of the time, works for some time then stops with error 'Can't make call. Make sure your phone is connected to a network and call and text is on both devices'
rows.Sub-Module: Call and text on other device
rows.Summarized Problem: Call and text functionality on other devices fails intermittently and stops working after a period of time.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature works intermittently and fails after a period, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete failure or device unusability.

rows.Title: Call barring and call forwarding failed message
rows.Problem: Call barring and call forwarding show failed to read check your network connection and try sometime later
rows.Summarized Problem: Call barring and call forwarding display a failed message indicating network connection issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The error message prevents users from using critical call features, leading to potential service disruption and user frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Always on display feature missing
rows.Problem: The Always on display feature is missing in my galaxy m36 model
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always on Display feature is missing on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is entirely absent, making a core display functionality unavailable.

rows.Title: Network is not stable
rows.Problem: After July update, 5G connectivity is unstable and device automatically switches to 4G, consuming 4G data daily. 5G is not working properly; 4G also fails intermittently. Device needs restart to regain network access. Other 5G devices in same location work fine.
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G connectivity is unstable and device frequently switches to 4G after July update, consuming data and requiring restart to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: Device fails to maintain 5G connection, leading to data consumption and intermittent loss of network access, making the device unusable for 5G users.
rows.R&D Comment: CP modem silent log is not present; logs required to analyze 5G connectivity failure and determine root cause.

rows.Title: Phone call and contact applications not working
rows.Problem: Phone call and contact applications not working, they show black screen. General use causes phone to overheat. 5G network use causes high heating. Applications hang after update. Suggestions: provide WiFi and hotspot simultaneously, show network data speed on top bar, provide daily data usage settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: After software update, phone call and contact apps fail to function and show black screens, with increased overheating during general use and 5G usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The apps are completely non-functional and users cannot perform basic operations like making calls or viewing contacts, rendering the device unusable for core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: High memory and CPU usage detected in core processes post-update. Counter Measure: Same as cause; ongoing monitoring of process load indicates instability in system services.

rows.Title: Portrait studio not working properly
rows.Problem: Photo editor cannot detect face, creates incorrect portraits, and generates images that are not similar to original pictures
rows.Summarized Problem: Portrait studio in photo editor fails to detect faces and generates incorrect, distorted portraits instead of realistic ones.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to perform basic functionality (face detection and accurate image generation), resulting in incorrect outputs that compromise user experience and expected outcomes.
rows.R&D Comment: Logging was dumped after 30 minutes of launching photo editor, so there is not enough log to find root cause. Request additional logs upon launching photo editor.

rows.Title: Videos not syncing to OneDrive
rows.Problem: Videos are not syncing to OneDrive after clicking Sync, with no error message. No sync activity has occurred for the past year despite multiple troubleshooting steps including clearing cache, relinking account, granting battery access, enabling video uploads, and ensuring sufficient storage space.
rows.Summarized Problem: Videos are not syncing to OneDrive despite user attempts to troubleshoot and enable all related settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable for file access and backup as critical media files fail to sync, impacting core functionality of data management.

rows.Title: notifications stay for long time on home screen
rows.Problem: phone notifications are lagging and stay on the screen for too long, making it hard to type as notifications hang over the keyboard
rows.Summarized Problem: Notifications remain on the home screen for too long, obstructing typing and causing user inconvenience.
rows.Severity Reason: Notifications hang over the keyboard, interfering with typing but do not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to disable unreachable call forwarding
rows.Problem: Call forwarding is enabled automatically on the phone without user input, a number (91569) is added without user action, network issues occur during calls (shifting from 5G to E), and users cannot disable call forwarding for unreachable numbers.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot disable automatic call forwarding for unreachable numbers, and an unknown number (91569) is added without user input.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to disable a critical call feature, leading to unexpected call routing and potential disruption of communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: 5G internet stopped working
rows.Problem: 5G shows connected but the internet stopped working while LTE works fine
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows 5G connection but internet access is not working, while LTE functions normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of 5G connectivity, where the network appears connected but internet is unavailable, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Settings not optimised for latest version popup
rows.Problem: System settings not closing and applications not visible on home screen after opening lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: System settings fail to close and applications are not visible after opening the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing applications after opening the lock screen, making the device unusable.

rows.Title: dot appear while loading when playing on YouTube
rows.Problem: dot appear while loading when playing on YouTube. The phone is not updating regularly and the Android Play system is not updating properly. The last update was in April, but the downloading is still working. The phone lags frequently.
rows.Summarized Problem: A dot appears during YouTube video loading, and the device experiences frequent lag and outdated system updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a visible UI element during playback and intermittent device lag, but does not cause complete device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Weather application showing wrong spelling
rows.Problem: Samsung weather application is showing wrong spelling of radhapuram as ramapuram instead of radhapuram
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Weather app incorrectly displays 'radhapuram' as 'ramapuram' in place name input.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in text display, affecting accuracy but not rendering the app unusable or causing crashes.

rows.Title: S Pen hangs
rows.Problem: S Pen hangs and causes splash during note taking, with lag in response time during writing
rows.Summarized Problem: The S Pen hangs and causes splash during note taking with noticeable lag in response time.
rows.Severity Reason: The S Pen hangs and causes splash during note taking, which directly impacts core functionality of note-taking and writing.

rows.Title: Galaxy Enhance-X application keep stopping
rows.Problem: Galaxy Enhance-X application keep stopping when trying to use it. Cleared cache and data, uninstalled and reinstalled, but problem persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy Enhance-X app crashes when used, even after clearing cache, data, and reinstalling.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to function during use, preventing user interaction with the feature.

rows.Title: Circle to Search
rows.Problem: Circle to search function not working; search results do not show and remain blank. A popup message appears stating 'something is stopped working' which persists every 5 minutes after closing.
rows.Summarized Problem: The circle-to-search feature fails to show search results and remains blank, with a persistent popup message indicating a system malfunction.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional, preventing user from performing a basic search action, and a recurring popup suggests system instability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Google Search app (com.google.android.googlequicksearchbox) has a bug in version 301575210; Counter Measure: Users should update Google app and perform cache clearing or restart device.

rows.Title: Camera captured blurry images
rows.Problem: Camera facing quality issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera captures blurry images when using digital zoom, due to image quality deterioration from upscaling.
rows.Severity Reason: Blurry images under digital zoom significantly degrade user experience and compromise image usability, making the camera functionally unreliable.
rows.R&D Comment: Digital zoom causes image quality deterioration due to upscaling; no effective countermeasure implemented.

rows.Title: Device take more than 10 seconds to fully go airplane mode
rows.Problem: When I click on airplane mode, it takes a while to fully go airplane mode. Same issue occurs when dialing a call, and it takes time to show screen with call details. Sometimes it takes more than 10 seconds to fully go airplane mode.
rows.Summarized Problem: Airplane mode takes more than 10 seconds to fully activate after being clicked.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a delay in functionality but does not cause device unavailability or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: drop in Night Mode quality
rows.Problem: Photos look softer with less detail, especially in low-light textures like walls, plants, or sky. Images appear warmer and less natural than before. Night Mode quality has dropped since updating to One UI 7, with no improvement in processing or tuning.
rows.Summarized Problem: Night Mode in the camera app has degraded in quality, showing softer images with reduced detail and unnatural color tones in low light.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a core camera feature, where image quality is inconsistent and degraded in low light, but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Image quality is expected under low-light conditions; users should take photos in brighter environments. No changes are needed on the solution side; maintain current status.

rows.Title: Notification shade stuck on home screen
rows.Problem: Notification shade stuck on home screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification shade remains stuck on the home screen, preventing normal interaction with the interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing the home screen interface, making the device unusable in normal operation.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi connect then 1 sim card disable automatically
rows.Problem: When Wi-Fi connect then 1 sim card disable automatically
rows.Summarized Problem: When Wi-Fi connects, one SIM card is automatically disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in SIM card functionality during Wi-Fi connection, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: watch faces not downloading
rows.Problem: watch faces not downloading
rows.Summarized Problem: Watch faces are not downloading on Galaxy Watch Active2.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing users from accessing watch faces, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Now bar not showing live sports scores on lock screen
rows.Problem: Now bar is not showing live sports scores on lock screen. I have send you a screenshot, and recently there is a cricket match is happening and I pin the live score but then also I'm not able to see this option in my lockscreen
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar does not display live sports scores on the lock screen, even when pinned during a cricket match.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a key context (live sports), preventing users from viewing real-time scores, but the lock screen remains otherwise functional.

rows.Title: Google Map Not opening
rows.Problem: Google map not opening
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Maps application fails to open.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to open, preventing users from using a core navigation and location service, making the device unusable for location-based functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Missing EGL_KHR_swap_buffers_with_damage extension; Countermeasure: Address EGL extension requirement in app compatibility layer.

rows.Title: AOD always goes back to horizontal clock style
rows.Problem: AOD always goes back to horizontal clock style, no matter what is set in the lockscreen.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always-On Display always resets to a horizontal clock style regardless of user settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user customization but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Lock Screen clock moves when quick access is opened
rows.Problem: Lock Screen clock moves when quick access is opened
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen moves when the quick access menu is opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI functionality but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to buy Font from Store
rows.Problem: The error changes every time I input password. After adding card, clicking download prompts memory verification, which fails even with correct password or one-time link. Server error prevents purchase.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot purchase fonts from the Galaxy Store due to repeated authentication errors and server-side price mismatch.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from completing a core transaction (font purchase) and fails consistently despite correct inputs, rendering functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The price of content (contentID: 000005453877) was revised to 54.39, but the minimum payment unit is 1, causing a mismatch during purchase.

rows.Title: Color gradients not rendering properly
rows.Problem: Color banding issue in rendering gradients, especially during call background
rows.Summarized Problem: Color gradients fail to render properly, resulting in visible color banding during call background.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual quality but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: We can't reproduce the issue at our devices; it may be a device-specific problem. User is advised to perform factory reset and reinstall firmware.

rows.Title: Google Map App crash
rows.Problem: Google Map App crashes again
rows.Summarized Problem: The Google Maps app crashes repeatedly when opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on launch, making it unusable for navigation and location services.

rows.Title: Battery Drainage
rows.Problem: Battery usage is high, causing significant drain on the S24 Ultra, especially when using OTG devices which consume a lot of power.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone experiences excessive battery drain, particularly when using OTG devices, leading to rapid power consumption.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery depletion, especially under normal usage with OTG, which impacts core functionality.

rows.Title: Home Battery Usage
rows.Problem: App uses more battery than other apps. How long to wait?
rows.Summarized Problem: The Home Screen interface is using more battery than other apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves battery consumption but does not result in device unusability or crash, and the problem is partial rather than complete.

rows.Title: Device keeps restarting automatically
rows.Problem: My Galaxy M31s keeps restarting automatically, at least 2-3 times a day. This happens even in Safe Mode. Battery and Power restart status shows Normal in diagnostics. Please check logs and confirm if it is a hardware issue (motherboard/battery). I would like to highlight that the motherboard was already replaced once after around 2 years of purchase. However, after a year of this replacement, the restarting issue has arrived. Please suggest and provide a permanent solution.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device repeatedly restarts automatically, even in Safe Mode, despite normal battery and power diagnostics.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is restarting multiple times daily, making it unusable and indicating a critical system failure.

rows.Title: Unable to download Beta version
rows.Problem: Unable to download Beta version. I have followed the steps. But still no luck.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot download the beta version of the software despite following the steps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial failure in the beta download functionality, preventing users from accessing the beta software, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The FOTA scenario was opened, allowing users to update beta software.

rows.Title: Empty Space show on App screen
rows.Problem: There is an empty space in app store where all apps will be there it just won't go. Here beside Meesho app there is no app but empty space
rows.Summarized Problem: An empty space appears in the app store section where apps should be displayed, creating a visual gap despite no apps being present.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects app store layout but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The problem seems to be solved by changing the app sorting method to direct setting and then back to alphabetical sorting.

rows.Title: Auto updating album features not working
rows.Problem: Phone shows no people found in auto updating album despite having 5000 photos with faces. Feature has not updated even after 3 months, despite new photos being added.
rows.Summarized Problem: The auto updating album feature fails to detect and update people in photos, showing 'no people found' despite having thousands of photos with faces.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work at all, preventing users from accessing content, but it does not cause device crash or data loss or render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Database may be corrupted or inconsistent after prolonged idle use; clearing related app data initiates fresh reanalysis.

rows.Title: Dynamic weather widget not present after device reset
rows.Problem: After factory data reset, the dynamic weather widget is missing. Tried clearing data and reinstalling/uninstalling the weather app, but issue persists. Screenshots show current widgets and absence of dynamic weather widget.
rows.Summarized Problem: The dynamic weather widget is missing after a factory data reset and cannot be restored through app reinstall or data clearing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a missing UI element that users expect to be present after a reset, but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: When checking the log and SW version, it is checked as VOS, and it is normal that the weather widget for VOS appears as attached photos "64450684_1" and "64450684_3". The situation where the previous dynamic widget came out is wrong. Thanks.

rows.Title: System Upload mode occurs while Using the device
rows.Problem: Screen goes black while using the device and system screens show
rows.Summarized Problem: The device displays a black screen during usage, with system screens showing instead of the intended interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes non-responsive during normal usage, preventing user interaction and rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera image quality low with blur and torn pixels
rows.Problem: Camera image quality is very low with blur and torn pixels around objects, even under good lighting. Night mode images are worse than promised.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces blurry and pixelated images with torn details, especially in good lighting and night mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera's image quality is severely degraded, undermining the device's primary feature and failing to meet promised performance.
rows.R&D Comment: Performance degradation in high-resolution images under indoor conditions is due to hardware limitations of the camera sensor and processing unit.

rows.Title: Google Assistant not switching to Gemini
rows.Problem: Google Assistant is not switching to Gemini; the watch reverts back to Google Assistant after a short time when attempting to switch to Gemini.
rows.Summarized Problem: The watch fails to retain the selection of Google Gemini as the default assistant and reverts to Google Assistant after a short time.
rows.Severity Reason: The assistant switch function does not work as intended, resulting in partial malfunction of the assistant selection feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera shakes abruptly while switching from 1x to 3x or from 5x to 3x in video mode
rows.Problem: Camera shakes abruptly while switching from 1x to 3x or from 5x to 3x in video mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera shakes abruptly when switching between 1x and 3x, or 5x and 3x, in video mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera shakes during critical mode transitions, which affects usability and stability of video recording.
rows.R&D Comment: The camera module's AF and OIS components are sensitive to electromagnetic fields; no operation logs or reproducible cases were found during testing, making accurate analysis difficult.

rows.Title: Phone became unresponsive
rows.Problem: Phone froze when taking a screenshot, same as previous occurrences. Restarted immediately. Issue occurred at 17:57:30 during screenshot action.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone froze when taking a screenshot and became unresponsive.
rows.Severity Reason: The phone became unresponsive during a critical user action (screenshot), leading to a device freeze that disrupts usability.
rows.R&D Comment: We analyzed each TG, but it is difficult to find the cause due to lack of log. If the problem occurs again, please upload the log. If the log is uploaded additionally, we will proceed with additional analysis.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains 11% overnight without any use, even with no network settings or background apps running, and continues to drop to 7% after initial observation.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device drains 11% of battery overnight without any usage or background apps, even with no network or apps active.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain occurs without any usage, leading to rapid depletion and potential device unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: Problem time user mentioned seems 8/22 23:59~ 8/23 09:06 but this log was got when 8:23 22:25 with much screen on usage. So, there was few log remains about this time. Please guide to user to get log right after standby time ends.

rows.Title: More options in camera app is not working
rows.Problem: The list of options isn't visible after the UI7 update. When clicking 'More' in the camera app, no options are displayed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'More' options in the camera app are not visible after the UI7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The user cannot access camera features after the update, making the functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Root cause: After Android 14 to 15 update, the 'More' tab in camera app loses options. Countermeasure: Add scaling and alpha animations on entry to the More page, and account for user settings that disable animations.

rows.Title: Wifi connection automatically disconnected
rows.Problem: Wifi connection automatically disconnected
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi connection disconnects automatically without user intervention.
rows.Severity Reason: The device disconnects from WiFi due to a deauthentication frame from the access point, indicating a critical network instability that can render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: AP sent deauthentication frame with reason code 2 (PREV_AUTH_NOT_VALID), indicating abnormal AP behavior. Counter Measure: Provide CP silent logs for further analysis.

rows.Title: Video playing on screen turns green and gets stuck
rows.Problem: Video playing on screen turns green and gets stuck. The video becomes green in colour while sound is heard, entire screen turns green. This occurs when playing videos in Chrome browser or on WhatsApp. No software fix provided despite sufficient memory and RAM.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback turns the screen green and gets stuck during playback in browser or WhatsApp, with sound but no visual content.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen turns entirely green, rendering the video unusable and potentially affecting user experience across apps, indicating a major display malfunction.

rows.Title: Quick Panel layout misaligned
rows.Problem: Quick settings changes layout
rows.Summarized Problem: The Quick Panel layout is misaligned and appears overlapping due to timing issues causing horizontal layout length to become zero.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in the layout appearance, affecting visual consistency but not rendering or device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Timing issues have caused the layout to appear overlapping as the horizontal length becomes zero; this has been fixed in OS update.

rows.Title: Writing style not working
rows.Problem: No change in text, AI features of spelling and grammar, Writing style not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The writing style feature in Samsung Smart Suggestions is not working and does not apply any changes to text.
rows.Severity Reason: The AI writing style feature fails to function, preventing users from customizing text output, which is a core feature of the AI suggestions system.

rows.Title: Auto shape cannot be erased in Notes
rows.Problem: In Samsung Notes, when auto shape is turned on, drawn shapes cannot be erased
rows.Summarized Problem: Drawn shapes in Samsung Notes cannot be erased when auto shape is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the eraser function, where shapes cannot be removed via eraser but can be deleted using selection tool.
rows.R&D Comment: Shape is not handwriting stroke. So you cannot remove it by eraser. It is normal operation. Choose the shape with selection tool and then choose "delete"

rows.Title: Phone freezes and restarting often
rows.Problem: Phone freezes and restarting often
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone frequently freezes and restarts, indicating a system-level instability.
rows.Severity Reason: The device repeatedly crashes and restarts, making it unusable and posing a risk of data loss or further hardware damage.
rows.R&D Comment: AP malfunction happened 405 times on this device. It might be caused by AP/DRAM/PCB issue on this device. This device should be inspected in HW perspective.

rows.Title: File picker not working
rows.Problem: System file picker is not working properly; when trying to attach a file in apps like ChatGPT, Gmail, Google Drive, or WhatsApp, the app crashes immediately or shows 'No file picker activity found'.
rows.Summarized Problem: The system file picker is not functioning and causes app crashes or error messages when attempting to attach files.
rows.Severity Reason: The file picker is essential for file attachment across multiple apps, and its failure leads to app crashes and complete inability to use file-attachment features.

rows.Title: Voice recording apps are not able to access microphone
rows.Problem: voice recording apps are not able to access microphone. Mic works fine in calls but not when recording
rows.Summarized Problem: Voice recording apps cannot access the microphone, even though the mic works during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot record voice, which is a core functionality for voice recording apps, rendering them unusable.

rows.Title: Error or glitch in the Theme Park app
rows.Problem: When choosing icon effects like Glass or Gradient, the app does not apply the effects properly. Apps such as Play Store, Airtel Thanks, and YONO SBI either don't show the effects or appear completely dark. Users need a proper Glass icon option and Dark Icon feature.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Theme Park app fails to apply Glass or Gradient icon effects when selected, resulting in missing or darkened app icons.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality of icon styling but does not cause device crash or complete failure of core operations.
rows.R&D Comment: When using glass or gradient effects, shape selection is required. A toast message currently alerts users to this requirement. In future versions, the system will automatically select a shape when effects are applied.

rows.Title: Device is not detecting or connecting to any 5G networks
rows.Problem: Device has network issue with 5G connectivity
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to detect or connect to any 5G networks.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot connect to 5G networks, which are essential for modern mobile communication, making the device unusable for high-speed data services.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: cover screen rotates automatically during video calls
rows.Problem: the cover screen rotates automatically during video calls even with orientation lock enabled in portrait mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The cover screen automatically rotates during video calls despite orientation lock being set to portrait mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconvenience during calls but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: The screen rotation behavior is handled by WhatsApp, and no framework-level handling exists for the Galaxy Fold; requires confirmation from WhatsApp app developers.

rows.Title: Error when making normal call on personal space
rows.Problem: Personal space call receives WhatsApp call in secure folder but shows error when trying to make normal outgoing call. Previous M33 handset did not show this error.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot make normal outgoing calls from personal space, despite being able to receive calls in secure folder.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents normal call functionality in personal space but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Network
rows.Problem: The mobile data speed is very low and the network does not work properly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile data speed is very low and network connectivity is not working properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The network fails to function properly, leading to no connectivity, which renders the device unusable for basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: OneUI 8 beta update not received after joining beta program
rows.Problem: User joined OneUI 8 beta program but received OneUI 7 August security patch instead of OneUI 8 beta update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users joining the OneUI 8 beta program are receiving OneUI 7 security patches instead of the intended OneUI 8 beta update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in the update delivery process, where beta users are not receiving the correct update, but the system remains functional.
rows.R&D Comment: Error between Members and FOTA servers caused user to be unregistered in GC_Beta1; servers should be synchronized to ensure correct update delivery.

rows.Title: Quick Share not working
rows.Problem: Quick Share functionality has inconsistent performance between devices, causing file transfers to fail when sharing between phone and tablet.
rows.Summarized Problem: File transfers fail when using Quick Share between devices, despite both being updated to latest software versions.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails intermittently but does not completely disable device functionality, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: It was not possible to find the cause of the issue from the attached logs. Please reproduce the problem and include log from both sender and receiver device.

rows.Title: Airplane mode takes time to fully activate
rows.Problem: Airplane mode takes time to fully activate
rows.Summarized Problem: Airplane mode takes a long time to fully activate.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a delay in functionality but does not cause device unavailability or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: WIFI button missing in Quick Panel
rows.Problem: WIFI is sometimes missing in control panels
rows.Summarized Problem: The WiFi button is intermittently missing in the Quick Panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a UI element, causing intermittent visibility of a key feature in the control panel.

rows.Title: eFootball does not open in full screen
rows.Problem: eFootball does not open in full screen after update, black bars appear with fullscreen toggle button, should start in fullscreen automatically
rows.Summarized Problem: eFootball fails to open in full screen after update, showing black bars and a fullscreen toggle button instead of starting in fullscreen automatically.
rows.Severity Reason: The game fails to start in fullscreen as intended, which is a partial malfunction affecting user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to remove added Fingerprint
rows.Problem: Unable to remove added Fingerprint thus not able to add or replace the fingerprints
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot remove an added fingerprint from settings, preventing them from adding or replacing fingerprints.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to remove fingerprints, which blocks the ability to add or replace them, making biometric setup inoperable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Failure in handling cancellation during consecutive authentication leads to improper fingerprint deletion. Countermeasure: Add defense code to prevent cancellation accumulation in Auth sequences and update B OS binary to resolve continuous authentication issues.

rows.Title: Display fps locked at 60 after connecting hdmi
rows.Problem: Display fps locked at 60 after connecting hdmi out. Not facing this issue with any other phone like oneplus and iphone. Please help me with solution with any app, software update, beta version etc.
rows.Summarized Problem: Display frame rate is locked at 60 FPS when HDMI is connected, causing performance lag.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of display performance under specific conditions, not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Birthday events removed after update
rows.Problem: Birthday events saved in the calendar app have been removed after a system update. Users cannot recover the data or share previous videos/images from before the update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Birthday events saved in the calendar app were deleted after a system update and cannot be recovered.
rows.Severity Reason: Users lose critical personal data, and the issue prevents access to saved events after update, making the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Check visibility of birthday events in 'My Calendar' and Google account settings; ensure synchronization of contact birthdays is properly maintained.

rows.Title: Device Getting Hang while playing Game
rows.Problem: Samsung S24FE phone hangs and lags during gameplay, issue persists despite update, feels worsening
rows.Summarized Problem: Device hangs and lags during gameplay, despite update, with no significant system resource contention or crashes.
rows.Severity Reason: The device does not crash or freeze, and system resources are sufficient; issue is intermittent and affects gameplay performance only.
rows.R&D Comment: CPU usage and memory are normal; no ANRs or fatal exceptions. Issue likely due to background processes or driver-level inefficiency.

rows.Title: Ghost Touch problem
rows.Problem: User experiencing ghost touch issue, especially during certain actions. Device is Samsung S23FE. Service center reported it as normal at the time, but issue persists. No video or log recorded at time of occurrence. No clear reproduction route provided.
rows.Summarized Problem: User reports persistent ghost touch issue on Samsung S23FE, with no clear reproduction route or supporting logs.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of touch functionality, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Accurate analysis is not possible because the time of the problem and the time of the log do not match. Display touch FW raw data and calibration data are in normal range. Video and log recording at time of issue would help identify root cause.

rows.Title: Unlock with biometrics vanished from my phone
rows.Problem: Unlock with biometrics vanished from my phone. Not visible on lock screen and AOD. Everytime i need to enter pin for unlock.
rows.Summarized Problem: Biometric unlock option is missing from the lock screen and AOD, forcing users to enter PIN every time.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to use biometric authentication, which is a core device functionality, leading to device unusability for secure access.

rows.Title: Camera poor sharpness and details
rows.Problem: Camera has poor sharpness, lack of details, poor HDR, and inconsistent performance after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera shows poor sharpness, lack of details, and poor HDR quality after the UI 7 update, with no improvement in image quality at different zoom levels.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is consistent under controlled conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to a change in image processing after UI 7 update; countermeasure confirms normal quality under static subjects.

rows.Title: unable to transfer my important data
rows.Problem: after last ui update cx facing otg issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot transfer important data due to an OTG issue after a UI update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects data transfer functionality but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is limited to specific external device use cases.
rows.R&D Comment: Samsung mobile device supports NTFS filesystem by using open source driver. Unfortunately, it is not fully stable yet to support writing features. We are trying to improve that feature but we could not confirm if we can support it right now. If you want to write into an external device, please use exfat-fs instead.

rows.Title: Landscape mode option disabled
rows.Problem: Landscape mode option is disabled and cannot be turned on or off
rows.Summarized Problem: Landscape mode option is disabled and cannot be enabled or disabled in the UI.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not functional, but the device remains usable as users can still navigate and use core functions.

rows.Title: Huge frame shift effect while switching from 1x to 3x and 5x in video mode
rows.Problem: Huge frame shift effect while switching from 1x to 3x and 5x in video mode
rows.Summarized Problem: A large frame shift occurs when switching between 1x, 3x, and 5x video modes in the camera app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction during mode transitions, affecting video stability but not causing complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The frame shift is due to parallax effects between the four independent camera positions; the system lacks compensation for image center disparity during mode switching.

rows.Title: can't send and receive any text messages
rows.Problem: I can't send and receive any text messages. Message center number not set and when attempting to set it, shows 'Unable to save address' or 'Unable to update address'.
rows.Summarized Problem: User cannot send or receive text messages, and the message center number setting fails with error messages.
rows.Severity Reason: User is unable to perform basic messaging functionality, which is essential for device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: No receiving logs present; root cause not identifiable with current logs. User must provide silent logs and video capture for further analysis.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi and Bluetooth turn off automatically while using the phone
rows.Problem: Wi-Fi and Bluetooth turn off automatically while using the phone. They disconnect suddenly and then get completely disabled - I am unable to turn them back on immediately
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi and Bluetooth disconnect suddenly during phone usage and cannot be re-enabled immediately.
rows.Severity Reason: The sudden disconnection and inability to re-enable the features render connectivity functions unusable during normal operation.

rows.Title: Saved birthday event not show in Calendar App
rows.Problem: In the calendar application, the birthday should be visible but somehow I'm not able to see it, however I had already saved it on contacts
rows.Summarized Problem: A saved birthday event is not visible in the Calendar app despite being saved in contacts.
rows.Severity Reason: The event is missing from the calendar view, but the user can still access it via contacts, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.

rows.Title: Call recording not working properly
rows.Problem: Call recording works only for incoming calls for excluded numbers; for outgoing calls, it randomly records excluded numbers like 'Pappa' and 'Devashri' once in a while, even when they are in the excluded list. The behavior is inconsistent and not expected on flagship phones.
rows.Summarized Problem: Call recording fails to properly exclude numbers during outgoing calls, resulting in random recording of excluded contacts.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working as expected for outgoing calls, leading to incorrect and inconsistent behavior that violates core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The logs are extracted with delay, making root cause analysis difficult. Recommend updating to latest One UI 8.0 and sharing logs promptly if issue recurs.

rows.Title: Auto HDR Features not working properly in Expert raw app
rows.Problem: Auto HDR Features is not working properly in Expert raw app when EV is set to -0.3, but works fine at EV 0. This issue started after UI 7.0 update and worked correctly in UI 5.1.
rows.Summarized Problem: Auto HDR feature fails to work when EV is set below 0 in the Expert raw app, despite working correctly at EV 0.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails under specific conditions but still works in others, indicating partial malfunction rather than complete device failure.

rows.Title: phone heats up during normal usage
rows.Problem: Galaxy M35 overheats abnormally during normal usage like browsing, YouTube, or even while idle. The issue persists after factory reset, software updates, and removing case. Heating worsens in sunlight.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone overheats during normal usage and while idle, especially in sunlight, despite multiple troubleshooting steps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats during normal and idle usage, which can lead to performance degradation, battery damage, or safety risks.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a third-party app (com.lemon.lvoverseas) holding frequent wake locks, contributing to CPU activity and overheating. The countermeasure is to request the third-party app developer to fix the app.

rows.Title: Unable to set my voice on bixby
rows.Problem: I am unable to set my voice on bixby please resolve it
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set their voice on Bixby.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where voice setting fails, but the core function of Bixby is not entirely disabled.
rows.R&D Comment: The attached log does not contain the logs when the recording failed. Please grab the log just after the issue occurred. The captured screen says that the recording fails because of it's noisy place. Try recording in more silent environment. If it keeps saying it's nosy even if you record in very silent environment, we need logs grabbed when the recording failed to find what's wrong.

rows.Title: speaker not working properly
rows.Problem: speaker erupting sound while playing videos and music
rows.Summarized Problem: The speaker emits erupting sounds during video and music playback, indicating improper audio output.
rows.Severity Reason: The speaker is producing abnormal sounds during media playback, which indicates a malfunction that compromises user experience and device reliability.
rows.R&D Comment: There is nothing unusual in the S/W log; hardware inspection is required. Please visit the service center and check the speaker.

rows.Title: Cannot place calls in the first attempt
rows.Problem: Cannot place calls in the first attempt. User has already sent error reports and visited service center where software was changed, but the issue persists. User has attached a recorded video for reference.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot place calls on the first attempt, despite software updates and service center interventions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents basic functionality (placing calls), making the device unusable for essential communication.
rows.R&D Comment: Resolving the issue due to unavailability of CP logs; no conclusive analysis possible without lower-layer logs.

rows.Title: Text disappears on zooming out in Samsung Notes
rows.Problem: Text written in Samsung Notes disappears when zooming out and reappears on zooming in. The issue occurs across multiple pages, not limited to a single file.
rows.Summarized Problem: Text in Samsung Notes disappears when zooming out and reappears on zooming in, affecting multiple pages.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects text visibility during zoom operations but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is reproducible across multiple pages.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is related to invalid cache; no save logs are available. Users can resolve it by deleting and restoring the document or undoing a page deletion.

rows.Title: Phone heats up during voice call
rows.Problem: Phone heats up severely during WhatsApp voice call, even battery heats up
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone overheats significantly during WhatsApp voice calls, with battery temperature rising noticeably.
rows.Severity Reason: Device overheats during active use, indicating potential safety or usability risk due to excessive heat generation under normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating occurs during high CPU and network usage in WhatsApp voice calls, likely due to combined camera and call load; countermeasure aligns with observed usage patterns.

rows.Title: Download stuck when downloading watch faces
rows.Problem: Download gets stuck when downloading watch faces from the pre-given watch faces list. Also shows no apps when trying to download from Galaxy Store.
rows.Summarized Problem: Watch face downloads get stuck and the Galaxy Store shows no apps during download.
rows.Severity Reason: The download process fails mid-way and no apps appear, preventing user from accessing watch faces, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Notification bar call from null showing in intervals
rows.Problem: Notification bar shows call from null in intervals
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification bar displays calls from null in intervals.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the notification display, affecting user experience but not causing device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Torch very dim or brightness adjustment not working
rows.Problem: Flashlight is not working; torch is very dim and brightness adjustment is not working. Issue occurred after patch update, resolved previously.
rows.Summarized Problem: The torch function is very dim and brightness adjustment is not working.
rows.Severity Reason: The torch is not functioning properly, making it unusable in low-light conditions, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: It cannot be seen from the log whether there is a problem with the flash. It is recommended to replace the module for verification or measure the current for verification

rows.Title: Device take 1 hr 30 min to charge 0 to 100%
rows.Problem: Charging speed is slow due to overheating protection, which reduces charging current to prevent battery overheating. This causes longer charging times, especially under heavy background app usage. Previously, a 15W charger took 1 hour 30-40 minutes to charge 100%, but current charging speed is slower.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device takes significantly longer to charge due to overheating protection reducing charging current.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction under specific conditions (heavy usage), not complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Possible causes of slow charging are due to background app use. In those conditions the device's temperature was getting raised intermittently. To prevent battery overheating current is reduced in order to reduce the temperature. This can cause some delays compared to ideal charging conditions charging time. Please guide the customer that the delays in their device's charging are due to overheating protection safety concepts.

rows.Title: Samsung TV Plus Not working
rows.Problem: Error show during use samsung tv
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung TV Plus app shows an error during use and fails to function properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to function during use, resulting in a complete failure of the feature, making it unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: installed version is not supported any more. need to update Samsung TV Plus app via Galaxy store or Play store.

rows.Title: battery drained for 35% after 6 hours with battery saver on
rows.Problem: Phone experiences significant battery drain even with battery saver enabled, despite factory reset and cache clearing. Battery usage remains high, and signal strength is poor, contributing to increased drain.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone drains 35% battery in six hours when battery saver is enabled, despite previous attempts to resolve the issue.
rows.Severity Reason: Device shows significant battery drain under normal usage conditions, indicating a major functional failure in power management.
rows.R&D Comment: High network usage and poor signal strength are contributing to increased battery consumption; optimize background app activity and signal handling to reduce drain.

rows.Title: Bluetooth connectivity issue
rows.Problem: Device's Bluetooth continues to connect and disconnect from car, persisting despite troubleshooting and software update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth connection between device and car repeatedly disconnects after connecting, despite troubleshooting and software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent connectivity but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Link loss between DUT and peer device occurred; peer device side issue suspected; requires service center inspection and re-pairing.

rows.Title: Audio adapter not working
rows.Problem: Type C to headphone jack audio adapter not working with Samsung S23 Ultra after Android 15 update. Works on Pixel 5.
rows.Summarized Problem: A Type-C to headphone jack audio adapter stops working on Samsung S23 Ultra after Android 15 update, though it works on other devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality in a specific device model after an OS update, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cable is detected in the MUIC logs. There is no issue from MU-IC side. Please help to check the port and cable, and replace the defective component in the service center.

rows.Title: Contact doesnt open. It keeps crashing.
rows.Problem: The contact doesnt open. It keeps crashing. So my whatsapp also doesnt showing any name of my contacts. Hence my status is not visible to anyone and I can not view anyone's status either
rows.Summarized Problem: The contact app crashes when attempting to open a contact, leading to WhatsApp not displaying contact names and status visibility issues.
