rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes when opening contacts, making it unusable and preventing core functionality like status visibility.
rows.R&D Comment: The current size of the contacts database is 10 GB, which is extremely abnormal. Due to this, the app is unable to run. Such cases typically occur when a 3rd party app continuously adds the same contact or incorrect contacts, resulting in an increase in data size without changing the number of contacts. This situation has previously been observed with apps like WhatsApp, Telegram, and Viber.

rows.Title: PDF name Devita open and closed automatically in Samsung Note App
rows.Problem: In Samsung Note app, book name Devita opens and closes automatically
rows.Summarized Problem: A PDF named Devita opens and closes automatically in the Samsung Note app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of a feature (PDF handling) in the app, where content opens and closes unexpectedly, but the device remains usable and no crash or data loss occurs.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by insufficient system memory during large document usage, and the countermeasure is to maintain current status due to system memory limitations.

rows.Title: Unable to set duration in custom exercise
rows.Problem: In the Samsung Health app, I created a custom exercise. Then I started setting a routine and began adding the duration of the exercise, but it wouldn't change. Refer to the attached screenshot. Kindly fix this issue so I can use Samsung Health for exercise.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set the duration for a custom exercise in the Samsung Health app.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work properly, preventing users from configuring exercise routines, but the app remains otherwise usable.

rows.Title: Unable to connect to my galaxy watch 6
rows.Problem: After factory reset, unable to connect to galaxy watch 6 and wearable app notifications showing blocked with option grayed out
rows.Summarized Problem: After a phone factory reset, users cannot connect to their Galaxy Watch 6 and wearable app notifications are blocked with no unblock option.
rows.Severity Reason: Device cannot connect to wearable, preventing core functionality like notifications and sync, making the device unusable for key use cases.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: State mismatch in wearable transport and incorrect client connection; Countermeasure: Watch must be reset and re-paired, limited by Wear OS design.

rows.Title: Modes & routines not working well
rows.Problem: Modes and routines do not end properly when they should; for example, Dark Mode continues past sunrise, even when the time has passed.
rows.Summarized Problem: Routines such as Dark Mode fail to end when their scheduled time ends, continuing to run past the intended duration.
rows.Severity Reason: The routine function does not end at the correct time, leading to inconsistent behavior, but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: PDF reader in Notes not recognizing links or embedded website links
rows.Problem: PDF reader in Notes fails to recognize links or embedded website links in PDF files, even when clicked.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Notes app's PDF reader does not recognize or handle links or embedded website links in PDF files.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where links fail to work in specific PDFs, but not universally, indicating intermittent failure rather than full system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be specific to certain PDF files; testing shows normal behavior in other PDFs, suggesting a file-specific or parsing issue. No general cause or countermeasure is confirmed.

rows.Title: battery consumption is high
rows.Problem: battery consumption is high, 27% in one hour, screen time 7 minutes at 12:04 am shows 7% usage, 11% usage at 0 minutes, customer played Minecraft until 1 AM accounting for almost 16% usage
rows.Summarized Problem: Device shows high battery consumption with 27% used in one hour, and Minecraft usage accounts for nearly 16% of battery use.
rows.Severity Reason: High battery consumption in a short period, especially with a major app usage, may lead to device unusability and rapid discharge.
rows.R&D Comment: It's unconfirmed that there was a 27% decrease in one hour, but based on the contents, it seems like the question is regarding the 26% figure at 8 AM on the 28th. Customer played Minecraft until 1 AM and it accounted for the highest usage (almost 16%). Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Purchase error in Galaxy Store
rows.Problem: Error when purchasing apps through Galaxy Store, specifically with Pokémon Go; Samsung checkout shows error
rows.Summarized Problem: Users encounter an error when trying to purchase apps through Galaxy Store, specifically with Pokémon Go, resulting in a Samsung checkout error.
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents users from making purchases, which is a core functionality required for app usage, rendering the feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: User registered on block list for malicious payment patterns; Countermeasure: Exception granted for this case to allow purchase.

rows.Title: Phone restarting unexpectedly
rows.Problem: Phone is restarting unexpectedly
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone is restarting unexpectedly.
rows.Severity Reason: Device is restarting unexpectedly, making it unusable and potentially causing data loss.

rows.Title: screen flicker and glitch
rows.Problem: screen glitch issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen exhibits flicker and glitch during video playback.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visible display anomalies during video playback, affecting user experience but does not cause device crash or complete failure.

rows.Title: Wrong sleep time showing on Galaxy Watch 8 Classic
rows.Problem: Galaxy Watch 8 classic showing wrong sleep time; device indicates sleeping from 12:30 to 5:29 am when user was not sleeping, with step data showing activity during that period; error occurs frequently
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy Watch 8 Classic incorrectly records sleep periods during active times, leading to inaccurate sleep data.
rows.Severity Reason: The sleep tracking function intermittently misidentifies active periods as sleep, resulting in partial malfunction of health monitoring data.

rows.Title: Light sensor not working
rows.Problem: The light sensor doesn't work, causing auto brightness to fail. Users have to find dimmer places to adjust brightness in daylight, which is inconvenient.
rows.Summarized Problem: The light sensor is not functioning, leading to failure of auto brightness adjustment in daylight.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot adjust screen brightness in daylight, making device usability severely compromised.
rows.R&D Comment: The light sensor's Data Ready is suspected to be malfunctioning; a sample is needed for accurate analysis, and hardware defect may require service center inspection.

rows.Title: myExcitel always crashing
rows.Problem: The attached application myExcitel is always crashing and giving the attached error
rows.Summarized Problem: The myExcitel app crashes repeatedly upon launch or use.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes repeatedly, making it unusable and preventing user functionality.

rows.Title: Low Camera Image quality
rows.Problem: Images captured on multiple devices in manual mode at infinite focus are soft compared to other models and lower-end phones. Professional photographer confirms issue persists despite trying manual settings. A 7000/- Chinese phone captures sharper images. Service center says wait for updates, but updates do not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera images are soft and blurry even in manual mode at infinite focus, showing inconsistent image quality compared to other models and devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality in manual mode, which is critical for professional photography, resulting in unusable images for users relying on accurate capture.
rows.R&D Comment: If the issue occurs in all scenes or without Magsafe case, it may indicate a hardware OIS malfunction; recommend module swap at service center if shaking is reproduced after disabling VDIS.

rows.Title: No apps showing in wear app
rows.Problem: App not installing on Galaxy Watch
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy Watch app is not installing on paired devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The app installation failure prevents users from adding or using any apps on the device, rendering the functionality unusable.

rows.Title: Error in joining beta programme
rows.Problem: When clicking on join button, it shows 'If you have any problem then contact us on support section' and fails to join the beta programme
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot join the beta programme as the join button fails and displays a support message instead of allowing enrollment.
rows.Severity Reason: The function to join the beta programme does not work, but the user is not completely blocked from using the device or experiencing a crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Error occurs while try to join BETA
rows.Problem: When I click join this message appears and nothing happens. Why can't join? I heard someone needs an Indian SIM, I don't have any SIM, that means I can't join beta?
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot join the beta program due to a missing requirement of an Indian SIM, and the app does not provide a clear error or alternative path.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents beta access for users without an Indian SIM, but the app does not fully fail or crash—only blocks access with unclear messaging.
rows.R&D Comment: Please check after some time and confirm behavior and also with India SIM

rows.Title: Recording at 60 fps, but videos are saved at lesser fps
rows.Problem: Recording at 60 fps, but videos are saved at lesser fps (30, 56). Please check attached logs and video. This is after the latest OS Upgrade.
rows.Summarized Problem: Videos recorded at 60 fps are being saved at lower frame rates such as 30 or 56 fps.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to deliver the intended recording quality, resulting in a significant loss of video performance and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Attached log file does not have camx info/config logs to check this issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: WiFi, Bluetooth and hotspot not working
rows.Problem: WiFi, Bluetooth and hotspot are not working despite user having tried all settings options.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi, Bluetooth, and hotspot functions are not working after user attempts to configure settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish basic network connections, rendering core connectivity functions inoperable.
rows.R&D Comment: The cnss is not powering up properly; need to check after swapping the Wi-Fi card and guide customer to get device checked at nearest SC center.

rows.Title: Video stabilisation not working
rows.Problem: Video stabilisation is not properly working after UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Video stabilisation is not working properly after the UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not functioning after an update, but the device remains usable and no data loss or crash occurs.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: can't connect to some websites/apps including popular ones such as Reddit, X, Clash Royale etc.
rows.Problem: Mobile data works initially but after 2-3 days, unable to connect to some websites and apps like Reddit, X, Clash Royale. Requires resetting mobile network settings to restore connectivity. Issue persists across OneUI 6 and 7.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device loses connectivity to certain websites and apps after a few days, requiring manual reset of mobile network settings to restore access.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents access to popular apps and websites, rendering core functionality unusable without repeated intervention.
rows.R&D Comment: Weak signal quality and high BLER values observed despite good signal strength; recommend service center inspection for hardware defects.

rows.Title: Camera not working
rows.Problem: Camera not working, screen black
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera is not functioning and the screen appears black.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot access the front camera, leading to a complete failure of a primary functionality, making the device unusable for basic operations.
rows.R&D Comment: Hardware failure in the front camera sensor (S5K3L6) detected; recommend hardware analysis at service center.

rows.Title: Picture colors have significantly faded
rows.Problem: Picture colors have significantly faded. Although the last security update improved the front camera quality, the colors are still not as good as they used to be in the beginning.
rows.Summarized Problem: The picture colors on the device have significantly faded after recent updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual quality but does not cause device malfunction or data loss, and is not fully disabling.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Notification Panel text not readable in Dark Mode
rows.Problem: Notifications are not readable in dark mode on lock screen, but appear correctly in light mode.
rows.Summarized Problem: Text in the notification panel is not readable when the device is in dark mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects readability in a specific mode but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is not reproducible in the latest firmware; users should check for software updates and restart the device.

rows.Title: Device getting Heatup while charge
rows.Problem: Device overheats when charging, even with no apps running or GPS, Bluetooth, or Wi-Fi active. Heating occurs only during charging, not at other times.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats when charging, even with no apps or connectivity features running.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs only during charging and is not related to device usage or heavy operations, but is noticeable and affects user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: Overheating during charging is due to booting operations using high performance; thermal management system is working as designed.

rows.Title: Emergency call only appears
rows.Problem: Device keeps prompting to repeat steps despite user already attempting them and sending logs
rows.Summarized Problem: Emergency call function is not working properly and repeatedly prompts user to repeat steps despite attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish emergency call service, which is a critical function for user safety, leading to potential device unusability in emergencies.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Poor RF signal (RX0 always floored); Countermeasure: User should get device checked at service center for RF issues.

rows.Title: Not able to open Excel in Dex mode
rows.Problem: Not able to open Excel in Dex mode unless app data is cleared
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot open Excel in Dex mode without clearing app data.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from using a core office function, requiring app data clearance to resolve, indicating a major functional failure.

rows.Title: contact search and selection issue
rows.Problem: contact search does not return correct results; tapping a contact brings up a different, wrong contact
rows.Summarized Problem: Contact search returns incorrect results, and tapping a contact causes it to be redirected to a different, wrong contact.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect contact selection, leading to a partial malfunction in functionality but does not render the app unusable.

rows.Title: Island application not functioning
rows.Problem: The Island application is not functioning on Samsung Galaxy A14. Work profile fails to set up and cloned applications do not launch. Issue persists after reinstalling, clearing cache, and checking permissions.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Island application fails to function on Samsung Galaxy A14, with work profile setup and cloned app launches failing despite troubleshooting.
rows.Severity Reason: The application fails to launch and work profile functionality is missing, preventing core device functionality from being used.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by the third-party app; countermeasure is to have the app owner investigate and fix it.

rows.Title: Contact is not functioning
rows.Problem: Contact application is not functioning after the last system update. The contact database has grown significantly, preventing initial initialization and causing the system to fail to start.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Contacts application is not functioning due to a large contact database preventing system initialization.
rows.Severity Reason: The system fails to start due to a critical failure in initialization, rendering the device unusable until resolved.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Large contact database prevents initialization. Countermeasure: Users can clear contacts storage, but this will erase all contact and call log data.

rows.Title: Fingerprint not working
rows.Problem: fingerprint not working after updating to latest security patch, screen also got blur
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint authentication is not working after a system update, and the screen appears blurred.
rows.Severity Reason: The fingerprint function is partially non-functional after an update, but the screen blur is a secondary visual issue that does not render the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The logs show correct placement of fingerprint windows and views, but the blur effect's application is unclear; reproduction with logs and screenshots is required for analysis.

rows.Title: App Size inside the suggested App widget become smaller
rows.Problem: App size in the suggested app widget is smaller after sideloading an updated version; user requests default version for SM-A346E
rows.Summarized Problem: The app size in the suggested app widget appears smaller after sideloading an updated version of the app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects app widget appearance but does not prevent device operation or cause functional failure.

rows.Title: Icons do not fully change according to display theme
rows.Problem: Icons do not fully change according to the display theme
rows.Summarized Problem: Icons do not fully update when the display theme changes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of UI elements, affecting appearance but not device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Dark mode on/off operates normally via mode and routine; updating software allows normal use of mode and routine.

rows.Title: Camera takes very dark images
rows.Problem: Camera takes very dark images even after motherboard change
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces very dark images despite motherboard replacement.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in image output, not complete device failure, but affects user experience significantly.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No unusual log or defect found; dark images likely due to inherent camera calibration. Countermeasure: Recommend using EV control menu to adjust exposure.

rows.Title: Unable to create double whatsapp business app
rows.Problem: Unable to create double whatsapp business app and other apps. Currently we don't support dual app creation for Whatsapp business as of now. For now if you need to use multiple instances of app, try using Secure Folder.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot create a second instance of the WhatsApp Business app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial functionality failure—dual app creation is not supported, but users can still use the app in one instance, and a workaround exists.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Dual app creation is limited to whitelisted apps; WhatsApp Business is not currently supported. Countermeasure: Users can use Secure Folder as a workaround; future support may be considered in upcoming OS versions.

rows.Title: Suggested apps widget is not working
rows.Problem: Suggested apps widget is not working. I have tried resetting system settings. But still does not work. Please check and let me know what settings is blocking this feature. Attaching screenshot and a small recording to show same apps are suggested even after cleaning up cache and data of the app.
rows.Summarized Problem: The suggested apps widget is not functioning properly and does not display recommended apps as expected.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where the widget fails to provide accurate recommendations despite user efforts to reset settings and clear data.

rows.Title: Cant install WhatsApp messenger
rows.Problem: Cant install whatsapp messenger
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot install the WhatsApp messenger app.
rows.Severity Reason: The installation failure prevents users from accessing a core communication app, rendering a key functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Downloaded app version is older than current version; Countermeasure: Clear data of previous installation and retry.

rows.Title: Camera failed suddenly after update
rows.Problem: Front camera facing camera failed
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera is failing unexpectedly after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera failure prevents basic device functionality and is a major function not working.
rows.R&D Comment: This pa3q device's camera had issue - i2c failed on rear wide camera sensor and eeprom. This is camera sensor module HW defect. not camera SW issue. Guide customer goto official samsung cs center for check and fix this kind's camera HW issue.

rows.Title: Outlook app crashes
rows.Problem: Outlook app crashes once in while
rows.Summarized Problem: The Microsoft Outlook app crashes intermittently.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes intermittently, which prevents users from using a core productivity tool, leading to device usability issues.

rows.Title: Photo Assist AI creating images not similar to input
rows.Problem: Photo Assist AI in Portrait Studio creates images that are not similar to the input image, especially when face is covered
rows.Summarized Problem: Photo Assist AI fails to generate images similar to the input, particularly when a face is covered.
rows.Severity Reason: The AI fails to match input images, resulting in inconsistent output, but the core functionality remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Generative AI model limitations when face is covered. Countermeasure: Developing a style-change feature while preserving input image shape and composition.

rows.Title: unable to transfer data via Smart Switch
rows.Problem: smart switch app not showing QR code to transfer data
rows.Summarized Problem: Smart Switch app fails to display QR code during data transfer, preventing data transfer between devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents data transfer but does not cause device crash or complete failure of core functionality, and can be resolved via app update.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Old version of smart switch app installed on receiving device. Countermeasure: Update to v3.7.64.10 or later; if issue persists, collect device logs.

rows.Title: Draw circle in Notes
rows.Problem: When trying to draw a circle, a straight line is formed in between. Words also break in between.
rows.Summarized Problem: When drawing a circle in the Notes feature, a straight line appears instead, and text breaks in mid-word.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work as intended, resulting in incorrect output during drawing, but the device remains usable and no data loss occurs.

rows.Title: Camera is continuously shaking rapidly only in 1x while taking photo and video
rows.Problem: In 1x while moving the phone camera is continuously shaking rapidly only in 1x while taking photo and video
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera continuously shakes rapidly when using 1x mode during photo and video capture.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent video stabilization but does not render the device unusable or lead to data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Customer reported shaking during 1x camera use; cause and countermeasure both point to user-side validation, suggesting no device-level issue.

rows.Title: Samsung Wallet not working
rows.Problem: Samsung Wallet is not working on A36. Tried all listed solutions, uninstalled Play Services and Play Store updates, but nothing works.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Wallet is not functioning on the A36 device despite multiple troubleshooting attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is completely non-functional, preventing core device functionality such as payment or access to wallet features.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a problem with the Google push service used by Samsung Wallet; connection between device and Google server is abnormal. Countermeasure: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Video not able to play
rows.Problem: Video not able to play which is taken from meta Ai glases, it's showing error codec not supported
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback fails when attempting to play a video captured from Meta AI Glasses, showing a codec not supported error.
rows.Severity Reason: The video playback fails completely with a clear error message indicating codec incompatibility, rendering the video player functionally unusable for content from Meta AI Glasses.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no trace of video playback of the particular video captured through Meta Glasses. Maybe the log extraction is late. Please ensure to take the logs immediately after reproducing the issue.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi issue on phone startup
rows.Problem: Each time Wi-Fi is turned on, the phone shows a green screen and restarts. This started after a recent update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone shows a green screen and restarts every time Wi-Fi is turned on.
rows.Severity Reason: The device crashes immediately upon attempting to connect to Wi-Fi, rendering the feature unusable and causing a system-level restart.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no response from the Firmware for the mm start. WLBT is not starting. Please guide customer to get the device checked at the nearest CS center.

rows.Title: Gmail application and widgets get stuck in loading
rows.Problem: Gmail application and widgets get stuck in loading every 2 to 3 days. Earlier, just removing application from recents or force stopping used to work which still works for the application, but the widget requires deleting all the widgets to make it work.
rows.Summarized Problem: Gmail widgets get stuck in loading every 2 to 3 days, requiring full widget deletion to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes repeated failure of a core feature (widget functionality), requiring user to delete all widgets, which is disruptive and affects usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Security exception in GoogleApiManager when attempting to access Google services. Countermeasure: Request CP silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Wallpaper automatically changed to the previous one
rows.Problem: The wallpaper automatically goes back to a previous selection even after deletion, regardless of current choice. Dynamic wallpaper is not enabled.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device automatically reverts to a previously selected wallpaper after user changes, even after deletion.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: com.datacultr.odyssey app changed the wallpaper force. Please remove or disable this app and check it again.

rows.Title: Custom cursor not working in apps
rows.Problem: Custom cursor appears correctly on home screen but reverts to default dot in certain apps, such as Samsung Notes.
rows.Summarized Problem: The custom cursor feature fails to retain its selected appearance when switching between home screen and specific apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality in specific apps but does not cause device failure or data loss, only a partial UI malfunction.

rows.Title: MyFiles app keeps crashing
rows.Problem: MyFiles app keeps crashing every time, upon trying to move files to Secure folder.
rows.Summarized Problem: The MyFiles app crashes when attempting to move files to the Secure folder.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes every time during a critical operation, making it unusable for file management.

rows.Title: One UI Home keeps crashing
rows.Problem: One UI Home keeps crashing or becomes unresponsive, especially after closing apps. The device often lags or freezes, making it impossible to restart or power off until it responds again.
rows.Summarized Problem: One UI Home crashes and becomes unresponsive after closing apps, causing device freezes and making restart or power off impossible.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes frequently and causes device to freeze, making basic operations like restarting or powering off impossible, rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The crash is caused by the third-party app 'RailOne' (org.cris.aikyam RailOne App), and the countermeasure is to have the third-party app side investigate and fix the issue.

rows.Title: Display working automatically and sometimes get blank
rows.Problem: Screen blank automatically after update
rows.Summarized Problem: The display occasionally becomes blank after an update, causing intermittent screen failure.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial screen malfunction but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.

rows.Title: keyboard disconnects intermittently
rows.Problem: samsung tab s9 ultra physical keyboard disconnects intermittently, leading to repeated keystrokes and disruptions. the issue stops only when touchpad is turned off. all troubleshooting steps have been tried without resolution. this expensive keyboard is turning the device unusable.
rows.Summarized Problem: The physical keyboard on the Samsung Tab S9 Ultra disconnects intermittently, causing repeated keystrokes and disrupting usability.
rows.Severity Reason: The keyboard disconnects intermittently, making the device unusable for basic typing tasks, which is a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: S/W side suspects keyboard/Tablet contact problem. If possible, please swap test with another good working keyboard. The problem symptoms follow the issued keyboard, indicating a single item defect. Detailed analysis requires sending the keyboard for testing.

rows.Title: Samsung keyboard crash
rows.Problem: Samsung keyboard crashing after latest security update, unable to use completely
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung keyboard application crashes after a security update, making it completely unusable.
rows.Severity Reason: The keyboard is a core input tool, and its complete crash renders the device unusable for text input.

rows.Title: System not responding
rows.Problem: System not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The system is not responding, causing performance lag.
rows.Severity Reason: The system failing to respond renders the device unusable, leading to a major functional disruption.

rows.Title: Camera freezes during video calls
rows.Problem: Camera freezes during video calls, other person cannot see user
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera freezes during video calls, preventing the user from being visible to others.
rows.Severity Reason: Camera freezing during video calls makes the user completely invisible to others, rendering video calls unusable.

rows.Title: 5g is not working
rows.Problem: network issue in phone, 5g not working, network automatically off
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G connectivity is not working and the network automatically turns off on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The network automatically turning off prevents the device from using 5G, which is a core connectivity function, rendering the device unusable for high-speed mobile data.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera image gets blurred at the top after update
rows.Problem: The upper part of images in camera from primary lens gets blurred automatically after last updated. Most of the times the image gets blurred of its own and its too frustrating
rows.Summarized Problem: The top portion of photos taken with the primary camera lens becomes blurred after the latest software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a major malfunction in image capture, directly affecting core camera functionality and user experience.

rows.Title: Games icons are not move automatically in the game launcher
rows.Problem: Games icons are not move automatically in the game launcher
rows.Summarized Problem: Game icons do not move automatically in the game launcher.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, resulting in partial malfunction of the game launcher functionality.

rows.Title: clock size gets reduced automatically
rows.Problem: the clock size gets reduced automatically when locking the phone from a landscape PDF reading screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock size reduces automatically when the phone is locked from a landscape PDF reading screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the display of a key element on the lock screen but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Camera night mode not working
rows.Problem: Camera night mode makes images black and dull when taking photos of humans
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera night mode produces black and dull images when photographing humans.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature completely fails to produce usable images, rendering night mode unusable in real scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Logs look fine; no data to compare old and new UI. Please provide comparison data between old and new UI.

rows.Title: battery protection to Maximum (85%) but it is charging up to 84% only everytime
rows.Problem: I have set my battery protection to Maximum (85%) but it is charging up to 84% only everytime. I have attached screenshots.
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery protection is set to 85% but charging stops at 84%, indicating a discrepancy between user setting and actual charging behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in battery protection behavior, where charging stops at a lower level than intended, but the device does not become unusable or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: As per logs, charging stops at 85% and resumes when SOC drops to 84%, which is normal behavior. User confirmed this at 83% SOC.

rows.Title: Digital Wellbeing PIN bypass and missing lock on app launch
rows.Problem: The Digital Wellbeing parental PIN can be bypassed, and the app does not require authentication to open. Even with a PIN set to restrict app timer changes, users can open the app without entering a PIN and modify the 'Excluded Apps' list without authentication. Anyone can add all apps to the excluded list.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users can bypass the parental PIN and access Digital Wellbeing without authentication, allowing unauthorized modification of app exclusion settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature allows unauthorized access and modification of parental controls, which undermines core security and privacy functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: We are supporting PIN code input in Excluded Apps entry, scheduled for release at the end of October via market update.

rows.Title: Slow networks
rows.Problem: Device has very slow network performance compared to other devices on the same network, with significantly fewer network bands and slower 5G speeds, even though other non-Samsung devices achieve 5 to 6 times higher data speed.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung S23 FE and other S-series devices experience significantly slower network speeds and fewer network bands compared to non-Samsung devices on the same network.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to achieve expected network performance, resulting in degraded connectivity and data speed, which impacts usability in regular work environments.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera performance degraded
rows.Problem: Severe camera performance degradation after One UI 7.0 update with oversaturation, focus issues, inconsistent portrait mode, and video jitters.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera performance has significantly degraded after One UI 7.0 update, showing oversaturation, autofocus issues, inconsistent portrait mode, and video jitters.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera functions are severely impaired, with visible issues in color accuracy, focus, and video stability, making photo and video capture unreliable.
rows.R&D Comment: Changes in sensor handling result in color saturation and upscaling artifacts; these are expected with sensor transitions but impact user experience.

rows.Title: RCS messages not working in Samsung Message App
rows.Problem: RCS is not working in Samsung Message App; it uses only Carrier SMS instead. Works in Google Messages but not in Samsung Message App. App data cleared and device restarted, but issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: RCS messaging is not functioning in Samsung Message App, despite working in Google Messages.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in one messaging app but works in another, indicating partial malfunction rather than full device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: B OS Ver 16 is already planned for this model. Kindly help share behavior on B OS. If reproduced, pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Ringtone and notification sound not changed after ONE UI 7 update
rows.Problem: Ringtone and notification sound not changed after ONE UI 7 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change ringtone and notification sounds after updating to ONE UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The sound settings feature is partially non-functional after the update, preventing users from customizing audio feedback, but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Watch is still in emergency calls only
rows.Problem: I unknowingly cancelled my airtel postpaid esim plan and registered again. I got confirmation from airtel that I can now call and text on watch on 02/09/2025 at 4.30pm. But my watch is still in emergency calls only.
rows.Summarized Problem: The watch is still restricted to emergency calls only after successful ESIM re-registration.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot make regular calls or texts, rendering basic communication functionality unavailable.

rows.Title: Routine not working
rows.Problem: Routine is not working properly. Mobile data remains on during charging even when set to off. Same issue occurs when charge is full. Sound mode also shows inconsistent behavior, sometimes off, sometimes on.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's routine feature fails to properly disable mobile data and sound mode during charging, resulting in inconsistent behavior.
rows.Severity Reason: The routine function intermittently fails to apply settings, leading to partial malfunction in expected behavior during charging.

rows.Title: Unable to Login Unidays ID in phone
rows.Problem: User has a previous Unidays ID linked to a phone number that expired, and a new ID is created but the phone number is still associated with the store, causing a 'DuplicateUserPhone' error during purchase.
rows.Summarized Problem: A phone number linked to an expired Unidays account is still registered in the store, causing a duplicate user phone error when trying to log in with a new Unidays ID.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a purchase failure due to a conflict in account linkage, but does not result in device crash or data loss, and only affects specific users under specific conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: The phone number remains linked to a previous Unidays/store account, causing conflict during registration; require user to provide details and UNiDAYS to confirm deactivation of old account linkage.

rows.Title: Steps counted during running is very less
rows.Problem: Steps counted during running is very less. It is nearly half of what it should be
rows.Summarized Problem: The step count during running is significantly lower than expected, nearly half of the actual value.
rows.Severity Reason: The step count is inaccurate during running, leading to partial malfunction of fitness tracking functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue arises due to inconsistent phone proximity to the user's body during running; countermeasure is to improve sensor calibration and user guidance on phone placement.

rows.Title: 5g switching to 4g
rows.Problem: 5g switching to 4-4g during app openings, YouTube playing, and downloading due to thermal throttling at low temperatures. This issue affects all users of F14 5g and other models, making 5g data unusable in real-world scenarios. Users feel this undermines the value of purchasing a 5g phone.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device switches from 5g to 4g during normal usage due to thermal throttling, even at low temperatures, resulting in loss of 5g data connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue renders 5g data unusable during real-world usage, directly impacting the core value proposition of a 5g phone and causing device unusability in key scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: 50 mp camera mode skin tone red
rows.Problem: In 50 mp camera mode skin tone appears red and portrait mode edge detection is poor after changing settings like intelligent optimisation, reset camera, or restart phone. Details are not visible, leading to poor user experience.
rows.Summarized Problem: The 50 MP camera mode incorrectly renders skin tones as red, and portrait mode edge detection is poor despite resets and reboots.
rows.Severity Reason: The skin tone distortion in 50 MP mode significantly affects image quality and user experience, making photos unappealing and potentially misleading.
rows.R&D Comment: The AI-based image processing in 50 MP mode may cause color shifts; the issue is likely due to algorithmic behavior during temporary image display, and requires calibration of AI color correction in high-resolution mode.

rows.Title: E-SIM receiving calls and messages after being turned off
rows.Problem: Despite deactivating the E-SIM, user is still receiving calls and messages on that SIM. E-SIM is inactive but calls and messages are still being received.
rows.Summarized Problem: User receives calls and messages on an inactive E-SIM after it has been turned off.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is receiving calls and messages on a deactivated E-SIM, which is a core network functionality failure and contradicts expected behavior, making the device unusable in real-world scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Observation: After disabling eSIM, calls are routed to pSIM; no call activity is observed on eSIM. The logs confirm that once eSIM is disabled, no calls occur on it. This indicates a misrouting issue in SIM call handling.

rows.Title: phone is getting slower day by day
rows.Problem: phone is getting slower day by day RAM usage is above 5GB most of the time none of the apps are not staying in background
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone is slowing down over time with high RAM usage and apps not staying in the background.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is experiencing significant performance degradation with high RAM usage, leading to poor responsiveness and usability.

rows.Title: camera focus is not working properly
rows.Problem: camera do not focus in automatic mode images are soft in manual mode images are disaster
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to focus properly, resulting in soft images in automatic mode and unusable images in manual mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera's focusing function is completely non-functional, rendering images unuseable and significantly impairing core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely due to hardware damage in the AF driving unit from prolonged use and vibrations, and users should have the camera module inspected at an A/S center.

rows.Title: Touch not working properly
rows.Problem: Touch not working properly after UI 7. Battery icon is small. Side panel not visible. Battery drain issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Touch functionality is not working properly after UI 7 update, with additional issues of small battery icon and battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: Touch functionality is essential for device operation and is completely non-functional after the update, making the device unusable.

rows.Title: 5g not working on jio sim
rows.Problem: 5g not working after one ui 7 update on jio sim
rows.Summarized Problem: 5g connectivity is not working on Jio SIM after the One UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot connect to 5G networks, which is a core connectivity function required for mobile data usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: unable to add widget of kgwt now
rows.Problem: cannot add kgwt now widget on lock screen; only company widgets available; installing lock star opens wallpaper service instead of lock screen; tried multiple versions of lock star without success
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot add the kgwt now widget on the lock screen, only company widgets are visible, and LockStar fails to launch properly, opening wallpaper service instead.
rows.Severity Reason: The lock screen functionality is fundamentally broken, preventing users from adding essential widgets, which impacts usability and core device functionality.

rows.Title: Keyboard not working with tab
rows.Problem: Keyboard is not working perfectly with tab
rows.Summarized Problem: The keyboard fails to function properly when using the tab key.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of keyboard functionality during tab navigation, but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.

rows.Title: Accidental touch protection doesn't work
rows.Problem: After the last update, accidental touch protection doesn't work. When the device is in a pocket, many apps open or close, dial log opens, numbers are typed automatically, or calls are hung up or accepted by accidental touches.
rows.Summarized Problem: Accidental touch protection is not functioning after the last update, causing unintended app activations and call actions.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially missing and does not work as intended, but the device remains usable and no critical data is lost.
rows.R&D Comment: The attached log alone cannot confirm the time of the problem, and the remaining logs are considered to have already passed the time of the problem. Please guide me so that I can attach a captured photo that can confirm the time of problem when a problem occurs and a log that matches it.

rows.Title: Notification sound automatically muted after changing scheduled modes in Modes and Routines
rows.Problem: After changing a scheduled mode in the Modes and Routines section, the device notification sound automatically mutes, causing important notifications to be missed.
rows.Summarized Problem: Changing scheduled modes in the Modes and Routines section causes the device notification sound to automatically mute, leading to missed important notifications.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from receiving critical notifications, significantly impacting usability and potentially leading to missed important alerts.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera switch stuck during WhatsApp video call
rows.Problem: Video stucks when switching camera from front to back during WhatsApp video call
rows.Summarized Problem: Video freezes when switching camera during a WhatsApp video call.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of camera switching functionality during a video call, preventing full user interaction but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Attached logs don't contain error scenario and frames are passed correctly to UI. Counter Measure: Update WhatsApp and device software; capture logs if issue persists.

rows.Title: WhatsApp video call stuck when switching to back camera
rows.Problem: Video call gets stuck when switching to back camera; only front camera works fine
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp video call freezes when switching from front to back camera.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure during a specific camera switch, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: WhatsApp app version is outdated. Countermeasure: Update WhatsApp app from Play Store and retest.

rows.Title: PDF viewer not open in WhatsApp
rows.Problem: PDF not opening in WhatsApp
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp fails to open PDF files received in chats.
rows.Severity Reason: The PDF viewer does not function when opening received files, but the core messaging feature remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is already reported to WhatsApp. Analysis by GMS Team: WhatsApp File Access Issue. The problem occurs when a file is already stored on the device and attempted to be opened directly by the sender.

rows.Title: WhatsApp PDF files not open
rows.Problem: PDF files not opening when sent via WhatsApp
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp fails to open PDF files when received or sent.
rows.Severity Reason: PDF files do not open, but the core messaging function remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue has been fixed on WhatsApp server side. Please retest with latest app version.

rows.Title: No internet connection
rows.Problem: The 5G internet connection works for a while then gets stuck and shows 'No internet connection'. Turning off and on the internet manually fixes it. The issue occurs in different areas of the city. Same phone model works fine on OnePlus.
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G internet connection intermittently drops and shows 'No internet connection' message, requiring manual restart to resolve.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent loss of connectivity but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Multi touch not working properly
rows.Problem: Multi touch is not working properly while playing BGMI or COD mobile, causing display shaking. This is happening on a new phone, which is disappointing.
rows.Summarized Problem: Multi touch functionality is not working properly during gameplay, causing display shaking.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes display instability and disrupts user interaction during gameplay, making the device unusable in game scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: The touch coordinate jitter issue in multi-touch scenarios has been resolved by improving the touch firmware (v11), and it is expected that the problem will be fixed with this version. The changes have been applied with CL 31181581.

rows.Title: Battery drains 50% at night with no background apps running
rows.Problem: Battery drains 50% overnight even with no background apps, WiFi or Bluetooth off, resulting in only one hour of screen time; issue persists after reset and reported by colleague with same model
rows.Summarized Problem: The device drains 50% battery overnight with no background apps, WiFi, or Bluetooth active.
rows.Severity Reason: The device loses significant battery charge in a single night with no background activity, indicating a major power consumption issue that renders the device unusable without charging.

rows.Title: Error playing videos from Meta AI glasses
rows.Problem: Video player shows "codec not supported" error; videos play with only audio, no video; suspect video format unsupported
rows.Summarized Problem: Videos taken with Meta AI glasses fail to play in the video player, showing codec not supported error and playing only audio.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot view videos taken with the device, rendering a core functionality of the Meta AI glasses unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Bottom (right) speaker non-functionality
rows.Problem: Bottom (right) speaker does not work when device is folded, while top (left) speaker works normally. Vibration functionality stops when device is flipped. Intermittent network connectivity issues are observed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The bottom (right) speaker fails to function when the device is folded, indicating a hardware-related audio issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The speaker malfunction prevents basic audio functionality in a key device state (folded), rendering the device unusable for audio output in that mode.
rows.R&D Comment: Suspected hardware defect in the LRA connector; recommend inspection at service center for loose connection or foreign particles.

rows.Title: Lagging and stuttering while scrolling
rows.Problem: Lagging and stuttering while scrolling during video recording
rows.Summarized Problem: Device lags and stutters when scrolling during video recording.
rows.Severity Reason: Lagging and stuttering during scrolling severely impacts user experience and device usability, especially during video recording.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Samsung Email crashing
rows.Problem: Samsung email app crashing frequently
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Email app crashes frequently when opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes frequently upon opening, making it unusable.

rows.Title: Video output exhibits vertical stretching in QHD recording
rows.Problem: CX facing pro video mode causes vertical stretching
rows.Summarized Problem: Video output shows vertical stretching when recording in QHD resolution using CX facing pro mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video quality during recording but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is related to a specific camera setting.
rows.R&D Comment: The anamorphic lens correction feature is enabled in Camera Assistant settings and causes vertical stretching; recommend disabling it during normal use.

rows.Title: No stabilization in Video in ultrawide camera
rows.Problem: Ultrawide camera has no stabilization after UI7 update, with zero stabilization in video and other camera issues
rows.Summarized Problem: Ultrawide camera lacks video stabilization after UI7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera has no stabilization, which is a core functional failure making video recording unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: If issue still persists, please provide CP silent logs; recommended actions include cleaning lens, resetting camera settings, checking resolution, testing in good lighting, and updating software.

rows.Title: Error connecting Samsung Gallery to Microsoft OneDrive
rows.Problem: Error occurs when trying to connect Samsung Gallery to Microsoft OneDrive; error appears at the last moment during sync attempt
rows.Summarized Problem: Users encounter an error when attempting to connect Samsung Gallery to Microsoft OneDrive, particularly when trying to link a new Samsung account to an existing Microsoft account.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a specific account connection scenario that results in a failure during sync, but does not prevent full device operation or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The error occurs when a user tries to connect a new Samsung account to an existing Microsoft account that is already linked to another Samsung account. Users must first disconnect the old Samsung account from the MS account before connecting the current Samsung account.

rows.Title: Wifi disconnect frequently
rows.Problem: wifi automatically disconnects frequently. User is irritated and has a bad experience. Log and screen recording show disconnection at the end of recording
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi connection frequently disconnects, especially on hotspot network 'POCO X6 Pro 5G'.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes intermittent disconnection but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Disconnections are observed with hotspot network 'POCO X6 Pro 5G'. We recommend trying to connect with other networks to check if issue is observed with other networks or not.

rows.Title: Image quality downgrades when using galaxy ai features in photo editor
rows.Problem: Image quality downgrades when using galaxy ai features in photo editor, as seen in attached photo
rows.Summarized Problem: Using galaxy ai features like object remover in the photo editor causes image quality to degrade.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the AI feature where image quality is reduced, but the core functionality remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: The quality downgrade occurs because generative AI models generate smaller images than originals; patching is used to preserve unedited areas, but the overall quality still appears reduced.

rows.Title: Call list showing recording is available even after deletion of audio files
rows.Problem: Call list showing recording is available even after deletion of audio files from My file
rows.Summarized Problem: After deleting audio files from My File, the call list still shows a recording icon.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the UI where a recording indicator persists after file deletion, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Record icon on calllog updated when it clicked. This is dialer concept and normal operation. Please keep current state.

rows.Title: tap middle button then tap translate then google will open
rows.Problem: when touch and hold middle button then tap on translate then google will open
rows.Summarized Problem: Tapping the middle button followed by the translate option opens Google search instead of the intended functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work as expected, but does not cause device crash or data loss, and only occurs under specific interaction paths.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Google Assistant package is triggered via middle button interaction. Counter Measure: Issue not reproducible; requires video to report to third party.

rows.Title: Screen goes black while using mobile phone
rows.Problem: Screen goes black while using mobile phone. The touch is active as I touch screen then the screen is black. Then I have to press power button twice to switch on the screen.
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen goes black during usage and requires multiple power button presses to re-enable, indicating a display performance issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen going black during use and requiring repeated power button presses renders the device unusable during operation, leading to a major functional failure.

rows.Title: Samsung applications not compatible
rows.Problem: Samsung applications not compatible with device, app not installing though installed
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung applications are not compatible with the device, leading to installation failures despite being installed.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of app installation, not full device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The AOD app is distributed via Galaxy Store, not Google Play Store; future updates will be available through Galaxy Store.

rows.Title: Network fluctuating
rows.Problem: Network fluctuating, not stable, works sometimes but not consistently, issues with both calls and internet on mobile data, works when switching to Wi-Fi, issue persists for 6 months
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile data network is unstable and intermittently fails, affecting both voice calls and internet connectivity, with no stability when using mobile data over six months.
rows.Severity Reason: The network instability prevents reliable voice calls and internet access, making the device unusable for core communication and browsing functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: network drops during call
rows.Problem: Network drops occur during calls, causing the other party to hear no sound or voice. Data speed is slow outside, and 5G connection fails. The issue persists across different networks and worsened after software updates, particularly UI 7.
rows.Summarized Problem: Network drops during calls result in the other party hearing no voice and poor data speeds, especially outside and with 5G failure, exacerbated after software updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents functional communication during calls, rendering the device unusable for basic voice calls, which is a critical user experience failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Need CP logs to check for lower layer failures or decoding issues; provide CP log for analysis.

rows.Title: Unable to update new post in member app
rows.Problem: User cannot update a post in the Samsung Members app due to server error when pasting text from Perplexity app
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot update posts in the Samsung Members app when pasting text from the Perplexity app due to server error from invalid tags.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full functionality of posting content but does not cause device crash or data loss; users can work around it by pasting into Samsung Notes first.
rows.R&D Comment: When pasting text from Perplexity into the Members app, it contains tags not allowed by the server. The next app update will allow text from Perplexity to be entered without issue.

rows.Title: Vibration mode stop working
rows.Problem: Vibration mode of my phone stop working completely
rows.Summarized Problem: Vibration mode has stopped working completely after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The vibration function is completely non-functional, making the device unusable for users who rely on haptic feedback.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Motor driver logs are not present for relevant instances. Counter Measure: Insufficient log time coverage; request for more comprehensive logs.

rows.Title: Live score not showing in Now Bar
rows.Problem: Live scores are not displaying on Now Bar; instead, tournament names appear in push notifications
rows.Summarized Problem: Live scores are not showing on the Now Bar and instead appear as tournament names in push notifications.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working as intended, but the device remains usable and no data loss or crash occurs.

rows.Title: Network is not stable
rows.Problem: Network issue is occurred. Network is not stable. Volte signal is not showing. So unable to know about Emergency. In other devices 5G Plus is working and there is good network speed in those devices but Samsung galaxy A16 phone does not work with 5G plus so there is very poor speed in this device. so update with 5G plus network. Operator Airtel. All time
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to register Volte signal and shows poor 5G Plus network performance, unlike other devices, making emergency communication unreliable.
rows.Severity Reason: The network instability prevents emergency communication, which is critical for device usability and safety.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: FASTag balance not showing in Samsung Wallet
rows.Problem: FASTag balance is not showing in Samsung Wallet despite removing and re-adding the FASTag
rows.Summarized Problem: The FASTag balance is not displayed in Samsung Wallet after re-adding the FASTag.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where the feature is missing after re-adding the FASTag, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Device has slowed down
rows.Problem: Device facing slow issue after reset
rows.Summarized Problem: The device slows down significantly after resets, indicating poor system performance stabilization.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to stabilize after minimal uptime, leading to prolonged slowness that impacts usability and overall device performance.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Uptime is very low; device should stabilize after 5+ minutes. Countermeasure: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Screenshot causes device freeze
rows.Problem: Taking screenshot causes device to freeze; gestures stop working, only navigation bar and quick panel remain functional; must restart via Bixby to recover
rows.Summarized Problem: Taking a screenshot causes the device to freeze and lose responsiveness to touch gestures.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive after taking a screenshot, preventing normal interaction and requiring a restart to recover, rendering it unusable temporarily.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Device experiencing excessive battery drain, affecting usability
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing excessive battery drain due to abnormal voltage fluctuations below 2V in the battery cell.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery voltage drops below 2V, which can lead to device malfunction or shutdown and significantly impacts device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Please check the HW connection for MT6365 BATADC_P(L7 pin) as the battery voltage fluctuation is abnormal despite normal charger ADC values.

rows.Title: Unable to set Preferred services option in password passkey and autofills
rows.Problem: Password passkey option not showing in settings

rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the interface, preventing users from configuring their preferred autofill service, but the core device functionality remains accessible.

rows.Title: Unable to register new fingerprint

rows.Title: System suggesting wrong apps to open PDF
rows.Problem: App not working issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The system incorrectly suggests apps to open PDF files.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in app suggestion functionality, which affects usability but does not render the device unusable.

rows.Title: Dual messenger option not present
rows.Problem: Dual messenger option not showing
rows.Summarized Problem: The dual messenger option is missing from the device settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not available due to device owner restrictions, resulting in a partial functionality gap.
rows.R&D Comment: The dual messenger feature is incompatible with device owner settings, and no actionable countermeasure is available.

rows.Title: Poor camera quality
rows.Problem: camera issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera has poor image quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects camera performance but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Only a few albums are shown while selecting pictures
rows.Problem: Gallery app issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The gallery app only displays a few albums when selecting pictures.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality of the gallery app, where not all albums are shown, but the app remains usable.

rows.Title: Device not connecting to WiFI
rows.Problem: Device facing wifi connectivity issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is unable to establish a stable WiFi connection, with logs indicating successful connection but no disconnection events and missing verbose logs during the issue period.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to maintain WiFi connection after initial setup, which renders the device unusable in environments requiring internet access.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Connection established but no disconnection events; logs not captured during issue time. Counter Measure: Request verbose WiFi logs during issue period to identify root cause.

rows.Title: Widget transparency not working properly on home screen
rows.Problem: Device care widget not transparency home screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The device care widget does not display with proper transparency on the home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The widget appears with incorrect transparency, affecting visual consistency but does not cause device malfunction or crash.

rows.Title: Sim keeps on turning on or off
rows.Problem: Cx facing sim issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The SIM card is intermittently turning on and off, causing connectivity instability.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device connectivity instability, leading to potential loss of service and unusability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera image quality poor when using flashlight
rows.Problem: Camera image quality poor when using flashlight
rows.Summarized Problem: Images taken with the flashlight are of poor quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of camera functionality under specific conditions, not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: If issue still persists, please follow steps: clean the camera lens, reset camera settings, check resolution, test in good lighting, update software, and use camera diagnostics.

rows.Title: Angle of pictures taken in full ratio mode changes
rows.Problem: Camera facing issue
rows.Sub-Module: Picture Angle in Full Ratio Mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The angle of pictures taken in full ratio mode is inconsistent and changes unexpectedly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent image orientation but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: We have identified the problem and fixed in latest software release. Please update your software to latest and raise again if the problem persists.

rows.Title: Unable to turn off the device via double tap
rows.Problem: Cx facing wallpaper issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot turn off the device using the double tap gesture.
rows.Severity Reason: The double tap gesture for power off is not functional, preventing users from turning off the device, but the device remains usable otherwise.
rows.R&D Comment: B OS Ver 16 is already planned for this model. Kindly help share behavior on B OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Unable to backup data on Samsung Cloud
rows.Problem: Lost Samsung cloud recovery data code
rows.Summarized Problem: User lost the recovery data code for Samsung Cloud backup, preventing data recovery.
rows.Severity Reason: User cannot recover data, but the feature is not completely broken or causing device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: EDP (E2EE) concept requires reset of state. Countermeasure: User must reset EDP state via Samsung Cloud settings.

rows.Title: Security Patch Update
rows.Problem: Facing security patch update issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are unable to receive the security patch update.
rows.Severity Reason: Failure to apply security patches exposes devices to potential vulnerabilities and could lead to data breaches or unauthorized access.

rows.Title: White square screen on display
rows.Problem: White square on screen
rows.Summarized Problem: A white square appears on the display screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen shows a blank or incorrect content, making the device unusable for basic visual interaction.

rows.Title: Unable to access Google Drive and One Drive

rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot see Google Drive and OneDrive in the home screen of the My Files app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial visibility of drives in the app interface, affecting usability but not causing device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: User cannot see OneDrive and Google Drive in the My Files app home screen; recommend clearing app data and providing logs for further investigation.

rows.Title: S pen issue
rows.Problem: S pen issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The S pen is not functioning properly due to a digitizer channel issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The S pen is a core input device; failure prevents basic interaction with the device.
rows.R&D Comment: It seems that there is problem in channel in digitizer. I need device for further analysis.

rows.Title: Navigation bar not working in landscape view
rows.Problem: Navigation bar issue in landscape view
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar fails to function when the device is in landscape view.
rows.Severity Reason: The navigation bar is a core UI element that is essential for device navigation, and its failure in a common view renders the interface unusable.

rows.Title: Unable to redeem voucher
rows.Problem: Difficulties redeeming August walk-a-thon voucher
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot redeem vouchers in the Samsung Members app due to incorrect UI button and missing coupon information.
rows.Severity Reason: The redeem function is missing or misconfigured, preventing users from using vouchers, which is a core feature of the Samsung Members system.
rows.R&D Comment: User's coupon should display a 'Copy code' button to use on a given URL, but instead shows a redeem button. Logs lack coupon-related data after viewing the coupon page.

rows.Title: Error code pops up while calling or testing
rows.Problem: The steps does not work. I get this error code
rows.Summarized Problem: An error code appears during phone calls or testing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents successful call execution but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Incorrect apps are suggested while opening the PDF from Whatsapp
rows.Problem: PDF issue when opening from WhatsApp
rows.Summarized Problem: Incorrect apps are suggested when opening a PDF from WhatsApp.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in app suggestion functionality, not causing device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Call disconnects with WIFI calling option
