rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi calling disconnects repeatedly and fails to show network bars from Jio operator, preventing use of calling and SMS features
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents core calling and SMS functionality, making the device unusable for voice communication via WiFi calling.
rows.R&D Comment: No call observed in provided logs. Please provide CP silent logs capturing the issue scenario.

rows.Title: System does not switch to mobile data in weak wifi strength
rows.Problem: When the wifi signal is weak, it doesn't switch to mobile data
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to switch to mobile data when WiFi signal is weak.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction under specific network conditions, not complete device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to change modes
rows.Problem: Modes and routines issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change modes due to a null pointer exception in metadata loading during routine execution.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a critical failure in system functionality, preventing users from changing modes, which is essential for device operation.

rows.Title: Camera flickers
rows.Problem: Camera flickering issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera exhibits flickering at 0.6x zoom.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera flickering at 0.6x prevents proper image capture and user functionality, making it unusable under specific conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: UV Damper peeling and misalignment cause driving force error, leading to AF position instability; improved jig and height measurement will correct assembly issues.

rows.Title: Issues observed in phone app
rows.Problem: No 'Dual Clock' option on lockscreen and unknown numbers blocking is not working as expected, resulting in continuous ring calls
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Dual Clock' feature is missing on the lockscreen and blocking unknown numbers is not functioning, leading to continuous ring calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a missing feature and a malfunctioning setting that results in unexpected calls, compromising user safety and usability.

rows.Title: App not processing google command
rows.Problem: Cx facing google command issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The app is not processing Google commands.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working, but the app remains usable overall.

rows.Title: Camera issue
rows.Problem: Camera not working properly; pictures are blurry and have pixel defects
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces blurry and pixelated images, especially in low-light conditions or with high magnification.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of camera functionality, resulting in degraded image quality but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The poor image quality is due to hand tremors and small sensor pixel size in 2x mode; using 1x camera in low light improves quality.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: My phone shows battery consumption in hours, while my friend's shows in days. Is this normal or should I be concerned?
rows.Summarized Problem: User reports inconsistent battery consumption display between devices, raising concern about normality and potential battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a display inconsistency rather than a device-wide malfunction or crash, but raises user concern about battery health.
rows.R&D Comment: Insufficient information about the issue. Only approximately 7% battery consumed over 1 hour is available. Instagram and Snapchat were used with screen on, no abnormal behavior detected.

rows.Title: Issues with enable disable button of eye comfort shield
rows.Problem: The enable disable button of the eye comfort shield settings doesn't have any animation. When pressed, the slider just instantly changes position unlike any other slider which has a slight animation of changing position. I have checked and my animations were all on. To check, I compared it side by side with other window and it turns out that there's a defect in the software. I've attached a screen recording for reference. Hope it gets fixed in the next update.
rows.Summarized Problem: The enable/disable button for the eye comfort shield lacks animation and responds instantly instead of smoothly, unlike other sliders.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, affecting user experience but not causing device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: The battery drains very fast without heavy usage, especially after the oneUI 7 update. Screen on time is now only 40 minutes, compared to over one hour on oneUI 6.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences rapid battery drain, especially after the oneUI 7 update, reducing screen-on time from over one hour to only 40 minutes.
rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains rapidly even under light usage, indicating a major performance issue that significantly impacts device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: After an OS update, there is an increase in background app activity, which gradually decreases over time. Reducing background tasks via deep sleep mode in battery settings can help minimize consumption.

rows.Title: No notification beep or vibration during call
rows.Problem: Phone does not vibrate or beep when on call
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone fails to provide vibration or beep notifications during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of notification feedback during calls, affecting user awareness but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Call recorder option showing after deleting recordings
rows.Problem: Irregular ♤ icon showing in Samsung dialer indicating a bug
rows.Summarized Problem: A call recorder option persists in the Samsung dialer even after recordings have been deleted.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not functioning correctly, leading to incorrect UI state, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Poor camera quality
rows.Problem: Camera images are out of focus at the edges and have grainy footage due to high ISO and 60fps recording. Color banding observed during gradient image viewing, likely due to third-party app usage.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera images show focus issues and graininess, especially under high ISO and high frame rate settings, with color banding possibly due to third-party app use.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image clarity but does not cause device crash or complete failure; it is a partial malfunction under specific conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: The out-of-focus and grainy footage occur due to high ISO and 60fps recording; color banding is likely caused by third-party app use, not native camera software.

rows.Title: UI issue
rows.Problem: weird bug with the now bar feature while using some application in landscape

rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI functionality in specific usage scenarios but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Device not charging

rows.Summarized Problem: The device is not charging when using a Samsung charger and cable, and OTG functionality is also impaired.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to charge, which is essential for basic operation, and OTG failure further limits usability.
rows.R&D Comment: AICL occurred, indicating voltage drop in the charging circuit; recommend service center inspection of hardware charging unit.

rows.Title: Google Maps app crashes
rows.Problem: The Google Maps app crashes intermittently, requiring multiple attempts to open, with no resolution despite updates.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Google Maps app crashes intermittently and requires multiple attempts to open.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes repeatedly, making it difficult to use the core navigation function.
rows.R&D Comment: Video and logs attached are not in sync. Please attach logs and video in proper sync to analyse the issue.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: battery draining issue

rows.Severity Reason: The battery drains faster than expected, affecting device usability during normal use.

rows.Summarized Problem: The camera stops working properly after each software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function is completely disabled after updates, making it unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Camera sensor eeprom module not working. Countermeasure: Check and replace the camera hardware sensor module.

rows.Title: Gallery people and pets issue

rows.Summarized Problem: Gallery fails to recognize faces of people after the one UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Face recognition is a core functionality that is completely broken, making the gallery unusable for key user interactions.
rows.R&D Comment: If the device has been idle with screen off and charging, the database may be corrupted; clearing related app data initiates a fresh reanalysis.

rows.Title: Clock position changed by Goodlock
rows.Problem: CX facing animation size issue

rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects animation size in a specific UI element but does not prevent device operation or cause system failure.

rows.Title: Poor signal strength
rows.Problem: The phone is not pulling signals well. The mobile network signals become weak

rows.Title: Routines not working properly

rows.Severity Reason: The routine function is completely non-functional in some devices, preventing users from using automated features.
rows.R&D Comment: A null pointer exception in MetadataLoaderJobService causes routine failure; a firmware update will address the app compatibility issue.

rows.Title: No update received
rows.Problem: No software update received since November, service center confirms it is not available

rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of update delivery, not complete device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Battery drain

rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain occurs after a software update, affecting device usability but not rendering it unusable or causing crashes.

rows.Title: Device hangs
rows.Problem: Device hanging issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device hangs during operation, likely due to insufficient logging and unstable background processes after boot.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive, making it unusable, and logs are insufficient to diagnose the root cause.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by inadequate log coverage during device boot; countermeasure is to collect CP silent logs after 5 minutes of uptime for stable performance analysis.

rows.Title: Yellowish tint on the screen

rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a cosmetic visual defect and does not impact device functionality or usability.

rows.Title: White square shown on the display

rows.Title: modes and routine app not working

rows.Title: Dialer not working
rows.Problem: Dialer app not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The dialer app is not functioning properly and users cannot switch to the dialpad screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a core app feature, preventing full access to the dialer interface.
rows.R&D Comment: The currently given log does not have enough logs regarding the Dialer app. However, from the image, it seems that it is temporarily impossible to switch to the Dialpad screen. If the problem is repeated, we ask for confirmation by initializing the app cache or update history. If it is still reproduced, we ask you to secure the log when the Dialer app is running.

rows.Title: Background wallpaper does not change

rows.Title: System UI not responding
rows.Problem: System UI not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The system UI is not responding, causing user interface unresponsiveness.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI not responding renders the interface unusable, preventing user interaction.

rows.Title: System heats up and goes in restart loop
rows.Problem: phone overheats and goes into restart loop after security update, continues for 70-80 restarts, persists after factory reset, phone lags during use
rows.Summarized Problem: The device overheats and enters a restart loop after a security update, with the issue persisting even after a factory reset and causing lag.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to repeated restarts and overheating, which severely impacts functionality and user experience.

rows.Title: Unable to turn on hotspot
rows.Problem: Mobile hotspot stops functioning after 4-5 uses and cannot be turned on again until device restart. Issue persists despite safe mode, factory reset, and troubleshooting.
rows.Summarized Problem: The mobile hotspot fails to turn on after repeated use and only works after a device restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The hotspot function becomes completely inoperative after multiple uses, rendering a key connectivity feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: PCIE interface between AP and WLAN Chipset is unstable. Need to check hardware. If the issue happens frequently, please visit customer center.

rows.Title: Unable to turn on High efficiency video and High Bitrate video simultaneously
rows.Problem: Both high efficiency video and high bitrate options are not turning on simultaneously in the camera. When one option is turned on, the other automatically turns off.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot enable both high efficiency video and high bitrate video options at the same time in the camera app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where one feature disables the other, but both are still functional in separate modes.
rows.R&D Comment: When High efficiency video is enabled, the device reduces bitrate, conflicting with high bitrate option. Starting with Galaxy S24 series, HEVC allows high bitrate recording without this conflict.

rows.Title: Incorrect apps suggested while opening PDF in WhatsApp
rows.Problem: Phone fails to recognize a default PDF viewer when opening PDF files in WhatsApp, instead showing incorrect app suggestions.
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp fails to recognize a default PDF viewer when opening PDF files, resulting in incorrect app suggestions.
rows.Severity Reason: The device does not properly detect or suggest a default PDF viewer, leading to a partial malfunction in app handling.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is fixed from WhatsApp server side. Please retest in latest version of app.

rows.Title: One UI not responding
rows.Problem: One UI not responding

rows.Title: Camera is very blurry

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drain and reduced screen-on time after One UI 7 update, even after patch. Screen-on time dropped from 6 hours to 4-5 hours under same usage conditions.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain after One UI 7 update, reducing screen-on time from 6 to 4-5 hours under consistent usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain severely impacts daily usage and device usability, leading to reduced screen-on time and regression compared to pre-update performance.
rows.R&D Comment: WhatsApp background activity and media syncing contribute to high battery consumption; optimization tips recommended.

rows.Title: Unable to turn on WiFi
rows.Problem: The log file is been attached

rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish a basic network function, preventing essential connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Issue started around 09-11 11:50:36; related log is already passed. Countermeasure: Capture log immediately after issue occurs.

rows.Title: Poor camera quality
rows.Problem: Nighttime photos look like they're trying to shoot daytime, losing clarity and photo balance. Low light photos have high noise despite advertised nighttime improvements. Videos are also affected. Portraits have issues with subject appearance.
rows.Summarized Problem: Nighttime and low-light photography lacks clarity and balance, with poor photo quality and high noise despite advertised improvements.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera's nighttime performance is fundamentally flawed, leading to inconsistent and unbalanced photos that fail to meet user expectations in real-world conditions.

rows.Title: Screen goes black when switching WhatsApp account

rows.R&D Comment: Video is not attached. Issue is not clear. So, we cannot analyse the issue. Please attach new logs and video in sync.

rows.Title: Screen freezes while using Modes & Routines

rows.Title: Modes and Routines not working properly

rows.Title: Issues observed while picking or ending the call
