rows.Problem: When opening a PDF file in WhatsApp, the app shows other app options but no PDF reader app, making it impossible to open PDF files
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp shows incorrect app options when opening PDF files, failing to display a PDF reader app and preventing users from opening PDFs.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from opening PDF files properly, but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is limited to app selection behavior.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is already reported to WhatsApp. The problem occurs when WhatsApp processes an internal file already stored on the device, and requires further investigation from WhatsApp side.

rows.Title: Color tone doesn't work in pro/pro video
rows.Problem: When Animator Scale is set to 0, color tone doesn't work in camera pro/pro video. When Animator Scale is above 0, color tone works and screen recording sends.
rows.Summarized Problem: Color tone function fails when Animator Scale is set to 0 in camera pro/pro video.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails under specific conditions but works when Animator Scale is above 0, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Fix NPE issue (B OS). Before modified APK is released, users must turn off 'Reduce Animations' in Settings > Accessibility > Visual Assistance > Reduce Animations setting.

rows.Title: Serious software issue detected pop up
rows.Problem: Getting a serious software issue detected notice every time after starting tab, but no pending software update
rows.Summarized Problem: A serious software issue detected pop-up appears every time after starting the tab, despite no pending software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The pop-up indicates a serious software issue that appears repeatedly upon app launch, suggesting a critical system-level malfunction.

rows.Title: Network issue
rows.Problem: Vi Idea SIM shows 'R' (roaming) at home
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows roaming indicator 'R' on SIM status when at home, indicating a network configuration issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue shows incorrect network status at home, which may lead to user confusion and potential loss of connectivity or service.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Network Switching Issue
rows.Problem: Device hangs when switching between 5G and 4G networks, showing 'No Internet Connection' in Chrome. Connection drops frequently and requires manual restart of mobile data or airplane mode to recover.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device hangs and loses internet connection when switching between 5 or 4G networks, requiring manual restart to recover.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable during network switching, preventing access to apps and browsers, and requires repeated manual intervention.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Clock animation not working
rows.Problem: Clock animation and AOD animation not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock animation on the lock screen is not functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: The animation failure affects visual feedback but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: App crash while launching Facebook
rows.Problem: Facebook app isn't launching on Samsung M34 5G device
rows.Summarized Problem: The Facebook app crashes when attempting to launch on the Samsung M34 5G device.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to launch entirely, preventing user access to a core social media feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Temporary app-side issue identified in GMS logs; Countermeasure: Update app via Play Store and retest.

rows.Title: Bixby Text Call
rows.Problem: Unable to turn on Bixby Text Call
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot turn on Bixby Text Call functionality.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not operable, but the device remains usable overall.

rows.Title: Samsung health monitor shows no connected watch found
rows.Problem: Samsung health monitor app issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Health Monitor app cannot detect or connect to any smartwatch, particularly Tizen watches in India.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to connect to watches due to unsupported firmware, but functionality is not completely lost and can be resolved with a compatible device.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Tizen watch for India doesn't support Samsung Health Monitor app. Countermeasure: Use Watch 4 or above in India.

rows.Title: Lock screen clock changes its position automatically
rows.Problem: Adaptive clock style not working properly after oneui 8 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The adaptive clock style on the lock screen is not working properly after the OneUI 8 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a specific UI element but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to set Modes & Routines
rows.Problem: Not able to Set Modes and Routine
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot set modes and routines in the device settings.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot configure routines, which is a partial functionality failure but does not render the device unusable.

rows.Title: Update for Samsung Language Core failed to install
rows.Problem: The new update for the Samsung language core on Android 16 kept downloading even after it reached its intended download capacity and failed to install
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung language core update fails to install after reaching download capacity.
rows.Severity Reason: The update fails to install, preventing proper language functionality on the device.

rows.Title: Secure Folder opening automatically
rows.Problem: Secure Folder has been opening automatically
rows.Summarized Problem: Secure Folder opens automatically when the user leaves it.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where the Secure Folder opens unexpectedly, but does not prevent device usage or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Immediate lock option has been deprecated due to UI and security issues; alternative lock methods remain available.

rows.Title: Clock not adjusting as per the set wallpaper
rows.Problem: Clock face is not updating with the set wallpaper after updating to one UI
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen is not updating when the wallpaper changes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality of the clock display but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Clock style editing option greyed out
rows.Problem: Clock style editing option on lock screen greyed out after UI 8 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock style editing option on the lock screen is greyed out after the UI 8 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially unavailable, preventing users from customizing clock style, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Pictures taken from PRO mode turns upside down
rows.Problem: Camera PRO mode takes photos upside down after update, while other camera options work normally
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera PRO mode captures photos upside down after the One UI 8 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a camera feature, not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The DOF Adapter function in Camera Assistant is enabled, which causes upside-down images; users should disable it if not using external lenses.

rows.Title: Wireless Android Auto not working properly
rows.Problem: Wireless Android Auto is not working properly. Music plays like scratched CD. Map freezes and unable to take calls. No issue with wired android auto. Video attached for reference.
rows.Summarized Problem: Wireless Android Auto fails to function properly, with music playback issues, map freezing, and inability to take calls, while wired Android Auto works normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to operate correctly, causing critical usability issues such as inability to take calls and map freezing, rendering the device unusable for key functions during use.

rows.Title: Facebook closes as soon as it is launched
rows.Problem: Facebook not working after One UI 8 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Facebook app crashes immediately upon launch after the One UI 8 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes immediately upon launch, preventing user access to Facebook entirely.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs in the PasskeyService component of the Facebook app; the root cause is within META's source code and not related to Samsung development.

rows.Title: Now Brief not shown on lock screen
rows.Problem: I am unable to see now brief on my lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief is not displayed on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the lock screen, preventing users from seeing real-time information, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Camera stutters in auto focus and macro mode
rows.Problem: Auto focus and macro mode are not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: Auto focus and macro mode in the camera experience stutters and do not function properly.
rows.Severity Reason: Auto focus and macro mode are major camera functions that are not working, making the camera unusable in key scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: UV Damper peeling and improper assembly cause AF oscillation errors; improved jig and height measurement will correct alignment and prevent driving force errors.

rows.Title: Slide to typing not working in Samsung keyboard
rows.Problem: Slide to typing is not working in Samsung keyboard
rows.Summarized Problem: Slide to typing function is not working in the Samsung keyboard.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working, but the device remains usable and no data is lost.

rows.Title: Filters missing from portrait video
rows.Problem: Portrait video filters such as Color Point and High-Key Mono are missing, even after the One UI 8 update, despite being available on previous Galaxy S Series phones.
rows.Summarized Problem: Portrait video filters are missing in the camera app on the Galaxy S25 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a key video function but is not causing device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Portrait video filter is no longer supported because simplification has been decided.

rows.Title: Animated clock does not appear on AOD
rows.Problem: The animated clock does not appear on the Always On Display when the screen is locked. A basic, non-animated clock is displayed instead.
rows.Summarized Problem: The animated clock fails to display on the Always On Display when the screen is locked, showing only a basic, non-animated clock instead.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a key visual element of the lock screen, impacting user experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Camera lens not focusing properly
rows.Problem: The camera lens is not focusing properly. The lens mechanism keeps adjusting and the back area of the phone heats up significantly. This issue has been occurring since July. Attached screen recording and logs of the last 10 minutes.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera lens fails to focus correctly and continuously adjusts, causing instability and overheating of the phone's back area.
rows.Severity Reason: The lens focus malfunction prevents reliable image capture and is linked to device overheating, which may lead to performance degradation or damage.
rows.R&D Comment: UV Damper peeling and improper assembly cause AF position errors; improved jig and OVS inspection will mitigate the issue.

rows.Title: Chat setting option is greyed out
rows.Problem: I can't open message Chat setting
rows.Summarized Problem: The chat settings option is greyed out and cannot be accessed.
rows.Severity Reason: The user cannot access a key feature setting, which impacts usability but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Quick Panel background becomes transparent when switching between dark and light mode
rows.Problem: When switching from dark mode to light mode, the notification panel becomes completely transparent and overlaps the home screen, making it appear as if it's on top of the previous screen.
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel becomes completely transparent when switching from dark to light mode, causing it to overlap the home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual clarity and user experience during mode switching, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Back navigation is not working
rows.Problem: Back navigation is not working while on call screen
rows.Summarized Problem: Back navigation does not work when on a call screen
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot exit a call using back navigation, making it impossible to return to previous screens, which renders a core interaction unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: This is not an issue; call support and home button provide alternative ways to minimize calls. Back navigation is intentionally unsupported during calls.

rows.Title: Camera stutters at 0.6x
rows.Problem: Ultra wide lens 0.6x creates glitter and noise when viewing video
rows.Summarized Problem: The ultra wide lens at 0.6x on the camera produces visual noise and glitter during video viewing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visual artifacts but does not prevent device operation or result in a complete failure of camera function.
rows.R&D Comment: UV Damper peeling and misalignment cause driving resistance errors, leading to AF position inaccuracies and video noise; improved jig and OVS inspection will mitigate this.

rows.Title: Clock style not adjusting with wallpaper
rows.Problem: Clock style issue on lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock style on the lock screen does not adjust properly when the wallpaper changes.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual consistency of the lock screen but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Lock Screen Wallpaper Shows Black
rows.Problem: Lock screen wallpaper shows black instead of the set image
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen wallpaper displays as black instead of the user-set image.
rows.Severity Reason: The wallpaper fails to display correctly, leading to a partial visual malfunction but does not prevent device usage or cause system failure.

rows.Title: Lockscreen shortcut outline visible when now bar is expanded
rows.Problem: Lock screen shortcuts outline present when expanding now bar
rows.Summarized Problem: The outline of lock screen shortcuts appears when the now bar is expanded.
rows.Severity Reason: This is a cosmetic UI issue that does not affect device usability or functionality.

rows.Title: Beta banner issue
rows.Problem: Samsung member beta banner still showing after updating to UI 8.0 and latest software version. User unsure if need to leave beta program and restore device.
rows.Summarized Problem: Beta banner continues to display after software updates, causing user confusion about whether to leave the beta program or restore device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause functional failure.

rows.Title: Blue hue seen while using camera
rows.Problem: Blue hue observed during camera preview under specific conditions
rows.Summarized Problem: A blue hue appears in the camera preview under specific conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance during camera use but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is intermittent under specific conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: AWB jump in preview mode under specific conditions. Countermeasure: Enable debug logs and tuning metadata via adb commands to capture sensor data for analysis.

rows.Title: Volume drops to zero when connecting Type C wired earphone
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7.0, when connecting Samsung Type-C wired earphones, the phone volume automatically drops to zero every time the earphones are plugged in.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device volume drops to zero whenever Type-C wired earphones are connected.
rows.Severity Reason: The volume drops to zero every time earphones are connected, making audio unusable immediately after connection.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Only one instance in logs with no volume change after connection; Counter Measure: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to find edge panel
rows.Problem: Edge panel setting is missing in display settings
rows.Summarized Problem: The edge panel setting is missing in the display settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a display setting, leading to a partial UI malfunction.

rows.Title: Scrolling has become slow
rows.Problem: hanging issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Scrolling has become slow and causes hanging during use.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of scrolling functionality, leading to intermittent hanging during user interaction.

rows.Title: Device turns off frequently
rows.Problem: Device restarts unexpectedly
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently turns off and restarts unexpectedly.
rows.Severity Reason: The device turning off and restarting unexpectedly renders it unusable, indicating a critical system failure.

rows.Title: BT not connecting
rows.Problem: bluetooth connectivity issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth is unable to establish a connection with the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to connect to Bluetooth, which is essential for pairing with other devices, making it unusable for core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Main PBA defect (BT/WIFI IC mounted) is suspected; physical analysis required for confirmation.

rows.Title: Wifi calling not working
rows.Problem: Wi-fi calling option stopped working after security updates, works on other Samsung handsets with same SIM card
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi calling stopped working after security updates and does not function on this device despite working on other Samsung devices with the same SIM card.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working on a specific device after an update, but still works on other devices with the same SIM, indicating a device-specific compatibility issue rather than a complete system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: As per logs, no call observed throughout the log time coverage. Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: User facing battery health issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience significant battery drain under normal usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial battery performance degradation under heavy app usage, but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Heavy app usage (Shadow Fight 4, YouTube) increases CPU and data consumption; Counter Measure: Collect logs after full charge and heavy usage until 20%.

rows.Title: Facebook screen goes black while scrolling
rows.Problem: Cx app screen issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The Facebook app screen goes black while scrolling.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction during scrolling but does not make the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is from app side; app not in latest version. Recommend updating app and clearing cache.

rows.Title: Mobile data not working
rows.Problem: Check attached video
rows.Summarized Problem: Mobile data connectivity is not functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot access mobile data, which is essential for basic communication and internet usage, making the device unusable in many scenarios.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera failed pop up
rows.Problem: Cx facing camera issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The Cx facing camera fails to pop up properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to function, preventing basic device usage.

rows.Title: Camera stutters at 0.6x
rows.Problem: Camera stutters when using 0.6x zoom in photos and videos, has persisted for months. Tried all recommended solutions previously.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera stutters when using 0.6x zoom in photos and videos.
rows.Severity Reason: The stuttering occurs during active use and affects core camera functionality at a common zoom level, leading to poor user experience and potential frustration during usage.
rows.R&D Comment: pa3q device's camera had issue - i2c failed on rear2 camera's actuator. this is camera sensor module HW defect or caused by damaged connector on PBA. this is not camera SW issue. guide customer goto official samsung cs center for check and fix this kind's camera HW issue.

rows.Title: Goodlock app unable to load app list
rows.Problem: cannot download plugins from Good Lock on Samsung S25 Ultra due to country restriction
rows.Summarized Problem: Goodlock app fails to load app list and plugins on Samsung S25 Ultra due to country-specific support limitation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents plugin downloads but does not cause device crash or complete failure of core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Device in Bhutan; Good Lock not supported. Counter Measure: Same as cause.

rows.Title: Lock screen adaptive clock not working
rows.Problem: Adaptive clock face is not working every time
rows.Summarized Problem: The adaptive clock face on the lock screen fails to function properly every time.
rows.Severity Reason: The adaptive clock fails to work consistently, rendering a core feature of the lock screen unusable.

rows.Title: Home screen customizations gets reversed
rows.Problem: Home screen customizations are reverting after each power cycle following the update to One UI 8 and the Home Up application
rows.Summarized Problem: Home screen customizations are reverting after each power cycle after updating to One UI 8 and the Home Up application.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of home screen personalization, but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue may be due to a specific path or setting in the Home Up application; users should report previous operations if the issue recurs.

rows.Title: Camera quality is not good
rows.Problem: Low image quality with lack of detail, especially in lighting conditions where images appear overly white and overexposed
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces low-quality images with poor detail and overexposure in lighting conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: Images lack detail and are overexposed in light, making them unusable for clear visual content.
rows.R&D Comment: The camera's low pixel sensor causes upscaling and reduced resolution, leading to noise and blur in out-of-focus areas; countermeasure involves addressing sensor limitations and image processing during high-resolution capture.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drains faster on UI 8.0 compared to UI 7.0, with 12-20% loss after one hour of YouTube use, 2-4% in two minutes of Chrome usage, and 3-4% in two minutes of Samsung News app usage when screen is on. Other apps also show significant drain. Please fix.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain on UI 8.0, especially during YouTube and browser usage, compared to UI 7.0.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain during normal usage leads to device becoming unusable before charge cycles complete, indicating a major functional issue.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Additional battery usage due to hotspot when screen is off. Countermeasure: Guide user to turn off hotspot when not in use.

rows.Title: Performance issue in AI image functionality
rows.Problem: AI image functionality is experiencing performance issues following the One UI 8 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The AI image functionality is lagging or performing poorly after the One UI 8 update, especially when handling multi-racial or multi-person inputs.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable lag during AI image generation but does not result in device crash or data loss, and functionality remains partially available.
rows.R&D Comment: High error rate when entering multi-racial or 4+ people inputs; Drawing Assist will block person generation and continuously improve output quality.

rows.Title: System text UI size increases or decreases automatically
rows.Problem: Text DPI on screen automatically increases or decreases, causing text to appear very small or enlarged, requiring restart to resolve
rows.Summarized Problem: Text size on the screen automatically changes, causing inconsistent display and requiring restart to fix.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes inconsistent text display but does not render the device unusable or crash.

rows.Title: Media player option not shown on Now Bar
rows.Problem: Missing media player option in live notifications now bar
rows.Summarized Problem: The media player option is missing from the Now Bar live notifications.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, but the device remains usable and core functions are intact.

rows.Title: Overlapping in quick panel buttons
rows.Problem: Software glitches when scrolling down to control panel
rows.Summarized Problem: Buttons in the quick panel overlap due to layout timing issues when scrolling.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes visual glitches during scrolling but does not prevent device operation or lead to crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Layout timing issue fixed; update includes correction in OS.

rows.Title: Call option not there in vibration intensity
rows.Problem: Call option not there in vibration and intensity
rows.Summarized Problem: The call vibration intensity option is missing in the audio vibration settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing but not causing device malfunction or data loss; it is a partial functionality gap.
rows.R&D Comment: This device does not support call vibration intensity. This option depends upon the motor HW in device.

rows.Title: Image date different in gallery
rows.Problem: Photos downloaded from Google Photos show current download date instead of original date, making chronological organization impossible
rows.Summarized Problem: Downloaded photos from Google Photos display the current download date instead of the original date, disrupting chronological organization.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo organization but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The gallery app shows the device's current time instead of original EXIF date because the image lacks EXIF date information; users should upload the image to Google Photos again to retrieve original metadata.

rows.Title: Can't apply content pop up in galaxy themes
rows.Problem: Cx unable to apply icon on device from galaxy theme
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot apply icons from Galaxy themes due to unsupported QMG-based content.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in theme application, preventing icon display but not causing device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: QMG content is not supported on devices without QMG library; Counter Measure: Display incompatibility message if device lacks QMG support.

rows.Title: Unable to login to work profile
rows.Problem: Unable to open work profile; enters 'try again' error after entering correct PIN or pattern; only one profile appears instead of two, despite having set same lock for both profiles
rows.Summarized Problem: User cannot log in to the work profile on Samsung A22, receiving 'try again' error despite correct PIN or pattern, and only one profile appears instead of two.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the work profile login and display, preventing full access to one profile but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.

rows.Title: 5G signal not working
rows.Problem: 5G signal not showing even in 5G network area
rows.Summarized Problem: The device does not show 5G signal despite being in a 5G network area.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to detect 5G signal in a 5G network area, making connectivity unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: mipi failure in physical device; Countermeasure: Provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: S Health app not auto syncing
rows.Problem: Samsung Health app is not auto syncing Galaxy Watch 8 LTE data regularly. It only syncs when the app is opened. User has tried all troubleshooting steps: latest app update, power saving mode disabled, background usage enabled, auto sync on mobile data and Wi-Fi enabled, both devices updated to latest version, app cache cleared. Sync still does not occur regularly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Health app fails to auto-sync data from Galaxy Watch 8 LTE regularly, only syncing when manually opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to perform a regular background sync, but functionality is partially available when manually triggered.
rows.R&D Comment: As per log analysis, data sync was ongoing at the time of screenshot; last sync occurred at 10:28 PM previous day. Time sync completed at 1:06 AM. User needs to manually trigger sync via dashboard or settings button to ensure data updates.

rows.Title: Auto rotate icon appears on the top of the screen
rows.Problem: Autorotate icon appears on right hand top corner, which if clicked, turns to landscape. How to prevent this
rows.Summarized Problem: An autorotate icon appears on the top right corner of the screen and toggling it changes the device orientation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user interface behavior but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Cursor placement is wrong
rows.Problem: Cursor is before the 0 when opening the Samsung calculator, making it difficult to use immediately. User has to clear the 0 before starting calculations.
rows.Summarized Problem: The cursor appears before the zero in the Samsung calculator when opened, hindering immediate use.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects usability but does not prevent core functionality or cause device failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cursor will be behind zero. We fixed the issue.

rows.Title: Android update warning
rows.Problem: Opening work apps like Teams, Outlook results in an error stating the phone requires an Android security patch of 2025-05-01
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot open work apps due to an Android security patch requirement error.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to launch essential apps, making it unusable for core functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Please ask customer to get update software from Settings -> Software Update in order to fix this issue

rows.Title: Lock screen shows black screen
rows.Problem: lockscreen shows black screen instead of dynamic wallpaper
rows.Summarized Problem: The lock screen displays a black screen instead of the dynamic wallpaper.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual appearance of the lock screen but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Camera stutters at 0.5x
rows.Problem: The 0.5x lens (wide lens) has lost stability after the ONE UI 7 update, causing shaking and poor image clarity with oily texture.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera's 0.5x wide lens is unstable and produces blurry, oily-textured images after the ONE UI 7 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function is severely impaired, resulting in unusable image quality and a significant user experience degradation.

rows.Title: Degraded camera quality
rows.Problem: Camera quality degraded after OneUI 7 update. Images have over-sharpness, pale colors, increased noise, and poor shadows. Selfie camera shows pale skin tones. 0.5x zoom produces blurry images and no video stabilization. Videos have more noise and instability.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera image quality has degraded after OneUI 7 update, with over-sharpness, color paleness, increased noise, and poor shadows, especially in selfies and low-light conditions, and lacks stabilization at 0.5x zoom.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera function is severely impaired, resulting in visibly poor image quality and instability, making photos and videos unusable in real-world conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: SeamlessZoom was not supported in U OS; camera ID mismatch caused degraded performance. Fixed by aligning camera ID with U OS for 50MP camera.

rows.Title: Brightness issue in low light condition
rows.Problem: The phone's brightness is low in low light conditions, and when scrolling on dark backgrounds, white colors appear with a pinkish tone. This issue occurs regardless of screen color mode or refresh rate changes.
rows.Summarized Problem: The display shows a pinkish tint when white colors are displayed on dark backgrounds in low light, affecting visual comfort.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance during normal use but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Low brightness area (IT1小) color draw due to Green emission delay due to CEL cap difference. Counter Measure: Improve design to reduce emission delay, aligning with previous model (A54, A34) ratios.

rows.Title: Mobile Data Not Working with Swiggy and BlaBla
rows.Problem: No internet connectivity
rows.Summarized Problem: Swiggy and BlaBla apps fail to connect to the internet when using mobile data.
rows.Severity Reason: The apps cannot access the internet on mobile data, making them unusable under normal usage conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera quality is not good
rows.Problem: Photos taken with flash are dimmed or completely black, indicating poor image capture when using flash light.
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos taken with flash are completely black or extremely dim, indicating a failure in image capture under flash conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The image output is totally black when using flash, rendering photos unusable and preventing basic functionality of the camera feature under normal use cases.
rows.R&D Comment: If issue still persists please follow below steps: Clean the camera lens – Remove dirt, smudges, or case obstruction. Reset camera settings – Go to Camera app settings and reset to default. Check camera resolution – Ensure it's set to high quality. Test in good lighting – Try in daylight or bright conditions. Update software – Check for and install any system or app updates. Use camera diagnostics – Run hardware test (e.g., Samsung Members 〉 D

rows.Title: Auto focus not working in camera
rows.Problem: Phone Samsung S20 FE 5G Since recent software update my phone is unable to do focus automatically nor by touching screen Auto focus is lost
rows.Summarized Problem: Auto focus functionality is not working in the camera app on Samsung S20 FE 5G after a recent software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot perform automatic focus, which is a core camera function, making photo capture unreliable and unusable.

rows.Title: Spam messages and calls
rows.Problem: Receiving spam messages and calls from unknown headers and numbers without a phone number
rows.Summarized Problem: Users receive spam messages and calls from unknown sources without identifiable phone numbers.
rows.Severity Reason: Spam calls and messages disrupt user experience but do not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Device restarts on its own
rows.Problem: Device restarting issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is restarting unexpectedly.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts on its own, making it unusable and indicating a critical hardware or system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: WTSR problem was happened several times. Please visit the Service Center to check HW problem on this device.

rows.Title: System performance issue
rows.Problem: When Samsung Note is open, screen jumps and nothing can be done. Cursor does not fall at proper place. Tab behavior is strange, leading to unintended clicks and loss of work. This occurs within 5 minutes of message sending.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device's screen and cursor behavior become unresponsive and erratic when Samsung Note is open, causing unintended actions and loss of work.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen jumps, cursor fails to position properly, and unintended clicks occur, making the device unusable during the session.

rows.Title: Call & text on other device option not working
rows.Problem: Call & text on other device option not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The call and text on other device feature is not working.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing users from using the functionality, but the device remains usable overall.

rows.Title: Apps not launching
rows.Problem: Apps are not launching; device says not compatible with the app
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps are not launching due to compatibility errors despite reinstallation.
rows.Severity Reason: The device indicates incompatibility, preventing app launch, which renders core functionality unusable.

rows.Title: Device shuts down unexpectedly
rows.Problem: Device shuts down unexpectedly
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shuts down unexpectedly.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shutting down unexpectedly can render the device unusable and may indicate a critical battery or system issue.

rows.Title: System UI not responding
rows.Problem: Ok those pic r
rows.Summarized Problem: The System UI is not responding.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI is not responding, making the interface unusable.

rows.Title: Moisture detected in USB ports
rows.Problem: Moisture or foreign material in the charging or USB port
rows.Summarized Problem: Moisture or foreign material is present in the charging or USB port, affecting connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The presence of moisture or foreign material in the USB port can cause device malfunction or damage, leading to potential failure of charging or data transfer.

rows.Title: Unable to clear notification from notification panel
rows.Problem: I get not removable notification on notification bar. The notification is voice mail number is not set, so how to get voicemail number of vi sim
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot remove notifications from the notification panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the notification panel functionality, preventing users from removing notifications, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Getting calls even when numbers are blocked
rows.Problem: Receiving calls after blocking numbers
rows.Summarized Problem: Users receive calls even after blocking phone numbers.
rows.Severity Reason: Call blocking is a core feature; failure to block calls renders the feature ineffective and compromises user control over incoming calls.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Instagram does not open
rows.Problem: The Instagram app keeps closing automatically and shows the message Instagram closed because this app has a bug. Try updating this app after its developer provides a fix for this error. Please resolve the issue as soon as possible
rows.Summarized Problem: The Instagram app crashes automatically and fails to open, indicating a bug in the app's code.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes immediately upon launch, preventing users from accessing a core social media function, which renders the device unusable for that feature.

rows.Title: Lag observed in gallery app
rows.Problem: Gallery app is lagging
rows.Summarized Problem: The gallery app is experiencing lag during operation.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag is a partial malfunction that affects user experience but does not render the app unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Internal update operations due to image additions or deletions may cause load; concurrent processes could also contribute. No action is required if logs are normal, but further logs should be collected if the issue persists.

rows.Title: Now brief not shown on lock screen
rows.Problem: Now brief not appearing on lockscreen after upgrading to android16
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief does not appear on the lock screen after upgrading to Android 16.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, where a feature fails to display on the lock screen under specific conditions, but does not render the device unusable or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: The brief on lockscreen disappeared when entering Brief application. This is concept. Please keep this status.

rows.Title: Poor camera quality
rows.Problem: After update, camera quality is blurry
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera quality is blurry after software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of camera functionality after an update, affecting image clarity but not causing device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Foreign object like fingerprint on camera lens. Countermeasure: Clean lens with microfiber cotton and retest.

rows.Title: Notification expands automatically
rows.Problem: When a new notification arrives, touching the screen simultaneously causes the notification panel to automatically expand downward without intentional swipe or tap on the status bar. This behavior is unintended and disrupts normal interaction.
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel automatically expands when the screen is touched, disrupting normal user interaction.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user interaction flow but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: System UI isn't optimized pop up occurs
rows.Problem: This occurred after one UI update and while connecting wireless Android Auto
rows.Summarized Problem: Unoptimized pop-ups appear in the System UI after an update, especially during wireless Android Auto connection.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of UI elements during a specific use case, not causing device crash or data loss, but affecting usability.

rows.Title: Lines appearing at border when launching apps
rows.Problem: Lines reflecting at border while opening apps, including camera app
rows.Summarized Problem: Lines appear at the screen border when launching apps or opening the camera.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects app launch and camera experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs due to scaling calculation errors between UI and preview layers in camera animation, causing a 1-pixel border line; countermeasure is identical to cause.

rows.Title: Searching contacts
rows.Problem: When searching for a contact with a partial name like 'Div', the search shows incorrect results such as other contacts starting with 'a' or names containing 'div' in the middle or at the end.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contact search returns incorrect results when using partial names, showing unrelated contacts instead of matching ones.
rows.Severity Reason: The search function partially fails, producing incorrect results but does not prevent full device operation or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: The root cause could not be identified due to insufficient logs and missing index files. Suggested countermeasure: clear SCS data to trigger reindexing.

rows.Title: Unable to reset the EPC
rows.Problem: I cannot reset the EPC. I need a reset option so I can use the EPC properly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot reset the EPC, and there is no available reset option in the settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The inability to reset the EPC prevents proper device functionality, making it unusable for intended use cases.
rows.R&D Comment: What is EPC? Please provide more information in detail for the EPC.

rows.Title: Video call UI glitch on WhatsApp
rows.Problem: WhatsApp video call side screen problem
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp video call displays a glitched side screen during video calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual display during video calls but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is likely due to WhatsApp app version incompatibility; recommend updating the app and clearing cache.

rows.Title: Screen off memo option not showing in S Pen settings
rows.Problem: Screen off memo enabled disable option not showing in S Pen setting option
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen off memo option is missing in the S Pen settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not visible in the settings, preventing users from configuring screen off memo functionality, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Modes and routines not working properly
rows.Problem: There is no update available and I have completed all troubleshooting steps. A screen recording is attached showing the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: Modes and routines are not functioning properly on some devices due to app compatibility issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional on some devices, preventing users from using core automation features.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: App compatibility issue in Modes and Routines automation. Countermeasure: Updated version to be released by September; users should keep firmware and app updated.

rows.Title: Screen display not working properly
rows.Problem: The display has broken pixels and background waves, indicating poor screen quality
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen display has broken pixels and visual artifacts, indicating poor display quality
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual clarity but does not cause device malfunction or crash

rows.Title: Modes and routines not working properly
rows.Problem: Some devices fail to execute modes and routines due to app compatibility issues during automation function execution
rows.Summarized Problem: Modes and routines fail to execute on some devices due to app compatibility issues during automation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of automation features but does not render the device unusable or result in data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Caused by app compatibility issues during automation; countermeasure is an updated version scheduled for release in September.

rows.Title: Pictures are not clear
rows.Problem: High noise in pictures taken with camera
rows.Summarized Problem: Pictures taken with the camera have high noise, especially in dark environments with digital zoom.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction under specific conditions (dark environment and digital zoom), but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The high noise is due to high ISO and digital zoom in dark environments; the issue is inherent to camera settings and not a software defect.

rows.Title: Modes and routines keeps stopping pop up
rows.Problem: Cx facing Modes and Routines is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Modes and Routines feature stops working and does not function properly in the app.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to operate consistently, leading to partial malfunction but does not render the device unusable.

rows.Title: fingerprint unlock is getting disabled automatically
rows.Problem: after the aug security update on my galaxy s24 ultra, fingerprint unlock is getting disabled automatically and has to be re-enabled repeatedly. also, after unlocking the phone with pin, the biometrics get disabled and a screen recording pop up appears
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint unlock is being disabled automatically after the August security update and requires frequent re-enabling.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is intermittently failing but does not completely disable device usability, only requiring manual re-enabling.

rows.Title: Battery drain issue
rows.Problem: Battery drains significantly even when the device is not in use, worse than on old phone. Screen-on time was 3 hours and 5 minutes. Instagram app was mainly used. Poor signal strength and high cellular TX power (54.1%) contribute to increased network consumption and frequent reconnections.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant battery drain even when not in use, especially in poor signal conditions, leading to rapid depletion of battery life.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drains rapidly over a few hours, with a 53% drop in battery level in under 10 hours, indicating a major issue that compromises device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Poor signal strength and high cellular TX power (54.1%) increase network consumption and reconnection frequency. Countermeasure: Same as cause; no improvement in current status.

rows.Title: Issue observed while zooming in the camera
rows.Problem: Cx facing camera issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera zoom function shows visual distortion when switching between lenses due to differences in lens characteristics and physical mounting positions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a visible mismatch during zoom transitions but does not prevent full camera functionality or cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The lens switching during zoom causes visual distortion due to differing lens characteristics and physical mounting positions; the issue is inherent to the hardware and optical design.

rows.Title: Unable to receive incoming calls
rows.Problem: fails to receive all incoming calls after the update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to receive all incoming calls after the update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot receive incoming calls, which is a core communication function making the device unusable for basic operations.

rows.Title: Spam call detection not working
rows.Problem: Spam call detection option is on but does not show spam calls during incoming calls
rows.Summarized Problem: Spam call detection is enabled but fails to identify and show spam calls during incoming calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is active but fails to function correctly during call reception, resulting in partial malfunction of a core call safety function.
rows.R&D Comment: Spam detection is enabled but no CallTC logs confirm filtering errors; spam numbers may not be flagged by Hiya service.

rows.Title: Unable to play videos on 4K in YouTube
rows.Problem: The Samsung Galaxy M33 does not support 4K quality options on YouTube or OTT platforms, despite claims of support. The device only supports software decoding for VP9 up to FHD, limiting 4K playback for VP9 content.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Galaxy M33 cannot play 4K content on YouTube or OTT platforms due to insufficient decoder support.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access 4K content as promised, leading to a major discrepancy between marketing claims and actual functionality, rendering a key feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The device supports only software decoding for VP9 up to FHD; it can play 4-4K AVC/HEVC at 30fps but fails for VP9 content, so playback depends on content format.

rows.Title: Device restarts and freezes
rows.Problem: Device restarts and freezes
rows.Summarized Problem: The device restarts and freezes unexpectedly.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts and freezes, making it unusable and potentially leading to data loss or system instability.

rows.Title: Sound noisy during call
rows.Problem: Call sound is unclear with significant noise, like broken speaker
rows.Summarized Problem: Call audio is noisy and unclear, resembling a broken speaker.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of audio quality during calls, but does not cause device freeze or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Check the voice call route setting and audio path: *#0*#>LOOPBACK>Rcv_1stMic, SPK_2ndMic to verify the root cause and confirm if the issue occurs in both speaker and handset modes.

rows.Title: Device freezes and jitters
rows.Problem: face gitter and freezes issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences freezing and jittering during operation, particularly in face-related functions.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes and jitters, making it unusable and unresponsive, which is a major functional failure affecting core operation.
rows.R&D Comment: The GMU error is suspected to be due to an AP defect; recommend guiding customers to check hardware.

rows.Title: Unable to set up mobile plan in galaxy watch 8
rows.Problem: Unable to add mobile plan in Galaxy Watch8
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot add a mobile plan to Galaxy Watch 8.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing or not working, preventing setup of a mobile plan, but the device remains otherwise usable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Airtel showed an error screen during watch eSIM ODSA subscription. Counter Measure: Please check why airtel showed error screen on their webpage during watch eSIM ODSA subscription.

rows.Title: Whatsapp notification not shown
rows.Problem: whatsapp notification issues
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp notifications are not being displayed to the user.
rows.Severity Reason: The notification feature is completely missing, preventing users from receiving important messages.

rows.Title: Now bar not working on Lock Screen
rows.Problem: Now brief is not showing or visible after updating One UI 8.0 on S25 Ultra. It appears after 12 hours but then disappears and does not show up again.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now bar does not appear on the lock screen after updating to One UI 8.0 and fails to show even when opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing after update, rendering the lock screen functionality incomplete and user experience disrupted.

rows.Title: Camera quality is not good
rows.Problem: Front camera videography is the worst. Video recorded in Pro Video mode at 60fps with maximum ISO results in noise, especially in low-light environments.
rows.Summarized Problem: Front camera video quality is poor due to high ISO settings in low-light conditions, resulting in visible noise.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of video recording quality under low-light conditions, not complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by maximum ISO settings in Pro Video mode; the countermeasure is to recommend longer shutter speed in low-light environments for better video quality.

rows.Title: Time zone settings not working
rows.Problem: Time zone settings not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Time zone settings are not functioning properly on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working, but the device remains usable overall.

rows.Title: USB headphones does not work
rows.Problem: usb headphones does not work
rows.Summarized Problem: USB headphones are not working after the update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a functional failure of a peripheral device after an update, affecting usability but not rendering the device completely unusable.

rows.Title: Device keeps on lagging
rows.Problem: Device lags and scrolling in social media apps is stuttering and jittery
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences significant lag and stuttering during scrolling in social media apps.
rows.Severity Reason: Lagging and stuttering during app scrolling severely impacts usability and makes the device feel unresponsive, especially in core social media use.
rows.R&D Comment: Performance issues not detected in logs; dumpstate has limited buffer; need detailed reproduction with app name and timing for better analysis.

rows.Title: Instagram app crash
rows.Problem: Instagram app crashes frequently and requires clearing cache or reinstalling to function. Issue occurs only with the official Instagram app and is intermittent.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Instagram app crashes frequently and requires cache clearing or reinstallation to function.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes repeatedly, making it unusable without frequent manual intervention, which severely impacts user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: This app is not developed by Samsung; code modification is not possible. Issue requires reporting to the app developer, who suggests avoiding low-frequency or non-critical issues.

rows.Title: Distorted pixels on Instagram and YouTube
rows.Problem: Damaged pixels causing display distortion in Instagram and YouTube apps, persists after factory data reset.
rows.Summarized Problem: Damaged pixels cause display distortion in Instagram and YouTube apps.
rows.Severity Reason: Display distortion in core apps affects usability and user experience, especially after factory reset.

rows.Title: Unable to see live cricket scores on the Now bar
rows.Problem: Unable to see live cricket scores on the Now bar
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot view live cricket scores on the Now bar of the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing users from accessing live cricket scores, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Camera quality is not good
rows.Problem: Camera image quality noticeably degraded compared to Galaxy S23. Photos and videos appear dull, moody, and noisier. Portraits lack sharpness and detail. Colors are less vibrant and punchy, low-light noise is more prominent. This is evident even in normal daylight shots.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera image quality is noticeably worse than Galaxy S23, with dull colors, lack of sharpness, and increased noise even in daylight.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial degradation of image quality, affecting visual appearance but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Noise removal performance is inferior in Pro mode and at 2x magnification due to single-frame processing and small sensor pixel size; 3x camera also has poor noise performance due to small pixel size.

rows.Title: Bixby unable to send WhatsApp message
rows.Problem: Bixby cannot send a WhatsApp message to a contact, while Gemini can
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby fails to send WhatsApp messages to contacts, while Gemini works correctly.
rows.Severity Reason: Bixby cannot send WhatsApp messages, but functionality works for Gemini, indicating a partial malfunction in a specific feature.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Bixby cannot find the contact on WhatsApp due to login or sync configuration issues. Countermeasure: Users must verify WhatsApp login status, contact sync settings, and icon visibility in ContactApp.

rows.Title: Network issue
rows.Problem: Network issue
rows.Summarized Problem: A network issue is occurring in the Mobile Networks settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in network settings, preventing full connectivity but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Call background shows solid color instead of default background
rows.Problem: Call background shows solid color instead of default background after updating to One UI 7
rows.Summarized Problem: The call background displays a solid color instead of the user's default background after updating to One UI 7.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual experience during calls but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs due to older versions of Samsung InCallUI (16.1.00.79) displaying contact card as background; it is resolved in newer versions (16.1.00.112 and above).

rows.Title: Face recognition option missing in Gallery
rows.Problem: Face recognition option missing in Gallery
rows.Summarized Problem: The face recognition option is missing in the Gallery app.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a potential database inconsistency after prolonged idle time; the recommended countermeasure is to clear related app data to initiate reanalysis.

rows.Title: Unable to launch Instagram
rows.Problem: Instagram is not opening on Galaxy S24 after recent update. App crashes with 'IllegalStateException: Unknown executor name' during launch. Clearing cache, data, force-stopping, and reinstalling did not resolve. Other apps like SuperMoney also crash.
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram fails to launch on Galaxy S24 after update, crashing with an illegal executor error during startup.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes during launch, preventing user from accessing a core social media application, rendering functionality unavailable.
rows.R&D Comment: This is a problem from app side. App developer need to fix this issue. We are not reporting one or sometimes issue until not reproduced manually. Log analysis shows Instagram terminates due to IllegalStateException: Unknown executor name during onCreate and onStart methods.

rows.Title: Call UI issue
rows.Problem: Name scrolling issue when calling or receiving a call with long names; name not fully displayed with scrolling
rows.Summarized Problem: Long caller names do not fully display and scroll properly in the call interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial display of caller names, affecting usability but not rendering the app unusable or causing crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: The caller information is shown in a small area due to profile picture size settings; users can select large profile picture size to show full name with automatic scrolling.

rows.Title: Poor camera quality
rows.Problem: camera facing issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces poor image quality, especially under low light conditions, with visible edging effects instead of noise.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial image degradation under specific conditions, but does not render the camera unusable or cause system crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: The photo with grass is taken in extreme low light condition with BV = -11, the image look as expected in such extreme low light condition. The second image does not look noisy, instead there is some edging effect. So introspect that effect we need dumps for capture. The provided dumps are not of the captures. It is requested to provide proper dumps to analyse.

rows.Title: Video quality compromises when posted on Instagram
rows.Problem: Instagram video quality issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Video quality is compromised when posted on Instagram.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of video quality during upload, not complete failure or device crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Tips to reduce compression: use high-quality source video, edit before uploading, and check Instagram upload settings.

rows.Title: Issue occurred while launching Airtel Thanks App
rows.Problem: When I try to open the Airtel Thanks app, I am getting the following error: "Screen overlay detected. Please disable."
rows.Summarized Problem: The Airtel Thanks app fails to launch due to a screen overlay detection error.
rows.Severity Reason: The app detects another app's overlay and blocks launch, preventing access to a core feature but does not cause complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The app detects another app's overlay (e.g., screen recording, notification, or live wallpaper apps) as interference. Users should check overlay permissions and clear app cache to resolve.

rows.Title: Call background issue
rows.Problem: When calling a saved contact, the call background is replaced by a random color preset for that contact. When calling a random number, the chosen background is displayed. This behavior started after the OneUI 7 update and was working correctly in OneUI 6.
rows.Summarized Problem: The call background incorrectly replaces the user-selected background when calling saved contacts, instead showing a preset color for that contact.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the expected behavior of call background display for saved contacts, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification

rows.Title: Charging issue
rows.Problem: Device stops showing time left until full charge on lock screen intermittently
rows.Summarized Problem: The device intermittently stops showing the remaining charge time on the lock screen during charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent failure of a key UI element on the lock screen, preventing users from knowing charging progress, but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: In the attached logs, there is no dump state file for debugging. Please raise a new issue with logs having issue scenario.

rows.Title: Setting up key for Samsung Wallet
rows.Problem: Digital Key Applet is not getting installed. Always fails.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Digital Key Applet fails to install during setup for Samsung Wallet.
rows.Severity Reason: The applet consistently fails to install, preventing user from setting up a key for Samsung Wallet, which is a core functionality.

rows.Title: Device freezes and restarts
rows.Problem: Device faces restart and freeze issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device frequently freezes and restarts, causing system instability.
rows.Severity Reason: The device freezes and restarts, making it unusable and leading to potential data loss or user frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: UFS link layer errors indicate hardware-level issues; recommend checking AP and UFS component signal and power integrity.

rows.Title: Lock Screen clock issue
rows.Problem: Lock screen clock issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen is not functioning properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a core UI element but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Green tint observed while recording in pro video at 2x zoom
rows.Problem: Green tint shown in Samsung Camera app during night and fast movement in pro mode; WB balance auto-to-manual fix needed, but green tint persists in all cameras including selfie
rows.Summarized Problem: A green tint appears during video recording in the Samsung Camera app under night and fast-moving conditions, and persists across all camera modes including selfie, despite automatic white balance adjustment.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects functionality in specific conditions but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Call background displays solid color instead of selected wallpaper
rows.Problem: Calling background is not what set and shows color of user profile card instead of selected wallpaper
rows.Summarized Problem: The call background displays a solid color instead of the user's selected wallpaper.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the visual appearance but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Spam call detection not working
rows.Problem: Spam call detection and blocking not working properly when blocking unknown numbers and private numbers
rows.Summarized Problem: Spam call detection and blocking fail when users attempt to block unknown and private numbers.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not function as intended when blocking numbers, but does not cause device crash or data loss, only partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Caller ID and Spam Protection are enabled but not effectively blocking spam calls. Countermeasure: Users must manually report spam numbers via the phone's contact menu.

rows.Title: Eye comfort shield makes display look brown
rows.Problem: Eye Comfort Shield turns entire screen yellow on Galaxy M55s
rows.Summarized Problem: The Eye Comfort Shield causes the display to appear yellow on the Galaxy M55s.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance but does not prevent device usage or cause functional failure.

rows.Title: Permission pop up comes even when permissions are enabled
rows.Problem: This message pops up even after giving all required permission
rows.Summarized Problem: A permission pop-up appears unexpectedly even when permissions are already enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the permission interface, causing user confusion but not preventing device operation or function.
rows.R&D Comment: The cause of issue is not analysed from the provided log; no abnormalities observed in attached logs. If issue occurs again, please attach screenshot and logs with application name.

rows.Title: AOD option cannot be found in settings
rows.Problem: The Always on Display is not available anywhere in the settings. I have tried troubleshooting but still I can't see Always on Display option anywhere in settings. In the Lock screen settings also, no Always on Display option is available.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always on Display option is missing from all settings, including the Lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access a core feature entirely, making it unusable without configuration options.

rows.Title: Bluetooth issue while connecting tripod camera
rows.Problem: Cannot pair tripod camera's Bluetooth module with Galaxy M35 5G. Works with Galaxy M12 and computer, but not with M35. Other Bluetooth module works with M35. Unable to identify whether issue is with phone or module.
rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy M35 5G cannot pair a tripod camera's Bluetooth module, while it works with other devices and another Bluetooth module.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in pairing functionality, not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The device was not discoverable in logs; pairing with another tripod failed due to timeout, but logs are incomplete. Request for CP silent logs to investigate.

rows.Title: Device faces performance glitch while launching any app
rows.Problem: Apps are partly loaded with visible black strips on each side, occurring multiple times with different apps
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps load partially with visible black strips on both sides during launch.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial app loading and visual artifacts, but does not result in crashes or device unavailability.
rows.R&D Comment: There are no abnormal logs in the attached logs as CPU and memory usage are fine, also no fatal/crash were seen. If issue is seen again, please attach proper issue reproduction steps with issue video and issue time logs along with systrace.

rows.Title: Shortcuts blurred on lock screen
rows.Problem: Shortcuts appear blurred on lock screen wallpaper setting screen, blur effect removed after applying wallpaper

rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual clarity of interface elements during wallpaper setup but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: WhatsApp not working properly
rows.Problem: Dual WhatsApp Messenger not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: Dual WhatsApp Messenger is not working properly
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a feature, not complete device failure or data loss
rows.R&D Comment: B OS Ver 16 is already IN for this model. Kindly help share behavior on B OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Half screen becomes blank
rows.Problem: Half display blank
rows.Summarized Problem: Half of the screen becomes blank on the device display.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial display failure, impairing usability but does not render the device completely unusable.

rows.Title: Camera stutters
rows.Problem: Camera is showing a blurry effect that resolves after a few seconds
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera feed shows a blurry effect that resolves after a few seconds, indicating stuttering during operation.

rows.Title: Color palette theme not applied to all apps

rows.Title: Wifi not working properly
rows.Problem: Log file attached
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi connectivity is not working properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of WiFi connectivity, which affects device usability but does not cause complete device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Sound limit issue
rows.Problem: After UI 7.0 update, volume limit at 80dB is at 60% and at 85dB is at
rows.Summarized Problem: The device shows incorrect volume limits after UI 7.0 update, with 80dB showing at 60% and 85dB at 70% volume, and the issue resets when earphones are reconnected.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects volume settings but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and only occurs under specific conditions.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is not reproduced. Please update to latest version and provide step-by-step reproduction details.

rows.Title: Swipe gestures are not working
rows.Problem: Swipe gestures are not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Swipe gestures are not functioning on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a user interface feature, preventing smooth interaction but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by the One Hand Operation + app having its left handle setting turned off. Users must enable the left handle setting in the app for swipe gestures to work.

rows.Title: A blank space in app drawer
rows.Problem: Ghost app in app drawer
rows.Summarized Problem: A ghost app appears in the app drawer with a blank space.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a visual anomaly but does not prevent device usage or core functionality.

rows.Title: Call and internet issue
rows.Problem: Facing both call and internet issues on Samsung S21FE. Call quality is poor even when connected to Wi-Fi.
rows.Summarized Problem: Poor call quality and internet connectivity issues when using Wi-Fi on Samsung S21FE.
rows.Severity Reason: Call functionality is not working properly even on Wi-Fi, which is essential for basic communication, making the device unusable for calls.
rows.R&D Comment: As per the logs, DUT is registered over VoWifi network. There is no call logs are captured; hence we can't share the analysis.

rows.Title: Work profile provisioning blocked
rows.Problem: Work profile provisioning blocked
rows.Summarized Problem: Work profile provisioning is blocked due to Samsung Finance+ India's security policy.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot install work profiles, which is essential for work functionality, making it unusable for enterprise users.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Work profile provisioning blocked by Samsung Finance+ India's security policy. Counter Measure: Device removed from financing system, allowing proper work profile installation.

rows.Title: Charging issues
rows.Problem: Battery and slow charging worsen with phone usage; charging twice is necessary even with minimal use, especially when charging above 20%.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone experiences slow charging and requires two charging sessions even with minimal usage.
rows.Severity Reason: Slow charging and the need for multiple charging sessions significantly impact usability and battery efficiency, making the device impractical for daily use.

rows.Title: Unable to maximise the screen
rows.Problem: After minimizing the screen for any app, I am not getting option to maximize the screen again. Basically once I am minimizing the screen then I am not able to open the app again or not able to maximize the screen again
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot maximize the screen after minimizing any app, preventing them from reopening or restoring the app interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents app restoration but does not cause device crash or data loss, affecting usability partially.

rows.Title: Call Waiting Feature Not Working
rows.Problem: Call waiting feature is not working in the phone app even after activation on Jio SIM by dialing a specific number.
rows.Summarized Problem: The call waiting feature does not function properly in the phone app after activation on Jio SIM.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing or not working in a specific context, but the device remains usable overall.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: A cursor is displayed on screen randomly
rows.Problem: Display issue with cursor showing on screen
rows.Summarized Problem: A cursor appears randomly on the screen when a device with mouse properties is connected.
rows.Severity Reason: The cursor display causes user inconvenience during device connection but does not prevent device functionality or cause system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The cursor appears when a mouse property device is connected; future OS versions will remove cursor display to improve user experience.

rows.Title: 5G network issues
rows.Problem: Airtel 5G network lags and does not run smoothly on Samsung Galaxy F15 5G, while same SIM works fine on Redmi 13 5G. The issue started recently, though it previously worked well.
rows.Summarized Problem: Airtel 5G network lags and fails to run smoothly on Samsung Galaxy F15 5G, despite working on other devices with the same SIM.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent network performance, not full device failure or data loss, but affects usability during 5G operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Game Booster settings glitch
rows.Problem: Unable to see in-game panel or game booster notification while playing games. Was showing early before factory reset; now not working. Previously displayed as small vertical bar or notification in panel.
rows.Summarized Problem: Game booster notifications and in-game panel are no longer visible during gameplay.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial functionality failure: notifications and panel are missing, but device remains usable and core functions operate.
rows.R&D Comment: Game not installed from official store (e.g., Google Play) lacks game category recognition; functionality works only when installed from a store.

rows.Title: Vibration not working
rows.Problem: Vibration and haptic feedback stopped working on Samsung Galaxy F15 5G since a few days. No vibration during typing, calls, messages, or when using back and home buttons. Issue appeared after September update. All settings and diagnostics have been checked and no issues found.
rows.Summarized Problem: Haptic feedback and vibration are not working on the device after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The device lacks basic tactile feedback for essential interactions like calls, messages, and navigation, making core user interactions unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Vibrator driver logs are normal; if the issue recurs, hardware inspection is recommended.

rows.Title: Device power off automatically
rows.Problem: Galaxy F14 5g automatically powers off after 5 to 10 minutes of inactivity when kept in a pocket
rows.Summarized Problem: The Galaxy F14 5G automatically powers off after 5 to 10 minutes of inactivity when kept in a pocket.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shuts down unexpectedly after a short period of inactivity, leading to loss of usability and potential data loss.

rows.Title: Keyboard does not appear when accessing from notification panel
rows.Problem: Keyboard doesn't appear when trying to reply through quick panel
rows.Summarized Problem: The keyboard fails to appear when accessed from the notification panel for quick replies.
rows.Severity Reason: The keyboard is missing during a common interaction, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Google sports live notification not displayed on Now bar
