rows.Summarized Problem: Google sports live score notifications are not displaying on the Now Bar.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working despite settings being enabled, indicating a partial malfunction.

rows.Title: Optimisation error for Whatsapp
rows.Problem: Error occurring for each application

rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects multiple apps but does not render the device unusable or cause a crash.

rows.Title: Animated clock not working
rows.Problem: The animated clock style on the lock screen does not show any animation when the device is powered on, despite being set to One UI 7.
rows.Summarized Problem: The animated clock on the lock screen fails to display animation upon device power-on.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a core visual element of the lock screen but does not prevent device usage or cause system failure.

rows.Title: Unable to sync Samsung Notes
rows.Problem: No option to sync data with Samsung Cloud or OneDrive in Samsung Notes app or Samsung Gallery. Urgently need access to important data affecting earnings.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot sync their notes with Samsung Cloud or OneDrive due to missing synchronization options in the app.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access critical data that affects their earnings, resulting in loss of productivity and potential financial impact.
rows.R&D Comment: The synchronization menu is not supported in Knox or B2B mode; users should check device mode and reattempt sync with logs if outside these modes.

rows.Title: 5G network issue
rows.Problem: 5G network mode has been disabled after the latest software update. It was working earlier.
rows.Summarized Problem: 5G network mode has been disabled after the latest software update, preventing 5G connectivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a core network feature after an update, affecting functionality but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs to diagnose the issue.

rows.Title: Ghost touch observed while typing
rows.Problem: Ghost touch observed while typing
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience ghost touch when typing on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects typing accuracy but does not cause device crash or data loss, and is intermittent.

rows.Title: Modes and routines not working properly
rows.Problem: Modes and routines are not working well, properly after the latest update
rows.Summarized Problem: Routines and modes are not functioning properly after the latest update.
rows.Severity Reason: The core functionality of modes and routines is not working, rendering key user features unusable.

rows.Title: Calendar widget cannot be expanded vertically

rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the widget interface, preventing full expansion but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Since OneUI 7.0, the widget size is templated and 2x3 is not supported; it works normally under current constraints.

rows.Title: Sound going through mic instead of earbuds during gaming
rows.Problem: While playing games like Free Fire max, the sound heard by teammates comes from phone mic instead of earbuds.
rows.Summarized Problem: During gameplay, audio is routed to the phone's microphone instead of the earbuds, causing teammates to hear incorrect audio.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects audio clarity during multiplayer gaming but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears due to incorrect audio routing; a countermeasure is to ensure proper log capture and device-level investigation upon recurrence.

rows.Title: Increased resolution makes picture darker
rows.Problem: When increasing image resolution after cropping, the image becomes darker than original
rows.Summarized Problem: Increasing image resolution after cropping results in a darker image than the original.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction in image processing, affecting visual quality but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Notification quick panel dark mode issue
rows.Problem: Notification panel and quick settings action bars do not apply dark mode correctly and remain in light mode when dark mode is enabled
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel and quick settings action bars fail to apply dark mode correctly and remain in light mode when dark mode is enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of UI elements in dark mode, but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: When Dark Mode is on, the inactive background of quick setting tiles changes, so dark mode is applied normally. The part that doesn't change is that dark mode and light mode have the same design, which is normal operation and will be kept as is.

rows.Title: Battery drain

rows.Title: Unable to install Whatsapp

rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to install a critical communication app, preventing core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: INSTALL_FAILED_VERSION_DOWNGRADE detected during app installation. Countermeasure: Request CP silent logs for analysis.

rows.Title: Jio 5G not supported

rows.Summarized Problem: Device shows no 5G support despite 5G preferred being enabled, and Jio network fails to register in 5G mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a network registration failure but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss; it is a partial functionality failure in connectivity.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Network registration reject due to N1_MODE_NOT_ALLOWED; Countermeasure: User advised to check My JIO App and contact operator for 5G activation.

rows.Title: Video lagging in YouTube

rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback lags in YouTube app.

rows.Title: Samsung Pass not available
rows.Problem: User unable to sign in to Samsung Pass after four months of device ownership
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot sign in to Samsung Pass after four months of device ownership.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial functionality failure where users cannot authenticate, but the system does not crash or become unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: User must withdraw and re-sign up for Samsung Pass after deletion; initialization requires manual steps on the Samsung privacy site.

rows.Title: Unable to increase blur of notification panel
rows.Problem: No option to increase blur of notification panel, neither through settings nor through lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot increase the blur level of the notification panel.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a missing UI option for adjusting blur, which affects user experience but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The blur level is controlled by an accessibility setting; users can adjust it in Settings > Accessibility > Vision enhancements > Reduce transparency and blur.

rows.Title: Sports from google option not shown on Now Bar
rows.Problem: Now bar not showing sports from google option
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar on the Lock Screen is not displaying the sports option from Google.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from a key UI element, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing system failure.

rows.Title: Suggestive Replies not working
rows.Problem: No suggestive replies appear in messaging app after enabling the feature. The feature was not added in the app following UI 8 update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Suggestive replies do not appear in the messaging app after enabling the feature.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing post-UI 8 update, resulting in partial functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Insufficient logs information; no message app logs available for analysis.

rows.Title: people recognition feature not working
rows.Problem: The people recognition feature within the Gallery application has ceased to function after One UI 7 and One UI 8 updates. Troubleshooting steps including clearing data for Gallery, CMHProvider, FaceService, and Samsung Media Storage have been attempted without success. The feature is fundamentally broken and persists despite intervention.
rows.Summarized Problem: The people recognition feature in the Gallery app is not working after One UI 8 updates.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is fundamentally broken and prevents core functionality of the Gallery app, making it unusable for users who rely on this feature.
rows.R&D Comment: In One UI 8, an engine update requires a process to connect the new engine with the existing analysis database. Clearing data is not recommended. Once the connection is complete, the feature should link back to existing data and operate normally. Keeping the device charged and screen off may speed up analysis.

rows.Title: Samsung DeX issues
rows.Problem: Minimised apps not showing in task bar or recent apps; upper taskbar not appearing when opening apps, leading to full-screen app experience.
rows.Summarized Problem: Minimised apps are not displayed in the task bar or recent apps, and the upper taskbar fails to appear when apps are opened, resulting in a full-screen experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects core functionality of app navigation in Samsung DeX but does not cause device crash or data loss, and functionality is partially available.

rows.Title: Weather background theme not found
rows.Problem: Weather background theme missing after updating from beta UI 8 to stable UI 8 version
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot find the weather background theme after updating from beta to stable UI 8.
rows.Severity Reason: The theme is missing in a stable version after an update, affecting user experience but not causing device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The theme appears to be functioning correctly based on log files; user may be confused by character changes based on weather conditions.

rows.Title: Adaptive clock on lock screen not working
rows.Problem: Clock features not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The adaptive clock feature on the lock screen is not functioning properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The clock feature is missing or not displaying, preventing users from seeing time information on the lock screen, but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: The nowbar feature is available in settings, but no live notifications are sent, so the adaptive clock does not display. Users should be guided to provide steps to reproduce the issue.

rows.Title: Now Brief not loading
rows.Problem: The brief functionality is not working after a device restart, showing a blank screen when accessed.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief feature fails to load, displaying a blank screen after a device restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional, preventing user access to essential content on the lock screen.
rows.R&D Comment: Brief ui entity was empty. We need to know the reason why the entity is not created. but there is no log. the ui entity was created when time has been changed (1-PM, 9-PM etc.) or manually changed. It is not reproduced, so plz attach the log again.

rows.Title: Low battery backup after Instagram update
rows.Problem: Phone shows extremely low battery charging progress and randomly shuts off, with battery level dropping from 17% to 0% after a brief charge. This occurred after updating to UI8 and has not happened before.
rows.Summarized Problem: Phone experiences rapid battery drain and random shutdowns during charging after an Instagram update.
rows.Severity Reason: Device randomly shuts off and battery level resets to zero, indicating a critical failure in battery management and charging functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: The current consumption increased high while the battery voltage was low, resulting in FG reset by MD75 POR. Due to FG reset, it was initialized to Raw SOC 5-000, which is a problem caused by UI SOC not being displayed normally. In case of problem symptoms, it is recommended to use after rebooting; if there is a problem continuously, please visit the service center and guide us to check the smartphone.

rows.Title: Camera stutters at 1x
rows.Problem: Camera preview becomes highly unstable, flickering, and produces a loud mechanical rattling sound when switching from 0.6x ultra-wide angle to 1x zoom.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera preview flickers and shakes when transitioning from 0.6x ultra-wide angle to 1x zoom.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera instability and mechanical rattling during zoom affect core functionality and user experience, making the camera unusable during use.
rows.R&D Comment: UV Damper peeling and improper assembly cause driving force error; improved jig and OVS inspection will mitigate the issue.

rows.Title: Widgets on lock screen change its color automatically
rows.Problem: Lock screen widgets change color randomly
rows.Summarized Problem: Lock screen widgets change color randomly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a random color change in widgets, which affects usability but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: battery issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences excessive battery drain.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain leads to device becoming unusable without charging.
rows.R&D Comment: standby current 35mA, RUT 27.3 hour\nThere are not abnormal app list

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor not working

rows.Severity Reason: The sensor failure prevents user authentication, making the device unusable for secure access.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: User changes required due to lockout processing in biometric authentication; Counter Measure: OneUI 8.0 now treats zero sensor status as normal.

rows.Title: UI issue in multi window
rows.Problem: App screens do not fit properly in split-screen, device lags multiple times a day
rows.Summarized Problem: App screens do not fit properly in split-screen mode, causing device lag.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial malfunction in UI layout during multi-window usage leading to intermittent lag.

rows.Title: Widgets on home screen not loading
rows.Problem: Widgets on home screen not loading

rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, preventing widgets from displaying, but does not cause device freeze or data loss.

rows.Title: Poor image quality
rows.Problem: After updating to Samsung One UI 8.0, camera image quality has degraded. The optimization is not good, and photos taken under certain conditions show worse quality compared to previous versions.
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera image quality has degraded after the One UI 8.0 update, with noticeable deterioration in photo output compared to previous versions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of camera performance, with degraded image quality but the device remains usable and functional.
rows.R&D Comment: The HDR solution trigger is determined based on the ratio of saturated areas in the camera, and the shooting environment has a very low ratio of saturated pixels, leading to suboptimal image optimization.

rows.Title: Magenta tint observed in the pictures
rows.Problem: Magenta tint observed in the pictures
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos show a magenta tint, indicating a color distortion in image capture.
rows.Severity Reason: Color distortion affects image quality and user experience, making photos visually inaccurate and untrustworthy.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Chromatic aberration in the 3X tele lens due to defocus and small pixel size; Countermeasure: Hardware lens chromatic aberration is good at 1 pixel level, but defocus deviation causes intensity differences.

rows.Title: Now bar live score not shown on lock screen
rows.Problem: Now bar live score not showing
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Bar live score is not displaying on the lock screen.

rows.Title: Unable to change widgets font size

rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a widget setting, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.

rows.Title: Jitter observed while expanding/collapsing the quick panel

rows.Title: Video stuttering in streaming apps
rows.Problem: Video playback stutters across all streaming apps, including YouTube and Hotstar, during content consumption. Stuttering occurs during video movement (e.g., background rotation, building movement) and is consistent, not related to video quality. UI scrolling is smooth, indicating the issue is specific to playback.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback stutters consistently across all streaming apps during motion content, affecting user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: Stuttering during video playback renders content consumption unusable and disrupts user experience across all streaming apps.

rows.Title: Image becomes darker when switching lens

rows.R&D Comment: Tele camera has a darker lens with larger F number; in lowlight with max exposure and gain, it is naturally darker than main camera. This is normal operation.

rows.Title: Widgets getting cropped from edges

rows.Summarized Problem: Widgets are being cropped at the edges of the screen.

rows.Title: Sync with ringtones won't work with 3rd party ringtones
rows.Problem: Sync with ringtones won't work with 3rd party ringtones even if they have the vibration pattern
rows.Summarized Problem: Ringtone sync fails when using third-party ringtones, even if they include vibration patterns.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure in a key audio feature, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to select option in call forwarding feature
rows.Problem: facing an issue with enabling the call forwarding feature on my Samsung S24 Ultra
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot select options when enabling the call forwarding feature.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full functionality of a key feature but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The device fails to register supplementary services during call forwarding, and logs show a gap in timestamps and network rejection; full CP logs are required for conclusive diagnosis.

rows.Title: Notifications overlapping quick panel
rows.Problem: Notifications and the quick panel open together causing overlap
rows.Summarized Problem: Notifications and the quick panel open simultaneously, causing visual overlap.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of UI elements, leading to visual interference but not device unavailability or data loss.

rows.Title: Poor image quality
rows.Problem: camera image quality issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces images with poor quality.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality but does not cause device malfunction or crash.

rows.Title: Lock when exit the app option missing in secure folder
rows.Problem: After UI 8 update, the 'Lock when exit the app' option is missing in the secure folder
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'Lock when exit the app' feature is missing in the secure folder after the UI 8 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing but users can still perform locking via alternative methods, so it is not a complete system failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Due to Android limitations, the option has been removed. Users can now hide the Secure Folder icon or use the 'Lock and exit' menu button to lock it immediately.

rows.Title: Quick Panel transparent
rows.Problem: Quick panel became transparent after updating to one UI 8
rows.Summarized Problem: The quick panel is now transparent after the one UI 8 update.
rows.Severity Reason: This is a cosmetic UI change that does not affect device functionality or usability.

rows.Title: Videos lag when bluetooth earphones connected
rows.Problem: Videos lag in gallery, YouTube, video player, Chrome, or everywhere when bluetooth earphones is connected
rows.Summarized Problem: Videos lag when Bluetooth earphones are connected due to improper acknowledgment of audio packets during A2DP transmission.
rows.Severity Reason: The lag affects multiple apps and makes video playback unusable, impairing core device functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue due to remote device not acknowledging audio packets properly during A2DP transmission; countermeasure confirms same root cause.

rows.Title: Samsung Pass shortcut not available on keyboard
rows.Problem: Samsung Pass shortcut not available anymore on the samsung keyboard
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Pass shortcut is no longer available on the keyboard.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing users from accessing Samsung Pass functionality, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Numbers do not change to selected language
rows.Problem: When the phone's system language is set to Bengali, most content translates to Bengali, but numbers do not
rows.Summarized Problem: Numbers do not translate when the system language is changed to Bengali.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects only the display of numbers, which is a partial malfunction of language localization, not a core system failure.

rows.Title: Back Tap Sensitivity Too High
rows.Problem: Touch sensitivity issue on Cx facing
rows.Summarized Problem: The back tap sensitivity is too high, causing unintended actions on the Cx facing.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user interaction but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Registration Failed pop up in Messages
rows.Problem: Unable to setup RCS. A "Registration Failed" message appears every time I start Chat Settings.
rows.Summarized Problem: RCS registration fails every time when starting Chat Settings, resulting in a 'Registration Failed' pop-up.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial functionality failure in messaging, but does not prevent full device usage or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Temporary server error with 401 invalid token. Countermeasure: Monitor server side; user may need to wait for resolution.

rows.Title: Can't generate with this content pop up occurs in Gen AI
rows.Problem: Whenever I use generative ai in ai assist to remove people from background, it always says can't generate with this content
rows.Summarized Problem: The generative AI feature fails to process images with people in the background, displaying a 'can't generate with this content' error.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents successful background removal in AI assist but does not cause device crash or data loss, only partial functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is due to internal policy restrictions in generative editing; countermeasure is ongoing improvement of the generative solution.

rows.Title: Camera making noise
rows.Problem: Camera is making sound all the time after new update
rows.Summarized Problem: The ultra wide camera is making continuous sound after a software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The noise is persistent and occurs during normal operation, indicating a major functional failure affecting user experience and device usability.
rows.R&D Comment: The noise is caused by UV damper peeling due to non-ideal assembly; countermeasures include improved jig, stroke measurement, and OVS inspection.

rows.Title: Poor camera quality
rows.Problem: Camera has low quality, blurry, missing clarity after update
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces blurry and low-quality images after the update, lacking clarity.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of image quality, not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: When we checked the attached image, no problems were found in the image. If the camera lens is contaminated by fingerprints, etc., the image may be blurred. You can get a clearer image by wiping the camera lens with a clean cloth and taking pictures.

rows.Title: Network issues
rows.Problem: facing network issue post the last update
rows.Summarized Problem: Users are experiencing network issues after the latest update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs after an update, indicating a compatibility problem, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. From lower layers POV, few mute instances are observed but further check requires CP logs.

rows.Title: Camera flickering sound and vibration noise
rows.Problem: camera flickering sound and vibration noise
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces flickering sound and vibration noise during operation.
rows.Severity Reason: The noise and vibration interfere with normal device operation and user experience, indicating a major functional failure.
rows.R&D Comment: UV Damper peeling due to improper assembly causes driving resistance error, leading to AF position error and noise; improved jig and height measurement will mitigate this.

rows.Title: AOD turns off automatically once battery crosses 85%
rows.Problem: Always on display turns off automatically when battery reaches 85% during charging
rows.Summarized Problem: The Always On Display turns off automatically when battery reaches 85% during charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature malfunctions under specific battery conditions but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to send messages
rows.Problem: Error message "Couldn't send" appears when trying to send a message on Samsung Messages. Issue persists despite attempts to resolve.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot send messages in Samsung Messages due to a persistent "Couldn't send" error.
rows.Severity Reason: The error prevents users from sending messages, which is a core functionality of the messaging app, making it unusable in practical scenarios.

rows.Title: Network Issue
rows.Problem: Not registered on network, problem arisen after last samsung update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is not registering on the network after the latest Samsung update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs after an update and affects network registration, which is a partial malfunction of a core connectivity function.

rows.Title: 5G internet issues
rows.Problem: Issue with 5G connectivity, persists across multiple SIM cards
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience persistent 5G connectivity issues across multiple SIM cards.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects connectivity across multiple SIMs but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: B OS Ver 16 is already planned for this model. Kindly help share behavior on B OS. If reproduced, pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Unable to use C-type earphones for call
rows.Problem: Cannot use USB C earphone for calls; only music works. Same earphone works on other phones for calls
rows.Summarized Problem: USB C earphones cannot be used for voice calls, only for music.
rows.Severity Reason: The earphone works for music but fails for calls, indicating a partial malfunction in call audio functionality.

rows.Title: AOD cannot be edited
rows.Problem: My Always On Display is bugged; I can't customize it in the Settings app or in Good Lock. I provided a video clip showing that I can't even access the AOD editing part
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot customize the Always On Display due to missing or inaccessible editing options in the Settings app and Good Lock.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are unable to access or edit a core display feature, which directly impacts usability and personalization of the device's lock screen.

rows.Title: Screen off memos option not working
rows.Problem: Screen off memos option not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen off memos feature is not functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, but the device remains usable overall.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: B OS Ver 16 is already planned for this model. If reproduced, report PLM accordingly. Counter Measure: Same as cause.

rows.Title: Flight mode not turning off when inserting sim card
rows.Problem: Flight mode is not turning off when inserting sim card
rows.Summarized Problem: Flight mode turns on automatically when a SIM card is inserted, instead of turning off as expected.
rows.Severity Reason: The device's behavior causes a core system function to malfunction, making it unusable in normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: B OS Ver 16 is already planned for this model. Kindly help share behavior on B OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Heating observed in the device
rows.Problem: User reports invalid steps from Samsung to reduce heating issues and requests valid solutions, stating device is totally frozen
rows.Summarized Problem: The device is experiencing excessive heating, leading to freezing and usability issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The device is freezing and becoming unusable due to overheating, which poses a risk to stability and user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: B OS Ver 16 is already planned for this model. Kindly help share behavior on B OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Touch glitch
rows.Problem: Touch not working on Cx facing
rows.Summarized Problem: Touch functionality is not working on the Cx facing of the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The touch function is partially malfunctioning, preventing reliable interaction on a specific area of the screen.
rows.R&D Comment: When checking the registered log, TSP hardware is checked as normal, and touch raw and calibration are checked as normal range. The symptom cannot be clearly analyzed because the log at the time of the problem symptom occurrence cannot be checked. For accurate analysis, you need to match and analyze the log at the same time as the problem video.

rows.Title: Ghost touch while charging
rows.Problem: Ghost touch while charging phone and it's not happen when i turn on touch sensitivity
rows.Summarized Problem: Ghost touch occurs when charging and is resolved by enabling touch sensitivity.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects touch functionality during charging but is mitigated by user action, indicating partial malfunction.

rows.Title: Battery draining
rows.Problem: Battery draining issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences excessive battery drain, especially when apps are running in the background and performing network operations.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain is severe and affects device usability, leading to short operational time and potential user frustration.

rows.Title: Live Caption feature not working
rows.Problem: Live Caption feature is not working and wants a download; when downloaded, all features below are greyed out or non-functional
rows.Summarized Problem: The Live Caption feature does not work and, after attempting to download, all related features are greyed out or non-functional.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional and prevents users from using a core accessibility function, rendering it unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: B OS Ver 16 is already planned for this model. Kindly help share behavior on B OS. If reproduced, pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Display blank after call ends

rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction of the screen during call end, but does not result in device unavailability or data loss.

rows.Title: Distorted pixels when zoomed in

rows.Severity Reason: Distorted pixels during zooming severely degrade image quality and make photos unusable.

rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief feature is not available on the lock screen after updating to UI 8.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing after an update, but the device remains usable and no core functionality is disrupted.

rows.Summarized Problem: Vibration occurs when accepting or rejecting a call via tap actions.

rows.Title: Unable to access files in secure folder from outside
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 8.0, users cannot access files saved in the Secure Folder from apps inside the Secure Folder, though access to files outside the folder remains functional.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access files stored in the Secure Folder from within the Secure Folder app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing their own stored files within the Secure Folder, which is a core functionality of the feature and undermines the intended isolation and privacy of the secure folder.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue needs to be checked with Google Documents UI. It has been registered in Google's issue tracker (https://partnerissuetracker.corp.google.com/u/0/issues/446997790). We will update it after Google's review.

rows.Title: Poor image quality

rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing despite settings being turned on, resulting in partial functionality failure.

rows.Title: Search engine selector running in the background
rows.Problem: After updating to UI 8 I see this search engine selector running in the background, not sure how to stop
rows.Summarized Problem: A search engine selector runs in the background after UI 8 update, causing system performance degradation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a background process that affects system performance but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Battery drain
rows.Problem: Battery drain has worsened after a recent UI 8 stable update
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drain has significantly increased after a recent software update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes rapid battery depletion, making the device unusable without charging.
rows.R&D Comment: The device continuously uses network location provider and GCM heartbeat alarms, which are managed by Google's GMS; Samsung has no control over these components and cannot debug the root cause.

rows.Title: Dynamic Clock Issue
rows.Problem: Dynamic clock is not working properly after the update on Samsung S24 Ultra.
rows.Summarized Problem: The dynamic clock feature is not working correctly after the update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing or malfunctioning after an update, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Now brief widget and now brief screen only display 'Stay up to date with Now brief' even after enabling all content options
rows.Problem: Now brief widget and now brief screen only display 'Stay up to date with Now brief' even after enabling all content options except youtube, in settings and updating to One UI 8. No personalized content like weather, commute, events is loading even after all permissions are enabled
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief widget and screen show a generic message instead of personalized content like weather, commute, or events.
rows.Severity Reason: Personalized content is not loading despite enabled permissions, resulting in a partial malfunction of the feature.
rows.R&D Comment: There is no data for show. If the user wants to show brief cards, add schedule or use Samsung Health. This is normal.

rows.Title: Device not switching to mobile data in poor wifi connection
rows.Problem: Device does not switch to mobile data when wifi signal is weak, even at -82 dBm, and continues to stay on wifi despite poor connection.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to switch from Wi-Fi to mobile data when the Wi-Fi signal is poor, despite having a weak connection.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where the device does not switch to mobile data under poor Wi-Fi conditions, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The Wi-Fi to cellular switch is triggered only when there is traffic and based on multiple link state metrics, not just RSSI; the current behavior may be a misinterpretation of the switching logic.

rows.Title: Poor camera quality
rows.Problem: The camera quality is so poor
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces poor image quality, especially in low light and under direct light exposure.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image clarity in specific lighting conditions but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Poor image quality in dark environments and direct light; Countermeasure: Recommend using night mode and avoiding direct light exposure when taking photos.

rows.Title: Inaccurate step counting
rows.Problem: Inaccurate step counting

rows.Severity Reason: The step counting function is not working correctly, leading to partial malfunction in fitness tracking.

rows.Title: Android Auto not working

rows.Problem: Apps in secure folder no longer lock automatically after exit; they open easily without authentication. The option to 'lock after exit' is missing in secure folder settings, which was available before the system update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Secure folder apps no longer lock automatically after exit and open without authentication due to removal of the 'lock after exit' setting.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing but does not cause device crash or data loss; it affects usability but does not render the system unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The 'Close app every time' feature is no longer available in B OS due to Android OS system limitations. Users can now configure secure folder auto-lock via settings when screen turns off.

rows.Title: Search in gallery not working properly
rows.Problem: Searching for any word or letter in the gallery search box does not correctly find images that contain the searched text
rows.Summarized Problem: The gallery search function fails to correctly identify images containing the searched text.
rows.Severity Reason: The search function does not return relevant results, resulting in partial functionality failure but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: When checking the attached log, there is no clue for this issue. The image analysis service for OCR text extraction works fine. Search results for recent photos depend on OCR analysis conditions such as screen off, charger connection, and battery level.

rows.Title: Google Play System not updating
rows.Problem: Google Play system is not updating since July
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Play system updates have not been received since July.
rows.Severity Reason: The update failure is partial and affects only the system update functionality, not full device operation or core services.
rows.R&D Comment: The Google Play system update is intentionally blocked on some Android 15 devices due to Samsung policy and Google consultation; updates will resume at device-specific times and critical updates are preloaded from Google.

rows.Title: Unable to connect buds to the device

rows.Title: Issues with WiFi
rows.Problem: The issue is not with the 5G network of the SIM.

rows.Severity Reason: The issue lacks clear evidence in logs and is not confirmed to affect device functionality.

rows.Title: Battery drain

rows.Title: App crash observed in secure folder
rows.Problem: Secure folder has become laggy, unusable and broken after OneUI 8 stable on S24 Ultra. When pattern is entered, it closes and returns to home screen, takes 3 seconds, then opens the secure folder apps screen. The content is not blurred when viewing recent apps, which defeats the purpose of secure folder locking.
rows.Summarized Problem: The secure folder apps screen is unstable and fails to load properly after entering the pattern, with content showing instead of being blurred, undermining the security and usability of the feature.
rows.Severity Reason: The secure folder functionality is broken, making it unusable and defeating the primary purpose of secure content protection.
rows.R&D Comment: Multiple fatal exceptions from third-party app org.cris.aikyam (RailOne) are causing system lag; the secure folder itself shows no exceptions but exhibits instability due to underlying system lag.

rows.Title: Unable to scroll down the Youtube home page
rows.Problem: YouTube homepage menu isn't getting scrolled down when scrolling down, but works fine when scrolling up. This has made the user experience worse.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot scroll down the YouTube homepage menu, though scrolling up works normally.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects only one direction of scrolling, impairing usability but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue is within the YouTube app (third-party), not Samsung-developed. No root cause analysis possible due to lack of source code access. Recommended action: user-level troubleshooting via app settings.

rows.Title: Dynamic clock not working
rows.Problem: The dynamic clock feature does not set up correctly when applying wallpapers with humans or animals. It resets to default after application, despite rearranging during editing. Tried restart, cache clear, and wipe cache partition without success.
rows.Summarized Problem: The dynamic clock feature fails to persist after applying human or animal wallpapers and resets to default settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not function as intended but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Navigation bar overlaps app screen

rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full use of app functionality but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: This is an E2E issue from app side. App developer need to fix this issue.

rows.Title: Unable to access Samsung Pass
rows.Problem: Samsung Pass issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access Samsung Pass after multiple failed attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial failure in authentication flow, preventing access after failed attempts but not causing device crash or total unavailability.
rows.R&D Comment: After 10 failed attempts, the system resets and allows access via Samsung account password.

rows.Title: Now Bar not shown on lock screen
rows.Problem: Now bar is not showing

rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing on the lock screen, preventing users from seeing real-time information, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Fingerprint icon appears when disabled
rows.Problem: Fingerprint icon still appears after disabling fingerprint setting, despite the feature being disabled in logs. Issue occurs even when fingerprint is set to 'never'.
rows.Summarized Problem: The fingerprint icon persists on the lock screen even after being explicitly disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the UI element, where the icon remains visible despite correct settings, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: According to the log, the fingerprint unlock feature is disabled, so the fingerprint icon should not appear. However, due to time zone mismatch in logs and screenshots, the exact cause is difficult to analyze. First, we need to verify the behavior in different lock screen configurations.

rows.Title: Samsung Messages not connecting to Vi and Airtel

rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure in RCS connectivity, affecting only specific service providers, not causing device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The device receives a 401 invalid token error from the server, indicating a temporary server-side issue; a server-side check is recommended as a countermeasure.

rows.Title: Weather App performance issues
rows.Problem: The new weather app introduced with One UI 8.0 has serious performance issues. It runs at like 15 fps during scrolling and stutters all the time, especially on mid rangers like the Galaxy A34. Please optimize the app to eliminate lag.

rows.Title: Issue observed in clicked pictures

However, if it is an image blur problem, the 40Cm Fixed Focus method is employed for the S24FE front camera. It is optimized for 30-50Cm selfie shooting. If it is another problem, please visit the Service Center to check the exact problem.

rows.Title: Images not shown in Camera directory

rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by incorrect 'Sort' setting in camera album; users should check and set 'date created - descending' to view photos properly.

rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel experiences lag when transitioning from portrait to landscape mode and expanding after use in vertical orientation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction during UI transitions, affecting usability but not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The lag occurs due to improper reset of tile listening when layout changes; the panel should reset related settings upon rotation, especially when transitioning from vertical to horizontal use.

rows.Title: Fingerprint Recognition Not Working
rows.Problem: Fingerprint recognition is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Fingerprint recognition is not working on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The device cannot authenticate users via fingerprint, preventing access to the device.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: No log data for fingerprint enrollment; Countermeasure: User should provide detailed logs immediately after attempting registration or authentication without reboot or delay.

rows.Title: Camera focus and edge detection issues
rows.Problem: The camera struggles to properly focus and define edges, especially in object portraits like bottles or non-human subjects. Background blur behaves inconsistently, and subject edge detection looks soft and unstable. Even in good lighting, the device fails to maintain clarity and accurate depth separation.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to accurately focus and detect edges, especially on texture-less subjects, resulting in poor depth separation and soft subject boundaries.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects specific camera functions but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and is limited to specific scenarios like object portraits.
rows.R&D Comment: Close-range black texture-less subjects are difficult to focus on; focus should be adjusted to ensure the main subject is not blurred by touching textured areas to improve accuracy.

rows.Title: Front camera blur
rows.Problem: Front camera shows blurred image; difficulty taking clear pictures
rows.Summarized Problem: The front camera displays a blurred image, making it difficult to capture clear pictures.
rows.Severity Reason: The front camera fails to produce clear images, rendering a core functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by AF drive not engaging due to physical damage from shock and vibration, affecting the wide module hardware; recommended action is to send device to nearest A/S center for inspection.

rows.Title: Adaptive clock on lock screen not working
rows.Problem: Clock face on lock screen not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The adaptive clock feature on the lock screen is not functioning properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The clock face fails to display, which prevents users from seeing the time on the lock screen, making the device unusable in that context.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Previous version of LockStar lacked DB field to support Stretch font; Countermeasure: Distribute updated LockStar version with Stretch font DB field support

rows.Title: Share option disappears when selecting more than 1 files
rows.Problem: Cannot select 2 or more files at once and share them. The share option disappears when multiple files are selected.
rows.Summarized Problem: The share option disappears when selecting two or more files in My Files, preventing users from sharing multiple files.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot perform a basic sharing function with multiple files, which is a partial malfunction of the feature.
rows.R&D Comment: When multiple files are selected, their size is reported as zero in the logs, causing the share option to hide. Users need to check file details to confirm file integrity before sharing.

rows.Title: Lag observed in recent bar
rows.Problem: Cx facing home screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The transition from home screen to recent apps toggle is laggy and abrupt, with a sudden jump in the interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a noticeable lag during screen transition but does not prevent device usage or cause a crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Lag during transition from home screen to recent apps toggle. Counter Measure: Issue not reproduced in latest APK version.

rows.Title: Multi-Window
rows.Problem: Media player gets stuck on the later opened app when both apps are in use.
rows.Summarized Problem: Media player gets stuck on the later opened app when both apps are in use in multi-window mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The media player fails to scroll between apps, resulting in partial functionality failure but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to edit lock screen widgets

rows.Title: Bixby not working
rows.Problem: Bixby not working
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby is not functioning properly on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: Bixby is a core voice assistant feature; its failure prevents users from using basic voice commands, making the device unusable for key functions.

rows.Title: Pictures clicked are in low brightness and faded
rows.Problem: Camera facing issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Photos taken with the camera appear in low brightness and faded, especially when the subject is close or motion is present.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo quality but does not cause device crash or complete failure, and users may perceive it as a visual inconsistency rather than a critical malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: High-resolution sensor uses longer shutter speed and has shallower depth of field, leading to motion blur and reduced brightness in close-up shots. Countermeasure: Photos appear normal; comparison with 12MP photos is needed to validate quality.

rows.Title: WiFi calling issues
rows.Problem: WiFi calling issue
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi calling fails due to server not responding to IKE SA INIT requests, leading to negotiation failure.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes the device to fail to establish a WiFi calling connection, making a core communication feature unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Server did not respond for IKE SA INIT request. After 3 times request trying, IKE was given up and made the negotiation fail. This is NW issue. It should be checked from operator side.

rows.Title: Internet only works when any call is initiated
rows.Problem: Internet starts working when calling any number
rows.Summarized Problem: Internet connectivity only works when a call is initiated.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent functionality under specific conditions, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue. Counter Measure: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot use a core feature across applications, rendering functionality unusable.

rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of network settings behavior, not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.

rows.R&D Comment: We should check if the issue reproduces with other routers; if so, investigate hardware; if only with 'Quantum_5G', gather router vendor and model details.

rows.Title: Samsung Pass does not show credentials while logging in
rows.Problem: Samsung Pass does not popup on username and password fields of any app, even though login credentials are saved. Users must manually enter data every time, defeating the purpose of Samsung Pass. This issue persists in both One UI 7 and One UI 8 on the A56. All Samsung Pass and autofill features are updated.
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung Pass fails to display saved credentials when logging into apps, requiring manual entry instead.
rows.Severity Reason: Users are forced to manually enter credentials every time, which undermines the core functionality of Samsung Pass and renders the feature ineffective.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue occurs because the app does not properly pass screen field information to Samsung Pass during login; it only shows a save popup after back navigation or app restart, indicating a failure in real-time autofill integration.

rows.Title: Ear speaker sound issue during phone call

rows.Title: Unable to Open Camera

rows.Title: Mobile over heated

rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Max temperature at boot after FOTA update is 40°C, which is normal. Counter Measure: Same as cause; overheating is intentional and not a fault.

rows.Title: Device heat up in normal usage
rows.Problem: device facing heating issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The device heats up during normal usage, reaching 41–42 degrees Celsius while playing a gaming app, which is within expected temperature range for heavy CPU usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The heating occurs during normal usage and is within expected limits for gaming, but may still be concerning for user experience under prolonged use.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Device temperature reaches 41–42°C during gaming, which is within expected range for high CPU usage. Counter Measure: Same as cause.

rows.Title: Network issue after One Ui 8 update
rows.Problem: Device constantly losing network after One Ui 8 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Device loses network connection after updating to One Ui 8.
rows.Severity Reason: Network loss makes device unusable for basic communication functions.
rows.Resolve Type: Issue Fixed(Fixed automatically by Main branch)
rows.R&D Comment: Connection fallback procedure is stuck because MM_RRC_FALLBACK_IND is not sent in Rel15; solution is to send MM_RRC_FALLBACK_IND regardless of protocol version.

rows.Title: Camera stop and hang device

rows.Severity Reason: The camera function completely fails after a specific zoom level, causing device hang and loss of usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Rear Ultrawide and Front camera sensor cannot be acquired due to i2c failure. Counter Measure: Replace defective rear ultrawide and front camera sensor with a working one; further hardware analysis by hardware TG.

rows.Title: Unable to connect Galaxy Buds 3 Pro

rows.Title: Network Issue

rows.Title: Unable to use internet and calls after UI 8 update
rows.Problem: Unable to use internet and calls; shows 5G in tower but no internet connectivity in browser
rows.Summarized Problem: After UI 8 update, device shows 5G signal but fails to establish internet connectivity and calls, indicating a network registration failure.
rows.Severity Reason: Device cannot make calls or access internet, rendering basic functionality unusable.
rows.Resolve Type: Issue Fixed(Fixed automatically by Main branch)
rows.R&D Comment: Connection fallback procedure is stuck because MM_RRC_FALLBACK_IND is not sent in Rel15; solution is to send MM_RRC_FALLBACK_IND regardless of protocol version.
