rows.Summarized Problem: Banking apps cannot access SMS messages in the Secure Folder after UI 8 update, preventing two-factor authentication.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents essential authentication processes for banking apps, making secure access to financial services impossible.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue arises because UI 8's Google Private Profile structure restricts access to messages in Secure Folder; banking apps cannot send SMS verification requests due to app installation constraints in the main user profile.

rows.Title: Fingerprint sensor not working
rows.Problem: Fingerprint sensor not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The fingerprint sensor is not working, preventing biometric authentication.
rows.Severity Reason: The fingerprint sensor is a core biometric function; failure prevents device authentication and usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Please get the log right after the issue (enroll fail)

rows.Title: Unable to hide recent files menu
rows.Problem: Unable to hide recent files menu from edit options
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot hide the recent files menu in the edit options.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, preventing users from customizing the interface, but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification

rows.Title: Playback speed dialog box appear cropped
rows.Problem: YouTube app is not showing speed feature completely it's still only half visible
rows.Summarized Problem: The playback speed feature in the YouTube app is only half visible due to a cropped dialog box.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially missing, affecting user experience but not causing device malfunction or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: It seems a temporary app side issue. Please update/clear cache of app and retest.

rows.Title: Noise in the image after UI 8 update
rows.Problem: Images are blurry with noise after UI 8 update; image quality was good before update
rows.Summarized Problem: Images become blurry and noisy after the UI 8 update, with good quality before the update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of image quality after an update, but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: I couldn't find anything strange in the attached image and video. Please give me a detailed explanation.

rows.Title: Camera image quality is not good
rows.Problem: The camera sensor captures mediocre quality pictures with blur and light spreading. The issue is likely due to a foreign object on the camera lens. Turning on scene optimizer can improve contrast and image quality.
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera captures blurry and low-quality images with light spreading, likely due to a foreign object on the lens.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image clarity but does not cause device crash or complete failure; users can mitigate it with scene optimizer settings.
rows.R&D Comment: Foreign object on lens causes blur and light spread; recommend cleaning lens and enabling scene optimizer to improve image quality.

rows.Title: Lock type for secure folder changed to pin after update
rows.Problem: After the One UI update, the Secure Folder only shows PIN option and no longer allows fingerprint or pattern unlock. User has important files inside and needs to unlock it.
rows.Summarized Problem: After an update, the Secure Folder no longer allows fingerprint or pattern unlock and only shows PIN option.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access their secure folder with previously used authentication methods, making it unusable and potentially leading to loss of important data.
rows.R&D Comment: Starting with B OS, fingerprints for general and secure folder areas have been separated. Users must register fingerprint in Secure Folder settings and retry. If issue persists, provide reproduce video and dump log.

rows.Title: Image quality is very low and lack of details
rows.Problem: Camera not properly working after Android 16 One UI 8 update; pixel quality is very low in pictures
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces low pixel quality images, especially when using telephoto lenses and AI zoom on the Samsung S24 Ultra.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of camera performance under specific conditions, not rendering the device unusable or causing data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The telephoto lens is not suited for high-frequency scenes like trees and grasses; AI zoom and high-resolution settings attempt to enhance images but result in poor quality due to sensor mismatch.

rows.Title: Status on Instagram and WhatsApp showing huge size
rows.Problem: Status and texts have become huge after UI 8 update, though text content is normal — appears to be a glitch
rows.Summarized Problem: Text status on Instagram and WhatsApp appears abnormally large after UI 8 update, despite normal content.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a visual glitch affecting display, not causing device malfunction or data loss, but impacts user experience.
rows.R&D Comment: App-side temporary glitch; recommend app update from Play Store to resolve.

rows.Title: GPS not working
rows.Problem: GPS is not working at all in all apps, started after UI 8 update
rows.Summarized Problem: GPS functionality is completely failing across all apps after the UI 8 update.
rows.Severity Reason: GPS is a core functionality required for navigation and location-based services, and its complete failure renders the device unusable in essential scenarios.

rows.Title: Not getting 5G network
rows.Problem: Cannot access 5G network after updating the phone. No matter what I do, 5G is not available. This issue started immediately after the update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access 5G network after a software update, despite multiple attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to establish 5G connectivity, which is a core network function, rendering the device unusable for high-speed mobile data.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by network-side failures in registration responses; countermeasure is to request CP silent logs for deeper analysis.

rows.Title: Device often goes to No svc
rows.Problem: Emergency calls issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Device fails to register to network, resulting in no service during emergency calls.
rows.Severity Reason: Emergency calls are critical functions; failure to register to network renders the device unusable in emergencies.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: RX difference is very high, signal strength is very poor and PDN_DISCONN_REJ - esm_cause(UNKNOWN_EPS_BEART_CONTEXT=43). This is network issue. Counter Measure: Same as cause.

rows.Title: Google Map is crashing frequently
rows.Problem: Google map is crashing frequently
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Maps app crashes frequently due to a missing EGL extension in graphics rendering.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes during rendering, making the map functionality unusable and indicating a critical graphics-related failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Missing EGL extension EGL_KHR_swap_buffers_with_damage in Google Maps app; Countermeasure: App developer needs to fix the OpenGL ES rendering issue.

rows.Title: Google voice typing option showing on homescreen
rows.Problem: Google voice typing on home display
rows.Summarized Problem: Google voice typing option is displayed on the home screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is visible but not functional, causing a partial UI malfunction.

rows.Title: Navigation Buttons overlap on screen content
rows.Problem: The Navigation Buttons overlap the content on the screen sometimes
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation buttons overlap with screen content on the device interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the interface but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: phone app is not working properly
rows.Problem: the phone app is not working properly since 5 hours phone app was not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone app is not functioning properly and has failed to work for five hours.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is completely non-functional for an extended period, making basic telephony operations impossible.

rows.Title: Video not playing properly
rows.Problem: Video playback including YT and Gallery not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: Video playback in YouTube and Gallery is not working properly.
rows.Severity Reason: Video playback is a core functionality that fails across key apps, making the device unusable for media consumption.
rows.R&D Comment: During VSS initialization, the PC jumps to an unexpected region, indicating memory corruption in the VSS code region; requires RDX and CP crash dumps for further analysis.

rows.Title: Google Drive not syncing in Samsung My Files app
rows.Problem: Google Drive storage is not syncing and is not showing any files in the Samsung My Files app. I am unable to update the app.
rows.Summarized Problem: Google Drive is not syncing and files are not visible in the Samsung My Files app.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access their files, making the device unusable for file management.
rows.R&D Comment: Possible causes include sync issues, missing permissions, or app glitches; countermeasure involves checking app permissions and network status.

rows.Title: phone is restarting very often
rows.Problem: my phone is restarting very often
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone is restarting frequently, indicating a power management or system stability issue.
rows.Severity Reason: Frequent restarts make the device unusable and indicate a critical system instability or hardware-incompatible condition.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue appears to be a Wi-Fi AP compatibility problem caused by a missing packet field in the AP configuration; temporary disabling of WIFI7 MLO function on BE400 may mitigate it, with further testing needed to confirm the root cause.

rows.Title: Video quality is very hazy on A35 5G device
rows.Problem: Video quality is very hazy on A35 5G device
rows.Summarized Problem: Video quality appears hazy on the A35 5G device's camera.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of video output quality, which affects user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: We cannot determine exactly what the issue is. From the attached video, there appears to be no problem with the video. If there are more detailed comments about the issue, a detailed analysis of the issue will be possible.

rows.Title: Gallery AI Photo assist not working
rows.Problem: Gallery AI Photo assist not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The AI photo assist feature in the Gallery app is not functioning.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing, preventing users from using AI-powered photo assistance, but the device remains usable overall.

rows.Title: Now brief app keeps crashing
rows.Problem: Now brief app keeps crashing
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief app keeps crashing on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes, which prevents users from accessing the feature, making it unusable.

rows.Title: Easter egg android 16 logo not working properly
rows.Problem: easter egg android 16 logo not working properly
rows.Summarized Problem: The Easter egg Android 16 logo does not work properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not functioning correctly but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Contact's important dates reminder plays one week before event
rows.Problem: Contact app issue with reminders playing one week before event
rows.Summarized Problem: Contacts app sends birthday reminders one week before the event instead of at the correct time.
rows.Severity Reason: The reminder is scheduled incorrectly, causing user inconvenience but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by Google account contacts being synced with Samsung Calendar, which pushes birthday alarms at unintended times; countermeasure is to delete or modify alarms in Google contacts.

rows.Title: Modes and routines not working from good lock app
rows.Problem: Modes and routines not working from good lock app. Wedges settings not getting opened. SMS-triggered routines stopped working.
rows.Summarized Problem: Routines and settings such as wedges and SMS-triggered actions are not working from the lock screen app.
rows.Severity Reason: Some functions are not working, but the device remains usable and no data loss or crash occurs.

rows.Title: Circle search in Samsung apps crashing
rows.Problem: Circle search in Samsung apps like camera, gallery is crashing
rows.Summarized Problem: Circle search feature crashes when used in Samsung apps such as camera and gallery.
rows.Severity Reason: The search functionality crashes during use, causing the app to close unexpectedly, making it unusable in key scenarios.

rows.Title: wipe gesture doesn’t respond properly from the bottom corners or edges
rows.Problem: The swipe gesture doesn’t respond properly from the bottom corners or edges of the home screen, only working from the center area after updating to One UI 8.
rows.Summarized Problem: The swipe gesture on the home screen fails to respond from the bottom corners and edges, only working from the center.
rows.Severity Reason: The gesture fails in peripheral areas but works in the center, causing inconsistent user interaction but not rendering the device unusable or crashing.

rows.Title: SPORTS FROM GOOGLE not showing in now bar
rows.Problem: SPORTS FROM GOOGLE not shown in now bar on Samsung Galaxy A36
rows.Summarized Problem: The 'SPORTS FROM GOOGLE' option is missing from the Now Bar on the Samsung Galaxy A36.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from a key UI element, affecting user experience but not rendering the device unusable or causing crashes.

rows.Title: Touch is not working
rows.Problem: Touch is not working i am using s pen to operate my d
rows.Summarized Problem: The touch functionality is not working, preventing user interaction with the device.
rows.Severity Reason: Touch is a fundamental interaction feature; its failure renders the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: The display module has a hardware defect causing abnormal touch sensor operation; the display module should be checked and replaced at service center.

rows.Title: Smart Tyre and Bike App Bluetooth force fully shutsdown
rows.Problem: Bluetooth forcefully shuts down when trying to connect to the Smart Tyre and Bike app by JK Tyre, causing device shutdown during use. Similar issues occur with Android Auto in a new car with latest infotainment system.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device forcefully shuts down when attempting to connect to the Smart Tyre and Bike app via Bluetooth.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shuts down completely during app usage, making it unusable and posing a safety risk.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Missing android.permission.BLUETOOTH_SCAN permission in app. Countermeasure: Same error log indicates same root cause; no fix implemented in logs.

rows.Title: Jio SIM card network problem
rows.Problem: Jio SIM card is experiencing connectivity issues despite functioning correctly in other devices. Other carrier SIM cards work, but Jio SIM fails to establish network connections. Issue persists after attempts to resolve with customer support.
rows.Summarized Problem: Jio SIM card fails to register on the network, while other SIMs and devices work normally.
rows.Severity Reason: Device cannot establish network connection, preventing basic functionality like calls and data, which is essential for usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: NR5G and LTE registration rejected due to illegal ME and GPRS services not allowed. Countermeasure: Same registration rejection logs indicate no change in behavior; issue stems from SIM-level network policy restrictions.

rows.Title: App Blocked popup window occurs when try to open App
rows.Problem: Issue occurs while opening app themes, happens often
rows.Summarized Problem: A popup window appears when attempting to open the app themes, indicating a problem with app access permissions.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing app themes but does not cause device crash or complete failure of core functionality.

rows.Title: Gallery not visible in Secure Folder when uploading images
rows.Problem: Gallery is not visible in Secure Folder when trying to upload an image; only personal profile photos are visible and file access permission is not granted.
rows.Summarized Problem: The gallery is not visible in Secure Folder when uploading images, and file access permissions are not granted.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot access photos in Secure Folder, preventing image uploads, but the core functionality of viewing personal photos remains partially available.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue needs to be checked in Google's documents UI; registered in Google issue tracker (https://partnerissuetracker.corp.google.com/u/0/issues/446997790).

rows.Title: Network showing full bar but unable to make calls
rows.Problem: Network shows full tower symbol but unable to make calls; only emergency calls work. Issue persists even after removing SIM and testing on other devices. Indicates software bug.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device displays full network tower symbol but cannot make regular calls, only emergency calls work, indicating a software issue in network registration.
rows.Severity Reason: User cannot make regular calls, rendering the device unusable for basic communication functions.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: LTE and GSM registration rejected due to no suitable cells or IMSI unknown in HLR. Countermeasure: Same logs indicate persistent rejection; no fix in logs, suggesting ongoing software issue.

rows.Title: Camera noise on face
rows.Problem: Camera facing issue with noise on subject's face
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces visible noise when capturing images of a person's face.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects image quality in specific conditions but does not render the camera unusable or cause system crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: It is difficult to get enough brightness to make low noise and good quality of photo in all condition. To get the optimal exposure in all condition, it has to use High ISO and It makes more noise. Maintaining the right level of sharpness and noise is the process of image quality tuning. We updated a new ISP firmware, but there is only a little improvement.

rows.Title: Microphone icon unexpectedly appears on display
rows.Problem: Microphone icon issue after closing application
rows.Summarized Problem: A microphone icon appears unexpectedly on the display after closing an application.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI consistency but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Flickering black spot in gallery
rows.Problem: A small flickering black spot observed in gallery, YouTube, and notes app
rows.Summarized Problem: A small flickering black spot appears in the gallery, YouTube, and notes app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects multiple apps but does not cause device crash or data loss, only a visual anomaly in display.

rows.Title: Lags and stuttering in device
rows.Problem: Lags and stuttering in galaxy A17
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences lags and stuttering during normal usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial performance degradation but does not cause device freeze or crash.

rows.Title: Cannot access WhatsApp media from the Gallery application
rows.Problem: Cannot access WhatsApp media from the Gallery application
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot access WhatsApp media files when browsing the Gallery application.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where media visibility is restricted, but the core functionality of accessing media is not completely broken.
rows.R&D Comment: Possible causes include media visibility settings in WhatsApp, app glitches, insufficient storage permissions, or corrupted data; countermeasure includes verifying app permissions and media settings.

rows.Title: battery percentage drops quickly during normal usage
rows.Problem: The battery percentage drops quickly even during normal usage like WhatsApp, YouTube, or camera, and the phone becomes noticeably warm around the top and side areas.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone experiences rapid battery drain during normal usage and overheats.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to rapid battery depletion and overheating during normal activities.

rows.Title: Camera quality degraded
rows.Problem: Camera quality degraded since initial purchase of the S23
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera quality has degraded since the device was initially purchased.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the camera function after a period of use, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Camera very poor quality photos with pixels disturbed
rows.Problem: Cx facing camera quality issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera produces photos with poor quality and pixel disturbances.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects photo quality but does not cause device crash or complete failure, only a partial malfunction in image output.

rows.Title: Chat gets behind the keyboard when typing
rows.Problem: When typing in Instagram chat, touching the edge of the keyboard causes the chat content to move below the keyboard while the keyboard remains visible, especially on gesture navigation.
rows.Summarized Problem: When typing in Instagram chat, touching the edge of the keyboard causes chat content to move below the keyboard while the keyboard remains visible.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user interaction during typing but does not cause device crash or data loss, and only occurs in specific gestures.

rows.Title: Low light Image Quality
rows.Problem: Photos taken in low light have noise, over saturation, and low sharpness, performing worse than older devices with similar specifications.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device produces noisy, oversaturated, and blurry photos in low light conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to deliver basic image quality in low light, which is a core function for a device marketed for photography.

rows.Title: Green tint appears in Camera
rows.Problem: Green tint appears when using Samsung official camera app, but not in third-party apps like gcam; indicates software processing issue, not hardware
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung official camera app displays a green tint in videos, while third-party apps show accurate colors, indicating a software-based color processing issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects only the color output in specific conditions and does not cause device failure or data loss, but impacts user experience during photography.
rows.R&D Comment: The green tint is a result of Samsung camera's color processing algorithm based on user environment data; users are advised to use Pro mode or Expert_raw for accurate color capture.

rows.Title: Extremely high battery drain
rows.Problem: After updating to One UI 7 and One UI 8, I have been experiencing extremely high battery drain. My screen-on time is now reduced to three hours for 60% battery consumption. This is paired with frequent device heating, which is frustrating for a flagship device barely a year old. I have kept all non-essential services off, background app usage is minimal, and I don't use CPU-intensive apps such as games or editors.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences extremely high battery drain after updating to One UI 7 and One UI 8, reducing screen-on time to three hours for -than 60% battery consumption.
rows.Severity Reason: The device loses battery rapidly, making it unusable for daily use, especially on a flagship device that is barely a year old.

rows.Title: Vascular load not working
rows.Problem: Vascular load not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The vascular load feature is not working despite continuous use for ten nights.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional after prolonged use, rendering a key health function unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: B OS Ver 16 is already planned for this model. If reproduced, pls report PLM accordingly. Counter Measure: Same as cause.

rows.Title: App folder not working
rows.Problem: App folder not working properly. The whole UI is buggy and glitchy after resetting the device. Lots of glitches, freezes, shutter lag etc.
rows.Summarized Problem: The app folder feature is not working properly, causing overall UI bugs and glitches after device reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The app folder malfunction leads to a major UI instability and device usability issues, making the interface unreliable and unresponsive.

rows.Title: Audio muffled/distorted during phone calls
rows.Problem: Audio on my side becomes severely muffled/distorted during standard or third-party calls
rows.Summarized Problem: Audio during phone calls is severely muffled and distorted.
rows.Severity Reason: Call audio is severely degraded, making communication difficult and potentially unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: USB headset sends incorrect data to audio subsystem, causing playback noise; patch from vendor to fix is blocked by vendor freeze policy.

rows.Title: Downloading and uploading problem on Samsung members app
rows.Problem: Downloading and uploading problem on Samsung members app, YouTube, Facebook and others platform
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience downloading and uploading problems with the Samsung Members app and other platforms.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects core functionality across multiple platforms, leading to failure in content access and app usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Camera stuttering
rows.Problem: Camera stuttering
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera experience is stuttering after the One UI 8 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of the camera function, causing intermittent stuttering but not complete failure or device unavailability.

rows.Title: Getting shutters while recording video
rows.Problem: Getting shutters while recording video. Dropping frames.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recording shows shutters and drops frames during capture.
rows.Severity Reason: Shutters and frame drops during recording prevent stable video capture, making the feature unusable.

rows.Title: System UI Not responding
rows.Problem: System UI not responding
rows.Summarized Problem: The system UI is not responding, causing usability issues.
rows.Severity Reason: The UI not responding makes the device interface unresponsive, preventing user interaction.

rows.Title: Smart switch is not working
rows.Problem: Smart switch is not working
rows.Summarized Problem: The smart switch is not functioning properly.
rows.Severity Reason: The smart switch is not working, but the issue is tied to device policy rather than a core system failure, indicating a partial malfunction that requires administrative intervention.

rows.Title: Navigation bar overlapping
rows.Problem: Navigation bar at the bottom is overlapping over the buttons making it impossible to click the buttons on that page
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar at the bottom is overlapping the buttons, making them impossible to click.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from interacting with buttons on the page, but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Apps are getting automatically closed
rows.Problem: Apps that are slated for deep sleep are getting automatically closed from recent apps after about a minute of inactivity in the background, following the UI 8 update. This behavior was not present before the update, as shown in a video where Swiggy and Tata Cliq apps are minimized and Microsoft Edge is used actively, with Swiggy closing but Tata Cliq remaining active.
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps are being automatically closed after a minute of background inactivity due to deep sleep management changes post UI 8 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of background app management, affecting some apps but not all, leading to inconsistent behavior.

rows.Title: Samsung native apps not showing on Gemini
rows.Problem: Samsung native apps not showing on Gemini in galaxy s24 snapdragon variant during flipkart sale
rows.Summarized Problem: Samsung native apps are missing from the Gemini interface on the galaxy s24 snapdragon variant.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where apps are missing from a feature, but the device remains usable and core functions operate normally.

rows.Title: Phone's renderer misbehaving after One UI 8.0 update
rows.Problem: Phone's renderer is misbehaving after One UI 8.0 update. Even with dark mode on, some screens and texts appear white or in light mode. Text on home screen that was white before has turned dark, and dark text on app lists has become white. When typing in search bar, rendering issues occur.
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone's display renderer is incorrectly rendering dark mode, causing text to appear in unintended light mode on home screen and app lists.
rows.Severity Reason: Partial malfunction of dark mode rendering affects user experience but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Now brief not available
rows.Problem: Now brief application is not available after one ui8 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief feature is missing after a UI8 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely unavailable after an update, preventing users from accessing a core functionality on the lock screen.

rows.Title: Swiping up from middle of screen to go to recent apps
rows.Problem: When swiping up from the middle of the screen to go to recent apps, the active app disappears from the recent screen without closing. The app remains open and can be re-opened via app icon. This occurs randomly across multiple apps like Instagram and Brave Browser.
rows.Summarized Problem: The active app disappears when swiping up to access recent apps, even though it remains open and can be re-opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the launcher's recent apps feature, but the app remains accessible and does not affect overall device usability.

rows.Title: Smart View Not working
rows.Problem: Unable to mirror screen on PC/laptop from device; other mobiles connect easily
rows.Summarized Problem: Smart View fails to mirror screen to PC/laptop, while other devices connect successfully.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature partially functions but fails under specific conditions, preventing reliable screen mirroring.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a mismatch in pre-shared keys between mobile and peer devices; resolution requires resetting Smart View and Wi-Fi settings on both devices.

rows.Title: Poor quality sound in Dolby Atmos
rows.Problem: issue with equalizer problem
rows.Summarized Problem: Sound quality is poor when using Dolby Atmos.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a functional audio experience but does not cause device crash or data loss, only a partial degradation in sound quality.

rows.Title: Apps inside Secure Folder cannot see or select files in Secure Folder storage for uploads
rows.Problem: File picker inside Secure Folder shows only main phone storage, not files within Secure Folder. Apps like Brave or Chrome installed in Secure Folder cannot access or select files for uploads.
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps installed inside Secure Folder cannot access or select files stored in Secure Folder for uploads.
rows.Severity Reason: Users cannot upload files from Secure Folder, making core functionality of secure storage unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue needs to be checked with Google Documents UI; registered in Google issue tracker.

rows.Title: Remove card in quick access
rows.Problem: Bug in Samsung wallet when trying to remove a card in quick access
rows.Summarized Problem: A bug causes a card to reappear after being removed from the quick access in Samsung Wallet.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue results in partial malfunction of the quick access feature, preventing users from properly managing their cards.

rows.Title: Samsung Calendar App keeps disappearing
rows.Problem: The Samsung Calendar app keeps disappearing after a factory reset or software flash, reappearing briefly before vanishing again after restarting. Multiple resets and software reflashes have not resolved the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Calendar app intermittently disappears after device restarts or software updates, reappearing briefly before vanishing again.
rows.Severity Reason: The app is a core functionality that fails to remain accessible after resets, making it unusable for users who rely on it.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by a system-level process (dex2oat) running post-update, which may interfere with app stability. A countermeasure is to wait for device stability post-update, with performance improving over time.

rows.Title: Low network coverage
rows.Problem: Galaxy A16 shows only 2 or 1 signal bars indoors, with poor data performance; same issue on different SIMs and in same location; Vivo V21e shows good signal and data under same conditions.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung Galaxy A16 shows weak signal and poor data performance indoors, even with different SIMs and under same conditions, while a previous device shows good signal and data.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial signal performance and data throughput, but does not cause device crash or complete failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Slow Uploading and downloading problem
rows.Problem: Slow Uploading and downloading problem on A35 5G device
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences slow uploading and downloading speeds on WiFi.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue directly affects core network functionality and device usability, making internet access slow and inefficient.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Notification panel pops up suddenly without animation when pulled from edge of screen
rows.Problem: Notification issue when pulling notification panel from edge of screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The notification panel appears suddenly without animation when pulled from the edge of the screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the UI animation, affecting user experience but not causing device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Notifications bar not pulling down when on other apps
rows.Problem: Notifications bar not pulling down when on other apps
rows.Summarized Problem: The notifications bar does not pull down when the user is on other apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially missing, preventing users from accessing notifications when on other apps, but the device remains usable.

rows.Title: Device got stuck/hang
rows.Problem: Screen got stuck
rows.Summarized Problem: The device screen gets stuck when no action is taken, indicating a performance issue in the idle state.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen getting stuck renders the device unusable, preventing user interaction.
rows.R&D Comment: The issue is caused by excessive work on the main thread in the Instagram app, leading to frame skipping; no Samsung involvement or debug capability exists.

rows.Title: Keyboard functions not working
rows.Problem: Keyboard functions are not working, like swipe to type and suggestions
rows.Summarized Problem: Swiping to type and text suggestions are not functioning in the Samsung keyboard.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a minor UI functionality limitation that can be resolved via user settings, not affecting device usability.

rows.Title: Adaptive clock style not working on lockscreen
rows.Problem: Clock wallpaper issue on lockscreen
rows.Summarized Problem: The adaptive clock style is not working on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing on the lock screen, preventing proper display of the adaptive clock style, but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Previous version of LockStar lacked DB field to support Stretch font. Countermeasure: Distribute LockStar version with DB field supporting Stretch font.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi / Bluetooth unresponsive button
rows.Problem: Clicking on Wi-Fi and Bluetooth options does not work. Resetting the devices does not resolve the issue. Unable to connect to Wi-Fi, impacting office work.
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi and Bluetooth buttons are unresponsive, preventing connection to Wi-Fi and disrupting office work.
rows.Severity Reason: User cannot connect to Wi-Fi, which is essential for office work, making device unusable for core tasks.

rows.Title: Camera quality poor, focus missing, colour dropping
rows.Problem: Samsung S25 Ultra camera has poor photo quality, missing focus, colour dropping in both photos and videos, significantly below expected for a flagship device
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera on the Samsung S25 Ultra produces low-quality photos with missing focus and colour dropping in both photos and videos.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to deliver basic functionality expected of a flagship device, resulting in unusable photo quality and visual inconsistencies.

rows.Title: Quick Panel spacing set to narrow with quickstar but shows as default
rows.Problem: QuickStar button spacing resets to default and seconds display shows as default in quick panel
rows.Summarized Problem: QuickStar button spacing and seconds display in the quick panel reset to default settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature setting resets intermittently, causing partial malfunction but does not render the device unusable.

rows.Title: Charging notification and navigation bar overlapping
rows.Problem: Charging notification and navigation bar exhibit overlapping behavior
rows.Summarized Problem: The charging notification overlaps with the navigation bar during charging.
rows.Severity Reason: This is a cosmetic UI issue that does not affect device functionality or usability.

rows.Title: Game open in mini window mode
rows.Problem: Game open in mini mode
rows.Summarized Problem: Games open in a mini window mode instead of full screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The game does not launch in full screen mode, which is a partial malfunction affecting user experience.

rows.Title: Create routine with Get Date and Time and use in Samsung Notes
rows.Problem: Creating a Samsung routine with Get Date and Time and using it as a variable in Samsung Notes causes it to hang
rows.Summarized Problem: A Samsung routine using Get Date and Time variable in Samsung Notes causes the system to hang.
rows.Severity Reason: The system hangs when executing the routine, making it unusable and potentially leading to a crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Dolby Atmos doesn't work
rows.Problem: Dolby doesn't work anymore
rows.Summarized Problem: Dolby Atmos audio feature is not functioning on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not working, but the device remains usable and no data loss or crash occurs.
rows.R&D Comment: Dolby Atmos Auto mode may have different effects depending on the content. Please select another mode and try it.

rows.Title: Search window opens automatically when attaching book cover keyboard
rows.Problem: Search window opens automatically when attaching book cover keyboard via pogo pins on tab s7 fe one ui 6.1. Happens even after cache clear and factory data reset. Please resolve the issue it is so annoying.
rows.Summarized Problem: The search window opens automatically when the book cover keyboard is attached via pogo pins, even after clearing cache and performing a factory data reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs consistently and persists after factory reset, making the device unusable in normal operation when the keyboard is attached.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi Calling not working
rows.Problem: Wi-Fi Calling not working after One UI 8 update; feature fails to activate or drops calls
rows.Summarized Problem: Wi-Fi Calling feature is not working after the One UI 8 update, failing to activate or dropping calls.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to activate or drops calls, making a core communication function unusable.

rows.Title: Battery Drain during Voice Call
rows.Problem: Battery usage during voice calls is high and drains quickly
rows.Summarized Problem: Battery drains rapidly during voice calls.
rows.Severity Reason: Device becomes unusable during calls due to rapid battery drain, affecting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: Issue scenario logs and battery dumps are missing; if similar issue occurs, capture logs immediately and raise a new case.

rows.Title: Significant noise in video recording
rows.Problem: Noise in video recordings when using the camera in Super Steady Video Mode, affecting multiple videos under different conditions
rows.Summarized Problem: Video recordings exhibit significant noise when using Super Steady Video Mode, particularly in high ISO and short shutter speed conditions.
rows.Severity Reason: The noise occurs during normal usage in a supported mode and affects multiple videos, but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.
rows.R&D Comment: Noise occurs in Super Steady Video Mode due to high ISO and short shutter speed; countermeasure is the same as cause.

rows.Title: Light sensor and magnetic sensor not working
rows.Problem: Light sensor and magnetic sensor not working in galaxy m35 device after receiving ui 8 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Light and magnetic sensors are not functioning after the UI 8 update on the Galaxy M35.
rows.Severity Reason: The sensors are not working, but the issue is not complete or critical enough to render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: After reviewing the attached log, all sensors appear to be functioning normally. Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Lockscreen Clock changes location automatically
rows.Problem: Clock style issue on lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The clock on the lock screen changes its position automatically.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the appearance of a key UI element but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: unable to share photos and videos from the secure folder to WhatsApp or any other app outside the secure folder
rows.Problem: Unable to share photos and videos from the secure folder to WhatsApp or any other app outside the secure folder. Users must first remove files from the secure folder, share them, and then reinsert them, which is very irritating. The error occurs repeatedly when selecting and sharing files.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot share photos and videos directly from the secure folder to external apps like WhatsApp without first removing them from the folder.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents direct sharing from a secure folder, forcing users to manually move files, which undermines the core functionality of secure storage and usability.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue needs to be checked in Google Documents UI. It has been registered in Google issue tracker (https://partnerissuetracker.corp.google.com/u/0/issues/446997790). We will update it after Google's review.

rows.Title: 15% battery drain in 1 hour
rows.Problem: Battery drains quickly during YouTube playback, especially with high speaker volume and 5G network, despite no background apps running. Battery consumption increases when fast forwarding or skipping videos. Previously, background app registrar was enabled, but now disabled.
rows.Summarized Problem: Device experiences significant battery drain during YouTube playback under high volume and 5G conditions, with increased consumption during video skipping or fast forwarding.
rows.Severity Reason: Battery drain occurs during active usage, leading to rapid depletion and potential device unusability within one hour under normal use.
rows.R&D Comment: Battery drain is caused by high speaker volume and 5G network usage during YouTube playback; countermeasure is to verify user environment consistency and ensure accurate battery consumption measurement.

rows.Title: Bluetooth S Pen cannot rewind or fastforward videos on Amazon Prime, Netflix, Hotstar
rows.Problem: Bluetooth S Pen cannot rewind or fastforward videos on Amazon Prime, Netflix, and Hotstar when flicking left or right; other functions work normally
rows.Summarized Problem: The Bluetooth S Pen fails to rewind or fastforward videos on Amazon Prime, Netflix, and Hotstar when using left or right flick gestures.
rows.Severity Reason: The function is partially missing but other features work, indicating a specific malfunction rather than complete device failure.

rows.Title: Unable to make call through swipe option
rows.Problem: Call swipe option is not showing after downloading android 1ate
rows.Summarized Problem: The call swipe option is missing after updating to Android 1ate.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially missing after an update, preventing a common functionality but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Dolby Atmos feature not working
rows.Problem: Dolby Atmos feature not working on Samsung mobile with mobile speakers after UI 8 update
rows.Summarized Problem: Dolby Atmos feature is not working on devices with mono speakers after UI 8 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature does not work on mono speaker devices, which are common, but is supported only on stereo models, leading to partial functionality failure.
rows.R&D Comment: Galaxy M36 5G supports mono speaker and Dolby Atmos is supported only on stereo speaker models; feature setting remains unchanged from Android 15.

rows.Title: Gesture navigation with hints off causes blank space at bottom of screen
rows.Problem: Display layout issue with gesture navigation
rows.Summarized Problem: A blank space appears at the bottom of the screen when using gesture navigation with hints disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects the display layout but does not cause device crash or data loss, and only occurs under specific navigation settings.

rows.Title: Video Not Saving after trimming or applying a filter
rows.Problem: Cannot save a video after trimming or applying a filter, even with noise reduction AI. Save and save copy options do not produce any output.
rows.Summarized Problem: Video fails to save after trimming or applying filters, even with noise reduction AI.
rows.Severity Reason: User cannot save edited videos, which is a core functionality required for content creation and device usability.

rows.Title: Vibration not working for notification
rows.Problem: Cx facing notification not vibrating issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Notifications are not vibrating on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The vibration feedback is missing for notifications, which affects user awareness but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Digital Wellbeing showing wrong screen time
rows.Problem: Digital Wellbeing showing wrong screen time
rows.Summarized Problem: The screen time display in Digital Wellbeing shows incorrect data, likely due to inaccurate app usage aggregation.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in data display, not causing device failure or data loss, but affecting user trust in metrics.
rows.R&D Comment: The cause is inaccurate app usage aggregation due to overlapping time not being fully accounted for; the countermeasure is to correct the usage log calculation and ensure all app times are properly summed after overlap removal.

rows.Title: Lockscreen icon colour background are different
rows.Problem: Lockscreen icon colour background issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The colour background of the lockscreen icon is inconsistent.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a cosmetic UI element and does not affect device usability or core functionality.

rows.Title: Device Wipes All User Data After Power-Off at 0% Battery
rows.Problem: Device erases all user data when battery drops to 0% and powers off, resulting in unexpected factory reset upon reboot. This has occurred over 10 times.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device deletes all user data when the battery reaches 0% and powers off, causing an unexpected factory reset on reboot.
rows.Severity Reason: Data loss leads to complete erasure of user information, making the device unusable without recovery.

rows.Title: video stuttering with earphones
rows.Problem: video glitching or stuttering occurs when using streaming apps like Netflix, JioHotstar, and Crunchyroll with earphones, but not with other apps
rows.Summarized Problem: Video streaming stuttering and glitching occurs when using earphones with streaming apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video playback during streaming but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Whatsapp images not visible in gallery
rows.Problem: Whatsapp images not visible in gallery even after resetting app preferences and clearing cache
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp images are not visible in the gallery despite clearing cache and resetting app preferences.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of image visibility in the gallery after app reset, but images are still accessible via WhatsApp settings.

rows.Title: Now brief not showing on lock screen
rows.Problem: Now brief is not showing except the morning brief on the lock screen
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief feature is not displaying on the lock screen except for the morning brief.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing for most times on the lock screen, but shows intermittently in the morning, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: Now brief on nowbar disappears when app resumes; shows only once daily on lock screen, concept-based.

rows.Title: Device stopped showing 5g network after UI8 update
rows.Problem: Phone stopped showing 5g network after One UI 8 update; persists despite airplane mode, battery saver, SIM removal, and restarts; currently shows only 4g, leading to data pack depletion
rows.Summarized Problem: Device fails to connect to 5g network after One UI 8 update, showing only 4g instead.
rows.Severity Reason: User cannot access 5g data, leading to loss of data plan and device functionality.

rows.Title: Camera is failing while open
rows.Problem: My camera is failing every time I try to open it, even after clearing cache and resetting the phone
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera fails to open and function properly despite multiple troubleshooting attempts.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera fails to open, which is a major functional failure preventing core device usage.
rows.R&D Comment: Rear Ultra Wide(x0.6) camera has I2C and MIPI errors; CS center should inspect the hardware module.

rows.Title: System UI crashing and charging stuck
rows.Problem: System UI keeps freezing and shows 'System UI isn't responding'. Battery percentage gets stuck at 26% while charging, and sometimes charge level decreases.
rows.Summarized Problem: The System UI crashes and freezes, causing the battery percentage to get stuck at 26% during charging.
rows.Severity Reason: The system UI crash and charging instability render the device unusable and prevent proper charging, which is a core device function.

rows.Title: Mobile app disappeared
rows.Problem: Mobile app disappeared over the past two months
rows.Summarized Problem: The mobile app has disappeared after two months of use in idle mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The app failure occurs after prolonged inactivity, affecting usability but not causing device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Camera Getting hanged while changed Zoom 3.x
rows.Problem: Cx facing camera issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The camera freezes when zoom level is changed.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera hangs during zoom, making it unusable and disrupting core functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: There is some Rear Ultra Wide(x0.6) camera HW error in the attached log. Please visit to CS center and request to check the Rear Ultra Wide(x0.6) camera module or related HW.

rows.Title: Restart black screen appears
rows.Problem: Black screen appears after restart and resolves after unlocking
rows.Summarized Problem: A black screen appears after device restart and resolves upon unlocking.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue occurs after restart, affecting device usability during boot, but does not cause full crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Incorrect weather information showing in Weather App
rows.Problem: Current weather report shows clear when it is actually raining heavily
rows.Summarized Problem: The weather app displays incorrect conditions, showing clear when it is actually raining heavily.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the weather display, where current conditions are misrepresented, but the app remains functional and does not crash or freeze.
rows.R&D Comment: The latest forecast is provided as Shower. Please attach a screenshot for accurate analysis.

rows.Title: Unable to restore Secure folder backup
rows.Problem: I can’t restore my Secure Folder backup after a factory reset on my Galaxy M55s 5G
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot restore their Secure Folder backup after a factory reset.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is essential for data recovery, and its failure prevents users from retrieving critical personal data after a factory reset.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Unable to register on YONO SBI app
rows.Problem: YONO SBI app is not working on phone after purchase. Issue persists despite contacting SBI customer care, who found no problem on their end. User faces significant banking issues.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot register on the YONO SBI banking app after purchasing the phone, despite no issues reported by the app provider.
rows.Severity Reason: The app fails to function entirely, preventing users from accessing banking services, which is critical for daily use.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue is caused by a third-party app defect and requires the app developer to fix it; no Samsung-side intervention is possible.

rows.Title: Gallery access stuck
rows.Problem: Cannot fully access the gallery when trying to edit photos using Snapseed or Gemini. Accessing the gallery results in it getting stuck, making it difficult to select photos.
rows.Summarized Problem: The gallery gets stuck when accessed for editing in Snapseed or Gemini, preventing users from selecting photos.
rows.Severity Reason: The gallery fails to respond during editing operations, blocking essential functionality and making photo selection impossible.
rows.R&D Comment: Attached logs and video are not in sync. Please attach new logs and video in sync.

rows.Title: OEM Unlock not appearing in Developer Options
rows.Problem: OEM Unlock option not appearing in Developer Options
rows.Summarized Problem: The OEM Unlock option is missing from Developer Options.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not available, but the setting is expected to exist in Developer Options, affecting user access to device-level security functions.

rows.Title: Samsung note not saving image file edited with the spen
rows.Problem: Handwriting is not saved
rows.Summarized Problem: Handwriting entered in Samsung Notes is not saved when edited with the spen.
rows.Severity Reason: The handwriting feature, which is a core functionality in the Notes app, fails to save user input, rendering the feature unusable.

rows.Title: Filters and effects not working in Instagram App
rows.Problem: Instagram app filters and effects are not working. When a filter is clicked, it does not activate. This issue started after the latest software update on the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra.
rows.Summarized Problem: Instagram app filters and effects are not activating when selected.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents the use of specific camera features but does not cause device crash or data loss, and functionality is partially missing.
rows.R&D Comment: Similar issue found previously. Request to 3rd Party (Non Samsung Issue).

rows.Title: Gemini live not working
rows.Problem: Cx facing Gemini live issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Gemini live feature is not functioning for users.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely missing and unavailable, rendering a key functionality unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Gemini live option was removed in the app by Google; Countermeasure: App developer should handle such dynamic changes properly.

rows.Title: Attached Option in Secure Folder shows general files instead of secure folder files
rows.Problem: Opening the attach options in secure folder shows general files instead of secure folder files, occurring after UI 8 update
rows.Summarized Problem: The attach options in the secure folder show general files instead of secure folder files.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is partially malfunctioning, showing incorrect content instead of secure folder files, but the device remains usable.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue needs to be checked in Google Documents UI; registered in Google issue tracker.

rows.Title: Navigation bar overlapped with 3rd party apps
rows.Problem: Navigation bar is overlapped in other apps including Market App
rows.Summarized Problem: The navigation bar is overlapping with third-party app content, causing visual obstruction in the user interface.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects app usability in multiple third-party apps but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Internet not working
rows.Problem: Internet is not working after one UI 8 update. Always showing E. I have full network in other devices. 5G and other network stopped working I have already restarted.
rows.Summarized Problem: Internet connectivity is failing after a UI 8 update, with 5G and other networks no longer working, despite having full network access on other devices.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents basic device functionality (internet access) and occurs across network types after a software update, making it critical for usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Bluetooth not connecting
rows.Problem: Bluetooth not connecting
rows.Summarized Problem: Bluetooth is not connecting properly after the October security update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction in Bluetooth connectivity, which may occur intermittently after a software update.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause and countermeasure both point to the need for CP silent logs to diagnose the issue.

rows.Title: Location not showing correct location
rows.Problem: Phone shows location 45 kilometers away from actual position and repeats the same incorrect location despite checking settings and restarting device
rows.Summarized Problem: The phone displays an incorrect and persistent location that is 45 kilometers away from the user's actual position.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows a completely wrong location repeatedly, making navigation and location-based services unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Fake GPS app installed on device. Countermeasure: Guide customer to remove fake GPS app; if issue persists, advise re-registration and log collection.

rows.Title: Restart not working, phone powers off instead
rows.Problem: Battery issue during restart
rows.Summarized Problem: When attempting to restart the phone, it powers off instead of restarting.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to restart properly, resulting in a complete power-off behavior that prevents normal operation.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Abnormal power resets detected in eRR.p logs; Counter Measure: Request CP silent logs for analysis.

rows.Title: bluetooth s pen not able to forward and rewind or go to next and previous videos
rows.Problem: bluetooth s pen not able to forward and rewind or go to next and previous videos
rows.Summarized Problem: The Bluetooth S Pen cannot forward, rewind, or navigate between videos.
rows.Severity Reason: The S Pen's media navigation functions are not working, preventing users from controlling video playback, which is a partial malfunction of a core feature.

rows.Title: Read Text Aloud in Modes and Routines is not working
rows.Problem: Modes and Routine issue
rows.Summarized Problem: Voice reading functionality is not working in modes and routines.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing in a specific context, preventing full functionality but not rendering the device unusable.
rows.R&D Comment: This issue occurred because the information was not updated properly when entering the app. Please reboot and check again after 5 minutes. This issue will be improved in the next One UI version.

rows.Title: Unable to change the preferred mode in mobile network settings
rows.Problem: 5G still not connected to the network after UI update
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to connect to 5G despite UI updates, indicating a network compatibility issue.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial functionality failure in network connection after an update, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide valid CP log, dumpstate log, and test videos that include the process of switching flight modes and test cases.

rows.Title: Glitchy animations while checking weather
rows.Problem: Glitchy animations while checking weather
rows.Summarized Problem: Glitchy animations occur when checking the weather.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves intermittent performance degradation during weather check, not causing device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: device sudden turnoff while playing game
rows.Problem: device turns off during gameplay after fast charging and battery drain despite showing low battery level
rows.Summarized Problem: Device turns off during gameplay after fast charging and significant battery drain despite showing low battery level.
rows.Severity Reason: Device suddenly turns off during use, indicating a critical battery or power management failure that renders the device unusable during gameplay.

rows.Title: Mobile data consumption is very high
rows.Problem: I cannot use my mobile due to heavy mobile internet data consumption
rows.Summarized Problem: High mobile data consumption is preventing the device from being usable.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to excessive data consumption, leading to potential service disruption and user frustration.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: Edge Panel handle getting disappears
rows.Problem: Edge Panel issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The handle in the Edge Panel disappears unexpectedly.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visibility and usability of a UI element but does not prevent device operation or cause system failure.

rows.Title: Touch not recognised
rows.Problem: New phone has touch recognition issues, severely problematic
rows.Summarized Problem: Touch input is not recognised on the device, especially on a new phone.
rows.Severity Reason: The device fails to recognise touch input, which is a fundamental functionality required for basic operation.

rows.Title: Unable to change home screen folder colour
rows.Problem: Unable to change home screen folder colour
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change the colour of home screen folders.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI feature, preventing customization but not rendering the device unusable.

rows.Title: Walking or work out details do not match with the main page of health app
rows.Problem: Walking or work out details do not match with the main page of health app
rows.Summarized Problem: Workout details in the health app do not match the main page content.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction where data display is inconsistent, but the app remains functional and usable.

rows.Title: Camera stabilization flickers when phone moves
rows.Problem: Camera quality issue during video recording
rows.Summarized Problem: Camera stabilization flickers during video recording when the phone is in motion.
rows.Severity Reason: The stabilization feature is present but unstable under movement, resulting in intermittent flickering, which affects video quality but does not cause device failure or crash.
rows.R&D Comment: Stabilization is operating as expected based on logs and video; maintain current status.

rows.Title: Screen doesn't wake up on notification
rows.Problem: The screen does not wake up when a notification is received while the device is off, unlike before when it would briefly turn on to show the notification.
rows.Summarized Problem: The device screen fails to wake up when a notification is received while the screen is off.
rows.Severity Reason: The screen failure prevents users from seeing notifications, impacting usability but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: App Drawer not visible properly after UI update
rows.Problem: App drawer looks bad when Discover tab is beside Personal tab; tabs hide during scrolling, UI becomes irritating and was not happening previously
rows.Summarized Problem: The app drawer appears incorrectly when the Discover tab is beside the Personal tab, with tabs hiding during scrolling, causing an irritating UI experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a noticeable UI malfunction but does not prevent device usage or crash.

rows.Title: 5g network not working proper
rows.Problem: 5g network not working properly on device, stable 5g previously available and functioning on older models, software issue claimed to save battery, user experiencing instability at home
rows.Summarized Problem: The device fails to maintain stable 5G connectivity, despite previous stable performance on the same model.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents stable 5G operation, which is essential for core device functionality and user experience, especially in a home environment where 5G is expected to work reliably.
rows.R&D Comment: Please provide CP silent logs for the issue.

rows.Title: notification content visibility in Secure Folder
rows.Problem: notification content from apps inside Secure Folder remains hidden after Android 16 / One UI 8 update, even when 'Show content when Secure Folder is locked' is selected
rows.Summarized Problem: Notifications from apps inside Secure Folder do not display content when the Secure Folder is locked, despite the setting being enabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of notification visibility, which affects user experience but does not cause device failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: To show notification data of secure folder in primary user, please advise user to activate 'Show Content' in notification settings in secure folder. Open Secure folder > 3 dots > Settings > notifications > Show content (select it). With this setting selected, Secure Folder notifications will show content even if locked.

rows.Title: Unable to deactivate device admin app settings for secure folder
rows.Problem: Device admin settings cannot be deactivated after UI 8 update; secure folder requires device admin privileges to function
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot deactivate device admin app settings for the secure folder after UI 8 update.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents full control over device admin settings but does not cause device crash or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: Secure Folder requires device admin privileges to function; removing the secure folder space removes these privileges.

rows.Title: Setting shut down and restarting
rows.Problem: My device is just getting shut down and restarting. One UI and home UI keeps getting crash
rows.Summarized Problem: Device repeatedly shuts down and restarts with UI crashes.
rows.Severity Reason: Device repeatedly shuts down and restarts, making it unusable and causing UI crashes.

rows.Title: Wrong storage value is shown for recycle bin
rows.Problem: The device's recycle bin shows data in GBs even after emptying it, and users cannot clear hidden data in the My Files app.
rows.Summarized Problem: The recycle bin in the My Files app incorrectly displays storage usage in GBs after being emptied, preventing users from clearing hidden data.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects user visibility of actual storage usage but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Apps not working despite latest update
rows.Problem: Device shows security risk error due to play integrity saying not certified, apps do not work, and device integrity error persists despite being on latest update.
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps fail to work due to device certification error despite being on the latest update.
rows.Severity Reason: Device fails to run apps due to certification error, rendering core functionality unusable.

rows.Title: Unable to run GOS lite
rows.Problem: Game Plugins and GOS Lite are not working properly and show the error "Unable to run GOS Lite"
rows.Summarized Problem: GOS Lite is not working and displays an error indicating it cannot be run.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is completely non-functional and prevents users from using a key in-app functionality.
rows.R&D Comment: From Android V-os, GamePlugin does not supported anymore, we will provide features of GamePlugin in later by Goodlock and GameBooster app

rows.Title: Downloaded filters not shown in camera app
rows.Problem: Downloaded filters are not visible in the camera app; no options available to add or use filters from Galaxy Store
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot see or use downloaded filters in the camera app despite having them in Galaxy Store.
rows.Severity Reason: The camera app lacks a visible option to add or use filters, preventing users from accessing downloaded content, but the device remains otherwise functional.
rows.Resolve Type: Product Requirement, UX Guide, Standard Technical Specification

rows.Title: Internet, WIFI, BT not working
rows.Problem: WiFi, hotspot, and Bluetooth not working after update to Android 16 UI-8.0. Resetting network and data settings did not resolve the issue.
rows.Summarized Problem: WiFi, hotspot, and Bluetooth are not working after the Android 16 UI-8.0 update.
rows.Severity Reason: Device cannot connect to basic network services, making it unusable for core functions like internet access.

rows.Title: YouTube app crash
rows.Problem: YouTube app crashes intermittently when opening, though it eventually resumes working. Device is updated, has sufficient memory and storage, but crashes still occur.
rows.Summarized Problem: The YouTube app crashes when opened and does not recover reliably.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on opening, which prevents user from accessing a core media function, leading to a significant disruption in usability.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: YouTube app process exits due to SIGNAL and LOW_MEMORY. Countermeasure: Recommend checking internet connection, updating app, and restarting the app.

rows.Title: Volume button working automatically
rows.Problem: Volume button auto up/down issue
rows.Summarized Problem: The volume button is automatically adjusting volume instead of allowing user control.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes unintended volume changes but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Unable to select files in browser
rows.Problem: Critical File Access Block in Browser
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot select files in the browser.
rows.Severity Reason: File access is blocked, preventing users from performing basic file operations in the browser, making the functionality unusable.

rows.Title: Sound Issue
rows.Problem: Sound erupting

rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves partial malfunction of sound output, causing unexpected behavior but not complete failure or device unavailability.
rows.R&D Comment: B OS Ver 16 is already planned for this model. Kindly help share behavior on B OS. If reproduced pls report PLM accordingly.

rows.Title: Pending update message shows despite being up to date

rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a UI element, causing a misleading alert but not preventing device operation or causing crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: System apps showing multiple times in app list
rows.Problem: Same system app showing more than once

rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of the app list display, causing duplication but not rendering the device unusable or crashing.

rows.Title: Galaxy Watch6 measuring incorrect heart rate value

rows.Summarized Problem: Galaxy Watch6 is providing incorrect heart rate readings.
rows.Severity Reason: The device shows inaccurate heart rate values, which affects health monitoring but does not cause a complete system failure or data loss.
rows.R&D Comment: In-sufficient log data; issue occurred before log capture, suggesting a timing gap in log extraction.

rows.Title: System incorrectly restarts or freezes

rows.Summarized Problem: The device hangs and automatically restarts.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unusable due to repeated hanging and auto-restart, making it functionally inoperable.

rows.Title: Unable to sign in to My Samsung Account
rows.Problem: Unable to sign in to my Samsung Account on my Galaxy Tab S9 FE (One UI 7.0). It shows a message saying "My Galaxy login is not possible on this device." I’ve already updated the software and cleared Samsung Account cache/data, but the issue persists.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot sign in to their Samsung Account on the Galaxy Tab S9 FE, with a message indicating login is not possible on the device.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from accessing their account, rendering core device functionality (like personalization and syncing) unusable.

rows.Title: Screen recording have very low brightness
rows.Problem: Screen recording on Tab S9 Ultra shows washed out videos with very low brightness after Android 16 update, affecting both default and third-party apps.

rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual quality during screen recording but does not cause device failure or crash.

rows.Title: Handwritten notes disappear on zooming out
rows.Problem: Handwritten notes on the last two pages before closing are being erased and need to be rewritten
rows.Summarized Problem: Handwritten notes disappear when zooming out, requiring users to rewrite them.
rows.Severity Reason: Users lose critical handwritten content, making the feature unusable for core functionality.

rows.Title: Permanent task bar covers menu buttons

rows.Summarized Problem: The permanent task bar covers menu buttons, making them unclickable and inaccessible.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents interaction with key UI elements but does not cause device crash or data loss.

rows.Title: Align letters' option is disabled

rows.Severity Reason: The feature is not accessible due to freezing, but users can still access other functions, indicating partial malfunction.
rows.R&D Comment: The handwriting clean-up feature is not activated for unsupported languages due to linguistic specificity; the same limitation applies to text alignment, and no active countermeasure is implemented.

rows.Title: Saved changes for adaptive clock is not working
rows.Problem: After the new UI8 update, whenever I try to set up the new clock feature on the lock screen, it's not working. When I set up the clock on the screen and save it, it automatically changes the clock design and location.
rows.Summarized Problem: The adaptive clock feature on the lock screen fails to retain user settings after saving, instead automatically changing its design and location.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature fails to save user preferences, resulting in inconsistent behavior and loss of user configuration.
rows.R&D Comment: Cause: Previous version of LockStar lacked DB field to support Stretch font; Countermeasure: Distribute LockStar version with DB field supporting Stretch font

rows.Title: Edge Panel and Quick Settings panel size not adjusting after DPI increase
rows.Problem: The Edge Panel and Quick Settings panel remain the same size even after increasing the DPI value in Developer Options.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Edge Panel and Quick Settings panel do not resize when DPI is increased in Developer Options.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects UI consistency but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Bluetooth WiFi and Hotspot stopped working
rows.Problem: Bluetooth, Bluetooth WiFi, and Hotspot stopped working after One UI 8 update; they do not activate when clicked. Tried all solutions including factory reset. Unable to revert to One UI 7.

rows.Severity Reason: Device connectivity functions are completely non-functional, preventing basic usage of the phone.

rows.Title: Wi-Fi and Hotspot stopped working

rows.Title: WhatsApp not opening

rows.Severity Reason: The app consistently crashes upon launch, preventing user from accessing a core communication tool, making the device unusable for messaging.
rows.R&D Comment: This app is not developed by Samsung; code modification is not possible. Issue requires reporting to the app developer, who suggests it is low priority due to low reproduction frequency.

rows.Summarized Problem: The device exhibits persistent UI stuttering and lag during app folder opening, multitasking transitions, and home screen unlock animations.

rows.R&D Comment: There are no abnormal logs in the attached logs as CPU and memory usage are fine, also no fatal/crash were seen. If issue is seen again, please attach proper issue reproduction steps with issue video and issue time logs along with systritecture.

rows.Severity Reason: The device hangs during use, making the feature unusable and potentially causing a system freeze.

rows.Title: Google Play System Update Not Available
rows.Problem: Device stuck on July 2025 Google Play system update while other devices received September 2025 or higher updates
rows.Summarized Problem: Device is stuck on July 2025 Google Play system update and cannot receive newer updates like September 2025.
rows.Severity Reason: Device is unable to receive system updates, which may lead to security vulnerabilities and lack of functionality.

rows.Title: Samsung DeX trackpad does not show up
rows.Problem: Samsung DeX trackpad does not show up and device automatically restarts
rows.Summarized Problem: The Samsung DeX trackpad fails to appear and causes the device to restart.
rows.Severity Reason: The device restarts after the trackpad fails to show, making it unusable and potentially leading to data loss or system instability.

rows.Title: AAOD turns off automatically and turns back on at 7 AM
rows.Problem: The always on display turns off at some point in the night and turns back on at 7 AM every morning
rows.Summarized Problem: The always on display turns off during the night and reactivates at 7 AM every morning.
rows.Severity Reason: The display turns off and on at fixed times, causing inconsistent visibility during nighttime, but the device remains otherwise functional.

rows.Title: Lag observed while watching YT shorts
